40027033	Kumtsh gm hu i bei g Jesus mamtsh am wo naggia. K hab e a'aga amai Golgotha. K ith hab d ahga Koshwak.
40027034	Kumtsh ab chum i'ich g nawait mo g kulani am wehnags mat wo hehogi g s-ko'ok. Tsh ab chum jeh k pi ab hu ih.
40027035	Kumtsh ab hahawa sisish kots t ab k am i kei g kots. Tsh am ha'i e chichwi g shonthal k am a'ai e gehg g wehschugaj
40027036	k am hahawa i thadhaiwua k nuhkuth.
40027037	Kumtsh an o'oha mam haschu ab abchuth k ab sihsh kots t ab ab thahm mo ab i mo'okch g Jesus. Sh hab chu'ig, “Ith o d Jesus ch d Tutuligo ha-kownalig.”
40027038	Tsh gohk ab ep ha nahngia kokots t ab gn hu a'ai. Sh eda d s-chu e'eskam ihtham.
40027039	Sh hegam mo an bihbimhim si gahi e mo'ogith ch ab si s-ko'okam has ahg g Jesus
40027040	hab kaijch, “Naptsh woho wo i wua g ge'e cheopi k am uhpam ep wo kei waik tash ab? Pegih, ab g hig i huduni kots t amjed k wo e tho'ibia maptp woho d wo Jiosh alithagk.”
40027041	Sh g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamtham ch ge'eged hab wa masma ep nahnko ahg hab kaijch,
40027042	“Ith atsh ha'i ha tho'ibia k atki wabshaba pi wo e nako mas wo hejel e tho'ibia. Nash hig pi woho d t-kownalig? Pegih, tt ab wo s-wohoch matp ab wo i huduni k wo e tho'ibia.
40027043	Ab o si hiwig g Jiosh ch hab e ahg mo d alithaj. Pegih, tt hig wo nei mas hu wo tho'ibia g Jiosh hemu.”
40027044	Chum wa hema hegam s-chu e'eskam mamt ab hab wa'ap ha nahngia kots t ab hab wa'ap s-ko'okam has ahg.
40027045	T am i thahm juh. T wehsko gei g s-chuhugam waik ohla ab.
40027046	Kutsh am i e ai g waik ohla. Sh si s-kaitham hab kaij g Jesus, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani,” mo hab d ahga, “Ni-Jioshga, Ni-Jioshga, shahchu apt ahgk am wabsh i ni-thagito?”
40027047	Sh ha'ijj hab kaij hegam mo am gegok, “Elijabad o ab chum waith.”
40027048	Tsh ab hema ha hekaj i med k an ha'ichu usko mat am wakch nawait ch ed k am uhgk i be k ab chum i'ich g Jesus.
40027049	Kush ha'i hab kaij, “Kia koi, tt hig wo nei mas ia wo jiwia g Elijabad k wo tho'ibia.”
40027050	Kutsh am si s-kaitham hab ha'ichu ep chei g Jesus k am hahawa i muh.
40027051	Kutsh hegai s-kowk ikus kuhpadag mash am s-tadnim naggia gd hu si eda g ge'e cheopi ab si shel e wantsh. T g jewed u'ugij k gam si e hahai g ge'eged hohothai.
40027052	Kutki g hiha'ini gam si e kuhkpi'o. T mu'ijj hegam mat heki hu koi ab s-wohochuthch g Jesus ab i wuwha muhkig amjed
40027053	i thahm mat g Jesus i wuhsh k gm hu i wahp amai mo hab e a'aga Si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kihhim ch d Jerusalem. K mu'ijj ha neith amai.
40027054	Tsh ihtham shonthal g e-ge'ejig wehm am i nei mat g Jesus muh k taht g jewed u'ujig k sha'i si e totothsith k hab kaij, “Woho oki d Jiosh alithag.”
40027055	Sh eda mu'ijj am ha'ichug hegam u'uwi mo ga hu amjed wehmaj g Jesus ab Galilee t amjed ch am ha'ichukaj i wehmaj. Ihtham ash ga hu wabsh mehk gegok ch ab neith.
40027056	Sh am ha wehmaj g Mary Magdalene ch hegai Mary mo d ha-je'e g James ch Joses ch heg ehp mo d Zebedeebad wehm kihkam ch d ha-je'e g James ch John.
40027057	Tsh am hahawa jiwia ihtha s-kais o'othham mo hab chehgig Joseph ch ab Arimathea t amjed ch ab s-wohochuth mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha. K eda e aihim mat wo i hud.
40027058	Tsh heg hekaj gm hu hih ihtha Joseph ab Pilate wui k ab tahni g Jesus honshpadag. Kush g Pilate am ha chehani mamt wo mah.
40027059	Tsh gm hu uhpam jiwia. Kumtsh am wehhejed ab i huduni g Jesus honshpadag. K am mia hab chu'ig g Joseph hiha'ini ch ab heki hu cheotas hothai ch ed. Kumtsh am i bei g honshpadag k am i hobino g si s-kehg ikuskaj k am cheh heg eda cheo k ab hahawa g ge ge'e hothai i himchuth k ab hekaj kuh g hiha'ini. Tsh gm hu hahawa uhpam hihi hegam Joseph.
40027061	Kush am thadha g Mary Magdalene heg wehm hema Mary ch am neith mat hebai cheh.
40027062	Ba'ich tash o d shahwai. Tsh am thatha g u'ugchu papal ch Palasi Pilate wui
40027063	k hab kaij, “T-kownalig, s-chegito ach mo wa ihtha s-chu iattomkam hab kaij matsh uhpam wo e chegito matsh d wo waik i tashk.
40027064	Neh pt am wo ha cheha mat wo si e nuhkuth g hiha'ini waik tash ab. T hekaj hab pi wo e nako g piongaj mas ab wo ha ehs g honshpadag k hab wo ha ahgi g hemajkam matki i wuhsh ab muhkig t amjed. Neh, ihtha ha-iattogi at ba'ich wo i si pi ap'ek mo g wehpegkam.”
40027065	Kush hab kaij g Pilate ab ha wui, “Am g ha'i wo ha u'uk g shonthal k am has i masma ab wo nuhkuth g hiha'ini.”
40027066	Kutsh am ha oi g shonthal. Kutsh gm hu hihim k ab si s-wihnam i kuh g hiha'ini k an bithsh g hothai k ab si chepos. Sh ihtham shonthal am nuhkuth g hiha'ini tash oitham ch chuhug oitham.
40028001	Sh am e aihim g thomig tash. Tsh am hiha'ini wui hihi g Mary Magdalene heg wehm hema Mary.
40028002	D am hahawa si u'ugij g jewed. Tsh g anghil ab i hud thahm kahchim t amjed k im hu hab i melch g hothai k an thahm thahiwua.
40028003	Sh g wuhioshaj si s-masma tonod hab masma mo g wepgi. Sh g wehschugaj hab masma s-toha mo g s-mohoni gew.
40028004	Kutsh wabsh woho'i totoths hegam shonthal mo ab nuhkuth k si gigiwek ch amjed hab sha e juh mo d wabsh ko'i.
40028005	Kush ab neok hegai anghil ch hab kaij ab ha wui hegam u'uwi, “Pi g am wo sha'i e totothsith. M ani wa s-mahch mam g Jesus chuhkug an chum gahghim.
40028006	Ab g wo i hihim k wo nei mo pi ia hu ha'ichug iia mat ia e cheh. Uhpam at ep i wuhsh muhkig amjed mo wa hab wa kaij.
40028007	Kumt am s-hohtam wo hihim k wo ha ahgi hegam mo am wehmajkahim mat uhpam e chegito k gm hu wo hih Galilee wui. Mt gm hu wo hihim k am ha'ab wo nei. Neh, am ani em-ahgith mo has i kaij.” Bash kaij g anghil.
40028008	Kutsh si e totothsith k si s-hohtam ga hu hihi ab amjed g hiha'ini k eda si s-hehgig ch ia hu chum wohp matsh wo t-ahgi.
40028009	Tsh wabshaba haha wabsh ha nam g Jesus k hab kaij, “T wo s-em ho'ige'el g Jiosh.” Tsh ab si i shul wui k an ui tahtdaj an k ab si ihm.
40028010	Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo ni-ehbenith. Am g wo hihim k wo ha ahgi g ni-wepnag mat am wo hihi Galilee wui k am ha'ab wo ni-nei.”
40028011	Kutsh gm hu hihi hegam u'uwi. Tsh hegam shonthal mash am nuhkuth g hiha'ini am ha'i hihim k gd hu thatha kihhim t am k am ha ahgi g u'ugchu papal wehs ha'ichu matsh haschu has i e juh.
40028012	Tsh g u'ugchu papal am ha wehm e nam g ge'eged k am e a'aga k am hahawa mu'i ha mah g lial ihtham shonthal
40028013	k hab ha ahg, “Bamt wo chei matki am thatha g piongaj chuhug ch ed k am em-ehs g honshpadag mam kohksh.
40028014	Kutp wo sha kah g kownal mam has i kaij, tt wo wa em-tho'ibia.”
40028015	Kutsh am ui g lial hegam shonthal k am hab e juh mam has i ha ahg. Ia o i ithani hab masma am e a'aga am ha shahgith g Tutuligo.
40028016	Kuchd ahchim gamai hemako am hihi heg wui tho'ag am Galilee ch ed mo wa hab kaij g Jesus matt am wo hihi.
40028017	D g Jesus am ha'ichug. Kuchd ab si ihm. D eda hi wa ha'i sha pi wohoch.
40028018	D ab si i t-miabi g Jesus k hab kaij ab t-wui, “Jiosh at ab ni-mah g gewkthag wehs ha'ichu thahm an thahm kahchim ch ed ch ith thahm jewed.
40028019	Gamai g wo hihim wehsko hemajkam ha wui k wo i ha mashcha g ha'ichu ni-ahga k ab wo i ha pahl wapko am chehchegch g ni-ohg Jiosh ch ahni ep ni-chehcheg mani d alithaj ch heg ehp Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
40028020	Ab ani em-chehani mamt has wo masmak. Kumt ab wo i ha mashcha g hemajkam mat ab wo s-wohog elithath wehs ha'ichu mani haschu ab em-chehani. Kunt chum hekith wo em-wehmajk, chum as wo huhug g jewed.”
41001001	Ith o d s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g alithaj Jesus Christ. Shonaj ihtha ha'ichu ahgaj.
41001002	o an hab chu'ig o'ohanaj ed hegai Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab chehgig Isaiah. Heg atki an o'oha mash g Jiosh hab kaij ab e-alithag wui: An ant hema wo i wuhshath mat am wo i ha ap'ech g hemajkam mapt ahpi am wo i wuhsh jewed thahm.
41001003	Ith at gm hu jeg ed wo ha mihshmath g hemajkam hab kaijch: Neh, in atsh wo i wuhsh jewed thahm hegai mo d ge kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. Kumt heg wehhejed wo i e nako. Neh, bash ahg g e-alithag g Jiosh.
41001004	Kutsh wa woho am hab e juh. M atsh hema i wuhshath g Jiosh g o'othham. K ith hab chehgig John ch am i e chehgi Judea chekshani ch ed miabithch hegai akimel mo hab chehgig Jordan. Ab ash e enigadathch g John g ka-mihyo wopo ikuskaj ch ge hogi giwud ch heg wa'i hekaj e gegosith kohktpul ch sit'ol. Kush mu'i hemajkam am wui hihim heg amjed chekshani chum hems ab Jerusalem kihhim t amjed. Sh g John am amog ch hab ha ahg, “Mamt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k wo e pahl wapko. T g Jiosh ab wo i s-em-ho'ige'ith k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig.” Neh, bash kaij g John ch am ep ha pahl wapkon akimel ch ed hegam mash ab wui hihimath ch am ahg g pi ap e-chu'ichig.
41001007	Sh hab ha ahg g John. “Pi g hab wo ni-elith manis ahni d si ha'ichu. Ab atsh hema wo i wuhsh ni-oithk mat d wo si s-has ha'ichuk.
41001008	Ahni ani hi wabsh em-pahl wapkon. Tsh wabshaba heg ab wo em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag matsh heg chum hekith wo em-wehmajk.”
41001009	Kush eda g Jesus wenog ab d kihkam heg eda al kihhim mash d Nazareth ch am eda g Galilee chekshani. Kutsh am i him k am jiwia mo am oimmed g John hab ahgk matsh wo e pahl wako. Tsh g John am pahl wako akimel ch ed.
41001010	Tsh ab wabsh i chum wuhsh ab amjed g shuhthagi. Tsh g thahm kahchim ab si i e kuhpi'o. Kutsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag i hud ab ab g Jesus hab sha masma mat g hohhi.
41001011	Sh ab neok g Jiosh thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Ahpi ap d si ni-tachuithch ni-alithag ch am si ni-tatchui oithch hab masma.”
41001012	Am wa'i hekaj, sh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab ahg g Jesus matsh gm hu hejelko wo hih.
41001013	Kutsh am hih tohono jewed wui k am ha'ichug gi'ikko wehst-mahm tash ab mo am ha'ichug g mischini ha'ichu thoakam. Sh heg i oitham g ge Jiawul am chum s-wuimk pi ap'ekam ch ed. Sh wabshaba g anghil am nuhkuth.
41001014	Sh am hu hebai, tsh e kuhpach hegai John mo am ha pahl wapkon. Tsh heg i thahm am jiwia g Jesus Galilee chekshani t am am ahgachugch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh
41001015	hab kaijch, “Gam g hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo i s-wohoch iththa s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. E at ai mat am ba'ich wo i e tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig.”
41001016	Neh, bash kaijhim ch an him hugithaj an hegai al kahchki mo d Galilee Kahchki. Sh eda am ha'i oiopo g waptopi ha u'utham ch am wuhpa g e-chuagia shuhthagi ch ed. Tsh am ha cheh g Jesus. Kush d ihtham gohk e wepngam mo hab chehgig Simon ch Andrew.
41001017	Sh hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Ab g wo i ni-oith k pi hegam wa'i waptopi wo ha u'uth ch wabshaba g hemajkam wo i ha wanchkwua ab Jiosh wui.”
41001018	Kutsh ha hekaj thagito g e-chikpan k am i oi.
41001019	Tsh am sha'i hihim k haha wabsh gohk ep ha cheh. Ihtham ash am kegchuth g e-chuagia wahlko ch ed ch d James ch John. Kush g ohgaj hab chehgig Zebedee.
41001020	Tsh ab i ha wai g Jesus. Kutsh gm hu i oi am thagitok g e-ohg wahlko ch ed ha wehm g ha-pionag.
41001021	Kutsh am hihim k am thatha Capernaum kihhim t am. Tsh am i e ai g shahwai mach heg eda t-mihshmath. Kutsh am i wahp ha-cheopi ed. Tsh g Jesus am ha mihshmath.
41001022	Kutsh g hemajkam ab si e totoths ab mashchamathaj amjed nash pi ba'ich i si s-e mamachim ha mashcham mo hi hegam mo d chum chehanig ha mashchamtham.
41001023	Kush eda am hema ha'ichug g o'othham mash g jiawul u'ukch g chegitoithaj.
41001024	Tsh heg hab juh mash am si s-kaitham neok ch hab kaij, “Shahchu ap ahgch t-kudut, ahpi Jesus map ab Nazareth t amjed. Napt heg hekaj ia wabsh jiwia mapt gm hu hab wo i ni-juh ith amjed o'othham? S-m-mahch ani map d hekia s-ap'ekam ch ab d Jiosh amjedkam.”
41001025	Tsh g Jesus ab si s-keh'el g jiawul k hab kaij, “Ab g wabsh i pi shahmuni k gm hu hab wo i e juh.”
41001026	Tsh g jiawul si ugij ihtha o'othham. Kutsh si hihin. Tsh g jiawul hahawa thagito.
41001027	Kutsh wehsijj si e totothsith k ab a'ai i e kakke, “Shah'o d ahga ihtha? No d wechij mashchama? No pi ab kaiham g jijawul mo haschu ab i ha chehani.”
41001028	Kutsh an wehsko i e ahgithahi am Galilee ch ed matsh haschu s-kehg hab juh g Jesus.
41001029	Kutsh ab i wuwha hegam Jesus cheopi t amjed k gm hu wa hekaj hihi ha-kih wui hegam Simon ch Andrew. Tsh g James ch John ep i ha oi.
41001030	Kush eda am wo'o g Simon hohnig je'e ch g s-tonjigkaj mumku. Kumsh am ahgith g Jesus.
41001031	Tsh am i wah mo hebai wo'o k ab bei nowij ab k i wamigi. Kutsh ha hekaj am i ap'et k am ha'ichu ha hihithol.
41001032	Kutsh gm hu si i juh. Tsh g hemajkam ab i ha ui hegam mo kok'o ch hegam ehp mo g jijawul u'ukch g ha-chegitoithag.
41001033	k am i e hemapai ha-kih ab.
41001034	Kutsh g Jesus wehs ha thothaj ihtham k gm hu hab i ha juh g jijawul ab ha amjed. Sh g jijawul s-mahch mo d Jiosh alithag. Sh wabshaba pi ha hiwgith g Jesus mas ihtham am wo ah mo hedai wud.
41001035	Ba'ich si'alim mash wabsh kia s-chuhugam, tsh am i wami g Jesus k gm hu hejelko him k am e ho'ige'ithahun.
41001036	Kutsh ihtham Simon am i gahghio.
41001037	k am hebai chehg k am ahgith, “Mu'i hemajkam o an m-gahg.”
41001038	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Oi g wo. Tt hig wo hihi am ba'ich kihhim wui. Nt am ep wo ha mihshmath nant pi heg hekaj i wuhsh.”
41001039	Kutsh am i ha mihshmethahi ha-chechopi ed wehsko Galilee chekshani ch ed k gm hu hab i ha juh g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.
41001040	Sh am hu hebai, tsh am hema jiwia Jesus wui k mumku heg hekaj mo hab e a'aga ‘leprosy’ ch chum pi ha thoajig. Ith ash ab wui e sho'igchuth g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Pt wo e nako mapt wo ni-thoaj maptp wo tatchuath.”
41001041	Kutsh ab si i s-ho'ige'ith k ab taht k hab ahg, “Mant hab wo wa m-juni.”
41001042	Kutsh ha hekaj thoa.
41001043	Jesus atsh am hahawa si shel ahgith k hab kaij, “Pi g hedai sha'i ahgith k wabsh am wo him k am wo i e chehgi pahl wui. T am wo m-chechga. Kupt wo ha mah hegai mo wa g Jiosh em-chehani hab masma mat g Mosesbad o'oha mamt heg hekaj wo wohokamch mamt thoa.”
41001045	Kutsh oi wa ihtha o'othham wehsko i ha ahgithahi g hemajkam ab amjed. Tsh heg hekaj pi e nako g Jesus mas am ep wo i wuhsh mo am hemajkamag kihhim ch ed k wabshaba gn hu hab wabsh jegko oimmed. Sh g hemajkam am wui himto ga hu wepsko amjed.
41002001	Kush d wabsh i he'ekia tash matsh am ep thatha hegam Jesus Capernaum t am. Tsh gn hu wa hekaj kaitha matsh am thatha.
41002002	Kutsh sha'i si mu'i e hemapai g hemajkam k am shuhthath g kih k ab kihjeg t ab ab wabsh i si s-kawkam gegokiwua. Kush g Jesus am ha mihshmath.
41002003	Tsh am ha'i thatha hema u'athch g pi himithkam. Ith ash ab wabsh i s-moik ch am wo'o e-wahkus ch ed. Kush gi'ik o'othham an u'a.
41002004	Sh wabshaba pi am hu sha'i jeg nash pi sha'i si s-hemajkamag. Kutsh gn hu i chehchsh kih thahm k am ge maggat g kih ma'ishpadag am hu i mash am thaha g Jesus k am i huduni g pi himithkam.
41002005	Kutsh g Jesus am i nei g ha-wohochuthadag k hab kaij heg wui pi himithkam, “Ni-nawoj, ab ani s-m-ho'ige'ith ch gm hu hab i juh g pi ap m-chu'ichig.”
41002006	Kush eda am ha'i thadha hegam mo d chehanig ha mashchamtham ch ash hab e ahg.
41002007	“Ih, pi oki ap neok hab masma e wepogithch g Jiosh. Heg at wa'i Jiosh wo e nako mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig.”
41002008	Kutsh ha hekaj ha amich g Jesus mo haschu am oithahim k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo sha'i oithahim
41002009	manis hab wabsh kaij ch pi woho edgith g gewkthag mant gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig. Bam elith mo s-pehegim hab e kaij mat gm hu hab i e juh g pi ap chu'ichigaj no ge hedai s-mahch mas s-wohom hab e juh.
41002010	Pegih, nt wo em-chehgi mani woho ge gewkthag ch hab wua mani has i kaij ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.” K hab hahawa kaij ab wui hegai pi himithkam,
41002011	“I g wamig k am beh'i g e-wahkus k gm hu hihm uhpam.”
41002012	Kutsh am ha hekaj bei g e-wahkus k gm hu hih uhpam am wehs ha-nena ed. Kutsh wehsijj si has i e tahtk k ab i si has elith g Jiosh ch hab kaij, “Pi ach hebai sha'i neith ha'ichu hab masma.”
41002013	Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihi hegam Jesus k gm hu thatha ge shuhthagi bahsho. Tsh mu'i am e chehm g hemajkam. Sh am ep ha mashcham.
41002014	Kush am hu hebai ep hihimath ch am bihbij amai mam am ha kowlant g lial kownal wehhejed. Sh am hema chikpan ch hab chehgig Levi (Matthew). Tsh g Jesus am jiwia wui k hab ahg, “Ab g i hihm k ab si ni-wecho e mashcham.” Kutsh am ha hekaj wabsh i oi.
41002015	Tsh am hu hebai i cheka. Kutsh g Levi am hab juh g gegosig ha wehhejed hegam Jesus. Kush am thadhak ch e gegosith. Sh am ha'i oiopo hegam mo d t-chehanig t-mashchamtham ch d ep Palasi. Ihtham Palasi o chum s-gewkam oithchug g t-himthag. K eda m u'i am oithchug g Jesus hegam mo pi am hu si oithchug g t-shohshon ha-himthag. Kush ha'i ihtham d lial t-kowlanttham heg wehhejed mash d ge'e kownal wehs jejewed thahm. Kush hegam t-chehanig t-mashchamtham hab ha ahg hegam mo ab si wecho e mashcham g Jesus, “Ih, k haschu ahgch g em-mashchamtham ha wehm e gegosith g pi ap hemajkam, chum hems g lial t-kowlantham?”
41002017	Tsh am i ha kaiok g Jesus k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ihtham pi ap hemajkam o s-e tho'ibiamk hab masma mat g kok'otham wo s-e thoajitham. Hegam mat hab wo e elithath mo s-ap'e at pi wo tatchua g mahkai. Pi ant hab ahgk ia jiwia jewed thahm manis wo ha tho'ibia hegam mo pi e tho'ibiamk.”
41002018	Hebaichuj ach he'ekkio pi t-gegosith matt ab wo t-ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui. Kutsh am hu hebai am i e ai matsh hab wo chum e juh. Sh eda ihtham Jesus pi hab e wua. Kumsh hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Hemu o he'ekkio pi e gegosith hegam mo g Palasi ha mashcham ch hegam mo g John ha mashcham. K eda haschu ahgch ihtham pi hab masma hab e wua mo ab si m-wecho e mashcham?”
41002019	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Nat hig pi wo e gegos g wo ha hohntam naipijju mat eda heg am wo ha wehmajk?
41002020	T am wo i e ai mat pi am hu wo ha wehmajk. T am hahawa pi wo e gegos. Pegih, bat wo wa e juh ihtham mant hekith pi ia hu wo ha wehmajk.”
41002021	Sh am hahawa chum ha tashogith g Jesus mat g mashchamaj pi ap wo wehnath g ha-himthag ash hab kaijch, “Pi at hedai g wechij ikuskaj wo shohsho g hekiuchij lihwa mat wo s-e wia nat pi wo i thahiwua k ba'ich wo i wantsh g hekiuchij.
41002022	K hab wa'ap pi hab mahs machs am wo toa g wechij uhdwis wadag am eda g hekiuchij ha'ichu elithag kostal. T wo am hu wantsh g hekiuchij k wo iawua. Wechij uhdwis wadag at am wo e toa wechij kokstal ch ed.”
41002023	Sh am hu hebai hihim ihtham Jesus t-mihshmetha tash ed. Kush am eshas g pilkani wohg huhugith an. Sh ihtham ha'i ab ha wohni g pilkani ch i mohon ch ko'a.
41002024	Kush ha'i hegam Palasi ab ha neith ch ab kakke g Jesus, “Shahchu o ahgch hab ha'ichu junihim mo pi hab sha'i chum mahs t-mihshmetha tash ed?”
41002025	Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Bo wabsh masma hab e wua matsh wa g Davidbad. Pi amtki chegito matsh heg has e Juh am i bihugimk. Bo chug'ig g Jiosh o'ohana
41002026	matsh wa am i wah ge'e cheopi ch ed k am ui g pahn k huh hegam ha wehm mash am wehmaj. K d hegai pahn mo am e to'aw k ch hegam d wa'i ha wuikam papal. T eda hemho wa am hab e juh. K heg hekaj am wa s-ap'e matsh ab mah g pahn hegai pahlibad mash am ha'ichug ch hab chehgig Abiathar.
41002027	Ith o am wohokamchuth mo g chehanig d i chum ha wehmtadag g hemajkam. Em-mihshmetha tash at am e ap'ech em-wehhejed. Kumt pi heg wehhejed e nahto e-mihshmetha tash.
41002028	Ni ahni d Jiosh si Kehsha ch gewkthag am thahm g em-mihshmetha tash.”
41003001	Sh am hu hebai, tsh am ep i wahp ihtham Jesus hema cheopi ch ed. Kush am hema thaha g o'othham mash g nowij mahnikodag.
41003002	Kush am ha'i thadha g Palasi ch am s-nen'eith mas hab wo juh g thoajitha am ha mihshmetha tash ed nash pi ab ha'ichu s-abchuthamk.
41003003	Sh g Jesus hab kaij heg wui mahnikokam, “Ia g hu i kekiwua.” Kutsh gm hu i kekiwua.
41003004	Sh ab hahawa ha kakke, “Shahchu am ahgch hab elith mo pi hiwgithas mihshmetha tash ed mamt wo i ha wehmt hegam mo e sho'igchuth? Ab o em-ab mamt wo i ha wehmt g sho'igkam k am wo i e nako mamt wo ha tho'ibia hegam mat am hu wo e ko'ij. Aha namt wabsh wo ha hiwigi mat wo e ko'ij?” Kush pi hedai has sha'i kaij
41003005	nash pi pi sha'i pihk e elith heg wui mahnikokam. Sh heg hekaj si s-ko'okam an i ha nenashad g Jesus ch eda ep pi ap e tahtk ha wehhejed ch ash hab kaij heg wui o'othham, “Ab g si i shelin g e-nowi.” Kutsh am wabsh i chum shelin k am wa'i hekaj ap'et.
41003006	Kutsh babgat g Palasi matsh ha thoaj ha mihshmetha tash ab k gm hu hihim k am ha wehm e nam g piongaj hegai mo wa d kownal heg eda chekshani ch hab chehgig Herod. Kush ihtham e wehm a'aga matsh has hig masma wo mua g Jesus.
41003007	Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihi hegam Jesus ge shuhthagi wui. Kutsh mu'i hemajkam am i oi ab Galilee t amjed
41003008	ch ab Judea t amjed, chum hems ab Jerusalem kihhim t amjed, ch Idumia chekshani ch gn hu aigojed g Jordan akimel ch gm hujed mash d Tyre ch Sidon kihhim. Ihtham mu'i atsh am himto am kaiok mo he'es i ge'e ha'ichu hab wuihim g Jesus.
41003009	Kush heg am ha ahgith hegam mo ab si wecho e mashcham matsh g wahlko an wo u'ukchith am wehhejed natsh pi g hemajkam wabsh wo i si chehmo.
41003010	Kush wehs am chum s-ahimk g kok'otham ch ab s-tahtmamk mat wo ha ap'et natsh pi mu'ijj ha thothaj.
41003011	Kutsh hekith wo sha nei g Jesus hegam mash g jijawul ha u'ukch k ab wo i e sho'igch wui k wo si hihin k hab wo chei, “Ahpi ap d Jiosh alithag.”
41003012	Sh g Jesus am si ha chehani mat pi hedai wo sha'i ahgi mo hedai wud.
41003013	Tsh am hu hebai, tsh ab i chesh g Jesus kawulk t ab k ab i wai hegam mash ab s-wohochuth. Tsh ab wui i hihi. Kutsh gamai gohk am i ha chuhcha ab ha wui hab kaijch, “Ahpim amt chum hekith wo ni-wehmajkath. Kunt hebaichuj am wo em-cheha mamt am hebai wo hihim k wo ha mihshmath.
41003015	Kumt wo edgithath g gewkthag mamt gm hu hab wo i ha juh g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.”
41003016	Neh, bash kaij ch am i ha chuhcha hegam gamai gohk. Hema hegam o d Simon. Kutsh heg hab ep chehch Peter mo hab d ahga Hothai.
41003017	Ha'i ehp o d James ch John ch d Zebedee a'alithag. Kutsh ihtham hab ep ha chehch g Jesus ‘Tataniki Namkam.’
41003018	Ha'i ehp o d Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, ch Thomas. K hema d hegai mo d James ch d alithaj hegai mo hab chehgig Alphias. K hema hab ep chehgig Simon ch d hema hegam mo tatchua matt ahchim Tutuligo hejel wo himchuthath g t-kownaltalig. K hema d Thaddaus
41003019	K hema d hegai mat gagda g Jesus k hab chehgig Judas Iscariot. Neh, ihtham gamai gohk ash d Jesus chuhchai. Kush an oithchug.
41003020	Kutsh am uhpam hih g Jesus mash am kih. Tsh hegam gamai gohk am i oi. Kutsh g hemajkam am ep i e hemapath k sha'i si mu'itha. Tsh heg hekaj pi e nako mas ep wo e gegos ihtham Jesus.
41003021	Kutsh am i kah g hahajunij k ab i hihim k am chum s-behimk hab elithch mat sha heb hu wua g e-chegitoi.
41003022	Sh am hai gegok g chehanig ha mashchamtham ch am thatha Jerusalem t amjed ch ash hab kaij, “Jijawul ha-ge'ejig oki an u'ukch g chegitoithaj ihtha.” Sh ha'i ep hab kaij, “Moki g jijawul ha-ge'ejig ab mahkch g gewkthag. K ith hekaj gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.”
41003023	Tsh oi wa g Jesus ab i ha waith k hab masma am i ha tashogi, “Kus haschu ahgk hig g Jiawul wo i wuhshath g hejel e-pionag?
41003024	S-mahch am mat g o'othham wo padch g hejel e-jewedga mat ab a'ai wo e cheggia.
41003025	Kut g e wehm kihkam hab wa'ap wo padch g hejel e-kihthag mat ab a'ai wo e cheggia.
41003026	Pegih, t has hig masma g jijawul pi wo padch g hejel e-gewkthag mat ab a'ai wo e cheggia?
41003027	Neh, wohppo'ith ani g ge Jiawul hegam mo an ha u'ukch. Kum s-mahch mat pi hedai wo sha'i e nako mas am hu wabsh wo wah hema kih ed mat wo s-ha'ahamak k am wo ui g enigaj, heg hi wa matp wehpeg wo wulsh.
41003028	“Wehs o gm hu hab i junihog g pi ap ha-chu'ichig g Jiosh.
41003029	K wabshaba si ge'ej g em-chu'ichig mamtp ab wo has ah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. T g Jiosh pi hekith gm hu hab wo i juh.”
41003030	Bash kaij g Jesus no pi hab ge ahg mash g ge Jiawul u'ukch. Kush eda d Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mo an u'ukch.
41003031	Kutsh am hahawa thatha g je'ej ch wepngaj g Jesus matsh wo nei. Sh wabshaba mu'ijj an wehgaj thadha g Jesus. Sh heg hekaj gm hu wabsh gegok jeg ed ch am chum waith. Kumsh am ahgith, “Neh'e, m-je'e ch m-wepnag o am gegok jeg ed ch ab m-waith.”
41003033	Sh g Jesus an i nenhoghi. Kush mu'i an wehgaj thadha hegam mo ab kaiham. Kush hab kaij, “Neh, ihtham mo ab ni-kaiham o heg wa wepo mo d ni-wepnag ch ni-je'e.
41003035	Hegam mat hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui o hab a masma mo d ni-wepnag ch ni-je'e.”
41004001	Sh am hu i hebai, sh g Jesus am ep ha mihshmath ge shuhthagi hugith an. Kush sha'i si mu'i hemajkam an wehgaj. Tsh heg hekaj gn hu i chesh g Jesus wahlko ch ed k an thahiwua k amjed ha mashcham. Sh hegam gn hu wabsh gegok shuhthagi hugith an.
41004002	Kush mu'i ha'ichu ha tashogith g wepogitha ahgakaj ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.
41004003	Ith ash d ha'ichu ahgaj mo hab kaij: “Am ant he'es wo i em-tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig wepogithch mat hema an i chum gantad g e-kaichka e-oith ed.
41004004	T ha'i gn hu wabsh shul wohg ch ed. T g u'uwhig am thatha k ko'ito.
41004005	Kut ha'i gn hu wabsh shul waw t ab mo pi ge'ej g jewed k ab ha hekaj hi wa chum i wuhsh no pi pi an hu juhk g jewed.
41004006	T oi wa hekith ab i chesh g tash. T ha hekaj wabsh gaksh no ge mehk tatk.
41004007	T ha'i gn hu wabsh ep shul sha'i ch ed. T oi wa hekith ab i ge'ege g sha'i k wabsh ha koktha. T pi ab hu ha kait.
41004008	T wabshaba hegam mat gn hu shul moihuna ch ed an i wuhshani k ab kait. Ha'i atp hems waikko wehst-mahm ab kait k ha'i ep chuhthpo wehst-mahm ab ep kait k ha'i siant ab ep kait.
41004009	Neh, am g wo i oithahim ahpim mam kah ihtha.”
41004010	Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch amjed am hahawa i e hejelkai. Kutsh ab wui i hihi g chuhchaij ha'i ep ha wehm k ab kakke, “A tt has masma wo s-ha amich g ha'ichu wepogitha ahga?”
41004011	Kush hab kaij ab ha wui, “Nt wo em-ahgi mo has d ahga no pi g Jiosh em-hiwgith mamt wo s-mai hegai mo hemu am maskogith ab amjed g e-kownaltalig. Ni wabshaba heg wa'i ha ahgith ha'ichu wepogitha ahga hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuthamk.
41004012	T hab pi wo amich ha'ichu ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig, chum as wo ha'ichu neith k wo ha'ichu kah. T g Jiosh pi gm hu hab wo sha'i i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig, heg hi wa mat ab wui wo i e nohnogi.”
41004013	Kush hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Mu'i ani ha'ichu chum em-ahgith g ha'ichu wepogitha ahgakaj. Kumki eda pi amichuth. Nt hemho am wo wa em-tashogi.
41004014	Hegai ha'ichu eshtham ani wepogith hegai mat an wo ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. K g kaichkaj d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Ith at am wo chum e ei o'othham amichuthadag ed.
41004015	K eda ha'i g ha-i'ibthag s-kawpk hab masma mo g wohg. T g Jiawul am wabsh s-pehegi wo ha wohppo'i mo haschu i kah.
41004016	“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag hab sha masma mo hebai pi ge'ej g jewed ab waw t ab. T ihtham wo si s-hohho'i Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab kaiok k wabshaba pi wihnam ab hu wo bebhe k ch ab hi wa al he'es wo s-wohochuthath.
41004017	T ab wabsh wo i chum hih g a'appema. T ha hekaj wabsh wo ta'i i shul.
41004018	“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag hab sha masma mo hebai s-sha'ig
41004019	no pi e sha'ijithch heg hekaj kudutadag ch s-kaisthag ch s-tahhathkam. Kut pi ha'ichu hab wo juh am Jiosh wehhejed.
41004020	“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag s-moik hab masma mo g moihuna. Kut ab wo kaiha g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k am wo si i nuhkuth e-ihbthag ed k gm hu wo i ha ahgithahi g hemajkam k ha'akia ab wo wa'i ep ha ba'iha, Ha'i atp hems waikko wehst-mahm wo i ha ba'iha k ha'i chuhthpo wehst-mahm k ha'i siant ab ep wo i ha ba'iha.”
41004021	Kush hab hahawa ep kaij am ha wui, “Wohokam o wepogithas mo g lahmpa tonlig. Namt hig wo ehsto g lahmpa ab mehithk aha namt an wo thai mat hebai wo em-tonlithch. Pegih, mt hab wa masma pi wo chum ehsto g wohokam.
41004022	Wehs at wo s-e mai matp haschu chum e ehstokch.
41004023	Am g wo i oithahim ahpim mam kah ihtha.”
41004024	Sh hab ep kaij am ha wui, “Am g wo s-amichuth mam haschu i kah. Mamt has i masma s-ba'ama ab wo ha'ichu ha mah hedai i, t hab masma ab uhpam wo i e nodagi ha'ichu ab em-wui ch atp hems gm hu ba'ich i.
41004025	Hegam mat s-ap wo hekaj g e-ap'ethag at ba'ich ep wo i nei. T hegam mat pi ap wo hekaj wabsh wo heb hu wua.”
41004026	Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Jiosh kownaltalig o heg wepogithas matp hems g o'othham am gantad g ha'ichu kai e-oith ed.
41004027	k am haha wabsh nenida he'ekia i tash. T g eshaj am i wuhshani k hahhagt k ab hahawa mudathagt k ab kait. K eda pi mahch g o'othham mo has masma hab e wua
41004028	no pi g ha'ichu kai wabsh hejel ab i wuhshani ab jewed t amjed.
41004029	T am wabsh i chum bai. Kut am ha hekaj ha cheha g e-chikpantham mat wo hihk k wo i ba'iha.”
41004030	Kush hab ep kaij, “Am ant ba'ich wo i em-tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig am wepogithch g ha'ichu kai.
41004031	Neh, heg am e'esha mo al chumaj
41004032	ch oi wa am wo wuhshani k ha'as wo i ge'etha mo g s-ehheg uhs. Tp hems heg ab an wo koksht g u'uwhig. Pegih, t hab wa masma wo ge'e i ge'etha g Jiosh kownaltalig, chum as al chum wo shonwua.”
41004033	Neh, bash masma heg wa'i hekaj am ha mihshmath wepogitha ahga mat he'es wo i s-amich.
41004034	Tsh gm hu wo hihi g hemajkam. Kutsh am haha wabsh ba'ich wo i ha tashogi g e-chuhchai g ha'ichu e-ahga.
41004035	Tsh gm hu si i juh. Sh hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Oi g wo. Ga att hu shuhthagi aigojed wo i chehchsh.”
41004036	Kutsh am i ha thagito g hemajkam k ab i chehchsh wahlko ch ed wehmaj g Jesus. Kutsh eda am ha'i ep chum i ha oi g al wapalko.
41004037	Tsh ab haha wabsh i meh g s-gewk jegos k sha'i si hewed. Tsh g shuhthagi sha'i si uhgk hab i e juh k gd hu wabsh e was wahlko ch ed.
41004038	Sh eda am wo'ok ch kohsh g Jesus si baikko g wahlko. Kutsh am wuha g chuhchaij k hab ahg, “Nap pi has sha'i elith mattki wo wachkk.”
41004039	Tsh am hahawa wamig k ab si wui neo g hewel ch shuhthagi k hab ahg, “Am g wabsh i thotholimat k ha'asa i hewed.” Kutsh ab wabsh si heweto k g shuhthagi gm hu wabsh i pi hoini.
41004040	Sh hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo ha'ichu ehbithath ch ab wabsh wo ni-hiwgath.”
41004041	Kutsh eda si s-ehbeni k wabsh ab a'ai i e kakke, “A kus hedai wud ihtha o'othham mat g hewel ch shuhthagi ab kaiha.”
41005001	Kutsh gm hu thatha miabithch mo am d Gerasa kihhim.
41005002	Tsh ab wabsh i chum hud g Jesus wahlko t amjed. Kutsh ab hema nam g cheoj mash ab e ulish cheo ch ed mash eda ab d hiha'ini.
41005003	Sh g jijawul an u'ukch ihtha. Kush pi hedai e nakog mas wo mahshoch.
41005004	Mu'ikko amsh chum wulshshap g e hukshchim wapainomikaj. Sh wabshaba wabsh wanikumiak. Sh pi hedai e nakog mas wo shohbi nash pi sha'i si s-gewk.
41005005	Tash oitham ch chuhug oitham ash am ulinig hiha'ini ch ed ch am tho'ag shahgith am hihnk ch e hikkumiak g hohothaikaj.
41005006	Tsh am jiwia g Jesus. Kutsh mehkjed chehg k am med k ab i gei wui.
41005007	k am si s-kaitham neok k hab ahg, “Ni-thagitoni, ahpi alithaj g si Jiosh. Bani m-ahgith ab si ihmch g Jiosh mapt pi ia hu wo ni-hudawogath.”
41005008	Bash kaij nash pi g Jesus ab i s-wuhshthamk g jiawul ith amjed o'othham.
41005009	Sh g Jesus ab hahawa kakke, “Shahp chehgig?” Sh hab kaij hegai o'othham, “Bani chehgig ‘Mu'ichu’ nach pi mu'ij,”
41005010	ch ab wui si e sho'igchuth mat pi mehk gm hu hab wo i ha juh hegam jijawul mo an u'ukch.
41005011	Kush eda inhab sha'i si mu'i kokji e nuhkuth kawulk huda.
41005012	Kutsh g jijawul ab si tahni g Jesus, “Am g hig t-hiwgith matt am wo i wahp ha eda hegam kokji.”
41005013	Kutsh ha hiwigi. Kutsh ab i wuwha heg amjed o'othham k gm hu hihim k am i wahp ha eda hegam kokji. Kutsh ihtham am e totothsith k am agshp i wohp k gd hu shul ge shuhdagi ch ed k wachkk k ash eda am hu d i gohk mihl.
41005014	Hegam mash am chum ha nuhkuth atsh e totothsith k wohp k gn hu wehsko ha ahgith mat has e juh. Kutsh am himto g hemajkam s-neithamk matsh haschu has e juh
41005015	k am hu thatha. Kush am thak ch e enigadathch ch ash wabsh s-ap'e. Kutsh wehsijj si e totoths.
41005016	Hegam mash am neith atsh an i ha ahgithahi mat has e juh hegai mo g jijawul an u'ukch k am ep ha ahgi mat has e juh g kokji.
41005017	Kutsh ab wabsh si s-bahbagi i ahgi g Jesus g hemajkam, “Mapt gm hig wo i e mehkoth ab t-amjed.”
41005018	Kush g Jesus an cheshajhim wahlko ch ed. Tsh ihtha o'othham mash g jijawul u'ukch ab chum ahgi, “Nt wo m-oi.”
41005019	Kutsh oi wa pi hiwgith k ash hab wabsh ahg, “Pt wabsh wo wa hih am e-kih wui k wo ha ahgi g e-nan'aipijju mat haschu si s-kehg hab m-juni g Jiosh.”
41005020	Kutsh gm hu hih ihtha o'othham k gn hu ha ahgithahi g hemajkam amai mash am d Wehst-mahm Kihhim matsh he'es ge'e ha'ichu hab juni g Jesus. Kutsh wehsijj ab si has i e taht hegam mash kah.
41005021	Kutsh an ep thadhaiwua ihtham Jesus wahlko ch ed k gn hu aigo i chehchsh.
41005022	Tsh ab hema i hih g o'othham k d ha'ichu amai ha-cheopi ed ch hab chehgig Jairus. Tsh ab i hud g Jesus. Kutsh ab wui i gehsh
41005023	k hab kaij, “Si g s-ni-ho'ige'ith. Ni-chehiaga o muhkhim. Pt am wo him k wo thoaj.”
41005024	Kutsh am i chum hih matsh wo oi ihtha o'othham. Kush eda g hemajkam gn hu wabsh i si bihagch.
41005025	Sh eda am hema ha'ichug g uwi ch mumku gamai gohk a'ahithagkaj. Sh heg wehs oitham g eh'edaj chum hekith jegwoni.
41005026	Kush mu'i ha'ichu nakog ab ha amjed g mamakai ch wabshaba wabsh ba'ich i mumku. Kutsh g lialigaj huhug.
41005027	Sh am hahawa i kah mash haschu has junihim g Jesus. Kutsh am s-apkot matsh am wo jiwia wui. Kutsh ab oithk i him k an taht g wehschugaj
41005028	hab e ahgch, “Chum anis hems an wabsh wo taht g wehschugaj, t wo ni-ap'et.”
41005029	Tsh ha hekaj am wabsh si huh g eh'edaj. Tsh e taht mat ap'et.
41005030	Kutsh g Jesus taht matsh g thoajig gewkthag sha wuhsh ab ab k am ha hekaj i sikoliwua hemajkam ha wui k hab kaij, “Thoht an ni-taht?”
41005031	Kush hema hab kaij g chuhchaij, “An o si i t-bihagch g hemajkam. Kup haschu ahgch hab kaij, Thoht an ni-taht?”
41005032	Kutsh an i nenhoghim k ab i nei hegai uwi matsh an taht.
41005033	Kutsh heg si e tothsith k ab wui i gehsh k am ahgi mat thoa.
41005034	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, ni-uwiga, am apt wa thoa nap pi ab si ni-hiwig. Gam g s-ap e-taht k hihm k am wabsh s-thoakath.”
41005035	Kush am wabsh kia neok. Tsh am ha'i thatha ab kihj amjed hegai Jairus k hab kaij, “Muh at g m-chehiaga. Kupt haschu hig ahgk am ba'ich wo i kudu g ha mashchamtham?”
41005036	Kush wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus ab Jairus wui, “Pi g am sha'i has e tahtkkath ch am wabsh i ni-hiwgath.”
41005037	Bash kaij ch am hahawa ha ui g Peter ch James ch John k am i oi.
41005038	Kutsh am hihim k gd hu thatha mash am kih g Jairus. Kush am wabsh si s-nakosigam hab e wua no pi si shoani g hemajkam.
41005039	Kutsh am i wah g Jesus kih ch ed k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo shoanith. Heg o wa wepo ni-wehhejed mo wabsh kohsh g chehia.”
41005040	Kush wehsijj si s-ko'okam ash nash pi s-mahch matsh heki hu muh. Kutsh gm hu i ha wuhwhasith k am i ha ui hegam mash am wehmaj k am i wahp amai mash am wo'o g muhki. Tsh g jehjij am ep i ha oi.
41005041	Tsh g Jesus ab bei nowij ab k hab kaij, “I wamigi, chehia.”
41005042	Kutsh ab ha hekaj i wami g chehia k ab i hih. Kutsh si has i e taht g hemajkam.
41005043	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab g wabsh mahki g chehia g ha'ichu hugi.” Kutsh ab mah. Sh hab ep ha ahg mat pi hedai wo sha'i ahgi mat has e juh. Kush d gamai gohk a'ahithag ihtha chehia.
41006001	Tsh gm hu hahawa hihi ihtham Jesus k gd hu thatha Nazareth t am mash am d si kihkam g Jesus.
41006002	Kush am d i t-mihshmetha tash. Tsh am ep ha mihshmath g Jesus ha-cheopi ed. Kush mu'i hemajkam am ha'ichug ch am kah ch si has i e tahtam k ab a'ai si e kakke, “ Kus hebai mai wehs ihtha amichuthadag k has masma hab wua ihtha s-hasig ha'ichu?
41006003	No hig pi woho d wabsh hegai huk chikpantham mo d madaj g Mary ch d ha-wehnag g James ch Joses ch Judas k ch Simon? No hig pi woho g u'uwi wepngaj ia kih?” Neh, bash kaij ch wabsh pi ha'ichuchuth.
41006004	Sh g Jesus si has i e tahtk ch hab kaij, “Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam at chum hebai ab si has wo e elithath. T wabshaba g si kih'amkam o'othham ch wehmaj kihkam pi ab hu has wo elithath”
41006005	Kutsh heg hekaj pi e nako mas g si s-hasig ha'ichu hab wo junihith amai ch heg hab wa'i juh mat al he'ekia kok'otham ha thothaj.
41006006	Kutsh am hahawa i ha mihshmethahi g Jesus an wehgaj g Nazareth mo hebai i kihhimag.
41006007	Am hu hebai, tsh am ha cheha g e-chuhchai matsh go'ogok e wehm am wo ha mihshmethahi g hemajkam k gm hu hab wo i ha juh g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.
41006008	Neh, bash ha ahg, “Gm amt hu wabsh wo i hihim k heg wa'i e-cheowikud wo u'ath ch pi wo bek g e-limoshan kostal o g lial o g ha'ichu hugi o g ha'ichu eniga.
41006009	Mt ab wo i em-wahpkith k wo em-thagio'ithath mamt hebai wo i ha mihshmath.
41006010	Kumt amokath k ab wo ai mamt ba'ich ep wo hihi.
41006011	Mt gm hu wabsh wo hihi mamt hebai pi ap ab hu wo i em-nei gm hu shahmuthk g e-shuhshk. T ith wo ha chehgi mamt wabsh wo ha thagito nat pi pi ap hab chu'i. Thohwai.”
41006012	Kutsh wa woho an a'ai i ha ahgithahi g hemajkam matsh gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.
41006013	Kutsh ab iawua g huhudakud ha-mohmi ab g kok'otham. Kutsh thotha. Tsh mu'i gm hu hab ep i ha juh g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.
41006014	An o wa wehsko hab kaithag mash has e junihim g Jesus. Kum am chum a'aga mas hedai wud. Ha'i o hab kaij matp hems d Elijabad o hema ehp hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. K ha'i hab ep kaij matp hems d hegai Johnbad mat wa am i shonwuich g pahl wakona. E atsh wa mu'ajith k atp hems uhpam e chegito k hab s-hasig ha'ichu hab junihim.
41006016	Sh hegai Herod mo am d wa kownal Galilee chekshani ch ed hab ep kaij, “Thoki hegai John mo wa ha pahl wapkonahim. Heg ant mua. Kutki wabshaba uhpam e chegito k hekaj hab e nakog mat hab wo juh g s-hasig ha'ichu.”
41006017	Ihtha Herod atsh wa heg hab juh am wehhejed g e-hohnig. Heg ash hab chehgig Herodias ch ash d chum hohnigaj g Herod wehnag. Kush heg hab chechgig Philip. Tsh g Herod ehs g hohnigaj. Sh amjed g John chum hekith hab chum a'aga. “Mo pi sha'i ap'e maps g e-wehnag hohnig wo ehs.” Sh g Herodias heg hekaj s-keh'ith ch am chehani g e-kun mat wo mua. Tsh Herod ha cheha g e-shonthalig mat wo be k wo kuh. K wabshaba si s-ap d o'othham g John. Kush heg hekaj s-ehbith g Herod ch wabsh kuhpch ch s-ap nuhkuth. Sh hab pi e nakog g Herodias mas wo mua. Kush g Herod s-hohho'ith ch kah g John mihshmetha, chum as si e kudut heg amjed.
41006021	Sh g Herodias am wabsh nenida mat am wo s-ap'et. Kutsh am hu hebai s-apkot wehhejed matsh e ai g Herod mahsithag tash. Kutsh g Herod ab i ha wai g e-shonthalig ha-ge'ege'ejig ch hegam mo d si haha'ichu am Galilee ch ed. Tsh ab i hihim k am wehmaj piast.
41006022	tsh am i wah g uwi madaj g Herodias k am e waila. Kush wehsijj s-hohho'ith. Sh g Herod hab ahg, “Maptp haschu hab wo i elithath ch ab wo i ni-tai, nt hab wo m-juni.” Sh pi has sha'i kaij ihtha uwi.
41006023	Kush hab hahawa ep si kaij, “Maptp haschu ab wo i ni-tai, nt wo m-mah, chum as hems eda hugkam g ni-kownaltalig.”
41006024	Kutsh am hahawa him k am kakke g e-je'e, “Shahchu ant wo tai?” Sh hab kaij g je'ej, “John mo'o apt wo tai”
41006025	Tsh ab uhpam i wah k hab ahg g Herod, “John mo'o apt wo ni-mah am hoas-ha'a ch ed thahshk”
41006026	Kutsh si pi ap e taht g Herod. Sh wabshaba wehsijj kah mo has i kaij. Tsh heg hekaj pi e nako mas pi am hu hab wo juh,
41006027	neh, k am hema cheha g shonthal mat am wo him k an wo shonchk g John mo'o k ab wo i bek. Kutsh am hih lilso ha-kih wui k an shonch g kuswoj g John
41006028	k am u'apa g mo'oj ab hoas-ha'a t ab k ab mah g uwi. Tsh g uwi am him k ab mah g e-je'e.
41006029	Kutsh am i kah hegam mo ab si wecho e mashcham g John matsh e muhkith k am hihim k am bei g honaj mat wo s-ap juh.
41006030	Tsh am i uhpam thatha g Jesus chuhchai k am wehs ahgith mat haschu has i juh k haschu ep ha mashcham.
41006031	Sh eda ia'i ithani mu'i am thaiw g hemajkam. Tsh pi am hu sha'i ha apkot mas wo e gegos ihtham Jesus. Sh hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Am att hig wo t-hejelkoth k wo sha'i t-uh'ulinihogi.”
41006032	Kutsh gm hu hejelko hihi g wahlkokaj.
41006033	Mu'ijj ash ha neith mat gm hu hihi ch gm hu ha ba'ich wohp k gm hu heki hu thatha. Kutsh ihtham am hahawa i thatha
41006034	k am i huhud. Tsh g Jesus am i ha nei. Kush hab sha masma mo g heb hu hihimkam kakawal. Kutsh ab si i s-ha ho'ige'ith k mu'i ha'ichu ha mashcha.
41006035	Kutsh gm hu si i juh. Tsh g Jesus chuhchai am wui thatha k hab chum ahg, “Neh, mehk at wa'i juh. K eda ia hu wabsh si jegko.
41006036	Am g ha ahgith g hemajkam mat gm hu wo hihi kihhim wui k wo ha nolawt hegai mat wo huh”
41006037	Kush hab ha ahg, “Ahpim amt wo ha'ichu ha mah mat wo huh.” Sh hema hab kaij ihtham, “A tt haschukaj wo ha gegos? Mu'i lial at wo nam g ha'ichu hugi matt hekaj wo ha gegos.”
41006038	Sh ab ha kakke, “Shahchu o am i kahch? Am g wo neith.” Kutsh am neith k hab ahg, “Hetasp sismito ch gohk waptopi.”
41006039	Kush hab ha ahg mat wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat wehsijj am wo thadhaiwua jewedo he'ekiajj i e wehm.
41006040	Tsh am ha cheha. Kutsh am thadhaiwua he'ekiajj i e wehm, ha'i am hu i siant k ch ha'i am hu i hehetaspo wepst-mahm.
41006041	Kutsh g Jesus am ui hegai ha'ichu hugi k am e thahm i nen k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am hahawa hahai hegai sismito k ab ha mah g e-chuhchai. Tsh an i ha mahkhi g hemajkam. Kutsh g waptopi an ep i hahain k ha mah. Tsh an i ha mahkhi.
41006042	Tsh wehsijj hug k oi wa hi si s-kokwoth.
41006043	Kutsh g chuhchaij an i u'ihim k u'apa g wihpi'ithaj mat am hu'i gamai gohk hoha wo ha shuhshuth.
41006044	Kush am hu d i hetasp mihl chechoj ch mu'ijj g u'uwi ch a'al hegam matsh am e gegos.
41006045	Tsh am hahawa ha ahgi g e-chuhchai matsh gm hu aigo wo hihi heg wui kihhim mo hab chehgig Bethsaida. Tsh heg am wo wi'i k am wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat gm hu wo hihi e-kihki wui. Tsh heg hekaj an i chehchsh wahlko ch ed k gm hu hihi.
41006046	Tsh g Jesus am ha thagito g hemajkam. Tsh gm hu himto. Tsh am hahawa hejel i chesh kawulk thahm k am e ho'ige'ithahun.
41006047	Tsh am i hud. Sh am wabsh kia hejel ha'ichug. Tsh g wahlko gm hu si eda i cheka g shuhthagi.
41006048	Kush g hewel ab si s-gewkam med ha wui. Sh hekaj pi ap him. Kush s-ap ha neith g Jesus mash sha'i si s-wihnam himchuth g wahlko. Tsh koi mahsi. Kush ab him ha wui an wabsh shuhthagi thahm k hab e juh matsh an wabsh wo bij.
41006049	Tsh wabshaba am i nei s-chuhugam k ed k am si hihnk nash pi si s-ehbini hab e ahgch mash d wabsh kok'oi.
41006050	Kush hab ha ah, “Pi g wo sha'i ni-ehbenith. Thani ahni. Mt oi wo s-ap e taht,”
41006051	k gn hu hahawa i chesh wahlko ch ed. Kutsh am wabsh si heweto. Tsh ihtham si has i el
41006052	nash ge sha'i amichuth mokis ha'as edgith gewkthag. K eda d si s-hasig ha'ichu mat ha gegos hegam mu'i hemajkam.
41006053	Kutsh ga hu aigo i chehchsh k ab thatha amai mo am d Gennesaret k am wulsh g wahlko.
41006054	Tsh g hemajkam ha hekaj s-amich g Jesus
41006055	k gn hu a'ai wohp k an i ha u'ihi g kok'otham an ha-wohpikud ab k gd hu ha u'apa Jesus wui.
41006056	Kush an oiopo hegam Jesus ch am thaiw kihhim ch ed ch oithag ch ed. Kutsh g hemajkam ab wui wo ha u'apath g kok'otham ch ab wo ahgithath g Jesus mat wo ha hiwigi g kok'otham mat chum hems wabsh g hugithaj g enigaj an wo taht. Kush wehsijj thotha an tahtamk.
41007001	Kutsh ab ha'i hihi g Palasi ch chehanig ha mashchamtham k am e hemapai an ha wehgaj hegam Jesus. Tsh eda wo chum e gegos.
41007002	Kutsh ihtham am cheh matsh am ha'i wabsh thadhaiwua pi hab masma ha wapkonk g e-nohnhoi mo hab masma d ha-himthag g kekelibad.
41007003	Ahchim Tutuligo ach mu'i ha'ichu hab masma hab chum wua mo wa g t-kekelibadga. K ihtham Palasi wehs t-ba'ich i s-gewkam oith g ha-chehanig ch pi ha'ichu wo huh pi hab masma ha wapkonk g e-nohnhoi mash wa g kekelibad.
41007004	Kut g ha'ichu hugi hab wa'ap wo si e wapko mamt hekith ab wo i ui tianna t amjed. T g hohas-haha'a ch hihithodakud ch chum hems g wohpikud hab masma wo e wapko mash wa g kekelibad hab wua.
41007005	Kush heg hekaj ihtham Palasi ch chehanig ha mashchamtham ab kakke g Jesus. “K haschu ahgch pi ab hu wohog elith g ha'ichu ha-mashchamadag g kekelibad ihtham mo ab si m-wecho e mashcham? Neh, e o gegosith pi am hu t-himthag oithch ha wapkonk g e-nohnhoi.”
41007006	(8) Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Kum ahpim haschu ahgch im hu hab wabsh wua g Jiosh chehanig ch im hu ha'ab ab s-wohochuth g ha-chehanig hegam mo d kekelibad ch d wabsh o'othham? (6) Isaiabad oki si s-ap hab em-ahg ahpim mam hab wabsh s-e junimk mat eda an o'oha mash hab kaij g Jiosh: Ha'i ihtham mo d chum ni-hemajkamga o hab kaij mo ab si has ni-elith ch ab ni-ihm. K wabshaba g ha-i'ibthag si s-kawpk ch si mehk ab ni-amjed. (7) Pi o sha'i wohom ab has ni-elith no pi wabsh g hemajkam ha-chehanig ha mashcham hab chum masma mo d ni-chehanig. Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh. Kum ahpim s-wohom hab masma mo wa an o'ohanas.”
41007009	K hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Si am s-e mahch mamt has masma im hu hab wabsh wo i juh g Jiosh chehanig ch am wo wa hekajith mo haschu d hejel em-mashchamig.
41007010	Mosesbad at an o'oha mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Ab g si has wo i ha elithath g e-ohg ch e-je'e, ch ith ehp: Mat hemho wo wa e muhkith hegai mat hedai wo sha s-ko'okam has ha ah g e-jehj.
41007011	Kum eda ahpim ha mashcham mat pi ab hu has wo ha elithath ch ab ha wui hab wo chei, ‘Mah ant g Jiosh hegai mat haschu ab d wo i chum em-wuikamk.’
41007012	T hahawa pi ha'ichu hab wo ha juni g e-jehj.
41007013	Kum hab masma im hu hab wabsh i wua g Jiosh ne'oki ch am ha mashcham mo haschu d wabsh o'othham ha-nahtoi. K mu'i d ha'ichu mam hab masma hab ep wua”
41007014	Kutsh am hahawa ep ha wai g hemajkam k hab kaij am ha wui, “ Ab g wo i ni-kaiham wehsijj ahpim k wo s-amich ihtha. (15) Pi at im hu hab wo sha'i em-juh g Jiosh heg hekaj mamt haschu wo huh k wabshaba im hu hab wo i em-juh heg hekaj pi kehg em-chegitoithag.”
41007017	Tsh am i ha thagito g hemajkam k im hu wah kih ch ed. Kumsh ab hahawa kakke ith amjed.
41007018	Sh hab kaij, “Pegih, kumtp ahpim hab wa'ap pi amichuth. Pi at im hu hab wo sha'i i em-juh ab amjed g Jiosh mamt haschu wo huh
41007019	nat ge am hu wo i wah em-chegitoi ed k wabshaba gd hu em-wohk ed wo wah k amjed gm hu wabsh wo wuhsh.” Pegih, t hab masma am ha ahgi g Jesus mo wehs g ha'ichu hugi s-kehgaj.
41007020	k hab ep kaij, “Heg at im hu hab wabsh wo i em-juh ab amjed g Jiosh pi ap em-chegitoi
41007021	nat pi hab wo em-juh mamt hab wo juh g ha'ichu pi ap'ekam. Neh, mtp hems hema ha'ichu wo ehs o wo ha mua
41007022	o wo ha ehs g ha-wehm kihkam o wo tatchua g ha'ichu ha-eniga o wo s-chu iattomk o hab wo juh mat haschu si pi kehg hab wo mahsk o wo s-chu hehgamk o hema wabsh wo s-ko'okam has ahgath o wo chum si e haschuthath o wabsh pehegi has wo e wuath.
41007023	Ith at wehs ab wo i wuhsh ab amjed g pi kehg chegitoithaj g o'othham k im hu hab wabsh wo i juh ab amjed g Jiosh.”
41007024	Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihi hegam Jesus k am thadhaiwua hema kih am mash am miabithch g Tyre kihhim matsh wo sha'i e hejelkoch. Kush eda an wa s-nen'oith g hemajkam ch ha hekai s-mai mo am thaha g Jesus.
41007025	Kutsh am hema jiwia g uwi mash am kih heg eda jewed ch d gawul mahs o'othham ch gm hu d mahsikam Syria jewed ch ed. Sh g ne'okij d Greek. Kush g jiawul an u'ukch g chehiagaj. Tsh heg hekaj ab i hih g uwi k ab wui i gei g Jesus k ab si tahni mat gm hu hab wo i juh g jiawul ab amjed g chehia.
41007027	Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus, “Heg at wo wa wepok mamt ab wo ha mah g gogogs g ha-chechmait g a'al. Wehpeg ant am wo i ap'ech g pi ha-ap'ethag g Tutuligo hemajkam no pi d chum Jiosh a'aliga.”
41007028	Kush hab kaij ihtha uwi, “Woho o wa. T wabshaba chum hems g gogogs am wo wa huh g a'al ha-ha'ichu hugi hahainig mat ab wo i shul mihsa wecho. Kunt ahni hab wa masma wo si s-ap ni-taht mapt ith am hab wo al i ni-juni.”
41007029	Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab wui, “M-ne'oki o am chehgith map ab si ni-hiwig. Nt heg hekaj gm hu hab wo i juh g jiawul ab amjed g m-chehiaga.”
41007030	Kutsh gm hu hih uhpam k s-mai matki gm hu hab i e juh g jiawul ab amjed g chehiagaj. Kush an wabsh s-ap wo'o.
41007031	Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihi hegam Jesus k am gahi wuwha g Sidon kihhim ch Wehst-mahm Kihhim chekshani k gm hu thatha Galilee kahchki am.
41007032	Kutsh am ha'i thatha g hemajkam k am hema u'apa g o'othham mash pi chekaithag ch ep pi ap neok k ab i tahni g Jesus mat ab wo taht k wo thoaj.
41007033	Kutsh imhab sha'i wuhshath hejelko k am i wahpki g al chu'uchum e-nohnhoi am nahnkaj ed k am hahawa sha'i wadagi g e-nowi g e-siswuadagkaj k ab hekaj taht g nehnij
41007034	k am i neh e thahm k si i ihbhuiwua k hab kaij, “Thoajini.”
41007035	Tsh hahawa chekaith. Tsh g nehnij ap'et matsh s-ap neo.
41007036	Kutsh g Jesus am hahawa wehs ha ahgi mat pi hedai wo sha'i ahgi ihtha. Sh oi wa haha wabsh wehsko ahg
41007037	nash pi si ge'e has elith ch hab kaij. “Sho'o wa'i si s-kehg ha'ichu hab junihim mo g pi chechkaithkam ha chechkaichuth ch pi neneoktham s-ap ha neokchuth.”
41008001	Kush pi sha'i tash amjed. Tsh mu'i am ep i e hemapai g hemajkam k ab kaiham g Jesus waik tashkaj. Sh hahawa pi an hu ha'ichug mas haschu wo huh. Tsh g Jesus am i ha wai g e-chuhchai k hah ha ahg.
41008002	“Neh, waik tashkaj o in wa'i t-wehmaj ihtham hemajkam ch heki hu wa'i pi ha'ichu huh. Ni s-ha ho'ige'ith.
41008003	Tp hems ha'ijj wo s-e chuhugi matp gm hu wo sha hihi pi ha'ichu hugok.”
41008004	Sh hegam ab i kakke, “Kuchs hebai hig wo ui g ha'ichu hugi mat wehs wo ha a'ahe ihtham?”
41008005	Sh ab ep ha kakke, “He'ekia at am i wih g sismito?” Sh hab kaij, “Wewa'ak”
41008006	Jesus atsh am hahawa ha ahgi g hemajkam mat am wo thadhaiwua. Kush am thadhaiwua. Tsh am ui g sismito k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am hahawa hahain k ha mah g e-chuhchai. Kutsh an i ha mahkhi g hemajkam.
41008007	Kumsh am hi wa ha'i al to'akch g waptopi. Kutsh ab ep ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am ha ahgi mat an ep wo i ha mahkhi. Tsh hab e juh.
41008008	Tsh wehsijj hug k oi wa hi si s-kokwoth, chum as am hu hebai d i gi'ik mihl chechoj ch mu'ijj g u'uwi ch a'al.
41008009	Tsh g Jesus chuhchai an i u'ihi g wihpi'ithaj mat am hu'i wewa'ak hoha wo ha shuhshuth. Kutsh g Jesus am hahawa ha ahgi g hemajkam mat gm hu wo hihi.
41008010	Tsh ihtham Jesus am ha hekaj i chehchsh wahlko ch ed k gm hu hihi mash am Dalmanutha chekshani k am i huhud.
41008011	Kutsh am ha'i thatha g Palasi k ab ne'owin g Jesus ch ab chum si chehani mat g si s-hasig ha'ichu am wo ha chehgi matp woho d Jiosh si Kehsha.
41008012	Kutsh g Jesus am si ihbuiwua k hab kaij, “Kus haschu ahgch ab ni-kakke ihtham hemajkam mant g si s-hasig ha'ichu am wo ha chehgi. Si ant s-wohom hab wo chei mant pi am hu wo sha'i ha chehgi g si s-hasig ha'ichu.”
41008013	Neh bash kaij ch am hahawa ha thagito. Kutsh an ep i chehchsh wahlko ch ed k gm hu aigo ep hihi.
41008014	Tsh eda pi chegito ihtham mat wo ui g sismito. Kush hemako am kahch.
41008015	Sh hab kaij g Jesus am ha wui, “Si g wo s-e nen'oithk mat pi wo em-cheawuagi g ha-jewajithakud hegam Palasi ch hegam mo ab si has elith g Herod.”
41008016	Sh hegam chuhchaij am hahawa a'aga ch hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Heg oki hekaj hab kaij mach pi ha sismitoga”
41008017	Kush eda g Jesus s-ha amichuth mo has kaij ch hab ha ahg, “Pi amki koi amichuth mani he'es edgith g gewkthag ch hekaj am a'aga mach pi ha sismitoga.
41008018	Am am wa chum neith mant al hetasp sismitokaj ha gegos g hetasp mihl chechoj ch mu'i ehp. Pegih, namt pi chegito
41008019	mamt he'ekia i hoha shuhshuth k ui g wihpi'ithaj?” Kush hab kaij, “Gamai gohk.”
41008020	Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Kumt he'ekia i hoha shuhshuth k ui g wihpi'ithaj mant al wewa'ak sismitokaj am ha gegos hegam gi'ik mihl chechoj ch mu'i ehp?” Sh hab kaij, “Wewa'ak.”
41008021	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, mt wo chum s-mahchk mani he'es i edgith g gewkthag ch hab wo s-amich mani pi heg hab ahg sismito ch wabshaba ha'ichu chum em-tashogith ch heg am wepogith g jewajithakud.”
41008022	Kutsh gm hu thatha Bethsaida t am k am i huhud. Kutsh g hemajkam am hema u'apa g o'othham Jesus wui mash pi nea k ab i e sho'igch wui mat ab wo taht.
41008023	Kutsh an bei g pi neatham nowij an k am i wanimed k gm hu i wuhshath ab kihhim t amjed k ab hahawa siswua wuhpuij ab k ab ep taht k ab kakke, “Shahchu ap hig neith?”
41008024	Tsh ab i nen k hab kaij, “Neith ani mo an oiopo g hemajkam ch wabshaba hab sha mahs mo g u'us wuhshanim.”
41008025	Tsh ab ep taht g wuhpuij. Kutsh ab ep i nea. Tsh g wuhpuij am i ap'et. Sh hahawa wehs ha'ichu si s-ap neith.
41008026	Sh g Jesus hab ahg matsh gm hu uhpam wo hih e-kihthag wui k pi am hu wo kia i wah kihhim ch ed.
41008027	Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihi ihtham Jesus am ha'i ep ha wui g kihhim am miabithch g Cesaria Philippi kihhim. Kush g Jesus ab ha kakke ch hab kaij, “Am g wo ni-ahgith, thoh'o ni-elith g hemajkam?”
41008028	Kush hab kaij, “Ha'ijj o hab m-elith map d hegai Johnbad mo chum t-pahl wapkonahim ch ha'ijj hab ep m-elith map d Elijabad o hema i ehp hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
41008029	Sh ab ep ha kakke g Jesus, “Kum ahpim hig hedai ni-elith?” Kush g Peter hab kaij, “Thap Jiosh si Kehsha maptsh ab wo i wuhsh si ha'ichu wehhejed.”
41008030	Kush hab ha ahg mat pi hedai wo sha'i ha ahgi hemu mo hedai wud.
41008031	Neh, tsh am i amjed am hahawa ha'ichu ha mashcha ab e amjed hab kaijch mat hemho wa mu'i wo e sho'igch g Jiosh si Kehsha. Kutsh pi ab hu wo tatchua g ge'eged ch u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham k am wo i thagito mat wo e-muhkith. Tsh amjed d wo i waik tashk, tsh ep wo e-chegito.
41008032	Neh, sh ith am si tasho ha ahgith. Kutsh g Peter im hu go'olko i be k ab si s-gewkam neok wui hab kaijch mat pi woho hab wo e juh.
41008033	Kutsh wabshaba g Jesus ab ha'ab i kekiwua ha wui k ab epai si s-gewkam neo ab wui g Peter hab kaijch. “Pi g sha'i ni-shohbith. Tho wabsh hejel hab m-elitha ihtha. Kup ab wui kehk g Jiosh hab elitha hab masma mo g ge Jiawul.”
41008034	Sh eda mu'ij g hemajkam an ha wehgaj. Kutsh ab i ha waith k hab ha ahg, “Mamtp am wo s-oitham g ni-himthag k hemho wa gm hu wo thagito g hejel e-tatchui k ahni ni-tatchui hab wo junihith ni-wehhejed e sho'igchuthch. Heg at wo wa wepok mam ab mohto g kots ch ab ab wo e muhkith.
41008035	Pi amt wo heki wua g e-thoakag mamtp wo hekaj am ni-wehhejed. Heg at wo heki wua g e-thoakag matp hedai wo chum s-tha'ath.
41008036	“Pi at ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk matp g o'othham wehs wo bei mo haschu i tatchua ith thahm jewed k wabshaba pi wo e tho'ibia.
41008037	Pi o an hu ha'ichug ith thahm jewed mas heg hekaj wo e tho'ibia g o'othham.
41008038	“Mu'i hemajkam at wabsh s-tahhatham hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ch wo pi em-ha'ichuchuthath. Kumt wabshaba ahpim pi wo si e elithath ni-hekaj ch hekaj g ni-mashchamadag. Nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo si ni-elithath em-hekaj mant hekith ia ep wo jiwia. Ithani at ab ni-ab si s-tondam wo e chehgithath g ni-ohg gewkthag. T g mu'i anghil ni-wehm ab wo i hihi.”
41009001	Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch hab ep kaij, “Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mo ia ha'i ha'ichug hemu mat pi koi wo koi k ho'ip nei mat ba'ich i s-gewkam inhab wo i e juh g Jiosh kownaltalig.”
41009002	Kush am d i chuhthp tash amjed. Tsh g Jesus ab i ha wai g Peter ch James ch John. Kutsh ihtham am wehmaj ab i chehchsh hema uhgk tho'ag t ab k gd hu thatha k haha wabsh nei. Tsh am gawul e juh g Jesus.
41009003	Tsh g wehschugaj hab e juh mash si s-tondam s-tohta mo pi hebai ha'ichu hab masma.
41009004	Kutsh ab haha wabsh i e chehgi g Elijabad ch Mosesbad k am wehmaj neneok g Jesus.
41009005	Kutsh si e totoths ihtham Peter. Tsh g Peter wabsh kohsh k tha'iwuni k hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “T-mashchamtham, s-ap'e oki mach ia ha'ichug. Tt ia waik wo ha chuhcha g al chechopi matt hekaj ab wo si has em-el ahpi ch Mosesbad ch Elijabad.”
41009007	Tsh an hahawa si ha ehkaj g chewagi. Tsh g Jiosh ne'oki ab kaitha chewagi t amjed k hab kaij, “Jesus o d si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag. Heg amt ab wo si kaihamath.”
41009008	Tsh am hahawa i chum nenhog hegam Peter. Kush hegai wa'i Jesus hejel am kehk. Sh pi am hu ha'ichug hegam gohk.
41009009	Sh ab hahawa i huhudkhim tho'ag t amjed. Sh ab si ha chehani g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Pi g am hedai wo sha'i ahgith mamt haschu i nei, nt ho'ip kia am uhpam i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”
41009010	Kutsh wa woho hab e juh k wabshaba hejel am a'aga mas has d ahga ihtha mo hab kaij matsh am uhpam wo i wuhsh muhkig t amjed.
41009011	Am hu hebai, sh hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Neh, bo chech'e hegam chehanig t-mashchamtham matsh ia wehpeg wo e maskogi g Elijabad. Tsh g Jiosh si Kehsha ia haha wo e maskogi. Pegih, t haschu ahgk pi ia wehpeg m-ba'ich e maskogi hegai Elijabad.”
41009012	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Hema at woho wehpeg wo e maskogith k hab wo masmak mash wa g Elijabad ch wehs ha'ichu wo i ap'ech. Kunt wo em-ahgi mat wa woho heki hu jiwia. T wabshaba g hemajkam am wui hab juh g pi ap e-tatchui mo hab masma an o'ohanas Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed mat hab wo e juh. K an ep o'ohanas mat ep wo ni-sho'igchuth k wo s-ni-ohhoth ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”
41009014	Sh gd hu ha aihim hegam mat am wih. Kush mu'i hemajkam am oiopo. Sh ha'i d chehanig t-mashchamtham ch am ha ne'owin hegam mat am wa'i wih.
41009015	Tsh g hemajkam am i nei mo ab him g Jesus k si s-ap i e taht k ab i wohp k ab nam.
41009016	Sh g Jesus ab ha kakke hegam e-chuhchai mat am wa'i wih, “Shahchu am ha wehm a'aga?”
41009017	Kush am hema g o'othham hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Neh, ia ant heki hu chum u'apa g ni-alithag m-wui no pi g jiawul an u'ukch ch pi hiwgith mas wo neo.
41009018	Hebai atp am si has tahtchuth ch i wuhppa. K g totshagi i chechshshaj chinij ab. K g e-tahtami si kuhm ch ab wabsh wo i si gewka. Kuni heki hu am chum ha ahgith ihtham mat gm hu hab wo i juh g jiawul. T pi e nako.”
41009019	Sh hab kaij g Jesus am ha wui, “Sho'o wa'i pi ge'ej g em-wohochuthadag. Shahag wepo mant tash ia wo em-wehmajkath ch ab wo em-nakogath mat hekaj wo i ge'etha.” Sh hab hahawa kaij heg wui o'othham, “Ab g i beka'i ni-wui.”
41009020	Kutsh ab hahawa i bei wui. Tsh ab i nei g Jesus. Kutsh g jiawul ha hekaj i wua g ali. Kutsh am gehsh k am si banimmed jewedo. Tsh g totshagi i wuhsh ab chinij ab.
41009021	Jesus ash ab hahawa kakke g ohgaj, “K hekith i amjed hab masma ihtha?” Kush hab kaij g ohgaj, “Gd hu wa'i e-alijk amjed o hab masma.
41009022	Mu'ikko o wa'i chum s-mu'amk ch am wuhppa shuhthagi ch ed ch am nahtha ch ed. Si g s-ni-ho'ige'ith k i wuhshath maptp wo e nako.”
41009023	Sh g Jesus hab kaij, “Maptp ahpi wo e nako k ab wo i ni-hiw. Pi o ha'ichu sha'i wihnk am ni-wehhejed maptp ab wo ni-hiwgath.”
41009024	Kush hab kaij g ohgaj. “M ani wa he'es ab chum m-hiwig. Oi g i ni-wehmt. Nt ba'ich ab wo i m-hiwgath.”
41009025	Tsh eda ab a'aijed i wohp g hemajkam an ha wehgaj. Kush hekaj s-e hohtkith g Jesus ch si s-keh'el g jiawul k hab ahg, “Thagitoni g ali, ahpi jiawul, k pi thahm an hu ep wo sha'i u'ukchith.”
41009026	Tsh am si s-kaitham hihin k ab si s-gewkam e ugij g ali. Tsh am hahawa thagito. Tsh hab wabsh e juh mat muh g ali. Sh g hemajkam hab kaij, “Muh atki.”
41009027	Tsh wabshaba g Jesus ab bei nowij ab k i wamigi. Tsh i wamig k kekiwua.
41009028	Kutsh gd hu i wahp kih ch ed ihtham Jesus. Tsh g chuhchaij am hahawa hejelko kakke, “Tt haschu ahgk ahchim pi t-nako machs gm hu hab wo i juh g jiawul?”
41009029	Sh hab kaij g Jesus. “Jiawul at heg wa'i hekaj gm hu hab wo i e juh mamt ab wo e ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui.”
41009030	Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hihim k gm hu gahi wuwha g Galilee chekshani. Tsh g Jesus pi am hu e chehgi hemajkam ha wui no pi ha mashchamahim g e-chuhchai ch hab ha ahg,
41009031	“E o aihim mat g s-ni-keh'iththam wo ni-bei ahni Jiosh si Kehsha k am wo ni-thagito ha'i ha wui mat wo ni-mua. Nt wabshaba ep wo ni-chegito mat d wo i waik tashk amjed.”
41009032	Sh oi wa pi sha'i amichuth mas haschu hab ahg ch wabshaba pi ab hu kakke nat pi e totoths.
41009033	Kutsh am hihim k gd hu thatha Capernaum t am k am i wahp kih ch ed mash hebai thadha. Sh eda ha'i ha'ichukaj e ne'owin hihimathch. Kush ab hahawa ha kakke ch hab kaij, “Shahchukaj am e ne'owinahim mach ab hihim?”
41009034	Kush oi wa pi hedai has sha'i kaij nash pi eda e ne'owinahim mas hedai ba'ich d wo i s-has ha'ichuk.
41009035	Kutsh am i thahiwua g Jesus k ab i ha wai. Tsh am i e hemapai wui. Kush hab ha ahg, “Pi g wo chum ge e ha'ichuchuthath mamtp hedai d wo uhgchuk am e-shahgith ch wabshaba hab wo e junihith mamt wehs d wo ha-pionagk.”
41009036	Sh am hema kehk g ali. Kutsh g Jesus an be k am kohm k hab kaij,
41009037	“Matp hedai hema wo ha thagio'ithath g ali am ni-wehhejed ch hekaj am wo e chehgithch mo ab si ni-tatchua ch ab ep si tatchua hegai mani d kehshaj.”
41009038	Kush g John hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Hema oki gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul heg hekaj m-chehgig. Kuch am chum shohbith no ge m-wecho e mashcham.”
41009039	Kush hab ha ahg, “Pi g am wo sha'i shohbith. Pi at woho has wo ni-ah matp hedai hekaj g ni-chehgig ch hab wua g s-wihnk ha'ichu.
41009040	Tki wo i t-wehmt hegai matp hedai pi ab hu t-wui kehk.
41009041	Nt wo si shel em-ahgi matp hedai wo i em-wasibi g shuhthagi ahpim mam ab si ni-wecho e mashcham k wo bei g s-ap'ekam e-namkithadag.”
41009042	Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Sho'o wa'i si s-ta ehbitham hab mahs am wehhejed hegai matp hedai hema am wo i ha wanchkwua pi ap'ekam wui ihtham al a'al mo ab al ni-hiwig. Ba'ich at wo i s-ap'ek wehhejed matp hems wo e wachumchuth k wo e muhkith mat koi hab wo juh ihtha chu'ichig.
41009043	“Pi at hedai wo e nako mas ab uhpam wo i wuhsh Jiawul kih amjed. Kut pi hekith wo huhug g ha-sho'igchutha amai. Heg at wo wa wepok mat wo waptopadt k chum hekith wo e sho'igchuthath am mei ch ed. Mt heg hekaj am wo i e nako mamt pi am hu wo gei heg eda. Ba'ich at wo i s-ap'ek mamt chum hems wo heb hu wua g e-nowi o g e-tad o g e-wuhi matp hema ihtham hab wo em-juh mamt am wo gei Jiawul kih ed k pi wo bei hegai wechij thoakag mo g Jiosh ab em-makiog.
41009049	“Hemho wa at wehs wo e maskogi g pi ap ha-chu'ichig g hemajkam.
41009050	Mt wabshaba hejel ab wo e abchuth k wo thagito hemu. T hab pi ab hu wo em-abch g Jiosh. Kumt ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk hab masma mo g on. Heg at pi has masma ep wo i e kegch mat wo onko. Kumt wo s-e nen'oithath mamt pi wo heb hu wua g s-e-ap'ek am k wabshaba wo s-ap e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
41010001	Tsh amjed gm hu hihi hegam Jesus k am gahi wuwha g Judea chekshani k am gahi i shul g Jordan akimel k gm hu aigo thatha. Kutsh g hemajkam am ep i e hemapai Jesus wui. Tsh am ep ha mashcha mash chum hekith hab e wua.
41010002	Kutsh ab ha'i i hihi g Palasi k ab ha'ichu chum s-abchuthamk g Jesus ch ash ab kakke, “No hiwgith g t-chehanig mat g o'othham wo s-ohhoth g e-hohnig?”
41010003	Sh g Jesus ab epai ha kakke, “Nam hig pi mahch mo has chu'ig g chehanig?”
41010004	Kush hab kaij g Palasi, “Heu'u, hiwgith o mat g o'othham wo bei g tapial k wo ha mah k gm hu wo s-ohhoth.”
41010005	Kush oi wa hab kaij g Jesus, “Heu'u, bo chu'ig mamt wo ha mah g ohhotha tapial mamtp pi ab hu wo kaihamath g Jiosh ch pi wo pihk e elithath ha hekaj.
41010006	K wabshaba gd hu i shohshonkam am ahgas: Jiosh at am ha nahto g cheoj ch uwi mat d wo e wehhejedkamk.
41010007	Kut ith hekaj g o'othham wo thagito g e-ohg ch e-je'e k am wo i e wehmt g e-hohnig wehm.
41010008	Kut hegam gohk hab wo e juh mat d wo hemakok. Pegih, t pi hab hahawa ep wo mahsk mat d wo gohkk ch wabshaba d wo hemakok.
41010009	Pi o hab sha'i mahs mas g o'othham wo ha gawulkai hegam mat g Jiosh ab i ha wehnath.”
41010010	Tsh gd hu hahawa i wahp kih ch ed. Tsh g chuhchaij ab i kakke mas haschu hab ahg.
41010011	Kush hab kaij, “Bo wua g pi ap'ekam matp hedai wo s-ohhoth g e-wehm kihkam k hema ep wo hohnt.
41010012	K g uwi hab wa'ap wua g pi ap'ekam matp wo s-ohhoth g e-wehm kihkam k hema ep wo kunt.”
41010013	Kutsh am ha'i ha u'apa g e-a'aliga Jesus wui hab ahgch mat ab wo ha taht k wo e ho'ige'ithahu ha wehhejed. Kumsh chum s-ha keh'ith mo hab e wua.
41010014	Kutsh oi wa pi hohho'i g Jesus matsh chum pi ha hiwigi k hab ha ahg, “Ab g wabsh wo i ha hiwgith g al a'al mat ab wo i hihi ni-wui k pi an hu wo sha'i ha shohbi. Am at wabsh s-moimam wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed ab ni-hiwigch.
41010015	Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mamt hab wa'i masma am wo i wahp.”
41010016	Neh, bash kaij ch an i ha kohmkahim k ab i ha tahtamahi ha-mohmi ab k ab i s-ha ho'ige'el.
41010017	Kutsh amjed haha wabsh i chum hihi. Kush ab hema med g o'othham ch ab i gei Jesus wui k ab kakke, “Ha mashchamtham map d s-ap'ekam, shahchu ant am hab wo juh mant ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag?”
41010018	Sh g Jesus hab kaij, “Pi ap mahch map haschu ahgch hab ni-a'aga mani d s-ap'ekam. Heg o wa'i Jiosh d s-ap'ekam. Kup pi woho mahch mani hedai wud.
41010019	S-mahch ap g Jiosh chehanig. K hab chu'ig: Pi g am hu ha mua'i g o'othham. Pi g am hu ha ehsithath g ha-wehm kihkam. Pi g am hu ha'ichu ha ehsithath. Pi g am hu ha'ichu ha iattogithath. Ab g si has ha elithath g e-ohg ch e-je'e.”
41010020	Kush hab kaij ihtha o'othham, “Wehs ihtha ani hab junihim gd hu i ni-alijk amjed.”
41010021	Tsh Jesus ab i nei ihtha k ab si pihk i e el wui k hab kaij, “Hemako ha'ichu apki pi am hu hab wua. Him k gagda map haschu i eniga k ha mahki g namkigaj g sho'igkam k ab wo i him k ab si ni-wecho wo e mashchamath ch an haha wo edgithath g ba'ich i s-kehg kaisthag Jiosh kihthag ed.”
41010022	Kutsh ihtha o'othham si pi ap e taht k kah mo has i kaij nash pi d s-kais ch atsh im hu hih pi ap e tahtkk.
41010023	Tsh g Jesus an i nenhog e wehgaj k hab kaij am ha wui g e-chuhchai, “Neh, t wo sha'i si s-hasigk mas g s-kakais am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed.”
41010024	Kutsh si has i e taht hegam chuhchaij am i kaiok mash has kaij. Sh oi wa hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ni-naipijju, pi g hab wo elithath mat g o'othham wabsh s-pehegi am wo i wah Jiosh kownaltalig ed.
41010025	Nam hig hab elith mat wo e nako g kamihyo mas am wo gahi wuhsh mo am jeg g ho'ipad? Pegih, t hab wa masma pi wo e nako hegam mo hiwig g ha'ichu e-eniga mas am wo i wahp Jiosh kihthag ed.”
41010026	Kutsh ba'ich i si has i e taht k ab a'ai e kakke, “Pegih, kus hedai hig wo e tho'ibia?”
41010027	Kutsh ab i ha nei g Jesus k hab kaij, “O'othham wehhejed o s-hasig ch wabshaba am Jiosh wehhejed pi hasig. Jiosh at wo e nako mat wehs hab wo juh mo haschu i tatchua.”
41010028	Kutsh g Peter hab ha hekaj chei, “Neh'e, ahchim att hi wehs ha'ichu thagito k am i m-oi.”
41010029	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mamt ba'ich i mu'i ha'ichu wo edagi mo chum hegai mam tp haschu i thagito am ni-wehhejed, kihki, wepnag, jehj, a'al, o'oithag. Kumt mu'i ha'ichu wo nako mamt wo ahgahi g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab ni-amjed k am haha wo ai g pi ha huhugetham s-hehgig.
41010031	Kut wabshaba hegam mo wabsh hejel chum si e ha'ichuchuth hahawa pi d wo ha'ichuk. T hegam mo hejel pi e ha'ichuchuth am hahawa d wo si ha'ichuk.”
41010032	Kutsh gm hu i oi g wohg Jerusalem wui. Sh gm hu ha ba'ich him g Jesus. Kush si e totothsith g chuhchaij. Kush am ha'i ep ha wehm hihimath ch hab wa'ap e totothsith. Tsh g Jesus am i ha hemapai hegam gamai gohk k am ep ha ahgi mat haschu has wo e juh am tahgio,
41010033	ash hab kaij, “Neh'e, gm att hu wo hihi Jerusalem wui. Kut an wo ni-bei g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig em-mashchamtham k ab wo ni-mohto'i g chu'ichig ahni Jiosh si Kehsha no pi s-ni-mu'amk ch im hu hab hahawa ep wo ni-thagito ha wui g gawul mahs hemajkam.
41010034	Kut hegam wo nahnko ni-ahgath ch ab ni-ab wo siswuath ch ep wo ni-gewittan k haha wo ni-mua. Kut d wo waik i tashk, nt ep wo ni-chegito.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
41010035	Tsh amjed ab wui thatha g James ch John k hab kaij, “T-mashchamtham, am ach ha'ichu chum s-m-kakkeimk mapt am hab wo t-juni.”
41010036	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Shahchu am hab elith mant am hab wo em-juni?”
41010037	Sh hab kaij, “Pt hig am wo i t-chuhcha matt ahchim gohk am m-oithch d wo haha'ichuk mapt hekith am wo i himch g e-kownaltalig.”
41010038	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi am sha'i ap mahch mam haschu ab ni-tahni. Wehpeg ant ab wo nako g ge'e sho'igthag. Kut hegam mat am ni-oithch d wo si haha'ichuk hab wa'ap wo e juh.”
41010039	Sh hab kaij, “Pegih, tt wo t-nako.” Kush g Jesus hab kaij, “Pegih, woho am t wo nako hegai mant ahni wo nako.
41010040	K wabshaba pi ab hu ni-ab manis ahni am wo i ha chuhcha mat hedai am ni-oithch d wo haha'ichuk. Hegam at am wo i e chuhcha mat hedai i ha wehhejed am e ap'ech.”
41010041	Kutsh hegam ha'i babgat ab ha wui g James ch John mash hab masma ab hejel e ha'ichuchuth.
41010042	Tsh g Jesus ab hahawa wehs i ha hemapath k hab kaij ab ha wui, “S-mahch am mo g ha-maliomig s-gewkam ha'ichu ha chehani g e-pionag ch g ha wanimedtham am ha himchuthahim.
41010043	T wabshaba pi hab masma hab wo sha'i chum mahsk am em-shahgith ahpim mam ab ni-hiwig. Mt wabsh si s-hemajim am wo i ha wehmtath g e-wehm wohochuththam hab sha masma mam d wabsh ha-pionag mamtp wo tatchuath mamt wo ha wanimedath.
41010045	Ahni ani hab wa masma si s-hemajim i em-wehmt ch pi ab hu ni-ha'ichuchuth em-thahm, chum anis d Jiosh si Kehsha. Ab o em-wui him g s-ko'ok namkithadag heg hekaj pi ap em-chu'ichig. Nt wabshaba ahni em-wehhejed wo nako mamt wo e wupul'o.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
41010046	Kutsh am hihi ihtham Jesus k gm hu thatha Jerico t am. Sh am sha'i he'es. Tsh am ep i chum hihi hasko. Kutsh sha'i si mu'i hemajkam an ep i ha oithahi. Sh an hema thaha wohg hugith an ch ha limoshan nash pi d pi neatham. Ith amsh hab a'aga Bar Timaius nash pi d alithaj g Timaius.
41010047	Sh am hihim ihtham Jesus. Kutsh am i s-mai ihtha mash g Jesus an him k am ha hekaj si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith, Jesus, mapsh d t-kownaligbad David amjedkam.”
41010048	Kush mu'ijj s-keh'ith ch hab chum ahg matsh am wabsh wo i pi shahmunik. Tsh oi wabsh ba'ich i e gewkai, “Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith, ahpi Davidbad amjedkam.”
41010049	Kutsh am i kekiwua g Jesus k hab kaij, “Ab g wo i waith!” Kumtsh am ha hekaj wai hab ahgch, “S-ap g e tahtam k i wuhshani. Ab o m-waith.”
41010050	Kutsh heg am ha hekaj si wuahawua g e-lihwa k am si tha'iwuni k ab i him k am jiwia wui.
41010051	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Shahchu ant hab wo m-juni?” Sh hab kaij g pi neatham, “Ni-kownalig, ab g i ni-thoajith mant wo nent.”
41010052	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “S-ap g e tahtk k hihm. Thoa apt nap pi ab ni-hiwig.” Tsh am ha hekaj wabsh i ap'et k nei ha'ichu k gm hu hahawa i oi g Jesus.
41011001	Sh amjed ab hihim ihtham Jesus Jerusalem wui. Tsh am hebai i cheka. Kutsh am ai g Olive U'us Kawulk. K heg mia gohk al kihhimag ch hab chehgig Bethphage ch Bethany.
41011002	Tsh g Jesus gohk hab ha ah g e-chuhchai, “Am g wo hihim k ga hu wo thatha kihhim t am. Kut am hema wo wulshpik g wechij wuhlu mo koi sha'i e chechshshaj. Mt gam wo wul'o.
41011003	T hema ab wo em-kakke mams has wo juh. Kumt hab wo ah mani ahni d em-mashchamtham ch tatchua ch am haha wo thagito mamt uhpam wo u'apa. Kut ab wabsh wo i thagito mamt ab wo i wanim.”
41011004	Neh, tsh wa woho gm hu hihi ihtham gohk k am cheh mo am wulshpi g wuhlu k am wul'o.
41011005	Kush eda inhab ha'i gegok g o'othham ch ha neith mash am wupul'ok. Sh hema hab kaij, “Shahchu am ahgch am wupul'ok g wuhlu?”
41011006	Sh am i ha ahgith mash has kaij g Jesus. Kutsh heg hekaj ha hiwigi matsh am wo bei.
41011007	Kutsh am i wanimed k gd hu u'apa Jesus wui k an toa g e-liliwa an ab. Tsh an thahiwua g Jesus.
41011008	Sh mu'i hemajkam an ha wehgaj ch am i ha tahtdahim g e-liliwa wohg ch ed ch ha'ijj g wechij u'us i'ibhonig an hikkumiak ch am to'ahim heg oithch wohg mash am him g Jesus.
41011009	Kush hegam mash an wehgaj hihim si s-kaitham hab kaij: “T-tho'ibiakam! Jiosh atki ia i m-wuhshath k ab si s-m-ho'ige'ith.
41011010	Kupt ep wo i himch kownaltaligaj g t-kownaligbad David k ab wo i s-t-ho'ige'ithath. T wo t-tho'ibia g Jiosh.”
41011011	Kutsh gm hu thatha Jerusalem t am. Tsh am i hud g Jesus k am i wah mo am kehk g ge'e cheopi k an i neithahi mo an haschu has e wua. Sh am i hudunihim. Tsh hekaj am i wuwhag k gm hu hihi Bethany wui matsh am wo thadkath.
41011012	Sh am ba'ich d i tash mash ab uhpam hihim Jerusalem wui. Tsh bihugim g Jesus.
41011013	Kush am hu hema kehk g suhna uhs. Tsh ab wui hihi nash pi s-hahhagag ch ab wo chum bahithagk, chum as pi koi e ai mat wo bai. Kush oi wa pi ab hu ha'ichu sha'i ihbthag.
41011014	Kush hekaj hab kaij, “Pi at hedai ab hu ep wo huh g bahithag.” Kush kah ihtham.
41011015	Kud gd hu thatha Jerusalem t am k am i wahp mo am kehk g ge'e cheopi. D eda am ha'i thadha ch am ha'ichu gagda ch ha'ichu ha nolawt ge'e cheopi miabithch. D g Jesus gm hu si ha shahmuth k gm hu a'ai kuhkpal si ha shul g ha-mimsa hegam mo g lial kammialt ch g ha thathaikud hegam mo g hohhi ha gagda.
41011016	D wenog g hemajkam ha'ichu gahi mohto mo am kehk g ge'e cheopi. Kud g Jesus am ha shohbith
41011017	k am hahawa ha mashcham g hemajkam ch hab kaij, “Bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Ahni o d ni-wehhejedkam ihtha ge'e cheopi. Kut ith wui ab wo hihhimath g wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam mat ab wo ni-ihmath. Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh. Kumt eda an be k am eda hab wabsh wua g hejel e-tatchui ch chum hems ha'ichu s-a'agi ha ehsith ab ha wui ha'ichu gagdach.”
41011018	D mu'ijj g hemajkam ab si has elith g mashchamigaj. Kudki heg hekaj s-ehbith g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham ch am i a'aga mas has masma wo mua.
41011019	Kud am i hud. D am hahawa i wuwha kihhim t amjed hegam Jesus.
41011020	Ba'ich mahsi, tsh am ep bihbij amai mash am kehk g suhna k nei matki gaksh.
41011021	Sh g Peter hab kaij, “Neh, t-mashchamtham, hegai suhna mapt ab si has ah atki gaksh.”
41011022	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab g wabsh wo hiwgath g Jiosh.
41011023	Kut wabsh chum haschu hab wo em-juni. Mtp hems wo cheha ihtha tho'ag mat gm hu wo e wua ge shuhthagi ch ed. Kut wa woho hab wo e juh mamtp ab wo hiwgath mat hab wo e juh.
41011024	Ab g wabsh wo s-wohochuthath mat g Jiosh am hab wo em-juni hegai mamt haschu ab wo i tai. Kut wa woho hab wo em-juni.
41011025	Mt wabshaba wehpeg wo pi chegito g pi ap ha-chu'ichig hegam matp hedai ab em-wui hab juh g pi ap'ekam. T g Jiosh em-ohg ab haha wo s-em-ho'ige'ith k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig. [
41011026	Mtp wabshaba pi wo sha pi chegito g pi ap ha-chu'ichig, t g Jiosh g em-chu'ichig hab wa'ap pi gm hu hab wo i juh.]”
41011027	Kud gm hu ep thatha Jerusalem t am k gd hu i wahp mo am kehk g ge'e cheopi. Kutsh g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham ch ge'eged am thatha wui g Jesus
41011028	k ab kakke, “Thohp amjed hab chum e elith map u'ukch g e-gewkthag ch am hab ha'ichu wua? Oi g am t-ahgith.”
41011029	Kush oi wa hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, nt ahni wehpeg ab epai wo ha'ichu em-kakke. Mt am wo ni-ahgi. Nt am epai wo em-ahgi g em-kakkei.
41011030	Am g hig wo ni-ahgith mams hedai amjed hab elith mo wa g Johnbad ab u'ukch g e-gewkthag ch ha pahl wapkonahim. No ab Jiosh amjed aha no ab o'othham amjed?”
41011031	Kush ihtham am wabsh chum hejel si a'aga ch hab kaij, “Shahtt hig wo chei? T wo s-t-keh'ith k ab wo t-kakke matt haschu ahgk pi ab hu wohoch g Johnbad mattp hab wo chei mo ab Jiosh amjed u'ukch g gewkthag.
41011032	T g hemajkam has wo t-juh mattp hab wo chei mo ab wabsh o'othham amjed u'ukch. Mu'ijj o hab elith mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
41011033	Neh, bash kaij ch ab hahawa uhpam i e nohnogi Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Pi ach sha'i mahch mas hedai amjed ab u'ukch g e-gewkthag.” Kush g Jesus hab epai kaij ab ha wui, “Pegih, nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo sha'i em-ahgi mani hedai amjed ab u'ukch g ni-gewkthag ch hab wua wehs ihtha.”
41012001	Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch am hahawa ha ahgith ihtha wepogitha ahga hab kaijch, “Matp hems hema hab i e ah mat am hig wo ge ei g uhdwis. T g piongaj an ge kolhaidath k heg ep nahto mat hekaj am wo i wuhshath g wadgaj k am i kei g uhgk kih mat heg amjed wo nuhkuthath g eshaj. T gm hu hasko chihpia g enigakam k ha'i ha hiwigi g e-oithag.
41012002	“T am i e ai mat g uhdwis wo bai. Kut am hema ahgi g e-pionag mat am wo him k ab wo bei hegai wadgaj mo ab d i chum wuikamaj g enigakam.
41012003	Kut am him k am jiwia. T wabshaba hegam mo am nuhkuth g oithag am wabsh be k am gewittan k hab ah mat gm hu wo hih.
41012004	“K am hu i hebai, t am hema ep cheha e-pionag mat am wo hih. T am him k am jiwia. Kut am hab wa'i ep juh mat hab juh g wehpegkam k s-ko'okam juh g mo'oj k s-ko'okam has ah.
41012005	“T g enigakam am hema ep cheha g e-pionag mat am wo hih. T g nuhkuththam hab wa'ap juh k mua. T g enigakam am ha'i ep ha cheha mat am wo hihi. T g nuhkuththam hab wa'ap s-ko'okam ha juh k ha'i ha koktha.
41012006	“K am hema wi'is ch d alithaj. T heg am cheha mat am wo hih hab elithch mat ab has wo i el.
41012007	“T wabshaba ihtham oithag nuhkuththam am wabsh e wehm neneok k hab kaij, ‘Ith o d ihtha mat ab wui wo i wuhsh g oithag. Tt hig wo mua. T d haha wo t-enigak.’
41012008	Kut hab juh k mu'a k gm hu tha'ich ab kolhai amjed.
41012009	“Neh, m ant wo i em-tashogi mat has wo e juh g oithag enigakam. Ab at wo i him k wo ha koktha hegam mat am chum ha nuhkuthach g e-oithag k am ha'i ep wo ha nuhkuthach.
41012010	Pi amki sha'i amichuth mo has d ahga ihtha wepogitha ahga mo an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Kihttham at wo hema s-ohhoth g hothai. T wabshaba ith d wo si s-has ha'ichu hothaik am ha-kihta wehhejed.
41012011	Ith o hab d ahga mat si s-kehg ha'ichu hab wo juh g Jiosh.”
41012012	Neh, bash wabsh ha ahg hegam t-u'ugchuga g Jesus nash pi chum s-ohhothamk. Kush heg hekaj an chum s-behimk mat wo kuh. K wabshaba mu'ijj g hemajkam ab si has elith g Jesus. Kush s-ha gihug ch am wabsh i thagito k gm hu hihi hasko.
41012013	Kumtsh am hahawa ha'i hab ha ah g Palasi ch Herod pionag matsh am wo hihi Jesus wui k wo ne'owin k wo ha'ichu cheh mat heg ab wo abch.
41012014	Kutsh am thatha wui k hab kaij, “Ha mashchamtham, s-mahch ach map s-ap d o'othham ch wabsh chum hedai ha mashcham g Jiosh himthag, chum as has wo chei hedai i. Pegih, k am wo t-ahgi maps has elith g ge'e kownal lial kowlanta. No hig t-hiwgith g t-chehanig ahchim Tutuligo matt wo ha namkith aha no pi t-hiwgith?”
41012015	Sh wabshaba g Jesus am wa s-ha amichuth mo g pi ap'ekam hab elith ch hab ha ahg, “Ahpim, s-chu i'attomkam am wabsh chum heki s-ni-himchuthamk. Ab g wo hema ni-chehgith hegai lial mam hekaj ha namkith.”
41012016	Kumtsh ab hema chehgi. Kush hab ha ahg, “Am g hig wo ni-ahgith mo hedai wuhiosha ch hedai chehgig ab o'ohadag ith ab lial” Sh hab kaij ihtham, “Hegai mo d uhgchu t-kownalig.”
41012017	Kush hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pegih, ab g wo i thagito kownal wui hegai matp d enigaj k am epai wo i thagito Jiosh wui mo haschu d epai enigaj.” Kutsh wehsijj si has i el g ne'okij.
41012018	Kutsh am ha'i thatha Jesus wui hegam mash d Sajusi. K ihtham o pi d ha-wohochuthadag mat g muhki ab uhpam ep wo i wuhsh muhkig t amjed.
41012019	Kush hab kaij ihtham, “Ha mashchamtham, Mosesbad atki an o'oha hegai chehanigaj g Jiosh mo hab chu'ig: Matsh g am oithchkam wehngaj hegai mat wo muh pi ha a'alithagkch hemho wo wa bei g hohnigaj g e-wehnagbad. Tsh g ha-a'aliga hab masma wo e kuint mat d wo a'alithajk hegai mat muh.
41012020	Pegih, k am hu hebai wewa'ak d e-wepngam. Kut g si ge'echu hema hohnt g uwi k pi ab hu ha a'aligat k muh.
41012021	Kut g am oithchkam nawojij hahawa ep bei g hohnigaj k hab wa'ap pi ab hu ha a'alitht k hab wa'ap muh. Kut ihtha g oithchkam hab wa'ap hohnt k hab wa'ap muh pi ab hu ha a'alithtk.
41012022	Kut hegam ha'i hab wa'ap wehsijj i hohntahim k hab wa'ap koi pi ab hu ha a'alithtk. K am hu i hebai, t haha wabsh muh hab wa ehp ihtha uwi.
41012023	Pegih, am g hig t-ahgith mas hedai d wo hohnigkath ihtha matp ep wo e chegito g ko'i no pi wehsijj hohnigkahim.”
41012024	Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pi am ap chegito nam pi pi sha'i mahch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ep pi sha'i mahch mo he'es i gewkthag.
41012025	Woho at ab uhpam wo i ha wuwhas g ko'i. T wabshaba hahawa pi wo hohontath hab masma mo g anghil pi hohont.
41012026	Mosesbad atki an o'oha mash wa g Jiosh am e chehgith wui heg hekaj sha'i mash meihith ch pi meitto. Sh hab kaij g Jiosh: Ahni ani d ha-Jioshga hegam Abraham ch Isaac k ch Jacob. Neh, ith o hab kaij g Jiosh chum as heki hu koi, no pi am e wehm ha nuhkuth ch ab uhpam wo i ha wuwhas muhkig amjed.
41012027	Pi amt wabsh woho wo i huhug am i ko'ok matp g Jiosh d em-Jioshga. K heg hekaj pi sha'i woho hegai mam ahpim hab chum elith.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
