41012028	Kush am hema kehk g chehanig ha mashchamtham ch am ha kaiham. K eda tasho mo s-ap hab ha ahg g Jesus. Neh, tsh hab i e ah mat ab hig epai ha'ichu wo kakke, ash hab kaij, “Shahchu o d si ba'iwechkim ge'e chehanigaj g Jiosh?”
41012029	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Si ge'e chehanig o d ihtha: Ab g wo si tatchuath g e-kownalig Jiosh wehs e-ihbthagkaj ch ith am wo chehgithch wehs e-thoakagkaj ch wehs e-chegitoikaj ch wehs e-gewkthagkaj. Ith g ab wo si kaihamath ahpim mam d chum hemajkamgaj no pi pi hema ep d em-Jioshga. Neh, ith o d si ge'e chehanig.
41012031	K ith hab wa'ap d si ge'e chehanig ch hab chu'ig: Ab g wo si ha tatchuath g hemajkam hab masma mam has i masma ab hejel si e tatchua. Ihtham gohk o d si ge'e chehanig.”
41012032	Kush hab kaij ihtha, “S-ap ap hab kaij, t-mashchamtham. M o wa woho mo g Jiosh si s-wohom d Jiosh ch pi an hu hema ehp.
41012033	Kutt hemho wa ab wo si tatchuath g Jiosh wehs t-ihbthagkaj ch ith am wo chehgithch wehs t-chegitoikaj ch wehs t-gewkthagkaj ch ab wo si ha tatchuath g hemajkam mach has masma ab hejel si t-tatchua. Ihtham gohk o ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo hegai chehanig matt g ha'ichu t-shoiga wo mu'a k am wo iagchul Jiosh wui k ha'ichu si t-eniga wo i thagito am Jiosh wui.”
41012034	Kutsh am i kah g Jesus mo s-ap hab kaij k hab epai ahg, “Pi apki sha'i mehk ab Jiosh kownaltalig amjed.” Kutsh amjed hahawa pi hedai sha'i nako mas ab hu ha'ichu ep wo kakke.
41012035	Kush am ha mashcham g Jesus ge'e cheopi ch ed ch hab kaij. “Am g wo oithahim mas hedai d wo Jiosh si Kehshak. Chehanig em-mashchamtham o em-mashcham matsh heg d wo amjedkamk hegai t-kownaligbad mash hab chehgig David.
41012036	Kush wa eda g Davidbad hab a'aga ‘ni-kownalig’ ch hab kaij g gewkthajkaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag: Bo Kaij g Jiosh ab ni-kownalig wui, In g thahiwua s-apkojed ni-hugith an. Kunt wo ha gewito g m-obga mat ab wabsh wo m-wechok.
41012037	Neh, namt hig s-ap wo ah mat has masma d wo Davidbad amjedkamk ihtha mash d kownaligaj?” Sh mu'ijj ab kaiham ch si s-ap e tahtk ch kah mo haschu ha mashcham.
41012038	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Hegam mo d chehanig em-mashchamtham o am si s-apko thadhaiwup mam am e hehemapath ch si s-kehg e enigadath ch an oiopo no pi si tatchua mamt ab wo si has ha elithath. S-e g wo nen'oithath mamt pi hab wo masmak.
41012040	Chum as si chew e ho'ige'ithahun am em-tahgio ch eda ha'ichu s-a'agi ha wohppo'ith hegam mo d hehe'ejel wihpkam. T g Jiosh ba'ich i s-ko'okam wo ha namkith heg hekaj pi ap ha-chu'ichig no pi wabsh pehegia e ho'ige'ithahun.”
41012041	Kutsh am thahiwua g Jesus miabithch g ge'e cheopi. K ab e to'aw hegai lial mo hekaj e nuhkuth g cheopi. Sh g Jesus am ha neith hegam mo am to'aw. Kush g s-kakais sha'i si mumu'i am to'aw.
41012042	Tsh am hema jiwia g hejel wi'ikam oks k am hi wa al toa g gohk s-wepegchu.
41012043	Sh g Jesus am ha ahgith g e-chuhchai, “Neh'e, hegam mo ha'ichu s-edgith o hi wa ba'ich i mumu'i am to'aw. T wabshaba ihtha al oks ba'ich i si ha'ichu hab juh nat pi am al toa wehs hegai mo haschu al i edgith.”
41013001	Kutsh gm hu hahawa i wuwha ihtham Jesus ab amjed g ge'e cheopi. Kush ihtham hema hab kaij, “Neh'e, t-mashchamtham, sho'o wa'i si ge'eged hohothaikaj in kihtas g ge'e cheopi ch si s-kehg hab mahs.”
41013002	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Heu'u, nt wabshaba si shel wo em-ahgi mo e aihim mat wehs wo i e shul ihtha.”
41013003	Tsh amjed gm hu hejelko hihi wehmaj g Jesus k ab i chehchsh Olive U'us Kawulk t ab k ab thadhaiwua ge'e cheopi wui. Kutsh ihtham Peter ch James ch John ch Andrew ab i hihi Jesus wui k hab ahg,
41013004	“Am g hig t-ahgith mas hekith am hab wo i e juh hegai map am t-ahgith. Kut haschu d wo chehgithak matt heg ab wo s-mahchk moki e aihim.”
41013005	Kush am ha ahgith g Jesus, “Mt wo si s-e nen'oithath mat pi hedai wo em-iattogi.
41013006	Mu'i at an wo i wuwha a'ahithag oitham k ni-wepo wo e chehcheg hab kaijch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha. Kut mu'ijj ab wo s-ha wohoch.
41013007	T g nahnko mahs hemajkam ch jejewed ab a'ai wo i e checheggia. Mt wabshaba pi wo e totoths. Hemho at hab wo wa e juh hab masma. K wabshaba pi hab d ahga mat e ai mat wo kuhgit. An at mu'ikpa wo u'ugij g jewed. T g bihugig an ep wo gei mu'ikpa. Ith at d wabsh wo shohshonajk g sho'igthag nat pi ba'ich wo i ge'etha.
41013009	“Kumt wo s-e nen'eithath namt pi wo em-u'u k wo em-lothait k am ep wo em-u'apa kokownal ha wui heg hekaj mam ab ni-hiwig. Mt wabshaba am wabsh wo ha ahgi g ha'ichu ni-ahga.
41013010	T an wehsko wo i e ahgahi ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mat koi wo kuhgit g jewed.
41013011	Pi g has wo sha'i e tahkkath mams has wo chei mat hekith wo em-u'apa k wo em-lothai. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at ab wo i em-ahgi mamt has wo chei.
41013012	“Haha'ichu at wo em-koktha. Kut ab ha wui wo em-gagda chum hems g em-wepnag o g em-jehj o g em-a'aliga.
41013013	Mu'i hemajkam at wo s-em-keh'ithath nam pi ab ni-hiwig. Kumt wo sha e nakog k wo gahi wuwha g e-sho'igthag. T g Jiosh ab wo i em-wahpki e-kihthag ed.”
41013014	Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus. “Am g wo amichuth mamt haschu in wo ne'okchul Hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam Daniel at an o'oha mat g em-obga am wo i kei g s-uam ha'ichu gd hu si eda g ge'e cheopi. Kut hemho wa am haha wo ahhio thohtha'ag wui hegam mat ia wo ha'ichugk Judea jewed ch ed.
41013015	Kut pi hedai am hu wo sha'i chum i wah e-kih ed k am wo ha'ichu ui, chum as hems imhab wo wa'i oimmedath e-kih wehgaj o am wo chikpanath oithag ch ed.
41013017	S-ta at ehbitham wo mahsk am ha wehhejed hegam mat wo chu'uchum mahmadk ch hegam mat wabsh wo kia wo'ok g ali.
41013018	“Mt ab wo tahnith g Jiosh mat pi eda hab wo e juh ihtha s-hehpich'ed.
41013019	Ba'ich at d wo i si ge'e sho'igthagk mo pi hekith g hemajkam sha'i neith ch pi hekith hab masma ep wo nei.
41013020	Pi at hedai wo e nako mas am gahi wo wuhsh matp tash wo hih. T g Jiosh heg hekaj wo i shopolkai am ha wehhejed g e-hemajkamga.
41013021	“Pi g wo sha'i ha wohochuth matp hema hab wo sha chei mo am hebai ha'ichug g Jiosh si Kehsha.
41013022	Mu'i at in wo i wuwhag k hab wo chei mo d ni-ahni, Jiosh si Kehsha, o d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam k am hab wo wuath g si s-hasig ha'ichu mat hekaj wo i chum ha wanchshul g Jiosh hemajkamga matp wo e nako.
41013023	Ni wabshaba am heki hu em-ahgith ihtha mamt heg hekaj wo s-e nen'eithath.”
41013024	Sh hab ep kaij, “T am wabsh wo i chum kuhgit hegai jewed shuhthgim sho'igthag. Kut g tash tonlig wo huhug. T g mashath ep pi wo ha ton.
41013025	T g thahm kahchim wo ugij. T g huhu'u wo i shul.
41013026	Kunt ab hahawa si s-masma wo i hud chewagi ch ed ab Jiosh kihthag amjed ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. T am wo e maskogi g ni-gewkthag.
41013027	Kunt wo ha cheha g ni-anghiliga mat ab wehs wo i ha hemapai hegam mant am i ha chuhcha mat wo e tho'ibia. T am wo hihi imhab si'al tahgio ch imhab juhpin tahgio ch imhab huduni tahgio k ch imhab wakolim tahgio k wo i ha hemapai.
41013028	“Nt wo ha'ichu em-mashcha heg hekaj suhna uhs. Mt wo s-mahchk mo g toniabkam e aihim mamt wo nei mat ab wo i i'iwgi.
41013029	Pegih, mt hab wa'ap wo s-mahchk mo e aihim mat wehs wo kuhgit mamt wo nei mat hab wo e juh hegai mani em-ahgith.
41013030	Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat d wabsh wo kia thothakamk hegam mat wo nei ihtha mani em-ahgith mat hekith wehs wo kuhgit.
41013031	Neh, wehs at gm hu hab wo i e juh ihtha Jiosh nahtoi mam in neith. T wabshaba g ni-ne'oki pi hekith gm hu hab wo i e juh.”
41013032	Kush hab ep kaij, “Heg o wa'i s-mahch ni-ohg Jiosh mant hekith ep wo jiwia. Pi o hedai ep s-mahch, chum hems g anghil nih ahni mani d hi wa chum alithaj.
41013033	Kumt wo si s-e nen'eithath ch ab wo neithachugath nam pi pi mahch mas hekith wo i k ihtha.
41013034	K hab sha masma am em-wehhejed matp hems hema wo ha hiwigi g e-kihthag g e-pionag k wo ha cheha mat has wo masmak hehemako k g kihjeg nuhkuththam ep wo cheha mat wo si s-e nen'eithath k gm hu hahawa mehk jewed wui wo hih. T ihtham chum hekith wo s-e nen'eithath no pi pi mahch mas hekith ep wo jiwia.
41013035	Pegih, mt ahpim hab wa masma wo s-e nen'eithath. Pi o ta machima am em-wehhejed mas hebai hab wo i e juh g tash an a'ai jejewed thahm mant hekith wo i uhpam jiwia.
41013037	Kuni wehs hab s-ha ahgithamk mani haschu hab em-ahg mat hab wa'ap wo s-e nen'eithath.”
41014001	K eda gohk tash am wi'is matt wo wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag. Kush ihtham u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham am chum e nakog mas has hu'i masma s-a'agim wo bei g Jesus k wo mua,
41014002	ash am wabsh a'ai e ahgith, “Hi wa pi am hu heg eda mat ia wo e hemapathch g hemajkam ith hekaj piast. T wo am hu e babgachuth k wo t-cheggia.”
41014003	Tsh am hu hebai am thatha hegam Jesus Bethany t am. K am hema d kihkam mo hab chehgig Simon ch wa chum mumku heg hekaj mo g chuhkugaj wabsh muhkhim. Ith atsh ab i ha waith k ha gegos. Sh am thadhak ch e gegosith. Tsh ab haha wabsh hema i wah g uwi g si s-namkig s-ap uhw shuhthagi wa'igchugch am al s-toa hothai ha'a ch ed. K hab e a'aga ‘spikenard’ ihtha shuhthagi. Kutsh am si hai g al ha'a k an wehs iawua Jesus mo'o thahm.
41014004	Kutsh ha'i babgat am i neithok matsh has e juh k s-ju'ujpij e wehm neneok ch ash hab kaij, “T wabsh heki e wua ihtha s-namkig ha'ichu.
41014005	Eda atp hu'i chum waik siant pihsh wo nam sha e gagdak. T heg wo e hekaj ha wehhejed g sho'igkam.” Neh, bash kaij ch si s-keh'ith g uwi.
41014006	Kush oi wa hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Pi g am wo sha'i keh'ith ihtha uwi. Si at s-kehg ha'ichu hab juh am ni-wehhejed.
41014007	Chum o hekith ia em-shahgith g sho'igkam. Kumt wabsh chum hekith wo i ha wehmt. Kunt ahni hi pi tash ia hu wo em-shahgithk.
41014008	T ihtha uwi hab juh mat haschu i e nako mat am heki hu s-ap juh ni-chuhkug g ni-muhkig wehhejed.
41014009	Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat am wo e ahgahith mat haschu has ni-juni mat hebai wo i e ahgahith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh.”
41014010	Kutsh am ha hekaj ha thagito g Judas Iscariot k gm hu hih u'ugchu papal ha wui hab ahgk matsh hegam ha wui wo gagda g Jesus.
41014011	Sh am si s-hohho'ith ch kah ihtham mash has i kaij, ash ab si ahgith matsh wo namkith. Kutsh am hahawa si i e nako g Judas matsh hebai wo s-ap'ek. Kutsh ab ha wui wo gagda.
41014012	T am hahawa s-ap i e ai hegai t-shohshonbad ha-tho'ibiathag piast. K ith eda pi e ko'a hegai pahn mo jewajithas. K d wehpeg tash mat eda wo e koktha g kahwal mahmad. Sh g Jesus chuhchai ab wui hab kaij, “Bahp hab elith matt am wo huh g ha-tho'ibiathag gegosig?”
41014013	Kutsh am hahawa gohk hab ha ah, “Am amt wo hihi Jerusalem wui. T ab hema wo himath g cheoj ch wo wa'igchugath ab ha'a t ab.
41014014	Kumt am wo i oi. T am hu hebai wo him k am wo i wah hema kih ed. Kumt hab wo chei ab kihkam wui, ‘Neh, s-mahchimk o g t-mashchamtham mas an hebai i ha wi'is matt wo wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag.’
41014015	Kut am wo hema em-chehgi g kih. T ith gn hu ha-kih thahm hab wo chu'igk ch wo ge'ejk ch am wo apchuthask. Kumt an ha'ab wo i ap'ech g t-gegosig.”
41014016	Kutsh wa woho am hihi ihtham gohk k gd hu thatha kihhim ch ed. Tsh wa woho s-ap am hab e juh mash has i ha ahg. Kutsh am i ap'ech g gegosig.
41014017	Tsh am i hud. Tsh am hahawa thatha hegam Jesus k am hu thadhaiwua k e gegosith.
41014018	Sh hab haha wabsh kaij g Jesus, “M ant wo si shel em-ahgi mat oi am hab wo e juh mamt hema wo ni-gagda ahpim mam ab si ni-wecho e mashcham.”
41014019	Kutsh wehsijj pi ap e taht k gn hu hab i che'iatahi, “Ih, hi wa pi ahni.”
41014020	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Heg at hab wo juh mat hedai am ni-wehm wo wakch g chemait hithod ch ed.
41014021	Bant masma wo ni-muhkith mo has masma heki hu o'ohanas Jiosh o'ohana ed mat g si Kehshaj wo e muhkith. T wabshaba wo si s-ko'okam e namkith hegai mat wo ni-gagda. Ba'ich at wo i chum s-ap'ek heg wehhejed mat hems wabsh pi wo chum mahsi.”
41014022	Sh am wabsh kia e gegosith. Tsh g Jesus am bei g chemait k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am hahawa i hahain k an i ha mah k hab kaij, “Oi g wo huhgi ihtha. Tho ni-honshpadag.”
41014023	Tsh am hahawa bei g tahsa k ab ep ho'ige'el g Jiosh k ab ha mah. Kutsh wehsijj ab ih.
41014024	Kush hab ha ahg, “Tho ni-eh'ed ihtha nawait. Ith ani hab ahgch hab kaij mant wo ni-muhkith am em-wehhejed. T g ni-eh'ed wo e iawua. T g Jiosh heg hekaj am hab wo juh hegai mo wa hab kaij matsh hab wo em-juni.
41014025	Ia o i s-ap'e. Kunt pi hekith em-wehm hab ep wo juh ihtha k wabshaba em-wehm wo si s-hehgigk Jiosh kihthag ed.”
41014026	Neh, kutsh am hahawa kuhgit am hema ahgk g mihshmetha ne'i k am i wuwhag k gm hu hihi Olive U'us Kawulk wui.
41014027	Kush hab ha ahg g Jesus, “An o o'ohanas mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Nt wo hiwigi mamt wo mua g kahwal ha nuhkuththam. T g kahwal wabsh a'ai wo wohp. Neh, ith o d ha'ichu wepogitha ahga ch hab d ahga mamt wehsijj wabsh wo ni-thagito k gm hu a'ai wo wohp mant hekith wo ni-muhkith.
41014028	Kunt wabshaba ep wo ni-chegito k gm hu wo hih Galilee wui. Mt am ha'ab wo ni-nei.”
41014029	Kush g Peter hab kaij, “Ahni ant hi pi hekith wo sha'i m-thagito, chum as wehsijj wo m-thagito ihtham.”
41014030	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Nt wo si shel m-ahgi mat koi gokko wo kuhu g chuchul ith i chuhug ab, kupt eda heki hu waikko hab wo wa'i chei map pi sha'i ni-mahch.”
41014031	Kutsh am wa si e gewkai g Peter, ash hab si kaij, “Pi ant hekith hab wo sha'i chei manis pi m-mahch, chum anis wo ni-muhkith m-wehm.” Kush wehsijj hab wa'ap kaij.
41014032	Kutsh gd hu thatha heg ab oithag mo hab e a'aga Gethsemane. Sh pi am hu ha wehmaj g Judas Iscariot. Kush hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Ia g hu wo i thadhak. Nt ahni am ba'ich wo i him k wo ni-ho'ige'ithahu.”
41014033	Bash kaij ch am ha u'uk g Peter ch James ch John. Tsh ihtham gm hu oi. Kush s-masma si pi ap e tahtk g Jesus ch si e kudut
41014034	ch hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ab at wabsh i si ni-shuhth g pi ap tahhathkam ch s-ni-mukima tahhathchuth. Ia g wabsh wo thadk ch wo ha'ichu si nenashanath.” Kutsh am thadhaiwua.
41014035	Tsh g Jesus gm hu hahawa him k am i gei jewedo k hab kaij ab Jiosh wui, “Ni-ohg, wehs ha'ichu o pi sha'i hasig am m-wehhejed. Pt wo e nako mapt im hu hab wo i juh hegai si s-ko'ok sho'igthag mo ab ni-wui him. Kuni eda tatchua mat ahpi g m-tatchui hab wo e juh.”
41014037	Tsh am hahawa uhpam ep jiwia ha wui hegam waik. Kush am kohksh. Sh hab kaij ab wui g Peter, “Simon, pi aptki sha'i e nako maps am hu i hemako ohla ab wo s-nenashank,”
41014038	ch ab wehs ha wui hab kaij, “Si g wo ha'ichu nenashanath ch ab wo tai g Jiosh g gewkthag mamt pi am hu wo shul pi ap'ekam ch ed. Chum am hi wa g s-ap'ekam hab elith ch eda pi e nakog.”
41014039	Bash kaij ch amjed gm hu hahawa ep him k heg hab kaij ab Jiosh wui matsh wehpeg
41014040	ch am hahawa uhpam ep jiwia ha wui. Kush ep si kohksh ch pi sha'i nenashani ch pi sha'i mahch mas has wo chei ab wui.
41014041	Ash d i waikkokam, tsh am ep jiwia ha wui. Kush ep si kohksh. Kush hab kaij, “Kumtki ep kohk k e uh'ulinihogith. T eda e ai mamt ni-gagda k am wo i ni-thagito ha wui g pi ap'ekam hemajkam ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.
41014042	Oi g wo wahpamigi. Tt wo hihi. Neh, ia at hu jiwia hegai mat ni-gagda.”
41014043	Sh am wabsh kia neok. Tsh am jiwia g Judas. Kush sha'i si mu'ijj am wehmaj ha'ijj g i'is-papayo uh'ukch ch ha'ijj g u'us. Ihtham atsh g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham ch ge'eged am ha cheha matsh am wo hihim k wo bei.
41014044	Kush eda g Judas heki hu ha ahgith ihtham mo am wehmaj matsh ab wo chintath g Jesus kahmaj ab. Tsh hab masma wo s-mahchk mat hedai an wo bei.
41014045	Tsh am wabsh i chum jiwia g Judas k wabsh shel i hih ab Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Ni-mashchamtham.” Neh, bash kaij ch ab chintath.
41014046	Tsh ab ha'i hihim k an bei g Jesus k gn hu si s-wihnam u'ukch.
41014047	Kutsh hema hegam chuhchaij am i wuhshath g e-ispahyo k ab si gehg g neholigaj g uhgchu pahl k an si hikuch g nahkaj.
41014048	Sh g Jesus hab ha ahg ihtham hemajkam, “Wehs tashkaj ani am thahiwup ch ha mashcham ge'e cheopi t am. Kumt pi an hu ni-be k wabshaba hahawa ia thatha an uh'ukch g i'is-papayo ch u'us mamt wo ni-bei. Pegih, bat wa masma an heki hu o'oha g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mant hab masma wo ni-behij mat g pi ap hemajkam.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
41014050	Kutsh am hahawa wehsijj wabsh i thagito hegam chuhchaij k gm hu si a'ai wohp.
41014051	Sh an hema oithahim g Jesus ch d wabsh wechij o'othham ch heg wa'i sawanokaj e hobinodch. Kutsh an chum bei g shonthal.
41014052	Tsh am wabsh i thagito g e-sawano k gm hu si meh ab wabsh i s-thahpkch.
41014053	Kumtsh am i bei g Jesus heg kih wui uhgchu pahl. Kush eda am e hemapthahim g u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged ch chehanig t-mashchamtham.
41014054	Sh g Peter ga hu wabsh mehkjed ha oith ch am i wah kolhai ch ed. Sh am ge nahthch g shonthal. Kush am ha wehm e huhkalith g Peter.
41014055	Kush eda ihtham e jehnigiththam am i chum ha'ichu gahg mat ab wo abch g Jesus mat heg hekaj wo mua.
41014056	Mu'ijj ash ab ha'ichu chum abchuth mash pi sha'i woho ch oi wa pi sha'i e wepo ha'ichu ahg.
41014057	Kutsh am hahawa ha'i gegokiwua k hab kaij,
41014058	“Kah ach mo hab kaij. ‘Nt wo padch ihtha ge'e cheopi mat g o'othham hab juh k hema ep wo nahto waik tash ab mat pi d wo o'othham nahtoik.’ ”
41014059	Kush ihtham hab wa'ap pi sha'i e wepot g ha'ichu ha-ahga.
41014060	Kutsh g si uhgchu pahl am i kekiwua ha shahgith k ab kakke g Jesus, “Napt pi am hu has wo sha'i chei ith amjed mo haschu ab m-abchuth ihtham?”
41014061	Kush oi wa pi am hu has sha'i ha kaij g Jesus. Kutsh ab ep si kakke, “Nap hab e elith map ahpi d Jiosh alithag matp am t-thahm wo e kei?”
41014062	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Thani ahni. T g Jiosh am wo e chehgi mo ab si has ni-elith an s-apkojed e-hugith an ni-thahshk e-kownal thaikud ed. T ab wo i e ai mant ab wo i hud chewagi ch ed k am ep wo jiwia jewed thahm. Kumt wehsijj wo s-mai mani d Jiosh si Kehsha.”
41014063	Kutsh g uhgchu pahl ab si wantsh g e-eniga hab elithch mo pi ap neok k hab kaij, “Pi ach hedai ep sha'i tatchua mas am wo ah g chu'ichigaj.
41014064	Am am wa kah g pi kehg ne'okij. Shahm i elith?” Kush wehsijj hab kaij matsh ab moht g chu'ichig am hugkam mat hemho wa wo e muhkith.
41014065	Kutsh ha'ijj ab si siswuimath g Jesus. Mtsh ab hahawa si ma'ishk wuh g wuhpuij k ab si shonikkash ch hab ahg, “Am g hig t-ahgith mas hedai ab m-shonikka.” Tsh g shonthal am hahawa be k ab si s-kapnim shonikkash.
41014066	Sh eda g Peter am thaha kih bahsho. Kutsh am hema jiwia g uwi piongaj g uhgchu pahl.
41014067	Sh am thaha g Peter ch e huhkalith. Tsh ith ab si i neith k hab kaij, “Ahpi ap ep wehmaj hegai Jesus.”
41014068	Kutsh pi mahch k e ah g Peter hab kaijch, “Pi ani sha'i mahch ch pi amichuth maps haschu hab ahg,” neh, k gm hu ha hekaj hih mash am ha'i gegok kolhai kihjeg t ab. Kush eda kuhu g keli chuchul.
41014069	Tsh am ep cheh g Peter hegai ha-pionag k hab kaij am ha wui hegam mash an gegok, “Ith o d ep hema hegam Jesus.”
41014070	Kutsh ep pi e edagi g Peter. Kutsh sha'i ha'as, sh hegam mash an gegok hab ep kaij ab wui, “Pi g sha'i pi e edgith. Thapki woho hema hegam Jesus napki pi ahpi hab wa'ap d Galilee t am o'othham.”
41014071	Kutsh g Peter am ha hekaj si ha ahgi, “Pi ani sha'i mahch ihtha o'othham mam an a'aga. T g Jiosh wo si ni-jehka'ich mantp em-iattogith.”
41014072	Kutsh am ha hekaj gokko kuhu g keli chuchul. Tsh g Peter am wabsh si i chegito mash wa hab kaij g Jesus, “Koi at gokko wo kuhu g chuchul kupt eda heki hu waikko hab wo chei map pi sha'i ni-mahch.” Tsh wabsh woho'i pi ap e taht k s-jupij shoak.
41015001	Tsh am wabsh i chum mahsi. Tsh am ep e nam hegam u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged ch chehanig t-mashchamtham mo d e jehnigiththam k atsh am i mamche mat has hahawa ep wo e juh. Tsh am i kuhgit g ha-namki. Kutsh am si maniadath g Jesus nohnhoi k gm hu be k am u'apa heg wui mo d kownal ch hab chehgig Pilate ab abchuthch mo chum e kownalchuth.
41015002	Kush ihtha Pilate ab kakke g Jesus, “No wa woho mapsh hab chum e elith map d ha-kownalig ihtham Tutuligo hemajkam?” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Thani ahni.”
41015003	Sh g u'ugchu papal mu'i ha'ichu ab abchuth. Sh pi am hu has sha'i kaij g Jesus.
41015004	Sh g Pilate ab ep kakke, “Neh. mu'i ha'ichu o ab m-abchuth. Napt pi am hu has wo sha'i chei ab amjed?”
41015005	Kush ep pi am hu has sha'i ha kaij g Jesus. Tsh g Pilate si has i e taht heg hekaj.
41015006	K am hab e wua ahith ab ith eda gegosig mo g kownal am hema i thathagitod g lihso am ha wehhejed g hemajkam.
41015007	Kush eda am ha'i kuhpi g lilso matsh ha'i ha koktha am i chum wushshathch g kownal. Sh hema hab chehgig ihtham Barabbas.
41015008	Kutsh g hemajkam ab i kakke g Pilate matsh am hab hig wo ha juni hegai mash chum hekith am hab ha wuijith.
41015009	Sh g Pilate ab ha kakke, “Pegih, nam hab elith mant ith am wo i thagito am em-wehhejed mash d em-kownalig?” nash pi chum s-thagitoimk g Jesus
41015010	ch hab ha elith mo d wa'i ihtham u'ugchu papal ch s-hehgamk ch s-mu'amk.
41015011	Kutsh wabshaba g u'ugchu papal am i ha cheha g hemajkam matsh hab wo chei matsh g Barabbas wo e thagito. Kutsh wa woho am hab e juh.
41015012	Kush hab ep kaij g Pilate, “Pegih, kunt has wo juh ihtha o'othham mam hab a'aga mo d em-kownalig?”
41015013	Kush si s-kaitham hab kaij g hemajkam, “Mu'ani ab kots t ab!”
41015014	Kutsh hab chum chei g Pilate, “Haschu ahg? Shahchu at hig pi ap has juh?” Kush oi wa wabsh ba'ich i si s-kaitham hab wabsh ge kaij mu'ikko, “Mu'ani! Mu'ani ab kots t ab.”
41015015	Kush g Pilate tatchua mat wo s-hohho'i g hemajkam ch atsh heg hekaj am i thagito g Barabbas am ha wui k am ha cheha g shonthal mat am wo gewitta g Jesus. Kumtsh wa woho hab juh. Tsh am hahawa ha wui thagito matsh gm hu wo be k ab wo naggia kots t ab.
41015016	Kutsh gm hu hahawa i bei g shonthal g Jesus kownal ge'e kih am k am wehs ha wai g e-wehm shonthal.
41015017	Kutsh am i e hemapath k nahnko wua. Msh wa ab abchuth mash chum e kownalchuth. Pegih, tsh ab wahki g kownal eniga k ge ho'i gihkot k ab wahki mo'oj ab.
41015018	Kush hab wabsh s-ahgamk ch hab kaij, “Tash g d ha-kownaligk g Tutuligo hemajkam.”
41015019	Tsh ha'i an si gewitta mo'oj an g uhskaj k ab siswuimath k ab wui i shul pehegia ab has elithch.
41015020	Kumtsh am i ha'asa nahnkogith k am si wuahawua hegai kownal eniga k ab uhpam wahki g enigaj k gm hu hahawa i bei mat ab wo naggia kots t ab.
41015021	D ab hema i ha nam g o'othham ch ab him Jerusalem wui ch ash hab chehgig Simon. Ith ad an bei g shonthal k ab kushwiotach hegai kots mamt ab ab wo naggia g Jesus. Ihtha Simon ash ab d kihkam Cyrene kihhim t ab ch d ha-ohg ihtham Alexander ch Rufus.
41015022	Kumd gm hu i bei g Jesus mam am ha nahngia. K hab e a'aga amai Golgotha mo ith hab d ahga Koshwak.
41015023	Kumd am chum i'ich g nawait ch kulani mat wo hehogih g s-ko'ok. Kud pi sha'i ih g Jesus.
41015024	Kumd ab hahawa sisish kots t ab k am kei g kots. D am ha'i e chichwi g shonthal k wo nei mas hedai haschu wo bei g ha'ichu enigaj.
41015025	K eda ga hu i juhk madki heki hu e ai g humukt ohla mamd ab naggia kots t ab.
41015026	D an o'ohanas g ha-abchutha ab thahm mo ab i mo'okch g Jesus ch hab chu'ig, “Ith o d ha-Kownalig g Tutuligo Hemajkam.”
41015027	Kumd gohk ab ep ha nahngia kokots t ab gn hu a'ai. Sh eda d s-chu e'eskam ihtham. [
41015028	Kum hab masma am chehgithch mam hab elith mo g Jesus hab wa'ap d pi ap hemajkam. Neh, heki o hu an o'ohanas Jiosh o'ohana ed mat ith am hab wo e juh.]
41015029	D hegam mo am bihbimhim nahnko ahg ch hab ahg, “Naptsh woho wo i wua g ge'e cheopi k am uhpam ep wo i kei waik tash ab?
41015030	Pegih, ab g hig i huduni kots t amjed k wo e tho'ibia maptp wo e nako.”
41015031	D g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham am hab wa'ap nahnko ahg hab kaijch ab a'ai e wui, “Ith atsh ha'i ha tho'ibia k atki wabshaba pi wo e nako mas wo hejel e tho'ibia.
41015032	Nash hig pi woho d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d t-kownalig? Pegih, tt ab wo s-wohoch matp ab wo i huduni k wo e tho'ibia.” D hegam ehp mad ab wehmaj nahngia hab wa'ap nahnko ahg.
41015033	D am i thahm juh. D wehsko gei g s-chuhugam waik ohla ab.
41015034	D am i e ai g waik ohla. D si s-kaitham hab kaij g Jesus, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani.” Ith o hab d ahga, “Ni-Jioshga, ni-Jioshga, pt haschu ahgk wabsh ni-thagito?”
41015035	D ha'ijj hab kaij hegam mad am gegok, “Neh'e, Elijabad o ab chum waith.”
41015036	Kud am hema med k an ha'ichu usko mad am wakch nawait ch ed k am uhgk i be k ab chum i'ich g Jesus k hab chei, “Kia koi, tt hig wo nei mas ia wo jiwia g Elijabad k ab wo i huduni.”
41015037	Kud am si s-kaitham ha'ichu hab ep chei g Jesus k am hahawa i muh.
41015038	Kutsh hegai s-kowk ikus kuhpadag mash am s-tadnim naggia gd hu si eda g ge'e cheopi ab si shel e wantsh.
41015039	D hegai moki d shonthal ha-ge'ejig gahab kehk kots wui ch am kah g Jesus ch am neith mat has masma muh ch hab kaij, “Ihtha oki si s-wohom d alithaj g Jiosh.”
41015040	D ga hu sha mehkjed g u'uwi ab ha'i neith mat haschu has e juh. Ha'i ihtham o d Salome ch Mary Magdalene ch hegai Mary mo d ha-je'e ihtham James ch Joses.
41015041	Ihtham waik ash am wehmaj oiopohim g Jesus ch ha'ichukaj i wehmt mo eda gm hu oimmelhim Galilee chekshani ch ed. Kud mu'i ihtham u'uwi am wehmaj ab i hihi g Jesus Jerusalem wui.
41015042	D am ha'ichug hegai e jehnigiththam mo ab Arimathea t amjed ch hab chehgig Joseph. Ith o si s-ap d o'othham ch ab s-neithamk g Jiosh kownaltalig. D eda e aihim mat wo i hud. Kuchd eda am chum t-nakog matt ba'ich i tash wo chum t-mihshmath. D heg hekaj am hih ihtha Joseph k atsh ab tai g kownal g Jesus honshpadag.
41015044	Kush g Pilate hab kaij, “A nat wa s-wohom heki hu i muh?” atsh am hahawa wai g shonthal ha-ge'ejig.
41015045	Sh ith hab kaij mat heki hu muh. Kush hab hahawa ahg g Joseph mo am wa s-ape mat am wo bei.
41015046	Kutsh g Joseph am him k am ha nolawt g si s-kehg ikus k am ep jiwia. Kumd am wehhejed ab i huduni g Jesus honshpadag. K am mia hab chu'ig g hiha'ini ch ab heki hu cheotas hothai ch ed. Kumd am i be k gd hu heg eda cheh am i hobinodk heg hekaj s-kehg ikus. Kumd ab hahawa kuh g ge'e hothaikaj.
41015047	D g Mary Magdalene ch hegai Mary mo d ha-je'e g James ch Joses am wa neith mad hebai e cheh.
41016001	Kud am bij g shahwai machd eda t-mihshmath. Kutsh am hahawa hihi g Salome ch Mary Magdalene ch hegai hema Mary k am ha nolawt g si s-ap uhwchu matsh hekaj wo huhu g muhki.
41016002	Wabsh i si'alim mo e aihim g thomig, tsh gm hu hihi ihtham hiha'ini wui k am neneokhim ch hab kaij, “Kus hedai t-wehhejed gm hu wo i nu'ichkwua hegai hothai mat ab hekaj e kuh g cheo?” Tsh ab i chesh g tash matsh eda gd hu thatha.
41016004	Tsh chum nei matsh heki hu in hu hab i e nu'ichkwua.
41016005	Tsh am i wahp. Kush inhab hema thak ch hab sha mahs mo g wechij o'othham. Sh g enigaj wabsh si s-toa. Kutsh si e totoths g u'uwi.
41016006	Sh wabshaba hab ha ahg, “Pi g am wo sha'i e totothsith. M ani wa s-mahch mam g Jesus chuhkug chum gahghim. Am g wo neith mo pi ia hu ha'ichug iia mat ia e woi. Uhpam at ep i wuhsh muhkig t amjed.
41016007	Kumt gm hu wo hihim k wo ha ahgi g chuhchaij, chum wa g Peter, mat uhpam e chegito k gm hu wo hih Galilee wui. Mt gm hu wo hihim k am ha'ab wo nei.” Neh, bash kaij g anghil.
41016008	Kutsh i wuwhag k gm hu uhpam wohp pi hedai sha'i ha ahgithch wohg oithch nash pi si e totothsith.
41016009	Kutsh am hihi g u'uwi k am ha ahgi ihtham Peter mat haschu kah.
41016010	Tsh heg i thahm g Jesus am hahawa ha cheha g e-chuhchai mat gm hu wehsko wo i ahgahi g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj mat g hemajkam ab wo s-wohochuth k wo e tho'ibia.]
41016011	Sh wabshaba pi sha'i wohochuth.
41016012	Sh am i thahm ha'i gm hu hasko hihimath ch d gohk. Tsh g Jesus gawul masma am i e chehgi ha wui.
41016013	Kutsh ihtham am uhpam ep hihim k gd hu wehs ha ahgi g chuhchaij. Kush pi sha'i ha wohochuth.
41016014	Tsh am hahawa i e chehgi g Jesus hegam ha wui gamai hemako e-chuhchai. Sh ihtham am e wehm e gegosith. Tsh am s-ha keh'el nash ge ha wohochuth hegam mash neith mo d thoakam
41016015	ch hab hahawa ha ahg, “Am g wo a'ai hihim k am wo i ha ahgithahi wehs hemajkam ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab ni-amjed.
41016016	Kut heg wo e tho'ibia matp hedai wo i s-wohochuth k wo e pahl wako. T wabshaba ab wo moht g pi ap e-chu'ichig k ab wo ai g pi ha huhugetham sho'igthag matp hedai pi ab hu wo wohoch.
41016017	T wo tashok mo hedai ab ni-hiwig nant pi ab wo ha mah g gewkthag. Kut am wo i ha wuwhasithath g jijawul ni-wehhejed ch ep wo neneokath g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj mat pi hebai mai.
41016018	Kut pi has wo e juh matp wo ha taht g kohk'oi o atp wo ih'eth g hialwui. Kut an wo ha taht g kok'otham. T wo thotha.”
41016019	Kutsh am i ha'as ha wehm neo g Jesus k am i thahm hahawa uhgk i e bei thahm kahchim wui k ga hu s-apkojed thahiwua e-ohg Jiosh hugith ab.
41016020	T ihtham gm hu a'ai ha ahgithahi g hemajkam g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Kut g Jiosh si s-hasig ha'ichu hab ha juni mat hekaj wo s-mahchk g hemajkam mo d wohokam g ha'ichu ha-ahga. [
42001001	Ni-nawoj map ab si tatchua g Jiosh: Ab apsh kaiham ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jiosh alithag mach ab s-wohochuth. Kunt am wo ha'ichu m-o'ohani ab amjed mapt hekaj wo s-ap s-mahchk. Hegam mash am neith o am t-ahgith ab amjed. Kut mu'i am s-ap o'oha hegai mo haschu am t-ahgith. Nt ahni am si i hoa wehs ihtha k hekaj am wo m-o'ohanith k am ba'ich ha'ichu wo m-ahgi ab amjed.
42001005	Amjed atsh ab i shohshonwua ihtha mash eda g Herodbad am d kownal Judea chekshani ch ed am ha thahm g Tutuligo hemajkam. Sh am hema d ha-pahlig ch hab chehgig Zacaria. Sh g wehmaj kihkam hab chehgig Elisabeth. Ihtham ash ab d amjedkamaj hegai mash d ha-shohshonbad g papal ch hab chehgig Aaron. Kush g Zacaria ab hema d amjedkam mash hab chehgig Abia.
42001006	Kush ihtham Zacaria ch Elisabeth am si oith g s-ap'ekam ch s-ap am hab junihim wehs hegai mo g Jiosh ab ha chehani g Tutuligo.
42001007	Kutsh wabsh okst ihtha Elisabeth k pi ha mahmadt. Tsh g Zacaria hab wa'ap kelit.
42001008	Kutsh hema tash am i e ai matsh g Abiabad amjedkam am hab wo juh g e-chikpan ge'e cheopi ch ed.
42001009	Kumtsh am i kei g Zacaria matsh am wo ha mehmhei g s-ap uhw kuhbhonthakud. Tsh am i wah cheopi ch ed.
42001010	Kush am jeg ed gegok g hemajkam ch e ho'ige'ithahun.
42001011	Tsh am cheopi ch ed hema i e chehgi g anghil Zacaria tahgio k ash ab kehk s-apkojed abai mash ab kuhbhoni g s-ap uhw kuhbhonthakud.
42001012	Tsh am i nei g Zacaria k si e tothsith k si s-ehbeni ihtha.
42001013	Kush wabshaba hab kaij g anghil, “Pi g am sha'i e tothsith, Zacaria. Jiosh at kah g m-ho'ige'ithahuna. T g m-wehm kihkam wo wa hema madt. T d wo cheojk. Kupt hab wo chehch John.
42001014	Jiosh at ab a wo si has elithath. Kut pi koi wo mahsi. T g Jiosh ab wo mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kupt heg hekaj wo si s-hehgigk. T g mu'i hemajkam hab wa'ap wo si s-hehgigk mat hekith wo mahsi. Kut ihtha em-aliga pi hekith wo ih'eth hegai mo s-nawmthag.
42001016	ch mu'i ab wo i ha nohnogi g Tutuligo hemajkam ab Jiosh wui.
42001017	T koi in hu wo i wuhsh g Jiosh si Kehsha jewed thahm. T g em-aliga ia wehpeg wo ahgachugath mat in wo i wuhsh. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wo mah g gewkthag heg wehhejed hab masma mo wa ab mahkch g Elijabad. Kut hab wo ha juh g hemajkam mat ab wo si pihk e elithath ha hekaj g e-a'aliga k hegam hab wo ha juh mo d pi ap'ekam mat ab wo kaihamath g ha-amichuthadag hegam mo d s-ap'ekam. Neh, bat masma am wo i ha ap'ech g hemajkam heg wehhejed jiwhiathaj g Jiosh si Kehsha.” Neh, bash kaij hegai anghil.
42001018	Kush g Zacaria hab kaij, “Nt has hig masma wo si s-ap s-mahchk machs wo hema bei g ali natt pi kekelt?”
42001019	Sh hab kaij g anghil ab wui, “Thani Jiosh chikpantham, Gabriel. Kut ab ni-cheha mant ia wo m-ahgi ihtha si s-hehgig ha'ichu ahgaj.
42001020	Kupt eda pi ab hu ni-wohoch. T heg hekaj hab wo m-juh mapt pi wo sha'i e nako maps wo ha neokath ia'i amjed am hugkam mat hab wo e juh ihtha mani m-ahgith.” Neh, bash kaij hegai anghil.
42001021	Sh eda heg oitham am chum nenida g hemajkam g Zacaria ch si has i elith k hab kaij, “A t has e juh k pi oi ab hu i wuhsh?”
42001022	Tsh am hu hebai ab hahawa i wuhshani k chum neo am ha wui k wabsh pi sha'i e nako. Sh am ha hekaj wabsh i amich g hemajkam matki ab ha'ichu e chehgi wui no pi ab wabsh i ha magwuith g e-nowikaj ch pi ab hu has sha'i kaij.
42001023	Tsh am wabsh i chum huhug g tash mat he'es tash am hab wo juh g e-chikpan. Tsh gm uhpam hih e-kih wui.
42001024	Kush amai i mia amjed matsh wo'iwua g ali. Kush am wabsh s-ap e tahtk ch am e ehstokch g Elisabeth e-kih ed hetasp mashath hab kaijhim. “Chum ani hekith si ni-elith mani pi ha mahmadt. Kutki wabshaba ith hab ni-juni g Jiosh k hekaj gm hu hab i juh g si ni-edathag am hemajkam ha-nena ed.”
42001026	Neh, tsh am him k am d i chuhthp mashath am i thahm matsh am wo'iwua g Elisabeth mad. Tsh g Jiosh am chea hegai anghil mash d Gabriel matsh am wo u'apa g ha'ichu ahgaj hema wui g chehia. Sh hab chehgig ihtha chehia Mary ch am kih heg eda kihhim mash d Nazareth ch am eda g Galilee chekshani. Sh am hema ep d kihkam ch hab chehgig Joseph ch atsh wo hohnt hegai Mary. Ihtham ash ab hema d amjedkam mash kownalibad ch hab chehgig David.
42001028	Kutsh koi e ai matsh wo e hohont. Tsh am jiwia hegai anghil Mary wui k hab kaij. “Si g s-hehgigk Mary. Jiosh at ab i s-m-ho'ige'ith k am wo i m-wehmt.”
42001029	Tsh am wabsh i pi amich mas haschu hab ahg k si e kudu heg hekaj.
42001030	Sh hab ep kaij g anghil, “Pi g am sha'i e tothsith, Mary. Ab at i m-mah g Jiosh g ho'ige'ithadag.
42001031	Kut am wabsh wo e nahto g ali m-eda k wo mahsi k d wo cheojk. Kupt hab wo chehch Jesus.
42001032	Kut d wo si s-has ha'ichuk no pi d alithaj g Jiosh. T g Jiosh am wo i kei mat d wo kownalk am kehkud ed g e-shohshonbad David.
42001033	Kut chum hekith d wo ha-kownaligk g Jiosh hemajkamga. Pi at hekith wo huhug g kownaltaligaj.” Neh, bash kaij g anghil.
42001034	Sh hab kaij g Mary ab wui, “Nt has hig masma wo ge madt mani d wabsh kia chehia ch pi koi ha kun?”
42001035	Sh g anghil ab wui hab kaij, “Jiosh at ab wo cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. T heg hab wo juh g Jiosh gewkthagkaj. Mt heg hekaj wo s-mahchk mat d wo si hekia s-ap'ekam alik ch d wo Jiosh alithagk.
42001036	“Neh, s-mahch ap mat heki hu okst g m-hajuni Elisabeth k pi ha mahmadt. Kut eda g Jiosh ab s-ho'ige'el. Kut g cheoj ali wo bei. K d chuhthp mashath hemu mat am wo'iwua g ali.
42001037	Kupt ith amjed wo s-mahchk mat wo e nako g Jiosh mat am hab wo juh hegai mo haschu hab e ahgahim.” Neh, bash kaij g anghil.
42001038	Kush hab hahawa kaij g Mary, “Neh, thani piongaj g Jiosh. K am wa s-ap'e mat am hab wo juh g e-tatchui ab ni-ab” Tsh gm hahawa hih g anghil ab amjed.
42001039	Tsh ab ha hekaj i e nako g Mary mat am wo chehgim g Elisabeth. Sh hegam Elisabeth ch Zacaria am kih mash am hema kihhim ka'akwulk ch ed am Judea chekshani ch ed. Tsh am jiwia Mary ha-kih am k ab ha-ihm.
42001041	Tsh am i kah g Elisabeth k ab taht matsh g mathaj am si al i banimme eda. Tsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewthag ab si i mah g gewthag.
42001042	Kush hekaj si s-hehgigam hab kaij ab wui g Mary. “Neh, ab atki si i s-m-ho'ige'el g Jiosh ba'iwechkim mo chum hedai uwi. Kutki wo mahsi m-amjed hegai mash ab mahks g si ge'e s-ap'ekam.
42001043	Kuptki d wo je'ejk hegai mat d wo ge t-kownalig. Kuni si s-ap ni-tahtk mapt ia'i ni-chehgim.
42001044	Neh. am at si i banimme g ni-mad mant am i m-kah mapt ab ni-ihm. K heg hekaj am ni-chehgith g Jiosh mo ab si s-m-ho'ige'ith.
42001045	Woho at hab wo e juh hegai mo ab m-chehgith g Jiosh. K d si ge'e ho'ige'ithalig mapt ab i s-wohoch.” Neh, bash kaij g Elisabeth.
42001046	Kush g Mary hab kaij: “Ab ani si hehgchulith g Jiosh
42001047	ch si s-ap ni-tahtk mo d ni-tho'ibiakam.
42001048	Thani wabsh sho'igkam. Kut eda ab si has i ni-elith k si ge'e ha'ichu ab hab ni-juni g si ge'e e-gewkthagkaj. T Hab i'ajed chum hekith hab wo chei g hemajkam imhab a'ahithag oitham mat ab si i s-ni-ho'ige'el g Jiosh. Tho si hekia s-ap'ekam g Jiosh
42001050	ch eda ia'i a'ahithag himtham oithch si pihk e elith ab wehs ha wui hegam mo ab si has i elith.
42001051	T am wo chehgi g si ge'e e-gewkthag k wo has gewito hegam mo si e hahaschuth
42001052	k wo ha wohppo'i g kokownal g ha-gewthag k g s-kakais s-ha-kaisthag gm hu hab wo i juh k wabshaba g sho'igkam ab has wo i ha elith k heg ab wo i ha mah mo haschu i s-kehgaj ha wehhejed.
42001054	Neh, bash wa am ha ahgith g t-shohshonbad gd hu i Abraham amjed matsh ith am hab wo e juh. Ab o i t-wehmt g Jiosh ahchim mach ab d ha-amjedkam k ab wehs t-wui si pihk e elith i'ajed chum hekith.”
42001056	Neh, bash hahawa g Mary ch amjed am ha wehm thakahim waik mashath ab ch gm hahawa hih uhpam.
42001057	Tsh am hahawa i e ai. Tsh madt g Elisabeth. Kush d cheoj ali.
42001058	Sh g hajunij ch hugithaj an kihkam si s-hehgig wehmaj am i kaiok matsh g Jiosh ab si i s-ho'ige'el.
42001059	Kush am d i gigi'ik tash g ali. Kumtsh wo pahl hikuch mo d ha-himthag. Tsh am e chehm g hemajkam k hab wo chum chehch Zacaria am oithk g ohgaj.
42001060	Kush wabshaba hab kaij g je'ej, “Pi atsh g e-ohg oithk wo chehgigk ch wabshaba hab wo chehgigk John.”
42001061	Sh hab kaij hegam, “Pi o hedai hab sha'i chehgig g m-hajuni,”
42001062	ch amjed ab wabsh i chum kakke g ohgaj mat am wo ha ahgi mas has wo chehch.
42001063	Sh heg hema ha tahni g o'ohanakud. Mtsh hema mah. Kutsh ith an o'oha, “Bo chehgig John”. Tsh wehsijj si e totoths.
42001064	Kutsh am wa'i hekaj s-ap neok k ab si ihm g Jiosh ch ab si ho'ige'ith.
42001065	Tsh wehsijj ab si has el g Jiosh hegam mo an ha wehgaj kih. Tsh gn hu a'ai s-e mai am Judea chekshani ch ed mat has i e juh.
42001066	Ab ash si s-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ihtha ali. Kush wehsijj hegam mash am kah am si i oithahim ch hab kaij, “Kus has mahs wo ha'ichuk ihtha ali?”
42001067	Kutsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag g si ge'e gewkthag ab i mah g Zacaria. Tsh heg am si s-hewelim neok k gm hu ba'ich ah mat haschu has wo e juh hab kaijch:
42001068	“Ab ant wo si i hehgchul g s-ap'ekam t-kownalig Jiosh. E o nahtokch mat wo t-tho'ibia ahchim mach d hemajkamgaj
42001069	ch atsh hekaj am hema wo i maskogi mat d wo t-tho'ibiakamk. Heg at ab d wo kownal Davidbad amjedkamk ch wo u'ukch g si ge'e gewkthag.
42001070	Kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam o heki hu am ahgachug matsh g Jiosh wo t-tho'ibia ab ha amjed g t-obga ch hegam mo s-t-keh'ith.
42001072	Ab at wo i s-t-ho'ige'el g Jiosh mash wa hab masma ha ahgith g t-shohshon.
42001073	Bash si kaij ab Abrahambad wui mat wo t-tho'ibia ab ha amjed g t-obga. Tt hab pi hedai wo ehbithath ch ab si s-ap wo ihmath g Jiosh.
42001075	ch wo s-ap'ek am nenaj ed ch am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam chum hekith.
42001076	Ihtha ni-sulijga at d wo Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththamk ch wo ha ahgi g Jiosh hemajkamga mat g Jiosh ab wo s-ha ho'ige'ith k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig k wo ha tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag. Kut heg hekaj wo e nahtokchith mat g tho'ibiakam am wo i e maskogi. Ith at am wo i wuhsh Jiosh t amjed k ab wo t-mah g amichuthadag.
42001079	hab masma mo g tash ab i chechshshaj ch ab t-mamka g tonlig. Ab ach wa hihim t-namkithadag wui mat g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i t-juh heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig. Kut wabshaba g t-tho'ibiakam ab wo i t-chehgi matt has masma am wo i t-ap'ech Jiosh wui.” Neh bash kaij g Zacaria.
42001080	Kutsh si s-gegokim i ge'etha g ali am e tashogith mo am Jiosh tatchui oithch him. Kush am hebai d i himtham, tsh gm hu i e gawulkai tohono jewed ch ed k am ha'ichugkahim ch ab ai mat am i e maskogi Tutuligo ha wui.
42002001	Sh am hema d si ge'e lai wehs ha thahm g jejewed ch hab chehgig Augustus. Sha am hu hebai, tsh ith am hab juh g chehanig matsh wehs wo e o'ohan k wo e kuint g hemajkam hehe'ejel e-kihhim ab.
42002002	Ith ash d si wehpeg kuintadag. Kush am hema d kownal Syria jewed ch ed hab chehgig Quirinius.
42002003	Tsh am himto g hemajkam ab hehe'ejel e-kihhim wui matsh wo e o'ohan k wo e kuint.
42002004	Tsh hegai Joseph mash wa am kih Nazareth t am ch atsh wo hohnt g Mary gm hu hih Bethlehem wui am Judea chekshani ch ed nash pi ab d kownalibad David amjedkam. Sh g Davidbad am d kihkam Bethlehem t am.
42002005	Tsh g Mary am oi g Joseph. Sh eda e aihim matsh wo bei g e-mad.
42002006	Tsh am thatha Bethlehem t am. Sh eda pi am hu ha jeg am koksikud kih ch ed. Tsh heg hekaj am thadhaiwua ha'ichu thoakam kih ch ed. Kutsh si e ai. Tsh madt g Mary. Kush heg d wehpegkam ch d cheoj. Kutsh am si i hobino s-moik ikus ch ed k am heg eda woi mo g ha'ichu thoakam am e gegosith.
42002008	Sh am ha'i thadha g kahwal ha nuhkuththam gm hu jeg ed ch an ha nuhkuth g e-shoshoiga.
42002009	Tsh ab haha wabsh ha wui e chehgi g anghil ab thahm kahchim t amjed. Kutsh an si i ton ha wehgaj matsh am e chehgi g Jiosh gewkthag. Kutsh wabsh woho'i e totoths.
42002010	Sh hab hahawa kaij g anghil, “Pi g am wo sha'i e totothsith. Ia ant jiwia mant ha'ichu wo em-ahgi. K ith wehs hemajkam d ha wuikam. T wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ab amjed.
42002011	Ithani at am mahsi Davidbad kihhim ed hegai mo d Jiosh si Kehsha mat d wo em-tho'ibiakamk ch d wo ge'echu em-kownaligk.
42002012	Kumt ith ab wo s-mahchk mat am wo wo'ok heg eda mo am e gegosith g ha'ichu thoakam ch g s-moik ikuskaj wo e hobinodch.”
42002013	Tsh haha wabsh sha'i mu'i anghil ab ha wui i e chehgi wehmaj hegai hema k si ne'e ch ab hehgchulith g Jiosh ch hab kaij.
42002014	“Ab ach wehsijj hehgchulith g Jiosh an thahm kahchim ch ed. T hegam mo hohho'ithachuth g Jiosh an jewed thahm wo e tho'ibia k wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui.”
42002015	Neh, bash kaij g anghil ch gm hu hahawa i himto thahm kahchim wui. Sh hab kaij a kahwal ha nuhkuththam ab a'ai e wui, “Oi g wo hihim. Tt wo hihi am Bethlehem wui k am wo nei hegai matsh am hab e juh mo ab i t-ahgith g anghil am wehhejed g Jiosh.”
42002016	Tsh wa woho am si s-hohtam hihim k am i ha gahghim k ha cheh. Kush woho am wo'o g ali heg eda mo am e gegosith g ha'ichu thoakam.
42002017	Tsh hegam kahwal ha nuhkuththam am hahawa i ahgahi mash has kaij g anghil ab amjed.
42002018	Tsh wehsijj hegam mash ha kah ab si has i el mo haschu ha ahgith.
42002019	Kush am si oithahim g Mary ch am wabsh hejel i s-mahch.
42002020	Tsh g kahwal ha nuhkuththam gm hu uhpam hihi ab si hehgchulithch g Jiosh natsh pi wehs nei hegai mo haschu am ha ahgith g anghil.
42002021	Kush am d i gigi'ik tash g ali. Kumtsh an pahl hikuch mo d ha-himthag k hab chehch Jesus matsh wa g anghil ia u'apa g ahga mat eda koi wo'iwua.
42002022	Tsh am i e ai g tash matsh g Mary am wo e chehgi mo kegchuthas mat hab masma g Mosesbad an o'oha g Jiosh chehanig. Bo chu'ig matsh heg hekaj gohk wo ha koktha g hohhi o g pap-loloma k ab wo iagchul Jiosh wui. K hab ep chu'ig matp d wo cheojk g wehpeg mahsithkam ch ab wo i e thagito Jiosh wui. Tsh heg hekaj am bei g ali k am hihi ge'e cheopi wui ab Jerusalem t ab.
42002025	Sh am hema kih g keli ch hab chehgig Simeon ch ash d si s-ap'ekam ch ab si has elith g Jiosh ch ash ab si nenida mat wo ha tho'ibia g Tutuligo. Sh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab si wehmaj
42002026	ch ash am i tashogi matsh pi wo muh k ab wo ai mat wo nei g Jiosh si Kehsha.
42002027	Neh, tsh am i e ai g tash. Tsh am hahawa i tashogi mat am wo i wah ge'e cheopi ch ed. Kutsh g Joseph ch Mary am u'apa g Jesus matsh am hab wo juni mo has i masma d ha-chehanig.
42002028	Tsh g Simeon an koh g ali k ab si e ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui hab kaijch.
42002029	“Pegih ia o i s-ap'e, ni-Jioshga. Pt ab haha wo i ni-hiwigi mant wo si s-ap ni-taht k ni-pihhu map hab masma heki hu am ni-ahgith.
42002030	Neh, ni-wuhpuikaj ani hahawa neith ihtha mapt hekaj wo t-tho'ibia.
42002031	Kut wehs hemajkam wo s-mai ab amjed
42002032	nat pi d wo ha-tonligk g nahnko mahs hemajkam ch ab wo si uhgk i ha bei g m-hemajkamga.” Neh, bash kaij hegai Simeon.
42002033	Sh g Joseph ch Mary si has e tahtk heg hekaj mo has i kaij ab amjed g ali.
42002034	Sh hab hahawa kaij g Simeon ab ha wui. “Jiosh at wo wa s-em-ho'ige'el,” ch ash hab ep kaij ab je'ej wui, “Neh, ihtha ali at g Jiosh am si i kei. Kut mu'i wo t-tho'ibia. T wabshaba mu'ijj g t-wehm Tutuligo pi ab hu wo wohochuth k im hu hab wo i e juh. Jiosh at ab wo e chehgi t-wui ith hekaj ali. T mu'ijj wo s-keh'ith
42002035	k hekaj wo mahsko wua g e-chegitoithag. Kut g m-ihbthag wo si s-ko'okkath hab wa'i masma matp hems g is-pahyo ab wo si m-chu'akath m-ihbthag ed.” Neh, bash kaij g Simeon.
42002036	Sh hema g oks am d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch hab chehgig Anna. Sh g ohgajbad hab chehgig Phanuel ch ab d amjedkamaj g Asherbad. Kush g keligaj ihtha Anna muh mash eda d haha wabsh i e wehm kihkam wewa'ak a'ahith ab.
42002037	Sh am haha d hejel wi'ikam gigi'ikko gamai gi'ik (84) a'ahith ab. Tash oitham ch chuhug oitham ash am ha'ichug ge'e cheopi t am ch ab si has elith g Jiosh ab wui e ho'ige'ithahunch ch hab al he'es ha'ichu ko'a.
42002038	Sh am ha'ichug g ali ch je'ej g Joseph wehm. Kutsh am jiwia hegai Anna k ash ab ho'ige'elith g Jiosh ch am hahawa wehsijj ha ahgith ab amjed g ali hegam mash hab wa'ap nenida matsh g Jiosh wo ha tho'ibia.
42002039	Neh, kutsh wehs am hab juh hegai mo an o'ohanas chehanig ch ed k gm hu hahawa uhpam hihi Galilee chekshani wui k am thatha e-kih am Nazareth kihhim t am.
42002040	Kutsh ab si s-gegokim i ge'elhi g ali k wabsh sha'i ha'ichu s-amichuth. Sh g Jiosh pihk elithadag am si e tashogith wehhejed.
42002041	Wehs ahith ab ash am e wushshath Jerusalem t am matsh wa ha tho'ibia g Jiosh g ha-shohshon ab ha amjed g Egypt t am hemajkam. Kush g Jesus jehj chum hekith am hihhim.
42002042	Kush am d i gamai gohk a'ahithag g Jesus. Tsh am i e ai hegai ha-tho'ibiathag wuhshtha. Tsh am ep hihi bekch g Jesus k am ha'ichugkahim mo he'es i tash am hab e wua.
42002043	Tsh am i kuhgit. Tsh gm hu i e nohnogi uhpam. Tsh eda am wa'i wih g Jesus Jerusalem t am. Sh g jehjij pi mahch mo pi am hu ha wehmaj
42002044	nash pi hab elith mash an wa hebai ha wehmaj g hihimtham mash am mu'i e wehm hihim. Kush hekaj hemako tash wa'i chihpia k an chum gahghi ha oithk g e-hajuni ch e-nan'aipijju.
42002045	Sh eda pi am hu ha'ichug. Kutsh oi wa gm hu uhpam hihi Jerusalem wui mat an wo i gahghi.
42002046	Kush am d i waik tash. Tsh gd hu hahawa cheh ge'e cheopi ch ed. Kush am thak ch ab ha kaiham g s-chu a'amichuththam ch ab si ha'ichu ha kakke mash am a'aga g Jiosh o'ohana.
42002047	Sh ihtham ab epai ha'ichu kakke. Kush si s-e mamachim neok ch si s-ap ab uhpam i nodgith g ha'ichu ha-kakkei. Sh wehsijj hegam mash kah ab wabsh i haha'athka si has i e tahtk.
42002048	Neh, tsh g Joseph ch Mary hab wa'ap si has i e taht am chehgiok. Sh g je'ej hab kaij, “Ni-sulijga, shahchu apt ahgk hab t-juh? Shelkam att nonda g m-ohg wehm pi m-edgithk.”
42002049	Kush hab kaij ab ha wui, “Chum am wa s-mahch mant hemho wa am wo ha'ichugk ni-ohg Jiosh kih ed.”
42002050	Sh eda pi sha'i amichuth mo haschu ahgch hab kaij.
42002051	Kutsh gm hu hahawa uhpam hih ha wehm Nazareth wui k ab ha wechokahim. Sh g je'ej pi hekith sha'i pi chegito ihtha matsh has e juh.
42002052	Neh, kutsh ab si s-gegokam i ge'ehogatahi g Jesus k ba'ich i edagi g amichuthadag k ash am si oith g Jiosh chehanig. Kush ab si s-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh. Sh g hemajkam ab si has elith.
42003001	Tsh am hebai i cheka. Kush am thaha ihtha John mo d Zacariabad alithag am tohono jewed ch ed. Sh wenog am hema d si uhgchu lai wehs ha thahm g jejewed ch hab chehgig Tiberius. Kush am hema ep d kownal Judea chekshani t am ch hab chehgig Pilate. Kush g Herodbad a'alithag hab wa'ap d kokownal. Hema ash hab wa'ap chehgig Herod ch ash am d kownal Galilee chekshani ch ed k ch hema hab chehgig Philip ch am d kownal Iturea ch ed ch Traconitis ch ed. Sh g Lisanias am d kownal Abelene ch ed. Kush ia'i ithani hegam am d si u'ugchu ha-papalig g Tutuligo mash hema hab chehgig Annas ch hema hab chehgig Caiaphas. Tsh g Jiosh ab mah g John g ha'ichu e-ahga mash eda hegai Tiberius am wa'i thaha gamai hetasp a'ahith ab.
42003003	Sh g John an wehsko ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga anai Jordan akimel wo'oshani ed hab ha ahgch, “Gam g hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k wo e pahl wapko. Tsh g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig.”
42003004	Batsh wa e juh hab masma matki an heki hu o'oha hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab chehgig Isaiah. K hab chu'ig g o'ohanaj: Hema atsh gm hu jeg ed wo ha mihshmath g hemajkam hab kaijch, “Neh, in atsh wo i wuhsh jewed thahm hegai mo d ge kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. Kumt heg wehhejed wo i e nako hab sha masma mamt am wo i ap'ech g pad wohg mat am oithk wo i hih g ge'e kownal.
42003005	Nat hig pi am wo i e ap'ech g wohg mo hebai pi apkothag mat hekith wo jiwia g ge'e kownal? Pegih, mt am hab wa'ap wo i ap'ech g e-thoakag am e tho'ibiak.
42003006	T hab wehs wo nei g hemajkam mat has masma wo chum ha tho'ibia g Jiosh.” Neh, batki masma an o'oha g Isaiabad. Kush g John woho hab masma hab e wua.
42003007	Tsh mu'i am wui e chehm g hemajkam matsh ab ab wo e pahl wapko. Ha'i ihtham o pi am hu gawul junimk g pi ap e-chegitoi. Kush hab ha ahg g John, “Hah, ahpim mam pi ap chegitoithag, bamki e elith mamt wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag heg wabsh hekaj mam ab d Abrahambad amjedkam. Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mamt pi woho wo e tho'ibia, heg hi wa mamt am wo e chehgi am hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam mamt gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. Wehs hegam mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi at d wo Jiosh hemajkamgak ch hab masma wo e kuint mo d Abrahambad amjedkam, chum wa g nahnko mahs hemajkam.
42003009	Kumt ahpim gm hu wo s-e ohhoth hab masma mat g pi kehg bahithkam u'us mamtp pi gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k pi am hu hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.”
42003010	Kush ha'i g hemajkam ab kakke, “Pegih, tt has hig wo chum t-juh?”
42003011	Kush hab kaij ab ha wui, “Mt am wo i ap'ech g e-chegitoi Jiosh wui k amjed pi wo tha'i g e-eniga. Neh, tp hems hema pi wo ha kotonik. Kumt ab wo hema mah. Tp hems hema pi wo ha'ichu chekk. Mt ab wo mah g ha'ichu hugi.” Neh, bash kaij g John.
42003012	Kush ha'i hegam matsh am wui thatha k wo e pahl wapko d lial ha kowlanttham am kownal wehhejed ch ash ab kakke, “T-mashchamtham, tt ahchim has wo chum masmak?”
42003013	Kush hab ha ahg, “Pi amt gamai hu wabsh ba'ich i mu'i wo ha kowlant mo he'ekkia i mohto'is g o'othham.”
42003014	Kush ha'i d shonthal ch ab epai kakke, “Tt ahchim has wo chum masmak?” Sh hab ha ahg, “Pi g hekith ha'ichu wo sha'i ha wohppo'ithath ch pi ab hu hema ha'ichu wo sha'i abch mat pi wo wohok ch ehp mamt wabsh wo s-ap e tahtkk ch ab u'u mam he'ekkia i em-namkith.”
42003015	Kush g hemajkam pi am hu thotholimath am oithahimch mas hu ith d Jiosh si Kehsha matsh wo ha tho'ibia.
42003016	Kush heg hekaj hab kaij g John, “Pi g hab wo ni-elith manis ahni d si ha'ichu. Ab at hema wo i wuhsh ni-oithk mat d wo si ha'ichuk. Ahni ani hi wa em-pahl wapkon. T wabshaba heg ab wo em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag k gm hu hab wo i juh pi em-ap'ekam hab sha masma mat g mehi wo mei g sha'i.
42003017	“Nam hig pi nehnichuth g pilkani mamt g mohgaj gm hu wo i gawulkath k wo mehith k g pilkani gd hu wo i ba'iha. Pegih, t hab wa'ap am a'ai wo i ha gawulkai g hemajkam am lothaita ch ed ihtha mani em-ahgith k wo ha tho'ibia g s-ap'ekam k g pi ap'ekam s-ko'okam wo ha namkith. T g ha namkithadag pi hekith wo huhug.”
42003018	Neh, bash kaij g John ch nahnko masma am i chum ha tashogith g hemajkam g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh.
42003019	Sh eda hegai kownal mash hab chehgig Herod ge'e hab junihim g pi ap'ekam ch atsh g e-wehnag ehs g hohnigaj. Sh hab chehgig hegai Herodias. Kush g John ab s-keh'ith g kownal ch hab kaij mat pi hab wo chum e juh.
42003020	Tsh g Herod am ba'ich i pi ap ha'ichu hab juh matsh gd hu si kuh g John.
42003021	Tsh wabshaba koi e kuh g John k wehs ha pahl wapko hegam matsh am wui e chehm ab s-wohochuthch g Jiosh. Tsh g Jesus hab wa'ap am wui jiwia k e pahl wakon k am e ho'ige'ithahun. Tsh g thahm kahchim gam i e kuhpi'o.
42003022	Kutsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag i hud ab ab g Jesus k hab sha mahs mo g hohhi. Sh ab neok g Jiosh ab thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Ahpi ap d si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag ch am si ni-tatchui oithch hab masma.”
42003023	Jesus ash am hu d i waikko wehst-mahm a'ahithag matsh eda am i himch g e-chikpan k am i ahgahi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kush ihtham d shohshonaj mant g ha-chechgig an wo ha o'oha. Bash masma s-e mahch mo d Josephbad alithag. Sh g Joseph ab d Heli amjedkam.
42003024	Kush g Heli ohgbad Matthat. Sh g Matthat ohgbad d Levi. Sh g Levi ohgbad d Melchi. Sh g Melchi ohgbad d Jannai. Sh g Jannai ohgbad d Joseph.
42003025	Sh g Joseph ohgbad d Mattathias. Sh g Mattathias ohgbad d Amos. Sh g Amos ohgbad d Nahum. Sh g Nahum ohgbad d Esli. Sh g Esli ohgbad d Naggai.
42003026	Sh g Naggai ohgbad d Maath. Sh g Maath ohgbad d Mattathias. Sh g Mattathias ohgbad d Semein. Sh g Semein ohgbad d Josech. Sh g Josech ohgbad d Joda.
42003027	Sh g Joda ohgbad d Joanan. Sh g Joanan ohgbad d Resa. Sh g Resa ohgbad d Zerubbabel. Sh g Zerubbabel ohgbad d Shealtiel. Sh g Shealtiel ohgbad d Neri.
42003028	Sh g Neri ohgbad d Melchi. Sh g Melchi ohgbad d Addi. Sh g Addi ohgbad d Cosam. Sh g Cosam ohgbad d Elmadam. Sh g Elmadam ohgbad d Er.
42003029	Sh g Er ohgbad d Joshua. Sh g Joshua ohgbad d Eliezer. Sh g Eliezer ohgbad d Jorim. Sh g Jorim ohgbad d Matthat. Sh g Matthat ohgbad d Levi.
42003030	Sh g Levi ohgbad d Simeon. Sh g Simeon ohgbad d Judah. Sh g Judah ohgbad d Joseph. Sh g Joseph ohgbad d Jonam. Sh g Jonam ohgbad d Eliakim.
42003031	Sh g Eliakim ohgbad d Melea. Sh g Melea ohgbad d Menna. Sh g Menna ohgbad d Mattatha. Sh g Mattatha ohgbad d Nathan. Sh g Nathan ohgbad d David.
42003032	Sh g David ohgbad d Jesse. Sh g Jesse ohgbad d Obed. Sh g Obed ohgbad d Boaz. Sh g Boaz ohgbad d Shela. Sh g Shela ohgbad d Nashon.
42003033	Sh g Nashon ohgbad d Amminadab. Sh g Amminadab ohgbad d Admin. Sh g Admin ohgbad d Arni. Sh g Arni ohgbad d Hezron. Sh g Hezron ohgbad d Perez. Sh g Perez ohgbad d Judah.
42003034	Sh g Judah ohgbad d Jacob. Sh g Jacob ohgbad d Isaac. Sh g Isaac ohgbad d Abraham. Sh g Abraham ohgbad d Terah. Sh g Terah ohgbad d Nahor.
42003035	Sh g Nahor ohgbad d Serug. Sh g Serug ohgbad d Reu. Sh g Reu ohgbad d Peleg. Sh g Peleg ohgbad d Eber. Sh g Eber ohgbad d Shelah.
42003036	Sh g Shelah ohgbad d Cainan. Sh g Cainan ohgbad d Arphaxad. Sh g Arphaxad ohgbad d Shem. Sh g Shem ohgbad d Noah. Sh g Noah ohgbad d Lamec.
42003037	Sh g Lamec ohgbad d Methusela. Sh g Methusela ohgbad d Enoc. Sh g Enoc ohgbad d Jared. Sh g Jared ohgbad d Mahalaleel. Sh g Mahalaleel ohgbad d Cainan.
42003038	Sh g Cainan ohgbad d Enos. Sh g Enos ohgbad d Seth. Sh g Seth ohgbad d Adam. Sh g Adambad d amjedkamaj g Jiosh.
42004001	Jesus atsh gm hu hih ab amjed g Jordan akimel matsh hebai e pahl wako. Kush g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab mahkch g si ge'e gewkthag ch hab ahg mat gm hu wo hih am tohono jewed wui.
42004002	Kush am ha'ichugkahim gi'ikko wehst-mahm tash ab. Sh heg oitham g jijawul ha-ge'ejig am chum s-wuimk pi ap'ekam ch ed. Jesus ash pi ha'ichu ko'a heg oitham ch hekaj bihugim.
42004003	Sh g ge Jiawul ab wui hab kaij, “Bap chum e elith map d Jiosh alithag. Pegih, ab g hig chehani ihtha hothai mat wo e pahnch naptki pi bihugim.”
42004004	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ant hab wo juh. An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Jiosh ne'oki o ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo hi g ha'ichu hugi. Kut g o'othham hemho ab wo wa s-wohog elithath.”
42004005	Neh, tsh g Jiawul am hahawa sha'i si s-hohtam wuhpuij tahgio wehs i mahsith g kokownaltalig ith thahm jewed
42004006	k ab wui hab ep kaij, “Wehs o ab ni-mahks ihtha gewkthag ch kaisthag ch d ni-eniga mant wo wa mah mani hedai hab i elith.
42004007	Kunt wehs ab wo m-mah mapt ab ni-wui wo i gehsh k ab wo has ni-el.”
42004008	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ant hab wo juh. An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Heg amt wa'i Jiosh ab wui wo i gehsh k ab wo ihmath ch heg ab wo wa'i s-wohog elithath.”
42004009	Kutsh am hahawa wuhpuij tahgio i mahsith hegai ge'e cheopi mo am kehk Jerusalem t ab k hab ahg, “Maptp d wo Jiosh alithagk, pegih, am g i thah'i amjed mo gn hu si uhgk kihtas.
42004010	No hig pi an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Jiosh at ab wo ha cheha g mu'i anghil mat wo m-nuhkuth.
42004011	Kut an hu wo si m-u'ukchith mapt nih g sha'i e-tahtad ab hu wo shul hohothai t ab.”
42004012	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pi ant wo pip'ich g Jiosh. An o hab chu'ig o'ohanaj ed: Pi g wo sha'i pip'ichuthath g e-kownalig Jiosh.”
42004013	Kush g Jiawul am hahawa sha thagito g Jesus am i wehs nahnko masma chum s-wuimkk pi ap'ekam ch ed.
42004014	Tsh gm hu hahawa hih g Jesus Galilee chekshani wui. Sh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag si ge'e mahkch g gewkthag. Tsh gm hu a'ai s-e mai g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed.
42004015	Kush am ha mashcham ha e'eda g ha-chechopi. Sh wehsijj ab si has elith g hemajkam.
42004016	Kush am him k am hekith. Tsh gm hu hih g Jesus Nazareth kihhim wui mash wa am d si kihkam. Tsh g shahwai am i e ai. Kutsh am i e chehm g hemajkam cheopi ch ed nash pi eda e mihshmath. Tsh am jiwia g Jesus k am thahiwua hab masma mash wa chum hekith am hab e junihim. Kumtsh am hiwigi. Tsh am kekiwua matsh wo ne'okchul g Jiosh heki hu o'ohana.
42004017	Kumtsh ab hema mah g holiwk o'ohana. Sh d o'ohanaj g Isaiabad. Tsh an ne'okchul mo an hab chu'ig matsh g Jiosh si Kehsha hab wo chei:
42004018	Jiosh at am i ni-kei mant am wo ha ahgithahith g sho'igkam g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj. K heg hekaj am ni-wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch ab ni-mahkch g si ge'e gewkthag. K ab ni-chehani g Jiosh mant am wo ha ahgithahith g tho'ibiathag hegam mo ha'ichukaj e wupulshch ch wo ha nench g pi neneatham k ab wo i ha wuwhas hegam mo ha'ichukaj e kudut
42004019	k wo ahgachug mat e ai mat g Jiosh wo ha tho'ibia g e-hemajkamga.
42004020	Tsh g Jesus ab i holiwkai g o'ohana k ab uhpam mah g nuhkuththam k am hahawa thahiwua mat ha'ichu hab wo chei. Sh wehsijj ab si kaiham mat has wo chei.
42004021	Kutsh am i neok k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Neh, hemu at e ai. Ni ahni hab wua ihtha mant am ne'okchul em-wehhejed.”
42004022	Tsh wehsijj ab si has i el no pi si s-ap neok k wabshaba hab kaij, “Aha no hig pi woho d Josephbad alithag?”
42004023	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “No hig pi woho mamt ab ni-wui hab wo chei hegai hab ha-che'ithag mo hab chu'ig, Am g i e maskogith maptp d ge mahkai, k hab ep wo chei, Ia g hu hig hab ep juhni g s-hasig ha'ichu e-kih am mapsh has masma am hab ge junihim Capernaum kihhim t am.”
42004024	Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus. “Mo wa woho mam pi ab hu has elith g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam amai mo hebai d i si kihkam.
42004025	Elijabad wehm o'othham ash wa hab masma pi ab hu has elith. Tsh heg hekaj pi am hu hema i wehmt matsh eda pi ha juh waik eda hugkam a'ahith ab. Tsh g bihugig i gei. Mu'ij ash g hehe'ejel wi'ikam u'uwi amai.
42004026	Tsh wabshaba g Jiosh am cheha g Elijabad matsh am wo hih Seraphath kihhim wui am Sidon jewed ch ed k am wo hema i wehmt g hejel wi'ikam uwi amai.
42004027	Kush mu'i kok'o g Tutuligo heg hekaj pi ha thoththakam mumkithag mo hab e a'aga ‘leprosy’. Tsh eda pi hema sha'i ha thoaj hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab chehgig Elisha. Sh hema heg hekaj mumku g gawul mahs o'othham ch hab chehgig Naaman ch am kih Syria jewed ch ed. Kutsh heg wa'i thoaj g Elishabad.”
42004028	Tsh wehsijj hegam mash am ha'ichug cheopi ch ed si babgat am i kaiok ihtha
42004029	k atsh gam si ne'iopa k am i chewaim g Jesus gm hu jegko. K eda g Nazareth an kehk kawulk t ab. Kutsh am i bei mo am hu hebai ge uhgk i koa g kawulk hab chum ahgk mat amjed wo i tha'ich.
42004030	Tsh wabshaba g Jesus am wabsh ha shahgith wuhshani k gm hu hih.
42004031	Tsh gm hu hahawa hih g Jesus Capernaum wui heg eda chekshani k am ha mashcha g hemajkam cheopi ch ed mo am d i ha-mihshmetha tash.
42004032	Kutsh wehsijj si has i el kaiok mo has masma ha mashcham no pi si s-e mamachim neok.
42004033	Sh am hema thaha mo g jiawul an u'ukch. Kush si s-kaitham hihnk ch hab kaij,
42004034	“Gam g hu hihm ahpi Jesus map ab Nazareth t ab d kihkam. A napt hab ahgk ia jiwia mapt wo t-koktha. S-mahch ani map hedai wud. Thap Jiosh si hekia s-ap'ekam kehsha.”
42004035	Tsh g Jesus ab si chehmo g jiawul k hab kaij, “Pi g shahmuni k ab i wuhshani ith amjed o'othham.” Tsh g jiawul am si wua hegai o'othham wehsijj ha tahgio k ab i wuhsh amjed k pi sha'i ko'okam has juh.
42004036	Kutsh wehsijj ab si has i el g Jesus k hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Sha'i si s-gewkthag g ne'okij. Ab o chehani g jijawul mat ab wo i wuwha. K wa woho hab e wua.”
42004037	Kutsh wehsko e kah ihtha anai heg oithk jejewed.
42004038	Tsh amjed gm hu hih g Jesus heg kih wui mo hab chehgig Simon. Sh eda g hohnigaj je'e ihtha si mumku k ch s-toni iajithch. Kumsh am ahgith g Jesus ab amjed.
42004039	Tsh am him k am i kekiwua heg wo'ikud hugith an k am e ho'ige'ithahu. Tsh am ha hekaj ap'et k am i wamig k ha hihithol.
42004040	Tsh gm hu hud g tash. Tsh wehsijj hegam mo g ha-naipijju kok'o g nahnko mahs mumkithagkaj am ha u'apa Jesus wui. Kut wehsijj ab i ha tahtmahim k ha thothaj.
42004041	Tsh mu'i ab wui i hihi hegam mo g jijawul an ha u'ukch. Sh ihtham jijawul si hihnk ch hab kaij, “Ahpi ap d Jiosh alithag.” Kush ab si s-ha keh'ith g Jesus ch gm hu i ha wuwhasith ch pi ha hiwgith mas am hu has wo kaijjith no pi s-mahch ihtham mo heg d Jiosh si Kehsha.
42004042	Sh am hu hebai wabsh i si'alim, tsh g Jesus gm hu jegko i wuhsh. Tsh am i gahghi g hemajkam k am i chehg k chum pi hiwigi mat wo hih ab ha amjed.
42004043	Kush wabshaba hab kaij ab ha wui, “Hemho wa ant am wo i ahgahi g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig an a'ai kihhim ch ed hab wa ehp nat pi hab ahgk i ni-kei g Jiosh.”
42004044	Tsh wa woho am i ha mihshmethahi wehsko ha-chechopi ed amai Galilee chekshani ch ed.
42005001	Sh am hu hebai g Jesus an kehk mo an i koa hegai al kahchki mo hab chehgig Galilee Kahchki. Kutsh g hemajkam ab wabsh i shodbinithahi s-kaimkch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
42005002	Sh neith mo gohk wapalko am wupulshpi shuhthagi ch ed. Tsh g enigakam am ha thagito k gd hu ha wapkon g e-chuchagia.
42005003	Kutsh am i chesh g Jesus hema ha eda ihtham wapalko. Sh heg d Simon eniga. Sh hab ahg matsh am wo sha'i nu'ichkwua shuhthagi ch ed. Tsh g Simon hab juh. Tsh ab i thahiwua g Jesus wahlko ch ed k am ha mashcha g hemajkam.
42005004	Tsh am i ha'asa ha'ichu ha ahgith k hab ahg ihtha Simon mat am wo i himch g e-wahlko mo am s-juhk g shuhthagi k am wo i huduni g e-chuchagia ha wehm g e-wehm chikpantham.
42005005	Sh hab kaij g Simon, “T-mashchamtham, ge att chuhug sha'i si chikpan k pi ha'ichu sha'i bei. P wabshaba am t-ahgith matt am ep wo i huduni g t-chuchagia. Pegih, tt am hab wo t-juh.”
42005006	Kutsh wa woho am hihim k am i ha huhuds ge e-chuchagia k atsh sha'i si mu'i waptopi ha ui matsh chum alo e wanikumia g ha-chuchagia.
42005007	Kush am ha'i ep chikpan hema wahlko ch ed. Kumtsh ihtham ab hahawa si ha wai mat am wo i ha wehmt. Tsh wa woho ab i himch g e-wahlko k wehs ha shuhshuth g waptopikaj mat chum alo wachkk g ha-wapalko.
42005008	Tsh am i nei g Simon mat haschu has i e juh k ab si i gei g e-tohtonkaj Jesus wui k hab wabsh kaij, “Ih, thani wabsh pi ap'ekam o'othham. K pi hab chum mahs maps wo ni-wehmajk ahpi s-ap'ekam ni-kownalig.”
42005009	Kutsh wehsijj hegam mash wehmaj si e totoths neithch mat has e juh.
42005010	Ha'i hegam wehmaj chikpantham g Peter ash d James ch John ch ash d a'alithaj hegai mash hab chehgig Zebedee. Sh g Jesus hab kaij ab Simon wui, “Pi g am sha'i has e tahtkkath. I'ajed apt imhab g o'othham an wo ha u'uth ni-wehhejed.”
42005011	Tsh am wabsh i chum ai g shuhthagi koa ihtham k am i ha wuwhas g wapalko k wehs ha'ichu am wabsh i thagito k gm hu i oi g Jesus.
42005012	Sh am hu hebai g Jesus am hasko kihhim ch ed oimmed. Kush am hema g o'othham wehsko ma'ishch hegai mumkithag mo g chuhkugaj muhkhim. Tsh am jiwia g Jesus. Kutsh heg am i chehg k ab si kupal i gei wui k hab kaij, “Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k i ni-thoajith pej maptp wo tatchuath.”
42005013	Tsh g Jesus ab tahtam k hab kaij, “Am o wa s-ap'e. Thoajini.” Tsh am ha hekaj i thoa.
42005014	Tsh g Jesus ab chehani k hab kaij, “Pi g am hedai ahgith ab amjed ihtha k wabshaba am ha hekaj wo hih pahl wui. T am wo m-chechga k wo wohokamch mapt thoa. Pt am hab haha wo juh hegai iagchulitha mo wa g Jiosh em-chehani Mosesbad o'ohana ed. T hab wo s-mahchk g hemajkam mapt woho thoa.”
42005015	Tsh amjed gm hu hih hegai o'othham. Kutsh wehsko i e ahgahi ihtha matsh g Jesus hab juh. Tsh hekaj mu'i hemajkam am wui hihi mat wo kah g ha'ichu ahgaj k wo e thothaj.
42005016	Tsh g Jesus am wo ha mihshmath k wo ha thothajith k amjed gm hu hejelko wo him k wo e ho'ige'ithahu.
42005017	Sh am hu hebai ehp mash g Jesus am ha mashcham. Sh am ha'i thadha g chehanig ha mashchamtham ch hegam mo si oith g chehanig ch hab e a'aga Palasi. Ihtham atsh ga hu a'aijed am thatha ab amjed g Galilee chekshani ch Judea chekshani ch ab Jerusalem kihhim t amjed. Tsh g Jiosh ab si mah g gewkthag g Jesus mat wo ha thothaj g kok'otham.
42005018	Tsh am ha'i thatha g chechoj hema u'athch g pi himithkam. Ith ash ab wabsh i s-moik ch am wo'o e-wahkus ed.
42005019	Kush am i chum s-wahkithamk kih ch ed matsh wo chehgi g Jesus ab si hiwigch mat wo thoaj. Sh wabshaba sha'i si s-hemajkamag. Kutsh pi has masma am hu wo i e wahki. Tsh heg hekaj gn hu hahawa i cheshaj kih thahm k am ge maggad g kih ma'ishpadag k amjed ab i huduni g wo'ikudaj am ha shahgith g hemajkam k am woi mash am kehk g Jesus.
42005020	Tsh am i nei g Jesus moki ab si hiwig ihtham k hab kaij ab wui ihtha o'othham, “Ni-nawoj, ab ani s-m-ho'ige'ith ch gm hu hab i juh g pi ap m-chu'ichig.”
42005021	Kush hegam chehanig ha mashchamtham ch Palasi wabsh hejel hab e ahg, “Ih, sha'i si pi ap neok ihtha o'othham hab masma e wepogithch g Jiosh. Heg at wa'i Jiosh wo e nako mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig.”
42005022	Sh g Jesus s-mahch mo haschu am oithahim ch hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo sha'i oithahim manis pi woho edgith g gewkthag mant gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig.
42005023	Bam elith mo s-pehegim hab e kaij mat gm hu hab i e juh g pi ap chu'ichigaj no ge hedai s-mahch mas s-wohom hab e juh.
42005024	Pegih, nt wo em-chehgi mani woho ge gewkthag ch hab wua mani has i kaij ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.” Neh, bash kaij ch hab hahawa kaij heg wui pi himithkam, “I g wamig k am beh'i g e-wahkus k hihm am uhpam.”
42005025	Tsh am ha hekaj i wami hegai o'othham k am bei g e-wahkus k gm hu uhpam hih ab si ihmch g Jiosh.
42005026	Tsh g hemajkam si has i elith k ab ihm g Jiosh hab kaijch, “Sha'i si s-kehg ha'ichu ach neith ith tashkaj.”
42005027	Sh hema d lial kowlanttham g kownal wehhejed ch hab chehgig Levi. Tsh g Jesus am cheh. Kush am thaha heg eda kih mo am chikpan. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Oi g i ni-oith.”
42005028	Tsh g Levi am ha hekaj i wuhshani k am wabsh i thagito wehs ha'ichu k gm hu i oi.
42005029	Am wa'i mia amjed, tsh g Levi am hab juh g ge'e gegosig am wehhejed g Jesus. Sh am ha'i oiopo g Palasi mash ihtham ha'i d chehanig ha mashchamtham. Sh eda mu'ijj hegam mash am ha wehm e gegosith d lial kowlanttham hab masma mo g Levi. Kush hegam Palasi am ha neith ch hekaj s-ha keh'ith g Jesus chuhchai hab ha ahgch, “Ih, shahchu am ahgch am ha wehm e gegosith ihtham pi ap hemajkam, chum hems am ha wehm g lial kowlanttham?”
42005031	Sh g Jesus hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ihtham pi ap hemajkam o s-e tho'ibiamk hab masma mat g kok'otham wo s-e thoajitham. Hegam mo hab e elith mo s-ap'e at pi wo tatchua g mahkai.
42005032	Pi ant hab ahgk ia jiwia manis wo ha tho'ibia hegam mo pi e tho'ibiamk.”
42005033	Sh ha'i g hemajkam hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Neh, mu'ikko o pi e gegosith ch wabsh e ho'ige'ithahun hegam mo ab wecho e mashcham g John ch hegam mo ab ha wecho e mashcham g Palasi. Kuki wabshaba ahpi g m-wohochuththam pi hab e wua.”
42005034	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Nat hig pi wo e gegos g wo ha hohntam naipijju mat eda heg am wo ha wehmajk?
42005035	T am wo i e ai mat pi am hu wo ha wehmajk. T am hahawa pi wo e gegos. Pegih, bat wo wa e juh ihtham ni-naipijju mant hekith pi ia hu wo ha wehmajk.”
42005036	Sh am hahawa chum ha tashogith g Jesus mat g mashchamaj pi ap wo wehnath g ha-himthag ash hab kaij, “Pi at hedai g wechij ikuskaj wo shohsho g hekiuchij lihwa mat wo s-e wia nat pi wo i thahiwua k ba'ich wo i wantsh g hekiuchij. T hab wa'ap pi wo ap'et g hekiuchij nat ge wo wepo mahsk g wechij ikus.
42005037	T pi hedai g wechij nawait am wo toa hekiuchij ha'ichu elithag kokstal ch ed. Tp hab wo sha e juh, t g wechij nawait wo wantsh g ha'ichu elithag. T g nawait wo iawua k g ha'ichu elithag wo e padch.
42005038	Neh, hemho wa at g wechij nawait am wo e toa wechij ha'ichu elithag kokstal ch ed.
42005039	“Pi o hedai tatchua mat wo ih g wechij nawait hekith ab i jehkiok g hekiuchij nawait nat pi hab wo chei mo ba'ich i s-ap hab kahk g hekiuchij.”
42006001	Sh am hu hebai hihim ihtham Jesus ha mihshmetha tash ed. Kush am eshas g pilkani wohg huhugith an. Sh hegam mash am wehmaj g Jesus ab ha wohni g pilkani ch i mohon g e-nohnhoikaj ch ko'a.
42006002	Sh ha'i g Palasi ha neith ch hab kaij, “Shahchu am ahgch hab wua hegai mo g t-chehanig pi t-hiwgith machs hab wo wuath mihshmetha tash ed?”
42006003	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Bo wabsh masma hab e wua matsh wa g Davidbad. Pi amtki chegito matsh heg has e juh am i bihugimk. Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana
42006004	matsh am i wah ge'e cheopi ch ed k am ui g pahn k huh hegam ha wehm mash am wehmaj. Kush d hegai pahn mo am e to'aw k ch hegam d wa'i ha wuikam mo d papal. T eda hemho wa am hab e juh. K heg hekaj am wa s-ap'e mat huh.”
42006005	Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Thani Jiosh si Kehsha ch gewkthag am thahm g mihshmetha tash.”
42006006	Sh am hu hebai d ep mihshmetha tash. Tsh am i wahp ihtham Jesus hema cheopi ch ed. Kush g Jesus am ha mashcham g hemajkam. Sh am hema thaha g o'othham mash g s-apkojed nowij mahnikodag.
42006007	Sh am ha'i thadha g chehanig ha mashchamtham ch Palasi ch an wa s-nen'oith nash pi ab ha'ichu s-abchuthamk g Jesus ch hekaj an neith mas wo hi wa ha thoaj mihshmetha tash ch ed.
42006008	Sh g Jesus s-mahch mo haschu am chegito ch ash hab kaij heg wui mahnikokam, “Kekiwuani k ab i hihm ia hu ha ba'ich g hemajkam.” Tsh ab i kekiwua.
42006009	Sh g Jesus ab hahawa ha kakke ch hab kaij, “Shahchu am ahgch hab elith mo pi hiwgithas mihshmetha tash ed mamt wo i ha wehmt hegam mo e sho'igchuth? Ab o em-ab mamt wo i ha wehmt g sho'igkam k ep wo ha tho'ibia hegam mat am hu wo e ko'ij. Aha namt wabsh wo ha hiwigi mat wo e ko'ij?”
42006010	Neh, bash kaij ch an hahawa wehsijj i ha neith k hab hahawa kaij ab wui hegai o'othham, “Ab g si i shelin g e-nowi.” Kutsh am wabsh i chum shelin k am wa'i hekaj ap'et.
42006011	Tsh hegam haha'ichu wabsh woho'i babgat matsh ha thoaj ha mihshmetha tash ab k am ha hekaj i e wehm a'aga mas has wo juh g Jesus.
42006012	Tsh am wa'i mia amjed am hu hebai gm hu i chesh g Jesus kawulk thahm k ge chuhug oitham e ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui.
42006013	Kut am i mahsi. Tsh ab hahawa i ha wai hegam mash ab si wecho e mashcham k g gamai gohk am ha ui mat d wo si chuhchaij.
42006014	Hema hegam ash d Simon. Kutsh heg hab ep chehch Peter mo hab d ahga ‘Hothai.’ Kush hema d Andrew ch d si wehngaj g simon. Kush ha'i d James ch John ch Philip ch Bartholomew
42006015	ch Matthew ch Thomas. Sh hema d hegai James mash g ohgaj hab chehgig Alphias. Sh hema hab ep chehgig Simon ch d hema hegam mash tatchua mat g Tutuligo hejel wo himchuthath g e-kownaltalig.
42006016	Sh hema d hegai Judas mash g ohgaj hab chehgig James. Kush hema d Judas Iscariot ch d hegai matsh wa gagda g Jesus. Neh, ihtham gamai gohk ash am d hahawa si chuhchaij g Jesus.
42006017	tsh ab hahawa i huhud hegam Jesus. Sh mu'i am ep ha'ichug g hemajkam ab amjed g Judea chekshani ch Jerusalem kihhim ch ab amjed g ge shuhthagi hugithag an miabithch g Tyre ch Sidon kihhim.
42006018	Wehsijj ash s-kaimk g Jesus. Kush ab wui hihim g kok'otham ch hegam mash g jijawul an ha u'ukch. Sh g Jesus ha thothajith ch gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul.
42006019	Kush wehsijj ab chum s-tahtmamk g Jesus nash pi g gewkthaj ab wuhshani amjed ch wehs ha thoajith.
42006020	Tsh g Jesus ab i ha nei hegam mash ab si hiwig k hab kaij: “Mt wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath ahpim mam ab e sho'igchuth Jiosh wui. Ab at wo i em-wahpki e-kihthag ed.
42006021	Mt wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath ahpim mam hemuch chum ha'ichu tatchua. B at wo wa em-mah g Jiosh mam haschu i tatchua. Mt wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath ahpim mam shoani hemu no pi ab him g tash mamt wo wa si s-hehgigk.
42006022	T wo s-em-keh'ithath g hemajkam ch wo s-em-ohhoth ch wo s-ko'okam has em-ahgath ch hab wo chei mam d wabsh pi ap'ekam.
42006023	Mt wabsh wo s-ap e tahtkkath ch wo s-hehgigk ith hekaj. Bash wa masma e sho'igchuth hegam mash d kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch hekaj bei g Jiosh mahkigdag. T g Jiosh hab wa'ap wo em-mah g ge'e s-ap'ekam mo em-wehhejed an nuhkuth e-kihthag ed.
42006024	T wabshaba wo si pi ap e tahtkkath hegam mo hemu d s-kakais no pi ab heki hu neith g s-e-hehgig.
42006025	T wo si pi ap e tahtkkath hegam mo pi ha'ichu tatchua hemuch. Ab o him g tash mat wo pi ha'ichu edgithath. T wo si pi ap e tahtkkath hegam mo s-e tahhathchuth hemuch. Ab o him g tash mat wo shoanith.
42006026	T wo si pi ap e tahtkkath hegam mo wehs hemajkam ab si has ha elith hemuch. Em-shohshon ash hab masma si s-ap has ha ahg hegam mash hab wabsh s-e junimk mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.
42006027	“Nt wo em-ahgi mamt has wo masmak am ha wui. Ab g wabsh wo i si pihk e elithath ha wui g e-obga k wabsh g s-ap ha'ichu hab wo ha juni hegam mo s-em-keh'ith.
42006028	Ihtham atp hems wo pi kehg neneokath ab em-wui ch wo em-sho'igchuthath. Mt wabshaba wabsh wo si s-hemajimak am ha wui ch wo e ho'ige'ithahu am ha wehhejed.
42006029	Tp hems s-ko'okam has wo em-juh. Mt wabshaba ab wabsh wo i s-ha ho'ige'el. Tp hems hema ab wo em-shonihi em-kahm ab. Kumt wabsh wo hiwigi mat aigojed ab ep wo em-shonihi. Tp hems hema wo em-wohppo'i g em-lihwa. Kumt g e-kotoni ep wo mah.
42006030	Tp hems hema ha'ichu wo i em-tai. Kumt wo mah. Kutp hems hema ha'ichu wo bei mo d em-eniga. Kumt pi uhpam wo tai.
42006031	Bamt wo ha juhkchith g hemajkam mam has i chum ha elith mat hab wo em-juhkchith.
42006032	“Pi at wo em-mah g s-ap tahhathkam g Jiosh mamtp hegam ab wo wa'i ha tatchuath mo ab uhpam em-tatchua. Chum o hems g pi ap hemajkam ab ha tatchua hegam mo ab uhpam ha tatchua.
42006033	Pi at wo em-mah g s-ap tahhathkam g Jiosh mamtp hegam wa'i ha wehhejed hab wo juh g s-ap ha'ichu mo s-ap ha'ichu hab em-junith. Chum o hems g pi ap hemajkam hab wa masma hab e wua.
42006034	Pi at wo em-mah g s-ap tahhathkam g Jiosh mamtp hegam wa'i ha'ichu wo ha hiwigi mam hab ha elith mat wo wa uhpam em-mah. Chum o hems g pi ap hemajkam hab wa'ap a'ai ha'ichu e hiwgith hab e elithch mat ab uhpam ep wo ui ha'akia mat he'ekia ha hiwigi.
42006035	“Neh, mt ab wo pihk e elithath ha wui g e-obga ch am hab wo ha junithath g s-ap ha'ichu ch wo ha'ichu ha mah mamt pi ab hu uhpam wo ge neithath. Bamt masma am wo e chehgi mam d a'aligaj g Jiosh. T heg mu'i s-kehg ha'ichu ab wo em-mah. Jiosh o hab wa masma s-ha ho'ige'ith g pi ap hemajkam ch hegam mo pi ab hu uhpam ho'ige'elith.
42006036	Am g hab wo juhkchith g ho'ige'ithadag hab masma mo g em-ohg Jiosh am hab juhkch.
42006037	“Pi g am hedai s-ko'okam has wo ahgath o ab wo ha mohto'ithath g pi ap'ekam. B at uhpam wo i e nodagi ab em-wui. Gam g hu wabsh wo pi chegito mat hema s-ko'okam has wo em-juh. Kut hab wa masma gm hu wabsh wo pi e chegito mamtp hems hema s-ko'okam has wo juh.
42006038	Ab g wo ha'ichu ha mahkath. T g Jiosh ab ha'ichu wo em-mahkath. Ab amt ba'ich i ge'e wo bei mamt he'es ab i ha mah no pi g Jiosh ba'ich i s-hemajima matp hems g hemajkam. Ab at wo i e nodagi em-wui mamt has i masma ab wo neithath hema.
42006039	“Pi at has masma wo em-wanimedath wohokam ch ed hegai mat hedai pi wo mahchk g wohokam. Heg at wo wa wepok matp hems hema g pi neatham ha'i ep wo i ha wanim g pi neneatham. Kutp hems wehsijj am wo i shul hiktani ch ed.
42006040	S-mahch am mat g ha mashchamtham ha ba'ich wo i chum s-mahchk hegai mo haschu i ha mashcham. E mashchamtham at am hugkam wo chum s-mahchk g e-mashchama am i s-ap nahtok mo hegai mat hedai i ha mashcha.
42006041	“Pi g am wo si s-nen'oithath g hema chu'ichig. Tp hems ba'ich i ge'ej g hejel em-chu'ichig. T heg wo wa wepok mam g chum ha'ichu ab i s-wuhshthamk wuhij ed mo eda ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu ab wo'o em-wuhi ed.
42006042	Tho iattogi mamtp hab wo chei mamt ab wo ha'ichu i wuhshath ha-wuhi ed mo eda ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu am wo'o em-wuhi ed. Hemho wa amt wehpeg wo i ap'ech g pi e-ap'ethag k haha wo e nako mamt ha'i ep wo i ha wehmt k wo i ap'ech g pi ha-ap'ethag.
42006043	“Mt wo s-mai mas hedai d s-ap'ekam o'othham hab wa masma mamt wo s-mai mas haschu d s-kehg uhs. S-kehg uhs at s-kehg wo bahithagt ch g pi kehg uhs pi kehg wo bahithagt.
42006044	Uhs o s-e mahch ab e-bahithag ab. Pi amt ab hu wo ui g suhna ho'i t ab o g uhdwis ab sha'i t ab.
42006045	K hab wa'ap masma g o'othham matp wo s-ap'ek ch s-kehg ha'ichu hab wo wuath o wo pi ap'ek ch pi kehg ha'ichu hab wo wuath. Matp has i masma ha'ichu chegito g o'othham, t hab masma wo neokath.”
42006046	Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ha'ijj am chum hekith hab ni-a'aga ‘ni-kownalig’ ch eda pi am hu hab wua mani haschu em-ahgith.
42006047	Ab g wo ni-hiwgath ch ab wo s-wohog elithath g ha'ichu ni-ahga. T hab wo s-ap'ek g em-thoakag.
42006048	Ith at heg wo wa wepok matp hems hema wo s-wihnam shondath g e-kihta. T hab pi wo i gei mat hekith wo hewed k juh k wo s-gewkam mel g shuhthagi. Pegih, mt hab wa masma s-wihnam wo gegokkath mo ihtha kih mamtp ab wo s-ni-wohog elithath.
42006049	“T wabshaba pi wo ap'ek g em-thoakag mamtp pi ab hu wo wohog ni-elithath. Ith at heg wo wa wepok matp hems hema pi wihnam wo shondath g e-kihta. T ab wo mel g shuhthagi. T ha hekaj wo i gei g kihj k am wabsh wo i e padch. Pegih, t hab wa masma wo i e padch g em-thoakag mamtp pi ab hu wo wohog ni-elithath.”
42007001	Neh, tsh am i ha'asa ha'ichu ha mashcha g Jesus amai k gm hu hahawa hih Capernaum wui. Kutsh g chuhchaij am wehmaj hihi.
42007002	Kush amai am hema d shonthal ha-ge'ejig ch ab d ha-kehsha Rome t amjed ch kah ab amjed g Jesus. Sh ith pionag hema muhkhim. Kush ab si tatchua g e-pionag ch hekaj ab ha tahni g Tutuligo ha-ge'egedga mat ab wo i wai g Jesus. T wo thoaj g piongaj.
42007004	Tsh hegam am thatha k ab si e sho'igch Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Am g i wehmt ihtha o'othham.
42007005	Ab o si t-tatchua ahchim Tutuligo ch am hema i kei g cheopi t-wehhejed.”
42007006	Kutsh gm hu ha oi g Jesus k am i aihi g kihj hegai shonthal ha-ge'ejig. Tsh heg am ha'i ha ahgi g e-naipijju matsh am wo hihim k wo ha'ichu ahgi g Jesus. Kutsh am wui hihim k hab kaij, “Bo kaij g t-nawoj, ‘Pi ani am hu hugkam d ha'ichu maps am wo i wah ni-kih ed
42007007	o manis hejel am wo hih m-wui. Am apt hab wabsh wo chea. T wo thoa g ni-pionag.
42007008	S-amichuth ani g m-gewkthag no pi g ni-ge'ejig gewkthag am ni-thahm. Ni ahni hab wa'ap gewkthag am ha thahm g ni-shonthalig ch ni-pionag. T hab wo juh mant haschu ab wo i ha chea. Ni heg hekaj s-mahch mat am hab wo e juh mapt haschu am hab wabsh wo i chei.’ Neh, bo kaij.”
42007009	Tsh g Jesus ab si has i el ab kaiok ihtha. Sh mu'i hemajkam an oithahim. Kush ab ha wui hab kaij, “Pi ani koi hebai sha'i neith mas hema ha'as ge'e ab si ni-hiwig, chum hems am ha shahgith g Tutuligo,” k am hahawa ha chea hegam mat ab thatha mat g m hu uhpam wo hihi.
42007010	Tsh am uhpam thatha k chum nei. Kutsh thoa g piongaj g shonthal ha-ge'ejig.
42007011	Kush am ba'ich d i tash. Tsh gm hu hihi hegam Jesus heg wui kihhim mash d Nain. Kutsh mu'i hemajkam ha oi.
42007012	Tsh am wabsh i chum thatha mo ab kihjeg g kolhai an wehgaj g kihhim. Sh ab g muhki e u'a. Sh g je'ej g muhki d hejel wi'ikam. K ith d si hemako madaj. Kush mu'i ha wehmaj g hemajkam ab kihhim t amjed.
42007013	Kutsh am i nei g Jesus ihtha uwi k si pi ap e taht wehhejed k hab wabsh kaij ab wui, “Pi g am shoakath,”
42007014	k ch amjed am him k an taht hegai mo an ab wo'ichug g muhki. Tsh ha hekaj gegokiwua hegam mo u'a. Kush hab hahawa kaij g Jesus, “Wechij o'othham, ab g i wamigi.”
42007015	Tsh am ha hekaj i thahiwua ihtha o'othham k ab ha hekaj wabsh neok. Tsh g Jesus am wamgith k hab ah mat gm hu wo i oi g e-je'e.
42007016	Kutsh wehsijj si e totothsith k ab si ihm g Jiosh ch hab kaij, “Ia atki hema jiwia t-shahgith g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam,” ch ha'i hab ep kaij, “Jiosh atki ia jiwia t-shahgith mat wo t-tho'ibia mattp hedai d hemajkamgaj.”
