42007017	Kutsh ihtha mat haschu has e juh an wehsko e a'aga Judea chekshani oithk ch an wehgaj.
42007018	Sh eda gd hu e kuhpach hegai John mash am ha pahl wapkonahim g hemajkam. Kush am ahgith hegam mash ab si wecho e mashchamahim mash haschu has junihim g Jesus. Tsh heg gohk ab i ha waith
42007019	k am ha cheha mat am wo hihim k ab wo kakke g Jesus mas wa woho d Jiosh si Kehsha aha nat ab hahawa hema wo i wuhsh mat d wo hegaik?
42007020	Tsh ihtham am thatha Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Ab o t-chehani g John matt ab wo m-kakke maps woho d Jiosh si Kehsha aha nat ab hahawa hema wo i wuhsh mat d wo hegaik?”
42007021	Tsh g Jesus heg i tashkaj mu'i ha thothaj g kok'otham k mu'i ha wuwhas g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch k ha-nench g pi neneatham. Kush heg wehs neith ihtham John chuhchai.
42007022	Sh hab hahawa ha ahg g Jesus, “Am g uhpam wo hihim k wo ahgi g John mam haschu i neith ch haschu i kah. Ha ani thothajith g pi ha thothajitham kok'otham ch pi neneatham ch pi hihimithkam ch pi chechkaithkam ch ha chechegitoichuth g ko'i ch am ha ahgith g sho'igkam mat g Jiosh wo ha tho'ibia.
42007023	T g Jiosh ab wo s-em-ho'ige'ithath mamtp hedai ab wabsh wo ni-hiwgath ch pi wo ni-thagito.”
42007024	Tsh am i gm hu hihi hegam John chuhchai. Sh g Jesus am ha'ichu ha ahgith g hemajkam ab amjed g John ch hab kaij, “Neh, am amt wa hihim k ab kaiha g John. K wa eda am oimmelhim pi apkokam jewed ch ed. Kumt pi woho am hu wo i wuwha wui matp d wabsh s-pehegi o'othham ch am gawul wo wuath g e-ne'oki. Pi o an a'ai e wanchkwua g John.
42007025	Kumt pi hema s-neitham mo s-kakaisim e enigadathch. Hegam mo hab masma e enigadathch o si s-kakaisim kih.
42007026	Neh, heg amt s-kaim Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam k heg wa woho kah. K g John am ba'ich ha'ichu k ed ep kehk
42007027	no pi d hegai mo ab amjed an o'ohanas mo g Jiosh hab ahg ch hab kaij: Am ant hema wo i maskogi mat am wo i ha ap'ech g hemajkam am wehhejed g si ni-Kehsha jiwhiathag am jewed thahm. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.
42007028	“Kunt wo em-ahgi mo g John wehs hemajkam ha ba'ich d i si ha'ichu am hugkam mat am i wuhsh g Jiosh kownaltalig ith thahm jewed. T hahawa chum hems g si pi ha'ichukam hemajkam am Jiosh kownaltalig ed ba'ich d wo i s-has ha'ichuk mo hegai John.”
42007029	Neh, bash kaij g Jesus. Kutsh wehs ab kaiha hegam mat ab s-wohog el g Jiosh k am e pahl wapko ab John wecho, chum hems hegam mo g lial ha kowlant g kownal wehhejed.
42007030	Tsh wabshaba pi ab hu wohog el g Jiosh tatchui pi e pahl wapkonk hegam mo d Palasi ch hegam mo d chehanig ha mashchamtham.
42007031	Kush heg hekaj hab kaij g Jesus, “Bo masma pi ta wepoma mo g a'al hegam mat pi ab hu wohog el g John k pi ab hu ni-bei.
42007032	Neh, tp hems am wo chichwith g a'al ch hab wo chei, ‘Am att em-gehgeth g e hohontam ha-piastakaj. Kumt pi e waila. Am att nei g muhki ne'i. Kumt pi sha'i shoshani.’
42007033	“Ith ani hab ahg mat g John ab i wuhshani k pi ih'e g nawait ch mu'ikko pi e gegosith ab e ho'ige'ithahunch Jiosh wui. K mu'ijj hab kaij mo g jiawul an u'ukch g chegitoithaj.
42007034	Nt ahni ia jiwia Jiosh si Kehsha k wabsh chum hedai ha wehm ni-gegosith. K mu'ijj hab kaij mani s-banma ch s-i'ithag ch d ha-nawoj g s-ta keke'ithamakam lial ha kowlanttham ch hegam mo pi ap oith g t-shohshon ha-chehanig. Neh, bo masma pi ta wepoma
42007035	ch im hu hab wabsh i juh g Jiosh amichuthadag. K wabshaba hegam mo ab s-wohochuth am chehgithch mo d wohokam.”
42007036	Tsh hema g Palasi ab i wai g Jesus mat am wo wehmaj e gegos. Tsh am hih g Jesus kihj wui k am i thahiwua mat wo e gegos.
42007037	Kush eda am hema d uwi heg eda kihhim ch si pi ap d hemajkam. Sh am thak ch e gegosith g Jesus.
42007038	Tsh ith am jiwia k am wehgaj i kekiwua am u'athch g s-ap uhw shuhthagi al s-toa hothai ha'a ch ed. Sh eda am e shelinch g Jesus mo hab masma thadhaiwup ch e gegosith. K si shoak ihtha uwi. Kush g oh'ogaj an iawua tahtadaj an. Kutsh an i thagio g che'echew e-mo'okaj k an si ha chintath k an hahawa iawua ga s-ap uhw shuhthagi tahtadaj ab.
42007039	Kush hab wabsh hejel e ahg hegai kihkam, “T wo chum s-mahchk mo si pi ap d uwi ihtha matp woho d wo Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththamk ch pi wo hiwigi mas an wo taht.”
42007040	Sh g Jesus wabsh s-mahch mo hab masma oithahim ch ab wui hab kaij, “Simon, ab ant wo ha'ichu m-ahgi.” Sh heg hab kaij, “Oi g ab ni-ahgith, ha mashchamtham.”
42007041	Kutsh g Jesus am ahgi ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha e-ahga k hab kaij, “Matp hema ab wo e wulshch g hetasp siant pihsh heg ab mo g lial ha hiwgith ch hema ab ab wo e wulshch g hetaspo wehst-mahm pihsh
42007042	k pi wo e nako mat wo uhpam namkith. Kut im hu hab wo i juh g ha-wulshpadag. Neh, t hedai ihtham ba'ich ab wo i si tatchua?”
42007043	Sh hab kaij g Simon, “Na'as hegai mamt ba'ich i mu'i im hu hab i juh g wulshpadaj.” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih,
42007044	ab g neith ihtha uwi. Ia ant jiwia m-kih am. Kupt pi ni-mah g shuhthagi mant wo i wapko g ni-tahtad. T wabshaba ihtha am i wapko g ni-tahtad g e-oh'ogkaj k am i ha thagio g che'echew e-mo'okaj.
42007045	Pi apt ab hu ni-chintath mant ia jiwia. K wabshaba ith g ni-tahtad chintath.
42007046	Pi apt ab hu i huhu g ni-mo'o. T wabshaba ith g uhw shuhthagi an iawua ni-tahtad an.
42007047	Neh, nt hab wo chei mat am ge'e chehgi mo ab si ni-tatchua. T heg am wohokamch mat g mu'i pi ap chu'ichigaj im hu hab i e juh. Hegai mam hedai pi sha'i ge'e im hu hab i wua g ha-chu'ichig o pi sha'i ge'e am hu chehgith g e-tatchuithag.”
42007048	Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus heg wui uwi, “Im ant hu hab i juh g pi ap m-chu'ichig.”
42007049	K hegam ha'i mo ab thadha mihsa wui hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “K hedai e elith ihtha ch im hu hab i chum wua g pi ap ha-chu'ichig?”
42007050	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ith wui uwi, “Ab ap ni-hiwig ch hekaj e tho'ibia. Gamai g s-ap e tahtk hihm.”
42008001	Sh amjed am hu hebai, tsh g Jesus am hih ha oithk g kihhim k am ahgahim g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig. Kush hegam gamai gohk chuhchaij am wehmaj.
42008002	Kutsh mu'i am ha oi g u'uwi. Ihtham atsh wa ha thothaj g Jesus. Kush am ha'ichukaj i ha wehmt. Hema ihtham ash d Mary Magdalene. Ith atsh g Jesus ab amjed i ha wuwhas g wewa'ak jijawul.
42008003	Kush hema d Joanna. Sh g wehmaj kihkam ihtha hab chehgig Chusa ch d ha'ichu am kownal wecho. Kush hema ehp d Susanna. Tsh ihtham u'uwi wo em-nolawt hegai mash haschu i tatchua hegam Jesus.
42008004	Kutsh mu'i hemajkam ab hihi Jesus wui ga hu a'ai kihhim amjed. Tsh am ha ahgi g Jesus ihtha wepogitha ahga:
42008005	“Nt wo ha'ichu em-mashcha ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig wepogithch mat hema an ei g ha'ichu e-kaichka e-oithag ed. T ha'i gn hu wabsh shul wohg ch ed. T g hemajkam am keish k g u'uwhig am huh.
42008006	T ha'i gn hu shul mo pi ge'ej g jewed ab waw t ab. T ab i chum wuhsh g e'es k wabsh gaksh no pi pi wadag amai.
42008007	T ha'i gn hu shul g kaichkaj sha'i ch ed. T heg am wabsh wehnathk i ge'ege k ha koktha g esha.
42008008	T wabshaba hegam mat an s-ap shul moihuna ch ed an wuhshani k siant ab kait hehemako.” Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, am g wo i a'amichuth ahpim mam kah ihtha.”
42008009	Kush g Jesus chuhchai ab kakke mas has d ahga ihtha wepogitha ahga.
42008010	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo em-ahgi mo has d ahga no pi g Jiosh em-hiwgith mamt wo s-mai hegai mo haschu hemu am maskogith ab amjed g e-kownaltalig. Ni wabshaba heg wa'i ha ahgith ha'ichu wepogitha ahga hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuthamk. T hab pi wo amich ha'ichu ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig, chum as wo ha'ichu neith k wo ha'ichu kah.”
42008011	Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, nt wo em-tashogi ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ni-ahga. Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o wepogithas mo g ha'ichu kai ch am wo e gantad hemajkam ha-i'ibthag ed.
42008012	K eda ha'i g ha-i'ibthag s-kawpk hab masma mo g wohg. K g Jiawul am wabsh s-pehegi ha wohppo'ith hegai mo haschu i kah. T hab pi ab hu wo wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k pi wo e tho'ibia.
42008013	“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag hab sha masma mo hebai pi ge'ej g jewed ab waw t ab. T ihtham wo si s-hohho'i g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab kaiok k wabshaba pi wihnam ab hu wo bebhe k ch ab hi wa al he'es wo s-wohochuthath. T ab wabsh wo i chum hih g a'appema. T ha hekaj wabsh wo ta'i i shul.
42008014	“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag hab sha masma mo hebai s-sha'ig no pi e sha'ijithch heg hekaj kudutadag ch s-kaisthag ch s-tahhathkam. Kut pi ha'ichu hab wo juh am Jiosh wehhejed.
42008015	“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag s-moik hab masma mo g moihuna. Kut ab wo kaiha g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k am wo si i nuhkuth e-ihbthag ed k am wo e nako mat am hab ha'ichu wo juh Jiosh wehhejed.
42008016	“Wohokam o wepogithas mo g lahmpa tonlig. Namt hig wo ehsto g lahmpa ab mehithk aha namt an wo thai mat hebai wo em-tonlithch. Pegih, mt hab wa masma pi wo chum ehsto g wohokam.
42008017	Wehs at wo s-e mai matp haschu chum e ehstokch. T haschu wo i chum e ma'ishchith wo e chehg k am wo i e wuhshath.
42008018	“Am g wo s-amichuth mam haschu i kah. Hegam mat s-ap wo hekaj g e-ap'ethag at ba'ich ep wo i nei. T wabshaba hegam mat pi ap wo hekaj wabsh wo heb hu wua.”
42008019	Tsh am chum thatha g Jesus je'e ch wepngaj. Sh wabshaba si mu'ij g hemajkam an wehgaj. Kutsh pi e nako matsh ab wo miabi.
42008020	Sh hema hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “M-je'e ch m-wepnag o am gegok jeg ed s-m-neithamkch.”
42008021	Sh hab ahg g Jesus, “Neh, ihtham mo ab ni-kaiham ch ab s-wohog elith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o heg wa wepo mo d ni-je'e ch ni-wepnag.”
42008022	Sh am hu hebai hab ha ahg g Jesus g e-chuhchai, “Am att hu hig shuhthagi aigojed wo i chehchsh.” Tsh wa woho am thadhaiwua wahlko ch ed k am gahi i shul.
42008023	Sh am hebai him g wahlko shuhthagi ch ed. Tsh g Jesus am i wo'iwua k koi. Kutsh g hewel ab haha wabsh i meh. Tsh ab i to'otonkai g shuhthagi k am iawua wahlko ch ed mash s-ta ehbitham hab mahs ha wehhejed.
42008024	Kutsh g chuhchaij am wui thatha g Jesus k am wuhan k hab kaij, “T-mashchamtham, ttki wo t-ko'ij.” Tsh am i wami g Jesus k ab si cheha g hewel ch shuhthagi to'otonk. Tsh am i wehs ha'asa k gm hu wabsh i pi shahmuni.
42008025	Sh hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui, “Ab g wabsh wo ni-hiwgath.” Kutsh eda si has i elith k si s-ehbeni k ash hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Kus hedai wud ihtha o'othham ch ab si chehani g hewel ch to'otonk mat wo ha'asa. K ab s-wohog elith.”
42008026	Tsh am hihim k gm hu thatha ga hu aigojed g Galilee shuhthagi heg maibithch kihhim mash d Geresa.
42008027	Kush am hema oimmed g cheoj jeg ed ch am chum kih heg eda kihhim. Sh wabshaba g jijawul an u'ukch g chegitoithaj. Kush gn hu wabsh kih mash an chehchog ch an e hihashp g ko'i. Kutsh ab i hud g Jesus.
42008028	Tsh ith am chehg k si s-kaitham hihnk ch ab i meh pi ha'ichu enigadathch mash hab wa chu'ig k ab wui i gehsh k si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Jesus, alithaj g si uhgk Jiosh, gam g hu hihm k pi ko'okam has ni-juhni.”
42008029	Bash kaij nash pi g Jesus ab si ha chehani g jijawul mat ab wo i wuwha amjed. Kush wa eda g jijawul mu'ikko an bebhe ihtha. Kumsh gd hu chum si kukpathch ch g kakhioj ch nohnhoij g e hukshchim wapainomikaj gn hu si wupulshp. Kush wabsh ha wanikumiak g e hukshchim wapainomi. Tsh g jiawul gm hu wo i wushshath tohono jewed ch ed.
42008030	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Shahp chehgig?” Sh hab kaij, “Bani chehgig Mu'ichu,” nash pi mu'i jijawul an u'ukch.
42008031	Tsh g jijawul ab si e sho'igch Jesus wui matsh pi am hu wo ha shul Jiawul kih ed.
42008032	Sh eda mu'i an oiopo g kokji kawulk bahsho ch e gegosith. Sh ihtham jijawul ab si tahni g Jesus matsh am wo ha thagito. Tsh am wo i wahp ha eda ihtham kokji. Tsh am ha hiwigi g Jesus.
42008033	Tsh ab i wuwha ab amjed g o'othham k am i wahp ha eda g kokji. Kutsh wehsijj ihtham kokji am agshp i wohp k gm hu shul shuhthagi ch ed k wachkk.
42008034	Tsh hegam mo am ha nuhkuth gm hu uhpam wohp k am ahgahim ihtha kihhim ch ed ch an ha oithk hegam mo an o'oithag.
42008035	Tsh g hemajkam am himto mat wo nei mat haschu has e juh. Kush ihtha o'othham am thaha Jesus wui ch ab e enigadathch ch wabsh si s-ap ha'ichu chegito. Kutsh wabsh woho'i e totoths.
42008036	Kush hegam mash neith am ha ahgith mat has masma e thoaj ihtha o'othham.
42008037	Kush wehsijj ihtham Geresa t am hemajkam ab ahgith g Jesus mat gm hu wo hih ab ha amjed natsh pi sha'i si s-ehbeni. Tsh wa woho hab e juh k an thahiwua wahlko ch ed mat gm hu wo hih.
42008038	Kutsh hegai o'othham matsh ab i wuwha g jijawul amjed ab si e sho'igch Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Nt wo m-oi.” K wabshaba g Jesus hab ahg,
42008039	“Uhpam g hihm k am wo i ha ahgithahi mat haschu hab juh g Jiosh m-wehhejed.” Tsh wa woho hab e juh k am i ahgahi kihhim oithk matsh haschu si ge'e hab juh g Jesus am wehhejed.
42008040	Tsh ga hu aigojed hahawa ep thatha hegam Jesus. Kush mu'i hemajkam am nenida ch si s-ap i e taht k ab i nei.
42008041	Tsh am hema jiwia g o'othham k hab chehgig Jairus ch wabsh d ha'ichu am cheopi ch ed. Sh ith chehiaga muhkhim ch d gamai gohk a'ahithag. Kutsh ab wecho si i gei g Jesus k ab ahgith matsh gm hu wo oi kihj wui. Tsh gm hu chum wehmaj hih g Jesus. Tsh g hemajkam am wabsh kawod him k gn hu wabsh i biha.
42008043	Kush eda am hema ha'ichug g uwi ch gamai gohk a'ahithag mumku heg hekaj mo g eh'edaj jegwoni. Tsh pi hedai e nako mas wo thoaj, chum as wehs hugio g e-lialiga ha namkithch g mamakai.
42008044	Kutsh ab i hih Jesus wehgaj k an taht g kahbaj hugithag. Kutsh am wabsh si ha'asa g eh'ed jegwoni.
42008045	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Thoht an ni-taht.” Tsh pi hedai am hu e ah. Sh hab hahawa kaij g Peter, “T-mashchamtham, an o m-bihagch g hemajkam ch ab m-shodbinch.”
42008046	Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab at hema ni-taht. Ni s-mahch nat pi ab i wuhsh g gewkthag ab ni-amjed.”
42008047	Tsh am i nei hegai uwi mamt s-mai k ab hahawa i him k si gigiwek ch ab i gei Jesus wecho amai hemajkam ha tahgio k ash am ahgith g Jesus mat haschu ahgk ab taht k has masma ha hekaj thoa.
42008048	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pegih, ni-uwiga, am apt wa thoa napt pi ab i ni-hiw. Gamai g s-ap e tahtk hihm k am wabsh s-thoakath.”
42008049	Kush hab wabsh kia kaij ihtha g Jesus. Tsh ab hema mel ab kihj amjed g Jairus k ash hab kaij, “Muh at g m-chehiaga. Kupt pi am hu ep wo kudu g ha mashchamtham.”
42008050	Kutsh kah g Jesus k hab kaij ab wui g Jairus, “Pi g am sha'i e tothsith. Ab g wabsh i ni-hiwig. Kut wabsh wo e chegito.”
42008051	Kutsh gd hu thatha kihj am. Tsh hegam wa'i ha ui g Jesus Peter ch James ch John ch hegam jehjij g chehia. Tsh am e wehm i wahp.
42008052	Kush eda wehsijj shoani ch pi ap e tahtk wehhejed g chehia. Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi g am wo shoanith. Heg o wa wepo ni-wehhejed mo wabsh kohsh g chehia.”
42008053	Kush wabsh has ahg hegam nash pi si s-mahch mat muh.
42008054	Tsh wabshaba g Jesus ab bei nowij ab k ab si neok wui ch hab kaij, “I wamigi, chehia.”
42008055	Kutsh uhpam e chegito k ha hekaj i wami. Sh g Jesus am ha chehani mat wo ha'ichu mah. T wo huh.
42008056	Tsh hegam jehjij am wabsh e totoths matsh e chegito. Sh g Jesus am ha ahgith mat pi hedai wo ha ahgi mat haschu has e juh.
42009001	Am hu hebai, tsh am i ha wai g Jesus g e-chuhchai. Tsh am wui i e hemapai. Kutsh ab ha mah g gewkthag mat gm hu wo i ha wuwhas g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch k wo ha thothaj g kok'otham
42009002	k am hahawa ha cheha mat am wo i ahgahi ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.
42009003	Pi atsh koi hihi, sh hab ha ahg, “Gm amt wabsh wo i hihim k pi ha'ichu wo u'uk, chum hems pi g cheowikud nih g limoshan kostal nih g ha'ichu hugi nih g lial nih chum hems hema ep lihwa.
42009004	Am amt wo thadkkath heg kih am mat hedai i si s-ap ab wo i em-nei am hugkam mamt hekith wo i hihi ab amjed hegai kihhim.
42009005	Kutp hebai pi ap ab hu wo i em-nei g hemajkam, mt am wo thagito hegai kihhim k ab wo si shahmuth g e-shuhshk mamt wo ha chehgi mamt wo ha thagito k pi wo ha ahgi ab amjed g Jiosh.”
42009006	Tsh wa woho am hihi ihtham chuhchaij ha oithk g kihhim k am ahgahim g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ha thoajith g hemajkam wehsko.
42009007	Sh eda g Herod am wabsh kia d kownal Galilee ch ed ch am i kah wehs ihtha mash haschu has e wua. Am amsh wehsko a'aga mas hedai wud ihtha Jesus. Ha'ijj ash hab kaij, “Thoki hegai Johnbad mo wa ha pahl wapkonahim. Heg amt mua. Kutki wabshaba uhpam e chegito.”
42009008	Kush ha'ijj hab kaij, “Thoki Elijabad o hema ep hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.” Kutsh wa g Herod am i pi e amichuth
42009009	k hab kaij, “Am ant wa ha cheha mat an e hikuch g John mo'o. Kus hedai wud ihtha o'othham mani mu'i ha'ichu kah ab amjed?” bash kaij ch wabsh am chum i e nakog mat wo nei g Jesus.
42009010	Tsh am hu hebai am i uhpam thatha g Jesus chuhchai k am ahgith g Jesus wehs ha'ichu mat haschu has i juh. Tsh gm hu hahawa i ha ui matsh gm hu hejelko hasko hihi maibithch hegai kihhim mo hab chehgig Bethsaida.
42009011	Tsh am i kah g hemajkam k am i ha oi s-neithamk g Jesus. Tsh g Jesus si s-ap ab i ha neith k am ha ahgi ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig k ha thothaj g kok'otham.
42009012	Kutsh gm hu i juh. Tsh g chuhchaij am thatha wui k hab kaij, “Am g ha chehani g hemajkam mat am wo hihi kihhim wui o am hasko o'oithag wui k wo bei g ha'ichu hugi k an hasko wo kohk heg hekaj mo ia hu wabsh si heb hu iia.”
42009013	Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ahpim amt wo ha'ichu ha mah mat wo huh.” Sh hab kaij ihtham, “Heg ach wa'i hetasp pahn ch gohk waptopi edgith. Aha nap tatchua matt am wo hihim k wo ha nolawt g ha'ichu hugi ha wehhejed ihtham mu'i hemajkam?”
42009014	Kush eda sha'i mu'ij g hemajkam mash hetasp mihl d chechoj. Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Hab g wo ha ahgith g hemajkam mat wo thadhaiwua hehetaspo wepst-mahm e wehm.”
42009015	Tsh wa woho hab e juh g chuhchaij. Kutsh wehsijj am i thadhaiwua.
42009016	Tsh g Jesus am ha ui hegam hetasp pahn ch gohk waptopi k ab i nea thahm kahchim wui k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am hahawa hahain k ab ha mah g e-chuhchai. Tsh ihtham ab i ha mahkhi g hemajkam.
42009017	Tsh wehsijj e gegosith k kokwoth. Tsh g chuhchaij an i u'ihi g ha wihpi'ithag g hemajkam ahim matsh wo shuhshuth g gamai gohk hoha.
42009018	Sh am hu hebai am hejelko e ho'ige'ithahun g Jesus. Tsh am wui thatha g chuhchaij. Kutsh am ha'asa e ho'ige'ithahun k hab kaij, “Thoh'o ni-elith g hemajkam?”
42009019	Sh hab kaij hegam, “Ha'ijj o hab kaij map d ha-wapkontham, Johnbad. K ha'ijj hab kaij map d Elijabad. K ha'ijj hab ep kaij map d hema ehp hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch ia uhpam e chegito.”
42009020	Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Kum ahpim hedai ni-elith?” Sh hab kaij g Peter, “Bach m-elith map d Jiosh si Kehsha!”
42009021	Sh hab kaij, “Thani ahni. Kumt wabshaba pi hedai wo sha'i ahgi hemu mani hedai wud.
42009022	Wehpeg at hemho wo wa ni-bei g ge'eged ch u'ugchu papal ch chehanig em-mashchamtham ahni Jiosh si Kehsha k mu'i wo ni-sho'igchuth k am wo i ni-thagito mant wo ni-muhkith. Nt wabshaba uhpam wo i wuhsh muhkig amjed heg eda waik tash amjed mamt wo ni-mua.”
42009023	Sh hab hahawa ep kaij ab wehsijj ha wui, “Mamtp am wo s-oitham g ni-himthag k hemho wa gm hu wo thagito g hejel e-tatchui k ahni ni-tatchui hab wo junihith ni-wehhejed e sho'igchuthch. Heg at wo wa wepok mam ab mohto g kots ch ab ab wo e muhkith.
42009024	Pi amt wo heki wua g e-thoakag mamtp wo hekaj am ni-wehhejed. Heg at wo heki wua g e-thoakag matp hedai wo chum s-tha'ath.
42009025	“Pi at ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk matp g o'othham wehs wo bei hegai mo haschu i tatchua ith thahm jewed k wabshaba pi wo e tho'ibia.
42009026	Pi g am wo si e elithath ni-hekaj ahni Jiosh si Kehsha ch hekaj g ni-mashchamadag. Nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo si ni-elithath em-hekaj mant hekith ia ep wo jiwia. Ithani at si s-tondam ab wo e chehgi g ni-gewkthag ch ni-ohg gewkthag ch ha-gewkthag g s-ap'ekam anghil.
42009027	Neh, ia am ha'i ha'ichug mamt ho'ip kia nei g Jiosh kownaltalig k haha wo ko'ok. Am g wo s-chegitok mani ith am em-ahgith.”
42009028	Sh am hu d i hemako thomig amjed mash hab kaij ihtha. Kutsh g Jesus gn hu wo e ho'ige'ithahu uhgk tho'ag t ab k ab i ha wai hegam Peter ch John ch James matsh gn hu wehmaj wo i chehchsh. Kutsh gn hu thatha heg thahm tho'ag.
42009029	Tsh am i e ho'ige'ithahu g Jesus k atsh am gawul i e juh. Tsh g wehschugaj hab e juh mash si s-tondam s-tohta.
42009030	Tsh haha wabsh am wehmaj i e chehgi g Mosesbad ch Elijabad.
42009031	Kush g Jiosh gewkthag ab ha ab e chehgith hab masma mo g tonlig. Sh ihtham am wehmaj a'aga g Jesus matsh pi sha'i tash amjed am hab wo e juh hegai matsh haschu g Jiosh am ap'ech matsh wo muh am Jerusalem t am.
42009032	Sh eda hegam Peter sha'i si gewpkog ch s-kohksim ch wabshaba ab si i nehnea k nei g Jesus ch hegam gohk o'othham mash am wehmaj gegok.
42009033	Tsh gm hu wo hihi hegam gohk. Tsh g Peter wabsh kohsh k tha'iwuni k hab kaij, “T-mashchamtham, s-ap'e oki mach ia ha'ichug. Tt ia waik hab wo em-juni g al chechopi matt hekaj ab wo si has em-el ahpi ch Mosesbad ch Elijabad.”
42009034	Tsh g chewagi ab i wuhsh mash eda wabsh kia neok g Peter k ab ehka ha thahm. Kutsh si s-ehbeni hegam Peter matsh ab i hud g chewagi.
42009035	Tsh g Jiosh ne'oki ab kaitha chewagi t amjed k hab kaij, “Jesus o d si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag. Heg amt ab wo si kaihamath.”
42009036	Sh am hahawa hejel kehk g Jesus. Kush pi am hu ha'ichug hegam gohk. Sh hegam Peter pi hedai sha'i ha'ichu ahgith ia'i ithani hegai mash haschu i neith.
42009037	Sh am ba'ich d i tash. Tsh ab hahawa i huhud tho'ag t amjed. Kush sha'i mu'i hemajkam am nenida g Jesus ch ab nam.
42009038	Kush hema si s-kaitham neok ch hab kaij, “Ha mashchamtham, ith o d wa'i ni-alithag m ia kehk.
42009039	K g jiawul an bebhe ch am si hihnk ch am i wuhpa jewedo. K g totshagi i chechshshaj chinij ab. S-ko'okam o has wua g jiawul ch chum alo pi thathagitosh.
42009040	Kuni ab wa chum si ha ahgith g m-pionag mat gm hu hab wo i juh. T wabshaba pi e nako.”
42009041	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g e-chuhchai, “Sho'o wa'i pi ge'ej g em-wohochuthadag. M im hu hab wabsh i si e juhkch ab ni-amjed. Shahag wepo mant hemho wa tash ia wo em-wehmajkath ch ab wo em-nakogath mat hekaj wo i ge'etha.” Bash kaij ch am hahawa ahgi hegai o'othham, “Ab g i beka'i g e-alithag.”
42009042	Sh ab chum him g ali. Sh haha wabsh ep i wua hegai jiawul am jewedo. Kush am si banimmed. Tsh g Jesus ab si s-keh'el g jiawul k i wuhshath k am hahawa bei g al k ab i wanim ohgaj wui.
42009043	Kutsh wehsijj si e totoths g hemajkam mat g Jiosh hab masma am i chehgi g e-gewkthag k ab si has elith wehs hegai mo g Jesus hab junihim. Sh g Jesus hab kaij ab ha wui g e-chuhchai,
42009044	“Am g wo s-chegitok ihtha mant am wo em-ahgi. E o aihim mat g s-ni-keh'iththam an wo ni-bei ahni Jiosh si Kehsha k am wo ni-gagda ha wui g haha'ichu.”
42009045	Kush pi sha'i amichuth mas haschu hab ahg ch wabshaba s-ehbith mas ab wo kakke.
42009046	Sh am hu hebai am e ne'owin hegam Jesus chuhchai mas hedai d wo si ha'ichuk.
42009047	Kush g Jesus s-ha amichuth mo haschu am chegito ch heg hekaj g al ali ab i kei e-hugith an
42009048	k ash hab kaij ab ha wui, “Hegai mat hedai am ni-wehhejed s-ap ab wo neithath g al ali ch hab wa'ap s-ap ab ni-neith. Kutp hedai s-ap ab wo ni-neithath ch hab wa'ap s-ap ab neith g Jiosh nani pi d Kehshaj. Hegai mo hedai i si pi e ha'ichuchuth am em-shahgith o d si ha'ichu.”
42009049	Sh am hu hebai g John hab kaij, “T-mashchamtham, hema ach neith g o'othham. K heg am m-chehcheg ch gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch. Kuch hab ahg mat wo ha'asa no pi pi am hu t-wehmaj.”
42009050	Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo sha'i shohbith. Tki wo i em-wehmt hegai matp hedai pi ab hu em-wui kehk.”
42009051	Kush s-mahch g Jesus mo e aihim mat g Jiosh am wo uhpam i bei e-kihthag wui ch heg hekaj am i e shelch mat am wo hih Jerusalem wui k am wo i e nako.
42009052	Sh am hihimath ch am hema miabith g kihhim Samaria chekshani ch ed. Kutsh g Jesus am ha'i ha cheha g e-chuhchai matsh ha ba'ich wo hihim k wo bei g koksikud ch ha'ichu hugi. Kutsh ihtham ha e juh.
42009053	Tsh wabshaba am i s-mai hegam hemajkam mash d gm hu himtham g Jesus Jerusalem wui k heg hekaj pi hohho'i mat am wo jiwia nash pi pi ha hohho'ith g Jerusalem t am hemajkam.
42009054	Kutsh hekith g James ch John am i s-mai mo pi hohho'ith k hab kaij, “T-kownalig, nap tatchua matt ab wo i tai g Jiosh. T ab wo i huduni g mei k wo ha koktha?”
42009055	Sh g Jesus si s-gewkam ha shohbith.
42009056	Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hihi hema ep kihhim wui.
42009057	Sh am hu hebai hihim. Kush hema g o'othham hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Ni-nahtokch ani ahni mant wo i m-oith k wo i m-wehmt.”
42009058	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Napt hig wo e nako? Neh, chum o hems g gagso ge wahpagga ch g u'uwhig ge koksh. Ni wabshaba ahni Jiosh si Kehsha pi sha'i ha kih ia jewed thahm. K heg hekaj s-hasig maps wo ni-oithath.”
42009059	Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus ab hema wui g o'othham, “Oi g ni-oith.” Kush wabshaba hab kaij, “Heu'u, ni-kownalig. T ho'ipki hekith muh g ni-ohg. Nt wo hiashpok haha wo m-oi.”
42009060	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Am g ha hiwgith hegam mo pi u'ukch g wechij thoakag mat wo ha hiash g ko'i. Pt ahpi hi am wo him k wo i ahgahi ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.”
42009061	Sh hema hab ep kaij g o'othham, “Ni-kownalig, am ant wo i m-oith k wabshaba wehpeg wo hih uhpam k an wehs wo i ha neithok g ni-hajuni.”
42009062	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Neh, nat hig shelinim wo moihunath hegai mat hedai am uhpam wo nea amai mo hebaijed him? Pegih, t hab wa masma pi ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk am Jiosh kownaltalig ed hegai mat am uhpam wo nea.”
42010001	Tsh amjed g Jesus am ha'i ep i ha chuhcha wewa'akko gamai gohk matsh go'ogok e wehm wo ahgahi g ha'ichu ahgaj am ha oithch hegam kihhim matsh hebai ap'ech matsh am epai wo hih.
42010002	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Neh, mu'ij o hegam mo e nahtokch mat wo e tho'ibia. Kuch eda pi mu'ij ahchim mach am ha ahgithahim g tho'ibiathag ahga. Ith o heg wa wepo mat hebai g ha-hihka wo si ge'ejk. T g ha-pionag pi wo mu'ijk. Ab g wo si tahnith g Jiosh mat mu'i wo i ha chuhcha mat am wo ha ahgithahith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ch ab wo i ha ba'ihamath hegam mo e nahtokch.
42010003	“Neh, bat masma wo s-ta ehbithamak g hemajkam am em-wehhejed mat g shesh'e am ha wehhejed g kahwal mahmad.
42010004	Mt wabshaba pi ha'ichukaj wo e kudut k pi ha'ichu wo u'ath nih g ha'ichu eniga nih chum hems g lial. Jiosh at hab wo ha juh g hemajkam mat wo em-thagio'i. Am amt wo s-e hohtmagi kihhim wui k pi hedai wo hiwigi mas wo em-shohbi wohg ch ed.
42010005	“Kumt hebai wo thatha ha-kih am k am hab wo chei, ‘Jiosh o ab em-makiog g s-ap tahhathkam.’
42010006	Kut s-ap ab wo i em-nei matp ab wo s-em-wohoch k ab wo i em-wahpki mamt am wo thadkkath. Kumt pi has wo elith k am wo thadkkath ch wo e gegosithath ch an wo i ha ahgithahith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh am hugkam mamt gm hu wo hihi ab amjed hegai kihhim. Chikpantham o ab d wuikam mat ab wo bei g e-nam-kithadag. K ihtham d ha wuikam mat am hab wo juh. Pi amt inhas wo wahpkith k am wo thadkkath am hugkam mamt ep wo ba'ich hihi.
42010008	Kut hebai g hemajkam s-ap ab wo i em-nei kihhim ch ed, mt wo huh mat haschu wo i em-gegos
42010009	k wo ha thoaj g kok'otham k wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat ab i ha miabi g Jiosh kownaltalig.
42010010	“Kut hebai pi ap ab hu wo i em-nei g hemajkam, mt am wo i wuwha kahya ch ed
42010011	k ab wo si i shahmuth g e-shuhshk k hab wo chei, ‘Ith att hekaj am wo em-chehgi matt wo em-thagito. Mt wabshaba wo s-chegitok mat ab i chum em-miabi g Jiosh kownaltalig.’
42010012	Neh, hegam si pi ap'ekam hemajkam mash wa am kihkahim Sodom kihhim ch ed at wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag mat hekith wo e ai g ge'e lothaita tash. T wabshaba ba'ich wo i s-ko'okam e namkith hegam mat pi ab hu wo em-kaiha.
42010013	“Mu'i s-hasig ha'ichu ant am hab juh Korasin ch Bethsaida kihhim ch ed. Kutki eda g hemajkam amai pi ab hu ni-wohoch. T heg hekaj ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag ge'e lothaita tash ch ed. Hegam mo am kih Tyre ch Sidon kihhim t am ch pi ge'e mahch ab amjed g Jiosh at pi am hu hugkam wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. Tp hems ab wo i e sho'igchuth k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi matp wo nei ihtha s-hasig ha'ichu.
42010015	Capernaum t am hemajkam o ab si e haschuth. T wabshaba g Jiosh gm hu wo i ha shul jiawul kih ed.”
42010016	Sh hab ep kaij ab e-chuhchai ha wui, “Heg o wa wepo mo ahni ab ni-kaiham hegai matp hedai ab wo em-kaiha. Kut ahni s-ni-ohhoth matp hedai wo s-em-ohhoth. Kutp hedai wo s-ni-ohhoth k hab wa'ap s-ohhoth g Jiosh nani pi d kehshaj.”
42010017	Tsh woho gm hu hihi hegam wewa'akko gamai gohk. Tsh am hebai i cheka. Tsh am i uhpam thatha k sha'i si s-hehgig ch hab kaij, “T-kownalig, chum hems g jijawul ab s-t-wohog elith mach am m-chechcheg ch ab si ha chehani mat gm hu hab wo i e juh.”
42010018	“Heu'u, nat pi hegai mo d ha-ge'ejig ch d Satan heb hu wua g e-gewkthag,” bash kaij g Jesus. “Neith ani mat ab i gei Jiosh kihthag amjed hab sha masma mat g wepgi.
42010019	Neh, ab ant em-mah g gewkthag mamt wo e nako mamt am wabsh wo ha keish g kohk'oi ch nanakshel ch wehs g gewkthag g ge Jiawul. Kut pi wo sha'i s-ko'okam em-juh.
42010020	Mt wabshaba pi heg hekaj wo s-hehgigk mo g jijawul ab s-em-wohog elith. Heg amt hekaj wo s-hehgigk mo gn hu o'ohanas g em-chechgig Jiosh kihthag an mam d e tho'ibiakam.”
42010021	Kutsh ia'i ithani g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab mah g Jesus g si ge'e s-hehgig. Kush am e ho'ige'ithahun ch hab kaij, “Ni-ohg Jiosh, thap kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. K hab d m-elitha mat pi hedai wo e nako mas hejel wo s-amich g ha'ichu m-ahga. E o ehstokch ab ha amjed g s-chu a'amichuththam. Kup wabshaba am ha chehgith ihtham mo ha'ichu s-mahchimk hab masma mo g a'al. Ni heg hekaj ab si m-ho'ige'ith.”
42010022	Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch am hahawa ha ahgith g hemajkam, “Ni-ohg Jiosh at ab ni-mah wehs ha'ichu. Pi o hedai ni-mahch ch hegai wa'i ni-ohg s-ni-mahch. K pi hedai mahch g ni-ohg. Ni ahni wa'i s-mahch ch hegam ehp mani hedai i wui tashogith.”
42010023	Tsh am hahawa i e hejelko hegam Jesus. Kush hab ha ahg, “Tho si s-ap tahhathkam mam am neith ch kah ihtha mam haschu i neith ch kah.
42010024	Mu'ijj g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch kokownalbad o wa chum s-neithamk hegai mam haschu i neith ch chum s-kaimk mam haschu i kah.”
42010025	Tsh am hu hebai am hema jiwia g chehanig ha mashchamtham k wabsh chum heki s-himchutham g Jesus hab kaijch, “Ha mashchamtham, shahnt wo ni-juh. T hekaj ab wo i ni-wahki g Jiosh e-kihthag ed?”
42010026	Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Nap hig pi mahch mo has chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed heg amjed.”
42010027	Sh hab kaij hegai o'othham, “Heu'u. Bo chu'ig: Matt hemho wa ab wo si pihk t-elithath t-kownalig Jiosh wui wehs t-ihbthagkaj ch ith am wo chehgithch wehs t-thoakagkaj ch wehs t-gewkthagkaj ch wehs t-chegitoithagkaj. K hab ep chu'ig: Matt hemho wa ab wo si pihk t-elithath t-nawoj wui hab masma mach has i masma hejel t-wehhejed si pihk t-elith.”
42010028	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Heg o wud. Kut s-ap ab wo i m-wahki maptp heg am hab wo junihith.”
42010029	Kush ihtha o'othham s-mahch mo pi am hu hab junihim hegai chehanig ch wabshaba gm hu wabsh chum s-e oanamk ch ash ab kakke g Jesus, “K hedai d ni-nawoj?”
42010030	Sh g Jesus am ahgith ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga, “Neh, matp hems am hema hih g t-wehm Tuhligo Jerusalem t amjed gm hu Jerico wui. T am haha wabsh g s-chu e'eskam am cheggia k ehs g ha'ichu enigaj k gewichkwua k chum alo mua.
42010031	K am wo'o. “T ab haha wabsh g pahl hema hih wohg oithch k nei mo am wo'o ihtha o'othham k gm hu wabsh mehk him k an bij.
42010032	T hab wa masma g papal ha wehm chikpantham ab hema him k am nei hegai o'othham mo am wo'o k gm hu wabsh bijim k gm hu hih.
42010033	T g hema Samaria t am o'othham am hahawa him k cheh ihtha o'othham. Kum ab a'ai s-e keh'ith g Samaria t am hemajkam ha wehm. T eda ihtha si s-ho'ige'ith
42010034	k ab i wako g eh'ed g nawaitkaj k ab i huhud k an i hobino g ikuskaj k an hahawa thai e-shoiga an k gm hu i bei kihhim wui mat am hebai wo ha nuhkuthach.
42010035	“K am ba'ich d i tash. T gm hu wo hih ihtha o'othham k wabshaba ab ha'i ha mah g lial mat wo nuhkuth k hab ha ah, ‘Am g wo nuhkuth. Kunt ia ep wo jiwia k wo wa em-namkith mamt haschu ba'ich wo i heki gei wehhejed.’
42010036	“Neh, kup hedai hab elith ihtham waik mo s-ap d nawojij hegai mamt gewichkwua?”
42010037	Sh hab kaij hegai chehanig ha mashchamtham, “Hegai mo s-ho'ige'ith.” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, gamai g hihm k am hab e junihith hab masma.”
42010038	Sh amjed am hebai hihim ihtham Jesus ch am thatha hema kihhim t am. Sh am hema g uwi hab chehgig Martha ch ab i ha wahpki e-kih ed.
42010039	Kush am wehmaj thaha g wehngaj ch hab chehgig Mary ch ith ab i thahiwua Jesus wui k ab si kaiham g ha'ichu mashchamaj.
42010040	Sh eda g Martha si chikpan ch e kudut k am jiwia Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig, nap pi sha'i has elith mat g ni-wehnag am wabsh i ni-thagito mant hejel hab wo juh g chikpan. Ab g ahgith mat ab wo i him k wo i ni-wehmt.”
42010041	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ih, Martha, mu'i ap ha'ichukaj e kudut.
42010042	K eda am d wa'i hemako ha'ichu mo d si ha'ichu. Ith at g Mary ab bei. Kut pi wo sha'i e wohppo'ithach.”
42011001	Sh am hu hebai e ho'ige'ithahun g Jesus ch am i kuhgit. Sh hema hab kaij g chuhchaij ab wui, “T-kownalig, oi g hig t-mashcham matt has masma wo t-ho'ige'ithahu hab masma mo wa g John ha mashcham hegam mo ab si wecho e mashcham.”
42011002	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ith amt hab wo chei am e ho'ige'ithahunch: Jiosh t-ohg, ab ach si has m-elith ch si ha'ichuchuth g m-chehgig ch tatchua mapt wo i ge'ethaj g e-kownaltalig ia t-shahgith.
42011003	Ab g i s-t-ho'ige'ith k ab wo t-mahkath g ha'ichu hugi wehs tashkaj.
42011004	Gam g hu hab i juhni g pi ap t-chu'ichig nach pi ahchim gm hu pi chechegitod g ha-chu'ichig hegam mat hedai i pi ap has chu'i ab t-wui. Pi g am hiwgith g Jiawul mas am wo t-shul pi ap'ekam ch ed.”
42011005	Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui hegam mo ab si wecho e mashcham, “Neh, tp hems hema pi am hu ge'e wo ha'ichu hugik. T am hema mehkjed wo jiwia hudunk ab mat ab i chehgim. Kut am wo hih g kihkam e-hugith am kihkam wui k ab wo ha'i tai g sismito mat wo gegos g e-nawoj.
42011007	“T hab haha wabsh wo chum chei g hugithaj am kihkam, ‘Pi g ia hu ni-kudut. Heki ant hu ab yahwidath g ni-kihjeg. Kutt heki hu wohpiwua g t-a'aliga ha wehm. Nt pi wo i wamig k wo m-mah ha'ichu.’
42011008	“T wabshaba pi has wo e elith k ab wabsh wo kia tahnith. T am haha wo i wamig k ab wo mah nat pi pi ha'asa ab wo tahnith.
42011009	“Pegih, mt ahpim hab wa masma pi ha'asa ab wo tahnith g Jiosh mam haschu i tatchua. T ab wo em-mah. Am g wo ha'ichu i e gahgithath. T wo em-chehgi. Ab g wo shontpag g kihjeg. T ab wo i e kuhpi'o em-wehhejed.
42011011	“Neh, s-mahch am mat pi hedai wabsh g wamad ab wo mah g e-alithag mat g watopi ab wo tai.
42011012	Kut pi wabsh g nakshel ab wo mah mat g chuchul nonha ab wo tai.
42011013	Mam has i masma pi ap'e ch wabshaba s-mahch mamt g s-kehg ha'ichu ab wo ha mah g e-a'aliga. No hig pi g em-ohg Jiosh ba'ich i e nahtokch mat ab wo ha mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hegam mat ab wo tai.”
42011014	Sh am hu hebai hema pi ha neok g cheoj nash pi g jiawul an u'ukch. Kutsh g Jesus gm hu hab i juh g jiawul. Tsh am ha hekaj i neo. Tsh g hemajkam si has i el.
42011015	Sh eda ha'i hab kaij, “Moki g jijawul ha-ge'ejig ab mahkch g gewkthag. K heg hekaj gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.”
42011016	Sh ha'ijj wabsh chum heki s-himchuthamk g Jesus ch ab chehani mat g s-hasig ha'ichu hab wo juh k hekaj am wo ha chehgi mo ab Jiosh t amjed.
42011017	Sh wabshaba g Jesus s-mahch mo haschu am chegito ch hab kaij ab ha wui, “S-mahch am mat g o'othham wo padch g hejel e-jewedga mat ab a'ai wo e cheggia. Kut g e-wehm kihkam hab wa'ap wo padch g hejel e-kihthag mat ab a'ai wo e cheggia.
42011018	Pegih, t has hig masma g Jiawul pi wo padch g hejel e-kownaltalig matp ab wo sha ni-mah g gewkthag mant am wo i ha wuwhas g piongaj?
42011019	Neh, em-pionag o hab wa'ap i ha wuwhasith g jijawul. Kum eda pi hab masma hab ha elith mo g Jiawul ab ha mahkch g gewkthag. Pegih, ihtham at wo em-ahgi mo pi woho hegai mam hab chum elith.
42011020	Jiosh gewkthagkaj ani gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul. K ith am wohokamchuth mat heki hu in i wuhsh g Jiosh kownaltalig em-shahgith.
42011021	“Nat hig pi wo e nahtokch g si s-gegoki kownal g e-cheggiakudkaj mat wo nuhkuth g e-kih. T hab pi hedai wo wohppo'i g ha'ichu enigaj.
42011022	Tp wabshaba g ba'ich i s-gegoki kownal wo cheggia k wo gewito k gm hu wo i ui hegai cheggiakudaj mo ab chum si hiwig k am wo a'ai i tahp g ha'ichu enigaj am ha wehhejed g e-shonthalig. Neh, bani wa masma cheggia g ge Jiawul.
42011023	K hegam mat hedai pi ab hu wo i ni-wehmajk ab ni-wui gegok ch wabsh ha gantan hegam mani s-ha tho'ibiamk.”
42011024	Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Matp hems g jiawul an wo hema u'ukch g o'othham ch wabsh wo thagito mat am hebai ep wo e ul. Kut hegai o'othham wo i chum kegch g e-thoakag. T wabshaba g jiawul pi hebai wo chehg k hekaj hab wo i e ah, ‘Mo hig woho d ni-kih hegai o'othham. Nt hig am uhpam wo hih wui.’
42011025	Kut wa woho am uhpam wo him k wo cheh mo am wabsh jeg ch si kegchuthas ch hehosimhunas.
42011026	T am haha wo him k wewa'ak ep wo ha u'apa g jijawul. T ihtham ba'ich wo i pi ap'ek ch am wehmaj wo i chiwia. Neh, t ihtha o'othham hahawa ba'ich wo i pi ap'ek mo wa ga hu i heki hu.”
42011027	Sh an wehgaj gegok g hemajkam. Kush hema g uwi hab kaij am wui g Jesus, “Tho si ge'e s-hehgig heg wehhejed uwi mat an m-mahsith k m-si'ichuthahim.”
42011028	Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus, “Ba'ich at wo i s-hehgigk hegam mat ab wo kaihamath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.”
42011029	Sh am i mu'ithahim g hemajkam. Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Mu'ijj o g ha-chegitoithag pi ap'e. K heg hekaj s-neithamk mant hab wo juh g s-hasig ha'ichu k am wo wohokamch mani ab Jiosh amjed. Bant wa'i masma am wo ha chehgi mani d Jiosh si Kehsha matsh wa hab e juh hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash d Jonah.
42011030	Heg atsh wa am si has masma i e chehgi ha wui g Ninevah t am hemajkam. Nt ahni am si has masma wo i ni-chehgi am ha wui g hemajkam ia'i ithani.
42011031	“Hegam Ninevah t am hemajkam atsh gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi am i kahk g Jonabad k hab pi ab hu wo e chu'ichigch ge'e lothaita tash ch ed. Ni ahni ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo g Jonabad. Kum eda pi ab hu ni-kaiham ch heg hekaj ab wo motoig g chu'ichig lothaita tash ch ed. (31) Mehkjed atsh ab i hih g uwi kownal ab wakolim tahgio amjed mat ab wo kaiha g Solomonbad ha'ichu mahchig. Ni ahni ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo g Solomonbad. Kum eda pi ab hu ni-kaiham ch heg hekaj ab wo motoig g chu'ichig lothaita tash ed.”
42011033	Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Wohokam o wepogithas mo g lahmpa. Kum s-mahch mo pi hab d ahga g lahmpa mas am wo e ehsto ha'ichu wecho. Mt an wo thai mat hebai wo ha tonlithath hegam mo ab i wahpk.
42011034	“Em-wuhpui at s-ap am wo i wahki g tonlig matp wo s-mamsk k wabshaba pi am hu wo i wahki matp pi wo mamsk. Kum heg hekaj s-ap ha nuhkuth.
42011035	Pegih, wahm amt wo si s-ap nuhkuthath g ha'ichu e-amichuthadag mat heg s-ap am wo i wahki g wohokam.
42011036	Bat wa'i masma ab wo i shuhthath g em-chegitoithag g wohokam.”
42011037	Tsh am i ha'asa neo g Jesus. Tsh am hema jiwia g Palasi k am waith mat wo wehmaj e gegos. Kutsh wa woho am i wahk k am i thahiwua matsh wo e gegos.
42011038	Tsh hegai Palasi si has i el neithok mat pi e wako hab masma mo d ha himthag.
42011039	Kush s-amichuth g Jesus ch hab kaij ab wui, “Neh, ahpim Palasi am si kegchuth g e-honshpadag. K wabshaba g em-chegitoi wabsh shuhthags g pi ap'ekamkaj. Heg o wa wepo mam an wa'i wehgaj si kegchuth g hohas-haha'a. K gd hu ha eda wabsh kia s-bibtagi.
42011040	Thamt wabsh wo totontok mamtp heg wo wa'i s-ap nuhkuth e-honshpadag. Jiosh at hab wa'ap nahto g em-thoakag. Kumt heg ep wo chum nuhkuth.
42011041	Am g wehs wo i thagito Jiosh wui k hab wo s-chechojimak ab sho'igkam ha wui ch wo nei mat wehs ha'ichu wo s-kehgajk am em-wehhejed.
42011042	“Neh, ahpim Palasi am ab mahk g Jiosh g hemako tahpani mo wehst-mahm e tahpanch g em-eniga, chum hems g nahnko mahs pi-mianthi ch ha'ichu tatk. T wabshaba g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo em-namkith nam pi pi ap'echuth hegai mam haschukaj ha sho'igchuth ha'i ch pi ab hu tatchua g Jiosh.
42011043	Sha'am wa'i s-hohho'ith mamt si s-apko wo thadhaiwua am cheopi ch ed ch s-hohho'ith mat ab wo si has em-elithath g hemajkam mamt an wo i wuwha kahya ch ed.
42011044	Ih, sho'ig! Mt wo si s-ko'okam e namkithach. Neh, pi at wo mahsk g hiha'ini matp pi am hu wo tohnkthask. Kumtp hems am wabsh thahm wo oiopoth. Pegih, bat sha masma pi wo mahchk g hemajkam mam d pi ap'ekam nam pi ehstokch g pi ap e-chu'ichig.”
42011045	Kush hema hab kaij g chehanig ha mashchamtham ab wui, “Ha mashchamtham, ahchim ap hab wa'ap has t-ahg hab kaijch.”
42011046	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, ab em-wui o hab wa'ap him g s-ko'ok em-namkithadag. Mu'i s-hasig ha'ichu am ab ha chehani g hemajkam. K ith d s-wehch ha'ichu mohtoi am ha wehhejed. M eda ahpim pi ha'ichu hab sha'i wua mams hekaj ha wehm wo moht.
42011047	“Em-shohshon at mu'i ha koktha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Kum ahpim ha wepo masma, chum ams ha hehosith g ha-hiha'iniga hegam mamt ha koktha. K heg hekaj ab em-wui him g s-ko'ok em-namkithadag.
42011049	Heki o hu hab kaij g Jiosh, ‘Ab ant wo i ha wuwhas g ha'ichu i tashogiththam ha shahgith g hemajkam. Kut ha'i wo ha-koktha k ha'i wo ha sho'igch.’
42011050	Neh, kum ha wepo chu'ichig mamtp ha wepo ha'ichu elith. Kut wepo masma wo em-ai g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag heg hekaj wehs mat hab juh ga hu i amjed mat in i e nahto g jewed.
42011051	Abelbad atsh wa wehpeg e muhkith. Tsh amjed mu'i ep e ko'ij. Tsh g Zecariabad ga hu si ha oithch e muhkith amai shahgith g iagchulithakud ch ge'e cheopi. Kum ahpim ha wepo chu'ichig hegam matsh wa ha koktha ch ha wepo masma wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag mamtp hedai ha wepo elith ha'ichu.
42011052	“Ahpim chehanig ha mashchamtham amt wo i chum ha amichuthach g hemajkam mat has masma wo s-mahchk g Jiosh. Kum eda ahpim pi mahch ch ep ha shohbithch hegam mo s-mahchimk. Heg o wa wepo mam ab yahwidath g kihjeg mat pi hedai am hu wo i wah. Jiosh at s-ko'okam wo em-namkith heg hekaj.”
42011053	Tsh am i wuhsh g Jesus k gm hu chum hih. Tsh hegam chehanig ha mashchamtham ch Palasi ab hahawa si s-ta ke'itham has ahg k mu'i ha'ichu kakke
42011054	hab wabsh chum ahgch mat wo heki himch mat pi ap ha'ichu hab wo chei.
42012001	Kutsh sha'i si mu'i mihl hemajkam am i e hemapath k wabsh a'ai e keishshap. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g e-chuhchai, “Neh, hegam mo d Palasi o hab wabsh s-e junimk mo d s-ap'ekam. Mt wo s-e nen'oithk mamt pi am hu ha oithk hab wo masmak.
42012002	Hegai mo chum e ma'ishch at wehs wo e ma'ishpi'o. Pej, wehs s-a'agi ha'ichu at wo s-e mai.
42012003	Wehs at wo mahsko e wua mamtp haschu chum s-a'agi hab kaij. Kut wehs am si s-kaitham wo e ahgath kih thahm amjed mamtp haschu i chum s-jupij hab kaij gd hu si e-kih ed.”
42012004	Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g hemajkam, “Neh, ni-naipijju, pi g wo sha'i ha ehbithath hegam matp hedai wo chum s-em-kokthaim. Pi at wo e nako mas ba'ich s-ko'okam has wo i em-juh em-kokthak.
42012005	Heg at wa'i Jiosh wo e nako mat am wo em-tha'ich Jiawul kih ed mamtp pi am hu wo wohog elithath. Kumt heg ab wo wa'i si has elithath.
42012006	K wabshaba g Jiosh si s-hemajima ch pi tatchua mas wo s-ko'okam em-juh. Am g wo oithahim mo chum hems g al u'uwhig s-ap ha nuhkuth. K eda chum alo pi ha'ichu namkig ihtham. Kum ahpim wehs ha'ichu ba'ich d i ha'ichu am tahgio. Jiosh o wehs ha'ichu s-mahch ab em-ab. Mt heg hekaj pi ha'ichu wo sha'i ehbithath ab wui e thagitokch.”
42012008	Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, am amt wo s-ni-mahch k ah hemajkam ha tahgio mani d em-tho'ibiakam. Kunt ahni hab wa'ap wo s-em-mahch k ah am ha tahgio g anghil ch am Jiosh tahgio.
42012009	Kutp wabshaba hedai pi wo ni-mahch k ah am ha tahgio g hemajkam, nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo mahch k ah am ha tahgio g anghil ch am Jiosh tahgio.
42012010	“Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap chu'ichigaj hegai mat hedai wo wa chum has ni-ah matp gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chu'ichig. T wabshaba pi gm hu hab wo i e juh g pi ap chu'ichigaj hegai mat hedai wo s-ko'okam has ah g Hekai S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
42012011	“Pi g wo sha'i kudut ab amjed mamt has masma e wehhejed wo neo mamtp hems am wo em-lothai chechopi ch ed o am ha tahgio g kokownal.
42012012	Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at wo em-ahgi mamt has wo chei.”
42012013	Sh am hema g o'othham hab kaij ab wui, “Ha mashchamtham, hab g ahgith g ni-nawoj mat am wo i ha ni-tahpani hegai mat g t-ohg an thagito t-wehhejed.”
42012014	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pi ant heg hekaj ia hu jiwia manis wo em-lothait k am wo i em-ap'echuthach g ha'ichu em-eniga am em-shahgith.”
42012015	Sh am ba'ich hab ep kaij ab wehs ha wui, “Am g wo s-e nen'oithk mamt pi heg wo wa'i hu'uithath s-kaisthag. Pi amt d wo s-ap thoakamk heg hekaj mam haschu i eniga, chum ams d wo s-kaisk.”
42012016	Sh ith am hahawa chum ha tashogith ch hab kaij, “Tp hems hema d wo s-kaisk. K g e'eshaj si ge'e babhe.
42012017	K hab e ahg, ‘Pi o an hu wi'is mant hebai ep wo toa g ha'ichu bahithag. Shuhshuth at g ni-waptto.
42012018	Nt hig wo i ha shulig k am ba'ich i ge'eged ha'i wo i chuhcha k am wo ba'iha g ha'ichu bahithag ch wehs ha'ichu ni-eniga.
42012019	Si at ha'ichu s-ni-abam. Nt mu'i a'ahithag ab wo hekaj ihtha s-i'owi ha'ichu k wo ni-ulinihogithath ch wo ni-gegosithath ch wo ih'eth ch wo si s-hehgigk.’ Neh, bo e ahg ihtha s-kais.
42012020	“K wabshaba ab wui hab kaij g Jiosh, ‘Thap wabsh tohnto. Ith i s-chuhugam ab apt wo muh. Kut d wabsh wo hemak ch wo ui g ha'ichu m-eniga map hejel am chum e wi'ithch.’
42012021	Neh, bo wa chu'ig ch hab wa'ap wo wa chu'igk wehs ha wehhejed hegam mo hejel s-e kaischuthamk ch wabshaba pi am hu Jiosh wehhejed hekaj g s-e-kaisthag,” bo kaij g Jesus.
42012022	Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g e-chuhchai, “Heg ani hekaj am em-ahgith ihtha mamt pi wo si e kudutath ab ha'ichu e-hugi ab o ab ha'ichu e-eniga ab.
42012023	Jiosh at ab em-mah g em-thoakag, pegih, k hab wa'ap ab wo em-mah mamt haschukaj wo e thagio'ithath.
42012024	“An g wo i ha neith g hahawani. Ihtham o pi ha'ichu e'eshath ch pi od g ha'ichu esha ch pi ha kihki o ha waptto mat am eda wo ba'iha. Jiosh o ha gegosith. Kum eda ahpim ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo g u'uwhig am tahgio g Jiosh. T heg s-ap wo em-thagio'ithath.
42012025	Pi amt wo e nako mams am ba'ich wo i himch g e-a'ahithagga am wabsh hekaj e kudutch.
42012026	Mamtp pi wo e nako mamt hab wo juh ihtha al ha'as chum ha'ichu, pegih, k haschu ahgk wo e kudutath g ba'ich i ge'eged ha'ichukaj?
42012027	“An g wo i ha neith hegam ha'ichu wuhshanig m an chuhch. Pi o chikpan ch pi shohshom g ha'ichu eniga. Kuki eda g ha-heosig ba'ich i s-kehgaj mo g ha'ichu enigaj hegai s-kais kownalbad mash hab chehgig Solomon.
42012028	Neh, tp hems s-hohtam wo gaksh hegai sha'i m an chuhch k wo hekaj e nantha. K eda heg wa wepo mo g Jiosh si s-kehg enigadathch g heosigkaj. Pegih, am g wo s-wohochuth mat ab s-ap wo em-enigadathch.
42012029	Pi g heg wa'i hekaj wo e kudutath mamt wo e gahgi g ha'ichu hugi.
42012030	Wehs hemajkam an jewed thahm o chum hekith ith an si e gahgith. K wabshaba g em-ohg Jiosh s-mahch mam tatchua ihtha.
42012031	Mt g Jiosh kownaltalig wehpeg am wo ul e-thoakag ed. T g Jiosh ab epai wo em-mah mam haschu i tatchua.
42012032	“Pi g am wo sha'i ha'ichu ehbithath ahpim mam al he'ekiajj ab ni-hiwig. Em-ohg Jiosh o ab si tatchua mat ab wo i em-mah g e-kownaltalig.
42012033	Wehs g wo gagda mam haschu i edgith k wo ha mah g namkigaj g sho'igkam k an haha wo edgithath g ba'ich i s-kehg kaisthag Jiosh kihthag ed. T heg pi hekith wo huhug. T pi hedai wo em-ehs. T g hiopch pi hekith wo padch.
42012034	Kumt am wo s-hihimim no pi g em-tatchuithag am ulinig mo hebai ha'ichug hegai mam haschu hab elith mo d em-kaisthag.”
42012035	Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo si e nahtokch mat haschu has wo e juh hab sha masma mat g pion wo si e nahtokch mat g ha-ahmo wo uhpam jiwia. Ha-ahmo atp hems am wui wo hih g wo ha hohntam gegosig k pi oi wo uhpam jiwia. T wabshaba g piongaj ab wo s-ap e enigadathch ch ab wo mehithch g e-kanjel ch g e-ahmo ab wo nenida. T am wo i jiwia k wo si shontpa. T ab ha hekaj wo i kuhpi'o g kihjeg wehhejed.
42012037	T wo si s-hehgigk hegam pion mat g ha-ahmo wo ha cheh mo neneath ch e nahtokch. Neh, t heg ab hab wo juh g bahshothag k wo si s-ap ha thadsh k wo ha gegos.
42012038	T wo si s-hehgigk hegam mat wo e nahtokch mat wo jiwia, chum as hems eda wo i huh g s-chuhugam o i ba'iwichkim.
42012039	“Neh, pi o ta machima mas hekith hema wo i jiwia g s-chu ehskam. Kum heg hekaj chum hekith nuhkuth g e-kihthag.
42012040	Pegih, k hab wa'ap pi ta machima em-wehhejed manis hekith wo uhpam jiwia jewed wui ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Mt heg hekaj wo si e nahtokchith chum hekith.”
42012041	Sh hab kaij g Peter, “T-kownalig, nap ahchim wa'i hab t-ahg aha nap wehs hab ha ahg?”
42012042	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Chum amt hedai wo e nahtokch mamtp wo s-wapagimak ch wo s-chu a'amichuthath. S-mahch am mat g ha-ahmo hema wo e gahgi g hab mahs chikpantham k wo nuhkuthach g e-kihthag. T heg s-ap wo ha chikpanchuthath ch wo ha thagio'ithath g e-wehm pion mat eda pi an hu wo ha'ichugk g ha-ahmo.
42012043	T am ep wo jiwia k wo cheh mo ihtha s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan. Kut d wo si ge'e s-hehgigk heg wehhejed pion
42012044	nat pi g ahmoj am hahawa wehs thahm wo kei g e-kihthag.
42012045	“T wabshaba pi ap d wo ha-kehshak matp hedai wo i ha sho'igchuthath g e-wehm pion ch wo si e gegosithath ch wo nawmmukath hab e ahgch mat pi oi wo jiwia g ahmoj.
42012046	T haha wabsh wo jiwia k wo cheh mo pi ap hab wua g e-chikpan k wo si s-ko'okam namkith k gm hu hab wo i juh.
42012047	“T wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag hegai pion mat wo s-mahchk g e-ahmo tatchui ch eda pi am hu hab wo junihith.
42012048	T wabshaba pi am hu i si s-ko'okam wo bei g e-namkithadag hegai mo pi e mahch ch hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. Ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu amt uhpam wo s-behim ab amjed hegai mamt ba'ich ha'ichu nuhkuthach.”
42012049	Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ia ant jiwia jewed thahm mant wo i ha chu'amu g hemajkam hab sha masma mant am wo si i nai ha-i'ibthag ed. T hab wo s-nenenashanik ab Jiosh wui. Mat hu'i heki hu hab wo e juh.
42012050	Am ant s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu gahi wo wuhshani k si ni-kudut heg hekaj.
42012051	Pi g hab wo e elithath mat wo thotholimat g hemajkam mant ia jiwia.
42012052	Ab at em-wui wo gegokiwua hegam mat pi wo ni-tatchuath, chum hems ha'akia em-wehm kihkam.
42012053	Cheoj atp hems wo s-keh'ithath g e-ohg o g e-alithag. T g uwi g e-je'e o g e-mad o g e-kahkma je'e wo s-keh'ithath.”
42012054	Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, mt wo s-mahchk mas wo juh o as wo tonih am neithk mas hebaijed hewed ch has mahs chewagi i wushke. M eda pi am hu i a'amichuth mo haschu has e junihog ia'i ithani neithch mani haschu hab wua. Shahag wepo mam pi mahchimk.
42012057	“E o aihim mat g Jiosh wo ha lothai g hemajkam. Am g wo a'amichuth mamt has wo chum masmak.
42012058	S-mahch am mamt hemho wa s-hohtam am wo i e ap'ech heg wehm mat ab wo ha'ichu i em-abch. Tp hems am wo i em-wahpki lothaita ch ed mamtp pi am hu wehmaj wo i e ap'ech. T g usagakam am wo i em-thagito chi-lihhi wui. T heg gd hu wo si em-kuh.
42012059	Kumt pi wo sha'i i e wuhshath am hugkam mamt hekith wo i wehs ha namkith mamt he'ekia i em-to'i.”
42013001	Kush ia'i ithani ha'i g o'othham am ahgith g Jesus matsh g kownal Pilate ha'i ha koktha g Galilee t am hemajkam mash eda ihtham am hab chum wua g iagchulitha Jiosh wui.
42013002	Sh g Jesus hab kaij am ha wui, “Kumtp hab elith mo ith am wohokamchuth mo ba'ich d i si pi ap'ekam mo hedai i Galilee t am kihkam namt pi hab masma ha koktha.
42013003	K eda pi woho. Wehsijj am hab masma d pi ap'ekam ch wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag mamt wo sha pi ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.
42013004	“Neh, am atsh i gei g uhgk kih Siloam wo'o t am Jerusalem ch ed. Kutsh gamai gigi'ik e ko'ij. Kum hab elith mo ith am wohokamchuth mo ihtham ba'ich d i si pi ap'ekam mo hedai i hegam mo am kih Jerusalem t am.
42013005	K eda pi woho. Wehsijj am hab masma d pi ap'ekam ch wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag mamt wo sha pi ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.”
42013006	Sh g Jesus am ha ahgith ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga, “Neh, matp hema g o'othham ge suhnaga am uhdwis e-oithag ed ch am him k am s-u'im g suhna. K pi ab hu bahithag.
42013007	“K hab ahg g oithag nuhkuththam, ‘Neh, waik a'ahith ab ach am nenneith hegai suhna uhs ch pi koi ha'ichu sha'i bei ab amjed. Pt wo shonch. S haschu ahgk am hig wo kehkk oithag ch ed?’
42013008	“K wabshaba hab kaij g oithag nuhkuththam, ‘Am att hig wabsh wo thagito hemako ahithag ehp. Nt am wo si i moihun k am wo iawua g haiwani biht an wehgaj.
42013009	Kut am wo s-ap'ek matp ab wo bahithagt. Nt wabshaba am haha wo si shonch matp pi ab hu wo bahithagt.’ ”
42013010	Sh am hu hebai mihshmetha tash ch ed g Jesus am ha mashcham cheopi ch ed.
42013011	Sh am hema ha'ichug g uwi mash g jiawul an u'ukch. Kush gamai gigi'ik a'ahith ab wa'i mumku mash ab wabsh i e olatch ch pi e nako mat wo shel i kekiwua.
42013012	Tsh am i cheh g Jesus k ab si wai. Tsh ab i hih. Kush hab kaij, “Ahpi uwi, ia at wo i thoa g m-mumkithag,”
42013013	K ab hahawa taht. Kutsh ha hekaj shel i kekiwua k ab si ihm g Jiosh.
42013014	Kutsh ab si bagat hegai mash d ha-wanimedtham am cheopi ch ed matsh g Jesus ha thoaj ha-mihshmetha tash ed k ash hab ha ah g hemajkam, “Am o ha'ichug g chuhthp tash matt heg eda wo chikpanath. Kunt heg oitham tash ia wo thatha k wo e thoaj, hi wa pi t-mihshmetha tash ed mo g Jiosh am kehshch.”
42013015	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ih, pi ap sha'i woho ab hu has elith g Jiosh pi ab hu ho'ige'ithch ihtha uwi no pi d chum aligaj. S-mahch ap mat wabsh chum hedai g e-woiwisga o g e-wuhluga am wo wul'ok k am wo be k gd hu wo i'ich, chum hems e-mihshmetha tash ed.
42013016	Pegih, tt wahm wo i wehmt ihtha t-wehm o'othham. Jiawul o wa ab wulshch gamai gigi'ik ahith ab. Kutt hemho wa wo wul'o, chum hems mihshmetha tash ed.”
42013017	Kutsh si e el hegam mo s-keh'ith. Sh wabshaba g hemajkam si s-hehgig heg hekaj si s-kehg ha'ichu mat hab juh.
42013018	Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am ant he'es wo i em-tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig
42013019	am wepogithch g ha'ichu kai. Neh, heg am e'esha mo al chumaj ch oi wa am wo wuhshani k ha'as wo i ge'etha mo g s-ehheg uhs. Tp hems g u'uwhig an ab wo koksht. Pegih, t hab wa masma wo ge'e i ge'etha g Jiosh kownaltalig, chum as al chum am wo shonwua.”
42013020	Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Jiosh kownaltalig o hab wa'ap wepogithas mo g jewajithakud. Heg amt wo be k am wo wah wehnathk g chu'i k am he'es wo i thai. T g jewajithakud wo chehmo g wahga mat wehs am wo i kopothka. Pegih, t g Jiosh kownaltalig hab wa masma wo chehmo g jewed.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus
42013022	Sh am hihimhim hegam Jesus ha oithk g kihhim. Sh g Jesus am ha'ichu ha mashcham g hemajkam ch am wabsh i si ha'ab e gewkathch Jerusalem wui.
42013023	Sh hema ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig, nat pi sha'i mu'i wo e tho'ibia g hemajkam?” Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui,
42013024	“Heu'u. Kumt heg hekaj am wo si e nakogath mamt am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed. Mu'ijj at am wo chum s-wahpkim k pi wo e nako. Heg o wa wepo mamt am wo i wahp al aj kihjeg t amjed.
42013025	Ith ant wo wepogi g kih enigakam mat am wo i ha wahpki g e-machiga k am haha wo si kuh g pualit. T ab ha'i ep wo i chum s-wahpkim. T hab wo ha ah, ‘Gam g hu wo hihim. Pi ani sha'i em-mahch.’
42013026	“Neh, bat wa masma mu'i am wo i chum s-wahpkim ni-kownaltalig ed hab kaijch, ‘M-wehm ach t-gegosithahim. Kup am ha mashcham t-kihhim am.’
42013027	“Kunt hab wo ha ah, ‘Pi ani sha'i em-mahch. Gam g hu wo hihim ab ni-amjed. Tham si pi ap hehemajkam.’
42013028	“T haha wo si shoanith ch ga hu wabsh wo i si e ki'ishch nat pi wo sha'i si s-ko'ok ha'ichu nakogath. T eda am wo ha'ichugk g Abrahambad ch Isaacbad ch Jacobbad ch wehs g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.
42013029	Kut g hemajkam ab wo i hihi si'al tahgio amjed ch huduni tahgio amjed ch ab juhpin tahgio amjed ch wakolim tahgio amjed k am wo thadhaiwua e wehm Jiosh kownaltalig ed.
42013030	Kut am d wo si haha'ichuk hegam mo hemuch d pi haha'ichu. T hegam mo hemuch d si haha'ichu d haha wo pi haha'ichuk.”
42013031	Tsh am ha hekaj ha'i thatha g Palasi k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Gam g hu hihm ia amjed nash pi s-m-mu'amk g Herod.”
42013032	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Herod o sha ban masma ch hab kaij. Him k ahgith mant ha'as tash am wabsh kia gm hu hab wo i ha junihith g jijawul ch wo ha thoajithath g kok'otham ch haha wo s-ap nahto g ni-chikpan.
42013033	Kunt pi wo sha'i ni-muhkith im hu haha wabsh i himathch. Am o wa'i Jerusalem t am e ko'ijith g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.
42013034	“Ih, t wo si e sho'igch g Jerusalem t am hemajkam nat pi g Jiosh s-ap wo ha thagito. Ha-shohshon ash wa ha ma'ichshulig ch mu'i ha koktha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. T ihtham am ha oithk hab wo e juh. Mu'ikko ani hab chum si ni-tahtk mant wo si s-ap em-nuhkuth hab sha masma mat g chuchul g e-mahmad ab e wecho wo ha hemapai. M wabshaba pi ab hu tatchua manis hab wo em-juh.
42013035	K eda an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mamt ab wo chum ni-ihmath ch hab wo chech'eth mat g Jiosh am i ni-kehsh k si s-ni-ho'ige'ith. Kunt ia wo i s-ap em-thagito am hugkam mamt hab hahawa masma hab wo e juh.”
42014001	Sh hema d uhgchu ch d Palasi ch hebai hab juh g ge'e gegosig ha-mihshmetha tash ed k ash ab i wai g Jesus. Kutsh am jiwia.
42014002	Sh eda an hema ha'ichug g cheoj ch mahniko nash pi g kakhioj ch nohnhoij ge totskoni. Kumsh an si s-nen'oith g Jesus mas wo thoaj nash pi ab ha'ichu s-abchuthamk.
42014003	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui hegam chehanig ha mashchamtham ch Palasi, “Shahchu am ahgch hab elith mo pi t-hiwgith g t-chehanig machs wo ha thoaj t-mihshmetha tash ed?”
42014004	Sh pi hedai has sha'i kaij. Tsh g Jesus ab hahawa i wai ihtha o'othham k thoajith k am hahawa thagito. Kutsh gm hu hih.
42014005	Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Neh, namt hig pi woho ab ha hekaj wo i wuhshath g e-alithag o chum hems g e-woiwisga matp am wo sha gei wawhia ch ed, chum as d wo em-mihshmetha tashk?”
42014006	Kush pi hedai e nako mas has wo chei.
42014007	Kutsh ha'i hegam ha-waitha gn hu si wehpeg s-apko thadhaiwua. Kush am ha neith g Jesus ch hab kaij,
42014008	“Pi g am hu si s-apko wo thadhaiwua mamt hekith am wo hihi gegosig wui. Tp hems am hema wo jiwia mat am ba'ich d wo i s-has ha'ichuk.
42014009	Kut am haha wabsh wo jiwia hegai mat ab i em-wai k hab wo em-ah mamt wo hiwigi hegai s-has ha'ichu abai mamt ab chum thahiwua. Kumt wo si e el namt pi hahawa ga hu wabsh si ha oithk wo thahiwua.
42014010	“Ba'ich at wo i s-ap'ek mamt ga hu wabsh mehk wo thahiwua. Kut g kihkam ab wo i him k hab wo em-ah, ‘Ni-nawoj, oi g i hihm k ia hu s-apko ni-miabithch i thahiwua.’ Neh, t ith ab wo em-mah g si has elitha am ha tahgio hegam ha'i ha-waitha.
42014011	“Mt wo pi ha'ichuch hegai mat hedai wo chum si e ha'ichuch k ab wo si ha'ichuch hegai mat wo pi e ha'ichuch.”
42014012	Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab wui hegai mat ab i wai, “Pi g hegam ab wa'i ha waith e-naipijju o g e-wepnag o g e-hajuni o g s-kakais e-hugith an kihkam mapt hekith hab wo juh g gegosig. Ab at epai wo i m-wai ihtham. Kupt hab masma ab wo bei g e-namkithadag heg hekaj mapt ith hab juh.
42014013	Ab g i ha waith g sho'igkam ch mamaniko ch pi hihimithkam ch pi neneatham mapt hekith hab wo juh g gegosig.
42014014	Pi at wo e nako ihtham mat wo uhpam m-namkith. T g Jiosh ab wo m-mah g s-kehg m-mahkigdag mat hekith am wo i ha wuwhas g s-ap'ekam hemajkam ab muhkig amjed.”
42014015	Sh am hema thaha g o'othham ch kah ihtha. Tsh am i ha'asa neo g Jesus. Sh ith ab wui hab kaij, “Ttki wo si s-hehgigkath, am i wahpk Jiosh kihthag ed, heg wa wepo matt am wo thadhaiwua ge'e gegosig ch ed.”
42014016	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Heu'u, mamtp woho am wo i wahp. Ith o wepo masma matp hems hema hab juh g ge'e gegosig k mu'i ab ha waith g hemajkam.
42014017	T am i e ai. Kut am hema cheha g e-pionag. T heg am him k ha-ahgi mo wehs ha'ichu e nahtokch.
42014018	“K wabshaba ihtham am ahgith mat pi wo e nako mat am wo hihi. “Neh, tp hems hema am wo ahgi, ‘Ha ant nolawt g oithag k heg s-neithamk ch hekaj pi am hu wo hih.’
42014019	“Kutp hems hema am wo ahgi, ‘Wehst-mahm woiwis ant am ha nolawt k hegam s-ha a'appemimk.’
42014020	“Kutp hems hema am wo ahgi, ‘Ha ant hohnt k hekaj pi am hu wo hih.’
42014021	“Neh, t am hahawa uhpam hih ihtha ha-pionag k am ahgi g e-ahmo. T g ahmoj wabsh woho i bagat k hab kaij ab e-pionag wui, ‘S-hohtam g am hihm kahya ch ed ch wohg ch ed k ab wo i ha ui g sho'igkam ch mamaniko ch pi neneatham ch pi hihimithkam.’
42014022	“Kut wa woho hab juh k am hahawa jiwia k hab kaij, ‘Bant juh g m-chehanig. K wabshaba am wabsh kia wi'is g kih.’
42014023	“K hab ep kaij g ahmoj, ‘Am g i wuhshani k an mehk hihm chu'uchum wopog oithch an sha'i ch ed k hab wo ha juh mat ab wo i hihi mat wo shuhth g ni-kih.
42014024	Pi at ab hu i hihi hegam mo d chum si ni-waitha. Kunt pi hema wo sha'i hiwigi mas wabsh wo i jeh g ni-gegosig.’ ”
42014025	Sh am hu hebai hihim hegam Jesus. Sh mu'i hemajkam am ha wehm hihim. Tsh ab i ha nei g Jesus k hab kaij ab ha wui,
42014026	“Pi am ab hu sha'i ni-tatchua mamtp pi ba'ich ab wo i ni-tatchua mam hi g e-jehj ch e-wepnag ch e-wehm kihkam ch e-a'aliga.
42014027	Hemho wa amt gm hu wo thagito g hejel hab e-elitha k ahni hab ni-elitha hab wo junihith ch ni-wehhejed wo e sho'igchuthath. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mam ab mohto g kots ch ab ab wo e muhkith.
42014028	“Neh, nat hig pi am hu wo i a'amich hegai matp hedai am hema ge'e wo kiht mas am hi wa ahim lialiga mat wo nahto g e-kihta?
42014029	Mt wo ashath matp am hab wabsh wo juh g shondaj k pi wo e nako mas am hu wo i nahto g e-kihta.
42014030	Kut hab wo e chech'eth, ‘Ihtha o'othham at am chum hema i kei g kih k wabshaba pi e nako mat wo nahto.’ Pegih, mt ahpim hab wa masma wo i a'amich mams wo e nakog k ab wo ni-hiwgath.
42014031	“Neh, matp hems hema g kownal wo s-cheggiam g e-obga k eda al wehst-mahm mihl (10,000) wo shonthaligak. T g obgaj gokko wehst-mahm mihl (20,000) wo shonthaligak ch ab him. T hegai kownal am wo i chum a'amich mas hu hi wo wa e nako mat wo cheggia.
42014032	Tp hab wo mahsk matki pi wo e nako, t hemho wa am wo ha'i ha cheha mat ab wo nam hegai hema kownal mat ga hu wabsh kia mehk wo himath k wo s-mai mas he'ekia wo i namkith. T pi wo cheggia.
42014033	Neh, bo chu'ig. Kumt ahpim pi wo e nako mamt ab wo ni-hiwgath, heg hi wa mamt wehs ha'ichu wo thagito am ni-wehhejed.”
42014034	Sh hab ep kaij, “Mt ha'ichu wehhejed wo chum s-kehgajk hab masma mo g on.
42014035	Heg at gm hu wabsh wo s-e ohhoth mat wo sha kahko. Kumt wo s-e nen'oithath namt pi wabsh wo s-e ohhoth mamtp pi ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk. Ab g wo i a'amichuth ahpim mam kah ihtha.”
42015001	Sh am hu i hebai, sh mu'i lial ha kowlanttham ch pi ap hemajkam ab i miabi g Jesus mat ab wo kaiha.
42015002	Tsh g Palasi ch chehanig ha mashchamtham ab i s-babgam neneok k hab kaij, “Ihtha o'othham o wabsh s-ap ab ha neith g pi ap hemajkam ch ha wehm e gegosith.”
42015003	Tsh heg hekaj am ha ahgi ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga, hab kaijch:
42015004	“Ith o wepo masma mamtp hems hema ahpim siant wo kahwaligak. Kut hema wo heb hu hih. Namt hig pi am wo ha thagito hegam humukto gamai humukt kolhai ch ed k am wo i gahghi hegai hema am hugkam mamt wo chehg
42015005	k an haha wo kushwiot k hih uhpam
42015006	k ab wo i ha wai g e-naipijju. T am wo i e hemapai. Kumt hab wo ha ah, ‘Si g wo s-hehgigk ni-wehm. Cheh ant g ni-shoiga mat chum heb hu hih.’ Kut am em-wehm wo si s-hehgigk.
42015007	Pegih, t hab wa masma d wo si s-hehgigk an eda g Jiosh kihthag chum hems hemako em-wehhejed mamt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. Kum eda ha'i hejel hab chum e elith mam d s-ap'ekam hemajkam ch pi tatchua mams gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.”
42015008	Kush ith am ep ha ahgith g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Matp hema g uwi wehst-mahm wo enigak g lial ch hema wo heb hu wua. Tp hems wo mehi g e-lahmpa k an wo i wosu g e-kih k an wo i gahghi am hugkam mat wo chehg
42015009	k ab haha wo i ha wai g e-naipijju. T am wo i e hemapai. T hab wo ha ah, ‘Si g wo s-hehgigk ni-wehm. Cheh ant g ni-lialiga mant chum heb hu wua.’ Kut am wehmaj wo si s-hehgigk.
42015010	Pegih, t hab wa masma wo si s-hehgigk g anghil chum hems hemako em-wehhejed mamt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.”
42015011	Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Matp hems hema g o'othham gohk wihpiopga.
42015012	T g chumchu ab wui i him k hab kaij, ‘Ni-ohg, wapt wo i ni-mah hegai mat d wo chum ni-wuikamk.’ Kut wa woho am i gawulkai g e-eniga k ab ha mah g e-wihpiopga hegai mo haschu d ha-wuikam.
42015013	“T ihtha chumchu am ha hekaj gagda g e-eniga k bei g namkigaj k gm hu simnolt mehk jewed wui k am heki wua g e-lialiga am hab wuathch g pi ap'ekam.
42015014	T am i huhug g lialigaj. T am hahawa gei ge'e bihugig. K ihtha simnolttham pi ha'ichu edgith mas wo huh.
42015015	K am hahawa hema chikpanachuth e-oithag ed mat wo ha nuhkuth g kokji.
42015016	Kut chum hems heg s-hugim mo haschu g kokji ko'a. T pi hedai ha'ichu mah mas wo huh.
42015017	“T am hahawa ha'ichu kop mo'oj ed. K hab e ahg, Wehs g ni-ohg pionag o s-edgith g ha'ichu hugi. Kuni eda ahni d bihugimkam.
42015018	Nt hig wo uhpam hih ni-ohg wui k hab wo chei, ‘Ni-ohg, pi ant ap has chu'i ab m-wui ch ab Jiosh wui.
42015019	K hahawa pi d ni-wuikam mams hab wo ni-a'agath mani d m-alithag. Chum anis hems d wabsh wo m-pionagk.’
42015020	“Neh, t am ha hekaj i wuhshani k am wui hih g e-ohg. T heg cheh mo im hu wabsh kia him k ab si s-ho'ige'ith k ab wui med k gn hu kohm k ab chintath.
42015021	“K ab wui hab kaij g alithaj, ‘Ni-ohg, pi ant ap has chu'i am m-wui ch am Jiosh wui. K hahawa pi d ni-wuikam mams hab wo ni-a'agath mani d m-alithag…’
42015022	“T wabshaba g ohgaj hab wabsh ha ah g e-pionag, ‘Ab g wo i bek g s-kehg eniga k an wo wahkith k g anilo an wo sha'ich nowij an k g shuhshk ab ep wo cheka
42015023	k wo mua g s-gihg wisilo. Kutt hab wo juh g ge'e gegosig k wo si s-hehgigk.
42015024	Uhpam at ep jiwia ihtha ni-alithag mat gm hu mehk hih. Ith o heg wa wepo mat muh k ep e chegito.’ Neh, t wa woho hab e juh g si ge'e s-hehgig.
42015025	“K eda gm hu chikpan g ge'echu alithaj oithag ch ed ch pihhun k ab hih. K eda si s-hehgig ch ne'eth ch keihin.
42015026	Kut kah k ab hema kakke g pion mas has d ahga ihtha.
42015027	“K heg hab kaij, ‘M-wehnag at jiwia. Kumt mua g s-gihg wisilo k hab juh g ge'e gegosig nat pi s-ap jiwia.’
42015028	“Neh, t bagat ihtha ge'echu k pi am hu i wah. T am hahawa kah g ohgaj k am i wuhshani k am wabsh s-ap ab chum waith.
42015029	K wabshaba ab wui hab kaij, ‘Neh'e, ha'akia a'ahithag ani ab m-wecho ch chum hekith hab wua g m-tatchui. Kupt eda pi hekith chum hems g siwat mad ab ni-mah mant wo ni-gegosith k wo s-hehgigk am ha wehm g ni-naipijju.
42015030	T wabshaba ia jiwia ihtha m-alithag mat hedai heki wua g m-kihthag ha wehm g chechpa'awi. Kupt mu'ij g s-gihg wisilo.’
42015031	“K g ohgaj ab wui hab kaij, ‘Ni-alithag, ahpi ap chum hekith ni-wehmaj. K wehs hegai mo d ni-eniga d m-eniga.
42015032	K wabshaba hemu am wa s-ap'e matt wo si s-hehgigk nat pi uhpam ep jiwia ihtha m-wehnag mat am simnolt. Heg o wa wepo mat muh k ep e chegito,’ bo kaij g ohgaj.”
42016001	Sh am ep ha ahgith g Jesus ihtha wepogitha ahga ch hab kaij, “Tp hems am hu hebai hema d wo s-kais o'othhamk. K hegai mat am i kei mo d maliom wabsh heki wua g lialigaj.
42016002	T am i wai e wui k hab kaij, ‘Am ant ha'ichu sha naksh ab m-amjed k antki hekaj hab wo chei mapt am wo i kuint k am wo o'oha wehs map has i masma nuhkuth g ha'ichu ni-eniga nantki pi wo m-thagito.’
42016003	“T hab i e ah ihtha o'othham, ‘Tki wo i ni-wuhshath g ni-ahmo. Nis has wo ni-juh? Pi ant wo ni-nako manis wo waikkat k si ni-elith manis wo ha'ichu ha tahnith.
42016004	Neh, s-mahch ani mantki has wo ni-juh k mu'i wo naipijjuk. T ihtham ab wo i ni-wahki e-kihki ed mamt hekith wo i ni-wuhshath ith amjed ni-chikpan.’
42016005	Bo kaij ch am hahawa hehemako ha waith hegam mo ab ab e wulshch g ahmoj. Kut am hema jiwia. K g maliom ab wui hab kaij, ‘Nap s-mahch map he'ekia ab ab i e wulshch g t-ahmo?’
42016006	“K hab kaij ihtha, ‘Heu'u, hemako siant waplin g a-saithi ani ab ab ni-wulshch.’ “K hab kaij hegai maliom, ‘Ab ant wo i huduni. Pt am wa'i hetaspo wehst-mahm waplin ab ab wo e wulshch.’ “T gm hu hih hegai. Kut am hema ep jiwia.
42016007	“K g maliom ab wui hab kaij, ‘Nap s-mahch map he'ekia ab ab i e wulshch g t-ahmo?’ “K hab kaij ihtha, ‘Hemako mihl kokstal g pilkani.’ “K hab kaij hegai maliom, ‘Ab ant wo i huduni. Pt am wa'i gigi'ik siant kokstal ab ab wo e wulshch.’
42016008	“Neh, t g ahmoj si has i el am i kahk mat has e juh ihtha s-chu banmathamkam maliom nat pi si s-e mahch k hab e juh. Neh, hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh o em-ba'ich i s-e mahch ch hab wua ha'ichu.
42016009	“Ith ani em-ahgith mamt wo s-ap hekaj g e-kaisthag am ha wehhejed hegam mo tatchua g i wehmtadag. T g Jiosh s-ap am wo i em-wahpki e-kihthag ed mamt hekith wo muh.
42016010	“Hegai matp hedai s-ap wo nuhkuth g al chu'uchum ha'ichu at hab wa'ap s-ap wo nuhkuth g ge'eged ha'ichu. Kutp hedai wo ha banmath g al chu'uchum ha'ichukaj k hab wa'ap wo ha banmath g ge'eged ha'ichukaj.
42016011	Am g wo s-ap nuhkuthath hegai mam haschu em-nuhkuthachuth ith thahm jewed. T g Jiosh am wo ha'ichu em-nuhkuthach e-kownaltalig ed. Heg o d s-wohom kaisthag
42016012	ch d wo em-enigak mamtp wo s-ap nuhkuth hegai mam haschu em-nuhkuthachuth ith thahm jewed.
42016013	“Pion at pi wo e nako mat gohk wo a'amok. Hema at ba'ich ab wo i tatchuath ch ba'ich i s-ap wo chikpanithath. Kumt ahpim hab wa'ap pi wo sha'i e nako mams wepo ab wo ha tatchuath g Jiosh ch ihtha jewed thahm s-kaistalig.”
42016014	Sh am ha'i kah g Palasi wehs ihtha. K eda g Palasi si pihk e elith g s-kaisthagkaj. Kush ihtham heg hekaj nahnko ahg g Jesus.
42016015	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ahpim am hab chum e wua mam d s-ap'ekam am ha tahgio g hemajkam. K wabshaba g Jiosh s-mahch g em-i'ibthag. Hegai mo haschu i g hemajkam hab chum elith mo d si ha'ichu o d wabsh pi ha'ichu am Jiosh nena ed.
42016016	“Mosesbad ch hegam ha'i kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam at an o'oha mamt has wo chum masmak. Kumt ith wo chum hekaj am hugkam mat ab i wuhsh hegai John mo em-pahl wapkonahim. K am i amjed ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig am e ahgahim. K wabsh chum hedai am chum e nakog mat am wo i wah.
42016017	T wabshaba pi wabsh wo huhug hegai chehanig. Ba'ich at wo i pi hasigk mat g thahm kahchim ch jewed wo huhug.
42016018	“That wo pi ap chu'ijkamk hegai matp hedai wo s-ohhoth g e-wehm kihkam k hema ep wo bei. K hab wa'ap wua g pi ap'ekam hegai matp hedai an wo bei g ha-ohhotha.”
42016019	Sh ith am ep ha ahgith g Jesus: “Tp hems hema d sha'i si s-kais o'othham ch chum hekith g si s-namkig eniga ab wahpkch ch wehs tashkaj si s-kakaisim kihthag.
42016020	K am hema d si sho'igkam o'othham ch hab chehgig Lazarus ch wehsko hihiwog. Kum ab i bebhe ch ab thathsha s-kais o'othham kihjego.
42016021	hab elithch mat he'es ha'ichu wo al huh mo ab i shulig s-kais o'othham mihsa t ab. K g gogogs ab winikon g hihiwthaj.
42016022	“T am i muh ihtha sho'igkam o'othham. T g anghil am i be k an u'apa anai mam am ha nuhkuth g s-ap'ekam. “Kut g s-kais o'othham hab wa'ap muh. Kumt gd hu cheh.
42016023	T am i e chegito k oki am ha'ichug mo am kuhkpi g pi ap'ekam ch sha'i si s-ko'ok ha'ichu tahtk ch ab i nea e thahm. K g Lazarusbad ab wehmaj thaha g t-shohshon Abraham.
42016024	K ihtha s-kais o'othham ab si s-kaitham hab kaij, ‘Ni-shohshon, Abraham, ge'e s-ko'ok ani nakog ith eda mehi. Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k ab wo cheha g Lazarus mat am wo wahki g e-nowi shuhthagi ch ed k ab wo i him k ab wo iawua ni-nehni ab.’
42016025	“K wabshaba hab kaij g Abrahambad, ‘Ni-hajuni, am g i chegito map wa in d thoakam ch wehs ha'ichu s-kehg edgith. K wa g Lazarus d wabsh si sho'igkam ch wabshaba hemuch ab si s-ap e tahtk iia. Kup ahpi g s-ko'ok tahtk.
42016026	Gamai wa ba'ich o an ge s'tadani ch s-juhk hiktani an t-tahgio. Kutt pi wo t-nako machs hedai am gahi wo i chesh em-wui o mamt ahpim ab gahi wo i chesh t-wui.’
42016027	“K hab kaij g s-kais o'othham, ‘Pegih, ni-shohshon, am ani hetasp wepnag. K ihtham am wabsh kia d thothakam ch am kih ni-ohgbad kih am. Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k am wo cheha g Lazarus mat am wo him k am wo ha shohbi. T pi ia hu ha'ab wo thatha mo ia g s-ko'ok e tahtk.’
42016029	“K hab kaij g Abrahambad, ‘M-wepnag o edgith g Moses o'ohana ch Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ha-o'ohana. T heg am wo ha shohbi matp ab wo kaiha.’
42016030	“K hab hahawa ep kaij g s-kais o'othham, ‘Ni-shohshon, Abraham, pi at woho ab wo kaiha. Pt wabshaba hema hab wo sha juh mat ep wo e chegito. T ab wo kaiham k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.’
42016031	“K hab kaij g Abrahambad, ‘Pi o ab hu kaiham g Moses o'ohana ch Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ha-o'ohana. K am wa tasho mat hab wa'ap pi ab hu wo wohoch hegai matp hems ep wo e chegito.’ Neh, bo kaij ch am thagito.”
42017001	Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui hegam mash ab hiwig, “Chum o hekith ha'ichu hab e wua mamtp hems heg hekaj am wo i shul pi ap'ekam ch ed. T wabshaba s-ko'okam wo e namkith hegai mat hab wo em-juh mamt am wo i shul.
42017002	Ba'ich at wo i s-ap'ek wehhejed matp hems wo e wachumchuth k wo e mua. T hab pi am hu wo ha shul g al ni-wohochuththam pi ap'ekam ch ed.
42017003	Am g wo s-e nen'oithath! “Mt wo ahgi g e-wehm wohochuththam matp pi ap wo chu'i ab em-wui. Kutp hems ab s-ap wo em-kaiham k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. Kumt ab wo i s-ho'ige'el.
42017004	Tp hems mu'ikko hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam ab em-wui hemako tash ed. Mt wabshaba chum hekith ab wo i s-ho'ige'el mat hekith gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo em-tai g ho'ige'elig.”
42017005	Sh hab kaij g Jesus chuhchai ab wui, “T-kownalig, ab g i ge'ethajith g t-wohochuthadag.”
42017006	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi am tatchua g ge'e wohochuthadag. Wehs at hab wo e juh hegai mamt hab wo che'e k wo s-wohoch mat hab wo e juh. Mtp hems am wo ahgi ihtha gohi uhs mat wo e huhpshan k gd hu wo e ei ge shuhthagi ch ed. Kut wa woho hab wo e juh.”
42017007	Sh g Jesus am ha'ichu ha wepogith ch hab kaij, “Pi o ab hu sha'i ab g ha-ahmo mas wo ha hihithol g e-pionag, chum as hegam ge tash oitham am chikpan oithag ch ed.
42017008	Pion at wo hihithol g e-ahmo k wo gegosith k hahawa hejel wo e gegos.
42017009	Ab o ha ab mat am hab wo wa juh hegai mo haschu am hab i ha chehani. Kut pi hab wo chum el mas ab wo ha ho'ige'el.
42017010	Pegih, bo wa masma am em-wehhejed. Wehs amt ha'ichu am hab wo juh mo haschu ab i em-chehani g Jiosh k hab wabsh wo e ahgath mam d wabsh pion ch am hab wabsh juh g e-chikpan.”
42017011	Sh am wabsh kia hihim hegam Jesus Jerusalem wui ch am hihi ha shahgith g Samaria chekshani ch Galilee chekshani.
42017012	Sh am hema d al kihhim. Kush am ha'i thadha jeg ed nash pi kok'o heg hekaj mo g ha chuhkug muhkhim ch chum pi ha thoajig. Tsh am i chum wahp hegam Jesus mash em kihjeg g kolhai. Tsh ihtham kok'otham am cheh g Jesus k i wahpamig k d wehst-mahm ch am nam k ga hu wabsh mehk gegok
42017013	ch amjed s-kaitham hab kaij, “Jesus, t-kownalig, ab g i s-t-ho'ige'ith.”
42017014	Sh ab ha neith g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Gamai g wo hihim k ab wo e-chehgi papal ha wui.” Tsh am he'es i hihim k s-mai matki ha thotha.
42017015	Kutsh hema ab uhpam i hih am i s-mahchk mat thoa k ab si ihm g Jiosh si s-kaitham
42017016	k atsh am si gei jewed thahm ab Jesus wecho k ab si ho'ige'el. Kush eda ihtha pi d Tuhligo ch d wabsh Samaria t am o'othham.
42017017	Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “A nant pi woho wehst-mahm o'othham ha thothaj.
42017018	T eda al hemako ia uhpam jiwia k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k d wabsh go'ol o'othham.
42017019	Kekiwuani k gamai hihm. Ab ap ni-hiwig ch heg hekaj thoa.”
42017020	Sh ha'i g Palasi hab si kaij ab wui g Jesus, “A pt hekith hig am wo i t-chehgi ihtha Jiosh kownaltalig map an ahgachug?” Kush hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi amt g e-wuhpuikaj wo nei g Jiosh kownaltalig
42017021	mams hab wo chei, ‘Ia o ha'ichug’ o ‘Gd o hu ha'ab ha'ichug.’ K eda am em-shahgith.”
42017022	Sh amjed hab kaij hegam ha wui mash ab si wecho e mashcham, “Ab o him g tash mamt wo chum tatchuath mant ia wo em-wehmajk chum hems hemako tash ab ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Nt wabshaba pi ia hu wo ha'ichugk.
42017023	Ha'i at hab wo kaijjith ‘Gad g hu wo neith g Jiosh si Kehsha’ o ‘Ia g hu wo neith.’ Mt wabshaba pi am hu wo i ni-gahghi.
42017024	Wehsko ant wo ni-chehgi mant hekith ep wo jiwia jewed thahm hab sha masma mat g wepgi s-masma an gahi wo kekiwua chewagi ch ed.
42017025	Nt wabshaba hemu mu'i wo ni-sho'igch. T pi ab hu wo ni-tatchua ihtham hemajkam ai'i ithani.”
42017026	Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Bat wo masmak mant hekith ep wo jiwia mash wa hab chu'ig eda mash g Noahbad in d thoakam.
42017027	Hemajkam ash wa gm ha wabsh i si neneath ch e gegosith ch ih'eth ch e hohont ch gm hu wabsh i pi chegito g Jiosh. T haha wabsh e ai g tash mat hegam Noahbad am i wahp ge'e wahlko ch ed. Kut mel g shuhthagi k ha wi'in k wehs ha koktha.
42017028	“Bat ep wo masmak mash wa hab masma mash wa g Lotbad in d thoakam. Wehsijj ash gm hu wabsh i si neneath ch e gegosith ch ih'eth ch ha'ichu ha nolawt ch ha'ichu gagda ch ha'ichu e'esha ch kihkit.
42017029	Kutsh wa g Lotbad ab i wuhsh Sodom kihhim t amjed. Tsh g mei ch ha'ichu s-mehithkam ab ha thahmjed i e iawua hab sha masma mo g juhki. Kutsh wehs e koktha.
42017030	“Bat wo wa masmak heg i tash mant am wo i ni-maskogi.
42017031	Kut pi hedai am hu wo sha'i chum i wah e-kih ed mat am wo ha'ichu ui, chum as hems imhab wo wa'i oimmedath e-kih wehgaj o am wo chikpanath oithag ch ed.
42017032	Pi at chum hems wo s-huwi g e-kihthag. Batsh wa e juh g Lotbad hohnigbad k hekaj e muhkith.
42017033	Bat wa masma wo heb hu wua g e-thoakag hegai matp hedai wo chum s-huwithath g e-thoakag hejel e wehhejed. T wabshaba wo tho'ibia g e-thoakag hegai matp hedai wo hekaj ni-wehhejed.
42017034	Tp hems gohk am wo kohkshath e-kih ed ch hema gm hu wo i e be k hema am wo wih mant hekith ep wo jiwia.
42017035	Gohk u'uwi atp hems am e wehm wo chu'ath g pilkani. T hema gm hu wo i e be k hema am wo e wuiok. [
42017036	Gohk o'othham at am wo oiopoth oithag ch ed. T hema gm hu wo i e be k hema am wo e wuiok.]”
42017037	Sh hab kaij g chuhchaij ab wui, “A t hebai hab wo i e juh ihtha?” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Am at wo tashok mat hebai hab e juh. Namt hig pi wo mahchk mat hebai wo kahchk g muhki am neithch mo am e hemapathch g nunuwi? Pegih, mt hab wa'ap wo s-ap s-mahchk mat hebai hab wo i e juh ihtha mani em-ahgith.
42018001	“Chum amt hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahunath am Jiosh wui ch pi hekith wo thagito,” bash kaij g Jesus ch am hahawa ha ahgith ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga:
42018002	“Tp hems am hebai hema d usagakam ch wabshaba pi ab hu has elith g Jiosh ch pi ab hu ha ha'ichuchuth g hemajkam.
42018003	T am wui hema jiwia g hejel wi'ikam uwi k ab tai mat am wo i wehmt namsh pi s-lothaitamk. T pi ab hu wohog el. K wabshaba ith chum hekith ab wui jijiwhia. “Kut hab i e ah g usagakam, ‘Chum ani hi wa pi ab hu has elith g Jiosh ch pi ab hu ha ha'ichuchuth g hemajkam.
42018005	K wabshaba sha'i si ni-kudut ihtha uwi ch wo am hu ni-gewkoch pi ni-thagitok. Nt heg hekaj am hab wo juni hegai mo ab ni-chehani.’ ”
42018006	Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, bat wo ha juni g pi ap'ekam usagakam hegai mo haschu chum hekith ab tahni.
42018007	Pegih, bamt wa masma chum hekith ab wo tahnith g Jiosh g i wehmtadag.
42018008	Kut s-hohtam am wo i ap'ech ha'ichu am em-wehhejed. T eda mu'i am wo e chehgi mo pi woho ab hu ni-hiwig mant hekith ia ep wo jiwia jewed thahm.”
42018009	Ha'i ash hab e elith g hemajkam mo d s-ap'ekam ch eda hab ha elith ha'i ehp mo d pi ap'ekam. Sh g Jesus am ha ahgith ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga:
42018010	“Neh, gohk o'othham at am hihi ge'e cheopi wui mat wo e ho'ige'ithahu. K hema d Palasi
42018011	ch am hejelko kehk ch am e ho'ige'ithahun ch hab kaij, ‘Ab ani si m-ho'ige'ith, Jiosh, mani pi s-banma ch pi hekith ha'ichu ha iattogith ch pi am hu hab junihim g s-uam ha'ichu hab masma mo chum hedai hab e junihim. Ab ani m-ho'ige'ith mani pi hab masma mo hegai pi ap ha kowlanttham m an kehk.
