42018012	Gohk tash ani ni-ho'ige'ithahun ch pi ha'ichu ko'a thomig ed ch ab m-mahk g hemako tahpani mo wehst-mahm e tahpanch mani he'es ha'ichu ab i neith.’ Neh, bo wa masma e haschuth g Palasi.
42018013	“K wabshaba hegai hema ga hu wabsh mehk kehk ch pi e nako mas ab wo uhgk i nea thahm kahchim wui no pi si e sho'igchuth. Ith o hab kaij, ‘Jiosh, ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith ahni pi ap'ekam hemajkam.’ Neh, bo kaij hegai hema.
42018014	“Kunt wo em-ahgi mat ith am i ap'ech g Jiosh e tahgio. T s-ap e taht k hih uhpam. T g Jiosh pi am hu i ap'ech hegai Palasi. Tho wohokam mat g Jiosh wo ha'ichuch hegai mat hedai hejel pi wo e ha'ichuch k wo pi ha'ichuch hegai mat hejel wo chum e-ha'ichuch.”
42018015	Sh ha'i g o'othham am ha u'apa g al chu'uchum a'al Jesus wui mat ab wo ha taht. Kush g chuhchaij ha neith ch chum s-ha keh'ith mo hab e wua.
42018016	Tsh wabshaba g Jesus ab i ha wai g a'al k hab kaij ab ha wui g e-chuhchai, “Ab g wabsh wo i ha hiwgith g a'al mat ab wo i hihi ni-wui k pi an hu wo sha'i ha shohbi. Am at wabsh s-moimam wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed ab ni-hiwigch.
42018017	Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mamt hab wa'i masma wo i wahp.”
42018018	Kush hema g Tutuligo ha wanimedtham ab kakke g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Ha mashchamtham map d s-ap'ekam, shahchu ant am hab wo juh mant ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag?”
42018019	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ap mahch map haschu ahgch hab ni-a'aga mani d s-ap'ekam. Heg o wa'i Jiosh d s-ap'ekam. Kup pi woho mahch mani hedai wud.
42018020	S-ha ap mahch ihtham chehanig mo hab chu'ig: Pi g am hu ha ehsithath g ha-wehm kihkam. Pi g am hu ha mua'i g o'othham. Pi g am hu ha'ichu ha ehsithath. Pi g am hu ha'ichu ha iattogithath. Ab g si has ha elithath g e-ohg ch e-je'e.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
42018021	Sh hab kaij ihtha o'othham, “Wehs ihtha ani hab junihim gd hu i ni-alijk amjed.”
42018022	Tsh am i kah g Jesus ihtha k hab kaij ab wui, “Hemako ha'ichu o am wi'is mapt am hab wo juh. Wehs apt wo gagda map haschu i edgith k wo ha mah g namkigaj g sho'igkam k ab wo i ni-oith k am wo ni-wehmajk. Bapt masma wo edgithath g s-kaistalig an thahm kahchim ch ed.”
42018023	Tsh si pi ap e taht ihtha o'othham am i kaiok nash pi d sha'i si s-kais ch si s-huwith g s-e-kaisthag.
42018024	Tsh am i nei g Jesus mo pi ap e tahtk k hab kaij, “Sha'at wa'i si s-kawkam wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed hegam mo d s-kakais.
42018025	Nam hig hab elith mat wo e nako g ka-mihyo mas am wo gahi wuhsh ho'ipad jeg ed. Pegih, t hab wa masma pi wo e nako hegam mo hiwig g ha'ichu e-eniga mas am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed.”
42018026	Sh hab kaij ihtham, “A t hedai wo e nako mat wo e tho'ibia.”
42018027	Sh g Jesus hab kaij, “Pi at hedai wo e nako mas hejel wo e tho'ibia. T wabshaba g Jiosh wo e nako mat wo ha tho'ibia.”
42018028	Sh g Peter hab kaij, “Neh, ahchim att am i thagito g t-kihthag matt wo i m-oi.”
42018029	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Woho amt hab e juh. Kunt am wo em-ahgi mat g Jiosh ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu ab wo em-mah ia jewed thahm ahpim mamt hedai wo thagito g e-kihthag o g e-wehm kihkam o g e-wepnag o g e-jehj o g e-a'aliga wehhejed g Jiosh kownaltalig. T am i thahm g pi ha huhugetham ap'ethag ab wo em-mah e-kihthag ed.”
42018031	Kutsh am hejelko i ha ui hegam gamai gohk e-chuhchai k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Neh, am att wo hihi Jerusalem wui. T am hab wo e juh am ni-tahgio hegai mo wa g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam an o'ohan ab ni-amjed.
42018032	Am amt wo i ni-thagito ha wui g gawul mahs hemajkam. T hegam wo nahnko ni-ahgath ch ab wo ni-siswuimath
42018033	ch wo ni-gewittan k hahawa wo ni-mua. Nt wabshaba ep wo ni-chegito mat d wo i waik tashk amjed.”
42018034	Kush wabshaba pi sha'i amichuth mas haschu hab ahg g Jesus. Heg o wa wepo mo e e'estokch g ha'ichu ahgaj.
42018035	Sh am hihim hegam Jesus miabithch g Jerico. Sh g pi neatham am hema thaha wohg hugith an ch ha'ichu ha nead.
42018036	Kutsh an bihbij. Sh ith ha kah ch ab ha kakke mas haschu an has e wua.
42018037	Kumsh hab ahgith, “An o him hegai Jesus mo ab Nazareth t amjed.”
42018038	Sh am si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Jesus, ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith, ahpi map d t-kownaligbad David amjedkam.”
42018039	Sh hegam mash am ba'ich hihim g Jesus si s-keh'ith ch hab ahg mat wo pi shahmuni. Kush wabshaba haha wabsh ba'ich i s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith, ahpi Davidbad amjedkam.”
42018040	Tsh am hahawa i kekiwua g Jesus k ha chehani mat ab wo i e bek g pi neatham o'othham. Tsh am i jiwia. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui,
42018041	“Shahchu ant hab wo m-juni?” Sh hab kaij ihtha, “Ni-kownalig, chum ani tatchua mant ep wo ha'ichu neithath.”
42018042	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Ha'ichu g neith. Thoa apt nap pi ab ni-hiwig.”
42018043	Tsh am ha hekaj wabsh s-ap ha'ichu neith k ab si i ho'ige'el g Jiosh k gm hu i oi g Jesus. Tsh am i nei g mu'i hemajkam ihtha k wehsijj ab si ihm g Jiosh.
42019001	Tsh am thatha hegam Jesus Jerico t am k am wabsh gahi wo wuwha.
42019002	Sh am hema chum si s-neithamk g Jesus ch d uhgchu lial kowlanttham ch d si s-kais ch ash hab chehgig Zackias.
42019003	Sh wabshaba sha'i mu'ij g hemajkam. Kush eda al shopolk ihtha ch pi ap neith
42019004	ch hekaj gm hu ha ba'ich meh g hemajkam k an i chesh uhs t an.
42019005	Tsh am i ai g Jesus mo an tha k ash an uhgk i neith k hab kaij ab wui, “S-hohtam g ab i huduni, Zackias. Ab ant wo jiwia m-kih am.”
42019006	Kutsh ha hekaj ab i hud g Zackias k si s-hehgig ch ab i wahki e-kih ed.
42019007	Kush wehsijj g hemajkam si s-ju'ujpij neneok ch hab kaij, “Ihtha o'othham atki am wo i thahiwua heg kih am mo d wabsh pi ap hemajkam.”
42019008	Tsh am i kekiwua g Zackias k hab kaij ab Jesus wui. “Neh'e, eda hugkam ant wo ha mah g sho'igkam g ha'ichu ni-eniga k uhpam ep wo ha namkith gi'ikko e thahm mantp he'es i ha banmath.”
42019009	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ith o am chehgithch map wepo wohochuthadag mo g t-shohshon Abraham ch hekaj e tho'ibia ith i tash ab.
42019010	Ith ant hekaj ia jiwia jewed thahm ahni Jiosh si Kehsha mant an wo i ha gahghim k wo ha tho'ibia g pi ap chu'ijkam.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
42019011	Pi ash sha'i tash matsh gm hu wo thatha ihtham Jesus Jerusalem t am. Kush hab e ahg g hemajkam mat si e ai mat am wo i wuhsh g Jiosh kownaltalig. Tsh heg hekaj am ha ahgi g Jesus ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga
42019012	k hab kaij: “Hema o d sha s-has ha'ichu ith eda ha'ichu ni-ahga. Kum am waith mehk jewed amjed mamt wo kownalch.
42019013	T pi koi him k ab i ha wai g wehst-mahm e-pionag k wehsijj g hemako ohla lial ab i ha mahkhi mat wo hekaj k am wo i mu'ithaj mat am wo i hih.
42019014	K eda mu'ijj pi hohho'ith g wehmaj o'othham ch am ha'i i e chuhcha mat am wo hihim k hab wo chei mo pi hohho'ith mat d wo ha-kownaligk ihtha o'othham.
42019015	“Kumt wa woho hab juh hegai s-has ha'ichu o'othham mamt kownalch. T am i uhpam jiwia k am ha hekaj ha wai hegam e-pionag mat am wo thatha k am wo e ah mat he'ekia i thahm nahto g lial heg amjed mat wa ab ha mah.
42019016	“K g wehpegkam hab kaij am jiwiak, ‘Ni-kownalig, wehst-mahm lial ant nahto am thahm hegai hemako mapt ni-mah.’
42019017	“K hab kaij g ahmoj, ‘S-ap apt hab e juh k d si s-wagimakam ni-pionag. Bant wo m-juh mapt wehst-mahm kihhim wo nuhkuth napt pi s-ap nuhkuth g al chu'uchum ha'ichu.’
42019018	“K hema ep hab epai kaij am jiwiak. ‘Ni-kownalig, hetasp lial ant nahto am thahm hegai hemako mapt ni-mah.’
42019019	“K ith hab ahg g ahmoj, ‘Bant wo m-juh mapt hetasp kihhim wo nuhkuth.’
42019020	“K hema ep hab epai kaij am jiwiak. ‘Ni-kownalig, m ia kahch g m-lialiga. Gd ant hu si wuh pa-nihtha ch ed k gd hu si ehsto.
42019021	S-m-ehbith ani heg hekaj map s-ta ke'ithama. Am ap wabsh u'u hegai map haschu pi chikpan ch am bahbhiam hegai ha'ichu bahithag mo pi d m-esha.’
42019022	“K hab kaij g ahmoj ab wui, ‘Hegai map has i kaij ant hab masma wo m-mohto'i g chu'ichig, ahpi s-padmakam pion. S-mahch apki mani s-ta ke'ithama ch wabsh u'u hegai mani haschu pi chikpan ch ab i bahbhiam hegai ha'ichu bahithag mo pi d ni-esha.
42019023	Pegih neh, pt haschu ahgk pi am hu cheh g ni-lialiga wahnko ch ed mant ab uhpam wo ui wehnadk hegai mat haschu ab mahmadt.’
42019024	k hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui hegam mo am gegok, ‘Gam g wo si wohppo'ith hegai lial k heg wo mah mat g wehst-mahm lial nahto.’
42019025	“K hab kaij ihtham ab wui, ‘T-kownalig, heki o hu wehst-mahm lialiga.’
42019026	“Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, ‘Pi at has e juh nat pi ba'ich ha'ichu ab ep wo i nei hegai mat s-ap wo nuhkuth g e-nuhkutha. T wabshaba wo e wohppo'ithach mo he'es al i chum nuhkuth hegai mat pi ap wo nuhkuth.
42019027	Kumt ab wo i ha u'u k wo ha koktha am ni-tahgio hegam ni-obga mo chum pi tatchua mant d wo ha-kownaligk,’ bo kaij g ha-ahmo ith eda ha'ichu ni-ahga.”
42019028	Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihi ihtham Jesus Jerusalem wui. Sh g Jesus am ha ba'ich him.
42019029	Kush gohk al kihhimag ch hab chehgig Bethphage ch Bethany ch ab hugithaj ab g Olive U'us Kawulk. Tsh gohk am ha cheha g e-chuhchai
42019030	k hab ha ahg, “Am g wo hihim heg wui kihhim m am mia kehk k am wo i wahp. T am wo hema e wulshch g wechij wuhlu mat koi sha'i e chesh. Ith amt wo wul'ok k ab wo i wanim.
42019031	Kutp hema wo sha em-kakke mams haschu ahgk wul'o, mt hab wo ah mani ahni em-mashchamtham tatchua.”
42019032	Kutsh wa woho am hihi hegam gohk. Kutsh hab masma hab e juh mash hab ha ahgith g Jesus.
42019033	Kush am wupul'ok hegai wuhlu. Sh hab kaij g enigakam mas haschu ahgk am wul'o.
42019034	Sh hab kaij hegam, “T-mashchamtham o tatchua.” Kutsh ha hiwigi.
42019035	Tsh gm hu i wanim g wuhlu Jesus wui k an toa g e-liliwa wuhlu thahm k an i cheshaj g Jesus.
42019036	Kush am him cheshajch. Sh ihtham g e-liliwa am i to'ahim wohg oithk.
42019037	Sh am i aihim g Jerusalem. K g wohg am agshp i huduni ab amjed g Olive U'us Kawulk. Sh mu'i hemajkam an ha wehgaj ch ab i ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ch ab si ihm si s-kaitham heg hekaj si ge'e ha'ichu mo neithchkahim ch hab kaij:
42019038	“Jiosh at wo s-m-ho'ige'el ahpi mapt ia jiwia wehhejed.
42019039	Sh am ha'i gegok g Palasi ch hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Ha mashchamtham, ha g chehani mat wo ha'asa hab chei.”
42019040	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Neh, matp ihtham wo ha'asa hab chei, kut chum hems g hohothai si s-kaitham ab wo ihmath g Jiosh ni-hekaj.”
42019041	Sh am i aihi g Jerusalem. Kutsh shosha g Jesus
42019042	k hab kaij, “Mat hu wo i s-mahchk g Jerusalem t am hemajkam ith i tashkaj mat has wo e juh k wo e tho'ibia.
42019043	Ab o him g tash mat wo ha biha g ha-obga k wo ka kuh
42019044	k s-ap wo ha hugio wehsijj hegam mat am wo ha'ichugk k wehs wo wuahawua g kihhim. K pi sha'i mahch mat ithani wo chum ha tho'ibia g Jiosh.”
42019045	Kutsh am hahawa hih g Jesus k gd hu jiwia ge'e cheopi t am. Sh eda am ha'i thadha ge'e cheopi wehgaj ch am ha'ichu gagda. Kutsh gm hu si i ha wuwhas
42019046	hab kaijch ab ha wui, “Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana mo hab kaij g Jiosh: ‘Ahni o d ni-wehhejedkam ihtha ge'e cheopi. T ab wui wo hihimath g hemajkam ch ab wo si has ni-elithath.’ Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh. Kumt eda an be k am eda hab wabsh wua g hejel e-tatchui ch chum hems ha'ichu s-a'agi ha ehsith ab ha wui ha'ichu gagdach.”
42019047	Kush wehs tashkaj am ha mashcham g Jesus ge'e cheopi ch ed. Sh hegam u'ugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamtham ch ha wanimedtham g hemajkam chum s-mu'amk.
42019048	Sh wabshaba g hemajkam chum hekith ab si kaiham. Kush heg hekaj pi e nakog hegam mash chum s-mu'amk.
42020001	Sh am hu hebai g Jesus am ha mashcham g hemajkam ge'e cheopi ch ed ch am ha ahgith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Kutsh am thatha g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamtham ha wehm g ge'eged
42020002	k hab kaij ab wui, “Thohp hab chum elith map ab amjed ab u'ukch g e-gewkthag ch am hab ha'ichu wua. Oi g am t-ahgith.”
42020003	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pegih, nt ahni wehpeg ab epai ha'ichu wo em-kakke. Am g wo ni-ahgith
42020004	mams hedai hab elith mat ab mah g Johnbad g gewkthag mat wo ha pahl wapko. Nat g Jiosh ab mah aha nat wabsh g o'othham?”
42020005	Kush ihtham am wabsh hejel si a'aga ch hab kaij, “Shahtt hig wo chei? T ab wo t-kakke matt haschu ahgk pi ab hu wohoch mattp hab wo chei mo ab Jiosh amjed u'ukch g gewkthag.
42020006	T g hemajkam wo t-ma'ichshul mattp hab wo chei mo ab wabsh o'othham amjed u'ukch. Mu'ijj o hab elith mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
42020007	Neh, bash kaij ch ab hahawa uhpam i e nohnogi Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Pi ach sha'i mahch mas hedai amjed ab u'ukch g e-gewkthag.”
42020008	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pegih, nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo em-ahgi mani hedai amjed u'ukch g ni-gewkthag ch hab wua wehs ihtha.”
42020009	Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch am hahawa ha ahgith g hemajkam ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga hab kaijch: “Neh, matp hems hema am ei g uhdwis e-oith ed k hab hahawa i e ah mat gm hu hasko mehk wo him k pi oi wo jiwia. Kut ha'i wo nuhkuthath g oithaj ch wo namkith hegai mo haschu ab d i chum wuikamaj. Pegih, t am ha shulig k gm hu hih.
42020010	Kut am i e ai mat wo bai g uhdwis. T am hema cheha g e-pionag mat am wo him k ab wo i u'ithk g wuikamaj. T wabshaba g nuhkuththam gewichkwua g piongaj k pi ha'ichu sha'i mah. Kut gm hu uhpam hih.
42020011	“T g enigakam hema ep cheha g e-pionag mat am wo hih. T ith ep gewichkwua g nuhkuththam k si s-ta edam sho'igchuth k pi ha'ichu sha'i mah. T gm hu uhpam hih.
42020012	“T g enigakam hema ep cheha mat am wo hih. T hab wa'ap s-ko'okam has juh k gm hu si wuhshath.
42020013	“K hab hahawa kaij g uhdwis oithag enigakam, ‘Neh, si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag ant wo cheha mat am wo hih. Heg at hemho ab wo wa has el.’
42020014	“T heg gn hu hih. T wabshaba ab i nei hegam nuhkuththam k hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, ‘Ith o d enigakam alithag. Tt hig wo mua. T d wo t-enigak g uhdwis oithag.’
42020015	T wa woho hab e juh k gm hu si i wuhshath ab amjed g uhdwis oithag k am i mua.” K hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus,
42020016	“Neh, nat hig pi woho wo ha koktha g oithag enigakam k am ha'i ep wo ha hiwigi mat wo nuhkuth.” Tsh am i kah ihtha g hemajkam k hab kaij, “Ih, pi at woho hab wo e juh hegai map am t-ahgith.”
42020017	Kush ab si ha neith g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Woho at hab wo e juh. K g Jiosh o'ohana am tashogith mamt hab wa masma wo s-ni-ohhoth. Ith o hab ahgch hab chu'ig g wepogitha ahga Jiosh o'ohana ed: Kihttham at wo chum hema s-ohhotham g hothai. T wabshaba ith d wo si s-has ha'ichu hothaik am ha-kihta wehhejed. Neh, bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana.
42020018	Kut wo e sho'igch hegam mat pi wo ni-amich. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mat ab wo e keiko hothai t ab. Kut wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag hegam mat wo s-ni-ohhoth. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mat g hothai ab ha ab wo gehsh k am wabsh wo s-ha wia.”
42020019	Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch hegam hab ha ahg chehanig ha mashchamtham ch u'ugchu papal. Kutsh hegam heg hekaj wabsh chum si s-behim. Sh wabshaba mu'ijj g hemajkam ab si has elith g Jesus. Sh ihtham ha mashchamtham ch papal s-ha ehbith ch pi am hu be
42020020	k wabsh am s-nen'oith mat am wo ha ap'et. Tp hems ha'ichu hab wo chei mat heg ab wo abchuth k an wo be k am wo i thagito kownal wui. Tsh heg hekaj ha'i ha namkith mat am wui wo hihim k ab wo ha'ichu kakke k wo heki himch.
42020021	Sh hab kaij ihtham ab wui, “Ha mashchamtham, s-mahch ach map wabsh chum hedai ha mashcham g wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh himthag, chum as has wo chei hedai i.
42020022	Pegih, k am wo t-ahgi maps has elith g ge'e kownal kowlanta. No hig t-hiwgith g t-chehanig ahchim Tutuligo matt wo ha namkith aha no pi t-hiwgith?”
42020023	Sh wabshaba g Jesus s-ha amichuth mo g pi ap'ekam hab elith ch hab ha ahg,
42020024	“Ab g wo hema ni-chehgith hegai lial mam hekaj ha namkith.” Kumtsh ab hema chehgi. Kush hab ha ahg. “Am g wo ni-ahgith mo hedai wuhiosha ch hedai chehgig ab o'ohadag ith ab lial?” Sh hab kaij ihtham, “Hegai mo d uhgchu t-kownalig.”
42020025	Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, ab g wo i thagito kownal wui hegai matp d enigaj k am epai wo i thagito Jiosh wui mo haschu d epai enigaj.”
42020026	Kutsh pi e nako ihtham mas wo heki himch am ha tahgio g hemajkam k oi wa am wabsh i pi has kaij ch si has i el mat has masma ab i nodagi g ha-kakkei.
42020027	Tsh am ha'i thatha Jesus wui hegam mash hab e a'aga Sajusi. Ihtham o d ha wohochuthadag mat g Jiosh pi ep wo ha chegitoich g ko'i. Sh ab kakke ihtham ch hab kaij,
42020028	“Ha mashchamtham, an o hab chu'ig ihtha chehanigaj g Jiosh Mosesbad o'ohana ed ch hab chu'ig matsh g oithchkam wehngaj hegai mat wo muh pi ha a'aligak hemho wo wa bei g hohnigaj g e-wehnagbad. Tsh g a'aligaj hab masma wo e kuint mat d wo a'aligajk hegai mat muh.
42020029	Pegih, k am hu hebai wewa'ak d e-wepngam. Kut g si ge'echu ge hohnt k pi ha a'alithtok am i muh.
42020030	T g oithchkam an bei ihtha uwi k hab wa'ap muh.
42020031	T amjed g waikkokam an be k hab wa'ap muh. T wehsijj hab e juh ihtham wewa'ak mat pi ha a'alithtok ko'o k huhug.
42020032	T gm hu si ha oithk heg ep muh uwi.
42020033	Pegih, k ihtham wehsijj hohnigkahim. Kut hedai d wo hohnigk matp g ko'i ep wo i wuwha?”
42020034	Sh g Jesus hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ia o wa'i e hohont g hemajkam jewed thahm.
42020035	K wabshaba pi hab chu'ig an Jiosh kihthag ed. Jiosh at uhpam wo ha chegitoich g e-tho'ibiakam k am wo i ha wahpki e-kihthag ed. T hahawa pi wo e hohontath ch pi wo ko'oth hab masma mo g anghil hab chu'ig.
42020037	Mosesbad atki wa an o'oha mash wa g Jiosh am e chehgith wui heg hekaj sha'i mash meihith ch pi meitto. Sh hab kaij g Jiosh: Ahni ani d ha-Jioshga hegam Abraham ch Isaac ch Jacob. Neh, ith o hab kaij g Jiosh, chum as heki hu koi, no pi am e wehm ha nuhkuth ch ab uhpam wo i ha wuwhas muhkig amjed.
42020038	Pi amt wabsh woho wo i huhug am i ko'ok matp g Jiosh d em-Jioshga.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
42020039	Kush ha'i hegam mo d chehanig ha mashchamtham ab neneok ch hab kaij, “S-ap apt hab chei, ha mashchamtham.”
42020040	Tsh amjed pi hedai e nako mas ab ha'ichu ep wo kakke.
42020041	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Am g wo oithahim mas hedai d wo Jiosh si Kehshak. Bo e a'aga matsh d wo amjedkamk hegai t-kownaligbad mash hab chehgig David.
42020042	Kush wa eda g Davidbad hab a'aga ‘ni-kownalig’ natsh o'oha ihtha mo an hab chu'ig ne'i ed heg eda Jiosh heki hu o'ohana: Bo kaij g Jiosh ab ni-kownalig wui: In g thahiwua s-apkojed ni-hugith an.
42020043	Kunt wo ha gewito g m-obga mat ab wabsh s-ap wo m-wechok.
42020044	Neh, namt hig s-ap wo ah mat has masma d wo Davidbad amjedkamk ihtha mash d kownaligaj?”
42020045	Kush wehsijj ab si kaiham g Jesus hegam mu'i hemajkam. Kush ab ha ahgith g e-chuhchai ch hab kaij,
42020046	“Hegam mo d chum chehanig em-mashchamtham o am si s-apko thadhaiwup cheopi ch ed ch ge'e gegosig ch ed. Si o s-kehg e enigadath ch an oiopo no pi tatchua mamt ab wo si has ha elithath. Kumt wo s-e nen'oithath mamt pi hab wo masmak mo hegam.
42020047	Chum as si chew e ho'ige'ithahun am em-tahgio ch eda ha'ichu s-a'agi ha wohppo'ith hegam mo d hehe'ejel wi'ikam. T g Jiosh ba'ich i s-ko'okam wo ha namkith heg hekaj pi ap ha-chu'ichig no pi wabsh pehegia e ho'ige'ithahun ch hab wua ihtha pi ap'ekam.”
42021001	Sh am hu hebai thadha ihtham Jesus mash am e shulig g ha-mahkigdag am wehhejed g ge'e cheopi. Kush g s-kakais mu'i am shulig g lial.
42021002	Tsh am hema jiwia g al sho'igkam oks mash d hejel wi'ikam k atsh gohk s-o'amchu am shul. Kush am neith g Jesus
42021003	ch hab ha ahg g e-chuhchai, “Neh, ihtha al sho'igkam oks at ba'ich i ge'e mahkigdag hab juh mo hegam s-kakais.
42021004	Hegam o ab wabsh mahk hegai mo haschu i pi tatchua no pi wabsh s-lialiga. T wabshaba ihtha al oks wehs mah mo haschu al i edgith mat hekaj wo chum kihthagk.”
42021005	Kush am ha'i neneok ab amjed g ge'e cheopi ch am a'aga mo si s-kehg hab mahs ch si s-kehg hohothaikaj hab junis ch si s-kehg mahkigdagkaj e heosith. Sh hab kaij g Jesus,
42021006	“Heu'u. Nt wabshaba wo si shel em-ahgi mo e aihim mat wehs wo i e shul ihtha mam neith.”
42021007	Sh g chuhchaij ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Hekith at hab wo i e juh ihtha? Kut haschu d wo chehgithak matt heg ab wo s-mahchk mo e aihim matki am hab wo e juh?”
42021008	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo s-e nen'oithath ch pi am hu wo e iattogi. Mu'i at an wo i wuwha a'ahithag oitham k ni-wepo wo e chehcheg hab kaijch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha ch hab wo chei mat e ai g tash. Pi g am hu wo i ha oith ihtham.
42021009	An at wo kaitha mo am hahasko a'ai e cheggia g jejewed. Kumt wabshaba pi heg hekaj wo e kudutath, chum as hems wo wohok. Hemho wa at hab wo mahsk ha'ichu wehpeg. K wabshaba pi hab d ahga mat e ai mat wo huhug g jewed.
42021010	Jejewed at ab a'ai wo i e cheggia.
42021011	T an a'ai hab wo e juh mat g jewed sha'i s-ta ehbitham wo u'ugij. T g bihugig wo gehsh k g s-cheawagig ab wo i hih. S-ta ehbitham ha'ichu at am wo i e chehgi ab thahm kahchim t amjed.
42021012	“Mat koi hab wo e juh ihtha, kumt an wo em-u'u k wo em-sho'igchuth k am wo em-u'apa chechopi ha wui k wo em-kuh. Kumt wo e lothai am ha tahgio g kokownal nam pi ab s-ni-wohochuth.
42021013	Ith at am wo em-ap'et mamt am wo ah g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh.
42021014	Pi g am heki hu wo e kudutath heg hekaj mamt has wo chei hejel e wehhejed.
42021015	Ab ant wo em-mah g ne'oki ch amichuthadag. Kut pi wo e nako g em-obga mas ab wo wui kekiwua mamt has wo chei.
42021016	Em-jehj ch em-wepnag ch em-hajuni ch em-naipijju at am wo i em-thagito ha wui g haha'ichu. Kumt ha'ijj wo e ko'ij.
42021017	Mu'ijj at wo s-em-keh'el nam pi ab ni-hiwig.
42021018	Mt wabshaba s-ap am wo gahi wuwha mamtp has wo i em-juh
42021019	k wabsh wo s-ha bahbgi. T g Jiosh wo em-tho'ibia.
42021020	“Shonthal at an wo biha g Jerusalem. Kumt hab wo s-mahchk mo e aihim mat oi wo e padch g kihhim.
42021021	Hemho wa at am wo ahhio thohtha'ag wui hegam mat am wo ha'ichugk Judea chekshani ch ed. T hegam mo am ha'ichug Jerusalem kihhim t am hemho wa wo ahhio ab amjed. Kut hegam mo gm hu wabsh jegko kih pi am hu wo i wahp kihhim ch ed
42021022	nat pi wo e ai mat wo s-ko'okam ha namkith g Jiosh k am wo wohokamch wehs hegai mo an o'ohanas o'ohanaj ed.
42021023	Ih sho'ig! S-ta at ehbitham wo mahsk am ha wehhejed hegam mat wo chu'uchum mahmadk ch hegam mat wabsh wo kia wo'ok g ali. Ab at wo i hih g ge'e sho'igthag ith thahm jewed. T g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag ab wo gei ha ab ihtham hemajkam heg hekaj ha-chu'ichig.
42021024	Mt wo ha'i ha koktha k wo ha'i ha lilsochuth k gm hu wo i ha ui mehk jewed wui. Kut g gawul mahs hemajkam an wo bei ihtha Jerusalem k ia wo i e chiwiadath am hugkam mat wo kuhgit g ha-ap'ethag g gawul mahs hemajkam.
42021025	“T wo e u'ugij mo haschu an hab chu'ig t-thahm. Kut s-ta ehbitham hab wo e juh g tash ch mashath ch huhu'u k wo thagito g e-wopogga. Kut g ge shuhthagi an wo wewgath ch an wo to'otonkath. T ith wehs wo chehgi mat ge'e ha'ichu hab wo e juh wehsko jewed thahm. T g hemajkam wo si s-ehbithath wehs jejewed ch ed ch wo s-e chuhug nat ge wo mahchk mat haschu has wo e juh.
42021027	Kunt ab hahawa si s-masma wo i hud chewagi ch ed ab Jiosh kihthag amjed ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Kut am wo e maskogi g ni-gewkthag.
42021028	Bat masma wo e chehgi mo ab e aihim g ha-tho'ibiathag hegam mat ab wo ni-hiwgath. Kut heg hekaj wo chum si s-ap e taht mat hekith wo i shonwua ihtha mani em-ahgith.”
42021029	Tsh amjed g Jesus am ha ahgi ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga, “Neh, mt wo s-mahchk mo g toniabkam e aihim mamt wo nei mat g suhna je'e ch nahnko mahs u'us ab wo i i'iwgi.
42021031	K hab wa masma hab mahs mamt wo nei mat hab wo e juh ihtham mani am heki hu em-ahgith k wo s-mahchk mo e aihim mant ep wo jiwia.
42021032	“Neh, hegam mat wo nei ihtha mani em-ahgith at d wabsh wo kia thothakamk jewed thahm mat hekith wehs am hab wo e juh.
42021033	Wehs am gm hu hab wo i e juh ihtha Jiosh nahtoi mam in neith. T wabshaba g ni-ne'oki pi hekith gm hu hab wo i e juh.
42021034	“Si g wo s-e nen'oithath mat haha wabsh wo em-ai hegai tash. Mt am hu pi wo mahchk. Pi g am wo sha'i e hiwgith mamt wabsh si mu'i ha'ichu k ed wo e nakogath ch wo si e gegosithath ch wo nawkko'oth ch g e-kihthagkaj wo e kudutath.
42021035	Hegai tash at am hab haha wabsh wo si e juh wehs hemajkam ha tahgio.
42021036	Mt wo si s-e nen'oithath ch wo e ho'ige'ithahunath chum hekith mamt ab wo u'ukch g gewkthag ch s-ap am gahi wo wuhsh wehs ihtha mat am hab wo e juh. Nt pi an hu ha'ichu wo em-abch ahni Jiosh si Kehsha mamt hekith wo ha lothai g hemajkam.”
42021037	Sh g Jesus wehs tashkaj am ha mashcham ge'e cheopi ch ed. Kush mu'ijj am wui thaiw wabsh i sisi'alimath mat ab wo kaiha. Sh am i huhuduk, sh gm hu hihhim ihtham Jesus Olive U'us Kawulk wui ch am koksho.
42022001	Sh am i e aihim mash eda e wushshath matsh wa g Jiosh ha tho'ibia g ha-shohshonbad. Sh heg eda pi e ko'a hegai pahn mo jewajithas.
42022002	Sh g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamtham am wabsh s-a'agi e nakog matsh wo mua g Jesus ch wabshaba s-ha ehbith g hemajkam.
42022003	Kutsh g ge Jiawul Satan an bei g Judas Iscariot.
42022004	Tsh ith am i ha thagito hegam Jesus k am him k am ha wehm a'aga g u'ugchu papal ch ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam ha-ge'ege'ejig mat has masma am wo i thagito g Jesus ha wui.
42022005	Tsh si s-hohho'i ihtham k ab si ahgi mat wo namkith.
42022006	Tsh amjed am i e nako g Judas mat am wo neithath mat s-a'agi wo gagda g Jesus ab ha wui. T pi wo mahchk g hemajkam ab amjed.
42022007	Tsh am hahawa s-ap i e ai hegai ha-shohshonbad ha-tho'ibiathag piast. Kush d wehpeg tash matsh eda wo e koktha g kahwal mahmad.
42022008	Sh g Jesus hab ha ahg g Peter ch John. “Am g wo hihim k am wo i ap'ech g t-gegosig matt wo wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag.”
42022009	Kush hab kaij hegam, “Bahtt hab wo juh g t-gegosig?”
42022010	Sh hab kaij, “Neh, am amt wo hihi Jerusalem wui. T ab hema wo himath g cheoj ch wo wa'igchugath ab ha'a t ab. Kumt am wo i oi. Kut am hu hebai wo him k am wo i wah hema kih ed.
42022011	Kumt hab wo chei ab wui g kihkam, ‘Neh, s-mahchimk o g t-mashchamtham mas an hebai i ha wi'is matt wo wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag.’
42022012	Kut am wo hema em-chehgi g kih. T ith gn hu ha-kih thahm hab wo chu'igk ch wo ge'ejk ch am wo apchuthask. Kumt an ha'ab wo i ap'ech g t-gegosig”
42022013	Kutsh wa woho am hihi ihtham kihhim wui. Tsh wa woho s-ap am hab e juh mash has i ha ahg. Kutsh am i ap'ech g gegosig.
42022014	Tsh am i hud. Kutsh am hahawa thatha hegam ha'i. Tsh g Jesus am i thahiwua mihsa wui. Tsh g chuhchaij am ep thadhaiwua.
42022015	Kush hab kaij ab ha wui, “Si ani tatchua mant wo em-wehm huh ihtha gegosig mant koi wo ni-muhkith
42022016	nant pi pi hekith ia hu em-wehm ep wo huh ihtha hab mahs gegosig. T wabshaba ab wo e ai mat wo s-ap e nahto g em-tho'ibiathag. Kumt an wo ni-wehmajk thahm kahchim ch ed.”
42022017	Mtsh ab hahawa mah g nawait am tahsa ch ed. Kutsh ab i ho'ige'el g Jiosh k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ab g wo beh'i ihtha k wehsijj ab wo ha ih.
42022018	Neh, ahni ant pi hekith ab hu ep wo ih ihtha uhdwis wadag k ab wo ai mat wo e nahto g Jiosh kownaltalig.”
42022019	Neh, bash kaij ch am hahawa bei g chemait k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am i hahain k hab kaij, “Tho ni-honshpadag ihtha mant am i em-hahaini. Ith ani hab ahgch hab kaij mant wo ni-muhkith am em-wehhejed. Ab g wo huhgi ihtha hahainig k ith chum hekith am hab wo junihith mamt hekaj wo s-ni-chegitok.”
42022020	Tsh ab hahawa ep ha mah g wasib k hab kaij, “Tho ni-eh'ed ihtha nawait. Ith ani hab ahgch hab kaij mat g ni-eh'ed wo e iawua mat hekaj am hab wo e juh hegai mo wa g Jiosh hab kaij matsh hab wo em-juni.
42022021	“Neh, hegai mat wo ni-gagda o ia ni-wehm thaha mihsa wui.
42022022	Bant wa masma wo ni-muhkith mat has masma g Jiosh am i ap'ech mat g si Kehshaj wo e muhkith. T wabshaba wo si s-ko'okam e namkith hegai mat wo ni-gagda.”
42022023	Tsh ab ha hekaj a'ai i e kakke mas hedai wud wok ch hab wo e juh.
42022024	Kush am e ne'owin hegam Jesus chuhchai am a'agathch mas hedai d wo si ha'ichuk am ha shahgith.
42022025	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Neh, ab am si e ha'ichuchuth hab sha masma mo g kokownal. S-mahch am mo hegam si s-gewkam an ha u'ukch g e-hemajkamga. Kut hemho wa am hab wo junihith mo haschu ab ha chehani. Mt wabshaba ahpim pi hab masma am wo ha thahmkath g e-wehm wohochuththam. Si amt s-hemajim am wo i ha wehmtath. Hegam kokownal o tatchua mat g hemajkam hab wo ha elithath mo ge'e ha'ichu hab ha junith. Mt wabshaba ahpim pi hab masma hab wo e elithath mam ge'e ha'ichu hab ha junith g hemajkam.
42022027	Aha nam hig hab chum e elith mam d ha-a'amo ch am wo thadhaiwua mat g em-pionag wo em-gegos? Ni eda ahni pi hab masma hab ni-wua, chum anis d em-kownalig ch wabshaba heg ni-wepogith mani d em-pionag.
42022028	“Ahpim amt pi hekith sha'i ni-thagito am oitham g ha'ichu ni-nakogig,
42022029	Kunt heg hekaj wo em-kokownalch hab masma mat g ni-ohg Jiosh ni-kownalch.
42022030	Mt am ni-wehm wo e gegosithath ni-kownaltalig ed. Kunt hab wo em-juh mamt d wo u'usagakamk am ha thahm hegam gamai gohk kawod thakam Tutuligo hemajkam.”
42022031	Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab Simon Peter wui, “Ih, Simon, Jiosh at wo hiwigi g ge Jiawul mat wehsijj wo em-a'appe hab sha masma mat g pilkani hihktham wo nehnich g e-hihka k gm hu wo i gawulkai g mohgaj. Jiawul o hab chum e ahg mat gm hu hab wo i em-juh hab masma mo g mohg.
42022032	Nt wabshaba ab i tai g Jiosh mat wo i gewkaj g m-wohochuthadag, Simon. Kupt am wo i ha gewkemhu g e-wehm wohochuththam mapt hekith ab uhpam wo i e nodagi ni-wui.”
42022033	Sh hab kaij g Peter, “Ni-kownalig, ni-nahtokch ani mant wo ni-kuhpachuth k wo ni-muhkith m-wehm.”
42022034	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Neh, Peter, pi at koi am hu wo kuhu g keli chuchul ith i chuhug ab, kupt waikko hab wo chei map pi sha'i ni-mahch.”
42022035	Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Neh, namd ha'ichu i pi edagi mam wa ahgachug g ha'ichu ni-ahga pi u'uk g e-lial kokstal o g limoshana kokstal o g shuhshk?” Sh hab kaij hegam, “Pi ha'ichu.”
42022036	Sh hab hahawa ha ahg, “Mt wabshaba hemu an wo u'ath g e-lial kih ch e-is-pahyo chum ams hems wo gagda g e-lihwa k hekaj wo hema ha nolawt g is-pahyo.
42022037	Hemho wa at am hab wo e juh ihtha mo ab ni-amjed o'ohanas ch hab chu'ig: Bamt masma ab wo mohto'i g chu'ichig g Jiosh si Kehsha mamt g pi ap hemajkam.”
42022038	Sh hab kaij hegam chuhchaij, “Pegih, t-kownalig, m ia gohk wehch g i'is-papayo.” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Neh, e at ai matt wo hihi.”
42022039	Tsh amjed gm hu hih g Jesus Olive U'us Kawulk t ab mash hab wa e wua. Kutsh oi hegam chuhchaij.
42022040	Tsh am i thatha amai. Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Am g wo e ho'ige'ithahun mamt s-ap wo nako g e-a'appema.”
42022041	Neh, tsh am hahawa ha thagito k am ba'ich sha'i him k am tonwua k e ho'ige'ithahun
42022042	hab kaijch, “Ni-ohg, matp am wo s-ap'ek, pt gm hu hab hig wo i juh hegai si s-ko'ok sho'igthag mo ab ni-wui him. Kuni eda tatchua mat ahpi g m-tatchui hab wo e juh.” [
42022043	Tsh am haha wabsh hema jiwia g anghil ab wui k ab si i gewkaj.
42022044	Kutsh si e kudut k am ba'ich haha wabsh si e ho'ige'ithahu. Kush g wahudthaj am e iawua jewed thahm k d wabsh eh'ed.]
42022045	Tsh am i ha'asa e ho'ige'ithahun k am hih mash am thadha hegam chuhchaij. Kush am kohksh nash pi wabsh i ha ba'iwich g pi ap tahhathkam.
42022046	Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Shahchu am ahgch kohksh? Ab g wo nehnen k wo e ho'ige'ithahu mamt s-ap wo nako g e-a'appema.”
42022047	Sh am wabsh kia neok. Sh ab ha'i ge hihim g hemajkam. Kush heg ha wanimed Judas mash d chum hema kehshaj g Jesus ch ab wui i hih matsh ab wo chintath.
42022048	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Ih, Judas, pt wo ni-gagda ab ni-chintathk ahni Jiosh si Kehsha!”
42022049	Tsh am i nei hegam ha'i Jesus chuhchai mo haschu has e wua k hab kaij, “T-kownalig, natt wo ha cheggia g i'is-papayokaj?”
42022050	Kutsh hema ab si i widu g is-pahyo k g uhgchu pahl neholiga nahk an si hikuch.
42022051	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Am g wo wa i ha'asa,” k an taht ihtha cheoj nahk k thoaj.
42022052	Tsh am wui thatha g u'ugchu papal ch cheopi nuhkuththam ha-ge'ege'ejig ch g ge'eged mat an wo bei. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Bamki ni-elith mani d s-chu ehskam ch hab ia thatha u'ukch g i'is-papayo ch u'us.
42022053	Am ani em-wehm ha'ichug cheopi t am wehs tashkaj. Kumt pi an hu ni-bei. T wabshaba hemu am i em-ap'et. Pi ap'ekam at s-ap am hab wo e juh s-chuhugam k ed.”
42022054	Tsh an bei g Jesus k gm hu i bei uhgchu pahl kih wui. Sh g Peter ga hu wabsh mehkjed ha oith.
42022055	Kutsh eda am ge e nai kolhai ch ed. Kutsh am i jiwia g Peter k am ha wehm thahiwua hegam mo am thadha.
42022056	Kutsh am hema jiwia g chehia pion k am nei g Peter k ab si i neith k hab kaij, “Ihtha o'othham o wa an wehmaj hegai mamt an bei.”
42022057	Tsh wabshaba pi mahch k e ah g Peter hab kaijch, “Pi ani sha'i mahch hegai.”
42022058	Sh am sha'i ha'as. Kutsh am hema ep cheh g Peter k hab kaij, “Ahpi ap d hema hegam Jesus.” Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Peter, “Ih, pi o woho.”
42022059	Sh am hu d i hemako ohla amjed. Kush hema o'othham am si e gewkaj ch hab kaij, “Woho o wa mo ihtha o'othham hab d wa'ap ha wehm o'othham noki pi ab d kihkam Galilee chekshani ch ed.”
42022060	Sh hab kaij, “Pi ani sha'i mahch maps haschu hab ahg.” Neh, sh am wabsh kia neok. Tsh g keli chuchul am si ku.
42022061	Kutsh ab si e sikolkai g Jesus k ab si i nei g Peter. Tsh am wabsh si chegito g Peter g jesus ne'oki mo wa hab kaij, “Koi at wo kuhu g keli chuchul, kupt waikko hab wo wa'i chei map pi ni-mahch.”
42022062	Tsh gm hu hahawa i wuhsh g Peter k si pi ap e tahtk ch shoak.
42022063	Sh hegam mash am nuhkuth g jesus nahnko ahg ch an si ma'ish k wuh g wuhpuij
42022064	k ab si shonikkash ch hab ahg, “Am g hig t-ahgith mas hedai ab m-shonikka.”
42022065	Kush mu'i nahnko ep s-ko'okam ahg.
42022066	Tsh am i mahsi. Kutsh am e nam hegam ge'eged ch u'ugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamtham mash d e jehnigiththam. Kumtsh am ha wui u'apa g Jesus.
42022067	Sh ihtham hab kaij, “Am g t-ahgith maps d Jiosh si Kehsha.” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi amt woho ab hu wo ni-wohoch mantp am wo em-ahgi mani hedai wud.
42022068	Kumt pi woho ab hu wo i nodagi hegai mantp haschu wo em-kakke.
42022069	Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mant i'ajed an s-apkojed hugithaj an wo thak g Jiosh ahni si Kehshaj.”
42022070	Kush wehsijj hab kaij, “A kuptp d Jiosh alithag?” Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Thani ahni.”
42022071	Sh hab kaij hegam, “Neh, pi ach sha'i hema tatchua mat wo si s-mahch k ah. Ahchim ach hejel kah mo si pi ap neok ab Jiosh t amjed ch hekaj wo chum e muhkith.”
42023001	Kutsh wehsijj hegam haha'ichu ab si e wehmt k am i bei g Jesus heg wui mash d kownal am Judea chekshani ch ed ch hab chehgig Pilate.
42023002	Sh ab ha kaiham. Kush ab wui ab ha'ichu abchuthahim g Jesus hab kaijch, “Neh, ihtha o'othham o im hu hab wabsh i ha wawan g t-hemajkamga hab ha ahgch mat pi wo namkith g ge'e kownal. Kuch kah mo hab hejel e ahg mo d jiosh si Kehsha ch d uhg kownal. Kupt hemho wa wo mua.”
42023003	Kush ab kakke g Pilate g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Nap d ha-kownalig g Tutuligo hemajkam?” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Thani ahni.”
42023004	Tsh g Pilate am i mamche hegai mam ab abchuth. Sh eda mu'i an oiopo g hemajkam s-neithamk mo has e wua. Tsh g Pilate am ha kaichuthk hab ha ah g u'ugchu papal, “Pi ant ha'ichu sha'i cheh mas pi ap hab juh ihtha o'othham mat heg hekaj wo e muhkith.”
42023005	Kush wabshaba ba'ich i e gewpkath ch hab kaij, “Am o ha chu'amun g t-wehm o'othham ha'ichu ha mashchamch wehsko ga hu Galilee t amjed ch ia Judea ch ed ch chum hems iia Jerusalem ch ed.”
42023006	Tsh am i kah g Pilate ihtha k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Kutp ab Galilee chekshani ch ed d kihkam ihtha o'othham?”
42023007	Kumsh am ahgith mash am ha'ab d kihkam. Sh g Herod am d ha-kownalig Galilee chekshani ch ed ch ia'i ithani am hab wa'ap ha'ichug Jerusalem t am. Kumtsh heg hekaj am wui u'apa g Jesus.
42023008	Kush si s-hehgig g Herod nash pi tash wa'i chum s-neithamk hab chum e ahgch matp hems am tahgio hab wo juh g s-hasig ha'ichu.
42023009	Kumtsh am kei tahgio. Kush mu'i ha'ichu kakke. Sh wabshaba pi has sha'i kaij g Jesus.
42023010	Kush g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamtham am gegok ch si s-gewkam ab ha'ichu abchuth g Jesus.
42023011	Sh g Herod g e-shonthalig ha wehm haha wabsh nahnko ahg g Jesus ch si ash k ash g si s-kehg kahba ab wahki. Tsh ab hahawa ha cheha g Herod mat wo uhpam bei am Pilate wui.
42023012	Kutsh heg i tash ab g Pilate ch Herod ab hahawa e nawojt k ash eda chum s-e keh'ith.
42023013	Tsh g Pilate am i ha hemapai g u'ugchu papal ch ha wanimedtham g hemajkam
42023014	k ash hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ia amt u'apa ihtha o'othham ni-wui hab kaijch mo go'olko ha wanimed g hemajkam. Kunt hemuch ia em-kaichuthk am i mamche hegai mam ab abchuth k pi ha'ichu sha'i cheh mas pi ap hab junihim.
42023015	Kutsh Herod hab wa'ap pi ha'ichu sha'i cheh. T g shonthaligaj ab uhpam i u'apa t-wui. Pi atki ha'ichu hab juh ihtha mas heg hekaj wo e muhkith.
42023016	Kunt wabsh wo ha cheha mat wo gewittan k wo thagito.” [
42023017	Neh, bash kaij nash pi am hema i thathagitosh g lihso ha wehhejed wehs ahith ab mo eda hab e wua hegai ge'e gegosig.]
42023018	Kush wehsijj hegam mu'i hemajkam mo am ha'ichug si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Pi ach tatchua ihtha. Barabbas apt wo i thagito t-wehhejed.”
42023019	Sh eda ihtha Barabbas am e kuhpch nash pi chum ha'i ha wehm cheggia g kownal ch ha'i ha koktha.
42023020	Sh am ep chum ha wehm neok g Pilate nash pi chum s-thagitoimk g jesus.
42023021	Sh wabshaba am ep si s-kaitham hab ge kaij mu'ikko, “Mu'ani! Mu'ani ab kots t ab!”
42023022	Sh hab ep chum kaij g Pilate, “A t haschu pi ap hab juh. Pi ant ha'ichu sha'i cheh mas heg hekaj wo e muhkith. Ab ant wo ha cheha mat wo gewittan k wo thagito.”
42023023	Sh wabshaba am wabsh si s-kaitham hab kaij matsh ab wo naggia kots t ab. Neh, tsh g ha-hihinki gewito g Pilate.
42023024	Tsh am i ap'ech mat am hab wo e juh g ha-tatchui.
42023025	Kumtsh gm hu i wuhshath hegai mash d ha cheggiadkam ch d ha mu'akam k amtsh g Jesus am i thagito ha wui mat am hab wo juh mo has i elith.
42023026	Kumtsh gm hu i bei g Jesus ab kushwiotachuthk g kots. Kush am hu hebai hihim. Tsh ab hema i ha nam g o'othham mash ab him Jerusalem wui. Ith ash hab chehgig Simon ch ab d kihkam mash am d Cyrene ch ash ab him ga hu o'oithag amjed. Kumtsh am wabsh si be k ab kushwiotach g kots k atsh hab juh mat ab oithk wo himath g Jesus.
42023027	Kush mu'i hemajkam ab oithch hihim. Sh g u'uwi si shoanihim wehhejed.
42023028	Tsh ab i ha nei g Jesus k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am ni-wehhejed wo shoanith, ahpim Jerusalem t am kihkam, ch wabshaba hejel e wehhejed ch e-a'aliga ha wehhejed.
42023029	Ab o him g tash mat hab wo chei g hemajkam mo si ha'ichu s-ha abamk hegam u'uwi mat pi hekith sha'i mahmadt.
42023030	Woho o wa mat s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu hab wo e juh am ni-tahgio. T wabshaba ba'ich i s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu hab haha wo juh am ha tahgio hegam mo d pi ap chu'ijkam ch pi ab hu ni-wui e nohnogimk. (30) Hegam at pi wo e nako mas heg wo nako k heg hekaj wo chum tatchua mat g thohtha'ag am ha thahm wo i shulig k wo ha ehsto.”
42023032	Kumsh gohk ep ha u'a mamtsh am wehmaj wo ha koktha. Sh ihtham d pi ap hehemajkam.
42023033	Kumtsh an thatha anai mash am hab e a'aga Koshwak. Tsh g shonthal ab hahawa sisish g Jesus kots t ab k am i kei g kots wag ch ed k gn hu a'ai hab wa'ap ha nahngia hegam pi ap hehemajkam kokots t ab.
42023034	Tsh ab hahawa e ho'ige'ithahu g Jesus k hab kaij, “Ni-ohg Jiosh, ab g wabsh si i s-ha ho'ige'ith hegam mat ab ni-naggia. Pi o sha'i mahch mani d si m-Kehsha ch d s-ap'ekam.” Kutsh g shonthal am e chichwi k g wehschugaj e to'i.
42023035	Sh g hemajkam am gegok ch neith wehs ihtha. Sh g ha wanimedtham nahnko ahg g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Ha at tho'ibia ha'i, pegih, k hejel wo e tho'ibia matp d Jiosh si Kehsha.”
42023036	Kush g shonthal hab wa'ap nahnko wua ch hab wabsh s-junim k ab chum mah g nawait
42023037	ch wabsh nahnko ahg hab kaijch, “Oi g hejel e tho'ibiad napsh pi d ge kownal.”
42023038	Sh am thahm o'ohadag ihtha, “Ith o d Tutuligo hemajkam ha-kownalig.”
42023039	Kush hema hegam pi ap hehemajkam mash ab hab wa'ap naggia kots t ab ab si s-ko'okam has ahg g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Neh, kuptp d ge Jiosh si Kehsha, pegih, k wo hejel e tho'ibia k ahchim ep wo t-tho'ibia.”
42023040	Kush g hema ab si s-keh'ith ihtha ch hab kaij, “Aha nap pi ehbith g Jiosh. Ia ach t-wehm nahngia ch ab t-wepo mohto'ithas g chu'ichig.
42023041	Kuch ahchim s-ap ab mohto'ithas nach pi wa woho d pi ap chu'ijkam. Kutsh eda ihtha pi hab sha'i juh g pi ap'ekam.”
42023042	Neh, bash kaij ihtha hema ch ab Jesus wui hab hahawa ep kaij, “Jesus, ab apt wo wa al s-ni-chegitok hekith ab bek g e-kownaltalig.”
42023043	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Neh, ni ab si m-ahgith mapt ith i tashkaj wo ni-wehmajk an Jiosh kihthag ed.”
42023044	Kutsh am i thahm juh. Tsh muh g tash k wehsko s-chuhugam ch ab ai g waik ohla.
42023045	Kutsh am ge'e cheopi ch ed g s-kowk ikus kuhpadag ab si shel e wantsh.
42023046	Kush am si s-kaitham e ho'ige'ithahun g Jesus Jiosh wui ch hab kaij, “Ni-ohg, ab ant i m-mah g ni-thoakag.” Neh, bash che'iok am i muh.
42023047	Kutsh am i nei g shonthal ha-ge'ejig matsh haschu has e juh k ab si ihm g Jiosh ch hab kaij, “Woho oki d s-ap'ekam o'othham ihtha.”
42023048	Tsh amjed mu'ijj gm hu uhpam hihi hegam mash ab neith ab wabsh e wecho wahpkch nash pi oi wa si ap e tatat.
42023049	Kush wehsijj hegam mo si s-mahch g Jesus ga hu wabsh mehk gegok ch ab neith wehs ihtha. Ha'i ihtham ash d hegam u'uwi mash ga hu Galilee t amjed an wehmajkahim g Jesus.
42023050	Sh eda wa hema hegam e jehnigiththam chum pi hohho'ith matsh g wehmaj e jehnigiththam s-mu'am k ah g Jesus. Ith ash hab chehgig Joseph ch ab d kihkam mash am d Arimathea ch s-ap d o'othham ch ab nenida g Jiosh kownaltalig.
42023052	Tsh hekith am i muh g Jesus, tsh ha hekaj am wui hih g Pilate k ab si e sho'igchuth k tahni g honshpadaj. Tsh am wa ap'ech matsh wo bei.
42023053	Tsh gm hu ep him k ab i huduni. Sh am mia hab chu'ig g hiha'ini ch ab heki hu cheotas hothai ch ed ch pi koi e hekaj. Tsh g Joseph am i bei g honshpadag k gd hu heg eda cheh am i hobinodk g s-kehg ikuskaj.
42023054	Tsh hegam u'uwi mo wehmajkahim g Jesus ab Galilee t amjed gm hu oi g Joseph k ash neith mat hebai e cheh g Jesus k has masma ab e woi. (54) Kush d wialos. Sh g hemajkam chum e nakog no pi g shahwai d ha-mihshmetha tash.
42023056	Kutsh gm hu uhpam hihi ihtham u'uwi mash hebai thadha k am i ap'ech ha'ichu mat hekaj wo s-ap hab juh mo hab masma hab ha wua g e-ko'ithag k ash am hahawa e ulinihogi mihshmetha tash ch ed mo hab masma d ha-chehanig.
42024001	Sh am e aihim g thomig tash. Tsh am hihi ihtham u'uwi hiha'ini wui k ash u'a hegai matsh am nahto matsh hekaj wo i ap'ech g muhki.
42024002	Kush gm hu e melchuthas hegai ge'e hothai mash ab hekaj e kuhpch g hiha'ini.
42024003	Tsh am i wahp k pi sha'i edagi g muhki
42024004	k am wabsh i gegok pi amichuthch ihtha. Tsh am haha wabsh gohk i e chehgi ha wui mo hab sha mahs mo g o'othham. Kush wabsh si tonod g ha'ichu ha-eniga.
42024005	Kutsh si e totoths ihtham u'uwi k ab si i shul jewedo. Sh hab kaij ihtham gohk ab ha wui, “Shahchu am ahgch ia gahg hiha'ini t am hegai mo d thoakam?
42024006	Pi o ia hu ha'ichug g Jesus nat pi i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed. Am g wo i chegito mo wa has kaij ab em-wui. Am am wa wabsh kia ha'ichug Galilee t am.
42024007	K wa hab kaij, ‘Hemho ant am wo wa i ni-thagito pi ap'ekam hemajkam ha wui ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. T hegam ab wo ni-naggia kots t ab mat wo ni-mua. Nt wabshaba wo i wuhsh muhkig amjed am heg eda waik tash amjed.’ Neh, bo kaij g Jesus ab em-wui.”
42024008	Kutsh ihtham u'uwi am i chegito mash wa hab kaij g Jesus
42024009	k ga hu uhpam hihim k ash am ha ahgith hegam gamai hemako Jesus chuhchai ch wehs g ha'i mat has e juh.
42024010	Ha'i ihtham u'uwi mash am ha ahgith ash d Mary Magdalene ch Joanna ch hegai Mary mash g madaj hab chehgig James.
42024011	Kush hegam Jesus chuhchai pi ab hu ha wohochuth nash pi hab ha elith mo wabsh pi e mahch ch hab kaij.
42024012	Tsh wabshaba g Peter am i e nakog k am meh hiha'ini wui k gd hu meliw k am i koachsh. Kush heg am wa'i kahch s-kehg ikus mash heg hekaj chum e hobinodch. Tsh amjed gm hu uhpam hih am wabsh i pi amichuthch matsh haschu has e juh.
42024013	Kush heg wa'i tash gohkajj am hihim Emmaus kihhim wui. Ith amt ab wo ai kihhim am hu i gohk ohla ab am hihimathch Jerusalem t amjed.
42024014	Sh ihtham am hihimath ch neneok ab amjed hegai matsh haschu has e juh am tahgio g Jesus.
42024015	Tsh g Jesus am ha a'a k am ha wehm hih.
42024016	Kush hi wa chum neith ch wabsh pi amichuth.
42024017	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Shahchu am am si a'agath ch ia hihim?” Tsh am wabsh i gegokiwua k si pi ap e tahtkam mahs.
42024018	Sh hema ihtham hab chehgig Cleopas ch ith hab kaij ab wui, “Aha nap ahpi wa'i hejel pi mahch mat haschu has e juh hemuch hu'i ch eda am thaha Jerusalem t am?”
42024019	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Shahchu ap hab ahg?” Kush hab kaij ihtha, “Hegai mat hab e juh am tahgio hegai mo hab chehgig Jesus ch ab d kihkam Nazareth t ab. Heg oki d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. K wehsijj ab si has elith mo haschu hab junihim ch has i kaij.
42024020	Kut g u'ugchu papal ch t-wanimedtham am i thagito kownal wui mat wo mua. Kumt ab sisish kots t ab k mua.
42024021	Kuch eda ith hab chum si elith mo d hegai matsh wa wo t-tho'ibia ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam. K hemuch d i waik tash amjed mat hab e juh.
42024022	Kut am ha'i hihi g u'uwi t-wehm wohochuththam wabsh i si'alim
42024023	k atsh pi cheh g muhki k uhpam thatha k t-toths am t-ahgithch matsh am ha'i i e chehgi g anghil ha wui. Sh ihtham hab ha ahgith mo d thoakam g Jesus.
42024024	T am ha'i hihi g chechoj hiha'ini wui k am s-mai mash wa woho pi am hu ha'ichug g muhki mo hab chum kaij hegam u'uwi.”
42024025	Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “S-wohom am hig pi ha'ichu a'amichuth ch pi wohochuth hegai mo wa g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam am ahg.
42024026	No hig pi hab wa mahs mat hab masma wo e sho'igch g Jiosh si Kehsha k am wo i wah si s-kehg e-ap'ethag ed.”
42024027	Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch amjed am i wuhshath k am tashogi wehs hegai matki g Mosesbad ch wehs hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam an o'oha ab amjed.
42024028	Kutsh am hihim k am i aihi hegai al kihhim mo am wui d hihimtham. Sh gm hu wabsh i si him g Jesus.
42024029	Kush wabshaba an shoshobith ch hab kaij, “Ia apt wo wa'i jiwia t-wehm. Hudunihim o k ch ab i s-chuhugamhi.” Kutsh wa woho am ha wehm i jiwia.
42024030	Tsh am wo i gegos. Tsh am bei g chemait k am e ho'ige'ithahun k am hahawa hahain k ab ha mah.
42024031	Kutsh am hahawa i amich. Tsh wabshaba am wabsh i pi'ata.
42024032	Sh hab hahawa kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Neh, ab at wa si i t-shuhthath g s-ap tahhathkam mo wa ab t-wehm neokhim ch am tashogith g Jiosh o'ohana mach ab hihim wohg oithch.”
42024033	Tsh am ha hekaj i e nakog k gm hu uhpam hihi Jerusalem wui. Kush am e hemapathch hegam gamai hemako Jesus chuhchai ha'i ha wehm g e-wehm wohochuththam. Tsh am thatha ihtham gohk.
42024034	Kush hegam am ha ahgith ch hab kaij, “Neh, woho atki i wuhsh g t-kownalig Jesus ab muhkig amjed. Kutsh g Simon nei.”
42024035	Kush ihtham gohk am hahawa epai ha ahgith matsh haschu has e juh am wohg ch ed ch heg ehp matsh amich g Jesus matsh am hahai g chemait.
42024036	Sh am wabsh kia a'aga ihtha. Sh am haha wabsh kehk ha shahgith g Jesus ch ash hab kaij ab ha wui, “Am g wo s-ap e tahtkkath.”
42024037	Kutsh sha'i si e totoths hab em-ahgch mo d wabsh kok'oi.
42024038	Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g wo sha'i e kudut k ab wabsh wo s-ni-wohochuthath.
42024039	Ab g wo i neith g ni-nohnhoi ch ni-tahtad k wo s-mai mani d ahni. Ab g wo ni-tahtam k wo nei mani pi d kok'oi. Kok'oi o pi ha chuhkug ch pi ha oh'o mani ahni hemuch imhab chu'ig.”
42024040	Kush hab che'iok ab ha chehgi g e-nohnhoi ch e-tahtad.
42024041	Kush chum si s-ap e tahtk ch wabshaba wabsh i haha'athka natsh pi wabsh i pi mai mat has wo el. Kush heg hekaj ab ha kakke mas am ha'ichu chekch mat wo hu.
42024042	Kutsh ab ge mah g watopi ga'i.
42024043	Kutsh ab be k huh. Sh ith wehsijj neith.
42024044	Kush hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui, “Wehs ani am em-ahgith ihtha heki hu. Wehs ha'ichu at hemho wa am hab wo e juh mo an o'ohanas ab ni-amjed ha-o'ohana ed g Mosesbad ch hegam ha'i kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch heg eda nen'ei o'ohana mo an hab chu'ig Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed.”
42024045	Neh, bash kaij ch ab hahawa i ha mah g amichuthadag mat wo s-amich g Jiosh o'ohana
42024046	k ash hab kaij ab ha wui, “Bant masma hab ni-juh mo wa hab chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed mant hab wo wa ni-juh. An o o'ohanas mantsh wo ni-sho'igchuth k wo ni-muhkith. Kutsh d wo i waik tashk amjed. Ntsh ep wo ni-chegito. Neh, heg ant hab juh.
42024047	Kut ia Jerusalem t amjed am a'ai wo i e ahgahi gm hu wehsko jejewed ha thahm mat g hemajkam ab wo i ni-hiwig k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. T g Jiosh im hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig.
42024048	Ahpim amt am wo ahgahith ihtha si s-has ha'ichu mam neith ch kah.
42024049	T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wo em-mah g gewkthag mamt hab wo junihith. Heg ant am wo cheha mat wo em-wehmajkath hab masma mo g ni-ohg Jiosh hab kaij mat hab wo e juh. Mt heg hekaj ia wo thadkath Jerusalem t ab ch ab wo ai mamt ab wo bei hegai gewkthag.”
42024050	Tsh am hahawa i ha wanim amai mash am miabithch g Bethany. Tsh am hu hebai i thatha. Kutsh am uhgk ul g e-nohnhoi ha thahm k ab ha ho'ige'elith,
42024051	Tsh g Jiosh gm hu i bei thahm kahchim wui.
42024052	Sh ihtham ab si has elith ch gm hu hahawa hihi Jerusalem wui s-hehgigch
42024053	k amjed chum hekith am hihhim ge'e cheopi wui ch ab ho'ige'elith g Jiosh.
43001001	Gd hu i si wehpeg ash d thoakam hegai mach hab a'aga Jiosh Ne'oki. Ith ash d Jiosh ch am wehmaj g e-ohg Jiosh.
43001002	Jiosh ash am e wehm thahshch mash eda pi koi ha'ichu sha'i nahtois
43001003	ch am i kei matsh wehs ha'ichu wo nahto. Kutsh wa woho wehs ha'ichu nahto
43001004	k an u'ukch g gewkthag ch wehs ha mah g ha'ichu thoakam g thoakag. K ihtha thoakag am tonlithch g hemajkam chegitoithag.
43001005	K wabshaba g hemajkam pi e nakog hejel mas wo s-amich mo haschu chum ha tashogith.
43001006	Am ad hema i kei g Jiosh g o'othham mat wo t-mihshmath. D ith hab chehgig John.
43001007	D g mihshmethaj hab chu'ig matsh in wo i wuhsh jewed thahm hegai mo ab t-mahkch g t-thoakag. K hab d elithaj g Jiosh mat wehs hemajkam wo kah ihtha ha'ichu ahga k ab wo hiwgath hegai mat in i wuhsh.
43001008	Pi ad hejel hab e ahg g John ch wabsh heg an ahgachug mad in i wuhsh.
43001009	Ith o d wohokam tonlig ch am tonlithch g wehs hemajkam ha-chegitoithag.
43001010	Pegih, d ia ha'ichug g Jiosh Ne'oki jewed e-nahtoi thahm. D wabshaba hemajkam nahtoij pi amichuth.
43001011	Ia adki mahsi k d t-wehm o'othham. D eda mu'ijj g Tutuligo pi amichuth ch pi ab hu hiwig.
43001012	Kuchd wabshaba ha'ijj ab i s-wohoch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha k ab hiwig. Kud heg hekaj ab t-mah g ap'ethag matt d haha wo a'aligajk g Jiosh.
43001013	Pi ach heg wabsh hekaj d Jiosh a'aliga matt in mamsi o heg wabsh hekaj mo g t-jehj ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh o heg wabsh hekaj mach hab t-elith machs d a'aligaj. Jiosh at hab t-juh mach d hahawa a'aligaj.
43001014	Hegai mo d Jiosh Ne'oki ad e wepogi g hemajkam k woho t-wepo chu'ig ch ia t-shahgith d thoakam. D g John an a'aga k si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ith o d hegai mani hab ahg ch am em-ahgith mat ab hema wabsh ni-oithk wo i e maskogith k eda woho d si s-has ha'ichu nash pi chum hekith an ha'ichug.” Neh, bo kaij g John. Kuchd heg amjed s-mahch g Jesus Christ ch am hahawa s-mai moki d Jiosh alithag ch si s-hemajima ch heg wa'i ahg wohokam ch woho ab si s-t-ho'ige'ith.
43001017	Thash Mosesbad matsh wa an o'oha g Jiosh chehanig am ha wehhejed g hemajkam. K wabshaba d Jesus Christ mad ia u'apa g Jiosh hemajimatalig ch wohokam.
43001018	Pi oki hekith hedai sha'i e-wuhpuikaj neith g Jiosh. K wabshaba g alithaj am wehmaj d hemako ch ab t-wui mahsko wua.
43001019	Am ad t-mihshmath ihtha John tohono jewed ch ed. K eda am Jerusalem kihhim t am thadha g t-ge'egedga ahchim Tutuligo. Tsh am i ha ai g ha'ichu kaitha ab amjed g John. Kutsh am ha'i ha cheha g papal ch hegam mo d papal ha wehm chikpantham matsh wo s-mai mas hedai wud hegai John. Tsh ihtham am hihim k am thatha k ab s-mahchim mas hedai chum e elith ab wui hab kaijch, “Nap hab chum e elith map d Jiosh si Kehsha?”
43001020	D ab wabsh si ha wehm neok g John ch am si tasho ha ahgith mo pi d hegai.
43001021	D ab ep kakke, “Aha nap d hegai Elijabad ch ia uhpam jiwia?” D g John hab kaij, “Pia'a, pi ani d hegai.” D ab ep kakke, “Nap d hegai Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam matsh in wo i wuhsh?” D hab ep kaij, “Pia'a, pi ani d hegai.”
43001022	D hab hahawa kaij, “Pegih, k am wo t-ahgi map hedai wud. Hemho wa att am wo ha ahgi g t-ge'egedga map has e a'aga.”
43001023	D g John hab hahawa kaij, “Ahni ani wud mo hab ni-ahg ch an o'ohanas: Hema atsh gm hu jeg ed wo ha mihshmath g hemajkam hab kaijch, ‘Neh, in atsh wo i wuhsh jewed thahm hegai mo d ge kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. Kumt heg wehhejed wo i e nako am thagitok g pi ap e-chu'ichig.’ Neh, ith o d ne'okij hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab chehgig Isaiah,” bad kaij g John.
43001024	Ihtham mad ab ha'ichu kakke g John o d ha'i hegam mo hab e a'aga Palasi. K hegam Palasi chum si nuhkuth g t-himthag.
43001025	D heg hekaj hab ep kaij ihtham ab John wui, “Pegih, p haschu ahgch ha pahl wapkon ch eda wa chum pi d Jiosh si Kehsha ch pi d Elijabad ch pi d hegai Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam matsh in wo i wuhsh?”
43001026	D hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui, “Ha ani pahl wapkon mat wo i e nako. Hemu at in wo i wuhsh hegai mo hig woho d si s-has ha'ichu, pej hemu ia ha'ichug em-shahgith. Kum pi amichuth.
43001027	Pi g hab wo ni-elithath manis ahni d si ha'ichu. Ihtha mat am ni-oithk wo i wuhsh at wehs ha ba'ich d wo i si ha'ichuk.”
43001028	Neh, wehs ihtha ad hab e juh gn hu aigojed g Jordan akimel mo am d wahlko kih.
43001029	Am ba'ich d i tash, d am jiwia g Jesus John wui. D heg an a'aga ch hab kaij, “Neh, ith o d hegai mat wo e wepogi g kahwal mad k ab wo e iagchul Jiosh wui mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
43001030	Ith ani hab ahg mani wa hab em-ahgith mat ab wabsh ni-oithk wo i wuhshani k wabshaba wehs ha ba'ich d i si ha'ichu no pi chum hekith an ha'ichug.
43001031	Pi ani hab wa sha'i mahch mas hedai d wo Jiosh si Kehshak. K wabshaba g Jiosh am ni-chehani mant wo ha pahl wapko g hemajkam. T hab wa masma am wo tashogi g si e-Kehsha am t-wui ahchim Tutuligo.” Neh, bad kaij g John.
43001032	D am hebai i cheka, d si s-mahch ch ahg g John hab kaijch, “Bo kaij g Jiosh ab ni-wui, ‘Ab at wo i hud g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag k ab wo e ul si ni-Kehsha ab. Kupt hab wo s-mahchk mo d ihtha mat wo ha mah g hemajkam g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.’ Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh ab ni-wui. Kut wa woho si s-hemajim ab i hud g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag k ab e ul ith ab Jesus hab masma mat g hohhi an hasko wo i thahiwua ab i hudunik.
43001034	Kunt wa neith k heg hekaj si s-mahch mo ihtha Jesus d Jiosh alithag.”
43001035	Am ba'ich d i tash, d am ep ha'ichug g John. Kuchd gohkajj an wehmaj ahchim mach ab si wecho t-mashcham.
43001036	D ab him g Jesus. Kud g John neidok hab kaij, “Neh, m ia him hegai matsh kahwal mad wepo wo e iagchul am t-wehhejed.”
43001037	Kuchd am i kah ahchim gohk k gm hu i oi g Jesus.
43001038	D ab ha'ab i e wua k ab i t-neith k hab kaij, “Shahchu am tatchua?” Ch hab kaij, “Bahp thak ch amjed ha mashcham?”
43001039	D hab kaij, “Oi g wo ni-oith k wo nei mani hebai tha.” Kuchd gm hu oith k am wehmajkahim im hu i juhk amjed ch ga hu si ai g s-chuhugam.
43001040	Hegai mad ni-wehm kah g John ch am i oi g Jesus o hab chehgig Andrew. K g wehngaj ihtha hab chehgig Simon.
43001041	K g Andrew d wehpegkam mat am i gahghi g e-wehnag k hekith am i chehg k hab ahgith, “Cheh att hegai moki d Christ.” (Ith o hab d ahga ‘Jiosh si Kehsha.’)
43001042	D g Andrew am hahawa u'apa Jesus wui. T ab si shel i nei g Jesus k hab kaij, “S-mahch ahni map d Simon ch d alithaj hegai mo hab chehgig Jonas. I'ajed apt hab wo chehgigk Peter.” (Ith o hab d ahga ‘Hothai.’)
43001043	Am ba'ich d i tash, d hab i e ah g Jesus mat gm hu wo hih Galilee chekshani wui. K eda an oimmed hegai mo hab chehgig Philip ch am d kihkam Bethsaida t am. (Ahchim g Andrew ch Peter ha wehm ach am hab wa'ap d kihkam Bethsaida t am.) Jesus ad am cheh g Philip k hab kaij ab wui, “Ab g i ni-oith k wo ni-wehmajk.”
43001045	D g Philip gm hu i gahghi g Nathanael k am i chehgiok hab kaij, “Cheh att hegai matki wa ab amjed an o'oha hegam Mosesbad ch kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Heg oki wud mash d Jesus ch heg d alithag mash d Josephbad ch ab Nazareth kihhim t ab d kihkam.”
43001046	D ab wabsh ge i nen k hab kaij, “Ih, nat hig woho ha'ichu s-ap'ekam wo i wuhsh ab Nazareth t amjed?” D g Philip hab kaij, “Pegih, k ab wo i him k hejel e-wuhpuikaj wo nei.”
43001047	D ga hu haha wabsh i hihim. D g Jesus neith k hab kaij, “Neh, ith o d si o'othham m ab him.”
43001048	D g Nathanael hab kaij, “P has masma s-ni-mahch?” D hab kaij g Jesus, “M ani wabsh tonlith ch m-neith map am tha suhna wecho mat eda koi m-cheh g Philip.”
43001049	D hab kaij g Nathanael, “Ih, neh, kupki d Jiosh alithag ch d t-kownalig ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam.”
43001050	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab ap ni-hiwig nani pi am wabsh tonlith ch m-neith. Nt wo si shel m-ahgi mapt ba'ich i s-ta neithamam ha'ichu wo nei imhab i ba'ich.
43001051	Thani Jiosh si Kehsha ch am wo kuhpi'o g thahm kahchim am em-wehhejed. Kumt wo nei mat am wui wo i chehchsh g anghil ab ni-amjed k ab ni-wui ep wo i huhud.”
43002001	Am gohk d i tash amjed, tsh am ha'i wo e hohont Cana kihhim t am. Ihtha Cana o am Galilee chekchani ch ed. K am ha'ichug g Jesus je'e.
43002002	Kumd ahchim ab i t-wai. Chd am hihi g Jesus wehm k am ha'ichug. Kumd am hahawa hab juh g gegosig.
43002003	D wabshaba am i huh g nawait. D g Jesus je'e ab wui hab kaij, “Huh at g ha-nawait.”
43002004	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi o ab hu ha'ichu ni-him heg amjed. Pi at koi chum e ai mant am wo i ni-maskogi.”
43002005	D wabshaba g je'ej hab ha ahg g pion, “Am g hab wo juhni matp haschu wo i em-ahgi mamt am hab wo juh.”
43002006	K eda d t-himthag ahchim Tutuligo mach mu'i ha'ichu has masma wapkon. D g hohothai haha'a chuhthp am thadha mamt ab wo chum wa'ig k am hab wo junihith g t-himthag. D ihtham haha'a hemako am hu i waikko wehst-mahm walohn shuhthagi am wo e toa.
43002007	D hab kaij g Jesus am ha wui g pion, “Am g wo i ha shuhshuth g shuhthagikaj.” D wa woho am si i ha shuhshuth.
43002008	D hab hahawa ep ha ahg, “Am g wo wassibi k wo mah hegai mo nuhkuth g e-hohontam piast.” D wa woho hab e juh k am i wassibi k gd hu ha mah.
43002009	D ab jeh mo d si s-kehg nawait k eda pi mahch mas hebai wa'i. Hegam o hi wa s-mahch pion mat hebai wa'i.
43002010	D am i cheh g ha-hohntam am i jehk g nawait k hab kaij ab wui, “Sha'i s-ap ab kahk ihtha nawait. Ha'i at an hi wo wa i ha wassibi g s-kehg nawait ga hu i wehpeg k wabsh g pi kehg nawait wo ha wassibi im hu i oithch. Kuptki eda ahpi im hu i oithch g si s-kehg nawait ha wassibi.”
43002011	Neh, k ith d si wehpeg s-hasig ha'ichu hab junij g Jesus. D am mahsko wua g e-gewkthag. Kuchd ab si s-wohochuth mo woho d Jiosh si Kehsha.
43002012	D am hahawa hab i e ah g Jesus matt am wo hihi Capernaum kihhim wui. D g je'ej ch wepngaj ep t-oi. Ch am ha'ichugkahim he'ekia tash.
43002013	Wehs ahith ab o am e wushshath Jerusalem t am matsh wa g Jiosh ha tho'ibia g t-shohshon. Kud am i e ai. Kuchd gm hu hihim
43002014	k gd hu thatha ge'e cheopi t am. D eda am ha'i ha gagda g haiwani ch kahwal ch hohohi ch am ha'i kammialt g lial heg wehhejed.
43002015	Kud si pi hohho'i g Jesus mo ith am hab e wua ge'e cheopi t am k hekaj hema gewikudt g wijinakaj k gm hu wehs si ha shahmuth g haiwani ch kahwal k am gai ha shul g ha-mimsa hegam mo g lial kammialt k gm hu si gantad g ha-lialiga
43002016	k hab ha ahg hegam mo g hohohi ha gagda mat gm hu wo i ha wuwhas hab kaijch, “Pi g hab wo sha'i juhni g ni-ohg kih mat d wabsh wo ha'ichu gagdakudk.”
43002017	Kuchd am hahawa i chegito mo g Jiosh heki o'ohana hab chu'ig: Jiosh si Kehsha at ab wo si has elithath g ge'e cheopi.
43002018	D ab si chehmo g haha'ichu k hab ahg, “Shahchu ap ahgch hab wua ihtha? Am g hig t-chehgith g s-hasig ha'ichu. Kutt hab wo s-mahchk map u'ukch g e-gewkthag ab amjed g Jiosh.”
43002019	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih oig, m ant wo wa em-chehgi g s-hasig ha'ichu. Mt wo padch ihtha mo g Jiosh am eda kih. Kunt ahni ep wo i kegch mat d wo i waik tashk.”
43002020	D ihtham si e sho'oshodkath k hab kaij, “Gi'ikko gamai chuhthp (46) a'ahith ab at hahawa i e nahto ihtha ge'e cheopi. Kuptp eda ahpi waik tash ab ia wo i kei.”
43002021	K eda g Jesus hejel hab e ahg mat wo e muhkith k uhpam ep wo e chegito.
43002022	Kutt s-chegito g ne'okij mat hekith uhpam e chegito am e muhkithk. Neh, bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana mat uhpam wo e chegito g Jiosh si Kehsha. Kutt hahawa s-amichuth k ab s-wohoch.
43002023	Am achd ha'ichugkahim Jerusalem t am wehs oitham g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag wuhshtha. Kud mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch g Jesus. D wabshaba pi am hu i e tashogi ha wui mas hedai wud no pi s-mahch mo heg wabsh hekaj ab s-wohochuth mo am neith mo hab juni him g s-hasig ha'ichu.
43002025	Pi o hedai ab hu hiwig g Jesus mas am wo ahgi g hemajkam ha-chegitoi no pi heki hu s-mahch.
43003001	Am ad hema d si s-has ha'ichu am t-himthag ed ch d ge Palasi ch hab chehgig Nicodemas.
43003002	Kuchd am hu hebai thadha chuhug ch ed. D ith am i chehgim g Jesus k hab kaij ab wui, “S-mahch ach mat am i m-kei g Jiosh mapt wo t-mashcha. Pi at hedai wo e nako mas hejel hab wo juh hegai s-hasig ha'ichu map hab junihim. Jiosh oki ab m-mahkch g gewkthag.”
43003003	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo si shel m-ahgi mat hegam d wo wa'i Jiosh hemajkamgak mat hedai gokko wo mamsi. Bo wa chu'ig g Jiosh kownaltalig.”
43003004	D hab kaij g Nicodemas, “Tt has hig masma ep wo mahsi heki hu kelitk. Aha natt am ep wo i wah t-je'e ed k ep wo mahsi?”
43003005	D g Jesus hab kaij, “Pia'a. Tham wabsh ha-a'aliga ab ha ab mamsik. Bani m-ahgith ab amjed g wechij thoakag. Ith at g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wo em-mah mamt wo e chehgi g pahl wakonakaj mamt thagito g pi ap e-chu'ichig. Mt hab s-ap am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed.
43003007	Pi g am e tothsith mani hab kaij mamt hemho wa ep wo mamsi.
43003008	Neh, kah ap g hewel m an hewelhog. Nap hig s-mahch mas hebai amjed med ch hebai wo meh? Pegih, k hab wa masma pi ta machima hab e junihim g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch an ha wechij mamsith mo hedai hab i elith.”
43003009	D g Nicodemas hab kaij, “A, kus has masma hab chu'ig?”
43003010	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Aha, nap pi amichuth ch eda d wa chum ge uhgk ha mashchamtham g Tutuligo?
43003011	Tho si wohokam ihtha mani m-ahgith. M ach ahgachug mach haschu s-ap s-mahch ch am em-ahgith mach haschu neith. M eda pi wohochuth g ha'ichu t-ahga.
43003012	Ihtha mani em-ahgith o in hab wa'i e junihim jewed thahm. M eda pi ni-wohochuth ch hab pi wo e nako mams wo s-ni-wohoch mant am wo em-ahgi mo haschu has e junihim an thahm kahchim ch ed.
43003013	An ani wa kih thahm kahchim ch ed ch d Jiosh si Kehsha. Kut pi hedai ep wo e nako mas hab masma wo em-ahgi ab amjed mant ahni.”
43003014	D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed matsh wa g t-shohshonbad mu'i e ke'ij g kohk'oikaj mash eda am oiopo tohono jewed ch ed. Kutsh wa g Mosesbad am hema hab juh g ko'oi g kohwlikaj k ab uhgk ul uhs t ab. T hedai ab i neith k thoa. Pegih, kumt ahni hab wa'ap uhgk wo i ni-ul uhs t ab ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.
43003015	Kutp hedai ab wo ni-hiwig k wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g pi ap e-chu'ichig.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.
43003016	Pegih neh, ab o si t-tatchua g Jiosh ch hiwigi g e-alithag mat am i e thagito k e muhkith am t-wehhejed mach d pi ap chu'ijkam. Kut pi wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag matp hedai ab wo hiwig k wabshaba g pi ha huhugetham thoakag wo bei.
43003017	Jiosh at am cheha g e-alithag mat in wo i wuhsh jewed thahm k wo ha tho'ibia g hemajkam. Kut pi heg hekaj in i wuhsh mas ab wo ha'ichu t-mohto'i.
43003018	Pi o ab hu ha'ichu mohto'is hegam mo ab hiwig g Jiosh alithag. Hegam o ab heki hu ha'ichu mohto'is mo pi ab hu hiwig.
43003019	Ia at jiwia jewed thahm hegai mo woho tonlithch g t-chegitoithag. K wabshaba hegam mo hab s-junimk g pi ap'ekam pi tatchua g tonlig nat pi wo mahsko wua g pi ap ha'ichu hab ha-juni. K oi wa ab him g lothaita heg hekaj pi ap'ekam.
43003021	Hegam mo hab wua g s-ap'ekam o tatchua g tonlig mat wo mahsko e wua mo hab wua g Jiosh tatchui.
43003022	Am i thahm, kuchd am i wuwha Jerusalem kihhim t amjed k am oiopohim Judea chekshani ch ed ch ha pahl wapkon g hemajkam.
43003023	Md eda wenog koi kuh hegai John mad ha pahl wapkon. Sh am oimmed ch ha pahl wapkon Aenon t am miabithch g Salim kihhim no pi am ge shohshon ch s-shuhthagig.
43003025	Sh am ha'ichug hegam mash ab si wecho e mashcham. Kutsh am hema jiwia g t-wehm o'othham k ha wehm ne'owi ab amjed g pahl wakona.
43003026	Tsh ihtham am hahawa hihi John wui k hab kaij, “T-mashchamtham, hema at wa am m-wui jiwia map wa am ha pahl wapkon gm hu aigojed g Jordan akimel. Kup wa am si s-mahch ch ahg mo hig woho d si s-has ha'ichu. Pegih, heg ash hab wa'ap ha pahl wapkon. Kush wehsijj gm hu ha'ab him wui.”
43003027	Sh hab kaij g John, “Heg ach ab wa'i bekch mo haschu g Jiosh ab t-mahkch.
43003028	Bani wa kaij mani pi d Jiosh si Kehsha ch wabsh am ha'ichu i ap'echuth g ia jiwhiathaj wehhejed. Am am wa kah mani wa hab kaij.
43003029	Jiosh si Kehsha o heg wepogithas mo g wo ha hohntam. K g hemajkam heg wepogithas mo g wo ha hohnta. T g nawojij wo si s-hehgigk mat hekith s-ap wo e hohont. Bani wa masma si s-hehgig mo ab wui him g hemajkam nani pi d nawojij.
43003030	Heg at am wo e maskogi mo hig woho d si s-has ha'ichu. Kunt ahni im hu hab wabsh wo i ni-junihi.” Neh, bash kaij g John.
43003031	Nt ahni hab wo chei mo g John d wabsh o'othham ch am t-ahgith mo haschu i neith ch ep kah ia jewed thahm. T wabshaba g Jiosh alithag ia jiwia ab thahm kahchim t amjed k d si s-has ha'ichu wehs ha'ichu thahm
43003032	ch am t-ahgith mash haschu i neith ch ep kah an thahm kahchim ch ed. K wabshaba pi sha'i mu'ijj ab wohochuth g ahgaj.
43003033	Jiosh at am cheha g e-alithag mat ia wo jiwia jewed thahm k s-ba'ama ab mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K g alithaj heg hekaj ahg g ne'okij. (33) Pegih, kuch heg hekaj s-ap ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ne'oki ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth g alithaj ahga.
43003035	Jiosh o si pihk e elith ab e-alithag wui ch wehs ha'ichu ab mah.
43003036	Kuch wehsijj u'ukch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag ahchim mach ab hiwig g alithaj. T hegam mat pi ab hu wo wohog el pi wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag k wabshaba g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag wo edagi. T heg hab wa'ap pi hekith wo huhug.
43004001	D ba'ich i mu'i hemajkam ab him Jesus wui mo ab wui g John kch ab wecho e mashcham. Kuchd ahchim ha pahl wapkon mach ab si wecho t-mashcham. D am i kah hegam Palasi ihtha k an si i neneo.
43004003	D hekaj g Jesus hab i e ah matt wo i wuwha ab Judea chekshani t amjed k gm hu uhpam wo hihi Galilee chekshani wui.
43004004	K eda ihtham ha shahgith chechkshani am hab chu'ig g Samaria chekshani.
43004005	Kuchd heg am gai hihimath ch gm hu ai g Sychar kihhim mat am thahm juh. K am wawhiag miabithch g kihhim. D am thahiwua g Jesus gewkok natt pi mehk wa'i hihi.
43004007	Kuchd ahchim gm hu hihi kihhim wui matt wo ha nolawt g ha'ichu hugi. D an hema i t-bij g uwi wa'igamedam k atsh am jiwia mo am thaha g Jesus. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ab g i ha ni-wasbith g shuhthagi.”
43004009	Sh hab kaij g uwi, “Neh, thapki Tuhligo. Ni ahni d Samaria t am o'othham. P haschu ahgch ab ni-tahni g wasib?” Neh, bash kaij nach pi s-ha uhwaith ch chum hems g ha'u pi ha wehm wo ha hekaj.
43004010	Sh g Jesus hab epai kaij ab wui, “Ahpi apt aigo ab wo ha'ichu ni-tai maptp wo s-mahchk mani hedai wud ch haschu i m-makiog. Hegai mani m-makiog o ab Jiosh d amjedkam ch heg wepogithas mo g shonkam shuhthagi.”
43004011	Sh hab ep kaij g uwi, “Pt has hig masma wo wa'i map pi ha kuhwo? K eda s-juhk g wawhia.
43004012	Aha nap ba'ich i gewkthag mo g t-shohshon Jacobbad. Heg at ia wawhiat e-oith ed k ia ih'ehim g e-a'aliga ha wehm ch ha'ichu e-shoshoiga.”
43004013	Sh g Jesus hab kaij, “Huhume o g shuhthagi m-wa'igi. Kup ep tonommek.
43004014	T wabshaba pi hekith wo huhug hegai mani ahni m-makiog. Heg at am wo m-edak ch hab wo masmak mo g shonkam ch ab wo m-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.”
43004015	Sh hab kaij g uwi, “Ih, pegih, si g s-ni-ho'ige'ith k ab i ni-mahki ihtha shuhthagi mant pi hekith ep wo tonom k pi wo ge i wa'igammedath.”
43004016	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, k ab wo i wai g e-kun.”
43004017	Sh g uwi hab kaij, “Pi ani ha kun.” Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Wohokam ap ahg map hab kaij map pi ha kun.
43004018	Hetasp ap wa'i ha kuhkunkahim. K hegai map hemuch an wehm kih pi d m-kun.”
43004019	Tsh ab wabsh ge nen k kekiwua g uwi k hab kaij, “Ih, thapki ge Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam!
43004020	Pegih neh, am g ni-ahgith mam haschu ahgch ahpim Tutuligo hab chech'e mo g Jerusalem d wa'i amai mat am wo e ihmath g Jiosh. Ch eda ahchim Samaria t am kihkam ia ha'ab ihm mo hebai g t-shohshon ihmahim ith ab tho'ag.”
43004021	Sh hab kaij g Jesus. “Nt wo si shel m-ahgi mo ab him g tash mat wabsh chum hebai wo e ihm g em-ohg Jiosh, pi iia wa'i ith ab tho'ag o am Jerusalem t am.
43004022	T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i t-gawulkai ahchim Tutuligo mat am gai t-wuhshanim wo e maskogi am ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam. M ahpim Samaria t am o'othham pi koi am hu i si s-mahch g Jiosh.
43004023	E at ai g tash mat g hemajkam si e-ihbthag amjed woho ab wo ihmath g e-ohg Jiosh. Bo masma hab ha elith g Jiosh mat hab masma ab wo ihmath.
43004024	Tho wabsh thoakag g Jiosh ch pi ha honshpadag mams am hebai wo kihchuth k heg wa'i eda wo ihmath. Pegih, mt wabsh chum hebai wo ihmath ch wehs e-ihbthag amjed.”
43004025	Sh am wabsh sha'i pi amichuth g uwi ch hab kaij ab wui, “Heg ani hi wa s-mahch mat wo jiwia hegai mo d Jiosh si Kehsha ch hab e a'aga Christ k wehs ha'ichu wo t-ahgi.”
43004026	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Thani ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”
43004027	Kuchd edapk i thatha. D am wabsh kia wehmaj neok hegai uwi. Kuchd si has i t-elith k wabshaba pi has sha'i kaij.
43004028	D ihtha uwi am wabsh i thagito g e-ha'a k gm hu si s-hohtam uhpam hih kihhim wui k ash am ha ahgith k hab kaij,
43004029	“Oi g ab wo i hihim k wo nei hegai mo am wehs ni-ahgith mani has i ni-wua. Kutp hu d i Jiosh si Kehsha.”
43004030	Kudki ab ha hekaj i hihi g hemajkam s-neithamk g Jesus.
43004031	D koi e chehm g hemajkam, kuchd ab chum si ahgith g Jesus mat wo ha'ichu huh.
43004032	D wabshaba hab kaij, “Am o ha'ichug g hab mahs gegosig mam ahpim pi sha'i mahch.”
43004033	Chd hab kaij ab a'ai t-wui, “A nat ia heki hu hema gegos?”
43004034	D hab kaij g Jesus ab t-wui, “Ni-gegosig o d ihtha mant hab wo juh g Jiosh tatchui k wo nahto hegai chikpan mo ab ni-mohto'ith.
43004035	Neh, bo e chech'e mat g ha-esha wo i e ba'iha mat d wo gi'ik i mashathk. Nt wabshaba wo em-chehgi mat hemu si s-hohtam wo e ba'iha ha'ichu.
43004036	Ahni ant am ei g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kumt ahpim wo ha ba'iha hegam mat wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Kutt hekaj t-wehm wo s-hehgigk.
43004037	Ith o heg wepogithas hab che'ithag mo hab chu'ig, ‘Hema o'othham at am wo ha'ichu ei. T d wabsh wo hemak ch am wo hih g esha.’
43004038	Ab g wo neith hegam mo ab hihim. Pi amt ha ahgi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wabshaba wo ha ba'iha hegam mat wo e tho'ibia.”
43004039	Kud wa mu'ijj hegam kihkam ab i s-wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha heg hekaj mo hab kaij hegai uwi, “Heg o wehs ni-ahgith mani has i ni-wua.”
43004040	D heg hekaj ab si ahgith g Jesus am wui thathak mat wo si s-ha ho'ige'ith k am wo kia ha wehmajkahim he'ekia tash. Kuchd wa woho am ha wehmajkahim gohk tash.
43004041	D mu'ijj ab ep i s-wohoch ab i kaiok g ahgaj
43004042	k hab hahawa kaij ihtham heg wui uwi, “B att hahawa si hejel kah k ab s-wohochuth k s-mahch moki woho d wehs hemajkam t-tho'ibiakam ith thahm jewed.”
43004043	Kuchd amjed gm hu hahawa ha'ab hihi Galilee chekshani wui
43004044	no pi hab kaij g Jesus, “No hu d wabsh i neitha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam amai mo hebai d si kihj am jewed.”
43004045	D wabshaba mu'ijj g hemajkam amai ab ha'ichugkahim Jerusalem t ab ch wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag ch am neith g Jesus. Kud wa am hab wua g s-hasig ha'ichu. D ihtham si s-hehgig ch ab neith g Jesus matt gd hu thatha.
43004046	Kuchd oi wa gm hu ha'ab hihi Cana kihhim wui mat wa am si wehpeg hab juh g si s-hasig ha'ichu mat wa wabsh g shuhthagi nawaitt. D am hema jiwia g kownal pionag ab Capernaum kihhim t amjed am i kaiok mo am ha'ichug g Jesus. Sh ith alithag muhkhim. D hab kaij ihtha ab wui g Jesus mat am wo hih Capernaum wui k wo thoaj g alithaj.
43004048	D hab wabsh kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Aha, namt pi hedai ab hu wo i s-ni-wohoch, mt hekith wo ipki nei mant hab wo juh g si s-hasig ha'ichu?”
43004049	D am hab wa'ap kaij g s-has ha'ichu, “Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k wo ni-oi am ni-kih wui mat koi wo muh g ni-aliga.”
43004050	D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Gamai g s-ap e tahtk hihm. T wo thoa g m-aliga.” D si i ihbheiwua ihtha s-wohochuthk k gm hu hahawa hih uhpam.
43004051	Sh am himath ch ab ha'i ha nam g e-pionag mash si s-hehgig ch hab kaij, “Tki wo thoa g m-aliga.”
43004052	Sh am hahawa ha kakke, “He'ekia ohla k ed at ab i ap'etahi.” Sh hab kaij g piongaj, “Tho i hemako ohla tako mat jumal gei g s-tonjig ab ab.”
43004053	Sh am ha hekaj i chegito g ohgaj mo am d wabsh i si hegai ohla mo hab ahgith g Jesus, “T wo thoa g m-aliga.” Tsh gd hu jiwia e-kih am k am si a'aga ihtha g e-wehm kihkam ha wehm. Tsh wehsijj ab i s-wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha.
43004054	Neh, ith o d i gokkokam s-hasig ha'ichu mat hab juh g Jesus ia Galilee chekshani ch ed.
43005001	D am hahawa hema i e aihi g t-mihshmetha piast. Kuchd hekaj gm hu hihi Jerusalem wui.
43005002	Am o hema wo'og kihhim ch ed ch hab e a'aga Bethsatha ch an miabithch hegai kolhai kihjeg mam an ha gagda g kahwal. K an hetasp wapttog heg wehgaj wo'o.
43005003	K ihtham ha wecho sha'i mu'i nahnko mahs kok'otham an wo'owop ch ha'i d pi neneatham ch ha'i d pi hihimithkam ch ha'i ab wabsh i s-momoik. [Kush ihtham nenida g shuhthagi matsh am wo i hoi
43005004	no pi hab elith mash hab hu g anghil am i huhuduk shuhthagi ch ed ch am i nonoig g shuhthagi. T hedai si wehpeg am wo hud shuhthagi ch ed mat am wabsh wo chum i nonoi k ash hab hu wo s-thoajima ab e-mumkithag amjed.]
43005005	D am hema wo'o g o'othham ch waikko wehst-mahm gamai gigi'ik (34) a'ahith ab wa'i mumku.
43005006	D g Jesus am neith ch s-mahch mo tash am wa'i wo'o ch hab kaij ab wui, “Nap tatchua mapt wo thoa?”
43005007	D hab kaij g mumkutham, “Ni-nawoj, pi o an hu hedaig mas am wo i ni-huduni shuhthagi ch ed mo hekith am i hoike. Ni im hu haha wabsh i ni-nakog mant am wo i hud, k gm hu heki hu hema ni-ba'iwichchek.”
43005008	D hab kaij g Jesus, “I wuhshani k am beh'i g e-wahkus k hihm!”
43005009	Neh, d ha hekaj thoa k am bei g e-wahkus k s-ap hih. Ith ad hab e juh chum t-mihshmetha tash ed ahchim Tutuligo.
43005010	D ha'i neith g t-wehm o'othham ch hab ahg, “Neh, ahpi, melchkwua ap g t-chehanig map kushwiotch g e-wahkus. A nap pi mahch mo d mihshmetha tash?”
43005011	D hab hahawa kaij hegai mo wa mumkuhim, “Hegai mat ni-thoaj o hab ni-ahg mant am wo bei g ni-wahkus k wo hih.”
43005012	D ab hahawa kakke mas hedai wud hegai mo hab ahg mat wo kushwiotk hih g e-wahkus.
43005013	D wabshaba am wabsh i pi e amich nad pi g Jesus im hu pi e mahsith hemajkam ha shahgith no pi sha'i mu'ijj g hemajkam amai.
43005014	D am hahawa g Jesus s-neitham k am cheh ge'e cheopi ch ed k hab ahg, “Neh, thoa apt. Pi g am hu hab i ep junihim g pi ap'ekam nat pi ha'ichu ba'ich i pi ap hab wo e juh am m-tahgio mapt am hab ep wo i junihi g pi ap'ekam.”
43005015	D am i wuhshani k gm hu him k am ha ahgi moki d Jesus mat thoaj.
43005016	D am i s-mai ihtham mash d Jesus mat hab juh ihtha mihshmetha tash ed k heg hekaj am i kudu ab ne'owinch.
43005017	D g Jesus hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ni-ohg Jiosh o chum hekith g s-ap'ekam chikpan. Ni ahni hab wa'ap chum hekith hab ni-wua.”
43005018	D am hahawa i si e gewpkai mat wo mua nad pi am i kah mo hab masma ihm g Jiosh ch heg hekaj e wepogith g Jiosh.
43005019	D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mani pi ha'ichu hejel hab wua ch wabshaba hab wua mo haschu g ni-ohg Jiosh ni-chehani.
43005020	Ni-ohg o ab si pihk ni-elith ch am ni-chehgith mant has wo chum juni. T ab wo ni-mah g gewkthag mant ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu hab wo juh mo ihtha. Mt ab wabsh wo i haha'athka.
43005021	Ni-ohg o i ha wuwhasith g ko'i ab muhkig amjed ch ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag mant s-ap hab wo juh. Nt hekaj ab wo i ha wuwhas mani hedai hab i elith.
43005022	K g ni-ohg pi hedai ha lothait ch wabshaba ahni ab ni-mah hegai ap'ethag mant wo ha lothai
43005023	no pi hab elith mat wehsijj ab wo si has i ni-el hab masma mo ab si has i elith g ni-ohg. Am at i ni-kei g Jiosh. T hedai pi ab hu has wo ni-elithath ch hab wa masma pi ab hu has elith g ni-ohg.
43005024	“Tho si wohokam ihtha mant hab wo chei. T wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag k am wo wehmajk g Jiosh hegam mat hedai ab wo kaihamath g ha'ichu ni-ahga ch ab wo hiwgath g Jiosh. Pi ant ab hu wo ha mohto'i g ha-chu'ichig mas hekaj gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed g Jiosh.
43005025	Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mo ab him g tash, pej heki hu e ai, mant ab wo i ha wai g ko'i ahni Jiosh alithag. T hegam mat ab i kaiha g ha'ichu ni-ahga ab wo i wuwha.
43005026	Ni-ohg o d hegai mo ab ha mahkch g thoakag ch ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag mant hab wa'ap wo ha mah g thoakag.
43005027	T ab ni-mah g gewkthag mant ahni hab wo juh g lothaita nani pi d si Kehshaj.
43005028	“Pi g am wo e totothsith ith hekaj mani has i kaij. Ab o him g tash mat wehs g ko'i s-ap wo ni-kah k ab wo i wuwha.
43005029	Hegam mo hab junihim g s-ap'ekam at ab wo i e wamgith k ab wo bei g e-ap'ethag. T hegam mo hab junihim g pi ap'ekam ab wo i e wamgith k ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.”
43005030	D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Pi ant wo sha'i ni-nako mant hejel ha'ichu hab wo juh k wabshaba am si ni-ohg oithk hab masma wo ha lothai. K hekaj hab s-ap'e g ni-lothaita.
43005031	“Pi amt wo mahchk manis am ahg g wohokam mantp wabsh hejel wo ni-wohokamch.
43005032	K heg hekaj am wa ni-wehhejed neok g ni-ohg Jiosh. Kuni s-mahch mo d wohokam mo am ahg ab ni-amjed.
43005033	“Neh, am amt wa ha'i hihi heg wui John mo wa em-pahl wapkonahim. K wa am em-ahgith g wohokam.
43005034	Ith ani hab wabsh kaij mamt hekaj wo e tho'ibia nam pi ahpim heg tatchua mat g o'othham am wo i wohokamch ha'ichu mamt ab haha wo i s-wohoch. Ni ahni hi heki hu s-mahch mani hedai wud ch pi sha'i tatchua mas am hema wo ge i ni-wohokamch.
43005035	John o wa ahgachug g wohokam ch hekaj em-tonlithch. Kumt wa ha'ijj ahpim he'es ab si s-hohho'i g ha'ichu ahgaj k an e hehemapaith wehgaj hab masma mat g hu'ul nahgi wo s-hohho'i g tonlig.
43005036	“John o s-ap ni-wohokamchuth. K wabshaba ahni ab ni-mahkch g Jiosh mani g s-hasig ha'ichu hab wua. K ith ba'ich i s-ap ni-wohokamchuth mani d ni-ohg kehsha.
43005037	Pi am hekith neith g Jiosh. K pi hekith ab hu em-wuhiosha neith ch neok ch wabshaba am ni-wohokamchuth mani d kehshaj.
43005038	Am o ni-wohokamchuth g Jiosh mani d si Kehshaj. Kum eda pi ab hu ni-tatchua nam ge wohochuth.
43005039	Am am si hoan g Jiosh o'ohana nam pi tatchua mamt wo e tho'ibia k wo edgithath g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. K g Jiosh o'ohana am ni-wohokamchuth
43005040	mani ahni d em-tho'ibiakam. M eda pi ab hu ni-hiwig.
43005041	“Neh, pi ani heg nen'oith mas g hemajkam ab wo si ni-ha'ichuch. Jiosh at ab wo si ni-ha'ichuch.
43005042	Kuni s-em-amichuth ch s-mahch mam pi ab hu sha'i tatchua g Jiosh.
43005043	Ia ant jiwia g ni-ohg si wehhejed. Kum pi ab hu has ni-elith. Hegam at ab has d wo em-elithak matp hedam wabsh hejel e wehhejed ab wo i wuwha.
43005044	Pi amt has masma ab hu wo s-wohoch g Jiosh nam pi heg am wa'i s-nen'oith mamt ab a'ai wo si has i e el. K eda d chum Jiosh mamt ab wo chum hehgchul.
43005045	Ni wabshaba pi d ahni manis ab wo ha'ichu em-abch am ni-ohg wui. Mosesbad chehanig am ab hiwig. K d hegai mat am wo tashogi g pi ap em-chu'ichig.
43005046	Mosesbad at ha'ichu o'oha ab ni-amjed. Kumt ab wo s-ni-wohoch mamt hems woho ab wo s-wohochuthath g Mosesbad o'ohana.
43005047	Pi amt has masma ab hu wo s-wohoch g ni-ahga namki pi woho wohochuth mat haschu an o'oha g Mosesbad.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus am ha mihshmathch. Am i amjed, tt gm hu hahawa hihi Jerusalem t amjed.
