43006001	Am hu hebai ep amjed machd an oiopohim Galilee Kahchki hugith an ch gm hu hahawa i chehchsh ha'abjed k am thatha.
43006002	D eda mu'i hemajkam chum hekith an oithahim g Jesus neithok mo g s-hasig ha'ichu hab wua ha thoajithch g kok'otham.
43006003	D ab i chesh g Jesus kawulk t ab. Kuchd ahchim wa'i mach ab si wecho t-mashcham am i oith k am wehmaj thadhaiwua.
43006004	D eda e aihim mat wo e wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag.
43006005	Kud mu'i hegam mad gm hu wo piasto ab i hihi s-kaimkch g Jesus. D am i ha nei g Jesus k hab kaij ab Philip wui, “Neh, Philip, chs hebai hig wo ui g ha'ichu hugi matt wo ha gegos ha'akia i hemajkam?”
43006006	Bo kaij ch wabsh s-a'appemamk g Philip no pi wa chum s-mahch mat has masma hab wo juh.
43006007	D hab kaij g Philip, “Pi att wo sha'i t-nako. Chum achs hems gohk siant pihshkaj wo ui g pahn, t eda pi wo ha ai g ha'akia hemajkam.”
43006008	D hegai mo d Simon Peter nawoj ch hab chehgig Andrew hab kaij,
43006009	“Ia o hema ha'ichug g ali ch hi wa hetasp sismito ch gohk waptopi u'a. T wabshaba pi ha'ichu ab hu wo sha'i ha nako ha'akia hemajkam ha wehhejed” .
43006010	D ab hahawa t-ahgith g Jesus matt wo ha cheha g hemajkam mat wo thadhaiwua no pi an s-washaig. D am i wehsijj thadhaiwua g hemajkam k d hetasp mihl chechoj ch mu'i ehp g u'uwi ch a'al.
43006011	D g Jesus am ui g sismito k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k ab t-mah. Kuchd ahchim an hahawa i ha mahkhi g hemajkam. D hab wa'ap juh hegam gohk waptopi. Kuchd wehsijj hug k si s-kokwoth.
43006012	D hab hahawa t-ahg g Jesus. “An g wo i u'ihim g ha-wi'a. Kutt pi ha'ichu wo sha'i heki wua.”
43006013	Kuchd an i u'ihim k gamai gohk wapshomi ha shuhshuth heg hekaj wihpi'ithag.
43006014	Neh, d am i nei g hemajkam mat si s-hasig ha'ichu hab juh g Jesus k hab kaij, “Neh, mo d wabsh i si shel moki ith d hegai Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mach nenida matsh ia wo jiwia ith thahm jewed.”
43006015	D g Jesus ha amich mat an wabsh wo si be k wo ge'e kownalch k hekaj gm hu hejel ba'ich i chesh tho'ag t ab.
43006016	Hudunihim o g tash. Kuchd gm hu i huhud
43006017	k am chum i chehchsh g wahlkokaj Capernaum wui nad pi hab t-ah g Jesus k hab kaij matsh pi oi gm hu wo hih. D am i s-chuk.
43006018	D g s-gewk hewel ab i med k ab i kudu g shuhthagi.
43006019	Kuchd am himchuth g wahlko am hu i gi'ik mihya. D ab haha wabsh hema him t-wui an wabsh shuhthagi thahm. Kuchd hab i neithok si t-totoths.
43006020	D ab hahawa t-wui neo k oki d Jesus ch hab kaij, “Pi g am wo e totothsith. Ahni ani wud” .
43006021	Kuchd si s-ap i t-taht k gn hu i cheshajch wahlko ch ed. Neh chd am wa'i hekaj gn hu aigo thatha mach am ha'ab t-tatchua.
43006022	Ba'ich i si'alim, d hegam hemajkam mad ab wih s-mahch mad pi i t-oi g Jesus no wa pi neith mo d hemako g wahlko. Kuchd ahchim wa'i heg ab an thadhaiwua k i hihi.
43006023	D ihtham an chum gagahim ch pi cheh g Jesus k nei matt pi am hu ep thatha. D oi wa am i ha'i thatha g wapalko ab Tiberias kihhim t amjed miabithk mat am ha gegos g Jesus hegam mu'i hemajkam. D ihtham hemajkam an e ba'iham k gm hu i gahgio Capernaum wui
43006025	K hekith am i chehg k hab kaij ab wui, “T-mashchamtham, hekith apt ia i jiwia?”
43006026	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Am ani woho ni-chehgithch em-wui heg hekaj s-hasig ha'ichu mani hab wua. M wabshaba pi heg hekaj ab s-ni-wohochuthamk. Neh am ant em-gegos. Kumt kokwoth k heg wai hekaj ni-gahg.
43006027	Pi g am wo si e kudutath wabsh g ha'ichu hugikaj ch wabshaba heg wo chum s-behim mo d pi ha huhugetham. Ahni ani em-makiog g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Heg at hekaj am i ni-kei g Jiosh k am ni-wohokamch.”
43006028	D hab kaij g hemajkam, “Tt has wo t-juh k ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag?”
43006029	D g Jesus hab ha ahg, “Ihtha wa'i mamt ab wo ni-hiwgath ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”
43006030	D hab ep kaij g hemajkam, “Am g hig hab juhni g s-hasig ha'ichu. T heg am wo t-chehgi map woho d Jiosh si Kehsha. Tt ab wo s-m-wohoch.
43006031	Neh, ab ash gegshshe thahm kahchim t amjed hegai ha'ichu hugi mash hab e a'aga ‘manna’. Kush heg ko'a g t-shohshon mash am jeg ed oiopo. Bo chu'ig g Mosesbad o'ohana: Ab o ha mahk hegai ha'ichu hugi mo am gegshe ab thahm kahchim t amjed. Pegih, pt ahpi has hig wo juh?”
43006032	D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Pi o d Mosesbad mo wa ab ha mahk hegai ha'ichu hugi. Tho ni-ohg mo wa hab wua. K heg d wabsh ha'ichu hugi mo wa heg hekaj d thothakam jewed thahm. K g ni-ohg ba'ich i s-kehg ha'ichu ab em-makiog
43006033	mamt heg hekaj d wo thothakamk chum hekith. Ith o heg wa wepo mo d s-kehg ha'ichu hugi. Kumt wo be k heg ab wo bei g s-kehg thoakag.”
43006034	D ab si tahni ch hab kaij ihtham, “Ih, pegih, ab g chum hekith t-mahkath ihtha map hab ahg.”
43006035	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ani wud mo g ni-ohg ab em-makiog. Ab g wo ni-hiwig. Nt wo em-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mamt wo huh g hab mahs ha'ichu mamt chum hekith d wo thothakamk ch pi hekith ep wo bihugk.
43006036	Neh'e mani wa hab wa heki hu kaij mam wa chum ni-neith ch eda pi ab hu ni-wui e thagitokch.
43006037	T wabshaba wehs ab ni-wui wo i e thagito hegam mat g ni-ohg am ha eda wo i chikp. Nt pi hedai wo sha'i ohhoth mat ab wo i e thagito ni-wui.
43006038	Tho ni-ohg tatchui mamt ab ni-wui wo i e thagito ch hab wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Nt wo si em-nuhkuthath mamt pi hedai wo heb hu wua g e-tho'ibiathag. Kunt ab wo i em-wuwhas muhkig t amjed mat hekith wo huhug ihtha jewed. Ith o d ni-ohg tatchui. Kunt heg hekaj ia jiwia ab thahm kahchim t amjed.”
43006041	D g haha'ichu si gahghai e mohmgith ch s-babgam neneok
43006042	ch hab kaij, “K haschu ahgch hab kaij mat ia jiwia ab thahm kahchim t amjed? S-mahch ach ch ep s-ha mahch g jehj. Tho wabsh Jesus ch d alithaj g Josephbad.”
43006043	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi g am wo gahghai e mohmgith k s-babgam neneok.
43006044	Pi at hedai wo sha'i e nako mas ab wabsh hejel wo i e thagito ni-wui. Jiosh ni-ohg at am wo i chikp ha eda. T hekaj ab ni-wui wo i e thagito. T ab wo i e ai g si oithchkam tash. Nt ab wo i ha wuwhas muhkig t amjed.
43006045	Kekelibad Jiosh Ha'ichu i tashogiththam atki wa an o'oha: Wehsijj at wo ha mashcha g Jiosh g hemajkam. Neh, t ab ni-wui wo i e thagito matp hedai ab wo kaiha g Jiosh ni-ohg k ab wo mai g mashchamaj.
43006046	Pi am hedai g e-wuhpuikaj neith g ni-ohg. Ahni ani wa'i neith nant pi ab amjed ia jiwia.
43006047	“Neh, hegam mat ab wo i s-ni-wohochuth k wo ni-bei at hekaj wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
43006048	T-shohshon ash wa ko'a hegai manna ch wabshaba pi heg hekaj edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Mt wo edagi hegai pi ha huhugetham thoakag ab ni-bek. Ith o heg wa wepo mani d ha'ichu hugi em-wehhejed.
43006050	Ba'ich ani d i s-kehg ha'ichu hugi mo hi hegai manna namt pi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag wo edagi ab ni-bek.
43006051	I atsh gei g manna ab thahm kahchim t amjed k ab ha mahkch g thoakag. Ni wabshaba d ahni mant woho ia jiwia ab Jiosh kihthag amjed k ia u'apa g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Nt wo thagito g ni-chuhkug mant wo ni-muhkith k hab wo ha tho'ibia g hemajkam.”
43006052	D ith kaiok am si s-babgam e ne'owi g haha'ichu hab kaijch, “Pi at has sha'i masma wo t-mah g e-chuhkug machs wo huh.”
43006053	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi amt wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag pi ab hu ni-bek ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.
43006054	Ab amt wo i s-wohoch mant wo iawua g ni-eh'ed k wo muh em-wehhejed k hab wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mamt wo huh g ni-chuhkug k wo ih g ni-eh'ed. Kunt ab wo i em-wuwhas muhkig t amjed mat hekith wo kuhgit g jewed.
43006055	Ihtha ni-chuhkug ch ni-eh'ed o heg wa wepo mo d ha'ichu hugi ch ha'ichu i'ithag.
43006056	T wo edagi g wechij thoakag hegam mat ab wo ni-bei. Am ant ha eda wo ul g ni-thoakag.
43006057	Ni-ohg at wa am ni-cheha mant ia wo jiwia jewed thahm. Kuni d pi ha huhugetham thoakam no pi g ni-ohg d pi ha huhugetham thoakam. T hab wa'ap d wo pi ha huhugetham thoakamk matp hedam ab wo ni-bei nant pi am ha eda wo ni-ulinith chum hekith.
43006058	Heg ani hekaj pi hab masma mo hegai manna. Hegam mash wa ko'a hegai at pi heg hekaj edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. T wabshaba wo edagi matp hedam ab wo ni-bei.”
43006059	Neh, bad kaij g Jesus mad eda am ha mashcham g hemajkam ha-cheopi ed amai Capernaum t am.
43006060	D mu'ijj hegam mo am t-wehm oith g Jesus hab hahawa kaij, “Sho'oki wa'i si s-hasig ihtha mashchamaj ch pi ab hu ta kaihama.”
43006061	D g Jesus wabsh ha amich mo has kaij an s-ju'ujpij neneokch k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi amki hohho'ith g ni-mashchama
43006062	ch eda wo nei mant am uhpam ep wo hih thahm kahchim wui ahni Jiosh si kehsha.
43006063	Pi amt wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag ab amjed g ha'ichu hugi k wabshaba ab wo s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga. Kunt ab wo cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat am em-eda wo i e ulin k wo em-mahkath g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
43006064	Kum eda ha'ijj pi ab hu ni-wohochuth.” Neh, bo kaij g Jesus no pi s-mahch mat hedam pi ab hu wo wohoch ch ep s-mahch mat hedai wo gagda mat wo e muhkith.
43006065	D hab ep kaij, “Pi amt hedai wo e nako mams ab wo s-ni-wohochuth k wo ni-bei, heg hi wa mat g ni-ohg am wo i chikp em-eda.”
43006066	D mu'ijj hegam mo am t-wehm oith g Jesus thagito am i kaiok g s-hasig ha'ichu ahgaj k pi thahm an hu hahawa ep wehmaj.
43006067	D heg hekaj hab kaij g Jesus ab t-wui ahchim gamai gohk, “Mt ahpim has wo e juh? Namt hab wa'ap wo ni-thagito?”
43006068	D g Simon Peter hab kaij ab wui, “T-kownalig, pi o an hu hedai ehp machs heg wui wo hihi. Ahpi ap wa'i am ahgachug hegai matt hekaj wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
43006069	Ch hahawa s-wohochuth ch s-mahch map ahpi d hekia s-ap'ekam ch ab amjed i hih g Jiosh.”
43006070	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heu'u, woho o wa. Kunt am i em-chuhcha ahpim gamai gohk mamt ith an wo ahgachugath. M wabshaba hema d wabsh sha jiawul.
43006071	Pi achd mahch mas hedai hab ahg. Kuki eda heg hab ahg Judas mo d alithaj g Simon Iscariot ch d hema ahchim gamai gohk ch atki wo gagda g Jesus.
43007001	Am amsh chum s-mu'amk g Jesus Judea chekshani ch ed. D hekaj pi am hu himimk. Kuchd an oiopo Galilee chekshani ch ed.
43007002	D eda e aihim hegai piast mach ab ihm g Jiosh mo babhaijith g t-e'es.
43007003	D heg hekaj hab kaij g Jesus wepnag ab wui. “Pt hems gm hu wo hih i'ajed Judea wui. T wo nei g s-hasig m-chikpan hegam mo wa an m-oithahim Judea ch ed.
43007004	Pi apt wo ge ehstoth hegai map hab junihim maptp wo tatchuath mat ab wo i m-mai g hemajkam. Am g ha chehgith g hemajkam map hab wua g s-hasig ha'ichu.”
43007005	Neh, bad kaij noki pi koi wohochuth mo d Jiosh si Kehsha.
43007006	D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pi ant am hu wo em-oi ith wui gegosig nat pi koi e ai mant am wo si s-ap i ni-maskogi. Mt gamai wo hihi namt pi ahpim hi wa wabsh chum hekith am wo e chehgi. Pi o am hu ha'ichug mas heg hekaj wo s-em-keh'ithath g hemajkam. K wabshaba ahni s-ni-keh'ith nani pi chum hekith ab ha ahgith mo am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam.”
43007009	Neh, bad kaij ab ha wui ch am wabsh i wih Galilee ch ed.
43007010	Heg i thahm mad gm hu hihi g Jesus wepnag, d am hahawa epai him k wabshaba wabsh s-a'agi. Kuchd ahchim gm hu i oi.
43007011	Sh hegam mo d haha'ichu am Judea ch ed an gahg ch an kaiam mas hebai has chu'ig.
43007012	D eda an s-ju'ujpij neneok g hemajkam ch hab kaij, “Tho si s-ap o'othham.” D ha'i hab ep kaij, “Pi o ap d o'othham no pi t-iattogith.”
43007013	K wabshaba s-a'agi an a'aga no pi s-ha ehbith g haha'ichu.
43007014	Kud eda hugkam wa'i hih g piast. D am hih g Jesus ge'e cheopi wui k am i ha mashcha.
43007015	D hegam haha'ichu si has i elith k hab kaij, “S has hig masma ge'e ha'ichu s-mahch ihtha o'othham mat eda pi sha'i e mashcha g papal ha-mashchama?”
43007016	D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Jiosh at ab ni-cheha mant ia wo jiwia jewed thahm. K d Jiosh mashchamadag ihtha mani i ha mashcham.
43007017	Tp hedai wo i tatchuath mat am hab wo juh g Jiosh tatchui wo chum s-mahchk mas wa woho d Jiosh amjedkam ihtha mani i ha mashcham.
43007018	Hegai mat wo ah g hejel e-mahchig at wabsh wo chum si e haschuth k atp hems d s-chu iattomkam. Nt wabshaba ahni ab ha'ichuchuth g Jiosh ch am ahg g wohokam.
43007019	Bam chum e wua mam am hab si junihim hegai chehanig mat wa g Jiosh ab mah g Moses am em-wehhejed. M wabshaba pi woho hab junihim nam pi s-ni-mu'amk.”
43007020	D ab si neneok g hemajkam ch hab kaij, “P haschu ahgch hab kaij mam s-m-mu'amk? Jiawul o an u'ukch g m-chegitoithag.”
43007021	D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Woho am s-ni-mu'amk. Ha ant thothaj mihshmetha tash ed. Kum heg hekaj s-ni-mu'amk.
43007022	Neh, nt am wo em-chehgi mam ahpim hab wa'ap wua g chikpan mihshmetha tash ed. Mosesbad atki wa an o'oha mat haschu g Jiosh heki hu ab ha cheha g t-shohshon mamt wo ha pahl hikuch g e-chechoj a'aliga mat d wo i gigi'ik tashk ab ha-mahsithag amjed. Kum heg hab wua chum as hems d wo mihshmetha tashk
43007023	mamt pi wo mul hegai chehanig matki g Mosesbad an o'oha. Pegih, mt haschu ahgk babgat mant hema s-ap thoaj am mihshmetha tash ed?
43007024	Am g wo si i a'amichuth mamt s-ap wo s-mahchk ha'ichu.”
43007025	D ha'ijj hab kaij g Jerusalem t am kihkam, “Aha no hig pi woho d ihtha mam chum s-mu'amk.
43007026	K eda haschu ahgch pi hedai has ahg? K ia t-jehnigith. Aha no hab elith g haha'ichu mo wa woho d Jiosh si Kehsha?
43007027	S has hig masma d wo hegaik mach eda s-mahch mo hedai d amjedkam ch hebai d kihkam. Kutsh wa eda g Jiosh si Kehsha pi hedai wo mahchk mat hebaijed ia wo jiwia.”
43007028	D si s-kaitham hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, s-mahch am mani hedai wud ch hebaijed him. Nt wabshaba pi wabsh hejel ni-wehhejed i hih. Jiosh o ab ni-chehani mant ia wo i wuhsh jewed thahm. Kum pi mahch g Jiosh ch hekaj pi woho ni-mahch. Ahni ani hi s-mahch ch ep s-mahch mo d wohokam nant pi ab amjed i hih.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus am ha mashchamch ge'e cheopi ch ed.
43007030	Kumd am hahawa chum bei. T wabshaba pi koi e ai g tashgaj. D pi e nako ihtham.
43007031	Kud mu'i ab i s-wohochuth k wabsh s-ju'ujpij hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Na'as woho d Jiosh si Kehsha nat pi pi hedai wo sha'i e nako mas hab wo juh hegai hab mahs s-hasig ha'ichu mo ihtha hab wua.”
43007032	D am ha'i oiopo g Palasi ch am i kah hegai mo hab e kaij k am hihim k atsh am ha ahgi g u'ugchu papal. Tsh hegam am ha cheha g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam mat an wo bei g Jesus.
43007033	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ant sha'i tash ia hu wo em-wehmajkahim ch gm hu hahawa uhpam wo hih heg wui mat ia i ni-ah'ath.
43007034	Kumt wo chum ni-gahgath ch wabshaba pi wo ni-edgith k pi wo e nako mams am wo hihi mant hebai wo ha'ichugk.”
43007035	D am wabsh i pi amich g hemajkam k hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “A t hebai wo hih, chs hab pi wo edagi?” D ha'i hab ep kaij, “Na'as gm hu wo hih go'ol hemajkam ha-kihhim wui mo am ha'ichug g t-wehm o'othham k wo ha mashcha g go'ol hemajkam.
43007036	A shah'o d ahga mo hab kaij matt wo chum gahgath ch wabshaba pi wo edgith k pi wo t-nako machs am wo hihi mat hebai wo ha'ichugk.”
43007037	D am i e ai g si oithchkam tash mo ba'iwechkim d si ge'e tash heg eda piast. D am e hemapathch g hemajkam. Kud g Jesus am si amog ch hab kaij, “Ab g wo i e thagito ni-wui k ab wo bei g wechij thoakag hab masma mamt hemho wa wo ih am i tonomk.
43007038	Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana mamtp hedai ab ni-wui wo i e thagito k heg wa wepo mamt wo edgithath g shonkam shuhthagi am e-ihbthag ed. T heg chum hekith ab wo tha'iwunith.”
43007039	Bo kaij g Jesus ch hab ahg matt ab wui wo i t-thagito k hekaj wo bei g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K eda wenog koi ab hu t-mahks g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag nat pi koi gahi wuhsh g muhkig g Jesus k koi bei g e-kownaltalig.
43007040	D mu'i hab kaij am i kaiok, “Ihtha o'othham oki d wa woho hegai Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mach nenida.”
43007041	D hai hab ep kaij, “Thoki Jiosh si Kehsha.” D wabshaba ha'ijj hab epai kaij, “Pi oki d sha'i hegai no pi d Galilee t am o'othham.
43007042	K eda an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed matsh g Jiosh si Kehsha ab d wo t-kownaligbad David amjedkamk ch ab wo amjedk g Bethlehem kihhim. Am ash d kihkam g Davidbad Bethlehem t am.”
43007043	D heg hekaj ab a'ai e wui gegokiwua g hemajkam.
43007044	Ha'ijj o chum s-kuhpamk. D wabshaba pi hedai sha'i e nako mas hab juh.
43007045	D am uhpam hihi g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam am ha wui g u'ugchu papal ch Palasi. D ihtham ab ha kakke ch hab kaij, “Shahchu amt ahgk pi an hu bei?”
43007046	D hab kaij g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam, “Pi o hekith hedai hab sha'i kaitham neok mo ihtha.”
43007047	D hab kaij hegam Palasi ab ha wui, “Aha nat hab wa'ap em-iattogi?
43007048	Pi ach hedai ab hu s-wohochuth ahchim Palasi o hegam mo d t-wanimedtham mas d Jiosh si Kehsha ihtha.
43007049	Ihtham pi ha'ichu a'amichuththam hemajkam o ab s-wohochuth no pi pi mahch g Mosesbad chehanig. T g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo ha namkith.”
43007050	D am ha wehmaj hegai mat wa am hu hebai chuhug ch ed am i chehgim g Jesus k hab chehgig Nicodemas. Ith o hab wa'ap d Palasi ch hab kaij ab ha wui,
43007051	“Bo chu'ig g t-chehanig matt pi hedai ab hu wo sha'i ha'ichu ha abch k ho'ipki am i mamche am lothaitk mas wa woho pi ap ha'ichu hab juh.”
43007052	D hab kaij ihtham, “Pegih, pki ahpi ab ep si ha wehmaj ihtham mo ab wabsh al Galilee t amjed. Am g i hoan g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wo s-mai mo pi hema g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ab hu sha'i Galilee t amjed.”
43007053	[D amjed gm hu a'ai himto g hemajkam.
43008001	Kuchd ahchim gm hu hihim k an kohksh Olive U'us Kawulk t an.
43008002	D ab i chesh g tash. Kuchd gd hu uhpam thatha ge'e cheopi wui. D mu'i am e chehm g hemajkam Jesus wui k gn hu biha. D am thahiwua k ha mashcha.
43008003	D ab wui ha'i thatha g chehanig ha mashchamtham ch Palasi am hema u'apathch g uwi. Ith atsh ha ehs g ha-kun. Kud am t-shahgith i kehsh
43008004	K hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Neh, ahpi map ia ha mashcham, ihtha uwi att s-ap cheh mat ha ehs g ha-kun.
43008005	K eda hab chu'ig g t-chehanig matt hemho wo wa ma'ichkwua k wo mua g uwi mat hab wo sha e juh. Pt ahpi has wo chei?”
43008006	Neh, bo kaij no pi wabsh ha'ichu s-kaimk ch s-abchuthamk g Jesus. D wabshaba g Jesus pi ab hu sha'i ha hudawog k am wabsh Ha'ichu o'oha jewedo g e-nowikaj.
43008007	D oi wa ihtham pi thagito k ab ep kakke. D ab hahawa i e shel g Jesus k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pegih, mt ahpim wehpeg ab wo ma'ihi g uwi mamt hedai pi hekith hab sha'i juh g pi ap'ekam.”
43008008	Bo kaij ch am hahawa i e jumalkath k am ep o'oha jewedo.
43008009	D am i kah ihtha g chehanig ha mashchamtham ch Palasi k wabsh sha hehemako gm hu a'ai hihi si e elithch. D hegam mo d ge'eged wehpegat k wehsijj himto. K heg am wa'i wih uwi Jesus wehm.
43008010	D ab i e shel g Jesus k ab wui hab kaij, “Baht hihi hegam mo ab ha'ichu m-abchuth? Nat pi ia hu hema wih mat ab wo m-ma'ihi?”
43008011	D hab kaij g uwi, “Pi at ia hu hema wih, ni-kownalig.” D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ani hab wa'ap pi ab hu ha'ichu m-abchuth. Gamai g hihm k pi hab ep juhni g pi ap'ekam.”]
43008012	D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g hemajkam, “Thani ge'e tonlig am wehs ha wehhejed g hemajkam. Kut s-ap am wo himath Jiosh ap'ethag ed ch pi hekith ha'ichukaj wo pi e amich hegam mat hedai ab ni-wui wo e thagitokchith.”
43008013	D eda am ha'i gegok g Palasi ch ab wui hab si kaij, “Ih, p wabsh chum hejel e wohokamchuth ch aptp hems wabsh t-iattogith.”
43008014	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ani em-iattogith chum anis am hi wa hejel ni-wohokamchuth. Tho wohokam mani has i kaij. S-mahch ani mant hebaijed ia jiwia k hebai wo hih. Ahpim am hi pi mahch ihtha.
43008015	Am am chum ahg mani has chu'ig ab wabsh ni-neithch ch eda pi woho ni-mahch. Ni ahni hemu pi hedai em-lothait.
43008016	Kut wabshaba d wo wohokamk g ni-ahga mant hekith wo ah mam has chu'ig nat pi g Jiosh am ni-wehm wo em-a'appe.
43008017	Neh, an o o'ohanas em-chehanig ed mamt wo s-ha wohoch matp gohkajj am ha'ichu wo wohokamch.
43008018	Pegih, ni ahni hejel ni-wohokamchuth. K g ni-ohg am hab wa'ap ni-wohokamchuth.” Neh, bo kaij g Jesus.
43008019	D ab kakke ihtham, “A k hebai has chu'ig g m-ohg?” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi am sha'i ni-mahch ch ep pi mahch g ni-ohg. Mt hems wo s-ap s-ni-mahchk ch hab wa'ap wo s-mahchk g ni-ohg.”
43008020	Neh, ith ad wehs hab kaij g Jesus am ge'e cheopi t am heg eda kih mo g hemajkam am shulig g e-mahkigdag g ge'e cheopi wehhejed. T pi hedai e nako mas an wo bei nat ge koi e ai g tashgaj.
43008021	D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Am ant hu wo hih. Kumt an haha wo i chum ni-gahghim k wabshaba wo koi pi e tho'ibiak. Pi amt wo e nako mamt am wo hihi mant hebai wo i hih.”
43008022	D heg hekaj hab kaij hegam haha'ichu, “Shah'o ahgch hab kaij matt pi wo t-nako matt am wo hihi mat hebai wo i hih. Aha nat wabsh hejel wo e mua.”
43008023	D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ia am wa'i amjed ith thahm jewed. Ni ahni hi ab thahm kahchim amjed.
43008024	Kum eda pi ni-wohochuth mani d ge ahni. Ni heg hekaj am em-ahgith mamt wo koi pi e tho'ibiak.”
43008025	D ab kakke, “Kup hedai wud higi?” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ani wud mani ga hu i wehpeg hab kaij mani hedai wud.
43008026	Mu'ijj o g em-chu'ichig. Kunt heg wo ah. K g ni-ahga d wohokam nani pi heg wa'i ahg mo haschu ni-ahgith hegai mat am i ni-kei. K heg chum hekith ahg g wohokam.”
43008027	D ihtham pi amichuth mo g Jiosh hab ahg.
43008028	D heg hekaj hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo mai mani d ge ahni mamt hekith ab uhgk wo ni-ul mamt wo ni-mua ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Am amt haha wo mai mani pi hab wua g hejel ni-tatchui ch wabshaba hegai wa'i ni-ohg tatchui hab wua ch g mashchamaj ahgachug.
43008029	Chum ani hekith ab s-wohog elith. K heg hekaj ni-wehmaj.” Neh, bo kaij g Jesus.
43008030	T muijj hegam mat ab kah ihtha ab i s-wohoch.
43008031	D heg hekaj hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui hegam mat ab i chum s-wohoch, “Mtki woho ab i e thagito ni-wui mamtp am hab wo i junihi g ni-mashchama.
43008032	Mt haha wo mai g wohokam. T heg hab wo em-juh mamt hahawa pi d wo neneholk.”
43008033	D ha'i hab kaij, “Pi ach hekith hedai d sha'i neneholiga nach pi d Abrahambad amjedkam. P haschu hab ahg ch hab kaij matt hahawa pi d wo neneholk?”
43008034	D g Jesus hab kaij, “Wehs am d nenehol mamtp hedai hab i junihim g pi ap'ekam nam pi heg hekaj e wulshch.
43008035	Pi o am hu ha wehm d si kihkam g nehol mo hig g ha-aliga.
43008036	Nt ahni woho wo i em-wul'o mamtp ab wo i e thagito ni-wui. Kumt hahawa pi d wo neneholk namt pi d wo a'aligajk g ni-ohg Jiosh.
43008037	S-mahch ani mam d Abrahambad amjedkam. M eda s-ni-mu'amk nam pi pi ab hu ap wohochuth g ni-mashchama.
43008038	Heg ani am ahgahim mo haschu g ni-ohg ab ni-chehgith. M ahpim hi heg wa wepo mam d ge Jiawul amjedkam nam pi hab wua g tatchuij.”
43008039	D hab kaij ab wui, “Pi ach d ge Jiawul amjedkam. Abrahambad o d t-shohshon.” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, m haschu ahgch pi hab masma hab e wua mo g Abrahambad no pi heg chum hekith hab wua g s-ap'ekam.
43008040	M eda am e nakog mamt wo ni-mua ahni mani heg wa'i em-ahgith wohokam mo g Jiosh ab ni-ahgith.
43008041	Heg am d wabsh amjedkam mam am oithch hab e junihim.” D hab kaij, “Ahchim ach hi pi d sha'i sha'i ch ed ha-a'aliga. Jiosh o d si t-ohg.”
43008042	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ia ant jiwia ab amjed g Jiosh. Kumt heg hekaj ab wo si ni-tatchuath mamtp woho d wo a'aligajk. Pi ant wabsh hejel hab i ni-ah mant ab wo i hih. Jiosh at ab ni-chea.
43008043	Pi am amichuth mani has i kaij nam pi s-ko'okoth g ha'ichu ni-ahga.
43008044	Tham wabsh ge jiawul amjedkam ch s-hohho'ith mamt am hab wo wuath g tatchuij. Heg o d ha mu'akam gd hu i si wehpeg amjed ch d ep s-chu iattomkam ch pi has sha'i elith ha'ichu ha iattogithch no pi wehs g iattogig ab d amjedkamaj.
43008045	Kuni ahni g wohokam ahg. Kum heg hekaj pi ni-wohochuth.
43008046	Neh, namt hig wo e nako mamt am wo wohokamch mas haschu d i pi ap ni-chu'ichig? Pegih, ab o em-ab mamt ab wo s-ni-wohoch nani pi em-ahgith g wohokam.
43008047	Hegai mo ab d amjedkamaj g Jiosh o ab kaiham g Jiosh ne'oki. Kum pi ab hu kaiham nam pi pi ab hu d amjedkamaj.
43008048	D g haha'ichu ab hahawa si chehmo g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Thapki wabsh t-obga ch d wabsh sha jiawul.”
43008049	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi o woho mam has i kaij. Pi ani d sha'i jiawul. Ab ani si ha'ichuchuth g ni-ohg. M wabshaba ahpim wabsh pi ni-ha'ichuchuth.
43008050	Pi ani heg am hu neithahim mas hedai ab wo si has ni-elithath. K wabshaba am hema d hegai mo am ni-gahgith g ab has elithadag ch wo ha lothai hegam mo pi ab hu has ni-elith.
43008051	Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat pi hekith wo huhug hegai mat hedai ab wo si i bei g ha'ichu ni-ahga.”
43008052	D hab kaij ab wui, “Si att hahawa s-ap s-mai mapki d wabsh sha jiawul. Neh, muh at g Abrahambad. T g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam hab wa'ap ko'ok k huhug. P eda hab kaij mat pi hekith wo huhug hegai mat hedai ab wo si i bei g ha'ichu m-ahga.
43008053	Chum apki si e ha'ichuchuth ch hab kaij ihtha. Abrahambad atki muh. Nap hab e elith map gm hu ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo hegai? T g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththambad hab wa'ap ko'ok k huhug. Thohp hab chum e elith?”
43008054	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wabsh wo pehegi neokath mantp ab hejel wo chum si ni-haschuthath. Heg o ab si has ni-elith ni-ohg mam e-Jioshga ahg.
43008055	Pi am hekith sha'i woho mahch hegai. Ni wabshaba ahni s-mahch. Kuntp hab wo chei mani pi mahch k d wabsh wo s-chu iattomkamk mam hab chu'ig ahpim. S-mahch ani ch ab si u'ukch g ha'ichu ahgaj.
43008056	Em-shohshon Abrahambad o si s-ap e tahtk mat wo nei mant an wo i wuhsh. T hekith i neithok si s-hehgig.”
43008057	D si has i el ihtham k hab kaij. “Ih, heki at hu wa'i muh. Aha nap neith ch eda pi koi ai g hetaspo wehst-mahm ahithag?”
43008058	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mani an ha'ichug ni-ohg kih ed mat eda koi mahsi g Abrahambad.”
43008059	Neh, d gn hu i u'ihi g hohothai mat hekaj wo ma'ichkwua g Jesus. D wabshaba wabsh s-a'agi am ha shahgith him k gm hu i wuhsh ge'e cheopi amjed.
43009001	Kuchd am hihim. D ab haha wabsh hema thaha g o'othham ch e-mahsithag amjed pi nea.
43009002	Kuchd ab kakke g Jesus, “Neh, t-mashchamtham, thoh'o d chu'ichig mo d pi neatham ihtha o'othham? No d hejel chu'ichigaj aha no d ge'egedgaj ha-chu'ichig?”
43009003	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ith o pi hab d sha'i ahga mas d ha-chu'ichig. Heg o hekaj pi nea mat g Jiosh am wo chehgi g e-gewkthag ab amjed.
43009004	Am att hab wo junihith g chikpanaj hegai mat ia i ni-ah'ath mo ithani am kia wi'is g tash no pi ab him mamt hahawa pi wo e nako.
43009005	Thani tonlig am em-wehhejed mani ia em-wehmaj.”
43009006	D hab che'iok g Jesus k am siswua jewed thahm k am hab juh g bith k hekaj ab bithsh g wuhpuij hegai pi neatham
43009007	k hab ahg, “Am g him k ab i wakon g e-wuhiosha heg eda wo'o mo hab e a'aga Siloam.” (K hab d ahga ihtha “I Ah'ath.”) T wa woho am hih ihtha pi neatham k am wako g e-wuhiosha k am i uhpam jiwia s-ap ha'ichu neithch.
43009008	Hegam mo s-mahch ch hegam mo si neith mo wabsh ha'ichu ha tahni ad am i neithok hab kaij, “Aha no pi woho d hegai mo am thahiwup ch ha'ichu ha tahni?”
43009009	D ha'i hab kaij mo d hegai. D ha'i hab ep kaij, “Pi o d hegai. Ho o wabsh si wepo mahs.” D hekaj hab kaij ihtha mo wa pi neakahim, “Thani ahni.”
43009010	Kumd ab ep kakke, “Shahpt masma nent?”
43009011	D hab kaij, “Hegai mash d Jesus at ab bithsh g ni-wuhpui am jewedo siswuak k hab ni-ahg mant wo him k wo wako g ni-wuhiosha am Siloam wo'o ch ed. Kunt am him k hab wabsh chum ni-wakon k ha hekaj s-ap ha'ichu neith.”
43009012	D hab kaij ihtham, “T hebai hih?” Kud hab hahawa kaij mo pi mahch mas hebai hih.
43009013	D am wa ha'i bei ihtha o'othham mo wa pi nea am Palasi ha wui.
43009014	K d t-mihshmetha tash mad eda g Jesus hab juh ihtha.
43009015	D g Palasi ab hahawa kakke mas has masma nent. D hab kaij, “Hegai Jesus at ab bithsh g ni-wuhpui am siswuak jewedo. Nt ab i wako g ni-wuhiosha k hahawa s-ap ha'ichu neith.”
43009016	D ha'i hab kaij hegam Palasi, “Neh, pi o ab hu sha'i Jiosh amjed nat pi melchkwua g t-chehanig hab juhk ihtha t-mihshmetha tash ed.” D am a'ai e wui gegokiwua g hemajkam nad pi ha'ijj hab epai kaij, “Pi at wo e nako g pi ap chu'ijkam mas hab mahs s-hasig ha'ichu hab wo juh.”
43009017	D heg hekaj ab ep si kakke hegam Palasi, “Shahp i elith hegai o'othham map hab kaij mat m-nench.” D hab kaij, “Bani elith mo d ge Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
43009018	D wabshaba pi wohochuth ihtham haha'ichu mas wa woho d pi neatham ch am ha waith g ge'egedgaj
43009019	ch mu'i ha'ichu ha kakke mas d ha-aliga ihtha ch ga hu i e-mahsithag amjed pi nea, kch ehp mas has masma hahawa ha'ichu neith.
43009020	D hab hahawa kaij g ge'egedgaj mo d ha-aliga ch ga hu e-mahsithag amjed pi nea
43009021	ch wabshaba pi mahch mas has masma s-ap ha'ichu neith ch ep pi mahch mas hedai thoaj ch ab ha ahgith mat wo kakke no pi d ge'e k ch hejel am wo e ah.
43009022	Hegam haha'ichu ad wa am heki hu ap'ech mat pi wo ha hiwigi mat am hu ep wo i wahp cheopi ch ed hegam mat hedam hab wo chei mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha. D heg hekaj s-ha ehbith g ge'egedgaj ch hab kaij mat ab wo kakke, t hejel am wo e ah.
43009024	D ab ep i wai g Palasi ihtha mat bei g e-nenthag k hab ahg, “Am g t-ahgith g wohokam mapt ab wo hehgchul g Jiosh. S-mahch ach mo ihtha has chehgi d pi ap chu'ijkam.”
43009025	D hab kaij ihtha mat bei g e-nenthag: “Pi ani sha'i mahch mas d pi ap chu'ijkam ch wabshaba ith s-ap s-mahch mani pi neakahim ch hemuch haha wabsh si s-nea.”
43009026	D ihtham ab hahawa ep kakke, “T has m-juh k m-nench?”
43009027	D hab kaij, “M ani wa heki hu em-ahgith. Mt pi ab hu ni-kaiha. A m haschu ahgch ab ep ni-kakke? Aha namt ahpim hab wa'ap ab wo i s-wohoch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha?”
43009028	D ihtham ab si s-keh'ith ch hab kaij, “Ahpi apt ab i s-wohoch hegai hemajkam. Ahchim ach hi g Mosesbad ab s-wohochuth.
43009029	S-mahch ach mo g Jiosh g Mosesbad ab ha'ichu ahgith. Kuch pi sha'i mahch mas hebai amjed him hegai.”
43009030	D hab kaij ihtha, “M haschu ahgch pi mahch mas hebai amjed him. T eda ab i ni-nench.
43009031	S-mahch ach mo g Jiosh pi ab hu kaiham g pi ap chu'ijkam ch wabshaba ab ha kaiham hegam mo ab si has elith ch am hab junihim g tatchuij.
43009032	Pi ach hekith sha'i kah mas hedai i nench hegai mo e-mahsithag amjed pi nea.
43009033	T hi wo wa e nako hema mat hab wo juh ihtha hab mahs ha'ichu matp ab Jiosh amjed wo himath.”
43009034	D ab si s-ko'okam has ahg ch hab kaij, “Thap wabsh si hekia pi ap'ekam ga hu'i e-mahsithag amjed ch eda chum ha'ichu t-mashcham.” D amjed gm hu si i wuhshath cheopi t amjed k pi hiwigi mas am ep wo i wah.
43009035	D kah g Jesus mamt i wuhshath k am i gahghim k hab kaij am i chehgiok, “Nap ab si hiwig g Jiosh si Kehsha?”
43009036	D hab kaij ihtha o'othham, “A k hedai wud. Am g ni-ahgith. Nt ab wo si i hiw.”
43009037	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Thani ahni map hahawa s-ap ni-neith mant wa m-nench.”
43009038	D ab si i gei wui k hab kaij, “Ab ani si m-hiwig, s-ap'ekam ni-kownalig.”
43009039	D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus, “Ia ant jiwia jewed thahm mant wo mahsko wua mo hedai pi nea ch hedai s-nea ith eda Jiosh ap'ethag.”
43009040	D ha'i am gegok g Palasi ch si has i elith k hab kaij, “Nap ahchim hab ep chum t-ahg mach hab wa'ap pi nenea.”
43009041	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi amt ab hu wo em-abch mamtp wo wohokamch mam pi nenea am Jiosh ap'ethag ed. M wabshaba hab chum kaij mam s-nenea.”
43010001	D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “No hig pi woho mat g s-chu ehskam wabsh s-a'agi haskojed ab wo i wah heg eda kolhai mam am ha nuhkuth g kahwal k wo s-ha ehsitham?
43010002	T wabshaba g si ha nuhkuththam ab wo i wah kihjeg amjed.
43010003	T g kihjeg nuhkuththam ab wo i kuhpi'oki. K g ha nuhkuththam am si ha chehcheg ch gm hu i ha wanimed.
43010004	T am wo i wuwhag k gm hu wo i oi no pi s-mahch g ne'okij. T am ha ba'ich wo himath.
43010005	Pi at hedai ep wo i oi no pi pi mahch g ha-ne'oki k wabsh wo e gantad.”
43010006	Neh, ith ad hekaj am chum ha'ichu ha mashcham g Jesus. D wabshaba pi sha'i amichuth mo haschu hab ahg.
43010007	D heg hekaj hab ep kaij, “Ahni ani hab ni-ahg ch ni-wepogith g kolhai kihjeg.
43010008	Hegam mo hab e a'aga mo d em-wanimedtham ch eda pi ab hu ni-wohochuth o d s-chu e'eskam ch d ha mu'akam. K wabshaba g ni-wohochuththam pi ab hu ha kaiham.
43010009	Heg ani wepo mo g kihjeg. Kahwal o am wapke kolhai ch ed. K pi ha'ichu has e wua am ha tahgio. Kumt ahpim ab wo s-ni-wohochuth k hab wa'ap wo e tho'ibia. Kahwal o ab mahks g s-kehg ha'ichu hugi. Kum ahpim ab ep mahks mam haschu i tatchua.
43010010	S-chu ehskam at wo jiwia mat wo ha u'u k wo ha koktha. Nt ahni ia jiwia mant s-ba'ama ab wo i em-mah g thoakag
43010011	nani pi s-wohom d em-nuhkuththam. “Neh, kahwal ha nuhkuththam at chum hems ha wehhejed wo e muhkith.
43010012	Hegai mo d wabsh ha-pionag at am wabsh wo i ha thagito k wo meh mat am wo jiwia g sheh'e. T g sheh'e am wo wahk k wo mu'a k wo ha gantad.
43010013	Pion at wo heb hu meh no pi pi ha tatchua g ha-shoshoiga.
43010014	“Nt eda ahni wo i nako g sho'igthag am ha wehhejed g ni-wohochuththam hab masma mo g si ha nuhkuththam g kahwal chum anis wo ni-muhkith am ha wehhejed. Kahwal ch ha nuhkuththam o ab a'ai s-e mahch. Kuch g ni-wohochuththam ch ahni ab hab wa'ap a'ai s-t-mahch. Ch ahchim g ni-ohg wehm hab wa masma ab a'ai s-t-mahch.
43010016	Ha nuhkuththam at wehs ab wo i ha hemapai g e-kahwaliga. Nt ahni hab wa masma ab wo i ha hemapai wehs hegam mat ab wo i s-ni-wohoch, chum hems g gawul mahs hemajkam.
43010017	“Am ant wabsh wo i ni-thagito muhkig wui. K g ni-ohg heg hekaj si ni-tatchua. Nt ab uhpam ep wo i ni-chegito.
43010018	Pi at hedai wo sha'i e nako mas wabsh hejel wo e elith k wo ni-mua. U'ukch ani g ni-ap'ethag mant am wo i ni-thagito muhkig wui k ab uhpam ep wo i ni-chegito. Ab o ni-chehani g ni-ohg mant ith am hab wo juh.”
43010019	D am ep a'ai e ne'owi g hemajkam heg hekaj mo has i kaij.
43010020	Kud mu'ijj hab nahnko kaij babgatk, “Thoki wabsh jiawul. Pi o wehsig. Shahchu am ahgch ab kaiham?”
43010021	D wabshaba ha'ijj hab epai kaij, “Pi at wo e nako hegai mo d wabsh sha jiawul mas hab kaitham s-kehg wo neokath ch wo nench g pi neatham.”
43010022	D am i e ai g ge'e cheopi wakonadag tash. D eda d s-hehpich'edkam.
43010023	Kuchd am oiopo anai mo hab e a'aga Solomonbad watto am ge'e cheopi t am.
43010024	D am i e chehm g haha'ichu k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Tt he'es i tash wo m-nenida mapt wo t-ahgi maps wa woho d Jiosh si Kehsha.”
43010025	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heki ani hu am em-ahgith. M eda pi ni-wohochuth. Ni-ohg o ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag mant hab wo juh g s-hasig ha'ichu. K heg am chum em-tashogith mani hedai wud.
43010026	M wabshaba pi ab hu ni-wohochuth nam d ge ni-hemajkamga.
43010027	Neh, am o oith g e-nuhkuththam g kahwal no pi s-mahch am i s-amichuthk g ne'okij. K hab wa'ap ni-oith g ni-wohochuththam no pi s-ni-mahch. Ni ahni ep s-ha mahch.
43010028	Ab ani ha mahkch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. T hegam pi hekith wo huhug. T pi hedai wo sha'i ni-wohppo'i.
43010029	Ni-ohg o wehs ha'ichu thahm s-gewkthag ch si s-wihnam an ha u'ukch hegam mo ab ni-mahkch. T pi hedai wo wohppo'i.
43010030	Ahni g ni-ohg wehm ach d hemako.” Neh, ith ad hab wabsh chum chei g Jesus.
43010031	D g hemajkam am ep u'ihi g hohothai mat wo ma'ichkwua.
43010032	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Mu'i ant ha'ichu hab juh g s-ap'ekam nat pi ab ni-mah g ni-ohg g gewkthag. K haschu d hegai mamt heg hekaj wo ni-ma'ichkwua?”
43010033	D hab kaij g hemajkam, “Pi ach heg hekaj s-m-ma'ichkwuimk s-ap'ekam ch wabshaba heg hekaj map pad neok. Thap wabsh o'othham ch eda hab chum a'aga g Jiosh mo d si m-ohg ch hab ab chum e wepogith g Jiosh.”
43010034	D hab kaij g Jesus, “An o o'ohanas em-chehanig ed mo g Jiosh hab ha a'aga jijosh hegam mo u'achug g ha'ichu ahgaj, chum as d wabsh hemajkam.
43010036	T wahm ahni hig woho am si i ni-kehsh k ia i ni-ah'ath ith thahm jewed. M eda haschu ahgch hab ni-ahg mani pad neok mani hab kaij mani d Jiosh alithag?
43010037	Mantp wa woho pi am hu hab wo junihith g ni-ohg chikpan, mt s-ap pi wo ni-wohoch.
43010038	Ni wabshaba am hab junihim. Mt heg hekaj wo s-mahchk mach d hemako g ni-ohg wehm.”
43010039	D g haha'ichu am hahawa ep chum cheha g cheopi nuhkuththam mat am wo hihim k wo bei. D wabshaba ep e tho'ibia ab ha amjed.
43010040	Kuchd gm hu hahawa hihim k gm hu ai g Jordan Akimel k am aigo i chehchsh k am thatha mo wa g Johnbad am ha pahl wapkon k am thadha.
43010041	D mu'i hemajkam am wui thatha hab kaijch, “Pi at wa ha'ichu s-hasigam hab juh g John. Kuki wabshaba d wohokam mo haschu i t-ahgith ith amjed o'othham.”
43010042	D mu'i hemajkam ab i s-wohoch g Jesus amai.
43011001	Am ad wa hema kih Bethany kihhim t am ch hab chehgig Lazarus ch am hu hebai haha wabsh mumku. Lazarusbad u'uwiga ad d Martha ch Mary.
43011002	(Ihtha Mary o wa d hegai mad wa g uhw shuhthagi an iawua Jesus tahtad an k an i thagio wabsh g e-che'echew mo'okaj.)
43011003	Kudki ihtham u'uwigaj am hema cheha mad am wo him k wo ahgi g Jesus, “S-ap'ekam t-kownalig, si m-nawoj at mumku.”
43011004	D am i kah g ha-ahga g Jesus k am t-ahgith, “Lazarus ash mumku. K wabshaba pi hab d ahga mat gm hu hab wo i e juh. Nt wo tho'ibia mamt hekaj ab wo ihm g Jiosh. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab epai wo ni-ihm.”
43011005	Jesus ad wa ab wa chum si pihk e elith ha wui ihtham Martha ch Mary ch Lazarus
43011006	ch wabshaba pi am hu wa hekaj i hih mo ab waith. K am d i gohk tash amjed.
43011007	D hab kaij ab t-wui, “M att hig ep wo uhpam hihi Judea chekshani wui.”
43011008	Kuchd ahchim chum pi hohho'ith ch hab kaij ab wui, “T-mashchamtham, pi o koi d sha'i tash mo wa am chum s-m-ma'ichkwuimk g hemajkam. Ttp eda am ep wo hihi!”
43011009	D hab kaij g Jesus, “T am wabsh s-ap wo himath g o'othham tash ch ed ch wabshaba wo e huchwua s-chuhugam k ed. Pegih, pi at has wo e juh mo eda ni-ap'echuthch g Jiosh mant hab wo junihith g chikpanaj.”
43011011	D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Koi at g t-nawoj Lazarus. Nt wabshaba am wo uhpam him k wo wuha.”
43011012	Kuchd hab kaij, “Kohsig o s-kehgaj wehhejed. T wo wa hejel ap'et.”
43011013	D eda g Jesus heg hab ahg mat muh g Lazarus
43011014	ch heg hekaj hab kaij, “Neh, muh at g Lazarus.
43011015	Ni wabshaba wabsh s-ap ni-tahtk mani pi am hu wehmaj namt pi haha wo nei mant has wo ni-juh k ab ba'ich wo i s-ni-wohoch. Tt oi wo hihim k wo nei.”
43011016	D ihtha Thomas mam hab a'aga Kuathi hab kaij ab t-wui, “Pegih, ttp wo oi g t-mashchamtham k wehmaj wo t-ko'ij.”
43011017	Kuchd gd hu thatha Bethany t am k s-mai mash d wa'i gi'ik tash matsh gd hu e cheh g Lazarus.
43011018	Tki eda mu'ijj am thatha g hemajkam ab Jerusalem t amjed mat am wo i ha gewkemhu g Martha ch Mary no pi d wa'i gohk mihya.
43011020	D ga hu t-nam g Martha nash pi kah mo ab him g Jesus. Tki g Mary ga hu wa'i wih ha-kih ab.
43011021	D hab kaij g Martha ab wui g Jesus, “Neh, ni-kownalig, mapt hems s-hohtam wo jiwia, t chum pi wo muh g t-wehnag.
43011022	Ni wabshaba s-mahch mat g Jiosh ab wo m-mah mapt haschu ab wo i tai, chum hems hemuch mat i ge'etha g ha'ichu pi t-ap'ethag.”
43011023	D hab kaij g Jesus, “T wo uhpam e chegito g em-wehnag.”
43011024	Kud hab ep kaij g Martha, “S-mahch ani mat uhpam wo e chegito mat hekith wo i huhug g jewed.”
43011025	D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ia ani ha'ichug ahni mant wo i ha wuwhas g ko'i ab amjed g muhkig k ab wo i ha mah g thoakag. Ab ani ha mahkch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hegam mo ab ni-hiwig. T wo uhpam e chechegito am i ko'ok. Nap s-wohochuth ihtha?”
43011027	Kud hab kaij g Martha, “Heu'u, ni-kownalig, s-wohochuth ani map d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d Jiosh alithag. An o o'ohadag Jiosh o'ohana ed maptsh ia wo jiwia jewed thahm.”
43011028	Kud gm hu hahawa uhpam hih g Martha k atsh am wabsh s-a'agi wai g Mary ash hab kaijch mo ab him g ha mashchamtham ch ab waith.
43011029	D am ha hekaj s-hohtam hih g Mary k gd hu jiwia mat am t-nam g Martha natt ge koi ai g kihhim.
43011031	Kud mu'ijj i oi g Mary hegam moki am ha wehm shoani ash hab em-ahgch mat gm hu uhpam ep wo hih hiha'ini wui mat am wo shoakath.
43011032	D am i cheh g Mary g Jesus k ab i gei wecho k hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig, mapt hems s-hohtam wo jiwia, t chum pi wo muh g t-wehnag.”
43011033	D am i nei g Jesus mo shoak g Mary. D hegam ep shoani mo wehmaj. D gd hu si ai g ihbthaj. D si has e tahtk
43011034	k ab ha kakke mas hebai ehsto g chuhkugaj. D hab kaij ihtham, “Oi g t-oith k am wo nei matt am ehsto.” Kuchd am hahawa hihim k am thatha k am nei mat am ehsto.
43011035	D am i shosha g Jesus.
43011036	D heg hekaj hab kaij g hemajkam, “Neh, kuki ab si pihk e elith wui.”
43011037	D wabshaba ha'ijj hab ep kaij, “Neh, t wa g pi neatham thoaj. T haschu ahgk pi thoaj g Lazarus mat pi wo muh?”
43011038	D am ep si has i e taht g Jesus k am i miabi g hiha'ini. Ith o ab cheho ch ed hab chu'ig ch g hothaikaj ab kuhpi.
43011039	D hab ha ahg g Jesus mat gm hu wo i nu'ichkwua g hothai. D g Martha hab kaij, “T-kownalig, heki at hu padt no pi d wa'i gi'ik tash mat am e cheh.”
43011040	D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Napt pi chegito mani wa m-ahgith mapt wo nei g s-hasig ha'ichu k wo taht g Jiosh gewkthag maptp ab wo s-ni-wohoch.”
43011041	D gm hu hab i e nu'ichkwua g hothai. D am e thahm i nea g Jesus k hab kaij, “Ni-ohg, ab ani i m-ho'ige'elith map ab ni-kaiham.
43011042	S-mahch ani map chum hekith ab ni-kaiham ch wabshaba hab kaij ihtha ihtham ha wehhejed hemajkam. T hab wo s-wohoch mapt ahpi ia i ni-ah'ath,”
43011043	k am i ha'asa e ho'ige'ithahun k am hahawa si s-kaitham neok ch hab kaij, “Lazarus, ab g i wuhshani!”
43011044	D ab i wuhsh g Lazarus k an wabsh kia bihiwigs g i'ikuskaj mach hekaj ha bihiwig g t-ko'i ch ab wabsh kia ma'ishp g wuhioshaj g ikuskaj. D hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Gam g hu wo padch g i'ikus k wo hiwigi mat wo hih uhpam.” Neh, d wa woho hab e juh.
43011045	Mu'ijj hegam mad am i ha chehgio g Martha ch Mary ad ab i s-wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha am i neithok mad haschu hab juh.
43011046	Tki wabshaba ha'i ehp gm hu hihi Palasi ha wui k am ha ahgi mat haschu hab juh.
43011047	Kutsh am e nam g Palasi ch u'ugchu papal ha wehm g ge'e e jehnigiththam k am a'aga mas has wo juh ihtha s-hasig ha'ichu hab wuatham.
43011048	“Wehsijj at ab wo i s-wohoch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha mattp am wabsh wo neithath. T g Rome kokownal am wo i e nakog k wo i wua g ge'e t-cheopi k wo wehs t-koktha,” bad kaij ihtham am a'agathch.
43011049	Sh am ha'ichug hegai mad d si uhgchu pahl ch hab chehgig Caiaphas ch si s-gewkam hab ha ahg, “Kaij, ahpim am sha'i pi ha'ichu a'amichuth
43011050	ch pi mahch mo ba'ich i s-ap'e mat hemako o'othham wo muh wehs t-wehhejed kih hegai mattp wehsijj wo t-ko'ij.”
43011051	Neh, bad kaij ch eda pi mahch mo g Jiosh am tashogith heg hekaj ne'okij mo e aihim mat g Jesus wo e muhkith ha wehhejed g Tutuligo
43011052	ch wehs ha wehhejed g nahnko mahs hemajkam. T ihtham ha'i ab wo i s-wohoch g Jesus k ab wo i e hemakoj e wehm.
43011053	Neh, ia'i amjed ad g haha'ichu am i e nako mat wo mua g Jesus.
43011054	D heg hekaj hahawa pi an hu s-masma oimmed g Jesus Judea chekshani ch ed am i thagitok g Bethany. Chd gm hu hihim k am ha'ichugkahim mo am d Ephraim kihhim mo am miabithch g tohono jewed.
43011055	Kud eda e aihim mat wo e wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag. K mu'ijj am hihim gm hu a'aijed Jerusalem kihhim wui mat am wo i e nako heg wehhejed.
43011056	D chum hedai an chum neith g Jesus am i e hemapathk ge'e cheopi t am ch hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Pi atp hems ia hu wo sha'i jiwia. Shahm i elith.”
43011057	Kuki eda g u'ugchu papal ch Palasi am i ha chehani g hemajkam mat hemho wa wo ha ahgi sha s-mahchk mo hebai ha'ichug g Jesus. T an wo bei.
43012001	Chuhthp tash o wa am wi'is mat wo e ai g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag wuhshtha.
43012002	Kud wa am hab e juh g ge'e gegosig Bethany t am wehhejed g Jesus. Kuchd gm hu hihim k am ha wehm t-gegosith. D g Lazarus am ep t-wehmaj. Martha ad am ha wehmaj hegam mad am hihithod ch an t-to'ith.
43012003	D g Mary gd hu jiwia Jesus wui k g si s-namkig uhw shuhthagi u'a ch an iawua Jesus tahtad an. K eda d hemako s-wehch. D an i thagio wabsh g e-che'echew mo'okaj. D wehsko uhwa ihtha uhw shuhthagi am kih ch ed.
43012004	D hab kaij hegai t-wehm kehshaj g Jesus mo hab chehgig Judas Iscariot,
43012005	“T haschu ahgk pi e gagda ihtha uhw shuhthagi matt wo ha mah g sho'igkam, natt pi ahim g waik siant pihsh namkigdag ab wo i nei g lial heg amjed.”
43012006	D eda pi woho s-ha ho'ige'ith g sho'igkam ch wabshaba s-behimk g lial nadki pi s-chu ehsk ch chum nuhkuth g t-lialiga ch wabsh hejel hekaj.
43012007	D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Thagitoni. T-himthag oithk at hab juh g ni-muhkig wehhejed.
43012008	Chum o hekith ia em-shahgith g sho'igkam. Nt wabshaba ahni hi pi wabsh chum hekith ia wo em-shahgithk.”
43012009	D eda wehsko kaithag mad g Jesus ab i wuhshath g Lazarus muhkig amjed. Kud mu'i am thatha g Judea t am hemajkam s-ha neithamk.
43012010	Kud mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha k am i ha thagito g e-wanimedtham am i neithok g Lazarus. D am i s-mai g u'ugchu papal k am i e nako mat g Lazarus hab wa'ap wo mua.
43012012	D am ba'ich i mahsi. Kuchd am i t-nakog k gm hu hihi Jerusalem wui. D eda mu'i am e hemapathch g hemajkam kihhim ch ed mat wo wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag. Chd am hihim wohg ch ed. D mu'ijj ga hu t-nam am i kaiok mat am wo jiwia g Jesus.
43012013	Ihtham ad ha uh'ukch g chukud shosha u'us i'ibhonig ch ab si has elith g Jesus si s-kaitham hab kaijch, “Ith o d s-ap'ekam t-kownalig ch ia jiwia am wehhejed g Jiosh. K g Jiosh si s-ho'ige'ith.”
43012014	D g Jesus am hema ha tai g wechij wuhlu k heg cheshathk.
43012015	Heki o hu an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed matsh ith hab wo e juh ch hab chu'ig: Pi g am wo e totothsith, ahpim Tutuligo! Ithani at ia wo jiwia g ge'e em-kownalig an thaichugch wechij wuhlu t an.
43012016	Kuchd pi sha'i amichuth wehs ihtha. Kut wa wabshaba hekith ab uhgk i e bei g Jesus thahm kahchim wui, tt am hahawa i chegito mo an o'ohanas ihtha Jiosh o'ohana ed. Kutki heg hekaj hab e juh am wehhejed.
43012017	Ihtham mu'i hemajkam ad wa am nam g Jesus nash pi kah mat ab i wuhshath g Lazarus muhkig amjed. Hegam mo wa am neith ash am ha ahgith.
43012019	D hab kaij g Palasi ab a'ai e wui am i ha neithok, “Ha g wo neith matki wehsijj am i oi. Pi attki wo t-nako matt wo keshwua.”
43012020	D am ha'i thatha g Greek hemajkam Jerusalem t am mat ab wo has el g Jiosh heg eda tho'ibiathag wuhshtha piast.
43012021	Kuchd am oiopo. D ihtham am thatha k am cheh g Philip k am ahgi mo s-neithamk g Jesus.
43012022	D g Philip am ahgi g Andrew. (Ihtham ad am d chum kihkam Bethsaida t am am Galilee chekshani ch ed.) Kud am hahawa e wehm hihim k am ahgi g Jesus.
43012023	D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ithani at e ai g ni-tashga mat g ni-ohg wo ni-maskogi mani d si Kehshaj.
43012024	T wabshaba wehpeg ha'ichu hab wo e juh am ni-tahgio. Neh, nat hig am wo i wuhshani k ab wo mu'itha g pilkani pi am hu e eshk? Hemho wa at am wo e ei jewed wecho k wo muh k hab wa'i masma wo i wuhshani k ab wo mu'itha.
43012025	Ith ani hab ahg mat g o'othham wo heki wua g e-thoakag matp wo s-huwithath hejel e wehhejed k wabshaba wo edgithath g pi ha huhugetham thoakag matp wo hugio g e-thoakag am ni-wehhejed.
43012026	Bat wo junihith g ni-tatchui hegai matp hedai hab e elith mat d wo ni-pionagk. Kunt hab wo juh mat an wo ni-wehmajk mant hebai wo i ha'ichugk. Ni-ohg at ab wo si has i ha el hegam mo hab junihim g ni-tatchui.”
43012027	D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ni-ihbthag at ab si i e kudu. Ni hab chum ni-tahtk mant hab wo chei, ‘Ni-ohg, pi g hiwgith mas hab wo e juh ihtha am ni-tahgio.’ Nt eda heg hekaj ia jiwia mant am wo gahi wuhsh hegai s-ko'ok ha'ichu.
43012028	Pegih, ni-ohg, am g maskogith g e-gewkthag am gahi ni-wuhshanim.” D ab neo g Jiosh thahm kahchim t amjed k hab kaij, “Am ant heki hu i maskogith k am hab ep wo juh.”
43012029	Mu'i o wa am gegok g hemajkam ch kah hegai mo ab neok. Ha'ijj o hab kaij, “Ab o kaithaghim g tataniki.” Kud ha'ijj hab kaij, “Anghil at ab wui neo.”
43012030	D Wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ahpim at em-wehhejed ab s-kaitham neo, ch pi ahni ni-wehhejed.
43012031	E at ai mat ge'e wo bei g chu'ichig g hemajkam. Jijawul ha-ge'ejig o chum e kownalchuth ith thahm jewed. Nt wabshaba oi wo gewito.
43012032	Ab amt wo ni-naggia uhs t ab ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Kunt ab haha wo i ha wanchshul g hemajkam ni-wui.”
43012033	Neh, bo wa kaij g Jesus ch oki heg hab ahg mat has masma wo muh.
43012034	D hab kaij g hemajkam, “An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mat g Jiosh si Kehsha pi hekith wo muh. P haschu ahgch hab kaij mapt ab wo e naggia uhs t ab maptp woho d Jiosh si Kehsha?”
43012035	D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ia ant he'es i tash wo ha'ichugk em-shahgith ch heg wa wepo mani d tonlig em-wehhejed. Am g s-ap wo hihimath tonlig oithch. T hab pi wo em-ma'ish g s-chuhugam. Hegai matp hedai am wo himath s-chuhugam k ed o pi mahch mas hebai him.
43012036	Ab g wo i s-ni-wohochuth mani eda ia wabsh kia ha'ichug k hab masma tonlig ch ed wo hihimath.” Neh, bad kaij ch gm hu hahawa i e mehkoth ab ha amjed.
43012037	Mu'ikko ad wa hab juh g s-hasig ha'ichu g Jesus am ha-nena ed ihtham hemajkam. Kud wabshaba mu'ijj pi ab hu wohochuth mo d Jiosh si Kehsha.
43012038	Neh, d hab wa masma hab e juh hegai matki g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam Isaiah an o'oha. An o hab chu'ig: Pi o mu'i ab s-wohochuth g ha'ichu t-ahga ab m-amjed. K g m-gewkthag pi tasho am ha-wehhejed.
43012039	Tki an ep o'oha g Isaiabad: Jiosh at hab ha juh mo pi ap ha'ichu neith ch pi ha'ichu amichuth mat pi ab hu wui wo i e nohnogith k pi wo e tho'ibia ab pi ap'ekam t amjed. Isaiabad o wa ab amjed neok g Jesus gewkthag natsh pi Jiosh am tashogi. Kut ihtham hemajkam wa woho pi e nako mas ab wo s-wohoch g Jesus.
43012042	Kud mu'i ab hi wa chum s-wohoch g haha'ichu. Tsh wabshaba g Palasi gm hu wo i ha wuwhas matp wo s-mai mat ab s-wohoch. D heg hekaj pi am hu tasho e ahg
43012043	no pi s-hohho'ith g ab has ha-elitha g hemajkam ch g Jiosh ab has elitha wabsh pi ab hu ha'ichuchuth.
43012044	Jesus ad am ep ha jehnigith ch si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Matp hedai ab wo i s-ni-wohochuth k hab wa'ap s-wohochuth g ni-ohg Jiosh.
43012045	K hedai i ni-neith ch hab wa'ap neith.
43012046	Ia ant jiwia ith thahm jewed k hab sha masma mo g tonlig am em-wehhejed nani pi am tashogith g wohokam himthag. Kumt s-ap wo himath g e-thoakag hab masma mam am tonlig ch ed mamtp ab wo ni-hiwgath.
43012047	Mu'ijj o pi ab hu ni-kaiham ch pi ab hu ni-hiwig. Nt wabshaba pi heg hekaj ia jiwia manis wo ha lothai. S-ha ani tho'ibiamk.
43012048	T wo e lothai g ni-ne'okikaj mat hekith wo i huhug g jewed.
43012049	Ni-ohg o ab ni-chehani mant haschu hab wo chei. Ni pi g hejel ni-ne'oki hab kaij.
43012050	Kumt heg hekaj ab wo kaiham k hab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Heg ani wa'i hab kaij mo g Jiosh ab ni-chehani.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.
43013001	D am him k am i e ai matt ba'ich tash wo mua g kahwal mad k wo wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag. Kuki s-mahch g Jesus mat am wa e ai matki ia wo thagito ihtha jewed k wo hih am e-ohg wui. D eda si pihk e elith wehs e-thoakagkaj ab ha wui hegam mat ab i s-wohoch.
43013002	D am e ap'ech matt am wo t-gegos hema kih am gm hu i juhk. D wa eda heki hu ab i kaiha g Judas Iscariot g ge Jiawul k am i e shelch mat wo gagda g Jesus.
43013003	Ab atsh Jiosh amjed ia jiwia g Jesus k ab wui ep wo i e nodagi. Kush g Jiosh ab wehs mahkch g gewkthag. D ith s-mahch g Jesus
43013004	ch wabshaba am i kekiwua k am wuahawua g e-lihwa k g tuayakaj ab e bahshodath
43013005	k am ge was wakonakud ch ed k ab i wapkonahi g t-tahtad k heg hekaj ha thagio tuaya mat ab e bahshodath.
43013006	D ab i ai g Simon Peter. D heg si has e tahtk ch hab kaij, “Ih, napt wo wapko g ni-tahtad k eda d ge ni-kownalig!”
43013007	D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pi ap hi wa amichuth hemuch mani haschu chum em-tashogith ith hekaj ch wabshaba wo wa amich imhab i ba'ich.”
43013008	Kud hab hahawa kaij g Peter, “Pi apt hekith wo sha'i wapko g ni-tahtad.” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi apt d wo i ni-wehmtthamk mant wo sha pi wapko g m-tahtad.”
43013009	Kud hahawa si s-hohtam hab kaij g Peter, “Ni-kownalig, pi g heg wa'i ni-tahtad wapkon k wabshaba g ni-nohnhoi ch ni-wuhiosha ehp.”
43013010	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heki apt hu e wako wehsko koi jiwiak. Heg at wa'i e-tahtad wo wapko hegai mat hedai heki hu wehsko e wako mat koi am hu wo jiwia kih t am. Ith ani hab ahgch hab kaij mat g em-thothakag wehs i e kegch, heg hi wa i hemako mat pi i e kegch.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus no pi s-mahch mat hedai wo gagda.
43013012	T am i ha wapko g ha-tahtad k ab uhpam wah g e-lihwa k ga hu hahawa ep thahiwua mihsa wui k ab ha kakke, “Nam s-amichuth mant haschu ahgk hab em-juni ihtha?
43013013	Neh, bam ni-a'aga mani d em-kownalig ch d em-mashchamtham. K am wa s-ap'e no pi woho ihtha.
43013014	Thani wa chum em-kownalig ch d em-mashchamtham ch eda am i ni-jumalkath k heg ni-wepogi mani d wabsh em-pionag. Pegih, mt ahpim hab wa masma ab a'ai wo e neithath
43013015	mant am em-chehgi ch ab a'ai wo i e wehmtath
43013016	nam pi d ni-pionag. Kut pi hebai g pion hab wo chum e elithath mas ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo hi g ahmoj.
43013017	M hahawa s-mahch mamt has wo chum masmak. Kut d wo s-ap tahhathkamk am em-wehhejed mamtp woho hab wo masmak.
43013018	“Mt wabshaba pi wehsijj ab hu wo bei ihtha no pi an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mamt hema ab ni-wui wo kekiwua ahpim mam ni-wehm e gegosith. Kuni s-mahch mat hedai hab wo e juh nani pi wehs s-em-mahch ahpim mant ab i em-gawulkai.
43013019	Kuni heki hu ab em-ahgith mat koi hab e juh. Kut hekith hab wo i e juh, mt ab haha wo s-wohoch mani woho d Jiosh si Kehsha.
43013020	Jiosh o ab ni-mahkch g ha'ichu e-ahga. Kuni ab epai em-mahk. K heg hekaj ab s-ap ni-neith ch ab s-ap neith g Jiosh hegam mat hedai ab wo s-ap em-neithath.”
43013021	D am hahawa si e kudu g Jesus k hab t-ahg, “Pi ant ap ni-taht k wo em-ahgi mamt hema ahpim wo ni-gagda.”
43013022	Kuchd si has i t-taht k ab wabsh a'ai si t-neith pi sha'i amichuthch mas hedai hab ahg.
43013023	Kunid eda an hugithaj an thaha g Jesus ahni mo ni-hekaj si pihk e elith.
43013024	D hekaj g Simon Peter wabsh s-a'agi ab ni-ahgith mant wo kakke mas hedai hab ahg.
43013025	Kunid wabsh s-a'agi ab epai kakke g Jesus mas hedai hab ahg.
43013026	D hab kaij ab ni-wui, “Hegai mant wehpeg ab wo bih o d hegai.” Kud wa woho am ge bia g hithod k ab mah g Judas Iscariot.
43013027	D am wabsh i chum huh g e-bih. D g ge Jiawul am ba'ich i chikp eda. D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “S-hohtam g am hab juhni hegai mapt hab wo juh.”
43013028	Kuchd pi sha'i amichuth mas haschu hab ahg ch hab kaij ihtha.
43013029	D eda nuhkuth g t-lialiga hegai Judas. Kuchd heg hekaj ha'i hab t-ahg mo hab ahg mat ep wo ha nolawt g ha'ichu hugi heg wehhejed ge'e gegosig o ha'ichu wo ha mah g sho'igkam.
43013030	D ha hekaj i wuhsh g Judas gm hu jeg ed. Kuki eda ab wabsh i si s-chuhugam.
43013031	D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus, “Neh, hemu at wehs wo e nahto hegai mat g Jiosh am i ni-kei mant hab wo juh ia jewed thahm. Am ani wa chehgith g Jiosh gewkthag.
43013032	T g Jiosh heg hekaj am wo tashogi g ni-gewkthag hemu s-hohtam.
43013033	“Pegih neh, ahpim mani ab si em-tatchua, pi ant sha'i tash ia hu wo e-wehmajk nant pi gm hu wo hih. Kumt pi wo e nako mams wo ni-cheh. Am ant hab ep wo chei em-wui mani wa haschu ha ahgith g hemajkam mamt pi wo e nako mamt hejel am wo hihi mant hebai wo i hih.
43013034	“Hemu ant ab wo em-mah g wechij chehanig. K d ihtha mamt ab a'ai wo si pihk e elithath hab masma mani ahni hab em-juhkch.
43013035	Wehsijj at wo s-mahchk mam ab i e thagitokch ni-wui mamtp ab a'ai wo si pihk e elithath.”
43013036	D hab kaij g Simon Peter, “A pt hebai wo hih, ni-kownalig?” Kud g Jesus hab kaij, “Pi apt wo e nako mapt wo ni-oi hemu amai mant am wo hih. K wabshaba ab him g tash mapt am haha wo i ni-oi.”
43013037	D hab kaij g Peter, “Nt haschu ahgk pi wo ni-nako mant wo m-oi hemuch? Ni-nahtokch ani mant wo m-wehhejed muh.”
43013038	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab ant wo si shel m-ahgi map pi woho e nahtokch mapt wo muh ni-wehhejed. Neh, waikko apt hab wo wa'i chei map pi sha'i ni-mahch mat koi wo kuhu g keli chuchul.”
43014001	D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Pi g wo sha'i e kudut. Ab g wabsh i s-wohochuth mo an ha'ichug g Jiosh k ahni ab ep wo i s-ni-wohoch mani d si Kehshaj.
43014002	Am o wi'is ni-ohg kihthag ed am wehs ha wehhejed g ni-wohochuththam. Nt wo wa chum em-ahgi matp pi am hu wo wi'isk. Nt am wo him k am wo i ap'ech em-wehhejed
43014003	k ia ep wo jiwia k ia wo em-ui mamt an wo ni-wehmajk.
43014004	S-mahch am mamt has masma am wo hihi amai mant am wo hih.”
43014005	D hab kaij g Thomas ab wui, “Ih, ni-kownalig, pi ach sha'i mahch maps hebai wo hih ch hab pi mahch machs has masma wo thatha.”
43014006	D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ab amt wo ni-hiwgath. Nt ahni an wo wa'i em-u'apa anai ni-ohg kihthag ed. Ith o heg wa wepo mani d am wui himtham wohg em-wehhejed ch d Jiosh wohokam ch d m-wechij thoakag.
43014007	Matp hedai woho s-ap wo s-ni-mahchk ch hab wa masma wo s-mahchk g ni-ohg. Neith am g ni-ohg nam pi ni-neith.”
43014008	D hab kaij g Philip ab wui, “Pegih, t-kownalig, am g t-chehgith g e-ohg. Heg ach wa'i tatchua.”
43014009	D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Tash ani ia em-wehmaj. Kupki eda pi woho ap ni-mahch, ahpi Philip. Hegai mo hedai i ni-neith ch hab masma ep neith g ni-ohg. P haschu ahgch ab ni-tahni mant wo em-chehgi g ni-ohg?
43014010	Ahni kch ni-ohg ach d hemako. Kupki pi koi ab hu s-wohochuth ihtha.” D hab ep kaij ab wehs t-wui, “Ni-ohg o ab ni-ahgith mant has wo che'e k has wo ni-juh.
43014011	Ab g wo s-wohochuth mach d hemako g ni-ohg wehm heg wabsh hekaj mani am em-ahgith, o amtp pi wo e nako hab masma k wo s-wohoch mach d hemako heg hekaj s-hasig ha'ichu mani hab junihim.
43014012	Nt wo si shel em-ahgi matp hedai ab wo s-ni-wohochuth k wo e nako mat hab wo junihith g s-hasig ha'ichu hab masma mani ahni, pej ba'ich i ge'e hab wo juh g s-hasig ha'ichu nant pi ahni hi wo hih am ni-ohg wui.
43014013	Kunt am hab wo em-juni mamtp haschu ab wo i tai g ni-ohg am ni-chehchegk. T heg hekaj g hemajkam ab wo si hehgchul g ni-ohg Jiosh.
43014014	Pegih, mt haschu ab wo i tai g ni-ohg am ni-chehchegk, nt ahni hab wo juh.
43014015	“Am g hab wo junihith g ni-chehanig mamtp woho ab wo si ni-tatchuath.
43014016	Nt ab wo tai g ni-ohg mat ab wo em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. T heg chum hekith wo em-wehmajk ch am wo i em-tashogithath g wohokam.
43014017	Pi o ta neithagma g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. T heg hekaj pi wo sha'i e nako mas wo s-mahchk hegam mo pi ni-mahch. M wabshaba ahpim hi s-mahch no pi em-wehmaj hemu ch am wo e ul em-thoakag ed.
43014018	“Pi ant ia hu hejel wo em-thagito k wabshaba ia wo wa em-wehm ha'ichugk am i thahm mant im hu wo uhpam hih.
43014019	Kumt wo s-mahchk mant ia wo em-wehmajk. T wabshaba hegam mo pi ab hu ni-wohochuth pi wo mahchk mani ia ha'ichug nat pi pi wo ni-neithath. Kumt d wo wechij thothakamk ab ni-amjed heg wa'i hekaj mant ab wo i wuhsh muhkig amjed k d ep wo thoakamk.
43014020	Ia'i amjed amt wo s-mahchk mach d hemako g ni-ohg wehm k ch ep wo s-mahchk mamt ahpim ab i e hemakoj ni-wehm.
43014021	“Am o e chehgith mo ab si ni-tatchua hegam matp hedai ab wo bei g ni-chehanig k hab wo junihith. Kunt ab ha wui wo si pihk ni-elithath g ni-ohg wehm ch ab ha wui wo i ni-tashogi.”
43014022	D hab kaij g Judas, hi wa pi hegai Judas Iscariot, “T-kownalig, pt has masma ahchim wa'i t-wui wo i e tashogith k pi ab hu wehs hemajkam ha wui?”
43014023	D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Hegai mo hedai ab si ni-tatchua at wo wohog el g ha'ichu ni-ahga. Kut hahawa ab wui wo si pihk e elithath g ni-ohg. Kutt g ni-ohg wehm am haha wo i t-maskogi wui k am wo wehmajkath.
43014024	Pi at ab hu wo wohog el g ha'ichu ni-ahga hegai mat pi ab hu wo ni-tatchua. K eda g ni-ohg d amjedkam ihtha ha'ichu ni-ahga.
43014025	“Ith ani hi wa em-ahgith hemuch mani ia em-wehmaj.
43014026	T g ni-ohg ab haha wo cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat heg am wo i em-wehmajk am ni-wehhejed ch wo em-gewkemhunath ch wo em-mashcha mani haschu i s-em-mashchamamk ch hab wo em-juh mamt wehs ha'ichu wo s-chegitok mani haschu i em-ahgith.
43014027	“Am g wabsh wo i s-ap e tahtkkath. Ab ant wo i em-mah hegai hab mahs s-ap tahhathkam mani ahni edgith. Pi at hedai wo e nako mat hab mahs s-ap tahhathkam wo em-mah. Pi g wo sha'i e kudutath ch pi ha'ichu wo ehbithath.
43014028	“Am am wa ni-kah mani wa hab kaij mant gm hu wo hih ab em-amjed k wabshaba ia wo wa ep em-wehmajk. Ni-ohg o ba'ich i s-gewkthag mani ahni. Kumt heg hekaj wo chum si s-hehgigkath mant im hu uhpam wo hih wui mamt hems g wehs e-ihbthagkaj ab wo ni-tatchuath.
43014029	Ith ani em-ahgith mat koi hab e juh. Mt hab ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga mat hekith hab wo i e juh.
43014030	“Hemu at am ge'e wo chehgi g e-gewkthag g jijawul ha-ge'ejig no pi chum e kownalchuth ia jewed thahm. K heg hekaj pi am hu ge'e s-ni-ap'e mant tash am ha'ichukaj wo em-wehm neo. K eda pi u'ukch g gewkthag mas hab wo ni-juh manis ab wecho wo i ni-ul.
43014031	Wehs ani hab junihim mo haschu ab i ni-chehani g ni-ohg. K hab masma s-mahch g hemajkam mani ab si tatchua g ni-ohg. “Pegih neh, oi g wo, am att wo i t-nakog k wo hihi.”
43015001	D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Thach wa'i hemako hab masma mo g uhdwis je'e d hemako g e-i'ibhonig wehm. Ahni ani heg wepogithas mo g uhdwis shon wa'ug. M ahpim heg wepogithas i'ibhonigaj. K g ni-ohg t-nuhkuth.
43015002	Hegai i'ibhonigaj at ab wo chum bahithagt. Mt ahpim hab wa'ap s-kehg ha'ichu hab wo chum junithahith g Jiosh. E'es nuhkuththam at an wo si hikkumia hegai i'ibhonig mat pi ab hu wo bahithagt k wo i kegch hegai mat ab wo bahithagt. T hab ba'ich i mu'i ab wo bahithagt.
43015003	“Heki am hu kegchuthas ahpim mam ab kaiham ch ab s-wohog elith g ha'ichu ni-ahga.
43015004	Pi g gm hu hab wo sha'i i e juhni ab ni-amjed. Nt ahni hab wa masma pi gm hu hab wo i ni-juh ab em-amjed. Mt hab s-ap hab wo juh ha'ichu k s-ap hab wo masmak hab masma mo hegai i'ibhonig mat s-ap ab wo bahithagt ab gi'ikch e-wa'ug ab.
43015005	“Pi at ab hu wo bahithagt g i'ibhonig pi ab hu gi'ikch e-wa'ug ab. Mt ahpim hab wa'ap pi wo e nako mamt ha'ichu s-kehg hab wo juh mamt gm hu hab wo i e juh ab ni-amjed.
43015006	Hegai i'ibhonig mat wo e hikkumia at am wo i e hemapath k wo e mei. Neh, ith o hab mahs matp hedai gm hu hab wo i e juh ab ni-amjed k ab wo e ahijithach mat hahawa pi ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk am Jiosh wehhejed.
43015007	Ab ant wo i em-mah mamt haschu ab wo i ni-tai mamtp ab wo s-wohog elithath g ha'ichu ni-ahga ch ab wo ni-hiwgath.
43015008	Hegam matp hedai woho ab i e thagitokch ni-wui at mu'i ha'ichu hab wo junihith ni-wehhejed. T heg hekaj ab wo hehgchul g hemajkam g ni-ohg Jiosh.
43015009	“Bani masma si em-tatchua ch si pihk em-elith mo hab masma si ni-tatchua g ni-ohg. Ab ani si s-wohog elith g ni-ohg. Ch ab a'ai si pihk t-elith. Kumt ahpim hab wa'ap ab wo s-ni-wohog elithath. Tt ab a'ai wo si pihk t-elithath.
43015011	Ith ani em-ahgith mamt wo bei g s-hehgig am hab junihithch g ni-chehanig hab masma mani ahni s-hehgig am hab junihithch g ni-ohg chehanig.
43015012	Ab ani em-chehani mamt ab a'ai wo pihk e elithath hab masma mani ahni has i masma si pihk em-elith.
43015013	Hegai matp hedai wo e muhkith ha wehhejed g e-naipijju o d hegai mo woho si pihk e elith ha hekaj.
43015014	Ahpim am d ni-naipijju mamtp hab wo junihith g ni-chehanig.
43015015	Kuni hahawa pi hab em-a'aga mam d wabsh ni-pionag ch wabshaba hab em-a'aga mam d ni-naipijju nani pi ab em-ahgith wehs ha'ichu mani ab kah ni-ohg amjed. Neh, mo hema d wabsh pionag ch pi mahch mo haschu am hab i wua g ahmo.
43015016	Pi amt hejel e elith k am wo i gegokiwua ni-wehhejed. Ahni ant am i em-chuhcha mamt am wo hihim k hab wo juh g ge'e chikpan. Kut pi hekith wo huhug hegai mamt hab wo juh. T g ni-ohg am hab wo em-juni mamtp haschu ab wo i tai am ni-chehchegch.
43015017	Pegih, ith ani ab em-chehani mamt ab a'ai wo pihk e elithath.”
43015018	D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo s-chegitok mo ahni wehpeg s-ni-keh'ith hegam mo pi ab hu tatchua g Jiosh ch hab wa'ap wo s-em-keh'ithath.
43015019	Ab at wo em-tatchua mamtp hems pi ab hu wo tatchua g Jiosh. Nt wabshaba ab si em-gawulkai ab ha amjed. Kum pi ha wepo chegito ha'ichu. K hekaj hab s-em-keh'ith.
43015020	Mt wo s-chegitok mani wa hab em-ahgith mat pi hebai g pion hab wo chum e elithath mas ba'ich d i ge ha'ichu mo g e-ahmo. T wo em-sho'igch hegam mo ni-sho'igchuth. Kut ab wo s-em-wohog el hegam mo ab s-ni-wohog elith. Hegam mo pi mahch g ni-ohg o ni-sho'igchuth ch hab wa'ap wo em-sho'igchuthath nam pi ab ni-wui e thagitokch.
43015022	Ia ant jiwia ha wui k am ha ahgi ab amjed g ni-ohg k am ha chehgi g s-hasig chikpan mat pi hedai hekith hab juh. K wabshaba s-ni-keh'ith. K heg hekaj tasho mo s-keh'ith g ni-ohg. Kut hab masma mahsko wua g pi ap e-chu'ichig.
43015025	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mat wo s-ni-keh'ithath pi haschu sha'i ahgk. Kut wa woho hab e juh.
43015026	“Ab ant wo cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat am wo em-wehmajk. Heg o am wehmaj g Jiosh ch ab em-wui wo him k wo em-wehmajkath ch am wo i em-gewkemhunath ch am wo ha'ichu em-tashogithath ab ni-amjed.
43015027	Kumt ahpim wo i ahgahi ab ni-amjed nam pi ni-wehmajkahim ga hu i amjed mant am i shonwuich g ni-chikpan.”
43016001	D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am ani em-ahgith ihtha mamt heg hekaj pi wo ni-thagito.
43016002	T wo i em-wuwhas ab amjed g cheopi. K ab him g tash mamt wo em-mu'a k hab wo e ahgath mat wehhejed hab juh g Jiosh.
43016003	Ith amt hab wo em-juh heg hekaj mo pi ni-mahch ch ep pi mahch g ni-ohg.
43016004	Mt wabshaba wo s-chegitok mani ith am em-ahgith mat hekith hab wo i e juh.” D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Pi ani em-ahgith ihtha ga hu i wehpeg heg hekaj mani ia em-wehmaj.
43016005	K wabshaba hemu e aihim mant uhpam wo hih am ni-ohg wui. M eda pi ab hu sha'i s-ni-kakkeimk manis hebai wo hih
43016006	ch wabsh pi ap e tahtk s-mahchok mant gm hu wo hih.
43016007	T eda pi ab hu wo i hih g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag em-wui nt ho'ip gm hu hih. K heg hekaj ba'ich i s-ap'e mant gm hu wo hih.
43016008	T ab haha wo i hih g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag k am wo i ha tashogi g hemajkam g s-ap'ekam ch pi ap'ekam ch Jiosh lothaita.
43016009	Ni-ohg at ab wo ni-ha'ichuch mant am wui wo him k pi ia hu wo ha'ichugk. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag heg hekaj wo wohokamch am ha wui g hemajkam mani d s-ap'ekam am Jiosh nena ed k ep wo wohokamch mo hab junihim g pi ap'ekam mo eda pi ab hu ni-wohochuth
43016011	k ep wo wohokamch mat wo e lothai hegam mo hab junihim g pi ap'ekam nat pi am wa e ai mat g Jiosh wo lothai g ge Jiawul.
43016012	“Mu'i ani ha'ichu ep s-em-ahgithamk. Mt wabshaba pi wo e nako mamt wo s-amich mant wo chum em-ahgi hemuch.
43016013	Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at am wo i em-tashogi g wohokam k am ep wo i em-ahgi mat haschu has wo e juh imhab em-ba'ich. Nt am wo ahgi mat has wo chei. Kut am wo em-tashogith k hab ab wo si ni-ha'ichuch.
43016015	Wehs g ni-ohg gewkthag o d ep ni-gewkthag. Ni hekaj hab kaij mat g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am wo i em-tashogi mani haschu ab i ahgith.”
43016016	D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Tho sha'i ha'as, mt pi an hu wo ni-neithath, ch am ep wo sha'i ha'as, mt hahawa ep wo ni-neithath.”
43016017	Kuchd hab kaij ab a'ai t-wui, “Shahchu o hab ahg ch hab kaij mas wo sha'i ha'as, tt pi an hu wo neithath, ch am ep wo sha'i ha'as, tt ep wo neithath. K wa hab ep kaij mat wo hih am e-ohg wui.
43016018	Pi ach sha'i amichuth mo haschu hab ahg ch hab kaij.”
43016019	D s-mahch g Jesus machd ab s-kakkeimk ch hekaj hab kaij, “Pi am sha'i amichuth mani haschu hab ahg ch hab kaij mat wo sha'i ha'as, mt pi wo ni-neithath, ch am ep wo sha'i ha'as, mt ep wo ni-neithath.
43016020	Pegih, nt wo ha'ichu em-ahgi mat woho hab wo e juh. Mt wo si pi ap e taht k wo si shoanith. T g s-ni-keh'iththam wabsh wo si s-hehgigk. T amjed ha'ichu hab wo e juh mat ab wo em-mah g si ge'e s-hehgig.
43016021	Neh, s-mahch am mat has wo e juh mat hekith wo e ai mat wo mahmadho g uwi. T wo pi ap e taht mat wo nako g s-ko'ok. T wabshaba am wo i mahsi g ali. T am wabsh wo i pi chegito g s-ko'ok heg hekaj mo si s-hehgig mat an i e mahsith g ali.
43016022	Bo wa masma am em-tahgio mam hemuch pi ap e taht. Nt wabshaba ab ep wo ni-chehgi em-wui. Kumt haha wo si s-hehgigk. T pi hedai wo sha'i padch hegai hab mahs s-hehgig em-wehhejed.
43016023	“Mt hahawa pi ab hu wo ge ni-kaiamath ha'ichu ch wabshaba ab wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ch ab wo kakke g ni-ohg am ni-chehchegch. T wa woho wo em-mah.
43016024	Pi am koi hekith ni-chehcheg am e ho'ige'ithahunch. Am g hab wo i e juhni. T g ni-ohg am hab wo em-juni. T ab wo si e shuhthath g em-thoakag g s-hehgigkaj.”
43016025	D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am ani ha'ichu i chum em-tashogith g ha'ichu wepogitha ahgakaj. Ab o him g tash mant hahawa si tasho wo em-ahgi ab amjed g ni-ohg.
43016026	T ab haha wo em-abk mamt ab wo i e ho'ige'ithahunath ni-ohg wui am ni-chehchegch. Pi amt heg wo wa'i hiwgath manis ahni am wo wa'i ni-ho'ige'ithahunath em-wehhejed.
43016027	Ni-ohg o ab si em-tatchua nam pi ab si ni-tatchua ch ab s-wohochuth mant ia jiwia ab amjed g Jiosh.
43016028	Ia ant woho jiwia ab amjed g ni-ohg ith thahm jewed. T e ai mant uhpam ep wo hih am ni-ohg wui.”
43016029	Kuchd ab wui hab kaij, “Neh'e, hemuch ap si tasho am ahg ha'ichu ch pi hekaj g wepogitha ha'ichu ahga.
43016030	Ch hahawa s-mahch map wehs ha'ichu s-mahch. Pi o hab hahawa mahs machs hedai ab wo ge ha'ichu m-kakke. Ch hekaj hahawa s-wohochuth map ab amjed g Jiosh.”
43016031	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nam hig hab elith mam ith woho s-wohochuth?
43016032	Ab o e aihim mamt gm hu a'ai wo si e gantad k gm hu uhpam wo hihi e-kihki wui ia hejel ni-thagitok. Ni wabshaba pi hejelig. Ni-ohg o chum hekith ni-wehmaj.
43016033	“Wehs ani em-ahgith ihtha mamt heg hekaj wo si s-ap e tahtkkath. T wo em-sho'igch hegam mo pi ab hu tatchua g Jiosh. Mt wabshaba am wo si e gewpkai nant pi heki hu s-ap wo em-gewitojel g pi ap'ekam.”
43017001	D am i kuhgi g Jesus g ha'ichu e-ahga k am i nea thahm kahchim wui k am e ho'ige'ithahun k hab kaij, “Ni-ohg, ia at i e ai g ni-tashga. Ab g uhpam ni-mahki hegai ni-gewkthag mani wa an u'ukch m-hugith an. Nt ab haha wo si has m-elith k wo mahsko wua g m-gewkthag.
43017002	Ab apt i ni-mah g gewkthag am wehs ha thahm g hemajkam. Kut ha'i ab ni-wui e thagito no pi d m-hemajkamga. K hab d m-elitha mant wo ha mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
43017003	Thap wohokam Jiosh ch am i ni-kei mant ia wo jiwia jewed thahm. Kut wehs wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hegam mat wo s-t-mahchk.
43017004	Ia ant ha chehgi g hemajkam g m-gewkthag k nahto hegai chikpan mapt ab i ni-cheha mant hab wo juh.
43017005	Pegih, ni-ohg, ab g uhpam ni-be k ep wo ni-mah hegai ni-gewkthag mani wa edgith an m-hugith an matt eda koi an hu nahto g jewed.
43017006	“Ab apt ni-wui i ha gawulkai ihtham chechoj mo ia ni-wehmaj. K d m-hemajkamga. Am ani i m-mahtchulith ha wui ch ha ahgith g ha'ichu m-ahga. Kut ab s-wohog elith
43017007	k hahawa s-mahch mo wehs g ni-mahchig ab d m-amjedkam.
43017008	Ab ap ni-mahkch g ha'ichu e-ahga. Kuni am ha ahgith. T ab i s-wohochuth k heg hekaj s-mahch mani ab d m-amjedkam.
43017009	“Ihtham o d m-hemajkamga. Kuni heg hekaj am ha wehhejed ni-ho'ige'ithahun ch pi ha wehhejed hegam mat pi ab hu wo m-tatchua.
43017010	Hegam o d wa'i m-hemajkamga mat ab wo ni-hiw mant wo ha tho'ibia. T g ni-gewkthag ab wo e chehgi ha ab.
43017011	T hemuch e ai mant wo hih am m-wui k pi ia hu haha wo ha'ichugk ith thahm jewed. T wabshaba ihtham ia hu wo ha'ichugk. Kuni ab m-tahni mapt wo ha nuhkuthath, ni-ohg. Thap hekia s-ap'ekam. Kut ab wo m-ihmath ch hab d wo hemakok hab masma mach ahchim d hemako.
43017012	Ia ani ha nuhkuthahim mat ab wo m-ihmath. Kut heg wa'i pi e tho'ibia mo an o'ohanas matki hab wo e juh.
43017013	“Ith ani hab kaij mani ia wabsh kia ha wehmaj ch koi ab hu m-wui hih mant hekaj ab wo si ha mah g s-ap tahhathkam.
43017014	Ab ant ha ahgi g ha'ichu m-ahga. T ab i s-ni-wohochuth k ab ni-hiwig ch ab i e gawulkai ha amjed hegam mo pi ab hu m-tatchua. K hegam heg hekaj s-ha keh'ith.
43017015	Pi ani heg hab ahg maps ia wo i ha wuwhas ab amjed g jewed ch wabshaba hab ahg mapt wo ha nuhkuthath. T hab pi gm hu wo i ha nu'ichshul g ge Jiawul.
43017016	Ab o gawulkthas ihtham pi ap'ekam t amjed hab masma mani ahni.
43017017	Ab g i ha gawulkath e wehhejed heg hekaj ha'ichu e-ahga. Ha'ichu m-ahga o d wohokam.
43017018	Am apt i ni-kei mant ia wo ahgath g ha'ichu m-ahga jewed thahm. Kunt hab wa masma am i ha chuhcha.
43017019	Ab ant si i ni-thagito m-wui mat ihtham wo s-mahchk g wohokam ch hekaj ab hab wa'ap wo i e thagito m-wui.
43017020	“Pi ani ihtham wa'i ha wehhejed ni-ho'ige'ithahun ch wabshaba hegam ehp mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga k ab wo i e thagito ni-wui.
43017021	Ith o d ha'ichu ni-tahnig mat wehs am wo i e hemakoch hab masma mach ahchim d hemako. Kut hab wo s-mai g hemajkam map d ahpi ch am i ni-kei mant ia wo jiwia.
43017022	M-gewkthag o d ep ni-gewkthag nach pi d hemako. Kuni ab ha mahkch g t-gewkthag mat t-wehm d wo hemakok.
43017023	Thani hemako ha wehm hab masma mach ahchim d hemako. T hab wehs s-ap d wo hemakok ihtham. T heg hekaj wo s-mai g hemajkam mapt am i ni-kei mant ia wo jiwia jewed thahm k ep wo s-mai map ab si ha tatchua ihtham hab masma map ahni.
43017024	“Ni-ohg, ab apt i ni-mah ihtham mo ab si ni-tatchua. Kuni si tatchua mat am wo ni-wehmajk anai mant anai wok. An apt ni-mah g si s-kehg ap'ethag nap pi si ni-tatchua mat eda koi e nahto g jewed. Kuni ab m-tahni mat ihtham am wo ni-wehmajk ch heg wo neithath map haschu ab ni-mahkch.
43017025	Thap hekia s-ap'ekam, ni-ohg. K pi hi wa chum m-mahch hegam mo pi ab hu m-tatchua. Ni wabshaba ahni s-m-mahch. K ihtham ep s-mahch mapt am i ni-kei.
43017026	Am ant m-mahtchul ha wui k am ba'ich wo i m-mahtchul ha wui. T hab wo si pihk e elithath ni-hekaj hab masma map ahpi. Nt ahni am wo i ni-hemakoch ha wehm.”
43018001	D am i ha'asa e ho'ige'ithahu g Jesus. Kuchd gm hu aigo i chehchsh hegai aki mo hab e a'aga Kidron k am thatha mo am eshas g u'us.
43018002	D eda pi an hu t-wehmaj g Judas nadki pi gm hu him k am si gagda g Jesus ha wui g u'ugchu papal ch Palasi. Kudki ihtham ab mu'i ha cheha g shonthal ch cheopi nuhkuththam mat am wo oi g Judas. Dki heg ab i ha wanim no pi s-mahch matt hebai wo ha'ichugk no pi mu'ikko am t-wehm thahiwup amai. D ihtham ha'ijj ge i'is-papayo ch ha'ijj ge lalamba ch ha'ijj wabsh kuhthch.
43018004	D eda wa chum wehs s-mahch g Jesus mat haschu has wo e juh am tahgio ch wabshaba am i hih ha wui k hab kaij, “Thohm in gahg?”
43018005	D hab kaij ihtham, “Hegai Jesus mo ab Nazareth t ab d kihkam.” Kud hab kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ani wud.”
43018006	D haha wabsh e totoths hegam k ab ta'i si i gegokiwua k wabsh i shul.
43018007	D ab ep ha kakke g Jesus, “A m hedai in gahg?” D hab ep kaij, “Hegai Jesus mo ab Nazareth t ab d kihkam.”
43018008	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Am ani wa heki hu em-ahgith mani d ahni. Mtp ahni in wo ni-gahghith ch pi has wo ha juh ihtham.”
43018009	Neh, bo kaij no pi s-t-tho'ibiamk. Kud hab masma hab e juh g ne'okij mo wa hab kaij matt wehsijj wo t-tho'ibia.
43018010	D g Simon Peter ge is-pahyo ch ab i huhpan k ab hu wabsh si i widut k higshp an si hikuch g s-apkojed nahkaj hegai mo d uhgchu pahl neholiga ch hab chehgig Malcus.
43018011	D hab kaij g Jesus ab Peter wui, “Ga g hu uhpam hab juhni g e-is-pahyo. Pi apt wo e nako mapt wo ha shohbi nant pi hemho wa wo nako mo haschu g ni-ohg ap'echuthch am ni-wehhejed.”
43018012	D ab ha cheha g shonthal g ha-ge'ejig mat am wo i ha wehmt g cheopi nuhkuththam. D am bei g Jesus k gn hu si wulsh g nohnhoij k gm hu i wanim Jerusalem wui.
43018013	Am ad kih g u'ugchu papal. Kud gn hu wehpeg i bei heg wui mo hab chehgig Annas. Ihtha Annas o d ba'amad ohgaj hegai mo d si uhgchu pahl ch hab chehgig Caiaphas.
43018014	K d ihtha Caiaphas mad wa am ha shelinith g haha'ichu mat hemako wo muh g o'othham wehs ha wehhejed.
43018015	Kuchd gohkajj g Simon Peter wehm am i ha oi mo am bebhehim g Jesus. K eda g uhgchu pahl s-ni-mahch. Nid hekaj am i wah kolhai ch ed.
43018016	D g Peter ga hu wa'i kehk jeg ed ab kihjeg t ab. Nid am hahawa him k ab ahgith hegai chehia mad ab nuhkuth g kihjeg mat ab wo i wahki g Peter.
43018017	D hab kaij ihtha chehia ab wui g Peter, “Nap hig pi ahpi an ep wehmaj hegai mamt an bei?” D hab kaij g Peter, “Pi ani an hu sha'i wehmaj.”
43018018	D eda s-hehpith. D hekaj am ge nahthch g pion ch cheopi nuhkuththam ch am gegok ch e huhkalith. D g Peter am him k am ha wehm i kekiwua k e huhkal.
43018019	D g uhgchu pahl ab kakke g Jesus mas haschu ahgk ab ha'i i ha gawulkath k haschu ha mashcham.
43018020	D hab kaij g Jesus, “P haschu ahgch ahni ab ni-kakke? Pi ani hekith s-a'agi ha'ichu ahg ch wabshaba wehs hemajkam wui hab kaij ch am ha mashcham ha-cheopi ed ch ge'e cheopi ch ed mach am wehs t-hehemapath. Pegih, ab g hig ha kakke mani haschu i ha mashcham. S-mahch o mani haschu ha ahgith.”
43018022	D hab wabsh chum chei. D ab si shonikka g cheopi nuhkuththam k hab ahg, “Pi apt hab sha'i kaitham wo neokath ab uhgchu pahl wui.”
43018023	D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus, “Am g hig wehs wo ha ahgi manis ha'ichu pi ap hab kaij. Wohokam ani em-ahgith. Pt haschu ahgk ab ni-shonikka?”
43018024	D g Annas am hahawa ha cheha mat am wo u'apa Caiaphas wui. Kud an wabsh kia wulshch g Jesus.
43018025	D eda g Peter am wabsh kia e huhkalith ha-nahtha wui. D hab kaij hegam mad am wehmaj, “Nap hig pi ahpi an ep wehmaj hegai mamt an bei?” D wabshaba g Peter pi mahch k e ah hab kaijch, “Pi ani an hu sha'i wehmaj.”
43018026	D am hema kehk g neholigaj g uhgchu pahl ch d hajunij hegai mat g Peter hikuch g nahkaj ch hab kaij ab wui g Peter, “Nani pi woho m-neith amai matt am bei ihtha?”
43018027	D hab kaij g Peter, “Ih, pia'a.” D edapk am i kuhu g keli chuchul.
43018028	Wabsh i si'alim mad koi i chesh g tash, md gm hu i bei g Jesus kownal kih wui. D hab chehgig hegai Pilate. D pi am hu i wahp g Tutuligo kownal kih ed no pi g t-himthag hab chu'ig matt wo t-uamhu mattp am wo i wahp gawul hemajkam ha-kih ed. Kut pi wo ap'ethagk mat wo huh g kahwal mad iagchulig gegosig imhab i juhk matp am wo i wahp.
43018029	D heg hekaj gm hu i wuhsh g Pilate k am ha nam k hab kaij, “Shahchu am ab abchuth ihtha o'othham?”
43018030	D hab kaij ab wui, “Pi att woho ia wo u'apa ahpi m-wui hegai matt pi koi wo s-mai mo am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam.”
43018031	D hab kaij g Pilate, “Pegih, mt ahpim wo be k ab wo mah g s-ko'ok namkithadag mo has i mahs g em-himthag chehanig.” D hab kaij g Tutuligo, “Pegih, bo mahs g t-himthag chehanig mat wo e mua heg hekaj pi ap e-chu'ichig. K eda pi t-hiwgith g ge'e kownal ab Rome t ab machs hab wo juh. Tt heg hekaj ia u'apa mapt ahpi am hab wo juh.”
43018032	Ith ad wa hab e juh mat hab masma wo e muhkith g Jesus mo wa hab kaij no pi g kownal hab masma ha muhkith.
43018033	D g Pilate gm hu uhpam wah e-kih ed k ab i wai g Jesus k hab kaij ab wui, “Neh, nap hab e elith map d ha-kownalig g Tutuligo?”
43018034	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nap ab ni-kakke ihtha ab hejel e amjed, aha no ha'ijj ab ha'ichu i m-ahgith ab ni-amjed?”
43018035	Kud hab kaij g Pilate, “Pi ani d sha'i Tuhligo manis wo s-mahchk ihtha. M-wehm hemajkam ha wehm g e-papalig at ia m-u'apa. Pt haschu has juh?”
43018036	D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ni-kownaltalig o pi hab chu'ig mo g ith thahm jewed kokownaltalig, Tp hems hab wo chu'igk, t wo ha cheggia hegam mo ab si ni-wecho e mashcham mamt pi am hu wo i ni-thagito haha'ichu ha wui. Pi o hab mahs g ni-kownaltalig.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.
43018037	D heg hekaj hab ep kaij g Pilate, “Kupki woho hab kaij map d kownal!” D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Heu'u, thani kownal ch ia jiwia jewed thahm k ia mahsi mant wo ha ahgi g wohokam. Matp hedai ab wo tatchuath g wohokam at ab wo ni-kaiha.”
43018038	D gm hu hab si e widu g Pilate k hab kaij, “Mas haschu d i wohokam.” D am hahawa uhpam i wuhsh ha wui g hemajkam k hab ha ahg, “Pi ant ha'ichu sha'i cheh manis ab wo abch ihtha.
43018039	K eda wehs ahith ab am hema i e thathagitod g lihso em-wehhejed ia'i ithani mam wushshath g e-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag. Pegih, nam tatchua mant ith wo thagito mash d em-kownalig ahpim Tutuligo?”
43018040	D si s-kaitham hihnk ch hab kaij, “Pi hegai. Barabbas ach tatchua.” D eda d s-chu ehskam ch d ha mu'akam ihtha Barabbas.
43019001	D am hahawa ha cheha g Pilate g shonthal mat wo s-ko'okam gewitta g Jesus. Kud wa woho hab e juh
43019002	k am hahawa ge ho'i gihkot k ab wahki mo'oj ab k ab wahki g kownal kahba
43019003	k wabsh has ahg ch hab kaij, “Wapt wo si tash d Tutuligo ha-kownaligk,” ch ab hahawa si shonikkash.
