43019004	D am ep i wuhsh g Pilate k hab kaij am ha wui g hemajkam, “Neh'e, ab ant ep wo i wuhshath k wo em-chehgi mant pi ha'ichu sha'i cheh g pi ap chu'ichig mas hekaj wo e muhkith.”
43019005	Md am hahawa i wuhshath k ab wabsh kia wahkch g ho'i gihko ch hegai kownal kahba. D hab kaij g Pilate ab ha wui, “Ab g wo i neith mo d wabsh si sho'ig o'othham.”
43019006	D am i nei g u'ugchu papal ch cheopi nuhkuththam k si s-kaitham hab wabsh ge kaij mu'ikko, “Mu'ani! Mu'ani ab kots t ab!” D g Pilate hab kaij, “Pegih, k wo be k ahpim ab wo mua kots t ab. Ahni ant hi pi ha'ichu sha'i cheh mas melchkwua g kownal chehanig mat wo e muhkith.”
43019007	D hab kaij hegam Tutuligo, “Ahchim at hi melchkwua g t-chehanig am hugkam mat hemho wa wo e muhkith no pi hab e a'aga mo d Jiosh alithag.”
43019008	Neh, d am i ha kah g Pilate mad hab kaij ihtham k ba'ich i e ebkioth
43019009	k gm hu uhpam i wah k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Bahp amjed him?” D wabshaba g Jesus pi ab hu has sha'i chei.
43019010	D hab ep kaij g Pilate ab wui, “Aha, napt pi has wo chei ab ni-wui k eda s-mahch mani gewkthag mant wo m-thagito o ab wo m-mua kots t ab!”
43019011	D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Jiosh at ab m-mah hegai gewkthag. K heg hekaj si pi ap hab e wua ihtham Caiaphas mo m-pi'ichuth mapt pi ap wo hekaj g e-gewkthag.”
43019012	D am i kah g Pilate ihtha k am ep i wuhsh ha wui k am chum si e nako mat wo thagito. D wabshaba si s-babgam hihnk hegam haha'ichu ch hab kaij, “Neh'e, ihtha hemajkam o hab e ahg mo d si ge'e kownal ch heg hekaj ab wui kehk hegai mo d si ge'e kownal ch ab Rome t ab. Kupki ahpi hab wa'ap ab wui kehk g si ge'e kownal mapt wo sha thagito ihtha.”
43019013	D am i kah g Pilate ihtha k am hahawa i wuhshath g Jesus k heg ga hu i thahiwua usagakam thaikud ed amai mach hab a'aga Gabbatha mo an sha uhgk i hothaitas.
43019014	D eda e aihim g thahm juhk. Kud wo e koktha g kahwal mahmad imhab i juhk mat wo e wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag. D hab kaij g Pilate ab ha wui g haha'ichu, “Ia g hu wo neith g e-kownalig.”
43019015	D ab ep si s-babgam hihnk ch hab kaij, “Mu'ani! Mu'ani ab kots t ab!” D hab kaij g Pilate, “Aha nam tatchua mant wo mua g si uhgk em-kownalig ab kots t ab?” D hab kaij g u'ugchu papal, “Heg o d wa'i si uhgk t-kownalig mo ab thaha Rome t ab.”
43019016	D am hahawa i thagito g Pilate g Jesus mamt ab wo mua kots t ab. D am hab hahawa e juh g ha-tatchui mamt ab ha mah g Jesus. D gm hu i wanim.
43019017	D g Jesus am kushwiot g hejel e-kots. Kuchd am thatha amai mo am e koktha. Bach a'aga amai Golgotha mo hab d ahga Koshwak.
43019018	Kumt gam si wuahawua g wehschugaj k ab sisish kots t ab k ab uhgk i bei. D eda gohk d ep lilso. Kumd ihtham hab wa'ap ab ha sisish kokots t ab k gn hu a'aijed ha chuhcha Jesus hugith an.
43019019	D an sisishp g tapial Jesus kots t ab. K an ab hab chu'ig: “Ith o d Jesus ch d ha-kownalig g Tutuligo.”
43019020	K eda pi mehk ab kihhim t amjed amai mam am ha koktha. D heg hekaj mu'ijj g t-wehm o'othham ab ne'okchul hegai mo haschu an o'ohanas. K an o'ohanas g t-ne'okikaj ch g Rome ne'okikaj ch g Greek ne'okikaj.
43019021	D gm hu uhpam ep hihi g u'ugchu papal Pilate wui am i ne'okchulithk ihtha k hab ahg, “Pi g hab masma an o'ohan mo d t-kownalig k wabshaba an o'ohan mo heg hejel hab kaij mo d t-kownalig.”
43019022	D hab kaij g Pilate ab ha wui, “Mant haschu an i o'oha, t heg an wo o'ohadagk.”
43019023	D hegam shonthal mad am naggia g Jesus d gi'ik ch hekaj am gi'ikpa e tahpath g Jesus wepschuga. K am hema d si s-namkig ha'ichu eniga ch pi hebai ha shohmas.
43019024	D ith hab ahg g shonthal ch hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Pi att am hu a'ai wo t-wanchith ihtha k am wabsh wo t-chichwi matt hedai wo t-gehg k heg wo bei.” Neh, bad kaij ch woho am hab e juh. Kud hab masma am e wohokamch g Jiosh o'ohana mo an o'ohanas hab masma: T am a'ai wo e tahpani g wehschugaj g Jiosh si Kehsha k am wabsh wo e chichwi k wo s-mai mat hedai wo bei g s-namkig ha'ichu enigaj.
43019025	D am gegok g je'ej ch jiskaj g Jesus miabithch amai mo am naggia. Kud gohk am ep ha wehmaj mo hema d hegai Mary mo g wehmaj kihkam d Clopas ch hema d ep Mary Magdalene.
43019026	Nid ahni am ha wehm kehk mo ni-hekaj si pihk e elith g Jesus. Kud g Jesus an ni-a'aga ch hab ahg g e-je'e, “Neh, ith at d haha wo m-madk m in kehk,”
43019027	ch hab ep ni-ahg, “Ith at d haha wo m-je'ek.” Neh, nid am i amjed bei g je'ej. Kud heg am t-wehm kih.
43019028	D hahawa s-mahch g Jesus mat wehs hab juh mat haschu hab wo chum juh mat koi wo muh ch hab kaij, “Tonom ant.”
43019029	D an hema thaha g ha'a mad am shuhthagi g pad nawait. D am hema g shonthal ha'ichu wakch pad nawait ch ed k an ha'ichu k an uskon k ab uhgk i be k ab kams hab masma mo an o'ohadag Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed.
43019030	D ab i winiun k hab hahawa kaij, “Ia ant i wehs ha'ichu nahto.” Neh, bad kaij ch am hahawa jumal i mo'owua k am i muh.
43019031	D am e nakog g hemajkam mat wo e mihshmath nat pi g ba'ich tash d wo shahwaik ch d wo ge'e tashk. Kutsh g haha'ichu ab kakke g Pilate mat wo e ohmi g ha-kakhio hegam mad am nahngia. T hab wo e oiwigi g ha-muhkig mat gm hu wo i e u'u k pi ab wabsh wo kia nahngiak t-mihshmetha tash ed, wahm mat ith d wo si ge'e t-tashgak.
43019032	D ab ha chehani g Pilate g shonthal mat wo ha ohmi g ha-kakhio. Kud hab ha juh hegam gohk mo ab hugithaj ab nahngia g Jesus.
43019033	D wabshaba g Jesus heki hu muh. Kud pi ohmi g kakhioj.
43019034	D hema g shonthal g e-is-pahyokaj chu'akad g Jesus ab hudaj ab. Kud ab ha hekaj si e iawua g eh'ed ch shuhthagi.
43019035	Ith anid neith ch s-mahch mat woho muh. Kuni hab masma am em-ahgithahim mamt ahpim hab wa'ap wo s-mahch mat woho muh.
43019036	Jiosh o'ohana o hab chu'ig: Pi at hema wo sha'i e mul g oh'oj. Kut wa woho hab masma hab e juh.
43019037	K an ep o'ohanas ch hab chu'ig: Hemajkam at ab wo neithath hegai mamt ab chu'akad.
43019038	K hema d Joseph ch ab Arimathea t amjed ch s-wohochuth mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha ch wabshaba s-ha gihug hegam mo pi hohho'ith. D wabshaba hekith am i muh g Jesus, d ith am hih Pilate wui k ab e sho'igchuth k ab tahni g honshpadaj. D am i hiwigi. D ga hu ep jiwia k ab i huduni g muhki k gm hu i bei.
43019039	D heg am ep ha'ichug Nicodemus mat wa gd hu i wehpeg chehgim g Jesus chuhug ch ed. Ihtham atsh s-ap wo juh g muhki. D g Nicodemus heg hekaj u'a g siant s-wehch hegai mo d s-ap uhw ha'ichu ch d myrrh ch aloes.
43019040	S-e ad hohtkith nad pi hudunihim. D ba'ich tash d t-mihshmetha tash. K eda an mia cheotas hothai ch ed mamt am hab juh g hiha'ini k wabshaba koi sha'i hekaj. K an wehgaj eshas g u'us. Kumd am i bei g honshpadag k am i hobino g s-kehg ikuskaj heg wehnathk s-ap uhw ha'ichu mach hab masma hab ha wua g ko'i k am cheh heg eda hiha'ini k gm hu hihi.
43020001	Thomig wabsh i si'alim mad wabsh kia s-chuhugam, tsh gm hu hihi hegam Mary Magdalene k am thatha cheo t am. Kutsh heki hu gm hu i e nu'ichkwua g hothai mad hekaj ab chum kuhpi.
43020002	Tsh am chum neith k am hahawa uhpam meh kihhim wui k ad gd hu t-wui mel ahni John ch Simon Peter k am t-ahgith ch hab kaij, “Am atki i e wuhshath g t-kownaligbad hon heg amjed hiha'ini mat am e cheh. Kuch pi sha'i mahch mas hebai has e juh.”
43020003	Kuchd g Peter wehm am ha hekaj wohp.
43020004	Nid ahni wehpeg gd hu mel nanid pi ahni ba'ich i s-hohtam meh mad g Peter.
43020005	Nid am i koachsh k nei mo am wehch hegai s-kehg ikus k wabshaba pi am hu i wah.
43020006	D am hahawa mel g Peter k am wabsh si i wah k cheh hegai ikus
43020007	ch heg ehp mat hekaj e hobino g Jesus mo'o. D ith gd hu hab wabsh hejelko holiwek ch kahch.
43020008	Kunid ahni am hahawa epai i wah k am i neithok ab hahawa i s-wohoch mat woho i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed.
43020009	Kuchd eda pi koi s-amichuth hegai Jiosh o'ohana mo hab chu'ig mat hemho wa wo i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed.
43020010	Kuchd gm hu hahawa hihi uhpam.
43020011	Sh am ep oimmed g Mary cheo kihjego ch shoak ch atsh am i e jumalkath k am i koachsh hiha'ini ch ed
43020012	ch ash gohk ha neith g anghil. Ihtham ash s-tohtam e enigadathch ch ga hu a'ai thadha, hema ab mo'oshko ch hema ga hu aigo
43020013	ch hab kaij, “Uwi, shahchu ap ahgch shoak?” Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Heg hekaj matki gm hu i e bei g ni-kownalig muhki. Kuni pi mahch mas hebai e cheh.”
43020014	Tsh hab che'iok ab sikol i kekiwua k ash neith mash ab hema kehk ch ash wabshaba pi sha'i mahch mo hedai wud.
43020015	Sh eda d Jesus ch ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Uwi shahchu ap ahgch shoak? Thohp in gahg?” Kush hab e ahg mo d e'es nuhkuththam ch hab kaij ab wui, “Ab g si s-ni-ho'ige'ith k am ni-ahgith mapt hebai hab cheh. Nt am wo him k am wo bei.”
43020016	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Mary.” Tsh ab hahawa ep i neith k hab kaij e-ne'oki ed, “Raboni!” mo hab d ahga “Ni-mashchamtham!”
43020017	Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi g am hu ni-shohbith. Koi ant am hu hih ni-ohg wui. Pt wabshaba am wo him k am wo ha ahgi g ni-naipijju mant wo uhpam i ni-nodagi heg wui mo d ni-ohg ch ahpim d ep em-ohg. Heg o d ni-Jioshga ch ahpim d ep em-Jioshga.”
43020018	D wa woho am uhpam hih g Mary Magdalene k am t-ahgi mo neith g t-kownalig Jesus. K heg am ahgith ihtha.
43020019	D gm hu si i juh thomig hudunk. Kuchd am t-nam hema kih am. D ga hu si yahwidag g kihkjeg nachd pi s-ha ehbith g haha'ichu. D wabshaba am haha wabsh jiwia g Jesus t-wui k hab kaij, “Am g wabsh wo s-ap e tahtk,”
43020020	ch ab hahawa t-chehgith g e-nohnhoi ch e-huda. Kuchd si s-hehgig ab i neithok.
43020021	D hab ep kaij ab t-wui, “Am g wabsh wo s-ap e tahtk. Am ant i em-chuhcha hab masma mat g ni-ohg am i ni-kei. Kumt hab wa'ap am wo ahgachugath g ha'ichu ahgaj.”
43020022	T hab chei ihtha k ab t-thahm ihbheiwua k hab kaij, “Ab g wo i beh'i g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
43020023	Kumt wo s-mahch k ah mas hedai g pi ap chu'ichigaj gm hu hab i juni g Jiosh ch hedai pi gm hu hab i juni.” Neh, bad kaij ch am hahawa i pi'ata.
43020024	D g Thomas pi am hu t-wehmaj mad wa am jiwia g Jesus.
43020025	Kuchd am hahawa chum ahgith matt nei g t-kownalig. D hab kaij g Thomas, “Bant wa'i masma wo s-wohoch mat uhpam i wuhsh mant wo nei g nohnhoij mat ab wo s-babaliwanik mamt ab sisish k ab wo taht abai k ab ep wo taht hudaj ab.”
43020026	Hemako thomig amjed, chd am ep i t-hemapai kih ch ed. D am hahawa t-wehmaj g Thomas. Chd ab ep si yahwidathch g kihkjeg. D wabshaba ab i wah g Jesus k am jiwia t-wui k hab kaij, “Am g wabsh wo si s-ap e tahtk.”
43020027	D hab hahawa kaij ab Thomas wui, “Ab g i ni-neith k ab tahtam g ni-nohnhoi ch ni-huda k ab wo s-ni-wohochuthath.”
43020028	D hab hahawa chei g Thomas, “Ni-kownalig ch ni-Jioshga!”
43020029	D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ab apt i s-ni-wohoch nap pi ni-neith. Ba'ich at wo i s-hehgigk hegam mat ab wo i s-ni-wohoch wa chum pi g e-wuhpuikaj ni-neithch.”
43020030	Mu'i s-hasig ha'ichu ad hab ep juh g Jesus am t-nena ed mant pi o'oha ith eda o'ohana.
43020031	Nt ith in hi wa ha o'oha mamt ab amjed wo s-wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d alithaj k hab masma ab wo bei g wechij thoakag.
43021001	Am wa'i hebai amjed, d am ep i e chehgi g Jesus t-wui amai al kahchki am am Galilee jewed ch ed.
43021002	Am achd wa oiopo g ni-nawoj James wehm. K g Simon Peter ch Thomas Kuathi ch Nathanael ch gohk ep g t-wehm e mashchamtham am t-wehmaj.
43021003	D hab kaij g Simon Peter ab t-wui, “Ih, nt hi wo sha ha u'im g waptopi.” Kuchd hab kaij, “Pegih, tt wo m-oi.” Chd am hahawa thadhaiwua wahlko ch ed k am i himch shuhthagi oithch k ge chuhug oitham am wuakch g t-chuagia shuhthagi ch ed ch pi ha'ichu sha'i bei.
43021004	D ab i chesh g tash. D ab hema kehk shuhthagi hugithgo. Kuchd pi sha'i mahch mo hedai wud.
43021005	D hab kaij, “Wihpiop, namt pi ha'ichu sha'i bei?” Chd hab kaij, “Pi ha'ichu.”
43021006	D hab hahawa kaij, “An g wo tha'ichuth g e-chuagia inhab s-apkojed g e-wahlko k wo ha'i ha ui.” Kuchd wa woho hab t-juh k pi t-nako machs ab uhpam wo i cheshaj nad pi sha'i si mu'i am e ba'iha g waptopi.
43021007	Nid hab hahawa kaij ab Peter wui, “Thoki t-kownalig Jesus!” D am i kah g Simon Peter moki d Jesus k ab wah g e-eniga mat wuahawua k am i thah shuhthagi ch ed k am i e wachwihim k ga hu jiwia wui.
43021008	Chd ahchim ha'i ab hahawa i himch g wahlko ab chewaimedch g chuagia waptopi shuhthch nachd pi am wa'i waik siant keishpa ab amjed mo an i hug g shuhthagi.
43021009	Kuchd an i huhud shuhthagi koa an k nei mo g chuhthagi am wehch. D am thahm kahch g watopi. D g pahn am ep wehch.
43021010	D hab kaij g Jesus ab t-wui, “Ab g wo ha'i u'uk g waptopi em-u'i.”
43021011	Ab ad wabsh i si shuhthags g chuagia g ge'eged waptopikaj. Kud g Simon Peter gn hu i chesh wahlko ch ed k ab i chewaim. Kud d siant hetaspo wehst-mahm gamai waik (153). D eda pi e wantsh g chuagia.
43021012	D hab t-ahg g Jesus, “Oi g wo i hihim k e gegosith.” Kuchd pi hedai ab kakke mo hedai wud nach pi wa chum s-mahch mo d Jesus.
43021013	D am hih g Jesus k am bei g pahn k an i t-hainithahim k g watopi am ep be k an i ha t-mahkhi.
43021014	Ith o d wa'i waikkokam mad am i e chehgi g Jesus t-wui amjed mad ab i wuhsh muhkig amjed.
43021015	Kuchd am i t-nahto t-gegosithk. D hab kaij g Jesus ab Simon Peter wui, “Simon map d Jonas alithag, nap ba'ich i si pihk e elith ni-hekaj mo hi ihtham?” D hab kaij g Peter, “Heu'u, ni-kownalig, s-mahch ap mani ab si m-tatchua.” D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Am g i ha nuhkuth g wechij ni-wohochuththam no pi hab wa'i masma mo g kahwal mahmad.”
43021016	D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Simon, nap woho si pihk e elith ni-hekaj?” D hab kaij g Peter, “Heu'u, ni-kownalig, s-mahch ap mani ab si m-tatchua.” D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am g i ha nuhkuth g ni-wohochuththam.”
43021017	D ith d i waikko mad hab kaij g Jesus, “Simon, nap ab si ni-tatchua?” D si pi ap e tahtk g Peter mat waikko ab wa'i kakke ch hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig, wehs ap ha'ichu s-mahch ch s-mahch mani ab si m-tatchua.” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Am g i ha nuhkuth g ni-wohochuththam.
43021018	Neh, s-mahch ap map hejel s-ap an has i e wua ch am hab e junihim map has i tatchua. Nt wabshaba wo si shel m-ahgi mapt am wo i si kelit k ab haha wo uhgk i uh'ul g e-nohnhoi. T wabsh hema ab wo m-enigadath k am wo i m-bei map hebai chum pi am hu himimk.”
43021019	Kudki heg hab ahg matki has masma wo e muhkith g Peter. T hab wo s-mai g hemajkam g Jiosh gewkthag. Kud g Jesus hab hahawa ahg g Peter mat gm hu hasko wo oi.
43021020	D am wehmaj i hih g Peter. Nid ab i ha oi. Kud g Peter ab uhpam i nea k ni-neith
43021021	k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Ni-kownalig, kut haschu am hab wo e juh am tahgio ihtha John.”
43021022	D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Neh, mantp wo tatchuithath g John mat pi wo ha muh k ab wo ai mant ep wo jiwia, k pi ab hu ha'ichu m-him heg amjed. Am apt wabsh wo ni-oithath.”
43021023	Kudki an i e ahgithahi am ha shahgith g Jesus wohochuththam mantsh pi wo ha muh. D eda pi hab kaij g Jesus manis pi wo ha muh ch hab kaij, “Mantp wo tatchuithath mat pi wo ha muh k ab wo ai mant ep wo jiwia, k pi ab hu ha'ichu m-him heg amjed.”
43021024	Ahni ani wud manid neith ch kah ch ia o'oha. Kuni si s-mahch mo d wohokam.
43021025	Neh, mu'i ad ha'ichu hab ep juh g Jesus. Tp hems am wo i e o'ohanahi wehs k wabsh wo shuhth g jewed.
44001001	Ni-nawoj map ab si tatchua g Jiosh: Am ant ep wo i em-o'ohani ahni Luke mant wa heki hu m-o'ohani hegai mash wa haschu hab junihim ihtha Jesus ch haschu ha mashcham eda mash am oimmelhim ha shahgith g Tutuligo hemajkam.
44001002	Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ash wa ab mahkch g Jesus g gewkthag. Kutsh heg am ha'i i ha chuhcha k am ha mashcha g e-chehanig.
44001003	Mtsh am hahawa sho'igchuth k mua. Tsh wabshaba uhpam ep e chegito k am e chehgith ha wui g e-chuhchai ch nahnko masma wohokamchuth mo d thoakam. Kush ihtham mu'ikko neith am oitham g gi'ikko wehst-mahm tash matsh eda koi im hu i e bei thahm kahchim wui. Sh g Jesus mu'i ha'ichu ha mashcham ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.
44001004	Sh wa am hu hebai am e hemapathch. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Mat ab i em-mah g John g pahl wakona. T wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag g si ge'e gewkthag ab wo i em-mah pi sha'i mu'i tash i'ajed. Ni am wa heki hu em-ahgith mo hab kaij g Jiosh matsh ith am hab wo em-juni. Kumt ia wabsh wo ha'ichugk Jerusalem kihhim t am k ab wo ai mat hab wo e juh.”
44001006	Sh am hema ep d tash. Tsh am ep i e hemapai g chuhchaij wehmaj g Jesus k ab kakke, “T-kownalig, napt ab hahawa ep wo t-mah ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam g ap'ethag matt hejel am wo i himch g t-kownaltalig?”
44001007	Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Heki at hu i ap'ech g Jiosh mat hekith am hab wo i e juh hegai mam haschu ab ni-kakke. K pi d em-wuikam mams wo s-ap s-mahchk ia'i ithani mas hekith wo i k.
44001008	Kumt wabshaba am wo i ahgahith mam haschu i s-ap s-mahch ab ni-amjed. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at ab wo i em-mah g si ge'e gewkthag mamt hab wo junihith. Kumt wehpeg am wo i ahgahi Jerusalem kihhim ch ed k amjed wehsko am Judea chekshani ch ed k amjed gm hu Samaria chekshani ch ed. T amjed gm hu wehsko wo i e ahgahi a'ai jewed thahm.”
44001009	Neh, bash kaij ch amjed im hu hahawa i e bei thahm kahchim wui k gm hu pi e mahsith chewagi ch ed.
44001010	Sh am wabsh kia gegok ch am uhgk si nenea ihtham. Tsh am haha wabsh gohk i e chehgi g anghil k si s-tohtam e enigadathch
44001011	ch hab kaij, “Pi g ia hu wabsh wo gegokk ch am uhgk neneath mat hebai hih g Jesus. Hema tash at wo wa uhpam jiwia hab masma mam hemuch am neith mat has i masma gm hu hih.”
44001012	Ith atsh hab e juh Olive U'us Kawulk t ab. Sh heg d al eda hugkam mihya ab amjed g Jerusalem. Tsh ab hahawa i huhud hegam Jesus chuhchai kawulk amjed k am hihim
44001013	k gn hu thatha mo an thadha k d ihtham Peter, John, James, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthew, ch hegai James mash g ohgaj hab chehgig Alphias, ch hegai Simon mash d hema hegam mash tatchua mat g Tutuligo hejel wo himchuthath g e-kownaltalig, ch hegai Judas mash g ohgaj hab chehgig James.
44001014	Sh g Jesus je'e ch wepnag ch ha'i ehp g u'uwi am ha wehm e hehemapath ch am e ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui.
44001015	Sh am he'ekia d i tash matsh am ep i e hemapath k d siant gokko wehst-mahm (120) hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus e tho'ibiakch. Kutsh am hahawa i kekiwua g Peter k ash hab kaij,
44001016	“Ni-wepnag, Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag atsh am i tashogi g t-kownaligbad David matsh has wo e juh hegai Judasbad mo chum t-wehmaj. Kut hemho wa hab e juh mash has i kaij. Judas at am i ha wanim hegam mat am bei g Jesus,
44001017	chum as d ep chum kehshaj mat am wo ahgahith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj.” Bash kaij g Peter.
44001018	Kumtsh wa chum namkith g Judasbad matsh gagda. Tsh wabshaba hema e nolawt g oithag heg hekaj namkithadaj. Kutsh g Judasbad am him k am e naggia heg eda k ab si wantsh g e-wohk. Tsh g hihij gm hu si e iawua.
44001019	Sh heg hekaj hab e a'aga Eh'ed Oithag.
44001020	Kush g Peter heg hekaj hab ep kaij, “An o hab chu'ig heg eda nen'ei o'ohana mo an hab chu'ig Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed: Pi at am hu wo ha'ichugk e-kih ed nat pi wo muh. K an ep o'ohanas: Am at kehkud ed hema ep wo i kekiwua.
44001021	“Kut ith hekaj hemho wa am hema wo i kekiwua t-wehm mat hab wa'ap wo wohokamch mat uhpam e chegito g t-kownalig Jesus. T hemho wa d wo hema t-ahchimk mach ga hujed i wehmajkahim g Jesus am i amjed mat g John pahl wako am hugkam mat im hu hih thahm kahchim ch ed.” Neh, bash kaij g Peter ch am i ha'asa neo.
44001023	Tsh am hahawa gohk i ha wuwhas. K hema hab chehgig ihtham Mattias. K hema d ep Joseph Justus ch hab ep e chechcheg Barsabas.
44001024	Tsh am hahawa e ho'ige'ithahun k hab kaij, “Ge t-kownalig, t am i thagito g Judas ihtha chikpan k atki am ai g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. Kuch ahchim pi sha'i mahch mo has e tatatk g hemajkam. Pt heg hekaj am wo si i t-tashogi mapt hedai am wo i ha kei ihtham gohk
44001025	mat d wo si m-kehshak ch am wo i ahgahi g ha'ichu m-ahga am kehkud ed g Judas.”
44001026	Tsh am hahawa i ha tashogi mat d wo Mattiask ch d wo si kehshajk.
44002001	Tsh am i e ai matsh g Tutuligo hemajkam wo e nam k am hab wo juh g hehgchulitha Jiosh wui heg hekaj ha'ichu e-bahijitha. Kutsh am wehs i e hemapai hema kih ch ed hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus.
44002002	Tsh haha wabsh ab thahm kahchim t amjed ha'ichu hab kaitha mo g s-gewk hewel wabsh shashawuk heg eda kih.
44002003	Sh hahawa ha'ichu ep neith mash hab mahs mo g mei. Tsh ith ab a'ai i e gantad k ab i thahiwuhi wehsijj ha ab.
44002004	Kutsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab i ha mah g si ge'e gewkthag. Tsh hekaj haha wabsh nahnko mahs ne'okikaj neneo matsh eda chum pi hebai mai.
44002005	Sh eda mu'ijj ab thadha Jerusalem t ab hegam mash d Tutuligo ch ab a'ai i hihi mu'ikpa jejewed amjed matsh ab wo ihm g Jiosh.
44002006	Tsh an wehsko i kaitha hegai mash hab kaithag mo g s-gewk hewel. Kutsh ihtham am i kah k am e chehm mash hebai i kaithag. Sh ihtham Jesus ihmtham haha wabsh am neneok g ha-ne'okikaj mash hedai haschu i ne'okikaj neok.
44002007	Kutsh si e totoths ihtham k hab kaij, “Hab kaitham neneok ch eda d wabsh Galilee t am o'othham.
44002008	Kus has masma hab chu'ig mach wehsijj s-ha amichuth g hehe'ejel t-ne'okikaj?
44002009	Kuch eda mu'ikpa jejewed amjed, ha'i ab Parthia t amjed ch ha'i ab Media t amjed ch ab amjed g Elam ch Mesopotamia ch Judea ch Cappadocia ch Pontus ch Asia
44002010	ch Phrygia ch Pamphylia ch Egypt ch Crete ch Arabia ch gm hu Cyrene kihhim wehgaj am Libya jewed ch ed ch ab Rome kihhim t amjed. K ia ha'i t-wehmaj g gawul mahs hemajkam mat ab i wahp t-himthag ed. Kuch wehsijj kah g hehe'ejel t-ne'okikaj heg amjed mat haschu si s-hasigam hab juh g Jiosh.
44002012	A t haschu ahgk hab ha'ichu e juh?” Bash kaij nash pi si has elith.
44002013	Sh wabshaba ha'ijj wabsh nahnko ha ahg ch hab kaij, “Tki wabsh nawkk ihtham.”
44002014	Tsh ab hahawa i gegokiwua g Jesus chuhchai. Sh g Peter am amog, “Ni-hajuni ch ahpim mam ia wabsh sha kih Jerusalem t am, ab g wo si i ni-kaiham k am wo i oithahi mant haschu wo i em-ahgi.
44002015	Pi ach d nawkkoi.
44002016	Ihtha mat haschu has i e juh o d hegai matsh g Joelbad an o'oha. Heg ash wa d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch an o'oha hab masma:
44002017	Bo kaij g Jiosh: T ab wo i e aihi g si oithchkam tash. Kunt wo cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat am wo ha wehmajk g hemajkam ch ab wo ha mahkath g si ge'e i wehmtadag. Kut g em-wihpiopga ch g em-chetchaga wo ah g ha'ichu ni-ahga. Nt wo i ha tashogi g kekel am ha-chehchki ed mat haschu has wo e juh imhab i thahm. T ith hab wa'ap am wo e chehgi ha-nena ed g wechij o'othham.
44002018	Ab ant wehs wo ha mah g ni-pionag g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag, chum hems g u'uwi ni-pionag, mat am wo i ahgahi g ha'ichu ni-ahga.
44002019	Nt wo ha chehgi g s-hasigam ha'ichu gn hu uhgk ha thahm ch an jewed thahm. Eh'ed at wo e iawua. T g mei ch kuhbs wo i wuhsh.
44002020	T g tash pi wo ton k g mashath wo ge wegiumih hab masma mo g eh'ed. K ith wehs hab d ahga mo e aihim hegai si ge'e tash mant heg eda wo ha lothai g hemajkam.
44002021	Kut hedai ab wo i gei ni-wui k wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g pi ap e-namkithadag. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.
44002022	“Kumt ab wo i ni-kaiha, ni-hajuni. Ihtha Jesus mo ab d kihkam Nazareth t ab at hab juh g s-hasigam ha'ichu mat pi hedai hejel wo sha'i e nako mat hab wo juh. T ith hekaj am i t-tashogi g Jiosh mo ith am d si Kehshaj. Kum ihtha am wa hejel s-mahch heg hekaj mat wehs am hab e juh em-shahgith.
44002023	Jiosh atsh heki hu i ap'ech matsh has masma wo e muhkith g alithaj k heg hekaj am i thagito em-wui. Kumt an be k ha mah hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh chehanig nam pi s-mu'amk. Kut ihtham mua ab kots t ab naggiak.
44002024	T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i wuhshath ab amjed g s-ko'ok muhkig nat pi am hab wa'ap i ap'ech mat ep wo e chegito. Kut hemho wa am hab wo e juh.
44002025	“T an wa o'oha g t-kownaligbad David mat hab wo chei g Jiosh si Kehsha: Chum ap hekith ni-wehmaj, ni-Jioshga! Ni heg hekaj pi sha'i ha'ichukaj ni-kudut
44002026	ch wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk ch s-hehgigam ha'ichu ahg. Ab o e aihim mant wo muh. Nt wabshaba wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk ch wo m-nenida.
44002027	Pi apt am hu wo sha'i ni-thagito amai mo hebai ha'ichug g ko'i k pi wo sha'i hiwigi mas wo padt g ni-chuhkug nani pi d hekia s-ap'ekam m-alithag.
44002028	Am apt i ni-chehgi mant has masma uhpam ep wo i wuhsh ab muhkig t amjed. Chum apt hekith wo ni-wehmajk. Nt heg hekaj wo si s-hehgigkath.
44002029	“Neh, ni-naipijju, batki masma an o'oha g Davidbad. K wabshaba si tasho mo pi hejel hab e ahg mat pi wo padt no pi g oh'oj am wabsh kia wehch hiha'inij ed ith i tashkaj.
44002030	Davidbad ash d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch heg hab ahg Jiosh si Kehsha matsh pi wo padt k wo uhpam i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed. Jiosh ash wa heki hu ahgith g Davidbad mat am wo hema i kei g amjedkam am kehkud ed mat d wo ge'e kownalk.
44002031	Davidbad oki s-mahch ihtha ch heg hab ahg ch hab kaij mat pi am hu wo sha'i thagito amai mo hebai ha'ichug g ko'i k pi wo sha'i hiwigi mat wo padt g chuhkugaj.
44002032	Pegih, k d hegai Jesus mat g Jiosh ab i wamigi muhkig amjed. Kuch ahchim g t-wuhpuikaj neith mach haschu ia em-ahgith.
44002033	Jiosh at am i wahkith k an kei si e-hugith an. Kut ab bei g ap'ethag k cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat ab t-wui wo hih. Heki ash hu hab kaij g Jiosh mat hab wo e juh. K d ihtha mam am neith ch kah hemuch mat hab t-juni.
44002034	Pi o hejel hab e ahg g Davidbad ch wabshaba heg hab ahg Jiosh si Kehsha mat pi wo padt k wo uhpam hih am thahm kahchim wui nat pi an ep o'oha: Jiosh o hab kaij ab ge ni-Kownalig wui: In g thahiwua si ni-hugith an
44002035	k ab wo ai mant wo ha gewito g m-obga.
44002036	“Pegih, ihtha Jesus mamt ab naggia kots t ab o d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d wo t-tho'ibiakam kownalk. Kutt ith wo chum si s-ap s-mahchk wehsijj ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam.” Neh, bash kaij g Peter.
44002037	Kush si s-ko'okam pi ap e tahtk g hemajkam am i kaiok ch hab kaij ab ha wui hegam Peter, “Ih, tt has wo t-juh, t-naipijju?”
44002038	Sh hab kaij g Peter ab ha wui, “Hehe'ejel g gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k wo e pahl-wapko ab chehchegch g Jesus Christ. Kut gm hu hab wo i juh g Jiosh g pi ap em-chu'ichig. T amjed wo si em-wehmajkath g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag
44002039	nash pi g Jiosh hab kaij mat ab wehsijj wo ha mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hegam mat ab wo i ha wai e wui.”
44002040	Sh tash am neok g Peter ch am chum ha ahgith ch hab kaij, “Am g wo e tho'ibia. Si s-ko'ok namkithadag o ab ha aihim hegam t-wehm hemajkam mat pi gm hu wo ohhoth g pi ap e-chu'ichig.”
44002041	Kutsh waik mihl ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj heg i tashkaj k e pahl-wapkon k ab i e hemakoj ha wehm.
44002042	Sh g Jesus chuhchai am hahawa ha mashcham. Kush am ha wehm e mihshmath ch e ho'ige'ithahun ch ha wehm huhuga g chemait.
44002043	Kush mu'i ha'ichu s-hasigam hab junihim ihtham Jesus chuhchai g Jiosh gewkthagkaj. Tsh heg hekaj mu'ijj ehp ab si has i el mat haschu hab juh g Jiosh.
44002044	Sh wehsijj g Jesus ihmtham ab si e hajunit ch wehs ha'ichu ab i a'ai e mahk mash hedai haschu i pi edgith,
44002045	chum as hems wo gagda g ha'ichu e-eniga mat heg hekaj lial am wo i ha wehmt hegam mo ha'ichu i pi edgith.
44002046	Sh wehs tashkaj am e nanmek ge'e cheopi ch ed ch am ep e wehm e gegosith a'ai e-kihki ed si s-ap e tatatk ch ab wabsh i e sho'igchuthch Jiosh wui
44002047	ch ab si hehgchulith g Jiosh. Kush wehsijj g hemajkam si s-ha ho'ige'elith. Sh g Jiosh ab i ha wahpkith ha shahgith wehs tash ab hegam mat hab wa'ap e tho'ibia.
44003001	Kush am wa'i hebai amjed, tsh am thatha g Peter g John wehm ge'e cheopi t am. Kush d i waik ohla gm hu i juhk mo eda e a'ahe mat wo e ho'ige'ithahu.
44003002	Sh ab hema thaha g sho'igkam hemajkam heg bahsho kolhai kihjeg mash hab e a'aga Si S-kehg Kihjeg. Kush ihtha o'othham ga hu e-alijk amjed pi himthag. Kumsh wehs tashkaj am wabsh i bebhe ch ab thathsha ab kolhai kihjego. Kush wabsh ha'ichu ha tahni hegam mo am thaiw.
44003003	Tsh eda am wo i wahp ihtham Peter ch John. Sh ab ha'ichu chum ha tahni.
44003004	Tsh ab si i nei ihtham Peter k hab kaij, “Ab g si i t-neith.”
44003005	Kutsh wa woho ab si i ha nei hab e ahgch mat wo ha'ichu mah.
44003006	Sh oi wa hab wabsh kaij g Peter, “Neh, ni-nawoj, pi ani ha lialiga ch wabshaba ha'ichu wo m-mah mat heg ba'ich wo i m-wehmt. K d ihtha mant hab wo m-ah mapt ab wo i hiw g Jesus Christ k wo kekiwua k wo hih.”
44003007	Bash kaij ch ab hahawa bei g nowij k ab i wuhshath. Kutsh am wa i hekaj ab gewpka g kakhioj.
44003008	Tsh am si uhgk tha'a k kekiwua k am wa i hekaj s-ap hih. Kutsh ihtham Peter im hu i wahp cheopi kolhai ch ed. Tsh heg ha wehm i wah k si chehk thath'ehim ch ab si hehgchulith g Jiosh.
44003009	Kutsh si has i el g hemajkam am i neithok mo d hegai pi himithkam mo ab thahiwup kolhai kihjego.
44003011	Batsh e juh ihtha anai mash hab e a'aga Solomonbad Watto. Kush ihtha pi himithkam gn hu wabsh i si e u'ukch ab ha ab g Peter ch John mat pi wo i e gawulkai ab ha amjed. Tsh ab hahawa a'aijed i wohp g hemajkam k gn hu ha biha si has i elithk mat e thoaj.
44003012	Tsh am wabsh ap'et g Peter mat am ha mihshmath k hab kaij: “Ni-wehm o'othham, pi g am wo si e totothsith. Pi att g hejel t-gewpkthagkaj thoaj ihtha o'othham,
44003013	Jiosh si Kehsha at hab t-juni nach pi ab hiwig. K d hegai Jesus mam ahpim s-mu'amk ch ab mah g kownal Pilate. K eda g Jiosh d pionag g Jesus ch d hekia s-ap'ekam ch pi ha chu'ichig. T ha chum wo thagito g Pilate. M wabshaba ahpim hab ahg mat wo mu'a k heg wo thagito mo d ha mu'akam. K heg hekaj d em-chu'ichig mat e muhkith. K eda d hegai mo ab t-makiog g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab si ha'ichuchuth k uhpam i wuhshath ab amjed g muhkig k am i bei thahm kahchim wui. Hegam t-shohshonbad mash d Abraham ch Isaac ch Jacob ash ab si has i elith g Jiosh. Kum eda ab wui gegok g Jiosh si Kehsha.
44003017	“Pegih, ni-wepnag, mtp hems heg hekaj s-mu'am g Jesus mam pi mahch mo heg am d si Kehshaj g Jiosh mat wo t-tho'ibia.
44003018	T eda heki hu wa'i amjed an o'oha g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mat g si Kehshaj wo e sho'igch. T ithani woho am hab e juh.
44003019	Pegih, oi g gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui. T heg wo s-em-ho'ige'ith k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig k ab wo si i wechijith g em-thothakag.
44003020	T ab em-wui wo i hih g si Kehshaj Jesus.
44003021	K hab mahs mat an wo ha'ichugk ihtha Jesus thahm kahchim ch ed am hugkam mat hab wo e juh hegai mo haschu i t-tashogith g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.
44003022	“Neh, bash wa kaij g Mosesbad am t-shohshon ha wui: Em-kownalig Jiosh at ab wo hema i kei g ha'ichu i tashogiththam hab masma mat ahni am i ni-kei. Kut ihtha d wo em-wepo o'othhamk. Wehs ha'ichu amt ab wo kaiha mat haschu ab wo i em-ahgi.
44003023	Kut wo e ko'ij matp hedai pi ab hu wo kaihamath. Neh, bash kaij g Mosesbad.
44003024	K wehsijj ahgachug g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam hegai mo haschu am hab i e junihim ithani. Samuelbad ash d hema hegam.
44003025	Jiosh ash wa am ha ahgith g t-shohshonbad matsh haschu hab wo t-juni. K heg d ep t-wuikam ahchim mach d ha amjedkam. “Bash kaij g Jiosh am wui g Abrahambad: Am ant wo hema i kei g m-amjedkam mant heg hekaj ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el g wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam ith thahm jewed.
44003026	“Neh, t wa woho hab e juh mat am i kei g e-alithag Jesus. T heg wehpeg ab i s-t-ho'ige'el ahchim Tutuligo k ab t-wui him k ab i t-mah g ap'ethag matt ab wo i t-nohnogi ab amjed g pi ap'ekam.”
44004001	Sh am wabsh kia ha mihshmath g Peter ch John. Kutsh am haha wabsh ha'i thatha g papal ch ha-ge'ejig g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam ch ha'i ehp mash am oith g Sajusi himthag.
44004002	Sh eda wa ihtham Peter ch John am ha mashcham g hemajkam mat ab i wuhsh g Jesus e-muhkig amjed. Sh ihtham Sajusi pi hohho'ith nash pi pi wohochuth mat ep wo e chegito g ko'i.
44004003	Sh eda e aihim mat wo s-chukk. T heg hekaj gd hu ha kuh mat wo ha lothai ba'ich tash.
44004004	Tsh wabshaba mu'ijj hegam matsh kah g Peter ch John ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Tsh am i mu'itha hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus. Kush hegam mash d chechoj d hahawa hetasp mihl.
44004005	Sh am ba'ich d i tash. Tsh am e hemapai g hemajkam ha wanimedtham ch ge'eged ch chehanig ha mashchamtham.
44004006	Kush am ha wehmaj hegai uhgchu pahl mash hab chehgig Annas. Sh g hajunij am hab wa'ap ha'ichug mash ha'i d Caiaphas ch John ch Alexander.
44004007	Tsh ab hahawa i ha wuwhas ihtham Peter kukpaikud amjed k ga hu i ha chuhcha k ab ha kakke, “Shahchu am e wepogith ch hab ha'ichu wua? Thohm hab elith mamt heg ab bei g e-gewkthag k thoaj ihtha pi himithkam?”
44004008	Tsh ab ba'ich i gewkai g Peter g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Sh hab kaij: “Bamki e elith ahpim t-wanimedtham ch ge'eged
44004009	matt hemho wo wa bei g ap'ethag matt hab wo juh g s-ap'ekam.
44004010	Pegih, nt wo em-ahgi mat g Jesus Christ ab i t-mah hegai gewkthag matt hekaj thoaj ihtha o'othham. Ahpim amt hab juh hegai Jesus Christ mat ab e naggia kots t ab. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab uhpam i wuhshath muhkig amjed.
44004011	Ith o hab ahg Jesus g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch an o'oha ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha mo hab chu'ig: Kihttham at wo hema chum s-ohhotham g hothai. T wabshaba ith d wo si s-has ha'ichu hothaik am ha-kihta wehhejed.
44004012	Hegai wa'i Jesus at wo ha tho'ibia g hemajkam. Tho Jiosh si Kehsha mat ab wo t-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Kut pi hedai ep hab wo sha'i juh g tho'ibiathag.”
44004013	Sh si s-e mahch ch neneok ihtham Peter. Tsh hekaj si has i ha el ihtham haha'ichu, wahm mat am i s-mai am i ha kahkch mo d wabsh si o'othham ch pi hasko sha'i uhgk e mashchamahim. Tsh am hahawa i amich moki an wehmajkahim g Jesus.
44004014	Kush am ha wehm kehk hegai mamt thoaj. Sh pi e nakog hegam haha'ichu mas has wo chei nash pi g e-wuhpuikaj neith mat woho e thoaj hegai.
44004015	Kumtsh gm hu hahawa i ha wuwhas hegam Peter matsh g haha'ichu am wo i a'aga.
44004016	Kush hab kaij, “Shahtt wo ha juh. Wehsijj o s-mahch g Jerusalem t am kihkam mat thoaj g pi himithkam. K ith d si s-hasig ha'ichu. Kutt pi wo sha'i t-nako machs hab wo chei mas pi woho hab juh.”
44004017	Sh hab hahawa ep kaij, “Matt wo keshwua ihtha ha-ahga mat pi hekith am hu ep wo sha'i a'agath ihtha Jesus am hema i wui.”
44004018	Kumtsh ab hahawa ep i ha wahpki. Sh hab ha ahg, “Chum as has wo chu'igk ha'ichu, mt pi am hu wo sha'i a'agath ihtha Jesus.”
44004019	Sh hab hahawa si kaij hegam Peter, “Am g wo i a'amichuth machs ahpim ab wo em-wohoch aha natt g Jiosh.
44004020	Tt ahchim hi hemho am wo wa ahgahith mat haschu i si s-kehg hab juh k haschu i si s-kehg hab kaij g Jesus mach si neith ch kah.”
44004021	Kush wa eda hegai pi himithkam i ba'iwchkim g gi'ikko wehst-mahm a'ahithag. Sh g hemajkam wehs ab si i hehgchulith g Jiosh mat thoaj. Kutsh heg hekaj pi sha'i e nako g ha wanimedtham mas has masma s-ko'okam wo ha namkith k am wabsh si ha ebkiod k chum ha keshwua k hahawa ha thagito.
44004023	Tsh am wa i hekaj gd hu uhpam thatha e-naipijju ha wui k am ha ahgith mo has i ha ahg g u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged.
44004024	Tsh am i kaiok am ha hekaj e ho'ige'ithahun k hab kaij, “T-kownalig Jiosh, wehs ap u'ukch g gewkthag ch nahtokch g thahm kahchim ch jewed kahchim ch ge kahchki ch wehs ha'ichu mo haschu am i ha eda.
44004025	Ab aptki cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wo amichuthach g m-pionagbad David. K hekaj hab kaij: Sho'o wa'i si s-babga g nahnko thakam hemajkam ch am chum e nakog mat am hab wo juh hegai mo g Jiosh pi ha hiwgith.
44004026	T am i e nako g kokownal k am i e wehmt mat ab wui wo gegokiwua g Jiosh si Kehsha.
44004027	“Neh, Jiosh t-ohg, t wa woho am e hemapai g t-wehm o'othham ha wehm g gawul mahs hemajkam ch hegam kokownal mo d Herod ch Pilate. Wehsijj at ab wui gegokiwua g hekia s-ap'ekam m-Kehsha, Jesus.
44004028	Heki apt hu am i ap'ech mapt wo ha hiwigi mat wo mua g si m-Kehsha. Kut ihtham mat ab chum m-wui gegokiwua hab wabsh juh mapt haschu heki hu i ap'ech.
44004029	Pegih, t-ohg Jiosh, am g i ha neith mo ab si t-ebkioth k ab wo i t-mah g gewkthag matt s-gewkam wo a'agath g ha'ichu m-ahga ch wo ha thothaj g kok'otham ch si s-hasigam ha'ichu hab wo juh g gewkthajkaj g hekia s-ap'ekam m-Kehsha, Jesus.”
44004031	Tsh am i ha'asa e ho'ige'ithahu. Tsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am si u'ugij hegai kih mo am e hemapathch k ab si i ha mah g gewkthag. Tsh am hahawa ba'ich i si s-gewkam ah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
44004032	Wehsijj ash ab a'ai si e tatchua g Jesus ihmtham ch ab si i hemakoch g e-chegitoi k pi hedai sha'i s-tha'a g ha'ichu e-eniga ab a'ai e wui.
44004033	Sh ihtham Jesus chuhchai si s-gewkam am ahgachug mat uhpam i wuhsh g Jesus muhkig t amjed k d wehs ha-kownalig. Kush g Jiosh am si i ha wehmt.
44004034	Sh ha'i am ha gagda g e-o'oithag ch e-kihki ch ab i u'u g lial
44004035	ch ab ha mamka g Jesus chuhchai mash hekith i e tatchua. Sh am hahawa a'ai ha mamka hegam mash pi ha'ichu edgith. Sh hekaj pi hedai ha'ichu pi edgith.
44004036	Sh hema d Joseph ch ab Cyprus jewed t ab d kihkam ch d chum papal ha wehm chikpantham nash pi ab d Levibad amjedkam. Sh ith hab ep chechcheg g Jesus chuhchai Barnabas mo hab d ahga I ha Gewkemhuntham.
44004037	Ith atsh gagda g e-oithag k ab i ui g namkigaj k wehs ha mah g Jesus chuhchai.
44005001	Sh am hema d Jesus ihmtham ch hab chehgig Ananias. Kush g wehmaj kihkam hab chehgig Sapphira ch hab wa'ap d Jesus ihmtham. Kutsh ihtha Ananias epai gagda g ha'ichu e-eniga
44005002	k hab masma hab chum e juh mat wehs ha mah g namkigaj g Jesus chuhchai k wabshaba gd hu ha'i si toa e-wohshag ed.
44005003	Sh hab kaij g Peter ab wui, “Shahchu apt ahgk hiwigi g Jiawul mat am pad ha'ichu hab juh m-ihbthag ed. Pt heg hekaj iattogi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mapt heg wepogi mo ith d wehs g ha'ichu m-eniga namkig.
44005004	Hegai ha'ichu m-eniga o d m-eniga mapt koi gagda. Pt am i gagda. K hegai namkigaj d m-lialiga. Pt eda hab juh ihtha si ge'e pi ap'ekam. Pi apt ahchim wa'i chum t-iattogi mach d wabsh o'othham. Jiosh apt ep chum iattogi.”
44005005	T am wabsh i chum kaiok ihtha g Ananias k muhk k i gei.
44005006	Tsh ab hahawa i wahp g wechij o'othham k am i ap'ech g chuhkugaj k gd hu cheh.
44005007	Sh am ep s-mahch g wehmaj kihkam g muhki matsh hab masma wo chum ha iattogi. Sh am d i waik ohla. Kutsh eda pi koi kah mat has e juh k hekaj am jiwia mo am thaha g Peter.
44005008	Kush heg ab wui hab kaij, “Namt ha'akia ui g lial mamt gagda g ha'ichu e-eniga?” Sh hab kaij, “Heu'u, ha'akia att ui.”
44005009	Sh hab kaij g Peter, “Ms haschu ahgk hig ahpi g e-wehm kihkam wehm hab chum i e taht mamt wabsh wo pi'ich g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag? Thatha at hegam mat gd hu cheh g m-wehm kihkam. Pegih, t hab wa'ap masma hab wo m-juh.”
44005010	Tsh am ha hekaj muhk k i gei wecho. Tsh ab i wahp g wechij o'othham k am nei matki muh k gm hu i be k gd hu cheh hugithaj an g wehmaj kihkam.
44005011	Tsh wehsijj ab si s-ehbeni g Jesus ihmtham ch hegam ehp mo hedai i kah ihtha.
44005012	Kush s-hasig ha'ichu s-ta neithamam hab junihim g Jesus chuhchai am ha shahgith g hemajkam. Sh wehsijj si s-ap e hehemapath hegam Jesus ihmtham heg wecho Solomonbad watto.
44005013	Sh g hemajkam ab si has ha elith ch wabshaba si s-e gihug mat ab wo i ha wehmt.
44005014	Tsh oi wa mu'i ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus k ab i ha wehmt. Ha'i d chechoj ch ha'i d u'uwi.
44005015	Kumtsh am i ha wuwhas g kok'otham am i neithok mo haschu has junihim g Jesus chuhchai k an kahya oithk ha wahpakusch hab elithch mat chum hems g Peter ehkathag ab hab wo e juh ha ab mat wo e thothaj.
44005016	Mu'ijj atsh ab a'aijed i hihi Jerusalem wui ab i ha u'uk g e-kok'othamga ch hegam mo g jijawul an ha u'ukch. Kutsh wehs ha thothaj.
44005017	Tsh g uhgchu pahl ch hegam mash hab wa'ap am oith g Sajusi himthag si s-ko'okam s-ha hehgam g Jesus chuhchai
44005018	k am i ha cheha g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam mat wo ha kuh. Tsh wa woho am ha kuh.
44005019	Tsh wabshaba heg i s-chuhugam ab g anghil am si kuhpi'o g kukpaikud k ab i ha wuwhas g Jesus chuhchai k hab ha ahg,
44005020	“Am g wo uhpam hihim k am wo i gegokiwua ge'e cheopi ch ed k wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat has masma wo bei ihtha pi ha huhugetham thoakag.”
44005021	Kutsh ab wohog elith k am hihim k am i wahp ge'e cheopi ch ed mat wabsh i chum mahsi k am ha hekaj i ha mashcha g hemajkam. Tsh eda heg wa'i si'alim g uhgchu pahl ch hegam Sajusi am i ha hemapai g e jehnigiththam. Sh ihtham pi mahch mat haschu has e juh ch atsh am ha cheha g nuhkuththam mat ab wo i ha ui g ha-lilsoga.
44005022	Kutsh am chum hihi g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam mat wo ha ui. Kush pi am hu ha'ichug. Tsh ab wabsh uhpam hihim k am ha ahgith ch hab kaij,
44005023	“M att thatha kukpaikud am k am chum nei. K ab wabsh kia yahwidag. K g lilso ha nuhkuththam ab ep gegok kihjeg t ab. Tt wabshaba am i chum kuhpi'o g kihjeg. K pi am hu hedai ha'ichug.”
44005024	Tsh am i ha kaiok am wabsh i pi amich mas hebai has e juh g ha-lilsoga.
44005025	Tsh am hahawa hema i wahk k hab kaij, “Neh'e! Ithani o gd hu ha mashcham g hemajkam ge'e cheopi ch ed hegam mamt wa ha kuh.”
44005026	Tsh am hahawa hihi g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam k ab uhpam wabsh s-ap i ha ui nat pi am hu wo ha ma'ichshul g hemajkam
44005027	k am ha u'apa ha wui g e jehnigiththam. Sh hab ha ahg g uhgchu pahl,
44005028	“Chum ach s-gewkam pi em-hiwgith mams an hu wo a'agath hegai Jesusbad. T eda g em-mashchamadag ab amjed heki hu wehsko chehmo g Jerusalem. Kum ahpim ab chum t-abchuth g muhkigaj.”
44005029	Sh hab kaij hegam Peter, “K wabshaba g Jiosh am t-ahgith matt am wo wa ahgahith ihtha mach haschu i si t-wuhpuikaj neith. Kutt hemho wo wa i hehgch g Jiosh, pi wabsh g o'othham. Ahpim amt bei g Jesus k hab juh mat ab e naggia kots t ab k e muhkith. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab uhpam i wuhshath muhkig amjed k am i wahki thahm kahchim ch ed k an i kei si e-hugith an k ab i mah g gewkthag mat wo t-tho'ibia k wo t-wanimedath. Kut heg ab i t-mah g ap'ethag ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam matt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap t-chegitoi. T hekaj g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Jiosh at ab cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wehs wo t-wehmajk ahchim mach ab s-wohog elith ch am t-gahi wuhshanim wo wohokamch g Jesus.” Neh, bash kaij g Peter.
44005033	Tsh wabsh woho'i babgat hegam e jehnigiththam k wabsh chum s-ha kokthaimk.
44005034	Sh wabshaba am tha hegai mash d Gamaliel ch d chehanig ha mashchamtham ch am oith g Palasi himthag. Sh wehsijj ab si has elith g hemajkam. Kutsh am i kekiwua k am ha ahgi mat gm hu wo sha'i i ha wuwhas g e-lilsoga. Tsh wa woho hab ha juh.
44005035	Sh hab hahawa kaij ihtha ab ha wui g e jehnigiththam, “Ni-hajuni, am g wo s-e nen'oithk mamt has wo ha juh ihtham o'othham.
44005036	Hekith o hu i mat am hema i e maskogith k hab chehgig Theudas ch hab kaij mo d ge ha'ichu s-mahchim. Kut am hu i gi'ik siant chechoj ab i wehmt. T wabshaba e muhkith ihtha. T wehsijj e gantad hegam mat wa ab wehmt. T am wa'i huhug g ahgaj.
44005037	T amjed am hema ep i e maskogi eda mat g hemajkam e kuint k hab chehgig Judas ch am Galilee t am d o'othham. T ihtha hab wa'ap mu'i o'othham am i oi. T wabshaba hab wa'ap e muhkith hegai Judas. T hab wa'ap a'ai e gantad hegam mat wa ab wehmt.
44005038	“Pegih, k hemuch hab wa mahs ha'ichu. Pi g am hu has wo sha'i ha juhni ihtham o'othham. Ha g wo thagito. Hemu at wo huhug ihtha ha'ichu hab ha-juni matp d wabsh wo o'othham hab ha-elithak. Tp d wo sha Jiosh ha'ichu hab junik, mt pi wo sha'i e nako mams wo keshwua.
44005039	Mtp hems heg wabsh wo e wepogi mam g Jiosh wabsh cheggia.” Tsh oi wa ab i s-wohog el g Gamaliel ihtham e jehnigiththam
44005040	k hab ha ahg g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam mat am wo i ha wahpki g lilso k wo ha gewitta. Tsh wa woho hab e juh. Kutsh ab ep si ha ahgi mat pi am hu wo sha'i a'agath g Jesus k hahawa ha thagito.
44005041	Kush wabsh si s-hehgig ihtham Jesus chuhchai am i wuwhak natsh pi ab si has i ha el g Jiosh k ab i ha mah g ap'ethag matsh si e sho'igch wehhejed g Jesus.
44005042	Pi atsh sha'i ha'asa a'aga g Jesus k wabshaba wehs tashkaj am wabsh i ha mashcham g hemajkam ge'e cheopi ch ed ch am ha-kihki ed mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha.
44006001	Kush am i mu'ithahim hegam mash am oith g Jesus himthag. Sh am ha'i neneok g Greek hemajkam ha-ne'okikaj nash pi tash gm hu kihkahim ha-jewedga ed. Kush ihtham hab kaij mash pi ap ha thagio'ith hegam hehe'ejel wi'ikam u'uwi mash d ha-hajuni. Kush heg hekaj am a'ai pi e ap'et ihtham Greek neneoktham ha wehm hegam mo g hejel e-ne'okikaj neneok.
44006002	Tsh am i kah g Jesus chuhchai k am wehs i ha hemapath k hab kaij, “T-wepnag, pi o ap'e machs wabsh wo thagito g mihshmetha ab amjed g Jiosh k im hu g lial wo hudawogath.
44006003	Ab oki ha'i ep em-mahkch g Jiosh g gewkthag ch amichuthadag mamt am hab wo junihith ihtha chikpan. Pegih, mt am wewa'ak wo i ha gawulkai hegam mam s-ha mahch mo woho hab masma. Kutt ihtham am wo i ha chuhcha mat wo nuhkuth ihtha hab mahs ha'ichu.
44006004	Tt ahchim Jesus chuhchai am hab wo si i juh matt wo t-ho'ige'ithahunath ch wo si ha mihshmethath g hemajkam.” Neh, bash kaij.
44006005	Kumtsh ab si i s-hohho'i mo has kaij k am wewa'ak i ha chuhcha. Hema ihtham ash hab chehgig Steven ch ab si s-gewkam hiwig g Jesus. Sh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab si mahkch g gewkthag. Kush hegam ha'i ehp hab chechgig Philip ch Prochorus ch Nicanor ch Timon ch Parmenas ch Nicolaus. Ihtha Nicolaus ash ab d amjedkam g Antiok kihhim ch d gawul mahs o'othham ch ab i s-wohoch g Tutuligo ha-himthag eda mat koi s-mai ab amjed g Jesus.
44006006	Tsh ihtham ab hahawa i ha ui g hemajkam ha wui g Jesus chuhchai. Kutsh ihtham am e ho'ige'ithahun k ab ha taht mat heg hekaj wo s-e mahchk mo d si ha-chuhchai.
44006007	Tsh am si i ge'etha g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga Jerusalem t am. Kutsh ba'ich i mu'itha hegam mash am oith g Jesus himthag. Tsh mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch hegam mo d papal Tutuligo ha-himthag ed.
44006008	Ab ash si s-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh g Steven ch ab si i mahkch g e-gewkthag. Kush s-hasigam ha'ichu hab wua.
44006009	Tsh wabshaba ha'i ab wui gegokiwua mash am hebai e wehm e mihshmath g Tuhligo e-himthag. Ha'i ihtham ash d neneholkahim Cyrene ch Alexandria kihhim t am. Tsh am ha'i i ha wehmt ab Cilicia jewed t amjed ch ha'i ab Asia jewed t amjed. Sh ihtham ab kam'on g Steven
44006010	Sh wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab si mahkch g Steven g amichuthadag. Kutsh pi sha'i e nako hegam mas ab uhpam wo i nodagi g ne'okij.
44006011	k heg hekaj am hahawa ha'i ha namkith k am ha ahgith mat hab wo chei, “Kah ach ihtha mo si has ahg hegai mo ab t-chehani g Jiosh Mosesbad o'ohana ed.”
44006012	Kush wa woho hab kaij ihtham ch hekaj i ha kudu g hemajkam ch ge'eged ch chehanig ha mashchamtham. Tsh ihtham wabsh woho i babgat k am hihim k an bei g Steven k gd hu u'apa ha wui g e jehnigiththam.
44006013	Mtsh am hahawa ha'i i ha wahpki g o'othham matsh am ha'ichu wo ha iattogi ab amjed. Sh hab kaij ihtham, “Ihtha o'othham o chum hekith has ahg g hekia s-ap'ekam ge'e cheopi ch hegai mo ab t-chehani g Jiosh Mosesbad o'ohana ed.
44006014	Kah ach mo hab kaij mat hegai Jesusbad wo i wua g ge'e cheopi k wo gawul juh g t-himthag mach ga hu hebai amjed hab i junihim mat g Mosesbad an o'oha.”
44006015	Kush wehsijj ab si neith g Steven. Sh g wuhioshaj hab haha wabsh mahs matp hems g anghil wuhiosha nash pi si tonod.
44007001	Kush hab kaij g uhgchu pahl ab wui g Steven. “No am wa woho map hab junihim hegai mo haschu ab m-abchuth?”
44007002	Kush hab kaij g Steven: “Ni-ge'egedga ch ni-hajuni, ab g wo si i ni-kaiham. An o o'ohadag matsh g Jiosh ab wui e chehgi g t-shohshonbad Abraham. Kush eda am wabsh kia kih Mesopotamia jewed ch ed.
44007003	“Sh hab kaij g Jiosh ab wui: Ia g wo ha thagito g e-hajuni ch e-jewedga k ab wo hihi heg wui jewed mant am wo m-chehgi.
44007004	“Tsh wa woho am thagito g Mesopotamia jewed mash am kih g Caldea hemajkam k am chihpia Haran kihhim wui. Kutsh am i muh g Abrahambad ohgbad. Tsh ab hahawa ep cheha g Jiosh mat ia wo chihpia Canaan jewed wui. Kutsh ia i chiwia mach hemuch ia kih.
44007005	Tsh eda koi ab hu he'es sha'i mah ihtha jewed k wabshaba am hi wa ahgith mat wo mah. T d wo ha-enigak g amjedkamaj mat he'ekiajj ab wo i oi. Kush eda pi koi ha a'aliga g Abrahambad mash eda hab ahg g Jiosh.
44007006	“Kush hab kaij g Jiosh ab wui: M at hu wabsh heb hu jewed ch ed wo kihk g m-amjedkam ch d wabsh wo ha-pionagk. Kumt wo ha sho'igch gi'ik siant a'ahith ab.
44007007	Nt wabshaba wo ha kastigal hegam hemajkam mat an wo ha u'ukchith. T ab haha wo i wuwha heg amjed jewed k ab wo si has i ni-elith k wo ni-ihm iia. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh
44007008	ch ab mah g Abrahambad hegai himthag mat am wa has masma wo ha o'oha an ha hikuchk g chechoj e-a'aliga. Tsh hab masma wo s-mahchk mash hab wa'ap d ha-wuikam hegai matsh g Jiosh am ahgi g Abrahambad. Tsh wa woho hab e juh g Abrahambad k an pahl hikuch g e-alithag Isaacbad mo d i gigi'ik tash amjed mat mahsi. Tsh g Isaacbad hab wa'ap juh g e-alithag Jacobbad. Tsh g Jacobbad hab wa'ap ha juh hegam gamai gohk e-a'alithag mach ab d ha amjedkam.
44007009	“Tsh ihtham wa s-hehgam g e-wehnag Josephbad k ab ha'i ha wui gagda mat d wo ha neholigak am Egypt jewed ch ed. Sh wabshaba g Jiosh am nuhkuth
44007010	ch ab s-ap i wuhshath wehs ha'ichu sho'igthaj amjed k ab i mah g si o'othhamthag ch amichuthadag. Tsh am i nei g ha-kownalig g Egypt t am hemajkam k am i uhgkajith k am kownalch am thahm g e-kownaltalig ch ha'ichu e-eniga.
44007011	“Tsh wa haha wabsh gei g bihugig k ha sho'igch g hemajkam wehsko Egypt jewed thahm ch iia Canaan jewed thahm. Tsh pi sha'i e amich hegam Abrahambad mat hebai wo bei g ha'ichu hugi.
44007012	Kush eda am s-ha'ichu hugig Egypt jewed ch ed. Kutsh am i kah g Jacobbad k am ha cheha g e-a'alithag matsh am wo hunio. Kutsh hab e juh.
44007013	“Tsh am ep i huhug g ha'ichu ha-hugi. Kutsh am ep hunio. Tsh g Josephbad am hahawa ha ahgi mo d ha-wehnag nash pi pi amichuth. Tsh g ha-kownalig g Egypt t am hemajkam ab s-ha mai g Josephbad hajuni.
44007014	Tsh g Josephbad am hahawa wai g e-ohgbad mat wehsijj ab wo i chihpia Egypt wui. Kush eda d wewa'akko gamai hetasp (75) hemajkam.
44007015	Tsh wa woho am i chihpia hegam Jacobbad Egypt wui k am kihkahim ch am koi.
44007016	Tsh am uhpam i e ui g ha-oh'o g Abrahambad ch Josephbad Shekem kihhim wui. Abrahambad atsh wa am he'es ha nolawt g jewed hegam mash d Hamor amjedkam matsh am wo e toa g ha-ko'ithag.
44007017	“Sh amjed mu'i a'ahithag wehgaj. Sh e aihim matsh am hab wo juh g Jiosh mash haschu i heki hu ahgith g Abrahambad. Tsh eda am i si mu'itha g t-shohshonbad amai Egypt ch ed.
44007018	Kutsh am hema i wuhsh g kownal mash pi sha'i mahch matsh wa has masma am si i ha wehmt g Josephbad amai Egypt ch ed.
44007019	Kush ihtha nahnko ha wua hegam t-shohshon ch ha sho'igchuth ch hab ha ahg mat gm hu wo ha shul g chu'uchum e-a'aliga hab ahgch mat wo koi.
44007020	Kutsh eda mahsi g Mosesbad k si s-kehg d ali. Kutsh am i nuhkuth g jehjij waik mashath ab
44007021	k gm hu hahawa i wuhshath. T g kownal uwi alithag am chehg k ab i bei hab masma mo d madaj.
44007022	Kumtsh wehs ha'ichu mashcha mo haschu d i si s-hasig ha'ichu am Egypt ch ed. Tsh ab si i mai ihtha wehs k d si s-has ha'ichu am heg eda mo haschu hab i kaij ch haschu hab i junihim.
44007023	“Batsh wa masma am i ge'etha g Mosesbad k am i ai g gi'ikko wehst-mahm (40) a'ahithag. Tsh am hu hebai hab i e ah mat am wo i ha chehgim g e-hahajuni.
44007024	Kush hema g Egypt t am o'othham am hema sho'igchuth g Tuhligo. Tsh g Mosesbad am i wehmt g e-hajuni k mua ihtha Egypt t am o'othham mat wo agwua
44007025	k hab e ahg mat g hajunij wo chum s-mahchk mat g Jiosh wo hekaj k wo ha tho'ibia. Sh wabshaba g hajunij pi hab masma hab elith ha'ichu.
44007026	Sh am ba'ich d i tash, sh am ha'i e cheggia g Tutuligo. Tsh am ha neith k chum s-ha tha'ith k hab kaij, ‘Kia, ahpim! Tham e-wepngam ch eda haschu ahgch e cheggia?’
44007027	“Kut hegai mo ha cheggia ab si nu'ichkwua g Mosesbad k hab kaij: Shahchu ap ahgch hab chum e wua maps am t-thahm. Pi o ab hu sha'i m-ab maps ahpi am ha'ichu wo i ap'echuthath am t-shahgith.
44007028	Napt hab wa'ap wo chum ni-mua mapt wa hab juh g Egypt t am o'othham tako?
44007029	“Tsh am i kah g Mosesbad ihtha k ha hekaj gm hu i e mehkoth ab Egypt amjed k gm hu i jiwia mash am d Midian jewed. Sh am ha'i o'othhamag. Kutsh am ha hohnt k gohk chechoj a'alitht
44007030	“Sh am him k am d i gi'ikko wehst-mahm a'ahithag. Sh am hu hebai ha nuhkuth g kahwal g Mosesbad am miabithch hegai tho'ag mo hab e a'aga Sinai. Tsh ab wui haha wabsh hema i e chehgi g anghil hab masma mo am meihim g sha'i ch eda pi meitto.
44007031	Tsh ab i miabi g Mosesbad mat ab si s-ap wo i nei nash pi pi amichuth matsh wa pi sha'i meitto g sha'i. Sh g Jiosh ab wui hab kaij am gahi wuhshanim g anghil:
44007032	Ahni ani d Jiosh. K wa ab has ni-elith hegam m-shohshon mo d Abraham ch Isaac ch Jacob. Tsh hahawa si gigiwuk g Mosesbad k si s-ehbeni mat am wo i nei.
44007033	“Sh hab ep kaij g Jiosh ab wui: Ab g has i ni-elith k wuashulig g e-kaikia shuhshk nap pi ia kehk ni-wui.
44007034	S-mahch ani mam has i masma ha sho'igchuth g m-hajuni amai Egypt t am. Tho ni-hemajkamga. Kuni kah g ha-shoshaki ch heg hekaj am i ni-maskogi ab m-wui mapt ahpi wo ha tho'ibia. Pt oi am wo i e nako mapt am wo hih Egypt wui. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.
44007035	Kuni hab ep s-che'imk mo ihtha Mosesbad d hegai matsh wa g hajunij pi ab hu tatchua ch hab kaij: Shahchu ap ahgch hab chum e wua maps am t-thahm? Pi o ab hu sha'i m-ab maps ahpi am ha'ichu wo i ap'echuthath am t-shahgith. Tho wa ihtha Mosesbad matsh g Jiosh am i kei ha thahm g hajunij matsh wo ha wanimed k wo ha tho'ibia. Kutsh hegai anghil mash ab neok mei ch ed am u'apa g Jiosh ne'oki Mosesbad wui.
44007036	Kutsh g Mosesbad am uhpam hih Egypt wui k am hab juh g s-hasig ha'ichu chehgitha k am i ha wanim g e-hajuni mat ab i wuwha Egypt amjed. Kutsh wa am i e tahp hegai mash hab e a'aga Al S-wegi Kahchki. Tsh am gahi i shul ihtham Mosesbad k am chipiahim gi'ikko wehst-mahm ahithag oitham tohono jewed ch ed. “Sh g Mosesbad heg oitham s-hasigam ha'ichu am hab junihim
44007037	ch am ha ahgith ch hab kaij: Jiosh atsh am hema ep wo i kei g t-hajuni hab masma mat ahni am i ni-kei. Kut heg d ep wo Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththamk. Neh, bash kaij g Mosesbad.
44007038	Tsh g Jiosh ab mah g e-ne'oki tho'ag t ab am gahi wuhshanim g anghil. K d t-himthag ihtha ne'oki matsh ab bei.
44007039	Tsh pi oi jiwia g Mosesbad ab tho'ag t amjed. Tsh g t-shohshonbad pi ab hu wohog elith k im hu hab wabsh i s-junimk g Mosesbad ch uhpam s-hihimimk am Egypt wui
44007040	Sh g ha-uhgchu pahlig d Aaronbad. Sh ihtham ab wui hab kaij: Pi ach mahch mas has e juh ihtha Moses mat ab i t-wuwhas Egypt amjed. Am g wabsh ha'i ha nahto g jijosh mat hegam am wo t-wanimedath.
44007041	“Kush wa am hema wisilot g ohlakaj k ab wui iagchul heg wepogithch mo d ha-jioshga k am ep piast mat heg hekaj ab wo si i ha'ichuch hegai e-jioshta.
44007042	Kutsh heg hekaj im hu hab i e juh g Jiosh ab ha amjed k am wabsh ha hiwigi mat wabsh g hejel hab e-elitha am hab wo junihith. Kush wabsh g huhu'u ab ha ihm mat hab masma an o'oha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab kaij g Jiosh: Ab ani ha chehani g Tutuligo hemajkam mat wo mum'a g e-shoshoiga k ab ni-wui wo iagchul am wehhejed g pi ap e-chu'ichig. K wabshaba pi woho ab hu ni-ihm mo eda am ha'ichug tohono jewed ch ed gi'ikko wehst-mahm ahithag oitham.
44007043	Tho hejel ha-nahtoi jijosh mo ab ha ihm. Bo ha a'aga Molok ch Rephan ch hab ha elith mo an kih huhu'u t an. Nt heg hekaj gm hu mehk wo em-shul Babylon jewed t am. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.
44007044	“Kuni hab ep s-che'imk mash hegam an u'ahim hegai cheopi mash heg hekaj am ha tashogith g Jiosh mash am ha wehmaj. Sh heg d wabsh hogi ch hab masma e nahto matsh wa g Jiosh am chehgi g Mosesbad.
44007045	Sh g ha-amjedkam an ep u'ahim hegai cheopi matsh hekith g Joshuabad am i e kei matsh wo i ha wanim. Kutsh g Jiosh ia i ha wahpki ith eda jewed k am ha wehhejed gm hu i ha wuwhas hegam nahnko mahs hemajkam mo ia d chum kihkam. Kush am ha'ichugkahim ihtha cheopi ch ab ai mash eda g Davidbad d ha-kownalig.
44007046	Sh ihtha Davidbad d si Jiosh tatchui ch ab ahgith mat wo hiwigi mat hema wo kihch. Tsh heg eda am hab wo e junihith g ho'ige'ithahuna Jiosh wui.
44007047	Kutsh g Jiosh hiwigi g alithaj Solomonbad. Tsh heg am i kei g kih am wehhejed g Jiosh.
44007048	“K eda g Jiosh ba'ich i ge'ej mo haschu i mo an hab chu'ig t-wehgaj. T pi wo sha'i e nako g o'othham mas wo kihch. Batsh wa masma an o'oha g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab kaij g Jiosh:
44007049	Ahni ani d Jiosh ch ab thahm kahchim t amjed ia nuhkuth g jewed kahchim. Pi amt wo sha'i e nako mamt wo ni-kihch mamt heg eda am wo ni-thai
44007050	nant pi ahni wehs ha'ichu nahto. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.
44007051	“Kush wabshaba g t-shohshonbad si e sheshemachuth ch pi chechkaithag ch pi ab hu kaiham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Jiosh ash am i ha wuwhasith g ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Kush wa g t-shohshonbad ha sho'igchuth ch ha'i ha koktha. Kum ahpim hab wa'ap chu'ig ch ab wabsh wui gegok g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ash am ahgachug mat wo jiwia g Jiosh si pionag k d wo si wehs s-ap'ekamk. Kut wa woho jiwia. Kumt wa gagda mat wo e muhkith.
44007053	Ahpim amt ab em-mah g Jiosh chehanig mat wa g anghil ia u'apa. Mt eda am wa pi wohoch.” Neh, bash kaij g Steven.
44007054	Tsh am i kah g e jehnigiththam mash has ha ahg g Steven k wabsh woho'i babgat k si kuhm g e-tahtami.
44007055	Sh wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab ba'ich i si mahkch g Steven g gewkthag. Tsh am i nea thahm kahchim wui k nei mo si s-masma tonod g Jiosh gewkthag. Kush g Jesus an si hugithaj an kehk g Jiosh.
44007056	Kush hab kaij g Steven, “Neitho! B at e kuhpi'o g thahm kahchim. K ab kehk g Jiosh si Kehsha an si s-apko hugithaj an g Jiosh.”
44007057	Tsh si hihinkiath k am si kuhkp g e-nahnk k ab hahawa si wui i wohp
44007058	k an be k gm hu i wuhshath kihhim t amjed mat wo ma'ichkwua. Sh am hema ha wehmaj g wechij o'othham ch hab chehgig Saul. Kutsh heg nuhkuthach g e-liliwa hegam matsh wo ma'ichkwua g Steven.
44007059	Kush g Steven ab si ihm g e-tho'ibiakam ch hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig Jesus, ia g beh'i ni-thoakag.” Sh eda heg oithch ab ma'ikkash g s-keh'iththam.
44007060	Tsh am hahawa tohtonwua g Steven k si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig, pi g ab hu ha abchuth ihtha chu'ichig mat ihab e juh.” Bash kaij ch am i muh.
44008001	Sh g Saul am wabsh ap'echuth mamt mua. Sh amai i amjed mamtsh ab si s-gewkam i ha sho'igch g Jesus ihmtham amai Jerusalem t am. Kutsh a'ai ahhio g e sho'igchuththam amai Judea ch Samaria chechkshani ch ed. Tsh wabshaba hegam Jesus chuhchai pi hasko ahhio.
44008002	Tsh ha'i hegam mo ab d si ihmtham g Jiosh gd hu cheh g Steven k si s-kaitham shoani wehhejed.
44008003	Kush g Saul chum s-padchuthamk g ha-mihshmetha g Jesus ihmtham ch hekaj an wahkhim ha-kihki oithch ch ab i ha chewaimed ch gd hu si ha kuhpahim, chum wa g u'uwi.
44008004	Kush wa an wehsko ahgahim g Jesus hegam matsh wa e gantad.
44008005	Hegai Philip mash wa am d ha-kehsha atsh am hih Samaria kihhim wui k am ha mihshmath ch am ha ahgith mat heki hu an i wuhsh g Jiosh si Kehsha.
44008006	Kush ab si kaiham hegam hemajkam mo haschu i ha ahgith ch am neith mo s-hasigam ha'ichu hab junihim g Jiosh gewkthagkaj.
44008007	Mu'ijj ash e thothajith hegam mash g jijawul an ha u'ukch. Kush si hihnk g jijawul gm hu hihimathch. Kush mu'ijj ha thothajith hegam mo pi hihimthag ch hegam mo pi ab hu gewpk.
44008008	Sh si s-hehgig g hemajkam amai.
44008009	Sh am hema kih g o'othham mash hab chehgig Simon ch heki hu wa'i amjed am hab junihim g s-hasigam ha'ichu ch hab chum e wua mo d ge mahkai.
44008010	Kush wehs g hemajkam am si neithachug ch ab si has elith, chum wa hegam mo d s-chu a'amichuththam. Kush wehsijj hab kaij, “Heg oki d ge mahkai ch ab u'ukch g e-gewkthag Jiosh t amjed.”
44008011	Bash kaij ch ab si kaiham nash pi heki hu wa'i amjed hab junihim g s-hasigam ha'ichu.
44008012	Tsh wabshaba am hahawa ha mihshmath g Philip ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig ch ab amjed g Jesus Christ. Kutsh ab i s-wohochuth k e pahl wapko.
44008013	Tsh hab wa'ap ab i s-wohoch g Simon k e pahl wakon k amjed pi hebai thagito g Philip k ab si has elith am i neithok mo hab junihim g s-hasigam ha'ichu.
44008014	Tsh am i ha ai hegam Jesus chuhchai ab Jerusalem t ab matsh ihtham Samaria t am o'othham ab bei g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kush am ha chehani g Peter ch John matsh am wo ha mihshmetho.
44008015	Tsh am hihi ihtham k gd hu thatha k am ha wehm e hemapai. Kutsh eda pi koi bei g gewkthag ab amjed g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hegam matsh e pahl wapko. Kutsh am e ho'ige'ithahun k ab tai g Jiosh mat hab wo wa e juh am ha tahgio
44008017	k amjed an i ha tahtamahi ab ihmch g Jiosh. Tsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab hahawa ha mah g gewkthag.
44008018	Tsh g Simon am i nei ihtha k chum s-ha namkitham
44008019	k hab kaij, “Ab g i ni-mahki ihtha gewkthag mant hedai ab wo i taht, t wo bei g gewkthag ab amjed g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.”
44008020	Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Peter ab wui. “T wabsh wo huhug g s-m-kaischutha hab wa masma mapt ahpi wo huhug. Pi o hab chum chu'ig mapt hekaj wo nolawt g Jiosh mahkigdag.
44008021	Pi o sha'i ap'e g m-chegitoi am Jiosh tahgio. K heg hekaj pi ab hu d sha'i m-wuikam ihtha chikpan.
44008022	Gan o hu wabsh i si m-u'ukch g pi ap'ekam napki pi s-chu hehgamk. Pt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo i e ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui. Tp hems gm hu hab wo i juh g m-chu'ichig.”
44008024	Sh hab kaij g Simon ab ha wui. “Ab g wo si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k am wo e ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui ni-wehhejed mat pi gm hu hab wo ni-juh.”
44008025	Tsh am hahawa ha mihshmath g Peter ch John ab amjed g Jesus k am ha ahgi mo haschu g e-wuhpuikaj neith. Tsh am hebai i cheka. Kutsh gm hu uhpam hihi Jerusalem wui am ahgachugch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh am a'ai kihhim ch ed heg eda Samaria chekshani.
44008026	Kush g anghil am hema neok ch hab kaij ab Philip wui, “Am g i e nakog k gm hu hihm k am wo i ai hegai wohg m an hims tohono jewed ch ed am ha shahgith g Jerusalem ch Gaza.”
44008027	Tsh wa woho am i e nako g Philip k gm hu hih. Sh eda am hema med g e-kalitkaj ch d Ethiopia jewed t am o'othham. Ith ash g kownaligaj am kehshch mash d lial nuhkuththam. Kush am e mihshmethahim Jerusalem t am ch hemu am uhpam ep wo chihpia Ethiopia wui.
44008029	Kush hab kaij g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wui g Philip, “An g i miabith hegai kalit k gn hu hugithaj an wo i hih.”
44008030	Tsh am hahawa si meh g Philip k an i miabi g kalit. Kush ihtha am ne'okchulith hegai matsh g Isaiabad an o'oha. Kush am kah g Philip ch ab kakke, “Nap s-amichuth hegai map an ne'okchulith?”
44008031	Sh hab kaij ihtha s-has ha'ichu, “Pi ant has masma wo s-amich, heg hi wa matp am hema wo i ni-tashogi,” ch amjed ab i wai g Philip mat gn hu wehmaj wo thahiwua kalit ch ed. T wa woho an i chesh.
44008032	Kush eda ith an ne'okchulith mo hab chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed: T am hema wo i wuhsh g o'othham mat wo e wepogi g kahwal. Neh, pi at wo shosha g kahwal mamt hekith wo sho'igchuth k wo mua. Pegih, t hab wa masma pi has wo sha'i chei ihtha o'othham
44008033	mamt hekith pi ap wo lothait k wo mua. T hab pi hedai wo e nako mas wo ah Mamt he'es i ge'e pi ap'ekam hab juh ab wui.
44008034	Sh hab kaij g s-has ha'ichu ab Philip wui, “Am g ni-ahgith. Thoh'o hab ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam? No hejel hab e ahg aha no wabsh hema hab ahg?”
44008035	Tsh g Philip amjed am i shonch ith ab mash am ne'okchulith k am ahgith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus.
44008036	Sh am wabsh kia wohpo wohg oithch ch am hu hebai ne'ibij mash am ge shuhthagi. Sh hab kaij g s-has ha'ichu, “Neh, m ia ge shuhthagi. No am hig ha'ichu ehp manis heg hekaj pi wo ni-pahl wako?”
44008037	[Sh am hahawa ahgith g Philip, “Bapt wa'i masma wo e pahl wako mapt wehskaj am wo i e thagito Jesus wui.” Sh hab kaij, “Heu'u, wehskaj ant am wo i ni-thagito wui.”]
44008038	Sh am hahawa i ahgith hegai e-pionag mo melchuthahim g kalit mat wo keshwua. Tsh am huhud ab kalit t ab k am i huhud shuhthagi ch ed. Tsh am pahl wako g Philip ihtha o'othham.
44008039	Tsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag gm hu wa hekaj i bei g Philip. Sh amjed si s-hehgig ihtha s-has ha'ichuch gm hu uhpam meh pi hekith ep sha'i neithk g Philip.
44008040	Tsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag gm hu u'apa g Philip Ashdod kihhim t am. Tsh am i ahgahi g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus k ga hu ai g Cesaria kihhim.
44009001	Kush eda ith oitham g Saul wabsh kia ha oith hegam mash am oith g Jesus himthag ch s-gewkam ha ebkioth ch s-ha kokthaimk. Sh am hu hebai i, sh ab si tahni g uhgchu pahl
44009002	matsh am wo ha o'ohani g papal am Damascus kihhim t am. Kutsh heg wo be k am wo him k wo ha chehgi. Tsh hegam wo s-mahchk mo u'ukch g e-ap'ethag. Kutsh wo ha ui hegam mo am oith g Jesus himthag k am wo uhpam i ha ui Jerusalem wui, chum wa g u'uwi. Tsh wa woho hab e juh g uhgchu pahl.
44009003	Tsh am hih g Saul ha'i ha wehm g chechoj k gm hu i aihim g Damascus kihhim. Tsh haha wabsh ha'ichu si ton ab thahm kahchim t amjed an wehgaj.
44009004	Tsh am i gei g Saul jewedo. Sh ab hema si neok ab thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij, “Saul, s-wohom ap hig ni-sho'igchuth.”
44009005	Sh si has elith g Saul ch hab kaij, “Thohp wud ch ab neok?” Kush hab kaij hegai mo ab neok, “Thani ahni Jesus. Kup ha sho'igchuth hegam mo am oith g ni-himthag.
44009006	Ab g i wamig k am hihm k am wo i wah Damascus ch ed. T am haha wo hema m-ahgi mapt haschu am hab wo chum juh.”
44009007	Tsh hegam mo am wehmaj ab wabsh i gewpka k pi has sha'i kaij ch ash hi wa kah g ne'oki ch wabshaba pi sha'i neith mas hedai ab neok.
44009008	Tsh am hahawa i wami g Saul k ab chum si i nea. Tsh wabshaba pi ab hu mamsi g wuhpuij. Kumtsh am haha wabsh i wanimed k gd hu u'apa Damascus ch ed.
44009009	Kush waik tashkaj pi ha'ichu sha'i neith ch ep pi ha'ichu sha'i ko'a ch pi ha'ichu ih'e.
44009010	Kush eda am hema d Jesus ihmtham amai ch ash hab chehgig Ananias. Tsh g Jiosh am ha'ichu hab juh nenaj tahgio mash heg eda g Jesus am chehcheg. Sh g Ananias hab kaij, “Shahchu ap tatchua, ni-Jioshga?”
44009011	Kush hab hahawa kaij g Jesus, “Am g i e nakog k am hihm heg kih wui Judas mo am kih Shelini Kahya oithch. Amai o hema thak ch e ho'ige'ithahun ch hab chehgig Saul ch ab d kihkam Tarsus kihhim t ab.
44009012	Kunt am nenaj tahgio ha'ichu hab juh mapt am wo jiwia wui ahpi Ananias ch ab wo taht mat ep wo mamsi g wuhpuij.”
44009013	Sh hab kaij g Ananias, “Ni-kownalig, ihtha o'othham atsh mu'i ha sho'igch g m-hemajkamga am Jerusalem ch ed. Mu'ijj o hab ni-ahgith ab amjed.
44009014	Kutsh heg hekaj ia jiwia mash u'ukch g ap'ethag ab ha amjed g u'ugchu papal mat wo uhpam i ha ui hegam mo ab m-ihm.”
44009015	Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Am apt wo wa hih nant pi ith am si i kei mat am ni-wehhejed wo chikp am i ahgahimk g ni-himthag ha wui g Tutuligo ch am ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam ch kokownal.
44009016	Nt ahni am wo wa chehgi ihtha Saul mat has i masma wo e sho'igch am ni-wehhejed.”
44009017	Tsh wa woho am hih g Ananias heg wui kih k ab si i s-ha ho'ige'el g kihkam. Tsh ab i wahki. Tsh ab hahawa e mahtchul g Ananias Saul wui k hab kaij, “Ni-nawoj, Saul, am apsh neith g ge'echu t-kownalig Jesus ab himathch wohg oithch. T heg ab ni-cheha mantsh ab wo i him k ab wo m-taht. Tsh ep wo mamsi g m-wuhpui. Kutsh ab wo m-mah g gewkthaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.” Neh, bash kaij ch ab hahawa taht.
44009018	Tsh ab ha hekaj i mamsi g wuhpuij. Tsh hahawa ep s-ap ha'ichu neith k am ha hekaj i e nakog k e pahl wakon
44009019	k ep ha'ichu hug k ab uhpam ep i gewka. Sh g Saul am he'ekia i tash ha wehmajkahim g Jesus ihmtham amai Damascus t am.
44009020	Kush am ha'i chechopi g Tutuligo. Sh g Saul am ha mihshmath g e-wehm o'othham ab amjed g Jesus am ah ahgithch mo d Jiosh alithag.
44009021	Tsh si has i el hegam mo hedai i kah k hab kaij, “Aha no pi d ihtha mash an ha kokthahim hegam mash am oith hegai himthag Jerusalem t ab ch heg hekaj ia jiwia mat in wo i ha u'ihim k am uhpam wo i ha ui u'ugchu papal ha wui.”
44009022	Tsh g Saul mihshmetha am i si e gewkai. Kutsh wa wohokamch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha. Tsh hekaj pi e nako g wehmaj o'othham mat ab hu has wo ah.
44009023	Sh am hu i hebai amjed, tsh g Tutuligo am i e nako matsh wo mua g Saul. K eda si uhgk kolhaitas g kihhim. Kumsh si nuhkuth g kihjegaj tash oitham ch s-chuhugam oitham. Tsh wabshaba s-mai g Saul mam s-mu'amk.
44009025	Tsh hegam mat ab i s-wohoch g Saul ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus am thai washomi ch ed k ab i huduni chuhug ch ed g wijinakaj ab amjed mash ab hebai ge wintani kolhai t ab.
44009026	Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hih Jerusalem wui k ab chum ha shahgith i s-wahkim hegam Jesus ihmtham mat ab wo i ha wehmt. Sh wabshaba s-ehbith ch pi wohochuth mas woho pi has wo ha juh
44009027	Kush oi wa am wehhejed neok g Barnabas am ha wui g Jesus chuhchai. Tsh hegam hiwigi matsh am i wahki ha shahgith. Sh am ha ahgith mash g Saul am himath ch haha wabsh neith g Jesus amai wohg ch ed ch ep kah mo ab neok. Sh am ep ha ahgith matsh has masma si s-gewkam am i ha mihshmath ab amjed g Jesus amai Damascus t am. Tsh g Jesus chuhchai am hahawa s-wohoch.
44009028	Sh am ha wehm thakahim ch wehsko oimmed ch am si s-gewkam ha mihshmath g hemajkam ab amjed g Jesus Jerusalem ch ed.
44009029	Kutsh hegam Tutuligo mo neneok g Greek ne'okikaj am i chum e nako matsh wo mua nash pi ha wehm e ne'owin ab amjed g Jesus.
44009030	Kutsh g Jesus ihmtham am i kah ihtha k am i bei Cesaria kihhim wui k am ahgith matsh gm hu wo hih e-kihhim wui mash d Tarsus. Neh, tsh gm hu hih.
44009031	Tsh am hahawa thotholimat ha'ichu am ha wehhejed wehsko am Judea ch Galilee ch Samaria ch ed. Kutsh mu'i ep ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus k ab si has elith g Jiosh. Kush ab si ha wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
44009032	Sh eda g Peter an wehsko oimmed e-jewedga oithk ch am i ha chehgim hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus. Sh am ha'i thadha Lydda kihhim t am. Kutsh gd hu jiwia.
44009033	Sh am hema kih g pi himithkam ch hab chehgig Aneus ch ab wabsh i s-moik ch ash gigi'ik a'ahith ab pi sha'i e nako mas am wo i wami ab e-wo'ikud amjed.
44009034	Kutsh g Peter am i chehgim k hab kaij ab wui, “Aneus, Jesus Christ at wo m-thoaj. Ab g i wamig k am i holiwkath g e-wahpakus.” Tsh am ha hekaj i kekiwua k am hab e juh.
44009035	Kutsh mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus hegam mo am kih Lydda ch Sharon kihhim t am nash pi neith matki thoa ihtha o'othham.
44009036	Sh am hema kih g uwi Joppa kihhim t am ch d e tho'ibiakam ch chum hekith s-ap ha'ichu am hab junihim ch am ha'ichukaj i ha wehmaj g sho'igkam. Sh hab chehgig ihtha Tabitha mo hab d ahga Kuhwith.
44009037	Kush am wabsh kia thaha g Peter Lydda t am. Tsh am wabsh si mumku ihtha uwi k am i muh. Tsh am i ap'ech g chuhkugaj k am woi mash an hema kehk g kih gn hu uhgk kih thahm.
44009038	K eda g Joppa pi sha'i mehk ab Lydda t amjed. Kumtsh am i kah amai Joppa t am mo am ha'ichug g Peter k am gohk ha cheha g chechoj matsh am wo wohp k ab wo wai. Kutsh wa woho am wohp k am wai matsh s-hohtam ab wo i hih Joppa wui.
44009039	Tsh am wa hekaj i e nako g Peter k gm hu ha oi. Kutsh gd hu thatha. Tsh g Peter gn hu i wah mash an wo'o g muhki. Tsh wehsijj gn hu biha g hehe'ejel wi'ikam u'uwi k si shoani ch ab chehgith g wehschuga matsh wa haschu hab ha juni.
44009040	Tsh gm hu wehs i ha wuwhas g Peter k am i tonwua k e ho'ige'ithahu ab Jiosh wui k ab hahawa si neok wui g muhki ch hab kaij, “Tabitha, ab g i wamig.” Tsh am ha hekaj i e chegito k am i nei mash am kehk g Peter k shel i thahiwua.
44009041	Kutsh g Peter an i wehmt. Kutsh kekiwua. Tsh ab hahawa wehs i ha waith k ab ha chehgi mo d thoakam.
44009042	Tsh ihtha matsh haschu has e juh am wehsko kaitha Joppa t am. Tsh mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus.
44009043	Sh mu'i tashkaj am thakahim g Peter Joppa t am heg wehm mash hab chehgig Simon ch ash g hogi chikpan hab wua.
44010001	Sh am thadha g siant shonthal Cesaria kihhim t am mash ab amjed g Italy jewed. Kush g ha-uhgchuga hab chehgig Cornelius
44010002	ch ash si oith g Jiosh himthag ch am ep i ha wehmt g sho'igkam Tutuligo ch ab ihm g Jiosh. Kush g wehmaj kihkam wehsijj hab wa'ap ab si ihm g Jiosh.
44010003	Sh hema tash mash d i waik ohla im hab i juhk, tsh am nenaj ed hab e juh matsh am jiwia g anghil k am si chehch hab kaijch, “Cornelius.”
44010004	Sh ab hu wabsh si neith ihtha anghil ch wabsh s-ehbeni ch hab kaij, “Shahchu ap ahgahim ch ab neok?” Sh hab kaij g anghil, “Ab o kaiham g Jiosh g m-ho'ige'ithahuna ch s-hohho'ith hegai map haschu am hab junihim g sho'igkam ha wehhejed.
44010005	Pegih, pt hemuch ha'i wo ha cheha g chechoj mat am wo hihi Joppa wui k am wo nei hegai mo hab chehgig Simon Peter.
44010006	Am o tha heg kih am mo d hogi chikpantham ch hab wa'ap chehgig Simon ch am kih ge kahchki hugith an.”
44010007	Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hih hegai anghil mash ab wui neok. Tsh g Cornelius am hahawa waik ha wai g e-pionag. Sh hema ihtham d shonthal ch si oith g Jiosh himthag.
44010008	Kutsh am ha ahgi ihtham matsh haschu has e juh k am hahawa ha cheha mat gm hu wo hihi Joppa wui.
44010009	Sh am ba'ich d i tash matsh am thahm i juh, sh am wabsh kia hihim ihtham ch ab hi wa aihim g kihhim. Tsh eda g Peter gm hu hejelko him k am e ho'ige'ithahun.
44010010	k ash am i si bihugim k chum ha'ichu s-hugimk. Tsh eda koi bai g hihithod. Kutsh am Peter nena ed hab e juh
44010011	matsh ab i e kuhpi'o g thahm kahchim. Kutsh ab ha'ichu i e huduni jewedo k hab mahs mo g lohna ch sha'i si ge'ej ch an a'ai e u'ukch chuhchpulij an ch ab i tadanich.
44010012	Sh ith eda am ha'ichug g nahnko mahs ha'ichu thoakam ch wahammad ch u'uwhig.
44010013	Sh hab kaij g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag, “Peter, i g wuhshani k am wabsh chum haschu wo ha mua ihtham k hekaj wo e gegos.”
44010014	Tsh wabshaba g Peter hab si chei, “Ih, pi ant am hu hab wo ni-juh, ni-kownalig. Pi ani hekith ko'a hegai mo g m-chehanig pi t-hiwgith machs wo ko'ath.”
44010015	Sh hab hahawa kaij hegai mo ab neok, “Pi g hab sha'i elith mas pi ap'e hegai mo haschu g Jiosh hemu am m-chehgith mo s-ap'e.”
44010016	Tsh waikko hab e juh ihtha am nenaj ed. Tsh amjed im hu hahawa uhpam i e bei ihtha ha'ichu am thahm kahchim wui.
44010017	Sh am wabsh kia oithahim g Peter hegai matsh haschu nei. Tsh heg i eda ihtham Cornelius pionag am i s-mai mo hebai i kih g Simon k am thatha k ab gegok kolhai kihjeg t ab
44010018	ch ab si s-kaitham ha kakke, “No ia hema thaha mo hab chehgig Simon Peter?”
44010019	Kush eda g Peter am wabsh kia chum a'amichuth mas has d ahga hegai mat am nei. Kush hab kaij g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag, “Neh, ia at ha'i thatha k s-m-neitham.
44010020	Pt am wo i e nakog k am wo ha nei. Pi g has sha'i ha elith mo d ge gawul mahs hemajkam k wabsh wo ha oi. Ahni o d ni-tatchui mat ab i hihi.”
44010021	Tsh wa woho am i hud g Peter k hab kaij ab ha wui ihtham o'othham, “Ahni ani wud mam s-ni-neithamk. Shahchu amt ahgk ia thatha?”
44010022	Sh hab hahawa kaij ihtham o'othham, “No pi ab t-chehani g Cornelius. Heg o d shonthal ha-uhgchuga Cesaria t ab ch si s-ap d o'othham k ch ab si ihm g Jiosh. K g Tutuligo hab wa'ap ab si has elith. Tsh g anghil ab wui i hih ab amjed g Jiosh k hab ahg mat ab wo i m-wai e-kih wui k wo m-kah mapt haschu wo i ahgi.”
44010023	Tsh ab i ha wahpki g Peter ihtham waik o'othham mat am wo wa'i kohk. Sh an ba'ich d i tash, tsh i e nakog k gm hu hahawa ha oi. Tsh ha'i ep ha oi hegam mash d Jesus ihmtham ch ab d kihkam Joppa t ab.
44010024	Am ba'ich d ep i tash. tsh gd hu hahawa thatha Cesaria t am. Tsh oi wa g Cornelius heki hu am i ha wai g e-hajuni ch e-naipijju. Kush ihtham am wehmaj ha nenida.
44010025	Tsh ab wabsh chum i wah g Peter. Tsh g Cornelius ab si tha'iwuni k ab si i gei wecho ab si has elithch.
44010026	Tsh wabshaba hab ah g Peter, “Pi g sha'i ni-wui i gehsh. Thani wabsh o'othham.”
44010027	Kush am e wehm neneokhim ch am i wahp. Sh am mu'i thadha g hemajkam.
44010028	Kush am ha neith g Peter ch hab kaij ab ha wui, “Am am wa s-mahch mach ahchim Tutuligo pi sha'i hiwgithas ab t-himthag amjed machs ab wo i s-em-hajunima ahpim mam d gawul mahs hemajkam, ni'ichs am hu wo em-chehgim em-kihki wui. T wabshaba g Jiosh am ni-chehgi mant i'ajed pi am hu has wo sha'i em-elithath.
44010029	Nt hekaj ab i hih pi sha'i has elithk mam d ge gawul mahs hemajkam. Pegih, m haschu ahgch am ni-waith.”
44010030	Sh hab kaij g Cornelius, “Am ani ni-ho'ige'ithahun ni-kih am d hu hema i tako imhab i juhk. T am haha wabsh hema jiwia g o'othham. K si tonod g wehschugaj. K ab kehk ni-wui
44010031	ch hab kaij, ‘Cornelius, ab o kaiham g Jiosh g m-ho'ige'ithahuna ch s-hohho'ith hegai map haschu am hab junihim g sho'igkam ha wehhejed.
44010032	Pt wo ha'i ha cheha mat am wo hihi Joppa wui k am wo wai hegai o'othham mo hab chehgig Simon Peter. Am wo tha heg kih am mo d hogi chikpantham ch hab chehgig Simon ch an kih ge kahchki hugith an.’ Neh, bo kaij.
44010033	“Kunt am hahawa ha'i ha cheha mat am hihim k ab i m-wai. Kupt s-ap e juh k ab i hih. Kuch hemuch ia thadha am nenaj ed g Jiosh ch s-kaimk hegai mat haschu g Jiosh am wo i m-ahgi mapt am hab wo chei.”
44010034	Tsh wa woho am hahawa ha'ichu i ahgahi g Peter k hab kaij, “Hahawa ant wa s-mai moki woho mo g Jiosh wehs ha wepo masma ha neith g nahnko mahs hemajkam.
44010035	K hegam d si tatchuij mo hedai ab i si has elith ch am hab junihim g s-ap'ekam, chum as pi d wo Tutuligo hemajkamk.
44010036	Am amki chum heki hu kah ab amjed ihtha mant haschu wo i em-ahgi nam pi ia t-shahgith thadha ahchim Tutuligo. K ahchim am t-ahgith g Jiosh mash s-ha tho'ibiamk g hemajkam am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag Jesus Christ. Heg o wud mat g Jiosh am i kei mat wehs d wo ha-kownaligk g nahnko mahs hemajkam.
44010037	K wa am hema t-jehnigith ab amjed g Jesus ch am t-pahl wapkon ch hab chehgig John. T am i wuhsh g Jesus k am e pahl wako heg ab John. T g Jiosh ab mah g si ge'e gewkthag am gahi wuhshanim g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat hekaj hab wo junihith g e-chikpan. T g Jesus am i shonwuich g e-chikpan Galilee chekshani ch ed k am hahawa wehsko hab junihim Judea chekshani ch ed. Jiosh o am wehmaj. K hekaj wehsko i ha wehmt g e-hemajkamga ch ha thothajith hegam mo g jiawul ha sho'igchuth.
44010039	“Kuch ahchim am wehmajkahim ch g si t-wuhpuikaj neith hegai mo haschu hab junihim am wehsko t-jewedga ed ch am Jerusalem ch ed. Kumt an be k mua ab naggiak kots t ab.
44010040	T wabshaba g Jiosh ab uhpam i wuhshath muhkig amjed mo d i waik tash k am i t-chehgi.
44010041	K pi wabsh chum hedai neith. Ahchim ach wa'i neith mat he'ekiajj g Jiosh heki hu am i t-chuhcha. Tt wa am wehmaj t-gegos am i thahm mat g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig amjed.
44010042	Jiosh atsh am si i kei matsh wo ha tho'ibia hegam mat ab wo hiwgath k wo ha lothai hegam mat pi wo e tho'ibia. T g Jesus ab t-mohto'i matt am wo si wohokamch ihtha k am wo ahgahith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj.
44010043	Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig wehs hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus. Ith o wehsijj wohokamchuth g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
44010044	Sh am wabsh kia neok g Peter. Tsh ab i hud g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ha thahm hegam mo am kaiham k ab si i ha mah g gewkthag.
44010045	Tsh am gawul ne'okikaj neneo mat pi hebai mai k ab si ihm g Jiosh. Tsh am i ha kaiok ab si e totoths hegam mo wehmaj g Peter natki pi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab si i ha mah g gewkthag hegam gawul mahs hemajkam.
44010047	Sh ab kaij g Peter. “Jiosh atki ab i ha mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat hab masma ab i t-mah. No hig pi d ha wuikam mat wo e pahl wapko?”
44010048	Kumtsh wa woho ha pahl wapko am chehchegch g Jesus Christ. Sh ihtham ab hahawa si ahgith g Peter mat am wo sha'i ha wehm thakahim he'ekia i tash.
44011001	Tsh am i kah g Jesus wohochuththam amai Judea jewed t am matsh hegam gawul mahs hemajkam ab bei ihtha Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
44011002	Sh eda am ha'i d hegam mash hab si elith mat hemho wa hab wo juh g Tutuligo ha-himthag hegam gawul mahs hemajkam matsh ab i s-wohoch. Kutsh am hihi ihtham Peter k am thatha Jerusalem t am. Kutsh hegam am ne'owin k hab si ahg,
44011003	“Kah ach maptsh am ha wehm e gegos hegam mo d gawul mahs hemajkam ch pi pahl hikuchkas. P eda s-mahch mo pi t-hiwgithas machs chum hems am wo i wahp ha-kihki ed.”
44011004	Tsh am hahawa ha ahgi g Peter matsh haschu has e juh gd hu i shonchuthk mo wa am e ho'ige'ithahun Joppa kihhim t am ch hab kaij:
