44011005	“Am ani thaha Joppa t am ch am hu hebai ni-ho'ige'ithahun. T am ni-nena ed hab e juh mat ab ha'ichu i e huduni thahm kahchim t amjed k hab mahs mo g lohna ch sha'i si ge'ej ch an a'ai e u'ukch chuhchpulij an ch am ni-tahgio i e ul.
44011006	Kunt am si i nei eda k nei g nahnko mahs ha'ichu thoakam, chum hegam ehp mo s-thothajk ch wahammad ch u'uwhig.
44011007	“K ab hahawa hema si neok ch hab kaij, ‘Peter, i g wuhshani k wabsh chum haschu am wo mu'a k hekaj wo e gegos.’
44011008	“Kuni hab kaij, ‘Ih, pi ant am hu hab wo ni-juh, ni-kownalig. Pi ani hekith ko'a hegai mo g m-chehanig pi t-hiwgith.’
44011009	“K hab ep kaij hegai mo ab neok, ‘Pi g hab sha'i elith mas pi ap'e hegai mo haschu g Jiosh hemu am m-chehgith mo s-ap'e.’ Neh, bo kaij ab ni-wui.
44011010	Kut ith hab e juh waikko. T amjed im hu hahawa uhpam i e bei ihtha ha'ichu am thahm kahchim wui.
44011011	“Kutki eda heki hu am ha'i thatha waik g o'othham. Ihtham ha-ge'ejig o hab chehgig Cornelius ch am kih Cesaria t am ch ab ha cheha matsh ab wo i ni-wai. Tki am thatha mani am tha.
44011012	K hab ni-ahgith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mant pi has wo sha'i ha el mo d ge gawul mahs hemajkam k wabsh wo ha oi. T ihtham chuhthp t-wepnag m ia gegok am ni-wehm hihi Cesaria wui k am ni-wehm i wahp Cornelius kih ed.
44011013	“K heg am t-ahgith matsh g anghil am jiwia kihj am k hab kaij, ‘Am g ha'i ha chehani mat am wo hihi Joppa wui k am wo wai hegai o'othham mo hab chehgig Simon Peter.
44011014	T heg am wo em-ahgi mamt has masma wo e tho'ibia wehsijj g e-wehm kihkam ha wehm.’
44011015	“Pegih, tki wa woho hab e juh. Kunt am him k am wabsh chum ha'ichu i ha ahgith. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab i hud ha thahm mat wa hab e juh am t-wehhejed ga hu si i wehpeg.
44011016	Nt am hahawa i chegito mo wa hab kaij g t-kownalig Jesus, ‘Mat ab i em-mah g John g pahl wakona. T wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag g si ge'e gewkthag ab wo i em-mah pi sha'i mu'i tash i'ajed.’
44011017	Neh, t ith amjed am si i e tashogi mat g Jiosh ab ha mah hegam gawul mahs hemajkam hegai mahkigdag mat ahchim ab t-mah mat hekith ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Kunt pi has masma am hu wo sha'i kuh g Jiosh ith amjed.” Neh, bash kaij g Peter.
44011018	Tsh ihtham am i kah wehs ha'ichu k pi ab hu has hahawa ep ahg ch wabsh si s-hehgigam ab ihm g Jiosh ch hab kaij, “Pegih, boki d Jiosh hab elitha mat ihtham gawul mahs hemajkam hab wa'ap gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.”
44011019	Kutsh ha'i hegam matsh wa e gantad matsh hekith i e muhkith g Steven gm hu ahgahi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga Phenicia ch Cyprus jejewed t am ch Antiok kihhim t am k hegam an wa'i ha mihshmath Tutuligo.
44011020	Tsh am hahawa ha'i thatha Antiok t am ab amjed g Cyprus ch Cyrene k am i ha mihshmath hegam ehp mo d gawul mahs hemajkam.
44011021	Tsh g Jiosh am i gewkai g ha'ichu ha-ahga. Kutsh mu'ijj hegam hemajkam ab i s-ha wohochuth k ab i e thagito Jesus wui.
44011022	Tsh am i kah hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus ch ab thadha Jerusalem t ab matsh has i e juh am Antiok t am k ab hahawa cheha g Barnabas matsh am wo him k wo i ha wehmt.
44011023	Tsh gd hu jiwia k am i nei si s-hehgigch matki wa woho g Jiosh ab si s-ha ho'ige'el. Sh am ha ahgith mamt wehs ab wo i e thagito Jiosh wui k pi hekith wo sha'i thagito hegai mamt haschu ab i bei.
44011024	Sh wa eda si s-ap d o'othham g Barnabas ch si e thagitokch Jesus wui ch ab si u'ukch g gewkthag ab amjed g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Tsh mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus.
44011025	Tsh hekaj hab i e ah g Barnabas matsh am wo i bei g Saul mat heg am wo i ha wehmt. Sh eda heg am kih Tarsus kihhim t am. Tsh am him
44011026	k am i chehg k ab uhpam i wai Antiok wui. Tsh am uhpam hihim k am thatha Antiok t am k hemako ahith ab am i ha wehmt g e wehm wohochuththam amai. Sh eda mu'ij ihtham. Amai ash Antiok t am mamtsh si wehpeg hab ha chehch Christian.
44011027	Tsh wa eda am ha'i thatha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ab Jerusalem t amjed amai Antiok t am.
44011028	Sh ihtham hema hab chehgig Agabus. Tsh g Jiosh am i tashogi ihtha mat g bihugig wo gei an wehsko jewed thahm. Kutsh am ha ahgi g Jesus ihmtham amai Antiok t am. Tsh amai i amjed am i e nakog k am wehsijj i shuligahi g lial am ha wehhejed hegam e-wehm wohochuththam mo am kih Judea jewed ch ed. Kutsh gei hegai bihugig mash eda g Claudius am d kownal.
44011030	Kumsh am ha chehani g Barnabas ch Saul matsh am wo i ui g lial. Tsh ihtham am i u'u k ab ha mah g ha wanimedtham g Jesus ihmtham amai Judea jewed ch ed.
44012001	Tsh eda am i ha sho'igch g kownal Herod hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus
44012002	k ab ha chehani g e-shonthalig. Tsh ihtham an bei hegai James mo d John wehnag k mua g is-pahyokaj.
44012003	Kush mu'i si s-hohho'ith g Tutuligo matsh hab e juh ihtha. Tsh heg hekaj wabsh ba'ich i si e gewkai g Herod k g Peter an ep bei. Kutsh eda e ai g si ge'e mihshmetha mo eda g Tutuligo pi ko'a g hegai pahn mo jewajithas wewa'ak tash oitham.
44012004	Tsh am ha cheha g Herod g e-shonthalig matsh wabsh wo kuh g Peter. Kumtsh am haha wo lothai am ha tahgio g hemajkam mat am wo i ha'asa e piast. Tsh gamai chuhthp i e chuhcha g shonthal matsh gi'ik e wehm wo nuhkuth tash oitham ch s-chuhugam oitham.
44012005	Sh wabshaba heg oitham am hahasko e hehemapath g Jesus ihmtham ch am wehhejed si e ho'ige'ithahun.
44012006	Kutsh am i e ai matsh ba'ich i si'alim wo e lothai g Peter. Tsh am i s-chuk. Sh am wo'o ch kohsh ha shahgith g gohk shonthal mash am nuhkuth. Kumsh gn hu si wupulshch g nohnhoij ch kakhioj g gohk e hukshchim wapainomikaj. Sh an gohk ep gegok g shonthal ch am nuhkuth g kukpaikud kihkijeg.
44012007	Tsh am haha wabsh jiwia g anghil k am wui i kekiwua g Peter. Tsh wabsh si ton am kukpaikud ch ed. Kutsh ihtha anghil ab si ugij g Peter k wuhan k hab kaij, “Oi g kekiwua s-hohtam.” Kutsh gm hu wa hekaj a'ai shul hegai e hukshchim wapainomi mamsh an hekaj wupulshch. Tsh am i kekiwua.
44012008	Sh hab hahawa kaij g anghil, “An g s-wihnam i e giwuddath k ab si i wuhpud g e-kaikia shuhshk.” Tsh wa woho hab e juh g Peter. Sh hab ep kaij g anghil, “Ab g wahki g e-lihwa k ab i ni-oith.”
44012009	Tsh ab wahk k gm hu i oi. Kutsh am i wuwha ab amjed mash am kuhpikahim. Kush sha pi s-wohoma mat woho ab i wuhshath g anghil nash pi hab e ahg mo wabsh chehchk.
44012010	Tsh am hihim k am i wuwha wehpeg kihjeg t ab. Kush am hema kehk g shonthal ch wabshaba pi am hu sha'i ha neith. Kutsh am ep hihim k gm hu ep wuwha mash am kahya wui kihjeg. Kush am hema ep kehk g shonthal ch hab wa'ap pi sha'i ha neith. Tsh wabsh hejel ab i e kuhkpi'o g kihkijeg. Tsh am wa'i hekaj pi e ha'ichuch g anghil.
44012011	Tsh am haha wabsh si i e taht g Peter k hab kaij, “Neh, woho atki hab e juh. Jiosh atki ab cheha g anghil mat ab ni-wui wo hih. Tki heg ab i ni-wuhshath kukpaikud amjed ch ni-tho'ibia ab amjed mat has wo i chum ni-juh g ni-wehm o'othham.”
44012012	Tsh amjed am hih kihj wui hegai Mary mo d John Mark je'e. Kush eda mu'ijj am e hemapathch ch e ho'ige'ithahun.
44012013	Kutsh ab si shontpag g pualit g Peter. Tsh am hema hih g ha-pionag k hab chehgig Rhoda. Sh hab kaij g Peter. “Gam g i kuhpi'ok.”
44012014	Tsh heg am i amich mo d Peter ch ab neok k si s-hehgig ch gm hu uhpam meh pi ab hu i kuhpi'ok g pualit k gd hu ha ahgith mo g Peter ab kehk jeg ed.
44012015	Sh hab kaij hegam ab wui, “Ptp wabsh chehch mo ab s-kehkathma.” Sh wabshaba am hab wabsh i kaij mo woho. Sh hab hahawa ep kaij, “Na'as d wabsh kok'oi namtsh pi wo mua.”
44012016	Kush eda ab wabsh kia shontpag. Tsh ab hahawa i kuhpi'o g pualit k nei mo ab kehk. Tsh am ha hekaj i wah k ab ha ihm k am i ha ahgith mat has masma g Jiosh i wuhshath ab amjed g kukpaikud. Kush si has i elith mat has e juh. Tsh hab hahawa ha ah, “Am g wo ha ahgith hegam James mat g Jiosh ab i ni-wuhshath,” k amjed gm hu hahawa ep hasko hih.
44012018	Tsh am ba'ich i mahsi. Tsh am sha'i si e kudu hegam mash am nuhkuth g kukpaikud. “T hebai hih g Peter?” bash kaij.
44012019	Tsh g Herod am hahawa si ha cheha mat am wo i gahghi. Tsh wabshaba pi sha'i mai mas hebai hih. Sh am si i ha chehani g Herod mat ab wo ha kakke hegam shonthal mas has e juh. Kush pi neith ch pi mahch mas has e juh. Kush oi wa am ha chehani mat wo ha koktha. Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hih g Herod Cesaria kihhim wui ab Judea chekshani t amjed.
44012020	Tsh am hebai i cheka. Kutsh wabsh woho'i bagat g Herod ab ha wui hegam mash am kih Tyre ch Sidon t ab. Kutsh ab wui hihi matsh wo chum ap'ech mash haschu i pi ap'e nash pi am chum huniop. Sh am hema d kownal kehsha ch nuhkuth g kihj ch hab chehgig Blastus. Kutsh heg wehpeg ab si i s-nawojima k amjed am wui hihi g Herod k ab kakke mat wabsh ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el.
44012021	Tsh hema kei g tash g Herod k ab si s-kehg e enigadath k ab thahiwua kownal thaikud ab k am si s-hasigam ha jehnigi g hemajkam.
44012022	Kush ab si hihnk g hemajkam ch hab kaij, “Pi oki d sha'i o'othham ch ab neok noki pi d ge hema jiosh.”
44012023	Kutsh pi ha shohbi g Herod k pi am hu has el g Jiosh. Tsh heg hekaj g anghil ab ab hab juh g mumkithag mat waptopad k muh.
44012024	Kutsh g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga i ge'etha.
44012025	Tsh g Barnabas ch Saul gm hu uhpam hihi ab Jerusalem t amjed mat am i ui g lial. Kutsh g John Mark am i ha oi.
44013001	Sh am ha'i ep d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam Antiok t am. Hema ihtham ash hab chehgig Simon ch wabshaba hab e a'aga S-chukchu. Kush hema d Lucius ch ab Cyrene t amjed. Kush hema d Manaen ch am wehmaj ge'etha g kownal Herod. Ihtham ash am ha mashcham am ha wehm g Barnabas ch Saul.
44013002	Kush am hu hebai wehsijj am he'ekia tashkaj wabsh e ho'ige'ithahun ch hab pi ha'ichu ko'a. Kush am ha tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mash g Jiosh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Neh, ab ant ha mohto'i g Barnabas ch Saul mat gm hu mehk wo i ahgahi g ha'ichu ni-ahga. Kumt am wo i ha thagito mat hab wo wa e juh.”
44013003	Kush am ba'ich i himchuth hegai mash wabsh e ho'ige'ithahun ch pi ha'ichu ko'a ch ab hahawa ha taht ihtham Barnabas ch Saul matsh hekaj am chehgi mat ha thagito heg wui mat g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am i ha tashogi.
44013004	Tsh gm hu hihi g Barnabas ch Saul mash wa g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am i ha tashogith. Kutsh am ep i ha oi g John Mark matsh am wo i ha wehmt. Tsh ihtham gd hu thatha Selucia kihhim t am. K ith an hugithaj an g ge kahchki. K ab hihhim g wapalko. Kutsh ihtham Barnabas an i chehchsh wahlko ch ed k gm hu aigo i shulig k gm hu thatha Cyprus jewed ch ed. Sh am hema kihhimag ch hab e a'aga Salamis. Kush am ha'i chuhch g Tutuligo ha-chechopi. Sh ihtham Barnabas am i wahpk ch am ha jehnigith ab amjed g Jesus.
44013006	Sh gm hu aigo hema ep kihhimag ch hab chehgig Paphos. Kutsh gm hu hihim k am ep ha jehnigith. Sh am tha hegai mash d kownal ith eda jewed ch hab chehgig Sergius Paulus. Kush am hema wehmaj g Tuhligo ch hab chehgig Barjesus ch d s-hasigam ha'ichu hab wuatham ch ha iattogith mash d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Kumsh hab a'aga Elymas mo hab d ahga Ge Mahkai. Sh g kownal d si ha'ichu s-amichuththam o'othham ch ab i ha wai g Barnabas ch Saul nash pi s-kaimk g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus. Tsh wabshaba ab ha wui kekiwua hegai Elymas k am i chum e nako mat hab wo juh g kownal mat pi ab hu wo ha wohoch.
44013009	Saul o hab ep e a'aga Paul Greek ne'okikaj. Tsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab ep si mah g Paul g gewkthag. Sh heg ab si shel i neith g Elymas
44013010	ch hab kaij, “Neh, thap Jiawul pionag nap pi ab wabsh i si shuhthags g pi ap'ekamkaj. K heg hab m-wua map ab wui kehk g s-ap'ekam ch chum gawul s-junimk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
44013011	Jiosh at hab wo m-juh mapt pi wo nehnt he'es i tash.” Neh, bash kaij g Paul. Kutsh am wa i hekaj woho hab e juh. Tsh am taht g Elymas mat ab ha'ichu si ma'ish g wuhpuij. K am wabsh i s-chuhugam wehhejed. Tsh an i thahthaghi an chum hema gahgch mat am wo i wanim.
44013012	Tsh ab si e toths g kownal k ab i s-wohoch neithok mash has masma g Jiosh am chehgith g e-gewkthag.
44013013	Tsh am hahawa gahi ep i shul hegam Paul ab Paphos t amjed k gm hu thatha Perga kihhim t am am Pamphylia jewed ch ed. Tsh wabshaba g John Mark am i ha thagito amai k gm hu uhpam hih Jerusalem wui.
44013014	Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hihi ihtham Paul ch Barnabas Pisidia jewed wui. K am hema kihhimag ch hab chehgig Antiok. Kutsh am thatha. Tsh am i e ai g ha-mihshmetha tash. Kutsh gd hu i wahp ihtham Paul e wehm o'othham ha-cheopi ed k am i thadhaiwua.
44013015	Kumtsh am ne'okchul g Jiosh o'ohana. Sh hegam mash d ha wanimedtham hab hahawa kaij, “T-naipijju, chum ach si tatchua mamt am wo ha'ichu ha ahgi g hemajkam mat heg amjed ab wo i e gewpkai.”
44013016	Tsh ga hu hahawa i kekiwua g Paul ha ba'ich k hab kaij: “T-hajuni ch ahpim mam ia ha wehm ihm g Jiosh, ab g wo i ni-kaiham.
44013017	Jiosh atsh ab i ha gawulkai g t-shohshonbad matsh d wo hemajkamgajk. Kutsh am i mu'itha mash eda am kihkahim Egypt jewed ch ed. Tsh ab hahawa i ha tho'ibia ab ha amjed g Egypt hemajkam g si ge'e e-gewkthagkaj.
44013018	Kush an oiopo tohono jewed ch ed gi'ikko wehst-mahm ahith ab. Sh g Jiosh am s-hemajim ha nakogahim
44013019	ch am wo i ha wahpki ith eda Canaan jewed. Sh eda g wewa'ak kawod thakam hemajkam ia kih. Tsh g Jiosh ha hugio k g ha-jewedga am a'ai i ha tahpjel g t-shohshonbad mash hab masma heki hu ahgith g Abrahambad.
44013020	Tsh heg i thahm am hahawa i ha chuhcha g Jiosh g s-chu a'amichuththam mash am ha'ichu a'ap'echuth ha wehhejed. “Tsh ga hu e ai matsh am i thahiwua g Samuelbad k d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.
44013021	Kush g t-shohshonbad ab si tahni g Jiosh matsh am hema wo i kei mat d wo ha-kownaligk. Tsh g Jiosh am i kei hegai Saul mash d Kishbad alithag ch ab d Benjaminbad amjedkam. Kush heg d ha-kownalig gi'ikko wehst-mahm ahith ab.
44013022	Tsh g Jiosh im hu hab hahawa i juh g Saulbad k g Davidbad am i kei matsh d wo ha-kownaligk. Sh hab kaij g Jiosh ab amjed: Ihtha David mo d Jesse alithag o am si ni-tatchui oithch hab masma ch am e tashogi mat am hab wo juh hegai mant haschu ab wo i ahgi.
44013023	“Sh hab ep kaij g Jiosh matsh am hema wo i kei g Davidbad amjedkam matsh d wo t-tho'ibiakamk. Kut wa woho hab e juh g Jiosh. K g Kehshaj hab chehgig Jesus.
44013024	T wabshaba g Jiosh ab hema wehpeg i wuhshath g t-wehm o'othham. K ith hab chehgig John ch ab i ha mihshmath ch hab ha ahg mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k wo e pahl wapko.
44013025	Tsh ihtha John ith hekaj am i kuhgi g e-chikpan mo wa hab ha ahg g hemajkam, ‘Pi g hab wo sha'i ni-elithath mani ahni d hegai mam si nenida. Pi ani d ahni ch d wabsh pi ha'ichu an hugithaj an. Mt wo wa nei mat am epai wo i e maskogi hegai mo hig woho d s-has ha'ichu.’ Neh, bash kaij g Johnbad.
44013026	“Pegih, ni-wehm o'othham ch ahpim mam hab wa'ap ab si has elith g Jiosh, ab o wehsijj d t-wuikam ihtha s-kehg tho'ibiathag ahgaj.
44013027	Hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam atki an o'oha matsh has wo masmak g Jiosh si Kehsha. K g ha-ne'oki e ne'okchulith t-sha'ashagith wehs mihshmetha tash. Kuki eda hegam t-hajuni mo ab kih Jerusalem t ab pi amichuth g ha'ichu ha-ahga ch hab pi amich g Jiosh si Kehsha mat hekith am jiwia k chum s-ha tho'ibiamk. Jiosh at am i kei g e-alithag Jesus mat wo t-tho'ibia.
44013028	K heg pi ha chu'ichig. T eda hegam ab chum chu'ichigch mat g kownal Pilate wo mua. Kumt ab naggia k mua kots t ab k ab hahawa i huduni k gm hu cheh hiha'ini ch ed.
44013029	Bat wa masma an o'oha g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mat hab wo e juh. Kut ihtham am wabsh wohokamch g ha'ichu ha-ahga.
44013030	T wabshaba g Jiosh ab uhpam i wuhshath muhkig amjed.
44013031	Tsh amjed mu'ikko am si i e chehgi ha wui hegam mash an wehmajkahim ch ab wehmaj i hihi Galilee t amjed ab Jerusalem wui. K ihtham am si s-mahch ch ahgahim am t-shahgith. “Pegih, ab g wo ni-kaiham, ni-wehm o'othham mam ab d ep Abrahambad amjedkam ch ahpim mam ia ha wehm ab ihm g Jiosh. Ahpim at em-wui gei ihtha ha'ichu ahga mamt has masma wo e-tho'ibia nat pi gm hu wabsh s-ohhoth g t-hajuni ab Jerusalem t ab.
44013032	Kutt hemuch ia thatha k ia u'apa ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga em-wui. Heki ash hu am ha ahgith g Jiosh g t-shohshonbad matsh wo uhpam i wuhshath g si e-Kehsha ab muhkig amjed. Kutsh wa woho hab e juh. Kutki ith heki hu o'oha g Davidbad mat eda koi hab e juh. K an wa o'ohanas gohkkam ne'i ed heg eda Jiosh heki hu o'ohana mash hab kaij g Jiosh ab e-alithag wui: Ahpi ap d si ni-alithag. Hemuch ant am i m-maskogi.
44013034	K hab ep masma an o'ohanas mash hab kaij g Jiosh ab e-alithag wui: B ant wo m-mah hegai si hekia s-kehg ho'ige'ithadag mani wa am si ahgith g Davidbad. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh ch heg hab ahg mat ab i wuhshath g Jesus muhkig amjed mat pi hekith wo sha'i padt g chuhkugaj.
44013035	K gn hu ba'ich an ep o'ohadag ch hab chu'ig: Pi at wo sha'i hiwigi g si e-Kehsha mas wo padt g chuhkugaj.
44013036	“Neh, pi oki hejel hab e ahg g Davidbad natsh pi muh am hab juniok hegai mat haschu g Jiosh ab mohto'i k am ha wehm e cheh g e-shohshonbad. Tsh hi padt g chuhkugaj.
44013037	Heg o hab ahg Jesus mat pi sha'i padt g chuhkugaj nat pi g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig amjed.
44013038	Pegih, ni-wepnag, ith amt hekaj wo chum s-mahchk mat g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig
44013039	mamt hedai ab wo i s-wohoch g Jesus. Heg at am wo i em-ap'ech mamt pi wo ha chu'ichigk am Jiosh nena ed. T pi ha'ichu ep wo e nako mas hab masma am wo i em-ap'ech, nih g chehanig.
44013040	“T an ep o'oha g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mo hab kaij g Jiosh: S-e g wo nen'oithk k am wo si i oithahi ahpim mam wabsh has ni-ahg. Am ant ha'ichu hab wo juh em-shahgith. Kut am hema wo si s-ap i em-tashogi mani d ahni ch hab wua. Mt eda pi ab hu wo ha wohoch. Nt heg hekaj gm hu hab wo i em-juh ab ni-amjed k pi thahm ep wo pihk ni-el em-hekaj. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh. “Pegih, si g wo s-e nen'oithk k ab wo s-wohog el g Jiosh. T hab pi ab hu wo i em-ai g s-ko'ok em-namkithadag.”
44013042	Tsh ab i kuhgit g ha-namki. Tsh wo chum hihi g Paul ch Barnabas. Sh wabshaba g hemajkam ab si ha waith mat am ep wo thatha ba'ich mihshmetha tash k am ba'ich ep wo i ha ahgi ihtham ha'ichu.
44013043	Tsh am i himto g hemajkam. Tsh ha'i ab i ha oi hegam Paul. Kutsh ab si i ha gewkemhu ab ha'ichu ep ha ahgithk mat am wo wa e nakogath Jiosh hemajimatalig ed. Sh ha'i ihtham d Tutuligo hemajkam ch ha'i d gawul mahs hemajkam ch am ha wehm e mihshmath.
44013044	Sh am ba'ich d i mihshmetha tash. Tsh chum alo wehsijj ab e hemapai g hemajkam matsh wo kah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
44013045	Tsh hegam Tutuligo mash pi ab hu ha wohochuth si s-ha hehgam k hab kaij mo d wabsh s-chu iattomkam g Paul.
44013046	Tsh wabshaba ihtham Paul am haha wabsh si ha ahgi, “Ni-hajuni, bo chum mahs matt wehpeg ab wo em-ahgi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g si Kehshaj. Kumtki wabshaba s-ohhoth k hab sha e wua mam pi tatchua g pi ha huhugetham thoakag am Jiosh kihthag ed. Kutt heg hekaj wo em-thagito k hegam ha wui wo i t-nohnogi gawul mahs hemajkam.
44013047	Bo wa masma am t-chehanig Jiosh. An o o'ohanas mash hab kaij: Am ant i em-gawulkai mamt am wo i ha tashogi g ha'ichu ni-ahga g nahnko mahs hemajkam wehsko jewed thahm. T ab em-amjed wo s-mai mat has masma wo e tho'ibia. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.”
44013048	Tsh am i kah ihtham gawul mahs hemajkam k si s-hehgigam ab ihm g Jiosh nash pi ab ha makiog g e-tho'ibiathag ahga. Kutsh hegam ab i s-wohoch mat hedai g Jiosh i ha ap'ech mat wo e tho'ibia.
44013049	Kutsh wehsko i e ahgahi g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus heg eda jewed.
44013050	Tsh wabshaba g Tutuligo am si i ha chu'amu hegam u'uwi mash am ha wehm e mihshmath ch hegam mash d haha'ichu heg eda kihhim. Kutsh ihtham am si i ha sho'igch g Paul ch Barnabas k gm hu si ha huhu'i ab amjed g e-jewedga.
44013051	Tsh ihtham gm hu hahawa si i shahmuth g jewed ab e-tahtad ab am ha chehgithch mat wo ha thagito nat pi pi ap ab hu i ha nei. Tsh gm hu hahawa hihi Iconium kihhim wui.
44013052	Kush hegam matsh ab i s-wohoch ab Antiok t ab si s-hehgig ch ab si u'ukch g gewkthag ab amjed g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
44014001	Kutsh am hab wa'ap e juh Iconium t am matsh g Tutuligo hemajkam ab ha wui gegokiwua. Paul ch Barnabas atsh am i wahp ha-cheopi ed k am si ha mihshmath. Kutsh mu'i ab i s-wohoch g Tutuligo mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha. Kutsh ha'i hegam mash am ha wehm e mihshmath hab wa'ap ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga.
44014002	Tsh wabshaba am i wuwha hegam Tutuligo matsh pi ab hu wohoch k am si i ha kudu g gawul mahs hemajkam. Kutsh ihtham s-ha keh'el g Paul ch Barnabas ch hegam ehp matsh ab i s-ha wohoch.
44014003	Sh wabshaba tash am oiopo ihtham Jesus chuhchai ha shahgith ch am si tasho ha mihshmath ab amjed g Jesus pihk elithadag. Tsh heg ab i ha mah g gewkthag mat hab wo wuath g si s-hasigam ha'ichu k hab masma wohokamch g ha-ahga.
44014004	Tsh hegam hemajkam am i e gawulkai mat ha'i ab ha wehmt g Jesus chuhchai k ha'i g ha-obga ab ha wehmt.
44014005	Tsh wehsijj hegam mat ab ha wui gegokiwua g Jesus chuhchai am hahawa i e ap'ech g e-wanimedtham ha wehm mat wo ha sho'igchuth k wo ha ma'ichshul.
44014006	Tsh ihtham am i s-mai mamtsh wo ha sho'igch k atsh gm hu wa hekaj ba'ich hahawa ep hihi Lystra kihhim wui. Ihtha Lystra o am hab chu'ig Lyconia jewed ch ed.
44014007	Kutsh am thatha k am ha ahgith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus.
44014008	Sh am ha wui hema thaha mash pi himthag ga hu i e-alijk amjed.
44014009	Tsh am i nei g Paul mo hab masma ab si kaiham g ahgaj mo ab si s-wohochuth mo g Jiosh woho ha thoajith. Tsh ab si shel i neith
44014010	k si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Oi g kekiwua.” Tsh gam si tha'iwush g pi himithkam k an has si oimmed.
44014011	Tsh am i nei g hemajkam matsh haschu has juh g Paul k ash am si e-ne'okikaj hihnk ch hab kaij, “Ia atki ha'i thatha g jijosh o'othham e wepogithch.
44014012	Ith oki d Zeus. Kuki heg d neoktham ch hab d Hermes.” Sh heg hab ahg Paul nash pi heg am neok.
44014013	Sh am mia kehk g ha-cheopi. Kush heg eda am kehshch g Zeus. Tsh am i ha wehmaj g ha-pahlig. Kutsh am ha u'apa g totolo ch ha'ichu heosig mat ab ha wui wo iagchul g Paul ch Barnabas.
44014014	Kutsh ith pi ha hohho'ithach. Tsh hab ab si wantsh g e-wehschuga k am si wohp ha shahgith g hemajkam k si hihnk ch hab kaij,
44014015	“Pi g hab wo t-elithath machs d jijosh. Thach wabsh o'othham hab masma mam ahpim. Ia att thatha matt am wo em-ahgi mamt wo ha'asa ihm hab masma mo d Jiosh hegai mo pi d wohokam Jiosh. Heg o d wohokam Jiosh mat nahto g thahm kahchim ch jewed kahchim ch wehs ha'ichu mo an hab chu'ig. Kumt heg wui ab wo i e thagito.
44014016	Heki o hu am hab wabsh junihim g hejel e-tatchui g nahnko mahs hemajkam. Kuki g Jiosh wabsh s-hemajim ha nakogahim.
44014017	K wabshaba chum hekith hab chu'ig mo am e chehgithahim no pi s-kehg ha'ichu hab em-junith ch ab em-mahkch g juhki ch ab bahijith g ha'ichu em-e'es mamt wo s-kokwogk ch wo si s-ap e tahtkkath.”
44014018	Neh, bash kaij ihtham Paul ch wabshaba chum alo pi ha shohbi nash pi chum si tatchua matsh ab ha'ichu wo iagchul ha wui.
44014019	Tsh am hahawa ha'i thatha hegam mash wa am ha sho'igchuth Antiok t am ch Iconium t am k am i ha nu'ichkwua g hemajkam. Kutsh ab wui gegokiwua g Paul k ma'ichkwua k am i chewaimed k gm hu i wuhshath ab kihhim t amjed k am wua hab elithch mat muh.
44014020	Tsh wabshaba am e chehm hegam mo ab ihm g Jesus k an wehgaj gegok g Paul. Tsh gam si i wamig k gm hu uhpam hih kihhim wui. Am ba'ich d i tash. Tsh gm hu hahawa hihi Derbe wui hegam Paul
44014021	k an i ha ahgithahi g Jesus ha'ichu ahga. Kutsh mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch. Tsh am hahawa hihi Lystra wui ch Iconium wui ch Antiok wui
44014022	k am si i ha gewkemhun mat am wo hihimath ch ab wo si hiwgath g Jesus. Ha-mashchama ash hab masma matt hemho wa mu'i ha'ichu wo nakog k am haha wo i wahp Jiosh kihthag ed.
44014023	Tsh am hahawa i ha chuhcha hegam mat d wo ha wanimedthamk am ha sha'ashagith mo hebai i e wehm e nanmek. Sh am hahawa wehsijj wabsh e ho'ige'ithahun ch hab he'ekkio pi e gegosith. Sh ihtham Jesus chuhchai ab hahawa i ha thathagitod Jiosh wui.
44014024	Neh, batsh wa masma am gahi wuwha g Pisidia jewed k gm hu thatha Pamphylia jewed ch ed
44014025	k am ha mihshmethahim Perga kihhim ch ed ch amjed gm hu hahawa ep hihi Attalia kihhim t am.
44014026	Tsh am i e nahto g ha-chikpan. Kutsh am gahi i shul ge shuhthagi ch ed an ge'e wahlko ch ed k gm hu thatha hegai Antiok t am mamtsh am i ha thagito Jiosh hemajimatalig ed.
44014027	Tsh am wehsijj i e hemapai hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus amai. Sh g Paul ch Barnabas am ha ahgith mat g Jiosh am si i ha wehmt k ab ha mah g nahnko mahs hemajkam g ap'ethag mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus.
44014028	Tash ash am thadkkahim ha wehm hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus amai Antiok t am.
44015001	Kutsh am ha'i thatha Antiok t ab ab Judea t amjed k hab chum ha ahg hegam matsh ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus, “Jiosh o am t-chehani Mosesbad o'ohana ed mat g chechoj hemho wa wo e o'oha an e pahl hikuchk. Kumt pi wo sha'i e tho'ibia mamtp pi hab wo e juh.”
44015002	Tsh wabshaba g Paul ch Barnabas pi sha'i hohho'i ihtha k am si ha ne'owi ihtham Judea t am Tutuligo. Tsh am hahawa i e ap'ech matsh g Paul ch Barnabas am wo hihi Jerusalem wui ha'i ep ha wehm k am wo s-mai mat has wo chei hegam ha'i ehp Jesus chuhchai ch ge'eged.
44015003	Tsh ihtham am hihim k am i ha ahgithahi hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus Phenicia jewed oithk ch Samaria jewed oithk mat g gawul mahs hemajkam ab i e nodagi Jesus wui. Kutsh wehsijj ab si s-ap i e tahtam k si s-hehgig ihtham mash hedai i kah.
44015004	Kutsh gd hu thatha Jerusalem t am. Tsh si s-ha ho'ige'el g Jesus chuhchai ch ge'eged ch wehsijj hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus amai. Tsh am hahawa ha ahgi mat haschu k ab am si i ha wehmt g Jiosh mat am hab juh.
44015005	Tsh wabshaba am ha'i ab ha wui gegokiwua hegam mash si s-gewkam oith g chehanig ch hab kaij, “Hemho wa at wo e o'oha an e pahl hikuchk g chechoj k am hab wo junihith hegai t-chehanig mo g Jiosh ab t-mahkch.”
44015006	Tsh am ep e nam g Jesus chuhchai ch ge'eged k tash am a'aga ihtha.
44015007	Tsh g Peter am i kekiwua k hab kaij: “Ni-wepnag, s-mahch am mant ga hu i wehpeg am ha ahgi g gawul mahs hemajkam g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g Jesus nat pi g Jiosh am i ni-gawulkai mant hab wo juh.
44015008	Jiosh o s-mahch g o'othham chegitoi ch ab ep ha mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab wa masma mat ahchim hab t-juh.
44015009	Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mo s-ha ho'ige'elith ch gm hu hab i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig mat ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj.
44015010	Pegih, m haschu ahgch ha'i pi'ichuth g Jiosh ab s-wehch ha'ichu ha mohto'ithch g wechij wohochuththam? Ahchim Tutuligo att pi sha'i t-nako machs wehs am hab wo junihith g t-chehanig. T g t-shohshon hab wa'ap pi sha'i e nako.
44015011	Pi attki hab masma wo t-tho'ibia. Heg at wo wa'i t-tho'ibia t-kownalig Jesus. Ab att i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj. T heg ab i s-t-ho'ige'ith k t-tho'ibia. Pegih, t hab wa'i masma wo e tho'ibia ihtham gawul mahs hemajkam.” Neh, bash kaij g Peter.
44015012	Sh am hahawa ha ahgith g Barnabas ch Paul mat haschu s-hasigam hab juh g Jiosh gewkthagkaj am ha shahgith g gawul mahs hemajkam. Kush wehsijj ab wabsh i pi shahmuni ch am ha kaiham.
44015013	Tsh am i ha'asa neneo. Tsh g James am i kuhgi g ha-ahga mash hab kaij, “Ni-wepnag, ab g wo i ni-kaiham.
44015014	Peter o am t-ahgith matsh has masma g Jiosh am chehgi mo pihk e elith ha hekaj g nahnko mahs hemajkam ch am ha'i i ha gawulkai mat d wo hemajkamgajk.
44015015	K ith am wohokamchuth mat wa has i masma an o'oha g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash wa hab kaij g Jiosh:
44015016	‘Neh, e at padch g Davidbad kownaltalig. K wabshaba ab him g tash mant am ep wo i ap'echuth k am hema wo i kei g amjedkam am kehkud ed mant heg gahi wuhshanim wo i himch g kownaltalig.
44015017	T g nahnko mahs hemajkam ab wo i ni-gahghi. Hegam ani ab i ha waith mat d wo ni-hemajkamgak.’
44015018	Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh ch heg am i t-tashogith heki hu wa'i amjed.
44015019	“Kuni hab ep s-che'imk mani hab hi elith matt pi ab hu wo ha mohto'i g t-chehanigkaj hegam gawul mahs hemajkam mat ab i e nohnogi Jiosh wui.
44015020	Tt hi wabsh wo ha ahgi mat has wo e junihith. T hab ab ha wui wo si s-ap e tahtkkath hegam t-wehm o'othham mo am ha wehm kihthag. Tt wabsh wo ha cheha mat wo si e nuhkuth g hejel e-wehm kihkam wehhejed ch pi ab hu wo ihm hab masma mo d Jiosh hegai mo pi d Jiosh ha'ichu ko'athch mo ab e to'ith ha wui k pi wo ko'ath g eh'ed ch hegai mo pi gm hu e iawua g eh'ed e mum'ajch.
44015021	Ith o wehsko si s-ap s-e mahch no pi an ahgachug wehs kihhim ch ed ch am e ne'okchulith t-wehm o'othham ha-chechopi ed.”
44015022	Tsh ihtham Jesus chuhchai ch ge'eged am i ap'ech am wehs ha wehm hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus amai matsh am ha'i wo i ha chuhcha. Tsh ihtham am wo i ha oi g Paul ch Barnabas am Antiok wui. Sh ihtham d ha-chuhchai Judas Barsabbas ch Silas nash pi g hemajkam ab si has ha elith.
44015023	Kutsh ab ha mah g o'ohana matsh wo bek am Antiok wui. Sh hab chu'ig ihtha o'ohana: “T-naipijju mam d gawul mahs hemajkam ch ab ihm g Jesus ch ab kihthag Antiok t ab ch Syria t ab ch Cilicia t ab. B ach si em-ho'ige'elith ahchim mach d Jesus chuhchai ch ge'eged ia Jerusalem t ab.
44015024	“Ihtham Barnabas ch Paul o ab t-ahgith mat am ha'i hihi g t-wehm o'othham k am em-kudu am ha'ichu pi ap em-ahgithk. Kuch eda wa chum pi sha'i ha ap'echuth mat hab wo e juh.
44015025	Kutt heg hekaj wehsijj ia t-hemapath k am i ap'ech matt has wo t-juh. B o si i s-ap e thagitokch ihtham Barnabas ch Paul am chikpanaj ed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ ch hekaj chum alo e ko'ij.
44015027	Kutt gohk ep i ha chuhcha mat am wo i ha oith k si s-ap wo em-ahgi mach haschu i em-o'ohanith. K d ihtham Judas ch Silas.
44015028	T am i t-tashogi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mattki pi ab hu wo i em-mohto'i g t-chehanig ahchim Tutuligo k wabsh wo em-ahgi ihtha mamt am hab hi wo wa junihith. T hab wabsh si s-ap wo e tahtkkath em-wui hegam t-wehm o'othham mo am em-wehm kihthag.
44015029	Neh, pi amt wo ko'ath g eh'ed ch hegai mo pi gm hu e iawua g eh'ed e mum'ajch ch pi wo ko'ath hegai mo ab e to'ith mo haschu hab chum e elith mo d jiosh. Mt wo si e nuhkuth g hejel e-wehm kihkam wehhejed. Mamtp wo si e nuhkuth ith ab k am wo wa s-ap'ek. T g Jiosh am wo wa em-wehmajk.”
44015030	Kutsh am hahawa gm hu hihi ihtham Barnabas ch Paul ch Judas ch Silas k gm hu thatha Antiok t am. Tsh am i e hemapai hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus. Kutsh am i ha mah g o'ohana.
44015031	Tsh ihtham am ne'okchulith k si s-ap i e taht natsh pi heg hekaj ab si i e gewkemhu.
44015032	Kush g Judas ch Silas hab wa'ap d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch am thadkkahim he'es i tash ch mu'i ha'ichukaj am i ha gewkemhu.
44015033	Kumtsh am hahawa s-ap i ha thagito mat wo uhpam hihi.
44015034	[Tsh wabshaba g Silas hab i e ah mat wabsh ha wehm wo thakath.]
44015035	Sh g Paul ch Barnabas he'es i tash am thadkkahim Antiok t am am ha jehnigithch ab amjed g Jesus. Sh mu'ijj hab wa'ap ha ahgith g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus.
44015036	Sh am hu hebai amjed, sh hab kaij g Paul ab Barnabas wui, “Am att ep wo hihim k am wo i ha gewkemhu wehs kihhim ch ed mach wa hebai ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k am wo ha nei mas has wa'i masma.”
44015037	Kush g Barnabas hab chum kaij mat wo bek g John Mark.
44015038	Tsh wabshaba g Paul pi hohho'i mat wo bek nat pi wa am wabsh i ha thagito Pamphylia t am k pi am hu ha wehm i nahto g chikpan.
44015039	Kutsh ith am si pi ha ap'et. Tsh hekaj i e gawulkai. Kutsh g Barnabas bek g Mark k gn hu aigo i shul ge'e wahlkokaj Cyprus jewed t am.
44015040	Tsh wabshaba g Paul g Silas am epai bek mat wo oi. Kumtsh am e ho'ige'ithahun k am i ha thagito Jiosh hemajimatalig ed.
44015041	Tsh ihtham Paul am hihi Syria ch Cilicia jejewed oithk k am i ha gewkemhunahim hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus.
44016001	Kutsh hegam Paul am hahawa hihi Derbe kihhim wui k amjed gm hu thatha Lystra kihhim t am. Kush eda amai am hema kih g wechij o'othham ch am oith g Jesus himthag ch hab chehgig Timothy. K g je'ej hab wa'ap am oith g Jesus himthag ch d Tuhligo uwi. Sh wabshaba g ohgbadaj d Greek hemajkam.
44016002	Sh wehsijj g Jesus ihmtham am Lystra t am ch Iconium t am am si wehhejed neok g Timothy.
44016003	Tsh g Paul s-behim g Timothy e wehm. Sh eda wehs s-mahch g Tutuligo amai mat g ohgbadaj pi pahl hikuch g Timothy. Tsh heg hekaj g Paul an pahl hikuch k hahawa bek.
44016004	Kutsh am hihim k hebai i thaiw kihhim t am ch am ha ahgith hegam mo ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga hegai matsh ha o'ohani g Jesus chuhchai ch ge'eged am Jerusalem t am k hab ha ahgith mat s-ap am hab wo chum junihith.
44016005	Tsh am i mu'itha hegam mash am e wehm e mihshmath wehs kihhim ch ed. Tsh g ha-wohochuthadag am i gewka.
44016006	Tsh am gahi wuwha g Phrygia jewed ch Galasia jewed ihtham Paul k am ahgahim g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus. Tsh wabshaba pi ha hiwigi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mas am wo i ahgahi am Asia jewed ch ed.
44016007	Tsh gm hu thatha mo an i chekshani g Mysia jewed k hab chum i e ah mat imhab uhpam wo hihi Bithynia jewed wui. Tsh wabshaba ep pi ha hiwigi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
44016008	Tsh hekaj gm hu gahi hihi Mysia jewed oithk k gm hu thatha Troas kihhim t am. Kunt am ha nam ahni Luke.
44016009	Tsh g Jiosh am ha'ichu hab juh nenaj ed g Paul. Sh am hema neith g Macedonia jewed t am o'othham. Kush ith ab kehk ch hab kaij, “Ab g i hihm Macedonia wui k wo i t-wehmt.”
44016010	T g Paul am hahawa t-ahgi ihtha. Kuch hab kaij moki tatchua g Jiosh matt am wo hihim k am wo i ha ahgithahi g ha'ichu ahgaj. Tt am ha hekaj i t-nako matt am aigo i chehchsh Macedonia jewed t am.
44016011	Kutt an ha hekaj gahi i shul g ge'e shuhthagi ge'e wahlko ch ed k ga hu thatha Samothrace kihhim t ab. Am ba'ich d i tash, tt am thatha Neapolis kihhim t am
44016012	k amjed gm hu ba'ich i wahp mo am d Philippi kihhim amai wehpeg chekshani ch ed g Macedonia jewed. Ihtha Philippi o d si s-has ha'ichu. K mu'i am thadha g si ge'e kownal shonthalig. Kuch am he'es i ha'ichugkahim ith eda kihhim.
44016013	Pi o am hu hema kehk g Tutuligo hemajkam ha-cheopi. Kutt heg hekaj am hihi mo an ge akimelig kihhim aigo mach hab t-ahg mo am hu hebai apchuthas mo am e ho'ige'ithahun g Tutuligo. K am hebai e hemapaithch g u'uwi. Kutt am i thadhaiwua k am ha wehm neneo.
44016014	K hema hegam u'uwi hab chehgig Lydia ch ab amjed g Thyatira kihhim ch d s-ihbhaimagi lohba gagdatham ch ab si ihm g Jiosh. Jiosh at ab i mah g wohochuthadag. Kut ab s-wohog el g Paul
44016015	k e pahl wako. T wehs hab wa'ap e juh g wehmaj kihkam. K hab hahawa kaij g Lydia, “Oi g wo t-oith k am t-wehm wo i thadhaiwua t-kih am nach pi d hahawa em-wehm wohochuththam.” Kutt wa woho hab t-juh heg hekaj mat pi t-thagito k ab ep t-waith.
44016016	Kuch am hu hebai am hihim matt gm hu wo hihi mo am e ho'ige'ithahun. T ab hema i t-oi g uwi. Kuki g jiawul an u'ukch ch ab mahkch g amichuthadag mo gm hu ba'ich tash ha'ichu ahg. K am ha'i si u'ukch ch mu'i lial u'u ab amjed mo am ha'ichu ha ahgith g hemajkam.
44016017	T ihtha uwi ab i t-oith k si hihnk ch hab kaij, “Ihtham o'othham o d piongaj g si uhgchu Jiosh ch am em-ahgithahim mamt has masma wo e tho'ibia.”
44016018	Neh, bo kaij ch mu'i tashkaj an t-oithahim. T am hahawa pi e nako g Paul k ab si sikol i kekiwua k hab kaij ab jiawul wui, “Jesus Christ gewkthagkaj ani ab si m-chehani mapt wo thagito ihtha chehia.” T am wa i hekaj thagito g jiawul.
44016019	T am i nei hegam mo an u'ukch mat hahawa pi has masma ep wo u'uth g lial heg hekaj chehia k hekaj an ha ui g Paul ch Silas k gm hu i ha chewaim haha'ichu ha wui. Ihtham o am thadha si eda g kihhim.
44016020	K hegam mat am i ha ui g Paul ch Silas hab ha ahg, “Ihtham o d Tutuligo. Kutt ha cheh mo ha kudut g ia kihkam
44016021	no pi chum t-ahgith mash hema d si ge'e kownal mattsh ab wo chum si has elithath. K eda pi hiwgithas machs hab wo t-wuath nach pi ab si wecho g Rome kownal. K pi d t-wuikam ihtha ha'ichu ha-ahga.”
44016022	T wehsijj hegam mat ab i e hemapai ab i ha wehmt k ab ha wui gegokiwua g Paul ch Silas. T g haha'ichu gm hu wuashul g ha-wehschuga k am ha'i ha chehani mat wo ha gewitta.
44016023	Kumt am i si s-ko'okam ha gewittani k gd hu ha u'apa kukpaikud wui k hab ahgith g lilso ha nuhkuththam mat si s-wihnam wo ha kuh.
44016024	T wa woho hab e juh k gd hu si chuhko ha kuh k an ha wahpki g ha-kakhio uhs wupulshpadag ed.
44016025	Kutsh am eda i huh g s-chuhugam. Sh g Paul ch Silas am si e ho'ige'ithahun ch si ne'eth ch ab si ihm g Jiosh. Sh am ha'i ep kuhkpi g lilso ch ha kaiham.
44016026	T am haha wabsh si s-gewkam ugij g jewed. Tsh g kukpaikud am si wehs u'ugij. Tsh gam si e kuhkpi'o g kukpaikud kuhkpadag. Tsh g ha-wupulshpadag e padch.
44016027	Tsh ab si i nea g ha nuhkuththam k hab e ahg mat ne'iopa g lilso k hekaj an bei g is-pahyo mat wo hejel e mua.
44016028	Sh wabshaba g Paul am si s-kaitham hihnk ch hab kaij, “Pi g am hejel e mua'i. Ia ach wabsh i wehs ha'ichug.”
44016029	Tsh am hahawa bei g lahmpa k am si med k am i wahk k si gigiwuk. Sh am wabsh kia thadha g lilso. Kutsh ab i gei ha wecho g Paul ch Silas
44016030	k ab i ha wuwhasith k ab ha kakke, “Shahnt masma wo ni-tho'ibia?”
44016031	Sh hab kaij ihtham Paul, “B apt wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. T heg wo m-tho'ibia. T ihtham m-wehm kihkam m ia gegok hab wa'ap wo e juh.”
44016032	Tsh ihtham Paul am hahawa i ha mihshmath ab amjed g Jesus.
44016033	Tsh am ha hekaj i ha u'u k ab i wako g eh'ed mat wa am ha gewitta. Tsh amjed am ha hekaj i e nakog k e pahl-wapko g e-wehm kihkam ha wehm
44016034	k gn hu hahawa i ha wahpki g Paul ch Silas e-kih ed k ha gegos. Kush si s-hehgig ihtha wehs ha wehm g e-wehm kihkam no pi ab hahawa wohochuth g Jiosh.
44016035	Sh am ba'ich d i si'alim. Tsh g haha'ichu am ha ahgi g chich-lilihi mat wo ha thagito ihtham Paul.
44016036	Sh hegai lilso ha nuhkuththam ab ahgith g Paul ch hab kaij, “Ia at gei g ahga ab ha amjed g haha'ichu matsh wo em-thagito. Mt gamai wabsh s-ap e taht k wo hihi.”
44016037	Kush wabshaba g Paul hab kaij ab ha wui g chich-lilihi, “Pi att hab wo t-juh. Hemho wa at ab wo i hihi hegam s-has haha'ichu k ia wo i t-wuwhas am ha tahgio g hemajkam nat pi t-gewitta am ha tahgio wa chum pi mahchch mas haschu d t-chu'ichig. K heg pi d chum t-wuikam nach pi u'ukch g t-shel hab masma mo g Rome t am hemajkam.”
44016038	Kush g chich-lilihi am hahawa ha ahgith g s-has haha'ichu mo has kaij. Tsh am i kah ihtha k si e totothsith k am hihim
44016039	k ab ha ahgi mat wabsh wo i s-ha ho'ige'el k am hahawa i ha wuwhasith k hab ha ahg mat hig gm hu wo hihi ab amjed g kihhim.
44016040	T g Paul ch Silas am i wuwhag k gm hu hihi Lydia kih wui. Kut am e nam hegam mat ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus. T ihtham Paul ab si i ha gewkemhun k gm hu hahawa hihi.
44017001	Tsh ihtham Paul am wabsh gahi wuwha g Amphipolis kihhim ch Apollonia kihhim k gm hu thatha Thessalonica kihhim t am. Sh am hema kehk g Tutuligo ha-cheopi.
44017002	Tsh heg wui am hihi hegam Paul mo hab wa e wua chum hekith. Tsh g Paul am ha wehm a'aga ab amjed g Jiosh o'ohana k ith hekaj am chum wohokamch mat g Jiosh si Kehsha hemho wa wo e sho'igchuth k wo e mu'a k wabshaba ep wo i wuhsh ab muhkig t amjed. Sh hab ep kaij, “Ihtha Jesus mani ia mahsko wua em-shahgith d hegai Jiosh si Kehsha.” Sh waik thomig oitham am ha jehnigith mihshmetha tash ab.
44017004	Kutsh ha'i ab i s-wohochuth k ab i ha wehmt hegam Paul. Tsh mu'i hegam Greek hemajkam ch hegam s-has ha'ichu u'uwi mash ab ihm g Jiosh ab hab wa'ap i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga k ha wehmt. Sh hema ihtham hab chehgig Jason. Tsh wabshaba ha'i s-ha hehgam g Tutuligo. Kush am ha'i oiopo g s-papadmakam ch am i ha wehmt hegam Tutuligo k am i ha kudut g kihkam. Kutsh wabsh woho i babgat k am hihim k am wabsh si wahp Jason kih ed mat am wo ha ui g Paul ch Silas k am wo ha u'apa hemajkam ha wui.
44017006	Sh wabshaba pi am hu ha'ichug. Kush heg hi wa Jason am tha. Kush ha'i ep thadha g wehmaj wohochuththam. Kumtsh ihtham ha u'u k am i ha chewaim haha'ichu ha wui k si hihnk ch hab kaij, “Ia at ha'i thatha g o'othham k ash wa wehsko ha kudut g hemajkam ch ab wui gegok g si uhgchu kownal hab kaijch mo am hema d ep kownal ch hab chehgig Jesus. K ihtha Jason ab ha to'akch e-kih ab.”
44017008	Neh, bash kaij ch hekaj ab si i ha kudut g hemajkam ch haha'ichu mat wabsh woho'i babgat.
44017009	Tsh g haha'ichu am cheha g Jason ch hegam ha'i mat wo ha namkith ha'akia mo haschu d i ha-chehanig. Kutsh am hab e juh. Tsh hahawa ha thagito.
44017010	Tsh am i s-chuk. Tsh hegam Jesus ihmtham am ha ahgi ihtham Paul matsh gm hu wo hihi Berea kihhim wui. Tsh gd hu thatha k am ha hekaj hihi Tutuligo ha-cheopi wui.
44017011	Tsh ihtham s-ap ab i ha nei. Sh am ha mihshmath. Kush si s-hohho'ith ch ab kaiham g ha'ichu ha-ahga ch wehs tashkaj am si hoan g Jiosh heki hu o'ohana mat wo s-mai mas wa woho hegai mash g Paul am ha ahgith.
44017012	Tsh mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch g Tutuligo. Tsh mu'ijj g gawul mahs hemajkam hab wa'ap ab i s-wohoch. Ha'i ihtham ash d s-has haha'ichu u'uwi.
44017013	Tsh am wabsh i chum kah g Tutuligo am Thessalonica t am mash ihtham Paul am ha mihshmath Berea t am hab wa ehp k am ha hekaj i hihim k am i ha kudu g hemajkam.
44017014	Kutsh heg hekaj am ahgi g Paul hegam mash ab s-wohochuth mat gm hu wo hih ge kahchki hugithgo. Tsh wabshaba g Silas am wa'i wih Berea t am g Timothy wehm.
44017015	Tsh hegam matsh am i bei g Paul gm hu u'apa Athens kihhim t am. Tsh am hahawa ha ahgi g Paul mat wo ha ahgi g Silas ch Timothy mamt hekith wo i e nakog k ab ha hekaj wo i hihi. Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa uhpam hihi ihtham e-kihhim wui.
44017016	Sh am thaha g Paul Athens t am ch am ha nenida g Silas ch Timothy. Sh eda wehsko chuhch g ha-jijoshta. Sh g Paul am ha neith ihtham ch hab si pi ap e tahtk.
44017017	Tsh am wabsh ap'et mat ha wehm wo si i a'aga g hemajkam am ha-cheopi ed. Kush am ha'i ha wehm e mihshmath g gawul mahs hemajkam. Sh g Paul am epai kuaya ch ed ha wehm ha'ichu i a'aga ab amjed g Jesus am ha ahgithch mat g ko'i wo i wuwha ab muhkig t amjed. Sh am ha'i d jewed t ab ha'ichu s-chu a'amichuththam ch wabsh ab uhpam i ne'owi g Paul. Sh ha'ijj hab kaij, “K haschu hab chum ahg ihtha pi ha'ichu amichuththam o'othham?” Kush ha'i hab ep kaij, “Shahag wepo mo g mehk jewed thahm jijosh am ha a'aga.”
44017019	Kush eda hegam kihkam ch hegam mo am wabsh sha thadha s-hohho'ith mat tash oitham wo kaihamath ch wo a'agath hegai mo haschu d si wechij ahga. (19) Kumtsh ab i bei g Paul k gd hu u'apa mo am e nanmek k hab kaij ab wui, “Shah'o d ahga ihtha wechij mashchama map ab amjed neok. (20) Pi ach am wa chum amichuth.”
44017022	Tsh am hahawa kekiwua g Paul k hab kaij, “Ahpim kihkam amki ab si has ha elith g jijosh.
44017023	Am ani neith m an chuhch g em-jijoshta kahya oithk. Kuki am hema kehk g iagchulithakud mo ith an o'ohanas, ‘Ia amt wo ha'ichu thai heg wehhejed jiosh mattp hems pi mahch.’ Pegih, ihtha pi em-machiga o d hegai mant am haha wo em-ahgi ab amjed.
44017024	“Tho ihtha Jiosh mat wehs ha'ichu nahto ch d kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. Wehsko o an ha'ichug g Jiosh. K pi hab sha'i mahs mas am hebai wabsh wo e thai hab masma mam hab ha wua g e-jijoshta.
44017025	Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g thoakag ch wehs ha'ichu. K pi am hu ha'ichu d sha'i hegai mas ab i si tatchua ab amjed g o'othham mat ab wo mah chikpank.
44017026	“Jiosh at am hemako nahto g o'othham k ab amjed i wuhshath g wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam k an a'ai i ha gantad wehsko jewed oithk mat hebai heki hu i ap'ech mat an wo kihkath.
44017027	K hab d elithaj mat am wo i e gahgithahi g Jiosh k atp hems wo cheh. Pi o sha'i mehk ab hema i t-amjed
44017028	ch ab t-mahkch g thoakag ch kihthag. Ha'ijj g em-wehm o'othham o d ha'ichu a'amichuththam ch hab kaij, ‘Ahchim hemajkam ach d Jiosh a'aliga.’
44017029	“Pegih neh, ith o d wohokam mach d a'aligaj g Jiosh. Tt pi hab wo ge t-ahgath mas g wohokam Jiosh hab mahs mo ihtham em-jijoshta mat wabsh g o'othham am nahto g ohlakaj o g plahthakaj o g hothaikaj.
44017030	Heki o hu pi mahch g hemajkam g Jiosh tatchui. K g Jiosh si s-hemajim am ha nakog. Ni wabshaba hemu em-ahgith mo hahawa ab si i ha chehani g hemajkam wehsko mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.
44017031	Am at i ap'ech g tash mat wehs wo ha lothai g hemajkam k heki hu am hema si i kei mat hab wo juh g lothaita. Tsh ith ia mahsi t-shahgith k ia oimmelhim ch e muhkith. Tsh g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig t amjed mat wo wohokamch mo d si Kehshaj.” Neh, bash kaij g Paul.
44017032	Tsh ihtham am i kah mo hab kaij matsh hema i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed. Kush ha'ijj wabsh si ash ch wabshaba ha'i hab kaij, “Am g wa ep t-jehnigith ab amjed ihtha.”
44017033	Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hih g Paul.
44017034	Tsh ha'i ab s-wohochuth k ab i wehmt. Sh hema ihtham d Dionysius ch d hema hegam s-chu a'amichuththam. Kush am hema d ep uwi ch hab chehgig Damaris.
44018001	Tsh gm hu hahawa hih g Paul ab Athens t amjed k am him k am jiwia Corinth kihhim t am.
44018002	Sh am hema thaha g Tuhligo ch hab chehgig Aquila ch ab d mahsikam Pontus t ab. K g wehmaj kihkam hab chehgig Priscilla. Ihtham o d ikus kihttham. Kutsh hab wa e juh am ha tahgio matsh g ge'e kownal Claudius gm hu ha huhu'i Tutuligo ab amjed g Rome kihhim. Sh ihtham Aquila ch Priscilla am ahhio Corinth wui.
44018003	Tsh g Paul am i ha chehgim k am ha wehm i thahiwua k am ha wehm chikpan no pi hab d wa'ap ikus kihttham.
44018004	Kush wehs mihshmetha tash am hihim Tutuligo ha-cheopi wui mat am wo ha'ichu i ha tashogi ab amjed g Jesus. Kush am ha'i ep ha wehm e mihshmath hegam mo pi d Tutuligo ch am kah g ha'ichu ahgaj.
44018005	Kutsh am i thatha g Silas ch Timothy ab Macedonia jewed t amjed. Tsh g Paul am hahawa i thagito g e-chikpan k heg am himch matsh am hahawa si i ha mihshmath am si s-mahch ch ahg ab ha wui g Tutuligo mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha mat wo t-tho'ibia.
44018006	Tsh wabshaba ab wui gegokiwua ihtham k am si pi ap has ahg. Tsh oi wa g Paul ab si i shahmuth g e-wehschuga ha wui mat wo ha chehgi mat ha thagito k hab kaij, “That wo hejel em-chu'ichigk mamtp wo sha pi e tho'ibia. T ahni pi ab hu ha'ichu d wo ni-chu'ichigk. Nt ia'i amjed g gawul mahs hemajkam ab wo i ha mihshmath.”
44018007	Neh, tsh ia'i thagito g ha-cheopi k gd hu hahawa ha mihshmath g hemajkam hema kih am g gawul mahs o'othham. Ith ash ab ihm g Jiosh ch hab chehgig Titius Justus ch an kih hugithaj an g Tutuligo ha-cheopi.
44018008	Kutsh mu'i ep ab i s-wohoch am i kahk k am e pahl wapko. Hema ash d chum ha wanimedtham g Tutuligo ch hab chehgig Crispus ch ab i s-wohoch g e-wehm kihkam ha wehm.
44018009	Tsh am hu hebai chuhug ch ed am ha'ichu hab e juh Paul nena ed mash kah g Jesus. Kush ab wui hab kaij, “Pi g am sha'i ha'ichu ehbithath. Ia ani m-wehmaj ch pi hedai wo shai hiwigi mas wo s-ko'okam m-juh. Pi g sha'i ha'asa ha mihshmath. Mu'ijj o ia kih ith eda kihhim mat d wo ni-hemajkamgak.”
44018011	Sh heg hekaj hemako ahithag ch eda hugkam ehp am ha'ichugkahim ch am ha mashcham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
44018012	Tsh am hahawa hema i thahiwua g kownal am Greek hemajkam ha-jewedga am k hab chehgig Gallio. Tsh g Tutuligo am i e hemapath k an bei g Paul k am u'apa ge'e kih t am
44018013	k hab kaij, “Ihtha o'othham o chum ha chehani g hemajkam mat hab masma ab wo i ihmath g Jiosh mam has masma pi t-hiwgith.”
44018014	Kutsh am haha wabsh wo i chum neo g Paul. Sh wabshaba Gallio hab ha ahg, “Pi oki ab wui kehk g ge'e kownal chehanig. T heg hekaj pi wo ni-ap'et mant ab wo em-kaiha.
44018015	Thoki wabsh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g em-himthag ch ab hema i amjed g em-wehm o'othham. Mt heg hekaj am hejel wo i ap'ech. Pi ant am hu wo sha'i i hudaw hab mahs ha'ichu.”
44018016	Neh, bash kaij ch gm hu si i ha wuwhas ge'e kih amjed.
44018017	Kutsh ihtham an wabsh si bei hegai mash d ha wanimedtham am cheopi ch ed ch hab chehgig Sosthenes k am si gewitta ge'e kih bahsho. Tsh pi ab hu has sha'i e taht g Gallio.
44018018	Sh mu'i tash am ha'ichugkahim g Paul Corinth kihhim t am ha wehm hegam mash ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Tsh amjed hab i e ah matsh gm hu uhpam wo hih Syria jewed wui. Sh eda gm hu hihhim g ge'eged wapalko Cenchrea kihhim t amjed. Kutsh gm hu hih g Paul. Tsh g Priscilla ch Aquila gm hu oi. Tsh koi am hu i chehchsh ge'e wahlko ch ed, tsh g Paul hih g e-mo'o matsh wa am he'es i tash pi hih mo d ha-himthag heg hekaj mat ab ha'ichu ah'ath g Jiosh.
44018019	Tsh am hahawa gahi i shul g ge'e wahlkokaj k ga hu thatha Ephesus kihhim t am. Kutsh am i thadhaiwua g Priscilla ch Aquila. Tsh g Paul am hih mat am wo sha i wah Tutuligo ha-cheopi ed k am ha wehm ha'ichu a'aga.
44018020	Sh ihtham ab ahgith mat am wabsh wo i wih ha wehm. Tsh wabshaba pi e nako
44018021	k ash hab wabsh ha ahg am wo i himk, “Matp g Jiosh d wo tatchuik, nt wo wa uhpam ep jiwia.” Neh, bash kaij ch amjed ab i chesh ge'e wahlko t ab.
44018022	Tsh heg gm hu gahi i gei Cesaria kihhim t am. Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hih g Paul Jerusalem wui k am i ha chehgim g e-wehm wohochuththam. Am he'es i tash, tsh gm hu hahawa ep gahi i chesh Antiok t am.
44018023	Sh am he'es i ha'ichugkahim amai ch am hahawa ep ha thagito k atsh gm hu hahawa ep hih ha oithk g Galasia ch Phrygia jejewed k am i ha gewkemhunahim g e-wehm wohochuththam.
44018024	Tsh am hema jiwia g Tuhligo Ephesus kihhim t am k hab chehgig Apollos ch ab d mahsikam Alexandria kihhim t ab ch si s-e mahch ab s-neokimakam t ab ch ash si ge'e s-mahch g Jiosh o'ohana.
44018025	Kumtsh heki hu mashcha ab amjed g Jesus. Kush si s-hohho'ith ch am ahgahim ch si s-ap ha mashcham ch eda heg wa'i s-mahch John pahl wakona.
44018026	Tsh am i kah hegam Priscilla ch Aquila nash pi am si ha mihshmath Tutuligo ha-cheopi ed. Tsh ihtham am i wai e-kih wui k am s-ap ahgith mo haschu i koi s-mahch ab amjed g Jesus.
44018027	Kutsh hab hahawa i e ah g Apollos mat am wo hih Greece jewed wui. Tsh am i wehmt hegam mash ab s-wohochuth g s-kehg ha'ich ahgaj g Jiosh ch am kih Ephesus t am k am ha o'ohani g e-wehm wohochuththam amai Greece ch ed k ab si ha ahgith mat s-ap ab wo i nei g Apollos. Tsh gm hu jiwia k ab si ge'e i ha wehmt.
44018028	Sh am ha'i ne'owin g Tutuligo. Tsh wabshaba am ha gewito am ha-kaichuthch g mu'i hemajkam k am si i wohokamch heg hekaj Jiosh o'ohana mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha mat wo ha tho'ibia g hemajkam.
44019001	Tsh gm hu ba'ich ep hih g Paul k gd hu jiwia Ephesus t am mo eda g Apollos am oimmed Corinth t am. Kush am ha'i kih ch ab chum s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
44019002	Sh g Paul ab ha kakke, “Namt am wa bei g gewkthag ab amjed g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mamt hekith ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga?” Sh hab kaij hegam, “Pi ach koi hebai sha'i kah mas am ha'ichu d Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.”
44019003	Sh hab hahawa kaij g Paul, “A namt koi e pahl wapko g Jesus pahl wakonakaj?” Sh hab kaij, “Pi koi. Johnbad pahl wakonakaj att t-wapko.”
44019004	Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Paul, “M o wa woho mash heg am ha ahgith mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi ch wabshaba am ep ha ahgith mat ab wo i s-wohoch hegai mat am epai wo i e maskogi. K heg d Jesus.”
44019005	Tsh ihtham ab i s-wohochuth k e pahl wapko ab chehchegch g Jesus.
44019006	Tsh g Paul an i ha tahtamahim k ab ihmahim g Jiosh. Tsh ab si i bei g gewkthag ab amjed d Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag k am si gawul ne'okikaj neneok mat pi hebai mai ch am ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
44019007	Kush am hu d i gamai gohk ihtham chechoj.
44019008	Sh am wapke g Paul Tutuligo ha-cheopi ed ch am ha wehm ha'ichu si i a'aga waik mashath ab chum s-ap s-ha mahtchuthamk ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.
44019009	Tsh wabshaba ha'i pi wohochuth k wabsh si pi ap neneok ab amjed g Jesus himthag am ha kaichuthch g hemajkam. Tsh heg hekaj am ha thagito g Paul k gm hu hih ha u'uk hegam mat ab i s-wohoch. Sh am hema d Tyrannus ch ge mashchamakud ch ith ha hiwigi. Kush heg eda g Paul am ha wehm a'aga g Jiosh kownaltalig wehs tashkaj
44019010	gohk ahith ab. Tsh wehsko e kah g Jesus ahga heg eda Asia jewed.
44019011	Kush g Jiosh am si i wehmaj g Paul mash am hab junihim g s-hasigam ha'ichu.
44019012	Sh g hemajkam chum hems ab u'u g Paul ha'ichu eniga ch hekaj ab tattam g kok'otham. Kush ha thothad. Tsh g jijawul im hu hab wo i e juh ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.
44019013	Sh eda an ha'i ep oiopo g Tutuligo ch hab chum e wua mo im hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed g hemajkam. Kush am hema g uhgchu pahl hab chehgig Sceva ch wewa'ak a'alithag. Sh ihtham hab wa'ap chum im hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed g hemajkam. Am hu hebai, sh ihtham am hema neith g o'othham mash g jiawul an u'ukch ch hab kaij, “Ab g i thagito ihtha o'othham, ahpi jiawul. Bani si m-ahgith heg gewkthagkaj Jesus mo g Paul ab amjed ha mihshmath.”
44019015	Sh wabshaba hab kaij g jiawul ab ha wui, “S-mahch ani g Jesus ch ep s-mahch mo hedai wud hegai Paul ch wabshaba ahpim pi sha'i em-mahch mams hedai wud.”
44019016	Kutsh ihtha cheoj mo g jiawul an si u'ukch haha wabsh ha thathge k s-ko'okam ha juh. Tsh gm hu ne'iopa ab amjed g kihj k d wabsh i eh'ed. K g ha-wehschuga wantshas.
44019017	Kutsh wehsijj kah ihtha amai Ephesus t am k atsh si s-ehbeni k ab si has i el g t-kownalig Jesus.
44019018	Tsh mu'ijj hegam matsh ab i s-wohoch s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus am i e hemapath k mahsko wua g pi ap e-chu'ichig am wehs ha tahgio g hemajkam.
44019019	Tsh mu'ijj hegam mash hab chum e elith mo d mamakai am u'apa hegam e-o'ohana mo an ahgas g hihoina k am ha chehgith k ha mei. Tsh eda am i kuint g ha-namkig ihtham o'ohana mash am mei. Kutsh ai g hetaspo wehst-mahm mihl pihsh (50,000).
44019020	Kutsh hab masma hekaj si s-gewkam am i hih g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus k am i e gantad. Sh g hemajkam ba'ich i s-gewkam ab u'ukch.
44019021	Tsh amjed hab i e ah g Paul matsh gm hu wo hih Macedonia ch Greece jejewed oithk k amjed gm hu haha wo hih Jerusalem wui k amjed am Rome wui wo hih.
44019022	Kush eda g Timothy ch Erastus am wehmaj. Kush am ha ahgith g Paul matsh am wo hihi Macedonia wui. Tsh g Paul am wih Asia ch ed he'es i tash.
44019023	Kutsh ia'i ithani am i e kudu g hemajkam ab Ephesus t ab heg hekaj Jesus himthag.
44019024	Amai ash am hema kehk g ge'e cheopi. Kush am eda e kehshch g uwi ha-jioshga ch hab chehgig Artemis. Kush am hema d plahtha chikpantham ch hab chehgig Demetrius. Sh ith pionag g plahthakaj ha nahto g al kihki mo heg wepogithas cheopi ch mu'i nahto g lial ha gagdathch.
44019025	Kutsh g Demetrius am i ha hemapai hegam mash hab wa'ap mahs chikpan hab wua k am si s-gewkam hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ni-naipijju, s-mahch am mo g s-t-kaistalig ab him ith amjed chikpan.
44019026	Kum eda si neith ch ep kah ihtha hab chehgi Paul mo hab kaij mo ihtham t-jijoshga pi d sha'i jijosh. T hab am gawul juh g e-chegitoi g mu'i hemajkam ab i s-wohochuthk iia Ephesus t am ch chum alo wehsko am Asia jewed oithk.
44019027	Kut wo e padch g t-chikpan nat pi pi ab hu hab masma wo e ihmath g Artemis mo hemuch wehsko ab si e ihm. T g cheopigaj pi ab hu wo e ha'ichuch.”
44019028	Tsh am i kah ihtham mat am e hemapai k atsh si babgat k si s-kaitham hihnk ch hab kaij, “B ach si has elith g t-jioshga Artemis.”
44019029	Sh wehsko kaithag g ha-hihinki ch wehs ha babgach g kihkam. Tsh gohk ha ui hegam mash am wehmaj g Paul k am ha u'apa chichwikud ed. Hegam mamtsh ha ui ash d Gaius ch Aristarcas.
44019030	Tsh g Paul am chum s-wahkim ha shahgith. Tsh wabshaba g wehmaj wohochuththam pi hiwigi.
44019031	Tsh ha'i hegam mash d haha'ichu ch d naipijjuj g Paul hab wa'ap ahgith matsh pi am hu wo hih mamt am i ha ui ihtham gohk.
44019032	Tsh eda heg oitham am i si e gewkai g kudutadag. Sh ha'ijj si hihnk has i kaitham. Sh ha'i am wa gawul ha'ichu ep hihnk heg hekaj mash mu'ijj pi sha'i mahch mas haschu ahgch ia e chehm.
44019033	Tsh g Tutuligo am hema i kei mat am wo him k ab wo i kekiwua ha wehhejed k am wo ha ahgi mo pi d ha-chu'ichig g Tutuligo. Ith ash hab chehgig Alexander ch am wabsh i chum ha ba'ich i kekiwua mat am wo neo.
44019034	Tsh am i nei g hemajkam mo d Tuhligo k pi ab hu sha'i kaiham k wabsh si hihnk e wehm am hu i gohk ohla ab hab kaijch, “B ach si has elith g t-jioshga Artemis.”
44019035	Tsh g s-has ha'ichu o'ohantham ha shohbi g hemajkam ash hab kaijch, “Ahpim kihkam! Wehsijj am s-mahch mo ia Ephesus t am e nuhkuth g cheopigaj g si s-has ha'ichu t-jioshga Artemis ch ia ep e nuhkuth hegai hothaigaj mat ab thahm kahchim t amjed i gei.
44019036	T pi hedai hab wo sha'i chei mas pi woho ihtha. Kumt ab wabsh wo i e bahbgi k pi am hu ha'ichu wabsh wo si has juh.
44019037	Neh, mamt i ha u'apa ihtham o'othham. T eda pi ha'ichu sha'i ha ehs ab cheopi t amjed, ni'is am hu sha'i pi ap has ahg g t-jioshga.
44019038	Neh, k am thadha g haha'ichu lothaita tash ch ed. Kut ihtham Demetrius am ha'ab wo ha u'apa matp ab ha'ichu wo s-ha abchutham.
44019039	K am ep e nanmek g kihkam ch ha'ichu i a'aga ch am i ap'echuth. Kumt am wo u'apa mamtp ha'ichu ep tatchua.
44019040	T hahawa pi ab hu wo t-abch g kownal machs wabsh t-cheggia heg hekaj mat haschu has i e juh ith tashkaj. Kutt pi wo sha'i t-nako machs wo ah mat haschu ahgk hab e juh ha'ichu.”
44019041	Neh, bash kaij ch ha thagito.
44020001	Tsh am i thotholimat ha'ichu. Tsh g Paul am i ha hemapai g e-wehm wohochuththam k am si i ha gewkemhun k am hahawa ha thagito k gm hu aigo i chesh Macedonia t am
44020002	k am heg oithk i ha gewkemhunahi mu'ikpa ha mihshmathk. Am he'es d i tash, t ia jiwia Greece jewed t am
44020003	k ia ha'ichugkahim waik mashath. T am hebai i cheka, t am hahawa i chum e nako mat am aigo i chesh Syria jewed wui. Tsh wabshaba g Tutuligo am i e nako mat wo be k wo mua. T hekaj hab i e ah mat am uhpam ep wo hih Macedonia wui.
44020004	Tsh ha'i oi g Paul mat gm hu hih. Hema o d Sopater ch ab Berea t amjed ch d alithaj g Pyrrus. K ha'i ep d Aristarcas ch Secundus ch ab Thessalonica t amjed. Tki hegai Gaius mo ab Derbe t amjed ch Timothy am ha oi. Tki hegam ep ha oi Tychicus ch Trophimus mo ab amjed g Asia jewed.
44020005	T ia thatha Philippi kihhim t am. Ni ahni Luke ia wabsh kia ha'ichug ch am hahawa oi g Paul. T wabshaba hegam ha'i i'ajed gm hu t-ba'ich i chehchsh Troas kihhim wui matsh am wo t-nenida.
44020006	T eda e ai mat g Tutuligo wuhshath g e-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag k hab pi ko'a hegai pahn mo jewajithas. Kutt am hahawa gahi i shul g ge'e wahlkokaj k am ha nam Troas t am mo d hetasp tash amjed mat hegam am i t-thagito. Kuch wehsijj am ha'ichugkahim hemako thomig.
44020007	Am hu hebai d i shahwai hudunk. Tt am i t-hemapai mo an hebai uhgk g kih k am t-wehm t-gegos matt am wo hehgigchul g Jiosh. K an mu'i e mehmheithch g lalampa. T g Paul am neok k sha'i si tash am t-mihshmath natsh pi wo hih ba'ich tash ed. Kut eda i huh g s-chuhugam.
44020009	K an hema thaha g wechij o'othham wintani t an ch hab chehgig Eutycus ch atsh am i s-kohsim k kohsh k i gei ab wintani t amjed k gd hu gei jewedo. K eda waik e thahm kihki mat amjed ab i gei. T am hahawa ha'i be k am s-mai matki heki hu muh.
44020010	T wabshaba g Paul am i huduni k an si kohm k hab kaij, “Pi g am wo has e tahtkkath. Tho thoakam.”
44020011	T g hajunij gm hu hahawa i bei hegai wechij o'othham kihj wui si s-ap e tahtkch mo d thoakam. Kut gm hu hahawa uhpam ep i chehchsh mo an e mihshmath k am hab juh hegai chemait hugi mat hekaj wo s-chegitok g Jesus muhkig. T g Paul am hahawa ep ha mihshmath k gm hu hahawa hih.
44020013	K am hahawa t-ahgith g Paul mattsh gm hu wo nam mo am d Assos kihhim natsh pi wabsh wo i keish g wohg k am wo hih. Kutt heg hekaj gahi i shul g ge'e wahlkokaj k gm hu thatha.
44020014	T am hahawa t-nam k an t-wehm thahiwua. Tt am ep gahi i shulig k gm hu ai g Mitylene kihhim
44020015	k amjed gm hu ai g Chios kihhim. K am ba'ich d ep i tash, tt gm hu ai g Samos kihhim. K eda e aihim mat g Tutuligo gm hu wo hihi Jerusalem wui k am hab wo juh g hehgchulitha Jiosh wui mat s-ap i ha wehmt k am babhaijith g ha-e'esha. K heg wui s-himimk g Paul ch s-e hohtkith ch hekaj hab kaij matt pi am hu wo i huhud Ephesus t am. Kutt hekaj am wabsh gahi wuwha. K am ba'ich d i tash, tt gm hu thatha Miletus kihhim t am.
44020017	K oi wa s-ha neithamk g Paul hegam mo d ge'eged am ha shahgith g t-wehm wohochuththam ab Ephesus t ab. Kut ab i ha wai Miletus wui.
44020018	T am i thatha. K hab kaij ab ha wui: “Ni-wepnag, s-mahch am mani haschu am hab i junihim am em-shahgith wabsh chum hekith ga hu i amjed mant hekith ia jiwia iia Asia jewed t am.
44020019	Ni ab wabsh i ni-sho'igchuth ch hebai ni-oh'og iawua am hab junihithch g Jiosh chikpan nani pi si pihk ni-elith em-hekaj. Am o chum e nakog g ni-wehm o'othham mat wo ni-mua. Ni heg hekaj ab nakog g s-wihnk ha'ichu.
44020020	Kum s-mahch mani pi ha'ichu sha'i ehstohim ch wabshaba am wehs em-ahgith mani haschu hab elith mat d wo i em-wehmtadagk. Ni am em-mashcham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mam am e hehemapath ch amai ep si hehe'ejel em-kihki ed.
44020021	Kuni am si tasho ha ahgith g ni-wehm o'othham ch gawul mahs hemajkam mat wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo i e thagito Jiosh wui k ab wo bei g t-kownalig Jesus.
44020022	K hemuch hab si tahhathag g ni-ihbthag mant am wo hih Jerusalem wui. Pi ani mahch mas haschu has wo mahsk am ni-wehhejed amai.
44020023	Ith ani hi wa s-mahch mani heg wui am him mantp hems wo ni-kuhpachuth k wo ni-sho'igch no pi heki hu am i ni-tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mani hebai i jijiwhia.
44020024	Pi o d sha'i ha'ichu g ni-thoakag manis wo si s-huwithath hejel ni-wehhejed. Heg ani wa'i hab s-junimk mant wo nahto hegai mo g t-kownalig Jesus ab ni-chehani mant am hab wo juh. K d ihtha mant am wo i ahgahi g Jiosh hemajimatalig.
44020025	“Neh, pi amtki hekith ep wo sha'i ni-nei. Ni heg hekaj s-em-ahgithamk mani wa wehs ha'ichu em-ahgith ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.
44020026	K pi d ni-chu'ichig mamtp hema i pi wo e tho'ibia.
44020027	Wehs ant em-ahgi hegai mo haschu g Jiosh am hab elith k pi haschu sha'i ehsto ab em-amjed.
44020028	Ab g hejel wo e nuhkuthath ch ep wo ha nuhkuthath g e-wehm wohochuththam. Hegam o g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag em-nuhkuthachuth hab masma mamt wo ha'i ha nuhkuthach g kahwal e-shoshoiga. Kumt wo s-chegitok mat g t-kownalig Jesus eh'ed e iawua mat am ha wehhejed e muhkith k ha tho'ibia.
44020029	Ab at ha'i wo i wahp em-shahgith mat hab masma wo s-ta ehbithamak am em-wehhejed mo g sheh'e am ha wehhejed g kahwal k wo chum s-em-u'im.
44020030	Kut am ha'i wo i e maskogi g chechoj em-shahgith k wo ha'ichu chum em-iattogi ahpim wohochuththam mat hab masma ha'i im hu gawul wo i em-wanim.
44020031	Neh, mt wo si e nuhkuthath ch wo s-chegitokath mani em-mashcham wehsijj waik ahith ab ch g ni-oh'og iawua s-chuhugam oitham ch tash oitham nani pi pihk ni-elith em-hekaj.
44020032	“Pegih neh, ab ant wa em-ahgi ab amjed g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag k am haha wo em-thagito Jiosh nohnhoi ed. T g Jiosh wo wa em-nuhkuthath ch ab wo i gewkai g em-wohochuthadag k wo em-mah hegai si s-kehg ha'ichu mo ab ha makiog g e-hemajkamga.
44020033	Pi ani hekith hedai ha-lialigakaj o g wehschuga sha'i pihk ni-elith.
44020034	Ni wabsh g hejel ni-nohnhoikaj am hab junihim g chikpan ch hekaj ni-thagio'ith ch ep ha thagio'ith g ni-wehm chikpantham.
44020035	Ni hab wa masma am em-chehgith mamt wo i ha wehmt hegam mo pi e amichuth. T-kownalig Jesus o hab kaij, ‘T wo s-em-hehgigch hegai mat ab wo ha'ichu em-mah. Mt wabshaba ba'ich wo i s-hehgigk mamt ab wo ha'ichu ha mah.’ Kumt ith wo s-chegitok mo has i kaij.”
44020036	I am i ha'asa neo g Paul k am hahawa wehs ha wehm tohtonwua ihtham k am e ho'ige'ithahu.
44020037	K wehsijj si shoani ch an si kokme no pi si pihk e elith hekaj ch hab ahg, “Jiosh at wo wa m-wehmajk.”
44020038	K si pi ap e tahtk, wahm mat am i chegito mo hab kaij mat pi thahm ep wo nei. T am hahawa wehsijj hihi mo am thaha g ge'e wahlko.
44021001	Kutt am hahawa si wehs i ha ho'ige'el g t-wepnag k am ha thagito k am wabsh si shel gahi i shul g ge'e wahlkokaj k ga hu thatha Cos kihhim t ab. Am ba'ich d i tash, tt ga hu ai g Rhodes kihhim k amjed ga hu aigo i thatha Patara kihhim t ab.
44021002	Neh, k am hema thaha g ge'e wahlko matsh gm hu wo hih Phenicia jewed wui. Kutt heg ab an ha hekaj i chehchsh k gm hu oi.
44021003	Tsh ab wo i e huhuds g wahlko mohtoi Tyre kihhim t am. Kutt am bihbij hugithaj an g Cyprus jewed k am thatha amai Tyre t am.
44021004	K am ha'i kih g t-wehm wohochuththam. Kutt ha chehg k am ha wehm thadha hemako thomig ab. T am i ha tashogi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag matsh am ha'ichu has wo e juh tahgio g Paul. Kum hab chum ahg mat pi am hu wo hih Jerusalem wui.
44021005	T wabshaba am i e ai matt wo hihi. Tt gm hu hihi. T wehsijj gm hu t-oi ha wehm g e-wehm kihkam ch e-a'aliga matt gm hu wo i wuwha ab kihhim t amjed. Tt wehsijj am i tohtonwua ge shuhthagi bahsho k am t-ho'ige'ithahun
44021006	k ab hahawa a'ai t-ahgith mat wo t-wehmajk g Jiosh. Tt ahchim gn hu hahawa i chehchsh ge'e wahlko ch ed. T hegam gm hu epai hihi uhpam.
44021007	Kutt gm hu hahawa ep gahi i shul g ge'e wahlkokaj Ptolemais kihhim wui. K am ha'i kih g t-wehm wohochuththam. Ch am ha wehmajkahim hemako tash ab.
44021008	Am ba'ich d i tash, tt ga hu thatha Cesaria kihhim t ab. Kuki am kih hegai Philip mo hema d hegam wewa'ak chechoj matsh wa am e chuhcha matsh am wo i ha wehmt g Jesus chuhchai Jerusalem t ab. Kutt am hihi kihj wui. T am i t-wahpki.
44021009	Kuch am wehmajkahim he'ekia i tash. Ihtha Philip o gi'ik u'uwi a'alithag. K ihtham pi ha kuhkun ch am ahgahim hegai mo haschu g Jiosh am ha tashogith.
44021010	Kut ab Judea t amjed heg ab jiwia Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mo hab chehgig Agabus.
44021011	Ch am t-mihshmath. T heg an bei g Paul giwud k an hekaj wuh g e-kakhio ch e-nohnhoi ch hab kaij, “Bamtsh masma hab wo m-juh maptp am wo hih Jerusalem wui. T-wehm o'othham atsh an wo si m-wud k ab wo m-thagito gawul mahs hemajkam ha wui. Ith o am ni-tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.”
44021012	Kutt am i kah ihtha k ab chum si i ahgith g Paul mat pi am hu wo hih Jerusalem wui.
44021013	K wabshaba hab wabsh kaij, “Pi g am wo shoanith. Pi am ap ni-tahtchuth. Ni-nahtokch ani mamtp wo ni-wulsh o chum hems wo ni-mua g t-kownalig Jesus wehhejed.”
44021014	Kutt pi sha'i t-nako machs wo shohbi k am wabsh i thagito k hab kaij, “Pegih, ith ach wa'i tatchua mat g Jiosh ha'ichu ap'echutha am hab wo e juh.”
44021015	Kuch am ep ha'ichug he'es i tash ch am hahawa i t-nakog k gm hu hihi Jerusalem wui.
44021016	T am ha'i t-oi Jerusalem wui k am i t-ui heg kih wui matt am wehmaj wo thadhaiwua. Ith o hab chehgig Mason ch ab d si kihkam Cyprus jewed t ab ch ash heki hu wa'i s-wohochuth mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha.
44021017	T si s-ap i e taht g t-wehm wohochuththam ab i t-neithok.
44021018	Ihtham ha-uhgchuga ash d James. Kutt heg chehgio am wehmaj g Paul. K am wehsijj thadha hegam mo d ge'eged.
44021019	T g Paul ab wehs i ha ho'ige'ith k am hahawa si s-ap ha ahgith wehs ha'ichu mat g Jiosh s-kehg am hab juh am gahi wuhshanim am ha shahgith g gawul mahs hemajkam.
44021020	T am i kaiok ab si ihm g Jiosh k wabshaba hab kaij ab Paul wui, “Neh, t-wehnag, s-mahch ap mat mu'i mihl t-wehm o'othham ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k ab ihm g t-kownalig Jesus k eda ab wabsh kia si has elith g heki hu t-chehanig.
44021021	Ihtham o kah mapsh ahpi ha mashcham hegam t-wehm o'othham mo an a'ai kih nahnko mahs hemajkam ha shahgith mat wo s-ohhoth g t-chehanig k pi an hu wo ha o'oha an ha pahl hikuchk g e-a'aliga.
44021022	Tho wabsh si shel mat wo kah mapt ia jiwia. Pegih, k hab chum mahs
44021023	mapt am hab wo e juh matt has wo i m-ah. M o ha'i d chechoj ch d gi'ik mat he'es pi hih g e-mo'o nat pi ab ha'ichu ah'ath g Jiosh.
44021024	Pt am wo ha oith k am ha wehm wo e thagito Jiosh wui ge'e cheopi t am. Am apt ha wehhejed wo namkith mat haschu wo i chum ha namkith heg hekaj. Kumt am haha wo hih g e-mo'o. Pt hab masma wo ha chehgi g t-wehm o'othham map am hab junihim g t-himthag. T heg amjed wo s-mahchk mo pi woho hegai mam haschu ab m-abchuth.
44021025	P am wa s-mahch matt haschu am ha o'ohani hegam gawul mahs hemajkam mat ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Bo chu'ig g t-o'ohana mat hegam pi wo ko'ath g eh'ed ch hegai mo pi gm hu e iawua g eh'ed e mum'ajch kch hegai mo ab e to'ith hegai mo haschu hab chum e elith mo d jiosh. Kut wo si e nuhkuth hab masma mat hegai wa'i si e-hohnig o g si e-kun wehm wo kihk.”
44021026	K wa woho am ba'ich d i tash. T g Paul am i ha ui hegam chechoj k am ha wehm i e thagito Jiosh wui k am hahawa i wah ge'e cheopi ch ed k am ha ahgith mat d wo wewa'ak tashk, t wo kuhgit hegai mat ab ah'ath. T am hab wo e juh hegai mat am hahawa ha'ichu wo iagchul Jiosh wui.
44021027	K am i e aihim mat wo kuhgit hegai wewa'ak tash. T am hih g Paul k am i wah ge'e cheopi ch ed. Kutsh ha'i am chehg k an bei hegam Tutuligo mo ab Asia jewed t amjed. K eda mu'i an oiopo g hemajkam. Kutsh am si i ha kudut
44021028	k ash si hihnk ch hab kaij, “T-hajuni, ia g wo i t-wehmt. Ihtha o'othham o an wehsko si has ahg g t-himthag ch t-chehanig ch ihtha ge'e cheopi. Pi o d ha-ap'ethag g gawul mahs hemajkam mas ia hu wo i wahp. Kutki eda ihtha ha'i i ha wahpkith k hab uamhu g ge'e cheopi.”
44021029	Bash kaij nash pi am hu hebai neith g Paul hema wehm g gawul mahs o'othham ch hab e ahg mat am i wahki. Hegai mo wa am wehmaj o hab chehgig Trophimus ch ab Ephesus t ab d kihkam.
44021030	T am wabsh wehsko chehmo g pi ha-ap'ethag amai kihhim t am. T ab a'aijed i wohp g hemajkam k an wabsh si bei g Paul k gm hu i chewaim ab amjed g ge'e cheopi. T ab ha hekaj si e kuhkp g ge'e cheopi kihkijeg.
44021031	K ihtham s-babgam hemajkam chum mum'a g Paul. Kumtsh am ahgi g shonthal ha-ge'ejig mash am ge e cheggia.
44021032	T ab ha hekaj tha'iwush mu'i ha wehm g e-shonthalig k ha'i ehp g ha-ge'ege'ejig k gd hu wo'i mat am e hemapai g hemajkam. T hegam am ha hekaj wabsh si ha'asa cheggia g Paul am i ha neithk.
44021033	T g shonthal am him k an bei g Paul. T g ha-ge'ejig hab ha ah mat an wo si wuh g gohk e hukshchim wainomikaj. Kut hab juh. T ab hahawa ha kakke g hemajkam, “Thoh'o wud ihtha o'othham ch haschu has juh?”
44021034	K ha'i g hemajkam am hu has i ahg. K ha'ijj ehp am wa gawul ep ahg. T am wabsh i ge nahnko e juh g ha'ichu ha-ahga. Kut pi sha'i amich ihtha shonthal ha-ge'ejig mat haschu has e juh k heg hekaj am wabsh ha ahgith g e-shonthalig mat gd hu wo kuh g Paul.
44021035	T an i bei mo an cheshajkudag. T wabshaba wabsh e nondagch g hemajkam k an chum s-behimk ch si hihnk ch hab kaij, “Mu'awo! Mu'awo!” T heg hekaj wabsh uhgk i ul g shonthal mat pi wo e muhkith.
44021037	T am haha wabsh i chum wahki g Paul e-kolhai ed. K hab kaij g Greek ha-ne'okikaj ab wui g shonthal ha-ge'ejig, “M ani ha'ichu chum s-m-ahgithamk.” K heg hab kaij, “A kupki neok g Greek ha-ne'okikaj.
44021038	Ps hemsi d hegai Egypt t am o'othham mat wa am hu hebai ia i chum shonwuich g cheggiadag. T wa am i wehmt g gi'ik mihl chechoj ch u'a g cheggiakud am tohono jewed oithk.”
44021039	K hab kaij g Paul, “Pi ani d hegai. Thani Tuhligo ch ab d mahsikam Tarsus kihhim t ab am Cilicia jewed ch ed ch ab u'ukch g ni-shel ab amjed g si s-has ha'ichu kihhim. Pt ab wo si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k wo ni-hiwigi mant am wo neo ha wui g hemajkam.”
44021040	T wa woho am hiwigi g shonthal ha-ge'ejig. T an i kekiwua mo an cheshajkudag ab ha ba'ich g hemajkam k am neo g hejel e-ne'okikaj k hab kaij:
44022001	“Ni-hajuni ch ahpim ge'eged hemajkam, ab g wo i ni-kaiham mant am hejel ni-wehhejed wo neo.”
44022002	T am i kah mo g ha-ne'okikaj neok k gm hu wabsh i pi shahmuni. K hab hahawa kaij g Paul:
44022003	“Ahni ani d Tuhligo ch ab d mahsikam Tarsus kihhim t am am Cilicia jewed ch ed ch wabshaba ia ge'etha Jerusalem kihhim t am k ia ni-mashcham. K wa g Gamaliel d ni-mashchamtham ch ab si s-gewkam ni-mashcham g t-chehanig. Ni hab wa masma am chum si s-gewkam oith g Jiosh himthag mam ahpim hemuch ith i tashkaj.
44022004	Kuni wa heg hekaj ha sho'igchuth ch ha koktha hegam mo an u'ukch ihtha wechij ha'ichu ahga ch wa an ha u'u g chechoj ch u'uwi ch am ha shulig kukpaikud ch ed.
44022005	T g uhgchu pahl ch hegam e jehnigiththam am wo wohokamch ihtha mani em-ahgith. Bani wa ha ahg mant am wo hih Damascus kihhim wui. T hegam ab ni-mah g o'ohana am ha wui hegam mo d u'ugchu am ha eda g t-wehm o'othham amai Damascus ch ed. Nt wa am hi wa i hih mant wo ha wupulsh g e hukshchim wainomikaj hegam mo ab s-wohochuth ihtha wechij ha'ichu ahga k wo uhpam i ha ui ab Jerusalem wui mat wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.
44022006	“Neh, am att wa hihim k gm hu i aihim g Damascus kihhim. K wa am hu d i thahm juhk mat haha wabsh ha'ichu si ton ab amjed g thahm kahchim an wehsko ni-wehgaj.
44022007	Nt wa am i gei jewedo. T wa ab hema si neo ni-wui k hab kaij, ‘Saul, s-wohom ap hig ni-sho'igchuth.’
44022008	“Kuni si has elith ch hab kaij, ‘Thohp wud ch ab neok?’ “K hab hahawa ep kaij, ‘Thani ahni Jesus map ha sho'igchuth g ni-ihmtham.’
44022009	K hegam mo am ni-wehmaj hi wa neith hegai ge'e tonlig ch wabshaba pi amichuth g ne'oki.
44022010	“Ni ab hahawa kakke, ‘Shahnt wo ni-juh, ni-kownalig?’ “K wa hab kaij, ‘Ab g i wamig k am him k am i wahki Damascus ch ed. T am hahawa hema wo m-ahgi mapt haschu am hab wo chum wuath.’
44022011	“Tki eda pi ni-nenich heg hekaj mat wa am si s-masma ton. T wa am wabsh i ni-wanim hegam mo am ni-wehmaj k gd hu ni-u'apa Damascus t am.
44022012	“Kuki wa am hema kih g o'othham ch hab chehgig Ananias ch ab si ihm g Jiosh ch ep am si oith g chehanig. K ab si has elith g t-wehm o'othham amai Damascus t am.
44022013	Heg at wa am jiwia ni-wui k ab kehk ch hab kaij, ‘Ni-nawoj Saul, ab g beh'i g e-nentalig!’ Nt ha hekaj s-ap ha'ichu neith k ab si i nei.
44022014	“K wa hab kaij ab ni-wui, ‘Neh, am antsh wo m-ahgi matsh ahpi am i m-kei g Jiosh mapt wo s-mahchk g tatchuij ch wo nei g si s-ap'ekam Kehshaj k wo kah mat am hejel wo m-ahgi g ha'ichu e-ahga. K d wa'i ihtha Jiosh mo an u'ukch g t-shohshonbad.
44022015	K hab d elithaj mapt d wo hema hegamk mapt am wo si i wohokamch g Jesus k am wo i ha ahgi g hemajkam mapt haschu i neith k haschu i kah.
44022016	Pt ha hekaj wo i e nakog k wo e pahl wako ab ihmathch g Jesus. T heg gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap m-chu'ichig.’ Neh, bo ni-ahg.
44022017	“Nt wa am hab juniok ab i hih Jerusalem wui k am hu hebai am ni-ho'ige'ithahun ge'e cheopi ch ed. T wa am haha wabsh ni-nena ed ha'ichu hab e juh
44022018	mani neith g Jesus. K hab kaij ab ni-wui, ‘Ia g ha hekaj thagito g Jerusalem k hihm ab amjed nat pi g m-wehm o'othham iia pi ab hu wo kaiha g ha'ichu m-ahga ab ni-amjed.’
44022019	“Ni hab kaij, ‘Tp hems wo wa ni-kaiha, ni-kownalig, no pi s-ap s-mahch mani d ahni mani wa an wahkhim ha eda g ha-chechopi ch an ha u'uth ch ha gewittan hegam mo ab m-ihm.
44022020	Kuni wa am ha wehmaj ch am nuhkuth g ha-wehschuga hegam mat mua hegai Steven mat am si s-mahch k ah ab m-amjed.’
44022021	“K wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus ab ni-wui, ‘Am g wa hihm nant pi am i m-kei mapt am mehk wo hih ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam.’ ” Neh, bo kaij g Paul.
44022022	K wa ab hi wa s-ap kaiham ihtham hemajkam. T wabshaba am hab wabsh chum chei ihtha matsh g Jesus am i kei matsh am wo hih ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam. T am ha hekaj i hihinkiath si s-kaitham k hab kaij, “Mu'awo! Mu'awo! Pi o an hu hab chum chu'ig mas in d wo thoakamk.”
44022023	K si hihnk ch ab si shahmuth g e-wepschuga ch g jewed shashkum ch am uhgk si nen'eichuth nat pi am i si babgat.
44022024	T g shonthal ha-ge'ejig am hahawa ha cheha g e-shonthalig mat gm hu wo i wahki g Paul shonthal ha-kih ed. T am i wahki. T am ha cheha mat wo gewitta am hugkam mat am wo ha ahgi mat has e juh mo hekaj si hihnkoith g Tutuligo.
44022025	T an wulsh mat wo chum gewitta. K am hema kehk g shonthal ha ge'ejig. K ab wui hab kaij g Paul, “Ab ani u'ukch g ni-shel hab masma mo g Rome t am o'othham. K heg hekaj pi hab chum mahs mams wo ni-gewitta pi koi ni-lothaithk.”
44022026	T heg am i kah ihtha k am wui hih g si uhgk shonthal ha-ge'ejig k ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Nap s-mahch maptki has wo chum chu'i? Ihtha o'othham oki ab u'ukch g e-shel hab masma mo g Rome t am o'othham.”
44022027	T am hahawa hih g si uhgchu shonthal ha-ge'ejig am Paul wui k ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Am g ni-ahgith. Nap ab u'ukch g e-shel hab masma mo g Rome t am o'othham?” Sh hab kaij g Paul, “Heu'u.”
44022028	K hab hahawa kaij g ha-ge'ejig, “A pt has hig masma ab bei g e-shel. Ahni ant hi ab bei mu'i lial ha namkith.” K hab kaij g Paul, “Ni wabshaba ahni ab u'ukch g ni-shel mani ab d ha amjedkam hegam mo u'ukch g e-shel.”
44022029	T ga hu ta'i si i gegokiwua hegam mo an wulshch g Paul mat wo chum gewitta. T g shonthal ha-ge'ejig ep si e toths nat pi ha cheha mat hab wo juh.
44022030	Am ba'ich d i tash, tsh g shonthal ha-ge'ejig am i ha cheha g u'ugchu papal mat am wo i ha hemapai g e jehnigiththam nash pi s-mahchimk mo haschu ab abchuth g Paul. T g shonthaligaj gam wul'o g e hukshchim wainomi ab ab g Paul k am i be k am i kei ha wui.
44023001	K g Paul ab si ha neith g e jehnitiththam ch hab kaij, “Ni-hajuni, chum ani hekith si ni-nakog mant am hab wo wa'i junihith g s-ap'ekam ch hab pi wo sha'i ha'ichukaj si has ni-elithath am tahgio g Jiosh ia i himtham tashkaj.”
44023002	Kut hegai uhgchu pahl mash hab chehgig Ananias am ha cheha hegam mo an miabithch gegok mat ab wo si shonihi g Paul chinij ab. T ab shonihi.
44023003	K hab kaij g Paul, “Jiosh at hemho ab wo wa uhpam i nodagi ihtha am m-wui ahpi map s-chu iattomk. Ab ap thak ch ni-lothait g t-chehanigkaj ch eda ep melchkwuhim g t-chehanig map ab ha chehani mat ab wo ni-shonihi.”
44023004	K hab kaij hegam mo an miabithch gegok g Paul, “S-ko'okam ap has ahg g uhgchu pahl.”
44023005	K hab kaij g Paul, “Ni-hajuni, mant hems wo s-mahchk mokis d uhgchu pahl, nt pi hab wo sha'i chei, no pi hab chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana: Pi g am wo sha'i pi ap has ahgath g e-ge'ejig.”
44023006	K hegam e jehnigiththam ha'i d Sajusi ch ha'i ep d Palasi. T ith am i s-mai g Paul k am si s-kaitham neok ha wui ch hab kaij, “Ni-hajuni, ahni ani d Palasi ch d ha amjedkam g Palasi ch ha wepo s-wohochuth mat g ko'i ep wo i wuwha ab hiha'ini t amjed. Kum heg hekaj ni-lothait.”
44023007	T ith am i kah g e jehnigiththam k am ha hekaj a'ai e ne'owin k pi ab hu i e wehmt.
44023008	Hegam mo d Sajusi o pi ab hu wohochuth mat g ko'i wo i wuwha ab hiha'ini t amjed ch ep pi wohochuth mo an ha'ichug g anghil o g kok'oi. K wabshaba g Palasi wehs s-wohochuth ihtha.
44023009	T am hahawa i si e gewkai g ha-hihinki. T am ha'i gegokiwua hegam mo d chehanig hudawogam ch d Palasi k am si s-gewkam ha shohbith k hab kaij, “Pi att ha'ichu sha'i cheh mas pi ap hab juh ihtha o'othham. Tp hems wa woho g anghil am wehmaj neo.”
44023010	T am ba'ich i si e gewkai g ha-ne'owina. Kum hab e ahg mat am hu wo wantsh g Paul. K g shonthal ha-ge'ejig am hahawa ha chehani g e-shonthalig mat am wo ha wohppo'i. Kut am hihim k be k gd i bei e-kih wui.
44023011	Sh am ba'ich d i hudunk, tsh am i e chehgi g Jesus Paul wui k hab kaij, “Ia ap si s-mahch ch am ahgahim ha'ichu ab ni-amjed. Kuni am i m-gewkemhun mapt hab wo wa masma hab e juh am Rome t am.”
44023012	K am ba'ich d i tash wabsh i si'alim, tsh am ha'i e hemapai g Tutuligo k am chum Jiosh tahgio a'ai si e ahgith mat pi ha'ichu wo hug k ho'ip mua g Paul.
44023013	Kush i ba'iwechkim gi'ikko wehst-mahm ihtham matsh hab masma e ap'ech.
44023014	Tsh am hahawa hihi ha wui g u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged ch hab kaij, “Matt am Jiosh tahgio a'ai si t-ahgi matt pi ha'ichu wo hug k ho'ip mua hegai Paul.
44023015	Kumt ahpim g e jehnigiththam ha wehm am wo ahgi g shonthal ha-ge'ejig mat ab wo i bek g Paul em-wui. Kumt hab wo e wuath mam ba'ich ha'ichu s-mahchimk ab amjed. Kutt ahchim wo t-nahtokchith matt wo mua mat koi ia hu wo jiwia em-wui.”
44023016	Tsh wabshaba g Paul cheoj ma'i am i kah ihtha k am him k am i wah shonthal ha-kih ed k am ahgith g Paul.
44023017	Tsh heg am hema wai g shonthal ha-ge'ejig k hab kaij ab wui, “Am g beh'i ihtha wechij o'othham am si uhgchu shonthal ha-ge'ejig wui, matsh wo ha'ichu ahgi.”
44023018	Tsh wa woho am i bei wui k hab kaij, “Ihtha wechij o'othham at ia jiwia k am nei hegai Paul mo ia e kuhpch. T heg am ni-waith k hab ni-ahg mant ab wo i bei m-wui matsh wo ha'ichu m-ahgi.”
44023019	Tsh g si uhgchu ha-ge'ejig ab bei nowij an k gm hu hekelko i wanimed k ab kakke, “Shahchu apt wo ni-ahgi?”
44023020	K hab kaij, “Ni-wehm o'othham at am i e ap'ech matsh si'alim ab wo m-tai mamt am wo i bei g Paul e jehnigiththam ha wui hab wabsh s-e junimk mat am ba'ich ha'ichu wo i s-mai ab amjed.
