44023021	Pt wabshaba pi ab hu wo ha kaiha. Gi'ikko wehst-mahm i ba'iwechkim chechoj atsh am wo e e'estok ch wo kihshath nat pi am chum Jiosh tahgio a'ai si e ahgi matsh pi ha'ichu wo hug k ho'ip mua g Paul. K hemuch e nahtokch mat am hab wo e juh ch wabsh nenida mapt has wo e juh.”
44023022	Sh hab kaij g si ha-uhgchuga, “Pi g am hedai sha'i ahgith hegai mapt haschu ia ni-ahgi.” Tsh gm hu hahawa hih g Paul ma'i.
44023023	Tsh g si uhgchu shonthal ha-ge'ejig gohk am ha wai g ha-ge'ege'ejig k hab kaij, “Am g wo ha'i i ha gawulkath gohk siant shonthal ch wewa'akko wehst-mahm ehp mo g kakawyu ha chehchej ch gohk siant ehp mo s-e mahch ab is-pahyo t ab. Kut hegam wo e nahtok ch wo hihi mat d wo i humukt ohlak chuhug am Cesaria kihhim wui.
44023024	Kumt am ha'i wo i ha ap'ech g kakawyu mat g Paul wo hekaj. Mt am s-ap wo i be k am wo u'apa heg wui ge'e kownal mo d Felix.”
44023025	Neh, bash kaij ch am hahawa o'ohani hegai uhgchu kownal ihtha:
44023026	“Ab g i s-ni-ho'ige'ith ahpi uhgchu ni-kownalig Felix. Am ant wo m-o'ohani ahni mani d Claudius Lysius
44023027	nat pi g ge'e ha'ichu has e juh. Tutuligo at am wabsh hema si be k chum alo mua. Kunt s-mai mo ihtha ab u'ukch g e-shel hab masma mo g Rome t am kihkam. Kutt hekaj g ni-shonthalig ha wehm am tho'ibia.
44023028	Nt amjed am i bei Tutuligo e jehnigiththam ha wui s-mahchimk hegai mam haschu ab abchuth.
44023029	Kuki wabshaba pi am hu d shai hegai mas hekaj wo e muhkith o wo e kuhpach. Heg amki ab wa'i abchuth mat g hejel ha-chehanig melchkwua.
44023030	Sh am hahawa ha'i e nakog ihtham Tutuligo matsh wo mua. Kunt am ha hekaj ha cheha g ni-shonthalig mat ab m-wui wo bei. Kuni hab ha ahg hegam mo ab ha'ichu abchuth mat ahpi m-wui wo gagda. Neh, ith o wud wa'i.”
44023031	Tsh am hab e juh g shonthal hegai mam haschu ab i ha chehani k am i bei g Paul chuhug ch ed k am u'apa Antipatris kihhim t am.
44023032	Sh am ba'ich d i tash, tsh hegam shonthal mo wabsh e-tahtadkaj hihim gm hu uhpam hihi Jerusalem wui.
44023033	Tsh hegam mo shoshoigakch am i bei Cesaria wui k am thatha k am i mah g kownal g o'ohana k ab wui hahawa i thagito g Paul.
44023034	Tsh g kownal am ne'okchul hegai o'ohana k ab kakke g Paul mas haschu jewed amjed. Sh heg am ahgith mo ab Cilicia jewed amjed.
44023035	Sh hab kaij ab wui, “M ant wo wa m-nei mat hekith wo thatha hegam mo ab ha'ichu m-abchuth.” Sh g shonthaligaj am hahawa nuhkuth kownal kih ed.
44024001	K am d i hetasp tash, t am hih hegai si uhgchu pahl mo hab chehgig Ananias. T g Tutuligo ha-ge'egedga am ha'i oi. T heg ep ha oi mo d chehanig ab s-chu amichuththam ch hab chehgig Tertullus. T wehs ihtham am i thatha kownal wui k am gagda g Paul.
44024002	T am wai g Paul. T ihtha s-chu amichuththam am hahawa i ahgahi hegai mam haschu ab abchuth g Paul hab kaijch: “Uhgchu kownal Felix, si ap s-e mahch ch t-wanimed ch mu'i ha'ichu am hab junihim mo d t-ap'ethag iia t-jewedga ed. Kuch heg hekaj s-thotholim kihthag
44024003	ch si s-ap t-tahtk chum hekith ch wabsh chum hebai ch ab si s-m-ho'ige'elith.
44024004	Kuni hi wa chum pi hohho'ith mant tash an wo m-u'ukch ch hekaj ab si i m-tahni mapt ab wo si s-t-ho'ige'elith k am he'es wo i kaiha ihtha al shopol ha'ichu t-ahga.
44024005	“Am att cheh ihtha o'othham. Kuki wa wehsko sha'i si ha kudut g t-wehm o'othham ch am i ha chu'amun mat wo cheggia g kownal ch pi apko ha wanimed mat ab wo i hema s-wohoch mo pi d wohokam ch ab Nazareth t amjed.
44024006	Kutt am cheh mat ep chum uamhu g ge'e cheopi ab Jerusalem t ab. Kutt hekaj an bei matt wo lothai g t-chehanigkaj.
44024007	T wabshaba g shonthal ha-ge'ejig Lysias am i wahk k si s-bagam am t-wohppo'ith
44024008	k ha cheha mat ia ha'ab wo i e bei m-wui. Kutsh hegam mo ab ha'ichu abchuth ab m-wui wo gagda. Pt hems ab wo ha'ichu kakke ihtha o'othham k wo s-mai ab amjed wehs ha'ichu mach haschu ab i abchuth.”
44024009	Neh, bo kaij. T wehsijj am wohokamch hegam Tutuligo mat am e nam.
44024010	T ab i ai g Paul. T g kownal ab ahgi mat am wo neo. K hab kaij: “Tash ap ia d kownal ch ha lothait g t-wehm o'othham. Ni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk mant am wo hejel ni-wehhejed neo m-tahgio.
44024011	M apt wo i hoan k wo wohokamch mo pi woho g ha'ichu ha-ahga ihtham. “Tho wabsh i gamai gohk tash mant am hih Jerusalem wui hab ahgk mant ab wo ihm g Jiosh.
44024012	Kunt pi woho sha'i hedai kam'o am ge'e cheopi ch ed k pi woho sha'i am ha kudu g hemajkam amai o hebai i am Jerusalem ch ed.
44024013	Pi at wo sha'i e nako mas wo wohokamch hegai mo haschu ab i ni-abchuth no pi pi woho.
44024014	“M o hi wa woho mani ab ihm g Jiosh am oithch ihtha himthag mo ihtham hab elith mo pi d wohokam. K eda d wa'i Jiosh mani ab ihm ch d ha-Jioshga g t-shohshon. Kuni wehs ab s-wohog elith g t-chehanig ch hegai mat g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam an o'oha.
44024015	Ni-wehm o'othham o s-wohochuth mat g Jiosh ab wo i ha wuwhas g ko'i muhkig t amjed k ab wo i ha gawulkai g s-ap'ekam k gm hu wo i ha gawulkai g pi ap'ekam. Ni ahni hab wa'ap s-wohochuth ihtha
44024016	ch hekaj chum hekith am si ni-nakog mant am hab wo wa'i junihith g s-ap'ekam ch hab pi wo sha'i ha'ichukaj si ni-el am tahgio g Jiosh ch am ha tahgio g hemajkam.
44024017	“Tash ani gm hu oimmed am ha oithk g gawul mahs hemajkam ch pi ab hu ha'ichug Jerusalem t ab. T hegam gawul mahs hemajkam ab i to'ahi g lial k am ni-nuhkuthach mant am wo i ha u'i g ni-wehm o'othham ab Jerusalem t ab. Nt heg ab ha mah am jiwiak k am hahawa i ni-thagito Jiosh wui k ab ihm ch am hab wua g iagchulitha ge'e cheopi ch ed.
44024018	K pi sha'i mu'i ni-wehmaj. Kuni pi d sha'i ahni manis am i shonwua g kudutadag.
44024019	K wabshaba d hegam mat am ni-chehg k am i shonwua g kudutadag k d ni-wehm o'othham ch ab thatha Asia jewed t amjed. T ia wo chum u'apa m-wui hegai mo haschu ab ni-abchuth k wabshaba pi ia hu thatha.
44024020	T ihtham m ia gegok am wo chum ah matp woho cheh g pi ap chu'ichig ab ni-ab mant wa am i kekiwua ha wui g e jehnigiththam.
44024021	Ahni ant wo em-ahgi mani wa hab kaij, ‘Ia am ni-lothait ith i tashkaj heg hekaj mani ab s-wohochuth mat g ko'i uhpam wo i wuwha ab muhkig amjed.’ Na'as ith pi hohho'ith.” Neh, bo kaij g Paul.
44024022	Felix o si s-ap s-mahch ihtha Jesus himthag. Kut am i ha'asa neo g Paul. T g Felix am i kuhgi g ha'ichu kaihama hab kaijch, “M ant wo wa i apch ihtha mat hekith wo i jiwia g Lysias ab Jerusalem t amjed.”
44024023	Neh, bo kaij ch am hahawa cheha g shonthal ha-ge'ejig mat am wabsh wo i u'ukchith g Paul ch wabshaba hi wo wa hiwgithath matp hems am wo neithath g naipijjuj ch am wo ha'ichukaj i wehmtath.
44024024	K g felix wehm kihkam d Tuhligo ch hab chehgig Drusilla. Sh ihtham ab s-kaimk g Paul. Tsh g Felix am ha cheha mamt am wo i wahki g Paul. Sh heg am ha ahgith am jiwiak mamt ab wo i chum s-wohoch g Jesus Christ. Sh am hugkam wabsh s-ap kaiham ihtham.
44024025	Sh am hahawa i ha ahgithahim mat am wo i e thagito s-ap'ekam wui k pi am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam no pi e aihim mat g Jiosh gm hu wo i ha gawulkai g pi ap'ekam hemajkam. Tsh g Felix si s-ehbenith k hab kaij, “Oi g gm hu hihm. M ant wo wa ep i m-wai mat hekith am wo s-ni-ap'ek.”
44024026	K eda hab chum em-ahg mat g Paul wo ha'i namkith g lial mat wo thagito ch heg hekaj mu'ikko ab i wappaith mat am wo wehmaj neo.
44024027	Kut am i e ba'iwich g gohk ahithag. T am hema ep thahiwua g kownal Felix kehkud ed k hab chehgig Porcius Festus. T wa eda g Felix pi sha'i thagito g Paul no pi si tatchua mat si s-ap ab wo i nei g Tutuligo.
44025001	Sh am d i waik tash amjed mat am i thahiwua g Festus Cesaria t am, tsh gm hu hih Jerusalem wui.
44025002	Tsh ab wui i hihi g u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged hemajkam k am ahgith hegai mo haschu ab i chum abchuth g Paul ch ab si tahni mat ab wo i bei Jerusalem wui. Kush eda ihtham am heki hu e a'aga mat wo mua g Paul mat ab wo u'ath.
44025004	Sh hab kaij g Festus, “Am o d wabsh kia lihso Cesaria t am. Nt eda hemuch am uhpam wo hih.
44025005	Kumt am ha'i wo ni-oith k am wo ah mam haschu ab abchuth.”
44025006	K am thakahim g Festus am hu i hemako thomig k gm hu hahawa hih Cesaria wui. T hegam ge'eged hemajkam gm hu ep hihi. Ba'ich i tash at am i thahiwua g Festus lothaita kih ch ed k am ha chehani mat am wo i wahki g Paul.
44025007	T am i wahki. T an wehgaj gegokiwua k ab ha hekaj si pi ap ha'ichu abchuth ch wabshaba pi e nako mas wo wohokamch ihtha.
44025008	T g Paul am e wehhejed neok k hab kaij, “Pi ant ha'ichu sha'i pi ap hab juh manis melchkwua g t-chehanig ahchim Tutuligo k pi sha'i uamhu g ge'e cheopi k pi ab hu sha'i wui kehk g kownal.”
44025009	K hab kaij g Festus ab wui, “Pt hig am wo hih Jerusalem wui mant am ha'ab wo m-lothai.” Bo kaij no pi hab elith mat wo s-hohho'i g Tutuligo.
44025010	K hab kaij g Paul, “Ia ani kehk kownal lothaita kih ed mant ia ha'ab wo chum ni-lothaitach. Am ap wa si s-mahch mant pi ha'ichu am hu hab sha'i juh mas pi ap'e am ha wui g ni-wehm o'othham.
44025011	Pi ant ab hu wo em-tai mams wabsh wo ni-thagito matp hab wo sha mahsk mant mul g chehanig. M o wa s-ap'e mamt wabsh wo ni-muhkith mantp am hugkam mul. K wabshaba pi woho hegai mo ab ni-abchuth. T heg hekaj pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo i ni-thagito ha wui. Ab ant wui wo i gei g si uhgchu kownal.” Neh, bo kaij g Paul.
44025012	K eda am thadha hegam mo am ha'ichu i shelamith ch am a'aga ihtha. K g Festus ab ha kahk ch hab hahawa kaij ab Paul wui, “Neh, pt hemho wa am wo e u'apa si uhgchu kownal wui napt pi ab wui i gei.”
44025013	K am hu hebai hema d kownal ch hab chehgig Agrippa. Sh g uwi wehngaj hab chehgig Bernice. Tsh ihtham am chehgio g Festus noki pi s-ap ab i neith.
44025014	Sh am he'ekia i tash amjed, sh am ha ahgith g Festus ab amjed g Paul ch hab kaij, “Ia o hema kuhpi g o'othham ch hab chehgig Paul. T g Felix pi i wuhshath.
44025015	Kunt wa am hih Jerusalem wui k am ha nei g Tutuligo u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged. K hegam ab ha'ichu abchuth ihtha lihso ch ab ni-chehani mant wo mua.
44025016	Ni wabshaba am ha ahgith mo pi hab mahs g t-kownalig chehanig. T hemho wa wehpeg am wo i e hudaw g lihso ha wehm hegam mo ab ha'ichu abchuth k am wo neo e wehhejed. T g kownal ab haha wo mah g namkithadgaj.
44025017	“T wa woho i thatha hegam Tutuligo ha wanimedtham. Nt am ha hekaj thahiwua kownal thaikud ed mant wo ha kaiha. Kumt ab i wahki g lihso.
44025018	T am gegokiwua hegam mo ab ha'ichu chum abchuth. Kuni hab ni-ahg matp hems ge'e ha'ichu ab wo abch ab t-chehanig amjed.
44025019	K wabshaba ab wabsh e-himthag amjed ab ha'ichu ne'owin ch heg amjed ehp o'othham mash hab chehgig Jesus ch atsh heki hu muh. K eda g Paul hab kaij mat uhpam e chegito.
44025020	“Nt am wabsh i pi ni-amich mant has masma si tasho ha'ichu wo s-mai ab amjed k heg hekaj ab kakke g Paul mas wo s-hohho'i mat am uhpam wo hih Jerusalem wui k ab ha'ab wo e lothaitach.
44025021	K wabshaba ab t-ahgith g Paul mat ab wo i gei si ge'e kownal wui mat heg am wo mamche hegai mo haschu ab i abchuth. Nt wa woho am ha cheha g shonthal mat wo si nuhkuth k ab wo ai mat am wo e u'apa si ge'e kownal wui.”
44025022	Kush hab kaij g Agrippa am Festus wui, “Ahni ani hab wa'ap chum s-kaimk ihtha o'othham.” Sh hab kaij g Festus, “Pt wo wa kah si'alim.”
44025023	K am ba'ich d i tash, t hab masma i ha wahpki g Festus mo d si s-has haha'ichu ihtham Agrippa ch Bernice. K hegam ep ha wehmaj mo d si u'ugchu shonthal ha-ge'ege'ejig ch hegam mo d si s-has haha'ichu heg eda kihhim. Kumt am i wahki g Paul.
44025024	K g Festus hab hahawa kaij: “Ahpi Agrippa map d kownal ch ahpim s-has haha'ichu o'othham, m ia kehk em-wui ihtha o'othham. K g Tutuligo iia kch ab Jerusalem t ab ab ha'ichu abchuth ab ni-wui ch am si e gewpkath mat hemho wa wo e mua.
44025025	Nt wabshaba pi sha'i cheh g chu'ichigaj mas heg hekaj wo e muhkith. “K heg wa hejel hab kaij mat ab wo i gei si ge'e kownal wui. T hekaj hemho wa am hab wo e juh.
44025026	Ni wabshaba pi ni-amichuth mant haschu am wo o'ohani g si ge'e kownal ab amjed. K pi hab chum mahs mas am wo e u'apa g lihso pi am hu tasho ahgk mas haschu d chu'ichigaj. Nt heg hekaj ia u'apa em-wui mamt am wo i kaiha, wahm ahpi Agrippa map d kownal. Ntp hems haha wo s-mai ab em-amjed mant haschu am wo o'oha.”
44026001	K hab kaij g Agrippa ab wui g Paul, “B ant m-mah g ap'ethag mapt am hejel e wehhejed wo neo.” T ab ha ba'ich i kekiwua g Paul k am e wehhejed neok
44026002	k hab kaij: “Agrippa map d kownal, ahpi ap s-mahch g t-himthag ch ha'ichu pi t-ap'ethag ahchim Tutuligo. Ni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk mant ab m-wui wo neo ith i tashkaj ab amjed hegai mo haschu ab chum ni-abchuth g ni-wehm o'othham. Kuni ab i m-kakke mapt ab wo si i ni-kaiham k ab wabsh wo i ni-bahbgi.
44026004	“S-mahch o g ni-wehm o'othham mani has i masma ga hu i amjed mani d wabsh kia si ali nani pi wa eda am wabsh i kih ni-jewedga ed ab Jerusalem t ab.
44026005	Thani Palasi wohochuththam. K g ni-wehm o'othham s-mahch mani am si s-gewkam oith g t-himthag.
44026006	Ia ani kehk ch wo ni-lothai nani pi ab s-wohochuth mat g Jiosh woho hab wo juh hegai mat haschu am ha ahgi g t-shohshonbad.
44026007	Bo ha ahg mat uhpam wo i ha wuwhas g ko'i ab muhkig t amjed. Ith o chum s-wohochuth g ni-wehm o'othham ch eda s-ni-lothaitamk nani pi s-wohochuth mat hab i juh.
44026009	“Bani wa wa elith mant am wo si i ni-nakog k wo shohbi g himthaj hegai Jesus mo ab Nazareth t amjed.
44026010	Ni wa wa woho am hab chum ni-junihim amai Jerusalem t am. T wa g u'ugchu papal ab i ni-mah g ni-ap'ethag. Kunid mu'i ha kuh hegam mo ab s-wohochuth hegai himthag k ha wehm ap'ech g e jehnigiththam mamt wo ha koktha.
44026011	Kunt wa mu'ikko am ap'ech mamt wo ha sho'igch an i a'ai ha-chechopi ed k am chum ha chehani mat hab wo chei mo pi ap'e hegai Jesus. Kunid wa sha'i si s-ha keh'ith ch am i ni-nako mant am i wah gawul jewed kihhim ch ed mant wo ha sho'igch amai.
44026012	“Kunid wa ab si ha tai g u'ugchu papal g ni-ap'ethag k am hih Damascus wui heg wa si hekaj mant wo ha kuh hegam mo s-wohochuth mo hegai Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha.
44026013	“Pegih neh, ahpi si s-has ha'ichu, am achd hihim wohg ch ed am hu i thahm juhk. Kud am hab e juh mat am ba'ich i s-mahs ton mo g tash tonlig an t-wehgaj.
44026014	Kutt wehsijj i shul am jewedo. “Kunid ahni kah mad ab hema neok ni-wui g ni-ne'okikaj ch hab kaij, ‘Saul, s-wohom ap hig chum ni-sho'igchuth ch wabshaba hejel s-ko'okam has e wua.’
44026015	“Kunid si has elith ch hab kaij, ‘Thohp wud ch ab neok?’ “Kud hab hahawa ep kaij, ‘Thani ahni Jesus map ha sho'igchuth hegam mo ab si ni-ihm.
44026016	Ab g i wamig k kekiwua. Ia ant i ni-chehgi m-wui mant am wo i m-kei mapt d wo ni-pionagk. Kupt am wo ha ahgi g hemajkam ihtha map neith ch kah. Kunt am ha'ichu ep wo m-chehgi imhab i ba'ich. Pt heg am ep wo ha ahgi.
44026017	Nt wo m-tho'ibia ab ha amjed g m-wehm o'othham. Kupt am wo ahgahith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am ha wui g gawul mahs hemajkam. Nt am ep wo m-nuhkuth k wo m-tho'ibia ab ha amjed.
44026018	Kupt am wo i ha tashogi mo pi am hu ni-tatchui oithch hab e junihim ch am wabsh jiawul tatchui oithch hab e junihim. T ab wo m-kaiham k ab wo i e thagito ni-wui. Nt hekaj gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig k hab wo ha juh mat d wo ni-hemajkamgak.’ Neh, bo kaij g Jesus ab ni-wui.
44026019	“Pegih neh, Agrippa map d kownal, bad wa masma am i e chehgi ni-wui hegai mo d si ge'e kownal am wehs ha'ichu thahm k hab wa masma ni-cheha. Kunt ahni ab wohog elith
44026020	k am ha hekaj i ahgahi Damascus t am g ha'ichu ahgaj k amjed am ahgahi Jerusalem t am ch wehsko Judea chekshani ch ed. K am hahawa ni-tashogith g Jiosh mant am ha wui wo hih g nahnko mahs hemajkam. Ni am mu'ikpa ha ahgithahim mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui k amjed hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.
44026021	Neh, k d ihtha mad heg hekaj an ni-bei g ni-wehm o'othham am ge'e cheopi ch ed k chum alo ni-mua.
44026022	K wabshaba ia'i himtham g Jiosh am ni-wehmaj ch ni-nuhkuth. Ni heg hekaj ia kehk ch am si tasho em-ahgith ahpim mam d s-has haha'ichu mani haschu am ep ha ahgith g sho'ig hemajkam. K ihtha ha'ichu ni-ahga d wa'i hegai mo haschu g Mosesbad ch hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam am heki hu ahgahim mat am hab wo e juh.
44026023	Sh ihtham am ahg matsh wa g Jiosh si Kehsha wo e sho'igchuth k wo e muhkith k uhpam wo i wuhsh ab muhkig t amjed k ith hekaj wo kuhpi'o g tho'ibiathag am ha wehhejed g Tutuligo ch nahnko mahs hemajkam.”
44026024	Neh, bo wa masma hejel e wehhejed neok g Paul. K g Festus ab si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ahpi aptki wabsh e lohgoch, Paul. Ha'ichu m-mahchig atki wabsh m-lohgoch.”
44026025	K hab kaij g Paul, “Pi ant sha'i ni-lohgoch, si s-has ha'ichu Festus. Hegai mani haschu hab ahg d si wohokam
44026026	ch am wabsh si tasho hab e junihim t-shahgith. K g Agrippa wehs s-mahch.
44026027	Agrippa map d kownal, m ap wa s-ha wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
44026028	K hab kaij g Agrippa ab wui g Paul, “Nap hab elith mapt ha hekaj wabsh s-pehegi wo i ni-nodagi ith wui Jesus himthag?”
44026029	K g Paul hab kaij, “Chum anis ha hekaj o gm hu ba'ich. K wabshaba g ni-ho'ige'ithahuna am Jiosh wui d ihtha mamt wehsijj ahpim mam am ni-kaiham ith tashkaj hems ab wo s-wohochuth k hab wo chu'igk mani ahni ch wabsh hi wo wa pi e wupulshch g e hukshchim wainomikaj.”
44026030	T am hahawa wehs i gegokiwua
44026031	k ab a'ai e wui hab kaij am hihimathch, “Pi atki ha'ichu has sha'i juh ihtha o'othham mat hekaj wo e muhkith o mas wo e kuhpach.”
44026032	K hab kaij g Agrippa ab wui g Festus, “T wo wa chum e thagito ihtha mat hems pi ab hu wo e ah mat ab wo i gei si ge'e kownal wui.”
44027001	Mt am hahawa thagito g Paul ch ha'i ep lilso shonthal ha-ge'ejig wui mat am wo i ha ui ge'echu kownal wui. Ith o hab chehgig Julius ch d ha-ge'ejig hegam mo hab e a'aga Ge'echu Kownal Shonthalig.
44027002	K am hema thaha g ge'e wahlko ch atsh am gahi wo i wua Asia jewed wui. T g Julius g e-shonthalig ha wehm am ha ui g lilso k am i chehchsh heg ab wahlko. Nt ahni Luke ep ha oi. T heg ha oi Aristarcas mo ab d kihkam Thessalonica t ab am Macedonia jewed ch ed. Kutt am gahi i shul g ge shuhthagi.
44027003	Am ba'ich i tash, tt am thatha Sidon kihhim t am. K eda g Julius s-ho'ige'ith g Paul ch hiwigi mat am wo him k wo ha nei g e-naipijju mat hegam wo thagio'i.
44027004	Tt amjed am hahawa gahi ep i shul. K wabshaba g hewel ab si s-gewkam med huduni tahgio t amjed ab t-wui. Tt hekaj an bihbij Cyprus jewed wehgaj mat pi wo heb hu t-wi'ichkwua.
44027005	T am hebai i cheka. Tt am gahi i shul hegai ge shuhthagi mo an miabithch g Cilicia jewed ch Pamphylia jewed k ga hu thatha mash ab d Myra kihhim am Lycia jewed ch ed.
44027006	T amai g shonthal ha-ge'ejig am hema ep cheh g ge'e wahlko. Ith ash ab Alexandria t amjed am Egypt jewed ch ed ch atsh gm hu wo gahi i gei Italy jewed wui. Kutt heg ab i chehchsh
44027007	k am gahi i shul. K wabshaba ab t-wui hewed he'ekia i tash. K hekaj wabsh s-bahbagi him g wahlko ch am hu wa has masma ga hu jiwia Nidas kihhim t ab. T ab i t-shohbi g hewel. Kutt hekaj inhab sha'al i t-nohnogi wakolim tahgio ab wui hegai al jewed mo hab chehgig Crete. K an s-mu'ukam i koa g jewed. K hab e a'aga Salmon Koa.
44027008	Kutt heg hugith an bihbij k am hu wa has masma ga hu thatha mash hebai s-ap thadhaiwup g wapalko. K ia amjed pi sha'i mehk hegai kihhim mo d Lasia.
44027009	Kuttki pi oi ba'ich hihim k ab wabsh ai mat wo si hewedath s-hehpich'ed. T hekaj wo s-ta ehbithamak matt am gahi wo i shul. K g Paul am ha'ichu chum ha ahgith
44027010	ch hab kaij, “Neh'e! Bani masma neith matki wo s-ta ehbithamak matt am gahi wo i shul ia'i amjed. T am hu wo e padch g wahlko ch hegai mo mohto. Kuttp hems ep wo ha'i t-ko'ij.”
44027011	T wabshaba g shonthal ha-ge'ejig ab si s-ha wohoch g wahlko nuhkuththam ch enigakam k pi ab hu kaiha g Paul mo ab chum ha ahgith.
44027012	Pi o apkothag amai ha wehhejed g wapalko s-hehpich'ed. K heg hekaj mu'ijj hab kaij matt am gahi wo i shulig k wo chum si s-ahim g Phoenix kihhim am Crete t am. Am o e shohbithch g shuhthagi to'otonk. K g wapalko am wabsh s-ap thadhaiwup.
44027013	Kut ab s-bahbagi i meh g hewel wakolim tahgio amjed. K hab e ahg hegam mo himchuth g wahlko mat am hab wo e juh mat has masma am e a'aga ch heg hekaj am wupulshpi'o g wahlko k am himch si miabithch g jewed hugithag.
44027014	T wabshaba ab haha wabsh s-gewkam i meh g juhpin hewel ab jewed thahm amjed
44027015	k ab si s-ta ehbitham wi'ichkwua g t-wahlko. Kut am i pi e nako mas wo mo'oshk himch g wahlko ihtha hewel. Kutt am wabsh i thagito k wabsh hiwigi g hewel mat am i t-wi'ichkwuhi.
44027016	K am hema al jewedag ch hab chehgig Cauda. K hi wa sha e shohbith matt an wecho bihbij. K eda am wabsh kia e chewaimed g al chum wahlko shuhthagi ch ed. Kutt am hahawa s-hasigam i cheshaj.
44027017	T g chikpantham an hahawa si s-wihnam wupulsh g ge'e wahlko mat pi wo e padch. Am attp hems wo t-wi'ichkwua jewed wui. T g wahlko am hu wo e hiash hia ch ed. T heg hekaj g chikpantham ab i huhuds hegai lohna mo hekaj himchuth g wahlko k wabsh hiwigi mat g hewel am i t-wi'ichkwuhi.
44027018	T ihtha sha'i si s-gewk hewel pi sha'i ha'asa. K am ba'ich d i tash. T gm hu i shul hegai mo mohto g ge'e wahlko.
44027019	K am ba'ich d ep i tash. K am wabsh kia si hewed. T gm hu i nehnch g hejel e-nohnhoikaj hegai mo haschukaj chum himchuth g ge'e wahlko mat wo si i haukai.
44027020	Kutt mu'i tashkaj pi sha'i nei g tash tonlig o g huhu'u. K am wabsh i med g s-gewk hewel. Tt am hu hebai hab haha wabsh i t-ah mattki pi wo sha'i t-tho'ibia.
44027021	Kuch tash pi ha'ichu sha'i ko'a. T g Paul ab i ha waith k hab kaij, “Mamt hems ab wo ni-kaiha, kutt pi ab hu wo chum gahi i shul ab amjed matt wa ab thadhaiwua. Neh, t ithani chum pi wo e padch g wahlko. T g ha'ichu mohtoi pi wo heb hu e shul.
44027022	Mt wabshaba pi has wo sha'i e tahtkkath. Pi amt hedai wo sha'i e muhkith. Heg at wa'i wahlko wo e padch.
44027023	Ith ani s-mahch nat pi hema am i e chehgi g anghil ni-wui
44027024	k hab kaij, ‘Pi g sha'i ha'ichu ehbithath, Paul. Hemho wa apt am wo kekiwua si ge'e kownal wui. T g Jiosh ab i m-kaiham k wehs wo ha tho'ibia hegam mo m-wehmaj.’ Neh, bo kaij g anghil ab ni-wui.
44027025	“Kumt am wo si i e gewpkai. Jiosh at woho hab wo juh hegai mo haschu am ni-ahgith g anghil
44027026	k ab wo t-u'apa g hewelkaj mo ab hebai al jewedag shuhthagi ch ed.”
44027027	Am d i gohk thomig amjed mat am t-ai g s-gewk hewel, t eda i e huh g s-chuhugam. K am wabsh kia t-wi'ichkwuhim. K hegam wahlko nuhkuththam hab elith mach aihim mash ab hebai jewedag
44027028	ch heg hekaj am ha'ichu s-wehch i huduni g wijinakaj an wudk mat heg hekaj wo s-mai mas he'es i s-juhk. T gd hu si taht g jewed mat siant gokko wehst-mahm (120) tad wijina hekaj. Kut ab i wanchkwua ihtha s-wehch ha'ichu. K am sha'i he'es, t am ep i huduni. T gd hu ep si taht g jewed mat humukto wehst-mahm (90) tad wijina hekaj.
44027029	T am i s-mai moki ab aihim mo ab hema jewedag k s-ehbith mat am hu ab wo gei hohothai ch ed g wahlko. T hekaj gi'ik am shul g s-wehch wapainomi mo hekaj wulshshap g ge'e wahlko k am hahawa si e ho'ige'ithahu mat wo mahsij.
44027030	K ha'i hejel s-e tho'ibiamk g wahlko nuhkuththam ch am i huduni g al chum wahlko shuhthagi ch ed hab wabsh s-e junimk mat am ha'i ep wo i huhuds g wupulshpadaj g wahlko.
44027031	K wabshaba g Paul hab kaij ab wui g shonthal ha-ge'ejig ch hegam shonthal, “Pi amt wo sha'i e tho'ibia matp wo sha t-thagito ihtham wahlko nuhkuththam.”
44027032	T hekaj g shonthal an si hikkumia g wipijina mo an hekaj wulshch g al chum wahlko. T gd hu gei shuhthagi ch ed.
44027033	Kuki eda mahsihim. K g Paul am ha chehani mat wo ha'ichu huh hab kaijch, “Tho wa'i gohk thomig mamt amjed pi ha'ichu huh nam pi e kudut ith hekaj pi t-ap'ethag.
44027034	Mt ab hig wo ha'ichu hug k ab wo i e gewpkai. Hemho wa amt wehsijj wo e tho'ibia.”
44027035	Neh, bat che'iok am ha hekaj bei g pahn k ab si ihm g Jiosh wehs ha wehhejed k am hahawa i hahain k huh.
44027036	T wehsijj am i neithok ab si i e gewkemhun k am hahawa ha'ichu huh.
44027037	Kuch eda d gohk siant wewa'akko gamai chuhthp (276).
44027038	Tt am i wehsijj kokwoth. Kut am hahawa ep i chikpan k gm hu shul g pilkani ge shuhthagi ch ed mat wo si i haukai g ge'e wahlko.
44027039	T am i mahsi, t g wahlko nuhkuththam pi sha'i amich hegai jewed mattki ab wui i wuwha. K eda am s-tadaniko i wahks g shuhthagi ch pi hohothaig an hugidaj an. T hab i e ah mat am wo himch g wahlko. Tp hems ab s-ap wo thahiwua heg eda.
44027040	T hekaj am si hikkumia g wupulshpadaj. T im hu shul shuhthagi ch ed. K eda an wupulshch hegai mo hekaj s-apko e himchuth g wahlko. Kumt gam si wuhpul'o k am hahawa wabsh i cheshaj hegai lohna mo gm hu ba'ich hab chu'ig. T g hewel am t-wi'ichkwua am wui mo am i wahks g shuhthagi.
44027041	T wabshaba gd hu si e hiash g wahlko mo'o o'od ch ed mat koi am hu i wah. K eda sha'i si s-gewkam ab i hihhim g shuhthagi to'otonk. Kut hegai mo gm hu oithch hab chu'ig gam si e ohmi.
44027042	T g shonthal am i e ap'ech mat wehs wo ha koktha g lilso mat pi wo i e watchwihim k wo heb hu wohp.
44027043	T wabshaba pi ha hiwigi g ha-ge'ejig nat pi s-tho'ibiam g Paul k am wehsijj ha chehani mat wo i e watchwihi am jewed koa wui. Tsh hegam mo s-mahch g watchwi am wo i nehni k hehe'ejel wo i e watchwihi.
44027044	T heg ha'i am wo i ha oi an e u'ukch u'us t an mat ab e ohmi g wahlko. Kutt hab masma wehsijj t-tho'ibia ga hu ak mo ab i koa g jewed.
44028001	Kuki am ha'i d o'othham ch si s-ap i e taht k ab i t-neith k si s-t-nawojima. Kutt s-mai mash ihtha al jewed d Malta. K eda juhk ch s-hehpith. Kutki am ge t-nahj.
44028003	T g Paul am ha'i ku'a mat am wo si i mehmeth g nahtha k am toa mei ch ed. T g ko'oi ab hema si i tha'iwush tonithk k an ki'ish nowij an.
44028004	T g kihkam am i nei ihtha ko'oi mo an ki'ishch g Paul k hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Ith oki d ha mu'akam ch hi wa chum pi e muhkith am shuhthagi ch ed. Kuki am hab wa mahs matki hemho wa wo e muhkith k ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.”
44028005	K wabshaba g Paul am si e nowigith ch gm hu wua g ko'oi mei ch ed k pi sha'i ko'okam e juh.
44028006	K ihtham kihkam am chum neith mat wo i tosko o wabsh chum hekith wo muhk k i gei. T wabshaba gm hu wabsh i mehko. T oi wa pi ha'ichu has sha'i juh g Paul. T am hahawa gawul ep i e ah k hab kaij moki d jiosh.
44028007	Ha-ge'ejig ihtham hemajkam o hab chehgig Publius ch am wa'i mia oithag. Kuch am wehmaj thadkkahim waik tash nat pi si s-ap ab i t-nei.
44028008	Kuki g ohgaj wo'ok ch mumku g s-tonjigkaj ch wakuithagkaj. T g Paul am i wah mo am wo'o k an tahtam k am i tai g Jiosh mat wo thoaj. T wa woho hab e juh mat thoaj.
44028009	T am i nei ihtha g hemajkam. T am hahawa mu'i ep thatha g kok'otham k e thothaj.
44028010	T hekaj ab si has i t-elith k sha'i mu'i ha'ichu t-mah. Am hu i hebai mat am i e ai matt wo hihi, t ab ep i t-mah hegai matt haschu wo i tatchuath am gahi ep i shuligk.
44028011	T eda hema wuhshath g s-hehpich'ed g ge'e wahlko ch hab e a'aga Kukathi Jijosh ch ab Alexandria t amjed. Am d i waik mashath, tt heg ab gm hu gahi i shul juhpin tahgio wui
44028012	k ga hu thatha mo am d Syracuse kihhim. Am d i waik tash,
44028013	tt gm hu gahi ep i shul juhpin tahgio wui k ga hu thatha mo am d Regium kihhim. Am ba'ich d i tash, t ab i meh g hewel wakolim tahgio amjed. Tt hekaj s-hohtam gm hu thatha mo d i gohk tash mash am d Putoli kihhim am gahi i shuligk.
44028014	Kuki am ha'i kih g t-wehm wohochuththam ch ab si t-ahgith mattsh am wo ha wehmajkahim hemako thomig ab. Kutt wa woho hab t-juh k gm hu hahawa hihi Rome wui.
44028015	Kutsh wa heki hu am kah hegam t-wehm wohochuththam ab Rome t ab mattsh am wo thatha k atki mehk ab i hihi mat wo t-ho'ige'el. Kut ha'i ihtham am t-nam mo am d Waik Gegosithakud. T ha'i am ep t-nam mo am d Appius Nolawtakud. Kut ab i ha nei g Paul k ab ihm g Jiosh k ab si e gewkai.
44028016	Kutt am thatha Rome t am. Kumt wabsh hiwigi g Paul mat wabsh hejelko wo i chiwia. K g shonthal am hi wa nuhkuth.
44028017	Mu'i o am kih g Tutuligo. K am d i waik tash. T g Paul am i ha wai g ha-ge'egedga e-kih wui. T am i e nam. K hab kaij ab ha wui: “Ni-hajuni, am amt ni-lihsoch Jerusalem t am k ab i ni-thagito Rome chehanig wui. K eda hab wa chum mahs mant pi has chu'i ab ha wui t-hajuni o g t-himthag.
44028018	T hegam Rome t ab haha'ichu ab ha'ichu ni-kakke k chum s-ni-thagitoimk nat pi pi ha'ichu sha'i cheh manis heg hekaj wo ni-muhkith.
44028019	T wabshaba g t-wehm o'othham ab wui gegokiwua ihtha. Kunt hekaj hab i ni-ah mantki hemho wa ab wo i gei si ge'e kownal wui mo hi wa chum pi am hu ha'ichu d hegai manis ab wo ha abch g t-wehm o'othham.
44028020	Ab ani hiwig hegai Jiosh si Kehsha mach wehsijj nenida ahchim Tutuligo. Ni hab elith mo hema d hegai ch heki hu am i wuhsh. K eda mu'ijj g t-wehm o'othham pi wohochuth mo d hegai ch hab s-ni-keh'ith. Nt heg hekaj ab i em-wai mant em-wehm wo a'agath.”
44028021	K hab kaij ab wui, “Pi at ab hu hedai sha'i t-o'ohani hegam ge'eged o'othham ab Judea t ab ab m-amjed. T pi hedai ia hu sha'i jiwia g t-hajuni ab amjed mas am hu i pi ap has m-ahg.
44028022	K eda wehsko g hemajkam mu'i pi ap has ahg ihtha himthag mapsh ahpi s-wohochuth. Kuch s-kaimk maps has wo chei ab amjed.”
44028023	Neh, bo kaij. T am hahawa a'aga k kei g tash mat wo e jehnigi. T am him k am i e ai g tash. T mu'i am thatha amai mo am thaha g Paul k am i e jehnigi ge tash oitham k gm hu si huduni. K g Paul am i ha tashogith g Jiosh kownaltalig ch am si s-gewkam ha jehnigith mo g Jesus d hegai si Kehshaj g Jiosh mat wa ab amjed an o'oha g Mosesbad ch hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.
44028024	T ha'i ab i s-wohoch ab kaiok. T wabshaba ha'ijj pi sha'i wohoch.
44028025	T am i pi sha'i e ap'et k hab e juh mat wo a'ai hihi. T hekaj ith hab ep chei g Paul, “Tho si wohokam mash wa has i kaij g Jiosh ab em-amjed ab Isaiabad wui. K an hab chu'ig Isaiabad o'ohana ed:
44028026	Am g hihm k am hab cheh'i ha wui ihtham hemajkam: Mt wo kah g ha'ichu ni-ahga ch wo neithath mani haschu s-kehg hab em-junith ch wabshaba pi wo amich mani d ahni ch hab wua ha'ichu.
44028027	Em-chegitoithag at i e mehkoth ab ni-amjed. Kum pi chechkaithag ch pi ab hu ni-wui i e nohnogithamk mant wo i kegch g pi ap em-chegitoithag ch pi ap ha'ichu hab em-juni. Neh, bo masma an o'ohadag mo ith hab kaij g Jiosh.
44028028	“Pegih, mtki pi ab hu wo kaiha g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mat wo em-tho'ibia. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab wo ha mah g gawul mahs hemajkam ihtha tho'ibiathag ahga mo ab chum s-em-mahkimk. T hegam ab hi wo kaiha.” [
44028029	T am i ha'asa hab chei ihtha g Paul. T gm hu a'ai hihi hegam mo ab kah si e ne'owinahimch.]
44028030	K am kihkahim g Paul gohk ahith ab hema kih ed mo namkith ch am kih. K g hemajkam am chechga.
44028031	K g Paul si s-ap e tahtk ch ab ha neith ch am wabsh si s-mahchim ha'ichu ha ahgith ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig ch ha mashcham ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. K pi hedai sha'i shohbith.
45001001	Am ant wo i em-o'ohani g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ahni Paul mani d piongaj g Jesus Christ. Jiosh at ab i ni-waith k am i ni-kei mant ith wo ahgachugath.
45001002	K d ihtha ha'ichu ahgaj matki g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam an o'oha matsh wa g Jiosh ab wo i wuhshath.
45001003	K ihtha ha'ichu ahgaj am t-tashogith hegai mo d alithaj ch d ge'e t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Ith atsh ia mahsi jewed thahm k ab d amjedkamaj g kownalibad David. K heg hekaj tasho mo woho d hemajkam.
45001004	Kutsh g Jiosh ab i wuhshath g Jesus Christ muhkig amjed am i thahm matsh e muhkith k hab masma ab t-chehgithch mo d alithaj ch d hekia s-ap'ekam
45001005	Kut wa ab si i s-ni-ho'ige'el g Jesus Christ k am i ni-kei am wehhejed g Jiosh mantsh am wo i ha ahgithahi g nahnko mahs hemajkam g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj. Kutsh mu'ijj ab wo s-wohochuth k ab wo s-wohog elithath.
45001006	Ni am wa kah mamtsh ha'i ahpim Rome t am hemajkam ab i s-wohoch. Jiosh o ab si em-tatchua ch ab i em-waith k am hab em-juh mamt ab i s-wohoch g Jesus Christ k d Jiosh hemajkamga. Kunt heg hekaj am wo ha'ichu i em-o'ohani. Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
45001008	Wehsko o am e a'aga mamtsh ab i s-wohoch g Jesus Christ. Ni heg hekaj ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.
45001009	Wehs ni-ihbthag amjed ani chikpanith g Jiosh am ahgachugch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g alithaj. K g Jiosh s-mahch mani chum hekith ab wui ni-ho'ige'ithahun am em-wehhejed.
45001011	S-em-neithamk ani ch ab tahni g Jiosh matp hems am wo ap'ech mant am wo i em-chehgim k wo i em-wehmt em-wohochuthadag ed mamt hekaj am wo i e gewpkai.
45001012	Ab att a'ai wo i t-wehmt ab a'ai kahk g t-wohochuthadag.
45001013	Am g wo s-mahchk mani mu'ikko am a'ap'echuth mant am wo i em-chehgim. K wabshaba am ha'ichu has e wua mani heg hekaj pi ni-nankog. Si ani tatchua mant am wo i em-wehmt am em-ahgithch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga hab masma mani i ha wehmaj hegam mo hahasko kihthag ch hab wa'ap pi d Tutuligo.
45001014	Ab o ni-chehani g Jiosh mant wo ha ahgi g wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj, chum wa hems hegam mo pi chu a'amichuth ch hegam mo d mischini.
45001015	Ni heg hekaj ni-nahtokch mant am epai wo i em-ahgithahi ahpim mam am kih Rome t am.
45001016	Wehs at wo ha tho'ibia g Jiosh hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ. Kuni heg hekaj wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk ch am ahgachug. Tutuligo at wehpeg ab bei e-ap'ethag mat wo e tho'ibia k g gawul mahs hemajkam ab hahawa bei.
45001017	Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o am t-tashogithch mat hedai g Jiosh am wo i ap'ech e wehhejed. An o o'ohadag: Am at wo i ha ap'ech g Jiosh e wehhejed hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj. Kut hegam wo wa'i bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
45001018	Ab o t-wui i e tashogith g Jiosh. K wabshaba mu'i hemajkam gm hu hab i juhkch ch hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. K ihtha pi ap'ekam an kuhpahim mat wo s-e mai g wohokam. T g Jiosh heg hekaj s-ko'okam wo ha namkith.
45001020	Tt wo chum s-mahchk mo has chu'ig g Jiosh am neithch g nahtoij no pi ith am chum t-tashogith mo g Jiosh wehs ha'ichu thahm hab chu'ig ch wehs edgith g gewkthag chum hekith. Kut hemho wa ab wo moht g e-chu'ichig matp hedai pi wo mahchim.
45001021	Neh, wehs hemajkam o wa chum s-mahch mo an hema d Jiosh ch wabsh pi ab hu mahkch g has elithadag. Ab o s-ha ho'ige'ith. K wabshaba pi ab hu i ho'ige'elith ch wabsh pehegi ha'ichu chegito. K am wabsh i s-chuhugam g ha-chegitoithag.
45001022	Bo e ahg mo s-chu a'amichuth ch eda pi ha'ichu mahch.
45001023	Jiosh o d pi ha huhugetham ch d si ha'ichu. Kutt heg ab wo wa'i chum ihmath mo d t-Jioshga. K wabshaba ihtham im hu hab wabsh juhkch ch wabsh ha'ichu jijoshchuth ch ab ha ihm. K eda d wabsh hemajkam ha-nahtoi mo ha o'othhamt o atp hems ha ha'ichu thoakamt. T hekaj g Jiosh am wabsh i ha thagito mat hab wo juh hegai mo haschu hab s-junimk. Kuki hab wua g s-uam ha'ichu ch s-ta edam ha'ichu. U'uwi o ha'i chum hems pi ha kuhkunt ch e wehm hab wua g s-ta edam ha'ichu.
45001027	K g chechoj pi ha hohont ch e wehm hab wa'ap wua g s-ta edam ha'ichu. Kut heg hekaj wo si s-ko'okam ha namkith g Jiosh.
45001028	Pi o tatchua ihtham mas wo s-mahchk g Jiosh. T g Jiosh heg hekaj am wabsh i ha thagito pi kehg ha-chegitoithag ed. K am hab wua hegai mat haschu pi am hu hab wo chum wuath.
45001029	Ab at wabsh i si ha shuhth g nahnko mahs pi ap'ekam mo ha'i si pihk e elith g s-kaisthagkaj ch ha'i s-ta kek'eithama o s-chu hehgamk o s-ha mu'amk o s-chu cheggiamk o s-chu i'attomk o s-chu padhog eh'elithamk o s-chu ahgamk.
45001030	Ha'i o s-ko'okam has e ahg o s-ta ko'okthama o chum si e hahaschuth o si i e nakog mat am ba'ich hab wo i juh g pi ap'ekam o pi ab hu wohog ha elith g e-ge'egedga
45001031	o s-u'ama. Ha'i o pi hab wua hegai mo haschu hab kaij mat hab wo juh o pi hedai pihk elith o pi ab hu ha ho'ige'ith no pi s-keh'ith g Jiosh.
45001032	Jiosh chehanig o hab chu'ig mat hema hab wo masmak ch ab wo nako g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. K ihtham am wa chum s-mahch ihtha ch eda am hab wa masma hab e junihim ch wabsh s-hohho'ith mo ha'ijj am hab wa'ap e junihim.
45002001	Na'ams ha'ijj ahpim hab kaij “Hah, sho'o wa'i si pi ap d hehemajkam hegam map am ha a'aga k ch hemho wa wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag,” ch amtp eda hems hab wa'ap junihim ihtha. Neh, m wabsh hejel e-ne'okikaj ab e mohto'ith g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.
45002002	S-mahch ach mo d wabsh i si shel mat wo ha lothai g Jiosh hegam mo hab wua hegai mani am em-ahgith.
45002003	Kumt ahpim hemho wa hab wa'ap wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag mamtp am hab wo junihith ihtha.
45002004	Ithani o wabsh ab si s-t-bahbgi g Jiosh ch s-hemajim ab t-nenida no pi tatchua matt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap t-chegitoi.
45002005	K wabshaba mu'ijj pi ab hu kaimk g Jiosh ch pi sha'i pihk e elith hekaj. Ihtham o ba'ich i ge'e ab e mohto'ithahim hegai s-ko'ok namkithadag mat wo nam ge'e lothaita tash ch ed.
45002006	Heg at i tash ed wo t-namkith g Jiosh heg hekaj mach haschu hab i junihim.
45002007	Heg att wo cheh mach haschu i gahg. Am g hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch wo e gahgithath g Jiosh ap'echutha. T g Jiosh am wo i em-wahpki e-kihthag ed mamt chum hekith an wo wehmajk.
45002008	Mu'i hemajkam o wabsh hejel e tatchua ch hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. T ihtham g Jiosh ab wo ha mah g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag.
45002009	Kut ab wo tahtkkath g sho'igthag ch s-ko'ok, wahm g Tutuligo matp pi hab hu wo kaiha hegai mo haschu t-nuhkuthachuth g Jiosh.
45002010	T g Jiosh ab wo si t-ha'ichuch ahchim mach hab junihim g s-ap'ekam k ab wo t-mah g has elithadag ch s-ap tahhathkam. Ahchim Tutuligo att wehpeg bei ihtha s-ap'ekam. Mt wabshaba ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ab hahawa bei.
45002011	Jiosh o wehs t-wepo ab t-neith ch wehs t-wepo s-t-tho'ibiamk.
45002012	Gawul mahs hemajkam o pi hekaj g Moses chehanig ch wabshaba s-mahch mo haschu d s-ap'ekam ch wo e lothai heg hekaj mo pi hab junihim g s-ap'ekam. K g Tutuligo s-mahch heg hekaj chehanig mo haschu d s-ap'ekam ch heg hekaj hab wa'ap wo e lothai mo pi am hu hab junihim.
45002013	Pi at hedai wo i ha ap'ech g Jiosh heg wabsh hekaj mo kah g chehanig k washaba heg hekaj mat heg am hab wo junihith.
45002014	Heki o hu pi edgith g Jiosh chehanig g gawul mahs hemajkam ch eda s-mahch mo haschu d s-ap'ekam. K g ha-mahchig d ha-chehanig. K g ha-mahchig d ha-chehanig.
45002015	K am wa tasho mo wa hab chu'ig no pi e kudut mo hekith hab wua g pi ap'ekam ch s-ap e tahtk mo hekith hab wua g s-ap'ekam.
45002016	Kut hab wa'ap wo e juh heg eda tash mat kei g Jiosh mat g Jesus Christ wo ha lothai g ha-chu'ichigkaj, chum hems g pi ap ha-chegitoithag. Neh, bo chu'ig ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mani ahgachug.
45002017	Mu'ijj g ni-wehm Tutuligo o hab e elith mo s-ap s-mahch g Jiosh tatchui ch am hab junihim g s-ap'ekam no pi edgith g chehanigaj.
45002019	Bo e elith mo d ha wanimedtham ch ab ha mahkch g tonlig hegam mo pi edgith g Jiosh chehanig.
45002020	Bo e elith mo wehs ab u'ukch g amichuthadag ch wohokam no pi ab u'ukch hegai chehanig. Chum o wa ha mashcham g pi ha'ichu mahchim ch a'al
45002021	k ch eda pi hejel am hu hab wua g e-mashchama. Ha'ijj o ha mihshmath mat pi hedai ha'ichu wo ha ehsithath
45002022	ch pi wo ha wehm wo'iwua hegai mo pi d ha-wehm kihhim ch eda hejel hab masma hab e wua. Si o pi hohho'ith mat ab wo ihmath g hemajkam nahtoi k ch eda wo ha ehs mo haschu an hab chu'ig ha-cheopi ed.
45002023	Ab o chum si e haha'ichuchuth mo edgith g Jiosh chehanig ch eda mu'ikko pi am hu hab junihim ch ab mamka g Jiosh g si edathag.
45002024	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Gawul mahs hemajkam o s-ko'okam has ahg g Jiosh ha hekaj g Tutuligo.
45002025	Tho si ha'ichu g pahl hikuchka em-wehhejed mamtp ab wo wohog elithath g chehanig. Mtp wabshaba pi ab hu wo wohog elithath, k pi has d sha'i ahga g pahl hikuchka.
45002026	Matp hema ab wo sha wohog elithath g Jiosh chehanig, t g Jiosh hab masma ab wo neithath mo pahl hikuchkas, chum as pi d Tuhligo ch pi woho hikuchkas.
45002027	Gawul mahs hemajkam o pi pahl hikuchkas ch eda ha'i hab e junihim mo hab masma hab chu'ig g chehanig. Kut heg hekaj ab wo e chu'ichigch g Tutuligo no pi edgith g chehanig ch eda melichkwuhim.
45002028	Pi o d Jiosh hemajkamga hegam mat wabsh gawul juh g e-chuhkug g pahl hikuchkakaj.
45002029	Hegam o hi d Jiosh hemajkamga mat gawul juh g e-ihbthag. Kut pi wo e nako mas g chehanigkaj hab wo juh ihtha. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at hemho wo wa gawul juh g t-ihbthag. Tp hems ab wo em-hehgchul g hemajkam mamt gawul wo juh g e-chuhkug. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab wo em-hehgchul mat gawul wo e juh g em-ihbthag.
45003001	Pegih, mtp hems a ha'ijj hab wo chei, “Pi oki ha'ichu d sha'i ha-ap'ethag g Tutuligo ha thahm g gawul mahs hemajkam.”
45003002	Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mo mu'i ha'ichu d t-ap'ethag. Hema o d ihtha mat g Jiosh ab t-hiwigi g ha'ichu e-ahga matt wo ha ahgi g nahnko mahs hemajkam.
45003003	K hi wa chum woho mo ha'ijj g ni-wehm o'othham pi ab hu wohog elith g ha'ichu ahgaj. T wabshaba g Jiosh woho am hab wo juh hegai mo has i kaij.
45003004	Chum o hekith ahg g wohokam, chum as wehs hemajkam g iattogi hab wua. Neh, bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed: Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o d hekia wohokam, chum as ha'ijj hab kaij mo pi woho.
45003005	Ha'ijj o hab kaij, M o wa s-ap'e matt hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam no pi heg hekaj tasho am chehgith mo g Jiosh hab wua g s-ap'ekam. T heg hekaj pi ap hab wo e juh g Jiosh matp s-ko'okam wo t-namkith heg hekaj. Neh, bo kaij.
45003006	Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mo ahg g iattogi. Jiosh o chum hekith hab wua g s-ap'ekam. Pi at has masma wo e nako mat wo t-lothai matp d wo pi ap'ekamk.
45003007	K hab kaij ihtham, T-iattogi o am tashogith mo g Jiosh chum hekith ahg wohokam. Kuch heg hekaj am chehgith mo he'es i ge'ej g Jiosh ha'ichu k ed. Pegih, k haschu ahgch hab kaij g Jiosh machs d pi ap chu'ijkam ch wo bei g s-ko'ok namkithadag.
45003008	Ha'ijj o an ha iattogith manish hab kaij matt am hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ch hab masma wo tashogi g s-ap'ekam. T wabshaba g Jiosh wo s-ko'okam ha namkith heg hekaj.
45003009	Neh, pi o sha'i ba'ich i s-ap'e g Tutuligo mo g gawul mahs hemajkam. Wehsijj ach wa ab mohtois g pi ap'ekam. K ith an t-u'ukch. Kutt pi hedai wo sha'i t-nako machs pi hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam.
45003010	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Pi o hedai o'othham d sha'i s-ap'ekam
45003011	ch pi hedai amichuth mo haschu d s-ap'ekam ch pi hedai mahchimk g Jiosh.
45003012	Wehsijj at i e mehkoth ab amjed g Jiosh k am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. Pi o hedai hab sha'i wua g s-ap'ekam. Pi hedai.
45003013	S-ko'okam o neneok hab masma mo s-em-mu'amk ch g iattogi hab kaij. Pi kehg ha-ne'oki o hab masma i wuhshani mo g hialwui ab ko'oi amjed.
45003015	E o nahtokch mat s-ko'okam wo em-juh k wo em-mua.
45003016	Chum o hebai gantan g sho'igthag ch padchuth g s-ha-hehgig.
45003017	Pi o hekith sha'i s-ap e tahtk.
45003018	ch pi hekith ab has elith g Jiosh.
45003019	Jiosh at ab ba'ich wo i ha chu'ichigch hegam mo edgith g chehanigaj ch pi am hu heg oithch hab e junihim. K hekaj hab mahs mo g Jiosh wehs ab ha abchuth g hemajkam.
45003020	Pi at hedai wo e nako mas wehs am hab wo junihith g Jiosh chehanig ch hekaj wo i e ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio. Chehanigaj at am wo i t-tashogi mach haschu pi ap'ekam hab wua.
45003021	Ia'i ithani at am i tashogi g Jiosh mat has masma wo i ha ap'ech g hemajkam am e tahgio. Chehanig at pi wo sha'i t-ap'echuth k wabshaba heg wohokamchuth mat has masma g Jiosh wo i t-ap'ech. K g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ith hab wa'ap wohokamchuth.
45003022	Jiosh at am wo i ha ap'ech hegam matp hedai ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k ab wo hiwgath g Jesus Christ, chum as has mahs d wo hemajkamk.
45003023	Wehs hemajkam at hab juh g pi ap'ekam k pi am hu ais g Jiosh hab elitha.
45003024	K wabshaba g Jiosh ab i s-t-ho'ige'ith. T g alithaj Jesus Christ ab moht g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag am t-wehhejed. T hekaj ab i t-ap'ech g Jiosh e wui.
45003025	Jiosh at am i ap'ech mat g alithaj wo e muhkith am t-wehhejed k hekaj gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig mattp hedai ab wo i s-wohoch. Ab o wabsh s-ha ho'ige'ith hegam heki hu hemajkam mo ab s-wohochuth ch pi chegima g ha-chu'ichig
45003026	nat pi g alithaj wo e muhkith am wehs t-wehhejed. Bo wa masma am t-chehgithch g Jiosh mo chum hekith hab wua g s-ap'ekam ch wo e nako mat am wo i ha ap'ech g pi ap chu'ijkam mat hekith ab wo bei g Jesus nat pi heg ab moht g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag.
45003027	Neh, k pi ha'ichu d sha'i hegai machs hekaj wo chum si t-haschuthath. Pi att wo sha'i t-nako machs wo i t-ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio am hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam. Jiosh at am wo i t-ap'ech e wui matt hekith ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj.
45003029	Pi o hegam d wa'i ha-Jioshga mat ab ha mah g chehanig ch wabshaba wehs hemajkam d ha-Jioshga.
45003030	Ab o ha wehnath ch wepo masma ab ha neith g Tutuligo ch hegam mo pi d Tutuligo. Wehsijj at hab wa'i masma wo i e ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus.
45003031	Ith o pi hab d ahga machs im hu hab i juh g Jiosh chehanig matt hekith ab i s-wohoch. T-wohochuthadag o am i t-gewpkath matt am hab wo junihith g tatchuij mo hab wa chum d ahga g chehanigaj.
45004001	Am ant wo i wuhshath g Abrahambad mant am wo i em-tashogi ihtha mani wa em-ahgith. Ihtha Abrahambad ash d t-shohshon ahchim Tutuligo
45004002	ch ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh. Tsh g Jiosh heg hekaj am i ap'ech e tahgio. Pi atsh wa hejel am i e ap'ech heg hekaj mas hab junihim g s-ap'ekam. K heg hekaj wa pi am hu ha'ichu d sha'i hegai matsh wa heg hekaj wo chum si e haschuthath g Abrahambad.
45004003	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Abrahambad at ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh. T g Jiosh heg hekaj am i ap'ech e tahgio.
45004004	Neh, tho em-namkithadag hegai mamt wo ha gehg chikpank.
45004005	K wabshaba d em-mahkigdag hegai mamtp ab wo bei ab s-wohochuthk hegai mo ab em-makiog. K g Jiosh hab kaij mat am wo i ha ap'ech e tahgio k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch. Ith o d Jiosh mahkigdag.
45004006	K ith hab ahg g Davidbad ch hab kaij mo s-ap e tahtk hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh nat pi am wo i ha ap'ech e tahgio. K hab masma an o'ohadag:
45004007	Sho'o wa'i s-ap e tahtk hegam mat hedam g Jiosh gm hu hab i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig k pi ab hu wo ha mohto'i.
45004009	David o pi hegam hab wa'i ha ahg mo pahl hikuchkas ch wabshaba hegam hab ep ha ahg mo pi pahl hikuchkas. Heki ani hu ahg matsh g Abrahambad ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh. Sh g Jiosh heg hekaj hab kaij mo d s-ap'ekam.
45004010	Ith at hab e juh mat koi e pahl hikuch g Abrahambad.
45004011	Ab ash wa s-wohochuth g Jiosh. Sh g Jiosh heg hekaj hab kaij mo d s-ap'ekam. T heg i thahm am hahawa e pahl hikuch mat hab masma am wo wohokamch g e-wohochuthadag mat heg hekaj am i ap'ech g Jiosh. T g Jiosh hab masma wehs am wo i ha ap'ech hegam mat hab wa'ap ab wo i s-wohoch, chum hems hegam mo pi pahl hikuchkas. Heg o wa wepo mach ahchim Jiosh wohochuththam woho d Abrahambad amjedkam nach pi hab masma ap'ethag. Hemho wa att ab wo s-wohochuthath ch ab wo hiwgath hab masma mash wa g Abrahambad.
45004013	Jiosh ah am ha ahgith g Abrahambad ch amjedkamaj matsh am wo i ha ap'ech e tahgio k wehs ab wo ha mah g jewed kahchki matp ab wo i s-wohoch.
45004014	Kut pi ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk g ha-wohochuthadag matp ith hab wo sha ha juni g Jiosh hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth ch am hab wabsh junihim hegai mo an o'ohanas chehanig ed. T g Jiosh d wo s-iattomkamk matp am hab wo sha ha juni.
45004015	Pi att ab hu wo sha'i i t-ap'ech g chehanigkaj k wabshaba heg hekaj ab wo t-abch g t-chu'ichig matt ab wo bei g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag. T hegam mo pi edgith pi heg hekaj ab hu wo e abch.
45004016	Pi at ahchim am wa'i i t-ap'ech g Jiosh mach wa an u'ukch g heki hu chehanigaj. Ahpim at am ep i em-ap'ech mamt hab wa'ap ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj. Batt masma am oithk hab t-juh g Abrahambad k ab hiwig g Jiosh hemajimatalig. Ith o heg wa wepo mo g Abrahambad d t-ohg. K g Jiosh heg hekaj am t-chehgithch mat has wo chum masmak.
45004017	Bo masma an o'ohadag mash g Jiosh am ahgith g Abrahambad: Bant m-juh mapt d wo ha-shohshonk g mu'i nahnko mahs hemajkam. Ith at woho hab e juh. K d wohokam hegai Jiosh ne'oki mat g Abrahambad ab i s-wohoch. Jiosh oki e nakog mat ab wo i wuhshath g muhki ab muhkig amjed k am wo nahto ha'ichu hab wabsh che'ek mat am hab wo e juh.
45004018	Abrahambad ash wa ab s-wohochuth mat g Jiosh ab wo ha mah g ali mat eda kekelit chum as pi mahch mas has masma hab wo juh. Tsh heg hekaj hab juh g Jiosh mo d ha-shohshon g mu'i nahnko mahs hemajkam. Bo masma an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mo g Jiosh hab kaij: G i ha neith g huhu'u. Ha'akia at d wo k g m-amjedkam. Neh, boki kaij.
45004019	Tsh pi sha'i gawul juh g e-wohochuthadag g Abrahambad, chum as hems aihim g siant ahithag. Kush g Sarabad pi ha mamdat.
45004020	Abrahambad ash ab si ihm g Jiosh nash pi ab si s-wohochuth mat wo e nakog k woho am hab wo juh hegai mo haschu am ahgith.
45004022	Heg atsh hekaj am i ap'ech g Jiosh e tahgio k gm hu hab i juh g chu'ichigaj.
45004023	K pi heg wa'i wehhejed an o'ohanas hegai
45004024	ch wabshaba ahchim ep t-wehhejed. Jiosh atsh gm hu hab ep wo i juh g t-chu'ichig ahchim matt hab wa'ap ab i s-wohoch.
45004025	Heg atsh hekaj am i kei g t-kownalig Jesus mat wo e muhkith g t-chu'ichig wehhejed k ab ep wo i wuhsh muhkig amjed. Kutt am i t-ap'ech Jiosh tahgio ab i s-wohochuthk ihtha.
45005001	Am at i t-ap'ech g Jiosh e tahgio ahchim matt ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Kuch heg hekaj ab wui si s-ap t-tahtk.
45005002	Sho'o wa'i si s-hemajima a t-wui. Kuch si s-hehgig ch ab nenida mat ab wo i t-wahpki e-kihthag ed k ab wo si t-ha'ichuch.
45005003	Chum as ha'ichu t-kudut, ch eda si s-hehgig nach pi s-mahch mo g t-kudutadag hab t-wua matt wo s-chu nakogath.
45005004	T g Jiosh s-ap wo i t-el mach s-chu nakog. Kutt ith hekaj am wo i t-gewpkai heg wui mach ab nenida.
45005005	Ab at i t-mah g Jiosh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg ab t-mahtchulith mo si pihk e elith g Jiosh ab t-wui. Ch hekaj s-mahch mat woho am wo i t-wahpki g Jiosh e-kihthag ed.
45005006	Thach wa pi ap chu'ijkam ch pi ha gewkthag machs hab wo juh ha'ichu matt hekaj am wo i t-ap'ech. T wabshaba g Jiosh am i ap'ech mat g alithaj e muhkith am t-wehhejed.
45005007	Pi o hedai e muhkithamk hema wehhejed. Tp hems hema hi wo wa e muhkith hema wehhejed mo d si o'othham.
45005008	Kuch eda d wa chum pi ap chu'ijkam. T g Jiosh am t-chehgi mo he'es ab si i t-tatchua am i ap'echuthk mat g alithaj am t-wehhejed muh k gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
45005009	Kuch hab s-mahch mat hahawa pi heg hekaj ab hu wo t-namkith.
45005010	Heki ach hu pi ab hu hajunima g Jiosh. T g alithaj muh am t-wehhejed mat hab wo t-juh matt ab haha wo hajunit g Jiosh. Pegih, ch ba'ich ab i ap'ethag am Christ tho'ibiatalig ed no pi d thoakam ab muhkig amjed ch wo e nako mat wo i t-wehmtath.
45005011	Kuch si s-hehgig mat g t-kownalig Jesus Christ gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig k am i t-ap'ech mach ab hahawa si s-hajunima g Jiosh.
45005012	Ab atsh ha'ichu cheha g Jiosh hegai mo d wehpeg o'othham ch hab chehgig Adam. Tsh heg mulin k hab i shonwuich g pi ap'ekam jewed thahm. Tsh hekaj am i shonwua muhkig. Tsh g Jiosh pi hab ep juh g chehanig am hugkam matsh an i wuhsh g Mosesbad. Sh eda wehsijj hab wua g pi ap'ekam. Kush heg hekaj g muhkig wehsijj ab ha a'ahe, chum as pi mulin g chehanig hab masma matsh wa g Adambad. Jiosh oki am ha'ichu t-chehgithch ab amjed g Christ ith hekaj Adambad.
45005015	Wehsijj atsh ab ha'ichu i wahpki am wehs ha wehhejed g hemajkam. K wabshaba gawul mams hegai mat ab i wahpki. Tho muhkig hegai matsh g Adambad ab i wahki wehs ha wehhejed g hemajkam. K wabshaba d Jiosh hemajimatalig hegai matsh g Jesus Christ ab i wahki wehs t-wehhejed.
45005016	K d al hemako hegai chu'ichig mat hekaj am i wah g s-ko'ok namkithadag. K wabshaba mu'ij g pi ap t-chu'ichig. K eda g Jiosh wehs gm hu hab i junihog am t-wehhejed. Ab o d t-wuikam hegai s-ko'ok namkithadag nach pi ab d Adambad amjedkam. K wabshaba d Jiosh mahkig ihtha mat hab t-juni gm hu hab i juhk g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
45005017	Muhkig at ab wehsijj t-ma'ish heg hekaj. Adambad pi ap chu'ichig. K wabshaba g Jiosh si s-hemajim ab t-makiog g ho'ige'ithadag. Kutt am aigo thahm i chehchsh g muhkig ahchim matt ab bei. Ab o t-mahkch g ap'ethag am gahi wuhshanim g Christ matt s-ap wo himath g t-thoakag ith thahm jewed.
45005018	Pegih, ith ani em-ahgith mat g Adambad ab i wahki g s-ko'ok namkithadag am wehs t-wehhejed heg hekaj hemako pi ap e-chu'ichig. T wabshaba g Christ am hab juh g tho'ibiathag am wehs t-wehhejed heg hekaj hemako s-ap e-chu'ichig ch ab t-makiog g wechij thoakag.
45005019	Adambad at pi wohog el g Jiosh. K heg hekaj mu'ijj d pi ap chu'ijkam. Christ at hejel ab s-wohog el g Jiosh. Kut heg hekaj mu'ijj ab wo i e ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio.
45005020	Hemajkam o pi hohho'ith g chehanig ch ba'ich hab i s-junimk g pi ap'ekam wa chum s-mahchch g chehanig. K wabshaba ab t-mahks matt hekaj wo s-mahchk mo he'es i ge'ej g pi ap t-chu'ichig. K eda g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag ba'ich i ge'ej no pi gm hu hab i junihog g t-chu'ichig.
45005021	Pegih, tt wo chum nei mat am t-gewito g pi ap'ekam nach pi heg hekaj ab aihim g muhkig. Heg o wa wepo mo d t-maliomig g pi ap'ekam ch am t-wanchshulig muhkig wui. Kuch wabshaba hemuch edgith g Jiosh hemajimatalig ab i s-wohochuthk g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
45006001	Pegih, tp hems ha'i hab wo chei matt hig ba'ich am hab wo i junihith g pi ap'ekam. T g Jiosh ba'ich wo i s-t-ho'ige'el.
45006002	K eda pi hab sha'i chum mahs machs am hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam. Am att i thagito g pi ap'ekam. K pi am hu hahawa ha gewkthag t-thahm. Ith o heg wa wepo matt heki hu muh natt pi pi hab hahawa ep wo junihith g pi ap'ekam.
45006003	Ab att t-chehgi g t-pahl wakonakaj matt ab i t-hemakoj Jesus Christ wehm. K heg wa wepo matt am wehmaj muh natt pi ab i t-hemakoj heg wehm mat muh.
45006004	T-pahl wakona o wepogithas matt wehmaj gd hu t-hiash am i muhk. T g Jiosh ab i t-mah g wechij thoakag heg hekaj si ge'e e-gewkthag mat hekaj ab i wamigi g Christ muhkig amjed.
45006005	Ab att i t-hemakoj heg wehm mat am t-wehhejed muh. Kut hekaj ab t-mah g wechij thoakag. Ith o wepo masma matt am wehmaj ko'o k wehmaj ep t-chechegito.
45006006	Am att i thagito g heki hu t-thoakag. Kut hab gm hu hab i e juh g pi ap t-tatchui. K pi an hu hahawa t-wulshch g pi ap'ekam.
45006007	Nat hig hab ep wo juh g pi ap'ekam hegai mat heki hu muh? Pegih, tt ahchim hab wa masma am i thagito g pi ap'ekam ab i s-wohochuthk mat g Christ am t-wehhejed muh.
45006008	Heg muhkig o d t-muhkig no pi d t-namkithadag. Ith att ab i s-wohoch. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab t-mah g wechij thoakag k ab wo i t-wuwhas muhkig amjed hab masma mat hab juh g Christ.
45006009	Pi at hekith ep wo muh g Christ mat wa uhpam ep e chegito. Muhkig o pi am hu thahm gewkthag.
45006010	Hemho at muh mat wo kuhgi g pi ap'ekam gewkthag am t-thothakag ed k ep e chegito k hemuch d thoakam wehhejed g Jiosh.
45006011	Pegih, mt wo chum kuhgi g pi ap'ekam e-thothakag ed k d wo thothakamk wehhejed g Jiosh ab i e hemakochuthk g Jesus Christ wehm.
45006012	Pi g wo hiwgithath g pi ap'ekam mas am ep wo i chikp g em-thoakag mamt hekaj hab wo juh g pi ap e-tatchui.
45006013	Wehs amt am wo i e-thagito Jiosh wui namsh pi d e tho'ibiakam ab amjed g muhkig. T am haha wo i em-hekaj g Jiosh mamt am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. Pi g wo sha'i e hiwgith mas wo em-hekaj g pi ap'ekam has i masma.
45006014	Heki ach hu ab wecho g chehanig ch wabshaba hemuch edgith g Jiosh hemajimatalig ch hab pi hab wo chum junihith g pi ap'ekam.
45006015	Pegih, t hahawa pi ab hu ha'ichu wo t-abch g chehanig nat pi g Jiosh ab s-t-ho'ige'ith k t-tho'ibia. Kutp hems heg hekaj ha'i hab wo elithath mat am hab wabsh wo i junihith g pi ap'ekam.
45006016	T wabshaba g pi ap'ekam an wo ha u'ukchith matp hab wo junihith. T g Jiosh s-ko'okam ab wo ha namkith. Ab amt wo s-wohog elithath g Jiosh. T heg am wo i em-ap'ech e wehhejed.
45006017	Pi ap'ekam o wa an em-u'ukch. Kumt wabshaba ab i s-wohoch g wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh. Kuni ith hekaj ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.
45006018	E amt wul'o ab amjed g pi ap'ekam. K g s-ap'ekam an hahawa em-u'ukch.
45006019	Ni wabsh g pi hasig ne'okikaj em-tashogith nam pi pi koi si s-amichuth. Am amki wa e thagitokch si s-uam ha'ichu wui ch hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. Tsh g Jiosh em-tho'ibia. Kumt am hahawa wehs wo i e thagito s-ap'ekam wui ch hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui.
45006020	Pi am ab hu kaiham g s-ap'ekam mo hekith g pi ap'ekam an em-u'ukch.
45006021	Kut pi ha'ichu s-ap hab em-juni g pi ap'ekam. Si am wa e eh'elith mam wa am hab junihim. K g pi ap'ekam ab wabsh em-ahijithahim g s-ko'ok em-namkithadag.
45006022	Kumt wabshaba e wul'o ab amjed g pi ap'ekam. K g Jiosh d hahawa em-ahmo ch hab em-juh mam d hahawa s-ap'ekam. K ab him mamt ab wehs wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
45006023	Hegam mat hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam at ab wo ai g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. T wabshaba hegam mat ab wo i e thagito t-kownalig Jesus Christ wui ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
45007001	Neh, ni-wepnag, s-mahch amki mo has chu'ig g t-chehanig. Kuni heg hekaj hab em-elith mamt wo s-amich ihtha mant wo em-ahgi. Chehanig o an u'ukch g o'othham am hugkam mat he'es i tash d wo thoakamk.
45007002	Pegih, k hab chu'ig g chehanig mat g uwi pi ep wo ha kunt mat eda g kunaj d wabsh wo kia thoakamk. K wabshaba hiwgithas mat wo ha kunt matp g kunaj heki hu wo muh. Pi o ab hu hahawa shohbithch g chehanig.
45007004	Pegih, k hab wa'ap chu'ig am t-wehhejed ahchim matt ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Am att i t-hemakoj g Christ wehm. K ith heg wepogithas matt am wehmaj muh. K pi an hu hahawa t-u'ukch g chehanig. Thach enigaj hegai mat e chegito ab muhkig amjed ch hekaj s-ap ha'ichu hab wo chum junihith am wehhejed g Jiosh.
45007005	Am o wabsh ha chu'amun g chehanig hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh. K ba'ich hab i junihim g pi ap'ekam. K g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag ab ha aihim.
45007006	Tt wabshaba ab i t-hemakoj g Christ wehm. T g Jiosh t-wul'o ab amjed g chehanig. Heki ach hu am chum chikpanith g Jiosh g chehanigkaj. K wabshaba hemu g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag t-wanimed. Ch hahawa woho chikpanith.
45007007	Ha'i o hab elith mo pi ap'e g Jiosh chehanig. K wabshaba pi woho. Chehanig o am t-tashogith g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Neh, pi att wo chum mahchk mo pi ap'e mach si pihk t-elith g ha'ichu t-enigakaj. K wabshaba g chehanig am t-tashogith mo pi ap'e.
45007008	Kuch wa am hahawa ba'ich i s-gewkam si pihk t-elith g ha'ichu t-enigakaj. Matp pi an hu wo ha'ichugk g chehanig, t d wabsh wo pi ha'ichuk g pi ap'ekam.
45007009	Neh, pi ani has sha'i ni-tahtk mani eda pi ap mahch g chehanig. Nt hahawa s-mai. T ba'ich am i si e chehgi g pi ap'ekam am ni-eda. Kunt s-mai maniki aihog g s-ko'ok ni-namkithadag.
45007010	Jiosh at hab juh g e-chehanig matt heg hekaj wo s-mai matt has masma wo bei g s-ap thoakag. Kunid eda heg ab am cheh maniki d pi ap chu'ijkam ch ab aihog g ni-muhkig ch s-ko'ok ni-namkithadag.
45007012	Tho hekia s-ap'ekam ch s-kehgaj g chehanig ch am t-tashogith matt has wo chum t-junihith.
45007013	Pi at g chehanig hab ni-juh mani ab aihog g ni-muhkig ch s-ko'ok ni-namkithadag. Pi ap'ekam at hab ni-juh mani wa ab aihog. Chehanig o s-kehgaj. K g Jiosh heg hekaj am t-tashogith mo haschu d pi ap'ekam ch has masma si pi ap'e.
45007014	Pegih, k d hekia s-ap'ekam g chehanig. Kuni wa wabshaba d wabsh o'othham. K wa g pi ap'ekam an ni-u'ukch.
45007015	Pi o wa ta amichuthama g ni-thoakag am ni-wehhejed mani wa eda wabsh hejel ab ni-hiwig. S-mahch ani mo haschu d s-ap'ekam ch wabshaba pi am hu hab junihim ch heg hab wa'i junihim mani haschu i pi hohho'ith.
45007016	Ith ani wa hekaj wohokamchuth mo g chehanig s-ap'e.
45007017	Pi ani wa hab chum junimk g pi ap'ekam. K wa wabshaba heg an ni-u'ukch. K wa heg hekaj heg wa wepo mani wa pi d si ahni ch am hab junihim.
45007018	Ni-thoakag o wa d wabsh hekia pi ap'ekam mani wa eda pi ab hu hiwig g Jiosh. Kuni wa pi sha'i ni-nakog manis am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam, chum anis wa hab s-junimk.
45007019	Heg ani hab wa'i junihim pi ap'ekam, chum anis pi hab chum junimk.
45007020	Heg ani wa hekaj hab kaij mani pi d si ahni ch hab junihim. Pi ap'ekam o wa an ni-u'ukch.
45007021	Pegih, boki chu'ig g t-thoakag mach eda pi ab hu hiwig g Jiosh. Pi att wo t-nako machs hejel am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam, chum achs hab s-junimk.
45007022	S-mahch ach mo s-ap'e g Jiosh chehanig.
45007023	K wabshaba g pi ap'ekam an t-u'ukch ch hab t-wua mach ab wui gegok.
45007024	Pegih, boki chu'ig g t-thoakag mach eda pi ab hu hiwig g Jiosh. Bach chum s-junimk g Jiosh chehanig ch wabshaba am hab wabsh junihim g pi ap'ekam. K pi in hu hedai ha'ichug mas wo t-tho'ibia. Kuch heg hekaj si pi ap t-tahtk. T wabshaba g Jiosh am i kei g e-alithag Jesus Christ. Kut heg t-tho'ibia. Ith ach hekaj ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.
45008001	Pi o ab hu hahawa t-abchuth g Jiosh g ha'ichu t-chu'ichig ahchim mach ab si hiwig g Jesus Christ.
45008002	Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at t-wul'o ab pi ap'ekam t amjed k ab t-mah g wechij thoakag. K pi ab hu hahawa t-aihog g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag.
45008003	Pi att wo sha'i t-nako machs am hu hab wo junihith g chehanig ch hekaj wo t-tho'ibia nach pi d wabsh o'othham. T wabshaba g Jiosh am i kei g e-alithag mat wo t-tho'ibia. T heg ia i wuhsh jewed thahm k hab masmakahim mach ahchim ch wabshaba pi ha chu'ichig ch gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
45008004	Jiosh at hab masma am i t-ap'ech e-tahgio k hab masma ab t-neith matt pi hekith sha'i mul g chehanig ahchim mach ab i t-thagitokch Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui ch pi am hu hab junihim g hejel pi ap t-tatchui.
45008005	Hegam mo hab junihim g hejel e-tatchui o heg hekaj an e u'ukch. K hegam mo hab junihim g tatchuij g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag heg hekaj an epai e u'ukch.
45008006	Am o hihim s-ko'ok e-namkithadag wui hegam mo hab junihim g hejel e-tatchui. Ch ahchim mach hab junihim g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag tatchui am Jiosh kihthag wui hihimath ch hekaj wo si s-ap t-tahtkkath.
45008007	Tho obgaj g Jiosh hegai mo hedai g hejel e-tatchui hab junihim no pi pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh ch pi wo sha'i e nako mas am hab wo e juh.
45008008	Pi at wo e nako hegam mo hab wua g hejel e-tatchui mas hab wo juh g Jiosh tatchui.
45008009	Ch wabshaba ahchim pi g hejel t-tatchui hab wua. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am t-eda hab chu'ig. Kuch heg tatchui hab wua. Hegam mo pi am hu ha eda g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o pi d Jiosh hemajkamga.
45008010	T ahchim am i t-ap'ech g Christ am tahgio g Jiosh k ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kuch heg hekaj edgith g wechig thoakag, chum as hi wa g muhkig ab wehs ha aihog g hemajkam g pi ap ha-chu'ichigkaj.
45008011	Kut am uhpam ep wo t-chegitoich g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab masma mat hab juh g Christ.
45008012	Pegih, ni-wepnag, ab o d t-wuikam matt hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui.
45008013	Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i t-juh mattp am hab wo sha junihith g hejel t-tatchui. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i em-wehmaj. Kumt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap ha'ichu hab e-juni k hab wo edgithath g wechij thoakag.
45008014	Ab at t-mah g Jiosh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg am t-wanimed. Ch hab s-mahch mach d Jiosh a'aliga
45008015	ch ab ihm mo d t-ohg ch pi sha'i ehbith.
45008016	Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am t-tashogith mach d a'aligaj g Jiosh.
45008017	Jiosh at ab wehs mah g e-alithag g e-ho'ige'ithalig k hab wa'ap wo t-mah nach pi hab wa'ap d a'aligaj. Kutt wabshaba wehpeg ab wo nako g sho'igthag hab masma mat heg hab e juh mo d si alithaj.
45008018	Si atsh ge'e ab wo has t-elithath g Jiosh. Kutt hab pi wo sha'i kuint g al t-sho'igthag ia jewed thahm.
45008019	Jiosh atsh wehs ha'ichu thahm wo t-mahsko wua ahchim a'aligaj. K wehs ha'ichu nahtoij heg nenida.
45008020	Tho Jiosh hab elitha mat wehs e padch g nahtoij mat eda g o'othham pi ap chu'i. Wehs ha'ichu o ab hahawa e wulshch g pi ap'ekamkaj. Tsh wabshaba g Jiosh wo wul'o g e-nahtoi mat hekith am wo mahsko t-wua ahchim a'aligaj. Tsh wehs ha'ichu hahawa ep si s-kehg hab wo mahsk.
45008022	S-mahch ach mo hemuch g ha'ichu nahtoij g Jiosh shahag wepo mo shahshani hab sha masma mat g uwi g ali wo be k ab i taht g s-ko'ok.
45008023	Ahchim mo g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ach hab wa'ap shahshani ch ab si nenida mat am wo i nahto g t-tho'ibiathag k wo wechijith g t-chuhkug. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o d wehpeg mahkigdaj g Jiosh ab t-wui.
45008024	Ab att i s-wohoch g Jiosh. Kut t-tho'ibia. K wabshaba am wabsh kia wi'is mat wo nahto g t-tho'ibiathag k am wo i t-wahpki e-kihthag ed. Kuch s-wohochuth mat ith hab wo t-juni.
45008025	Wohochuthadag o hab d ahga mamt s-e tahtk ch ab wo nenidath hegai mamt koi nei.
45008026	Pi ach ahim gewkthag. K wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag i t-wehmaj. Pi ach mahch matt has masma wo t-ho'ige'ithahunath am Jiosh wui. K wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab t-mahtchulith. Kuch hab shahshani ch shoak am Jiosh wui ch pi sha'i mahch matt has masma hab wo chei hegai mo haschu ab t-tahtchuth.
45008027	K wabshaba g Jiosh s-mahch g t-ihbthag ch ep s-mahch hegai mo haschu ab t-tahtchuth g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Heg o hab wua g t-ho'ige'ithahuna am Jiosh tatchui oithch. Kuch ab tahni g i wehmtadag am ha wehhejed g Jiosh hemajkamga.
45008028	Ab at i t-wai g Jiosh matt d wo hemajkamgajk. Kuch ab wui si pihk t-elith. K g Jiosh heg hekaj wehs ha'ichu am i ap'echuth mat t-wehhejed wo s-ap i wuhsh ha'ichu.
45008029	Heki o hu s-mahch g Jiosh mat hedai ab wo kaiha g waithaj ch am ap'ech matt wo wepo chu'igk g alithaj ch wehmaj d wo a'aligajk. T g alithaj d wo wehpeg t-si'ihegk.
45008030	T wa woho ab i t-waith k am i t-ap'ech e tahgio k hahawa pi ab hu ha'ichu t-chu'ichigchuth. K am ba'ich ehp mat ab t-mah g si has e-elithadag.
45008031	Pegih, bo masma am t-wehhejed kehk g Jiosh. T hab pi hedai wo e nako mas ab t-wui wo kekiwua.
45008032	Pi at sha'i t-tha'i g Jiosh g e-alithag. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mat pi ha'ichu ep wo sha'i t-tha'i. Alithaj at ab wui e iagchul am t-wehhejed.
45008033	T g Jiosh heg hekaj gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. T hab pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo ha'ichu t-abch.
45008034	Jiosh alithag at ab nako g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag am t-wehhejed muhk. T hab pi wo t-ai hegai t-namkithadag. T g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig amjed k an s-apko thai e-hugith an. K heg am t-wehhejed e ho'ige'ithahun ab Jiosh wui.
45008035	Kuch eda hi wa hebaichujj ab nakog g kudutadag ch s-hasig ha'ichu ch sho'igchuthadag nach pi d Christ wohochuththam. Bihugig ch sho'igthag ch s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu ch cheggiadag o ab ep t-aihog.
45008036	Bo chu'ig g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga: “Chum ach hekith ab nakog g s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu am wehhejed g Jiosh. Kum hab t-elith mach ab aihim g muhkig hab masma mo g ha-gi'ichutha kakawal.” Neh, ttp hems hebai hab wo i el mat am i ha'asa si pihk e el g Christ ab t-wui.
45008037	K wabshaba ith pi woho. Ab o si pihk e elith g Christ t-wui ch ab t-mahkch g gewkthag. Kuch wehs gewitoghim g t-kudutalig.
45008038	S-mahch ani mat pi hekith ha'ichu wo sha'i e nako hemuch o gm hu t-ba'ich mas an wo shohbi g Jiosh pihk elithadag ab t-wui mattp hebai wo i k ith thahm jewed o in t-thahm. Pi at g muhkig o g thoakag wo shohbi, ni'is g anghil o g s-ta ehbithamkam gewpkthag. Ab o t-chehgithch g t-kownalig Jesus Christ mo t-hekaj si pihk e elith g Jiosh. Kut pi hekith ha'ichu wo sha'i e nako mas an wo shohbi g pihk elithadaj.
45009001	Mu'ijj g ni-wehm Tutuligo o s-ohhothamk g Jesus pi wohochuthch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha. Kuni heg hekaj si pi ap ni-tahtk. K g ni-ihbthag sha'i si s-ko'ok. S-mahch ani mani g wohokam em-ahgith nani pi pi ni-elith ch em-ahgith. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag an ni-u'ukch.
45009003	Si ani tatchua mat wo e tho'ibia g ni-wehm o'othham, chum anis hems heg hekaj pi wo ni-tho'ibia.
45009004	Tho chum Jiosh hemajkamga. Jiosh at ab i ha chuhcha g t-shohshonbad k am ha ahgith mat si s-kehg ha'ichu hab wo t-juni. Ab o si has t-elith g Jiosh ch ab t-mahkch g e-chehanig. Kuch hab s-t-mahch ch hab junihim g ab si has elitha Jiosh wui. T g Jiosh si Kehsha ab t-amjed i wuhsh ia jewed thahm. Tt heg hekaj ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh chum hekith. Neh!
45009006	K eda mu'ijj g ni-wehm o'othham pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh si Kehsha. K wabshaba ith pi hab d ahga mas g Jiosh pi am hu hab wo juh hegai mo hab kaij mat hab wo juh. Pi atsh wehsijj g Tutuligo d wo Jiosh hemajkamgak.
45009007	Ith ant am wo em-tashogi am em-ahgithch ab amjed g Abrahambad. Pi atsh wehsijj g Abrahambad amjedkam wo enigak hegai mash wa g Jiosh ab makiog. Gohk ash wa a'alithag g Abrahambad. Sh hema hab chehgig Isaac. Kush g Jiosh hab kaij ab Abrahambad wui: Hegam wa'i Isaac amjedkam at wo enigak hegai mani ab m-makiog.
45009008	Ihtha Isaacbad ash d hegai matsh wa g Abrahambad wehm kihkam bei matsh eda heki hu okst natsh pi g Jiosh am i ha wehmt k hab kaij: That wo hemako ahithagk, t g Sarah wo ge cheoj madt. Ith o am chehgithch mat hegam d wo wa'i Jiosh hemajkamgak mat hedai g Jiosh am wo i ha chuhcha.
45009010	Neh, tsh am hema hohnt g Isaacbad am i ge'ethak. Sh ith hab chehgig Rebecca ch gohk ha mahmadt.
45009011	Sh hab kaij g Jiosh ab wui g Rebeccabad: Ge'echu at d wo piongajk g alichu. Tsh eda ihtham koi an hu mamsi k koi ab hu ha'ichu chu'ichig. Tsh g Jiosh ab i wai g chumchu mat hekaj wo tashok mo ab hejel ab g Jiosh mat hedai ab wo i ha wai.
45009013	Hegai mo d ge'echu ash hab chehgig Esau. Sh g chumchu hab chehgig Jacob. K hab chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana mash g Jiosh hab kaij: Ab ant i wai g Jacob k g wehngaj Esau pi ab hu i wai.
45009014	Pegih, na'ams ha'i hab elith mat pi ap chu'i g Jiosh. K wabshaba pi hab chu'ig
45009015	nash pi hab kaij ab Mosesbad wui: Nt wo s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mani hab ha elith.
45009016	K heg hekaj tasho mo s-ha ho'ige'ith heg wabsh hekaj mo hab ha elith. Pi at hedai heg wabsh hekaj wo nei g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag mas haschu i tatchua ch haschu am hab juni him.
45009017	An o o'ohanas mash hab kaij g Jiosh am wui g ha-kownalig g Egypt t am hemajkam: Am ant i m-thai mapt d wo kownalk ith si hekaj mant ab m-wui wo kekiwua k am wo ha chehgi g ni-gewkthag k am wo mahsko ni-wua wehsko jewed thahm.
45009018	K heg hekaj tasho mo g Jiosh s-ha ho'ige'ith mo hedai hab i elith ch hab ha wua mo hedai hab i elith mat pi ab hu wo kaihamath g ne'okij.
45009019	Neh, tp hems hema wo kah ihtha k hab wo chei, “Pegih, pi at ha'ichu ab hu wo chum t-abch g Jiosh matp heg hab wa masma hab t-juh map has i kaij.”
45009020	Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mo pi ab hu sha'i ab g o'othham mas ab wui wo neo g Jiosh. Thach Jiosh nahtoi ch pi edgith g ap'ethag machs ab wui hab wo chei mas haschu ahgk hab masma t-nahto.
45009021	Neh, nat hig pi hab wo ha juh g haha'attham g hab mams haha'a mat wo tatchuath? Hema atp hems d wo s-kehg ha'ak ch hema d wo pi kehg ha'ak.
45009022	Pegih, t g Jiosh wehs hab ha juh g hemajkam. K ha'i pi ap d hemajkam. K wabshaba g Jiosh s-ha bahbgi. T am wo i e ai mat am wo chehgi g e-gewkthag k wo s-ko'okam ha namkith.
45009023	Kuch ha'i s-ap d hemajkam no pi ab si s-t-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh. Am at i t-ap'ech matt hab masma wo nei g gewkthaj.
45009024	Ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam am d ep waithaj. Jiosh at ab ep i em-gawulkai.
45009025	Neh, bo masma an o'ohadag heg o'ohana ed mash hab chehgig Hosea mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Bant wo ha juh hegam mo pi d ni-hemajkamga mat d haha wo ni-hemajkamgak k ab wo si pihk ni-elithath ha wui.
45009026	Kumt hab wo ha a'agath mo d ni-hemajkamga. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.
45009027	Kush wa g Isaiabad d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch hab kaij: E o aihim mat g Jiosh ab wo ha mah g ha-namkithadag wehs hemajkam. T pi sha'i mu'i wo e tho'ibia g Tutuligo hemajkam, chum as wo si mu'ijk hab sha masma mo g o'od.
45009029	Sh wa am hu hebai hab ep kaij g Isaiabad: S-ap atsh huhug g pi ap'ekamkaj hegam kihhim mash hab chechgig Sodom ch Gomorra. Kut ahchim Tutuligo hab wa'ap s-ap wo huhug mat hems g Jiosh pi wo ha'i t-tho'ibia. Sha'i si s-gewkthag g Jiosh.
45009030	Pegih, pi am wa am hu e gahgith g Jiosh ap'ethag ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ch wabshaba am i kah ab amjed g Jiosh alithag k ab i s-wohoch. T g Jiosh am i em-ap'ech e tahgio gm hu hab i juhk g pi ap em-chu'ichig.
45009031	K g ni-wehm o'othham am i chum e ap'echuth g chehanigkaj ch pi bei g e-ap'ethag
45009032	nat pi pi ab hu wohoch g Jiosh k pi ab hu bei g si Kehshaj k wabsh am hab chum s-junimk g s-ap'ekam mat hekaj wo s-ap'ek am Jiosh tahgio. Ith o heg wa wepo mat e huchwua ab hothai t ab.
45009033	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Am ant wo i maskogi g si ni-Kehsha ha shahgith g Tutuligo mat d wo chum ha-tho'ibiathagk. T pi wo e tho'ibia hegam mat pi ab hu wo wohoch. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mat ab wo e huchwua hothai t ab k wo i shul. Hegam at wo wa'i e tho'ibia mat ab wo i s-wohoch. Neh, bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana.
45010001	Ni-wepnag, chum ani si tatchua mat hu wo i e tho'ibia g ni-wehm o'othham ch heg hekaj am ni-ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui.
45010002	Hegam o tatchua mat am wo i e ap'ech Jiosh tahgio ch wabshaba pi ap mahch mas has masma hab wo e juh.
45010003	Jiosh at am i ap'ech matt has masma wo s-ap'ek am tahgio. K g ni-wehm o'othham wabsh s-ohhothamk g apchuthaj ch wabsh hejel am chum s-e apchuthamk
45010004	ab s-wohog elithch g Jiosh chehanig. K wabshaba g Jiosh am t-chehgithch matt ab wabsh wo i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj k ab wo i hiwigi g Christ. T heg am wo i t-ap'ech am tahgio.
45010005	An atki hi wa o'oha g Mosesbad mash hab kaij g Jiosh: Wehs amt wo himath g ni-chehanig mamt heg hekaj wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
45010006	K oi wa tasho mat pi hedai wo sha'i e nako mas wehs wo himath. K eda in ha'ichug g tho'ibiathag ahga. Kush heg hekaj hab kaij g Jiosh matt ab wabsh wo i s-wohochuth k ab wo i hiwigi. Kut am wo i t-ap'ech hejel e tahgio. An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Pi g hab wo i e ahgi mat hedai am wo em-behijitham g tho'ibiathag thahm kahchim wui. Neh, bo chu'ig nat pi g Jiosh alithag ia heki hu i t-behij.
45010007	K an ep o'ohanas: Pi g hab ep wo i e ahgi mat hedai am wo em-behijitham jewed wecho. Jiosh alithag at heki hu ab i wuhsh muhkig amjed mat ab wo t-mah.
45010008	Bo hig woho chu'ig: Pi o sha'i mehk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab em-amjed. Chum am hekith ne'okchulith ch si s-mahch. Neh, ith o d ihtha ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g wohochuthadag mach am ahgahim.
45010009	Am g wo wohokamchuth mo g Jesus d em-kownalig ch ab uhpam e chegito muhkig amjed. T g Jiosh wo em-tho'ibia.
45010010	Wehsijj atsh am wo i ha ap'ech g Jiosh hegam mat hedai ab wo i s-wohoch g alithaj e-ihbthag amjed. T wo e tho'ibia am i wohokamchuthk mo g Jesus d ha-kownalig.
45010011	Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana: Mat hedai ab wo s-wohochuth k wo e tho'ibia.
45010012	Pi o ahchim wa'i Tutuligo hab t-ahg. Wehs hemajkam o d ha-kownalig g Jiosh ch wehsijj s-ba'ama ab wo s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mat ab wo tahnith.
45010013	Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana: Matp hedai ab wo tai g Jiosh k wo e tho'ibia.
45010014	T wabshaba pi hedai has masma ab hu wo tai matp pi ab hu wo wohochuthath. T hab wa'ap pi hedai has masma wo kah matp pi hedai wo ha ahgithath g ha'ichu ahgaj.
45010015	Kut pi hedai wo e nako mat hejel wo i e ah mat an wo ahgachugath. Jiosh o wa ab t-chehani. An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Sho'o wa'i si s-kehg hab mahs mat wo thatha g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgtham.
45010016	Pegih, ch an ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g si Kehshaj. T ha'i kah k ab i s-wohochuth k ab wui e thagito k ha'i ehp pi ab hu wohoch. An atki o'oha g Isaiabad matsh ith hab wo e juh. K an hab chu'ig o'ohanaj ed: Ni-kownalig Jiosh, pi at mu'i ab hu wohoch g ha'ichu t-ahga ahchim ha'ichu i m-tashogiththam. Neh, boki kaij.
45010018	K hemuch ha'i hab chech'e mo pi wehsijj kah g hemajkam g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mo wehsijj neith g Jiosh nahtoi. K g Jiosh o'ohana hab chu'ig: An o wehsko e tashogith g Jiosh e-nahtoi ed.
45010019	Tki an o'oha g Mosesbad moki hab kaij g Jiosh am ha wui g Tutuligo: Bam ha ahg g gawul mahs hemajkam mo pi d Jiosh hemajkamga ch pi ha'ichu a'amichuth. Nt wabshaba ab wo ha mah g ap'ethag. Kumt haha wo s-ha hehgam k wo babgat ab ha wui.
45010020	Tki g Isaiabad an o'oha mash s-gewkam hab kaij g Jiosh: Am ant ni-chehgi ha wui hegam mo pi an hu ni-gahg. T ab i s-ni-mai hegam mo pi ni-mahch.
45010021	T an ep o'oha g Isaiabad mo hab kaij g Jiosh ab ha amjed g Tutuligo hemajkam: Tash oitham ani ab i chum ha waith ihtham hemajkam. K wabshaba pi chechkaithag ch pi ab hu ni-wohog elith.
45011001	Pegih, na'as hab sha elithas mat gm hu s-ha ohhoth g Jiosh g Tutuligo mat pi d haha wo hemajkamgajk. K wabshaba pi hab mahs. Ahni ani hab wa'ap d Tuhligo. T g Jiosh pi gm hu ni-ohhoth. Benjaminbad o d si ni-shohshon ch heg d amjedkamaj g Abrahambad.
45011002	Pi at gm hu s-t-ohhoth g Jiosh. Thach chum hemajkamgaj. Heki at hu ab i ha gawulkai g t-shohshon. Batsh wa masma pi gm hu ha ohhoth wenog mash wa g Elijabad d thoakam ch d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. M o hi wa woho mash wa am ha gagda g e-hemajkamga Jiosh wui hab kaijch:
45011003	Ni-kownalig Jiosh, ha at koktha g ni-wehm o'othham g ha'ichu i m-tashogiththam k i shul g iagchulithakud. Ahni ant wa'i hejel in wih. K ep chum s-ni-mu'amk.
45011004	Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Jiosh ab wui: Am ani wabsh kia nuhkuth g wewa'ak mihl hemajkam. K ihtham ab has ni-elith ch pi ha'ichu ep jioshga. Neh, bash wa kaij g Jiosh.
45011005	K ia'i ithani am hab wabsh i masma. Ab at ha'i s-t-ho'ige'el g Jiosh ahchim Tutuligo k ab i t-gawulkai. Kuch ab s-wohochuth.
45011006	Pi at heg hekaj ab i t-gawulkai machs haschu has i juh k wabshaba heg hekaj mo s-t-ho'ige'ith. Pi at d wo wohokam ho'ige'ithadagk matp g Jiosh heg ab wo ha himch g hemajkam mo haschu has i junihim k ab wo i ha gawulkai e wui.
45011007	Pegih, al he'ekia at ab i ha gawulkai g Jiosh g ni-wehm o'othham. T ihtham cheh g e-gahgi. Mu'ijj at pi cheh no pi pi chechkaithag ab Jiosh wui.
45011008	K hab chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana: Jiosh at hab ha juh mo pi ha'ichu a'amichuth. K am hab wabsh i chu'ig ith i tashkaj. Shahag wepo mo pi ha'ichu neith ch pi ha'ichu kah.
45011009	David ash wa hab kaij ab Jiosh wui: Hegam mat gm hu s-m-ohhoth at wo hejel e sho'igch am e-pipiast ed k wo i shulig k s-ko'okam wo e namkith
45011010	k heg wo wa wepok mo pi ha'ichu neith. T g ha-kudutadag ab wo si i wehchi.
45011011	Neh, bo chu'ig. Jiosh at am ha thagito hegam ni-wehm o'othham mo pi ab hu kaiham. T heg hekaj am i e ahgahi g tho'ibiathag ahga gawul mahs hemajkam ha wui. Kutp hems ha'i g ni-wehm o'othham wo s-ha hehgam k ab haha wo kaihamath g Jiosh. Kut pi wabsh wo s-kehg ha hugio g Jiosh.
45011012	Pi at ap chu'i g ni-wehm o'othham k ab ai g ge'e sho'igthag T heg hekaj g ge'e ho'ige'ithalig ab hih nahnko mahs hemajkam ha wui. Ab o him g tash mat mu'i Tutuligo ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui k ha'akia ab wo ai mo he'ekia hab i ha elith g Jiosh mat wo ha tho'ibia. T g nahnko mahs hemajkam ab ep wo bei g ge'e ho'ige'ithalig heg hekaj.
45011013	Thani kehshaj g Jesus Christ mant wo em-ahgi ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam g ha'ichu ahgaj. Kunt wo si ha'ichuch ihtha ni-chikpan.
45011014	Tp hems g ni-wehm o'othham wo s-em-hehgam k ha'ijj wo e tho'ibia.
45011015	Jiosh at ab i kuhpi'o g ap'ethag am ha wehhejed g gawul mahs hemajkam mat hekith gm hu hab i ha juh g Tutuligo. T g gawul mahs hemajkam ba'ich wo i bei g ho'ige'ithadag mat hekith am wo i e ai g tash mat g Tutuligo ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui. Kut woho ab wo i e nohnogi wui.
45011016	Neh, ab ach mamka g Jiosh g wehpegkamaj g ha'ichu t-gehgewa ch hab masma chehgith mo wehs d enigaj hegai t-gehgewa. Pegih, t-shohshon ahchim Tutuligo o d wehpegkam. K d si shel mat g ha-amjedkam mu'i ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui. Uhs mahmhadag o d Jiosh eniga mamtp ab wo mah g tatkaj. T-shohshon o d tatk. Ch ahchim d mahmhadgaj.
45011017	Mt wabshaba wo hikkumi'a hegam mahmhadgaj mat pi ab hu wo bahithagt k ab wo ha namki ab hegam mat wo s-kehg bahithagt. Pegih, t g Jiosh hab masma gm hu hab i ha juh hegam Tutuligo mo pi ab hu wohochuth k ahpim em-ui gawul mahs hemajkam mamt ab i s-wohoch. Kum ab hahawa wehs ap'ethag hegai mo haschu d i chum ha-ap'ethag hegam Tutuligo mo pi ab hu wohochuth.
45011018	Mt pi wo e haschuthath mat gm hu hab i ha juh. Jiosh at hab em-juh mamt hab haha wo masmak mam d Abrahambad amjedkam. Pi am d ha-shohshon ch wabsh heg wa wepo mam d mahmhadag.
45011019	Mtp hems hab wo chei mat g mahmhadgaj e hikkumi'a mat am wo em-jegel.
