45011020	T wabshaba hab wa e juh nat pi pi ab hu wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Mt ahpim ab s-wohochuth k hekaj ab gi'is shonaj ab. Mt wabshaba pi wo si e haschuthath ith hekaj.
45011021	Gm at hu hab i ha juh g Jiosh hegam Tutuligo mo pi ab hu wohochuth. Kumt ahpim gm hu hab ep wo i e juh mamtp pi ab hu wo wohochuthath.
45011022	Jiosh at wo si s-hemajimak ab em-wui mamtp ab wo s-wohochuthath ch wabshaba ab em-wui wo kekiwua mamtp ab uhpam wo i e nohnogi pi ap'ekam wui. Pegih, ab g wo i oithahim ihtha k an wo u'ukchith g Jiosh hemajimatalig.
45011023	Jiosh at ab uhpam ep wo ha ui hegam Tutuligo mat ab wo i s-wohoch.
45011024	Ab at em-ui ahpim gawul mahs o'othham. Kum wa chum pi e nahtokch. Ith o wepo masma mamt wabsh chum hebai wo ha mul g i'ibhonig k ab wo namki g uhs e-e'es. Tutuligo o chum e nahtokch. T g Jiosh ab uhpam ep wo ha ui hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch. Ith o wepo masma mamt ab uhpam ep wo ha namki g ha-i'ibhonig am i ha mulink.
45011025	Neh, ni-wepnag, hemu at ha'ichu mahsko wua g Jiosh. Kuni ith s-em-ahgithamk. Kumt wo s-mahchk ch hekaj pi hab wo chum ge e elithath mam si s-chu a'amichuth. Pi at chum hekith im hu hab wo i e juhkch g Tutuligo ab amjed g Jiosh. Jiosh at mahsko wua mat ab wui wo i e nohnogi am i thahm mamt ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ha'akia ab wui wo i e nohnogi mo he'ekia hab i em-elith g Jiosh.
45011026	T haha wo e tho'ibia g Tutuligo. An o o'ohadag mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Ab ant wo i wuhshath g hemajkam ha-tho'ibiakam ab ha amjed g Tutuligo. T heg gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig.
45011027	Neh, bat wa masma hab wo e juh g ha'ichu ni-ahga ab ha wui g Tutuligo.
45011028	Ahchim Tutuligo ach d chum Jiosh hemajkamga nat pi ab i ha gawulkai g t-shohshon. T wabshaba mu'ijj g ni-wehm o'othham pi ab hu wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k hab masma e obgach ab wui. K g Jiosh heg hekaj t-chehani matt am wo ahgachugath g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj em-wui ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam.
45011029	Pi at hekith am gawul wo juh g e-chegitoi g Jiosh.
45011030	Ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam am wa pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh. K wa g Jiosh pi ab hu em-ho'ige'ith. T g Tutuligo gm hu i e nohnogi ab amjed g Jiosh. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab em-mah g ho'ige'ithadag.
45011031	K wabshaba ab him g tash mat hahawa em-wepo masma wo bei g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag g Tutuligo.
45011032	Wehs hemajkam o d pi ap chu'ijkam am Jiosh nena ed. Kut g Jiosh wehs ha wepo wo s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mat ab wui wo i e nohnogi.
45011033	Sho'o wa'i si ge'ej g Jiosh. K g ha'ichu amichuthadaj ch ha'ichu mahchigaj sha'i si ge'ej. Pi at hedai wo sha'i e nako mas hejel wo s-mai g hab elithaj o wehs wo s-amich mo has masma hab wua ha'ichu.
45011034	Neh, bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed: Pi o hedai sha'i mahch g Jiosh chegitoi ch pi hedai wo e nako mas am wo ha'ichu i shelini g Jiosh.
45011035	Wehs ha'ichu o d Jiosh eniga. Kut pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo ha'ichu mah.
45011036	Wehs ha'ichu at an nahto. K wehs ha'ichu an hab chu'ig wehhejed. K hab mahs matt chum hekith ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh!
45012001	Pegih neh, ni-wepnag, si o s-t-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh. Tt heg hekaj wehs am wo i t-thagito wui matt am wehhejed d wo thothakamk ch am hab wo junihith g tatchuij. Batt masma s-wohom ab has wo elithath g Jiosh.
45012002	Pi g am hu ha oithch hab wo masmak hegam mo pi ab hu ihm g Jiosh ch wabshaba ab wo i e thagito Jiosh wui. T heg am gawul wo juh g em-chegitoithag. T hab wehs wo i e wechijith g em-thoakag. Bamt wa'i masma wo s-mahchk mo haschu d Jiosh tatchui. K heg d wa'i si hekia s-ap'ekam.
45012003	Jiosh o ab s-ni-ho'ige'ith ch ab ni-mah g gewkthag. Ni heg hekaj hab em-ahg wehsijj mamt pi wo chum ge e ha'ichuchuthath ch wo si s-mahchk mam haschu am chegito. Wehsijj amt am wo si i mamche mo he'es ab i em-mahkch g Jiosh g gewkthag ch haschu em-tatchuith mamt am hab wo junithath am oithch g e-wohochuthadag.
45012004	Neh, no hig pi woho nahnko ha'ichu hab wua g o'othham chuhchu'ithag, chum as d hemako g honshpadaj.
45012005	Pegih, tt hab wa masma nahnko ha'ichu wo junihith mat a'ai d wo i t-wehmtadagk ahchim mach ab t-hemakochuthch g Christ wehm.
45012006	Am g wo hekaj g e-gewkthag a'ai e wehhejed hab masma mo g Jiosh am ap'echuthch mamt hab wo e juh. Ha'i o ab em-mahkch g gewkthag mamt am wo ahgahith g ha'ichu ahgaj. Kumt ab wo s-wohochuthath ch wo ahgahith.
45012007	Ha'i o d em-mahkigdag mamt ha'ichukaj wo i ha wehmtath g e-wehm wohochuththam o wo ha'ichu ha mashchamath
45012008	o ha'ichukaj ab wo i ha gewkemhunath. Ha'i o d em-mahkigdag mamt ab wo ha'ichu ha ho'ithath g e-wehm wohochuththam. Am g s-ba'ama hab wo wuath ch s-ha ho'ige'ith. Ha'i o d em-mahkigdag mamt d wo ha wanimedthamk. Kumt wo si chikpanath ch s-gewkam am hab wo junihith. Ha'i o d em-mahkigdag mamt wo s-ha ho'ige'ith k wo i ha wehmt hegam mo e sho'igchuth.
45012009	Pi g hab wabsh wo s-e junimk mam ab pihk e elith hedai i ha wui ch wabshaba si s-wohom ab si pihk e elith ab ha wui. Pi g hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ab hedai i wui ch wabshaba g s-ap'ekam hab wo wa'i junihith ab ha wui.
45012010	Ab g wo si ha tatchuath g e-wehm wohochuththam ch ab has wo ha elithath, chum as aigo pi ab hu has wo em-elithath.
45012011	Mt wo si chikpanath ch pi wo papadmak. Si e-ihbthagkaj amt ab wo ihmath g Christ ch wo chikpanthath.
45012012	Mt wo si s-hehgigk heg hekaj mo haschu g Jiosh ab em-wuichuth. Am g wabsh wo i s-thotholimak e-kudutadag ed ch chum hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahunath.
45012013	Ha'i o e sho'igchuth g t-wehm wohochuththam. K ab t-ab matt am wo i ha wahpki t-kihki ed k ab wo i ha mah g i wehmta, chum as d wabsh wo ge o'othhamk.
45012014	Ab g wo i tahni g Jiosh mat ab wabsh wo i s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mo em-sho'igchuth. Pi g wo sha'i has ha ahgath.
45012015	Ab g wo si ha wehm s-hehgigk hegam mo s-hehgig ch ha wehm pi ap e tahtk hegam mo pi ap e tahtk.
45012016	Am g wabsh s-ap e wehm wo kihkath. Pi g am wo chum e ha'ichuchuthath ch ab wabsh wo ha tatchuath g sho'igkam ch am hab wabsh wo junihith wabsh chum has mahs chikpan. Pi amt hab wo e elithath mam d s-chu a'amichuththam.
45012017	Am g hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam wehs ha wui ch pi ab hu uhpam wo i nodagi g pi ap'ekam hegam ha wui mat ab em-wui hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam.
45012018	Am g wo i e nakog mamt s-ap e tahtk ch ab wo ha neithath g hemajkam mamtp he'es wo i e nako.
45012019	Pi g am wo hejel e agwuan. Jiosh at am hab wo wa em-juni. Neh, bo chu'ig an o'ohanaj ed g Jiosh: Ahni o ab ni-ab mant em-wehhejed hab wo juh g agwuithag.
45012020	K hab ep chu'ig g o'ohanaj: Mt wo gegos chum hems g e-obga matp d wo bihugimkamk. Kutp d wo tonomkamk, mt wo wasibi g shuhthagi. T hab masma am hejel wo i e chegito g em-obga.
45012021	T wo t-gehg g pi ap'ekam mattp wo hejel t-agwua. Kutt wabshaba wo gehg g pi ap'ekam mattp ab wo namkith g s-ap'ekamkaj.
45013001	Am o ap'echuthch g Jiosh mat in wo ha'ichugk g kownaltalig ch am wo t-thahmk. Tt heg hekaj ab wo wechok g ha-chehanig g kokownal
45013002	ch pi wo melchkwuath. Jiosh o ab ha mahkch g gewkthag. Kut wo t-namkith matt wo sha melchkwuath.
45013003	Tt heg hekaj wo s-ehbithath g kownal matt hab wo sha junihith g pi ap'ekam ch wabshaba pi wo ehbithath mattp g s-ap'ekam hab wo junihith. Am g hab wo wa'i junihith g s-ap'ekam. T g haha'ichu s-ap wo em-elithath.
45013004	Jiosh at am i ha chuhcha g kokownal mat wo t-nuhkuthath. Kut wo s-ta ehbithamk mattp hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam no pi g Jiosh ab ha mahkch g gewkthag mat s-ko'okam wo t-namkith.
45013005	Hemho wa att wo himath g chehanig nach pi s-mahch mo pi ap'e matt wo melchkwua.
45013006	Ab o d wuikamaj g kownal hegai mo haschu ab t-kowlant mat hekaj wo himath g e-chikpan.
45013007	Pegih, tt ab has wo ha elithath g haha'ichu k wo namkithath g kownal hegai mo haschu ab t-chehani.
45013008	Pi att hedai wui wo chum t-wulshchith ch wabsh s-ap wo ha namkithath. Ith att wa'i hekaj wo chum t-wulshchith matt ab a'ai t-hekaj wo si pihk t-elithath. Ith o d Jiosh chehanig. Kuch ab s-wohog elith g chehanigaj ab a'ai si pihk t-elithch.
45013009	Bo chu'ig g chehanigaj: Pi g wo ha ehsith g ha-wehm kihkam. Pi g wo ha mua'i. Pi g ha'ichu wo ha ehsithath. Pi g wo pihk e elithath g s-kaisthagkaj. Neh wehs ihtha o hab d ahga matt ab wo si pihk t-elithath wabsh chum hedai wui hab masma mach has i masma hejel pihk t-elith.
45013010	Pi att hekith am hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ab ha wui hegam mach ha hekaj si pihk t-elith. Neh, wehs ach am hab junihim g Jiosh chehanig mattp ab wo pihk t-elithath wabsh chum hedai wui.
45013011	Ith att hab wo wuath heg hekaj mat mehk wa'i hih g tash. E at ai matt ab wo si i t-nenenashanich no pi e aihim mat g Jiosh ab wo i t-wuwhas ith amjed jewed.
45013012	Pegih, tt wo thagito g pi ap'ekam k g s-ap'ekam am hab wo junihith. E o aihim matt s-ap wo t-tho'ibia.
45013013	Tt wo si t-elithath mattp wo ih'eth ch wo t-nondagch o attp wabsh chum hedai wehm wo wo'iwup o attp s-uam has wo t-wuath o attp wo s-ha hehgam o attp wo ha cheggia. Ab o t-ab matt am wo thagito hewai hab mahs ha'ichu k heg hab wo wa'i junihith mo d s-ap'ekam.
45013014	Tho si t-kownalig g Jesus Christ. Kutt ab wui wo i t-thagito matt pi am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap t-tatchui.
45014001	Ha'i atp hems am wabsh kia pi gewpkthag g em-wehm wohochuththam am e-wohochuthadag ed. Kumt wabsh wo ha tatchuath ch pi wo ne'owi heg amjed mo haschu al i s-mahch.
45014002	Neh, am o wa s-ap'e matt wabsh chum haschu hugi wo ko'ath matp wo s-gewkthagk g t-wohochuthadag. K wabshaba ha'i pi gewkthag e-wohochuthadag ed ch heg hekaj hab e elith mo ha'ichu pi hiwgithas mat wo e ko'ath.
45014003	Kutt pi a'ai has wo t-eh'el heg hekaj mach haschu i ko'a nat pi g Jiosh ab i t-ui.
45014004	Pi o ab hu t-ab machs wo has ahgath g t-wehm wohochuththam. Tho Jiosh pionag. Jiosh o d t-ahmo ch heg am wo i a'appe mas s-ap am hab e junihim g t-wehm wohochuththam. T wabsh wo e nako mat s-ap am hab wo junihith no pi g Jiosh am i wehmaj wehs ha'ichu k ed.
45014005	Ha'i o hab e elith mat am wo oithath g Tutuligo ha-pipiast tash ch ha'i hab elith mo wehs tash am wabsh i e wepothag. Ab o hejel t-ab mattp has wo i elithath.
45014006	Matp hedai ab wo si has elithath hema tash ch hab e wua mat heg eda ab wo si i ihm g Jiosh. Tp hedai wabsh chum haschu wo ko'ath ch ab wo si has i elithath g Jiosh nat pi ab wo si i ho'ige'el heg hekaj ha'ichu hugi. Kutp hedai pi wabsh chum haschu wo ko'ath ch hab wa'ap wo si has elithath g Jiosh nat pi ab wo chum ho'ige'el g Jiosh heg hekaj mo haschu i ko'a k ab wo si has i el.
45014007	Pi ach hedai wabsh hejel t-wehhejed in d thoakam ch wabshaba Christ wehhejed in d thoakam ch wo muh mat hekith hab wo i el g Jiosh.
45014008	Pegih, thach Christ hemajkamga mach in d thoakam ch hab wa'ap d enigaj chum achs hems wo muh.
45014009	Christ at muh k ab uhpam i wuhsh muhkig amjed mat d wo t-kownaligk, chum achs hems wo muh.
45014010	Pegih, pi att am wo chum has ahgath g t-wehm wohochuththam. Wehsijj att am wo i gegokiwua wui g Jiosh heg i eda lothaita tash.
45014011	Neh, an o o'ohadag mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Wehs at ab wo i shul g hemajkam ni-wui k ab wo ni-ihm mani d Jiosh.
45014012	Wehsijj att hemho wa hehe'ejel am wo i kekiwua ba'ich matt wo ah g hejel hab t-juni.
45014013	Pegih, mt hig wo ha'asa a'ai has e ahgath. Ith amt am hab wo elithath mamt pi am hu wabsh has wo e wuath. T hekaj pi wo heki hih g em-wehm wohochuththam o am wo gei pi ap'ekam ch ed.
45014014	Ab ach s-wohochuth g t-kownalig Jesus ch hekaj chum s-mahch mo wehs g ha'ichu hugi hiwgithas matt wo huh. Tp wabshaba hema hab wo elithath mo pi hiwgithas, pegih, k pi ap'e mas an wo bei.
45014015	Kutp hems wo heki him k pi wo e tho'ibia matp hema an wo hekaj hegai mo haschu hab elith mo pi hiwgithas. Pi ach tatchua g t-wehm wohochuththam mattp wo heki himch. T eda g Christ wehhejed muh chum s-tho'ibiamk.
45014016	Pi g am hu ha'ichu has wo juhni mamt heg hekaj wo has em-ahgath, chum ams hems hab elith mo d s-ap'ekam.
45014017	Pi o d si ha'ichu machs haschukaj wo t-gegosithath. K wabshaba ith d si ha'ichu matt am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch ab a'ai t-wui wo si s-ap t-tahtkk ch wo si s-hehgigk mat g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am i t-ap'ech Jiosh wui.
45014018	Pegih, tt hab wa masma am hab wo t-junihith am wehhejed g Christ. T g Jiosh ab wo si s-hohho'i ihtha. T g hemajkam pi ha'ichu wo cheh mas ab wo t-abch.
45014019	Tt heg wui am wo i t-nako matt haschukaj ab a'ai wo i t-gewkemhunath ch ab a'ai t-wui wo s-ap t-tahtkk.
45014020	Tho Jiosh tho'ibiakam g t-wehm wohochuththam. Pegih, pi g ha'ichu hab wo juhni mas hekaj wo heki hihi. Wehs ha'ichu hugi o hiwgithas. K wabshaba pi ap'e machs wo ko'ath matt haschukaj wo ha heki hihimch g t-wehm wohochuththam.
45014021	Kutt heg hekaj wabsh wo thagito hegai mattp haschukaj wo heki himch g t-wehm wohochuththam. Chuhkug attp hems wo thagito o g nawait o wabsh chum haschu.
45014022	Am att wabsh wo hejel nuhkuthath mach haschu i s-wohochuth ith amjed ch heg wa'i Jiosh ab wo ahgi. Tt wo s-hehgigk mattp hab wo junihith hegai mach haschu i s-mahch mo s-ap'e. T hab pi wo heki hih g t-wehm wohochuththam.
45014023	Pi g am hu hab wo juhni hegai mam haschu pi mahch mas d s-ap'ekam k hab pi ab hu wo e chu'ichigch heg hekaj.
45015001	Pi att wabsh hejel am wo t-chegitoth ahchim mach ab wabsh s-ap s-wohochuth g Jiosh ch wabshaba ep wo ha chegitoth hegam mo pi am hu i si s-amichuth mo ha'ichu s-ap'e.
45015002	Kut heg hekaj ab wo i e gewkemhunath ch ba'ich wo i s-ap s-amich mo haschu s-ap'e.
45015003	Am o t-chehgithch g Christ matt pi wabsh hejel wo t-chegitok no pi pi wabsh hejel am hu e chegito mo wa in oimmed. An at o'oha g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam: Jiosh si Kehsha at ab wo nako g has e-ahgadag ab ha amjed hegam mo ab wui gegok g Jiosh. Kut wa woho hab e juh.
45015004	Wehs o d t-mashchamadag mat haschu an o'oha g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Kutt heg ab ab wo i t-gewkemhunath ch hab s-ap t-tahtkk ch wo nenidath matt ab wo bei g t-ap'ethag ab amjed g Jiosh.
45015005	Tho Jiosh mo ab i t-gewkemhun matt s-ap t-tahtkk ch wo nenida g t-ap'ethag. Kuni ab tahni mat hab wo em-juh mamt am oithch hab wo e junihith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ k ch wehs e wehm ab wo ihmath g ohgaj Jiosh ch hab s-ap wo e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui.
45015007	S-ap o ab t-neith g Christ. Kutt ahchim hab wa masma ab a'ai s-ap wo t-neithath ch hab ab wo has elithath g Jiosh.
45015008	Chum o hekith am hab junihim g Jiosh mo has i kaij. T heg hekaj ia jiwia g Christ mat am hab wo t-juni ahchim Tutuligo hegai moki haschu g Jiosh ab ha ahgith g t-shohshonbad.
45015009	Kumt heg hekaj ab ep wo ihm g Jiosh ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam mat ab hab wa'ap s-em ho'ige'el. Neh, bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed mo hema hab kaij am Jiosh wui: Ab ant wo m-ho'ige'ithath am ha shahgith g gawul mahs hemajkam ch ab wo si ne'eth ch ab wo m-ihmath ha wehm.
45015010	K an hab ep chu'ig: Ahpim amt ep wo s-hehgigk gawul mahs hemajkam t-wehm ahchim Tutuligo.
45015011	K an hab ep chu'ig: Ab g wo ihmath g Jiosh wehsijj ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ch wo si hehgchulithath.
45015012	K an hab ep chu'ig mo hab kaij g Isaiabad: Ab at hema wo i wuhshani k wehs d wo ha-kownaligk g nahnko mahs hemajkam. T hegam ab wo i s-wohoch. Ith at d wo amjedkamajk hegai mash d t-kokownaligbad ha-shohshon ch hab chehgig Jesse.
45015013	Jiosh at hab em-juh mamt wabsh wo nenidath matp haschu am hab wo i em-juni. Kuni ab tahni mat ab wo i gewkai g em-wohochuthadag mamt hekaj wo si s-hehgigk ch wo si s-ap e tahtkk ab wui. Bamt masma ba'ich i s-ap wo nenidath g e-ap'ethag. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab ba'ich wo i em-mah g wohochuthadag.
45015014	Ni-wepnag, s-mahch ani mamtp hu hi wa i s-ap am hab e junihim ch mu'i ha'ichu s-mahch mamt s-ap a'ai wo e mashcha.
45015015	Ni wabshaba ith eda o'ohana si s-gewkam ha'ichu am em-ahgith mant am wo i em-chegitoich. Jiosh at ab has ni-elith k am i ni-kei
45015016	mant d wo piongajk g Jesus Christ em-wehhejed ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam. Am ani wehsko ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh am ha wui g gawul mahs hemajkam. K heg hekaj ha ap'echuthahim g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K ab ihm g Jiosh ihtham.
45015017	Kuni si s-ap ni-tahtk ch chikpanith g Jiosh ahgachugch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus Christ.
45015018	Heg at am hab ha juh g gawul mahs hemajkam mat ab s-wohog el g Jiosh heg hekaj mani has i kaij ch has ni-wua. Kuni heg wa'i s-em-ahgithamk mat heg has e juh.
45015019	Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o ab ni-mahkch hegai gewkthag mani hekaj hab wua g s-hasig ha'ichu. K ith am wohokamchuth g ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Kunt am i ahgahi Jerusalem t amjed wehs jejewed ha oithch gm hu Illyricum (Albania) jewed hugkam.
45015020	Chum ani hekith hab ni-elith mant am wo i ahgahi ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mo hebai pi koi sha'i kah g hemajkam ab amjed g Christ k hab si wechij am wo i shonwuich.
45015021	Neh, bo d ahga ihtha Jiosh o'ohana mo hab chu'ig: T wo wa kah k wo s-amich hegam mat koi sha'i kah ab amjed hegai mat wo ha tho'ibia.
45015022	Neh, mu'ikko o ni-shohbithch ihtha chikpan nant pi pi koi nahto. Nt hab pi koi i em-chehgim.
45015023	K wabshaba hemu pi am hu ha wi'is manis am hu wo ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga am ha oithch ihtham jejewed. Mu'i a'ahithag ani am chum s-em-chehgimelimk
45015024	ch antp hu'i haha wo ni-nako hemuch am himathch Spain jewed wui nani pi am s-himimk. S-mahch ani hi wa mamt am wo i ni-wehmt mant am wo him k am he'es wo i em-neithchkahim ch s-ap wo ni-tahtkk.
45015025	Nt wabshaba wehpeg gm hu wo hih Jerusalem wui k am ha'ichukaj wo i ha wehmt g t-wehm wohochuththam amai.
45015026	Si ash e sho'igchuth g t-wehm wohochuththam Jerusalem t am. T hegam t-wehm wohochuththam mo am kih Macedonia ch Greece jejewed ch ed hab i e ah mat wo i hemapai g lial k hekaj wo i ha wehmt.
45015027	S-ap'e o mat am aigo wo i ha wehmt nat pi ab ha amjed i hih g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh.
45015028	Neh, am ant ha wehm wo hih hegam mat am wo i ui g ha-mahkigdag Jerusalem t am. Heg i thahm ant am haha wo i em-chehgim am himathch mant gm hu wo hih Spain wui.
45015029	S-mahch ani matt ab a'ai wo si s-t-ho'ige'el mant am wo jiwia em-wui.
45015030	Tham ni-wehm wohochuththam g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab em-mahkch g gewkthag mamt wo si pihk e elithath ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuththam. Kuni heg hekaj ab em-tahni mamt ab wo si e sho'igch Jiosh wui
45015031	k ab wo tai mat wo si ni-nuhkuthath. T hab pi has wo ni-juh hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Christ amai Judea ch ed. Ab g ep wo tahni g Jiosh mat am hab wo ha juh g t-wehm wohochuththam mat ab wabsh s-ap wo ui g t-mahkigdag.
45015032	Nt heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk k am wo i em-chehgim matp hab wo elithath g Jiosh.
45015033	Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam. Ni ab tahni mat ab ba'ich wo i em-wehmt.
45016001	Am atsh wo i em-chehgim ihtha t-wehm wohochuththam mo hab chehgig Phebe ch am i ha wehmt g t-wehm wohochuththam Cenchrea kihhim t am.
45016002	Mt s-ap ab wo i nei am wehhejed g t-kownalig Jesus. Ab o d t-wuikam matt ab wo i ha wahpki hegam mo an oiopoth ch chikpan g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Ge'e ha'ichu o am hab junihim ihtha Phebe mu'i t-wehhejed. Kumt am wo i wehmt heg hekaj mat haschu wo i tatchua.
45016003	Am g wo ha ahgith g ni-machiga amai mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el. Kah ani mash am thadha g Priscilla ch Aquila. Ihtham o wa am ni-wehm chikpanahim
45016004	ch chum alo e ko'ij ni-wehhejed. Kuni ab si s-ha ho'ige'ith. K hegam gawul mahs hemajkam mo ab ni-ab kah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga hab wa'ap ab s-ha ho'ige'ith mat ni-tho'ibia.
45016005	Kah ani mash am ha'i e hehemapath ch e mihshmath ha-kih am ihtham Priscilla ch Aquila. Kumt am wo ha ahgi mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el. Am g ep wo ahgith g ni-nawoj Epanetus mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el. Heg o wud mat si wehpeg ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh amai Asia jewed ch ed.
45016006	Sh am si i em-wehmt g ni-machiga Mary. Kumt am wo ahgi mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el.
45016007	Sh g ni-hajuni Andronicus ch Junia am ep em-wehmaj. Ihtham at wa wehpeg ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Nt ab hahawa i s-wohoch. S-ap o ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mo heg hekaj ab gawulkthas. Kum wa hab wa'ap ha kuhpchkahim. Am g wo ha ahgith mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el.
45016008	Kush g Ampliatas am ep thak ch d si ni-nawoj am Christ himthag ed.
45016009	Sh am ep em-wehmaj hegai Urbanus mo wa am ni-wehm ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Sh g Stacas am ep em-wehmaj ch d si ni-nawoj.
45016010	Sh g Apelles am ep em-wehmaj ch hab wa'ap e chehgithch mo am hab wa'ap ha'ichu hab junihim wehhejed g Christ.
45016011	Sh g Herodion am ep em-wehmaj ch d ni-hajuni. Ihtham g wo ha ahgith mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el. Am g wo ha ahgith hegam Aristobulus ch hegam Narcissus mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el.
45016012	Sh am ep em-wehmaj g Tripina ch Triposa ch am chikpan g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Sh g Persis am ep si chikpan.
45016013	Sh g Rufus g si ge'e chikpan am hab wa'ap junihim. Rufus je'e o hab masma ab ni-neith mani d madaj. Kumt wehs am wo ha ahgi ihtham mat ab wo s-ni-ho'ige'el.
45016014	Sh am e wehm ab ihm g Jiosh hegam Asincritas ch Plegon ch Hermes ch Patrobas ch Hermas ch ha'i ehp. Kumt am wo ha ahgi mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el.
45016015	Sh am e wehm ab ihm g Jiosh hegam Philologas ch Julia ch hegam Nerias g e-uwiga wehm ch Olimpas ch ha'i ehp. Kumt am wo ha ahgi mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el.
45016016	Ab g wo e chehgith mam a'ai s-e ho'ige'elith. Wehsijj hegam mo an a'ai e nanmek ch ab ihm g Jesus Christ o ab s-em-ho'ige'ith.
45016017	Neh, am ant ha'ichu wo em-ahgi, ni-wepnag. An o ha'i oiopoth ch am gawul junihim g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch am ha'ichu hab ahg mat hekaj wo e kudu g t-wehm wohochuththam k ab e wui wo gegokiwua. Kumt wo si s-e nen'oithk ab ha amjed k pi ab hu wo i ha miabi.
45016018	Ihtham o wabsh hejel e wehhejed hab wua g pi ap e-tatchui ch pi ab hu chikpanith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Ho o iattogith hegam mo pi ap mahch g wohokam wabsh si s-kehg neneokch ch s-ap has ha ahg.
45016019	Kumsh eda ahpim ab si s-wohog elith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Christ. Kuni heg hekaj ab si s-hehgig em-hekaj ch am s-em-ahgithamk mamt wo s-ap s-mahchk g s-ap'ekam ch pi wo mahchk g pi ap'ekam.
45016020	Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam ch s-hohtam wo em-mah g gewkthag mamt wo gewito g Jiawul. Ab ani tahni g t-kownalig Jesus mat wo em-wehmajk ch ba'ich ab wo i em-mah g ho'ige'ithadag.
45016021	Ia o ni-wehm chikpan g Timothy ch hab kaij mamtsh ab wo i s-ho'ige'el. K ihtham ab s-em-ho'ige'ith ni-wehm o'othham mo hab chechgig Lucius ch Jason ch Sosipater.
45016022	Ia o ni-wehhejed em-o'ohanith ihtha g Tershus ch hab ep kaij mamtsh ab wo i s-ho'ige'el.
45016023	Ia ani tha kihj am g Gaius. K ith ab ep s-em-ho'ige'ith. Ia kihj am o e nanmek g Christ wohochuththam. Hegai mo d lial nuhkuththam am wehhejed g kownal ith eda kihhim o hab chehgig Erastus ch ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ch hab wa'ap am em-ho'ige'elith. K g Quartus hab wa'ap am em-ho'ige'elith. [
45016024	Neh, ab at wo wa ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'el g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.]
45016025	Nt am haha wo i em-thagito Jiosh wui. Heg at wo e nako mat wo i em-gewpkai. Mt hahawa s-wihnam ab wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Heg ani hekaj ahgachug ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus Christ. Kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam at wa heki hu an o'oha ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus Christ.
45016026	T g Jiosh hemu mahsko wua mo has d ahga k am tashogi mat am wo e ahgahith wehs ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam matp hems ab wo i s-wohochuth k ab wo s-wohog i el. Pi o hebai ha hug g Jiosh
45016027	ch wehs ha'ichu s-mahch ch ab i e maskogith am gahi wuhshanim g Jesus Christ. Kutt heg gahi wuhshanim ab wo si ihmath g Jiosh ch ab wo si has elithath chum hekith. Neh, ith ant am wo wa'i em-o'ohani.
46001001	Ni-wepnag mam am kih Corinth t am: Am ant wo ha'ichu i em-o'ohani ahni Paul mani d Jesus Christ kehsha mo wa am ni-tatchuith g Jiosh. K ia i ni-wehmaj ihtha t-wehnag mo hab chehgig Sosthenes.
46001002	Jiosh at ab i em-gawulkai mamt d wo hemajkamgajk. Kumt heg hekaj ab i e hemakoj wehsijj t-wehm ahchim mach hab wa'ap ab ihm g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
46001003	Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
46001004	Chum ani hekith ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh em-hekaj. Ab amt i s-wohoch g Christ. T g Jiosh ab i em-mah g ge'e i wehmtadag.
46001005	M heg hekaj s-mahch mo haschu s-ap'e ch s-ap ha'ichu am hab junihim ch s-ap ha'ichu k amjed neneok.
46001006	Am o e chehgithch mam s-wihnam an u'ukch g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed g Christ.
46001007	Kum wehs ab i neith g ho'ige'ithadgaj ch ep nenida mat ep wo jiwia.
46001008	Jiosh at ab i em-waith k ab i em-gawulkai mat hab masma hab t-juh. Kum hab si s-ap s-mahch g alithaj Jesus Christ. T g Jiosh pi hekith am hu gawul wo juh g hab e-elitha k an wo t-u'ukchith matt pi ab hu wo t-chu'ichigch heg eda tash mat wo ha lothai g pi ap chu'ijkam.
46001010	T-kownalig Jesus Christ o ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag mant wo ha'ichu em-cheha. Kunt hekaj wo em-ahgi mamt pi ab hu e wui wo gegokiwua k wabshaba ab wo i hemakoj g e-chegitoithag k wo s-ap e tahtkk ab a'ai e wui.
46001011	Ia at ha'i thatha g em-wehm kihkam mo d Cloe hajuni k hab kaij mamsh pi e wehm neneok.
46001012	Ha'i amsh hab kaij mamsh ahni am ni-oith ch amsh ha'i g Apollos am oith ch amsh ha'i g Peter am oith. Kumsh ha'i hab e elith mamsh ahpim d wa'i wohokam oiththam g Christ.
46001013	Neh, am amtsh a'ai i e ga'agwulkath k eda d chum hemako ab wecho g Christ. Pi att hema ahchim ab muh kots t ab em wehhejed. Heg at wa'i Christ hab e juh. Kumt heg ab wa'i s-wohochuth k e pahl wapko.
46001014	Pi ant heg wehhejed am hu jiwia manis wehs wo em-pahl wapko. Shahag wepo mant hegam wa'i Crispus ch Gaius ha wapko, pej hegam ehp Stephanus. Pi ant chegito manis ha'i ep ha pahl wapko. Pi ani hab ni-ahg mams ahni wo i ni-oi. Pi at heg hekaj am i ni-kei g Christ manis wo ha pahl wapkonath k wabshaba am i ni-kei mant am wo ahgachugath ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mo hab chu'ig mat ab e muhkith kots t ab t-wehhejed. Neh, ith ani wa'i ahgachug ch pi hekaj g s-hasig ne'oki mams ab wo si has ni-elith k p i am hu wo amichuth k hab pi wo e tho'ibia.
46001018	Hegam mo pi d e tho'ibiakam o hab elith mo d wabsh pi ha'ichu g ha'ichu t-ahga mat g Christ ab muh kots t ab t-wehhejed. Kuch wabshaba ahchim mach d t-tho'ibiakam s-mahch mo g Jiosh hab masma ab t-chehgithch g e-gewkthag.
46001019	Neh, an o o'ohanas mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Ha'i o hab e elith mat wo i e ap'ech heg hekaj hejel e-amichuthadag. Nt wabshaba am wabsh wo pi ha'ichuch g hab ha-elitha.
46001020	Pegih, am o t-chehgithch g Jiosh matt pi hedai wo sha'i t-nako machs wo hejel t-tho'ibia, chum achs hems ha'ichu wo s-amichuthath ch ha'ichu wo s-mahchkath. Pi att hedai wo sha'i t-nako machs wo ha ne'owin k wo cheh g Jiosh wohokam.
46001021	Jiosh at hab masma hab t-juh matt pi hedai wo sha'i t-nako machs hejel wo s-mai g Jiosh k wo t-tho'ibia. Ha'i o pi ha'ichuchuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. K wabshaba hab d elithaj matt ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k hekaj wo t-tho'ibia.
46001022	Ni-wehm Tutuligo o s-hohho'ith mat ho'ip nei g s-hasig ha'ichu k haha wo s-wohoch hegai mo hab junihim. K g gawul mahs hemajkam s-kaimk g hemajkam ha'ichu ha-mahchig mat hab masma wo chum s-mai g wohokam.
46001023	Ch wabshaba ahchim hi heg ahgachug mat g Christ ab muh kots t ab k hekaj t-tho'ibia. Tutuligo o hab elith mo ith wabsh chehgithch mo pi gewkthag. K g gawul mahs o'othham hab elith mo wabsh chehgithch mo pi ha'ichu amichuth.
46001024	T wabshaba g Jiosh ab ha'i i t-gawulkai ahchim Tutuligo k hab wa'ap ab ha'i i em-gawulkai ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam matt ab wo i s-wohoch g alithag k wo t-tho'ibia. Hegam mo pi d e tho'ibiakam o pi ab hu ha'ichuchuth ihtha mat g Jiosh am hab t-juni am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag. K wabshaba g Jiosh hab masma am t-chehgithch g e-amichuthadag ch e-gewkthag.
46001026	Am g wo s-chegitok, ni-wepnag, mam has i masma mat eda koi ab hu i em-gawulkai g Jiosh mamt d wo hemajkamgajk, Mu'ijj am pi ha'ichu mahch ch pi ha gewkthag ch d wabsh pi ha'ichu am ha-nena ed g hemajkam.
46001027	T g Jiosh ab i em-gawulkai mat hekaj am wo ha chehgi hegam mo pi mahch mo d wabsh pi ha'ichu g ha'ichu ha-amichuthadag ch ha-gewkthag.
46001028	Pi am ab hu em-ha'ichuchuth ch wabsh s-em-uhwaith. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i em-gawulkai mat hekaj am wo ha chehgi mo pi d sha'i ha'ichu hegam mo g hemajkam ab si has ha elith.
46001029	Heg o hekaj hab mahs mat pi hedai wo chum si e haschuthath am tahgio g Jiosh.
46001030	Heg at ab i t-wehnath g Christ matt ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed. T g Christ t-tho'ibia ab amjed g pi ap'ekam k am i t-ap'ech wehhejed g Jiosh matt d wo hekia s-ap'ekam hemajkamgajk, Bo masma ab t-chehgithch g Jiosh ha'ichu amichuthadag.
46001031	Heg o hekaj an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Pi g hedai hejel ab hu wo e ha'ichuchuthath k ch heg ab wo wa'i ha'ichuchuthath mat haschu hab t-juni g Jiosh.
46002001	Kuni ahni hi pi sha'i hasigamkaj neok, ni-wepnag, mant eda am wa jiwia em-wui am ahgachugch
46002002	mat g Jesus Christ ab muh kots t ab am t-wehhejed. Kuni hab n-ahg mant heg am wo wa'i ahgachugath
46002003	ch heg hekaj si s-gihug ch gigiwuk.
46002004	K g ha'ichu ni-ahga pi am hu hab sha'i kaithag matp hems g si s-e mahchim o'othham ha'ichu ahga. K wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am wohokamchuth g ha'ichu ni-ahga.
46002005	Heg ani hekaj s-mahch mo g em-wohochuthadag pi ab hu shon heg ab hemajkam ha'ichu amichuthadag ch wabshaba ab Jiosh gewkthag amjed.
46002006	Am ani wa hi wa ha ahgith g ha'ichu amichuthadag hegam mat ge'ege'ehogat e-wohochuthadag ed. K wabshaba ith pi d hemajkam ha'ichu ha-amichuthadag, chum hems hegam mo d s-has haha'ichu. Hegam ha'ichu ha-amichuthadag at wabsh ha wehm wo huhug.
46002007	Ihtha ha'ichu amichuthadag mani hab ahg o d Jiosh hab elitha am t-wehhejed ch an hab chu'ig mat koi in hu nahto ihtha jewed ch wabsh s-a'agi an hab ah chu'ig. Tho Jiosh hab elitha mat g Christ wo t-tho'ibia.
46002008	Heg o d kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. T eda g s-has haha'ichu ab naggia kots t ab no pi pi mahch g Jiosh hab elitha.
46002009	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Pi o hedai sha'i neith o kah o chegito mat he'es i s-kehg ha'ichu am i ap'ech g Jiosh am ha wehhejed hegam mo ab si tatchua.
46002010	Jiosh ha'ichu hab elitha o pi ta machima am t-wehhejed. K wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wehs s-mahch ch am i t-tashogith.
46002011	Neh, no hig pi woho mo pi hedai ep s-mahch g ha'ichu t-chegitoi hab masma mach ahchim hejel s-mahch? Pegih, ch ahchim hab wa masma pi hedai ep s-mahch g Jiosh ha'ichu chegitoi.
46002012	T wabshaba g Jiosh ab t-mah g Hekai S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat am t-eda wo ulinig ch am wo i t-tashogithath mo haschu ab t-makiog g Jiosh.
46002013	Pegih, pi att wo sha'i t-nako machs am hu wo tashogi g Jiosh wohokam heg hekaj hemajkam ha'ichu amichuthadag. K wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab t-mahkch g ha'ichu amichuthadag mach hekaj am i tashogith. T hegam wo wa'i s-amich mo hedai edgith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
46002014	T hegam mo pi edgith pi wo amichuth k pi wo bei mo haschu ab t-makiog. Heg wa'i Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o ab t-mahkch g amichuthadag matt wo s-amich g wohokam.
46002015	Ahchim mach edgith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag att wo t-nako matt am s-ap wo i a'amich mo haschu am i t-tashogithch. K hegam pi t-amichuth matp hedai i pi edgith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
46002016	Ith o hab ahg hegai mo an Jiosh t amjed o'ohanas: Pi o hedai hejel s-mahch g Jiosh chegitoithag mas ab wo ha'ichu i ahgi. Pegih, bo chu'ig. Kuch wabshaba ahchim s-mahch no pi g Christ ab t-mahkch g e-chegitoithag.
46003001	Am ani wa pi hasigam neok, ni-wepnag, mani am em-ahgith g wohokam namt pi pi koi ge'ege'ehogat ith eda t-wohochuthadag ch pi am hu si e thagitokch Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui. Bam wa'i masma mo g a'al nam pi d wabsh wechij ith eda t-wohochuthadag.
46003002	Heg o wa wepo mani g wihbi em-i'ichuth ch pi g ha'ichu hugi em-gegosith ab wabsh s-bahbagi ha'ichu em-ahgithch. Chum wa ia'i ithani amt koi ge'ege'ehogat
46003003	k hab wabsh kia chu'ig mo hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh. Neh, am am a'ai s-e hehgamk ch a'ai e kawani. K ith hekaj am tasho mam ha oithch hab e wua hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh.
46003004	Ha'ijj amsh hab chech'e mam ahni Paul am ni-oith ch ha'ijj hab chech'e mam g Apollos am oith. K ith am wohokamchuth mam ha wepo ha'ichu chegito hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh.
46003005	Pi ach d si ha'ichu ch d wabsh piongaj g Jiosh mamt ab t-ab bei g wohokam ab amjed g Christ. Tho Jiosh mo ab t-mahkch g t-chikpan. Kuch am hab wabsh junihim mo haschu ab t-mahkch hab masma mo g oithag ch ed chikpantham.
46003006	Heg o wa wepo mani ahni am esh g ha'ichu kai am wehpeg ahgch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. K g Apollos am wapga g esha am ba'ich i ahgch. K wabshaba d Jiosh ch am i wuhshath g t-esha mamt ab s-wohochuth k am he'es i oi g ha'ichu ahgaj mach am ahgachug.
46003007	Kuch heg hekaj pi d si ha'ichu ahchim mach am eshath ch wapga am ahgch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Jiosh o d si ha'ichu no pi heg am i wuhshath g t-esha mam ab s-wohochuth ahpim mam kah g ha'ichu ahgaj.
46003008	Wehs ach t-wepo masma ahchim mach ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga, chum achs hema wehpeg am wo ah, tt hema am ba'ich wo i ahgahi. T g Jiosh ab wo t-mah g t-namkithadag matt he'es hab i juh g chikpan.
46003009	Pegih, thach piongaj g Jiosh g Apollos wehm. Kum ahpim d Jiosh eniga mach am em-chikpan wehhejed g Jiosh. Heg o wa wepo mam d Jiosh kihta.
46003010	T heg ab i ni-gawulkai mant em-chikp hab masma mani d s-ni-mahchim kihttham ch am shondath g kih am ahgachugk g Jesus Christ. Kum ahpim epai himchuth g kihta ahgachugch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. K ab em-ab mamt si s-nen'oith k am hab wo junihith.
46003011	Shondaj o heki hu nahtois ch d Jesus Christ. Kumt pi haschukaj ab ep wo shondath.
46003012	Neh, tp hems wo e mehi matp haschu kih wabsh g sha'ikaj hab wo e juh.
46003013	Pegih, t hab wa masma wo i e a'appe g em-chikpan. Mt heg hekaj si s-ap hab wo juh
46003014	k hab wo bei g e-namkithadag mat hekith wo e mamche.
46003015	T hi wo wa e tho'ibia matp hedai pi kehg hab juh g e-chikpan. T wabshaba g chikpanaj wo huhug hab masma mat g sha'i wo meitto am mei ch ed.
46003016	Heg o wa wepo mach d Jiosh cheopiga no pi am t-eda kih g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Ith amt wo chum s-mahchk.
46003017	Jiosh at wo padch matp hedai wo i em-padch nam pi d enigaj ch d hekia s-ap'ekam.
46003018	Ha'i amtp hab i e ahg mam s-chu a'amichuth am ha nena ed g hemajkam. Pi g am wo hejel e iattogith. Pi at hab wo t-elithath machs s-chu a'amichuth hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh ha'ichu amichuthadag mattp heg an wo u'ukchith. Am g wo i e nakog mamt an wo u'ukchith, chum as hab wo em-elithath mam pi ha'ichu a'amichuth.
46003019	Tho wabsh pi ha'ichu an Jiosh tahgio mo haschu ihtham hab elith mo d ha'ichu amichuthadag. T g Jiosh an wo ha wulsh heg hekaj ha'ichu ha-amichuthadag mo hab masma an o'ohanas wehhejed.
46003020	K an hab ep chu'ig mo d wabsh pi ha'ichu g ha-chegitoithag g s-chu a'amichuththam am Jiosh wehhejed.
46003021	Kumt hekaj pi hedai wo chum ge t-ha'ichuchuthath. Thach wabsh em-pionag g Apollos ch Peter ha wehm. Wehs ihtha jewed o d em-eniga. Hegai mo hemu in ha'ichug ch hegai mo ab hahawa him o d em-eniga. Thoakag ch muhkig d em-ap'ethag.
46003023	Kum d Christ hemajkamga. K heg d alithaj g Jiosh.
46004001	Thach wabsh piongaj g Christ. K heg t-nuhkuthachuth matt am wo i tashogi g s-a'agi ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Kumt hab masma wo s-t-mahchk.
46004002	Ha-pionag at heg am hab wo wa'i junihith mo haschu g ahmoj chehani ch s-ap wo nuhkuth g e-nuhkutha.
46004003	Pegih, ni heg am wa'i chikpanith Jiosh. K pi sha'i ni-kudut mamtp has i masma hab wo elithath g ni-chikpan ahpim o hedai i hemajkam. Ni'inis hejel wo ah manis has masma hab wua.
46004004	Pi o ha'ichu sha'i ni-kudut am ni-chegitoi ed manis pi ap am hab junihim g chikpan am Jiosh wehhejed. K wabshaba pi ith hekaj e wohokamchuth manis am wabsh i si s-ap am hab junihim. Heg o wa'i Jiosh s-mahch machs hedai s-ap am hab junihim g t-chikpan.
46004005	Mt heg hekaj pi ab hu wabsh si s-hohtam hema ha'ichu wo abch mat koi wo e ai g tash. Am at haha wo t-a'appe g t-kownalig mat hekith wo jiwia k wo mahsko wua mach haschu i chegito ch haschu ahgch hab junihim ha'ichu k ab haha wo i t-mahkhi g s-ap has elithadag mo he'es ab i him t-wui.
46004006	Neh, ith ani am em-ahgith, ni-wepnag, ab t-amjed ahni ch Apollos mant am wo i em-tashogi mamt pi am hu thahm wo i chesh hegai mo haschu an o'ohanas Jiosh o'ohana ed. Pi amt hedai Jiosh pionag ha ba'ich ab wo si has elithath ch wabshaba ab wehs wo ha kaihamath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
46004007	Pi g wo chum si e haschuthath heg hekaj mam haschu i edgith ch haschu i s-mahch. Jiosh at wehs ab wabsh em-mah mam haschu i edgith.
46004008	Bamsh e elith mam heki hu wehs ha'ichu edgith ch heki hu d s-kakais ch d ge kokownal. Kuch eda ahchim Jesus Christ chuhchai pi d s-kakais ch pi d kokownal. Mamt hu'i woho d wo kokownalk. Kutt em-wehm d wo kokownalk.
46004009	Kuch eda wehs ha ba'ich d i sho'igkam ch attp hems wo t-ko'ij am wehhejed g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Shahag wepo mo g Jiosh am t-chehgithch wehs ha ba'ich hab masma mat g kownal am wo ha chehgi hegam matp ha gewito k ha lilsoch.
46004010	Ahpim am hab e elith mam d si ha'ichu s-mahchim ab amjed g Christ ch si s-gewpkthag ch ab d si has ha-elitha hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh. K eda ihtham pi kehg has t-elith ahchim mach ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch hab t-elith mach pi ha'ichu mahch ch pi ha gewpkthag.
46004011	Hebai ach bihugko'o ch ep tonkko'o ch pi edgith g eniga. K hegam t-gewichshulig. Pi ach hebai t-mahch ch kih
46004012	ch si chikpan ch hejel t-thagio'ith. K hegam s-ko'okam has t-ahg. Kuch ab wabsh i s-ha ho'ige'ith. T-sho'igchuth o. Kuch wabsh nakog.
46004013	An o ahgahim g iattogi ab t-amjed. Kuch wabsh s-hemajim ha wehm neneok. Bo wabsh t-elith mach d wabsh hegai mo g hemajkam s-ohhoth ch gm hu nehnchuth.
46004014	Ith ani em-ahgith mant wo ha'ichu i em-shelini hab masma mam d si ni-tatchuithch ni-a'aliga. Pi ani hab ahgch em-ahgith manis wo si em-edawua.
46004015	Heg o wa wepo mani d em-ohg ith eda himthag namt pi ab ni-amjed kah g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh k hekaj bei g e-wechij thoakag. T wo mu'ijk g em-mashchamtham ith eda Christ himthag. Ni eda d wa'i ahni mant wehpeg am em-wui u'apa ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mamt heg hekaj e tho'ibia.
46004016	Kuni ab i em-gewkemhun mamt am hab wo junihith mani wa haschu am em-chehgith.
46004017	Ia o thaha g t-wehnag Timothy. Kuni am ahgith mat am wo i em-chehgim ed k wo i em-chegitoich matt has masma am wo himchuthath g t-thoakag am wehhejed g Christ mani wa am em-mashchamahim ch wehs ha mashchamahim mani hebai i hihhim. S-mahch am mat heg ab ni-amjed ab i s-wohoch g Christ k heg wa wepo mo d si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag ch am hab junihim g ha'ichu ni-ahga.
46004018	Kah ani mamsh ha'i si e sheshmachuth hab e ahgch mant pi am hu wo i em-chehgim.
46004019	Nt wabshaba s-hohtam ab wo i hih em-wui matp g Jiosh hab d wo elithak k am haha wo s-mai mams has masma himchuth g e-thoakag ahpim mam chum si e sheshmachuth ch mu'i neneok.
46004020	Ab ach wecho g Jiosh. K pi hab chum chu'ig machs wabsh wo neneokath ch wabshaba g s-ap ha'ichu hab wo junihith heg hekaj Jiosh gewkthag.
46004021	Ab o em-ab mamt ab wo i e thagito wui g Jiosh. Nt hemho wo wa s-em-keh'el am jiwiak mamtp pi ab hu wui wo i e thagito, k wabshaba si s-hemajim ab wo i em-nei mamtp ab wui wo i e thagito.
46005001	Am ash ha'ichu hab ep chu'ig em-shahgith ch d si ge'e pi ap'ekam. Msh eda si e hahaschuth. Hema ash wabsh hohnig g e-ohgbad hohnig. Eda chump g Jiosh pi wohochuththam pi hab sha'i masma.
46005002	Mt wo chum si pi ap e taht mat ith am hab e juh em-shahgith k wo i wuhshath hegai mat am hab juh ihtha pi ap'ekam.
46005003	Chum anis pi am hu ha'ichug ch eda heki hu hab i n-ah mat ihtha o'othham hemho wa gm hu wo i e wuhshath,
46005004	no pi hab masma t-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus matt hab masma am hab wo junihith. T heg am wo em-wehmajk. Kumt heg hekaj am wo e nam
46005005	k wo i wuhshath ihtha o'othham ab e amjed. Kut am wo e sho'igch ihtha o'othham ge Jiawul wecho k atp hems ith hekaj ab wo i e sho'igch Jiosh wui k d wo e tho'ibiakamk mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus k wo ha lothai g pi ap chu'ijkam.
46005006	Pi o ap'e mams hab wo chei mam wabsh si s-ap'e mo eda an ha'ichug g pi ap'ekam am em-shahgith. S-mahch am ihtha hab che'ithag, “Al chum jewajithakud o s-gewkthag ch i ko'okpothkath g wahga.” Ith o chum t-tashogith mat g al chum pi ap'ekam ge'e ha'ichu wo padch.
46005007	Neh, t wo wa e muhkith g kahwal mad mat wo e wuhshath g t-shohshon ha tho'ibiathag. T g jewajithakud gm hu hab wo i e juh. Pegih, k g Jesus Christ d s-wohokam ch e muhkith am t-wehhejed mat wo t-tho'ibia ab amjed g pi ap'ekam. Kum heg hekaj pi padchuthas ch gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap'ekam mat pi wo em-padch.
46005008	Pegih, tt wo si s-hehgigk ith hekaj ch gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap'ekam k hab wo wa'i junihith g s-ap'ekam ch hab wo wa'i kaijjith g wohokam.
46005009	Heki ant hu wa am em-o'ohanith k em-ahgith mamt pi ab hu wo ha nawojk hegam mo ha wehm wo'iwup mo hedai pi d ha-wehm kihkam ch hegam mo s-bahbanma ch hegam mo melchkwuhim g chehanig kch hegam mo heg ab ihm ch ab wui e ho'ige'ithahun mo pi d Jiosh ch d ha-nahtoi g hemajkam. Pi ani hegam hab ha ahg mo pi d t-wehm wohochuththam ch hab chu'ig. Ihtham o an wehsko hab chu'ig. Kumt pi has masma pi ab hu wo ha miabi.
46005011	Hegam ani wa hab ha ahg mo hab e ahg mo d t-wehm wohochuththam ch eda am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. Pi g am chum hems wo ha wehm thadhaiwua matp hedai wo ha wehm wo'iwup mo hedai pi d ha wehm kihkam o atp wo s-bahbanmak o atp wo melchkwuhith g chehanig o atp ab wo ihmath mo haschu d wabsh o'othham ha-nahtoi ch ab wui wo e ho'ige'ithahunath o atp d wo s-i'imkamk o atp d wo s-chu ehskamk.
46005012	Pi o ab hu t-ab machs wo mamche g ha-chu'ichig hegam mo pi d t-wehm wohochuththam. Jiosh at hab wo ha juh. Ab o em-ab mamt gm hu wo i ha wuwhas hegam mat pi wo thagito g pi ap'ekam k eda d chum em-wehm wohochuththam. Ith o hab ahg hegai mo an Jiosh t amjed o'ohanas: “Gam g hu wo i wuhshath g pi ap'ekam hemajkam ab e amjed.”
46006001	Pi g am hu a'ai wo e lothaitath am ha tahgio hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh ch wabshaba ab e-wehm wohochuththam ha wui wo e thagito. T am wo i ap'ech mamtp haschukaj pi e ap'et.
46006002	Mt wo chum s-mahchk mo hab him g tash matt d wo u'ugchuk ith thahm jewed ahchim Jiosh hemajkamga. Pegih, tt wo chum t-nako matt am wo i ap'ech g al chu'uchum ha'ichu am t-shahgith.
46006003	Mt ep wo chum s-mahchk matt am hu wa hebai chum hems g anghil wo ha lothai. Kutt wo chum t-nako matt wo ha'ichu i ap'ech ith thahm jewed hejel t-wehhejed.
46006004	Pi g am wo beh'i hegai mo pi mahch g Jiosh mas am wo i ap'ech mo haschu i pi ap'e am em-shahgith.
46006005	That wo s-ta edam ha'ichuk mamt a'ai wo e lothaitath. Ab amsh si has ha elith g s-chu a'amichuththam ch amtp eda pi hema cheh am e shahgith mas am wo i em-ap'ech.
46006006	K amsh a'ai e lothait am wabsh ha nena ed hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh.
46006007	Am am e chehgithch mamt i e gehgch mam eda e kam'on. Matp pi am hu wo i em-ap'ech g em-wehm wohochuththam, mt wabsh pi am hu has wo kaijjith ch wo nako, chum ams ha'ichu em-ehs.
46006008	Ni eda kah mamsh wabsh hejel pi ap ha'ichu hab wua ab ha wui ch ha'ichu ha ehsith chum hems g e-wehm wohochuththam.
46006009	Mt wo chum s-mahchk mat g pi ap hemajkam pi am hu wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed. Pi g am wo e iattogith mams am hu wo i wahp mamtp ha wehm wo wo'iwupath mo hedai pi d em-wehm kihkam o hedai d em-wehm chechoj o g em-wehm u'uwi o amtp wo jioshgat k ab wo ihmath mo haschu d wabsh o'othham ha-nahtoi
46006010	o amtp wo s-chu e'eskk o wo s-bahbanmak o wo s-i'imkk o wo ha'ichu ha iattogithath ab hema amjed o wo ha'ichu ha wohppo'ithath.
46006011	Ha'ijj am hab chu'igkahim. T wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag gm hu hab i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig k am i em-ap'ech g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehhejed.
46006012	Kumsh hahawa ha'i hab chech'e mo wehs ha'ichu hiwgithas matp haschu wehhejed pi an hu ha'ichug g chehanig. Nt wabshaba am wo em-ahgi mo pi wehs ha'ichu s-kehgaj am t-wehhejed. Pi att wo chum hiwigi mat haschu gn hu wabsh wo i si t-ui.
46006013	Ha'i amsh hab chech'e, “Ha'ichu hugi o ab d wuikamaj g t-wohk ch g wohk g ha'ichu hugi ab d wuikam,” ch hab chum ahg mo wehs s-ap'e mach haschu i tatchua am wehhejed g t-honshpadag. K wabshaba ith pi woho mamsh has chum ahg. Pi att wabsh wo huhug hab masma mat ihtham ha'ichu k heg hekaj wo si t-nuhkuth. Neh, mo g cheoj tatchua mat ab wo i miabi g uwi nat pi hab masma nahto g Jiosh. K wabshaba pi hab d ahga ihtha mas wabsh chum hedai wehm wo wo'iwua, Pi at hab ahgk t-nahto g Jiosh machs pi ap wo hekaj g t-honshpadag k wabshaba hab ahgk matt g t-kownalig Jesus wehhejed wo hekaj nat pi heg am t-wehhejed muh.
46006014	Jiosh at ab uhpam i wuhshath g t-kownalig Jesus ab muhkig amjed k hab wa'ap wo i t-wuwhas ahchim heg hekaj e-gewkthag mat hekaj ab i wuhshath g Jesus.
46006015	Mt wo chum s-mahchk mo g em-honshpadag ab gi'i ab g Christ ch d enigaj. Pegih, mt pi woho hab wo juh g e-honshpadag mat ab wo i e wehnath g chehpa'awi.
46006016	Aha nam pi mahch mamtp hema i wo wehmaj wo'iwua g chehpa'awi k d haha wo hemakok heg wehm. Si o shel am ahg ihtha g Jiosh o'ohana ch hab chu'ig mo d hemako am Jiosh tahgio hegam mat wo e wehm wohpiwua.
46006017	K pi hab chum mahs machs hab wo masmak chehpa'awi wehm ahchim matt ab i t-thagito Christ wui nach pi d hemako heg wehm.
46006018	Ni heg hekaj hab kaij mamt wo si e nuhkuth ith amjed mamt pi wabsh chum hedai wehm wo wo'iwupath namt pi heg hekaj wo e hemakoj ha wehm k wo uamhu g e-honshpadag k hab masma wo i e mehkoth ab amjed g Christ.
46006019	Mt wo chum s-mahchk mo g Jiosh ab em-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg am em-eda kih. Pegih, k d cheopigaj g em-honshpadag ch pi d wabsh hejel em-eniga.
46006020	Jiosh at am i thagito g e-alithag kots wui mat wo t-tho'ibia. Kutt d haha wo hemajkamgajk ch heg hekaj ab wo si has i elith k wehhejed wo hekaj g t-honshpadag.
46007001	Ia ant haha wo em-ahgi hegai mam wa ni-kakke ia ni-o'ohanithk. Ith amt wehpeg ab ni-kakke mas s-ap'e matt pi wo ha hohnt. Kunt hab wo em-ah mo chum hi wa s-ap'e mamt pi wo ha hohnt.
46007002	K wabshaba ha'i g ha-tatchuithag si s-gewkthag. K ihtham ha wehhejed ba'ich i s-ap'e mat wo e hohnt mat heg hekaj pi am hu wo i shul pi ap'ekam ch ed.
46007003	Kumt ab a'ai e wui wo e thagito ahpim mam d e hohonikam no pi g em-honshpadag d a'ai em-eniga ch pi d wabsh hehe'ejel em-eniga. Mt hab s-ap e tahtk ch wo e wehm kihk.
46007005	Pi g a'ai wo e tha'ath, heg hi wa mamtp am a'ai wo e ap'ech mamt he'es i tash pi ab hu wo i e miabi mamt heg hab wo wa'i juh ho'ige'ithahuna k am hab hahawa ep wo masmak mam heki hu mat pi wo em-gehg g ge Jiawul heg hekaj em-tatchui.
46007006	Pi ani ab hu em-chehani mams wo ge hohont, heg hi wa mamtp wo tatchuath ch wo e hohont.
46007007	Mamt hu'i pi wo ha wehm kihkamk hab masma mani ahni. K wabshaba g Jiosh pi wehs hab masma em-ap'echuthch ch ha'i em-ap'echuthch mamt wo e hohont.
46007008	Nt wo ha'ichu em-ahgi ahpim mam pi ha wehm kihkam ch ahpim mat koi g em-wehm kihkam. Ba'ich o i s-ap'e mamt wo hehe'ejelk mani hab masma.
46007009	Mt wabshaba wo e hohont mamtp pi wo e nako mamt wo shohbi g e-tatchui. Ba'ich o i s-ap'e mamt wo e hohont mamt pi wo e kudutath g e-tatchuikaj.
46007010	Tho chehanigaj g t-kownalig Jesus mamt pi wo ohhoth g e-wehm kihkam
46007011	k amtp wabshaba hab wo sha e juh k hemho wa pi hema ep wo hohnt o wo kunt k wabsh wo hejelk o an uhpam ep wo i e nodagi e-wehm kihkam wui.
46007012	Chum as pi d wo em-wehm wohochuththamk g em-wehm kihkam, mt pi am hu wo ha ohhoth matp wo tatchuath mat an wo em-wehmajk. Jiosh at am i ap'ech em-wehhejed mat pi wo padch g em-kihthag. T g Jiosh ab wo ha ui g em-a'aliga mat d wo a'aligajk. T g em-wehm kihkam pi wo ha padch.
46007015	Mt wabshaba wo ha hiwigi mat wo s-em-ohhoth matp wo tatchuath nam pi pi heg hekaj e wupulshch matp wo s-em-ohhoth. Tho tatchuij g Jiosh mamt wo s-ap e tahtkkath ith thahm jewed.
46007016	Kum pi mahch mas em-hekaj ab wo s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wo e tho'ibia.
46007017	Pegih, tt am wabsh wo kia oithath mattp haschu d i wehhejedkam mat hekith ab i t-gawulkai g Christ. Ith ani wehsko ha mashcham g wohochuththam.
46007018	Pi o has d ahga mamtp wo pahl hikuchkask o pi wo pahl hikuchkask. Kumt pi wo chum ge gawul e juh ith hekaj. Heg o d wa'i si ha'ichu matt ab wo s-wohog elithath g Jiosh.
46007020	Mattp haschu d i wehhejedkam mat eda ab i t-gawulkai g Jiosh ch heg s-ap am hab wo junihith wehhejed.
46007021	Mamtp hedai d wo ha-neneholigak ith thahm jewed ch wabsh pi heg hekaj wo si e eh'el ab s-wohochuthk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Tp wabshaba am wo sha s-em-ap'et mamt wo e wuhpul'o, mt am hab wo e juh.
46007022	Am g wo s-chegitok mat em-wul'o g Christ ab amjed g pi ap'ekam, chum ams d nehol. Wehsijj ach d hahawa neneholigaj g Christ, chum hems ahchim mach pi d ha-neneholiga ith thahm jewed.
46007023	Jiosh at ab uhpam t-u'apa e wui heg hekaj e-alithag muhkig. Pegih, pi att hegai wo sha'i hiwigi mas wo t-shohbi mach d piongaj g Jiosh.
46007024	Heg o chum hekith am t-wehmaj. Kutt am nenaj ed s-ap hab wo junihith g t-chikpan matp haschu wud matt eda ab i s-wohoch ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj.
46007025	Neh, nt am haha wo em-ahgi mam haschu ab ni-kakke ab ha amjed hegam mo pi ha wehm kihkam. Pi o d chehanig ihtha mant wo em-ahgi. K wabshaba ab s-ni-ho'ige'ith g t-kownalig Jesus ch ab ni-mahkch g amichuthadag. Kunt heg hekaj wo em-ahgi mo haschu ba'ich i s-ap'e.
46007026	Sho'o wa'i si ge'ej g t-kudutalig hemu. Kuni heg hekaj hab elith mo ba'ich i s-ap'e mamt am hab wabsh wo i chu'igk mam has i masma.
46007027	Mamtp wo ge wehm kihkamk ch pi am wo ohhoth o pi wo ha wehm kihkamk ch pi an hu wo hema i chum gahghi.
46007028	K wabshaba pi d pi ap'ekam mamtp an wo bei g wehm kihkam. Hi wa g hohnta at ab ba'ich wo i wuhshath g ha'ichu pi ap'ethag. Kuni heg hi wa chum pi hab elith mams ab hu wo nam.
46007029	Pi o am hu ge'e wi'is g tash mat ia ep wo jiwia g Jiosh alithag jewed thahm. Kuni am i em-gewkemhun mamt wo e nahtokchith heg wehhejed. Pi g wo sha'i hiwgith mas wo em-shohbi g hohnta
46007030	o g chikpan o g has tahhathkam o g em-eniga.
46007031	Tt wo hekaj g jewed thahm ha'ichu k wabshaba pi ab hu wabsh wo si pihk t-elithath nat pi wehs wabsh wo huhug.
46007032	Chum ani em-tatchuichuth mamt pi ha'ichukaj wo e kudutath. Gohkpa o kahch g t-chegitoi matt wo ge hohnigk. Kutt wabshaba wo t-nako matt heg am hab wo wa'i junihith chikpan am wehhejed g t-kownalig Jesus mattp pi wo ha hohnigk.
46007033	Mattp hedai wo ha hohnt k hemho wa ha'ichu am hab wa'ap wo junihith wehhejed mat wo s-hohho'ithath.
46007034	Kumt ahpim u'uwi hab wa'ap wo e nako mamt ab wo gawulkthask ch heg am hab wo wa'i junihith chikpan am wehhejed g t-kownalig Jesus mamtp hedai pi wo ha kunk o koi wo ha kunt. Mtp wabshaba hedai wo ge kunk ch ha'ichu am hab ep wo junihith ha wehhejed mat wo s-hohho'ithath.
46007035	Ith ani hab kaij nani pi tatchua mant am wo i em-wehmt ch pi heg hekaj manis am ha'ichukaj em-shoshobith. Tatchua ani mamt am hab wo junihith mo haschu d s-ap'ekam ch pi wo hiwigi mas am ha'ichu wo em-shohbi mamt am wehs wo i e thagito t-kownalig Jesus wui.
46007036	Mt wabshaba wo ha hiwigi g u'uwi e-a'aliga mat wo ha kunt mamtp hab wo elithath mo d si tatchui nat pi s-ap ge'ege'ehogat. Am o wa s-ap'e mat am hab wo e juh.
46007037	K wabshaba am wa s-ap'e mamt wo ha nuhkuthath mamtp hab wo elithath mo s-ap'e no pi pi d tatchui.
46007038	Pegih, am o wa s-ap'e mamt wo ha hiwigi ch hi wa ba'ich i s-ap'e mat pi wo ha kunt.
46007039	Matp hedai wo e hohont k d wo e-wehm kihkamk am hugkam mat hekith hema wo i muh. K am hahawa s-ap'e mat ep wo bei g wehm kihkam, heg hi wa mat g e-wehm wohochuththam an wo bei.
46007040	Mt wabshaba ba'ich wo i s-ap'e tahtkkath mamt pi ep wo bei g wehm kihkam. Neh, ith o am ni-tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
46008001	Am ant haha wo em-ahgi hegai mam ab ni-kakke ab amjed hegai ha'ichu hugi mo g hemajkam an to'aw am chum iagchulithch g e-jijoshga. Ha'ijj amsh hab e elith mam si s-mahch mamt has wo chum e junihith ch si e hahaschuth g ha'ichu e-mahchigkaj. Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mamt am hab wabsh wo junihith mat haschu d wo i ha-wehmtadagk g em-wepnag mamtp woho ab wo ha tatchuath.
46008002	Pi amki koi ha'ichu s-mahch mamtp hab e elith mam s-e-mahch.
46008003	Jiosh o s-t-mahch ahchim mattp ab si tatchua.
46008004	Pegih, k pi d ha'ichu g ha-jijoshga am t-wehhejed nach pi s-mahch mo g Jiosh d hemako.
46008005	K eda mu'i an ha'ichug g gewpkthag an thahm kahchim ch ed ch an jewed thahm mo hab e a'aga jijosh ch kokownal.
46008006	Ch ahchim hi s-mahch mo d hemako g Jiosh t-ohg. K wehs ha'ichu d amjedkamaj. Kuch heg wehhejed in d thothakam. K g t-kownalig Jesus Christ d hemako ch wehs ha'ichu nahto. K heg gahi wuhshanim g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g wechij thoakag.
46008007	Pegih, msh ha'i hi wa s-mahch mo g ha-jijoshga pi d ha'ichu am t-wehhejed ch hekaj pi has e elith ch wabsh ko'a hegai mo an e to'aw ha wehhejed. Sh ha'i g em-wehm wohochuththam pi am hu s-ap s-mahch mo pi d ha'ichu g ha-jijoshga no pi heki hu wa'i amjed ab has ha elith. Kumsh ko'a hegai mo am e to'aw. Sh ihtham am em-neith ch am em-oithch hab e junihim ch eda hekaj e kudut no pi hab elith mo pi ap'e.
46008008	Kumsh ahpim hab kaij mo pi has d ahga am Jiosh nena ed mamt wo huh ihtha. Pegih, matp pi has d ahga k ch pi ha'ichu wo heki em-wua mamt wabsh wo thagito.
46008009	Chum as hi wa s-ap'e hejel em-wehhejed mamt wo huh ch wabshaba pi ap'e mamt wo huh matp heg hekaj wo e kudut k wo i shul hegam mo pi hab masma s-mahch ihtha.
46008010	Ihtham atp hems am t-oithk hab wo e juh ahchim mach ha'ichu s-mahch k am hab wo juh mo haschu hab elith mo pi ap'e. Pi att am hu wo i wahp k wo t-gegos mo hebai i e ko'a hegai mo an e to'aw ha wehhejed g ha-jijoshga
46008011	natt pi heg hekaj wo heki ha himch hegam mo pi gewpkthag e-wohochuthadag ed. Tsh eda g Christ ha wehhejed muh no pi s-ha tho'ibiamk.
46008012	Kutt wo padch mo haschu hab chum s-junimk am ha wehhejed mattp wo heki ha himch.
46008013	Pi att hekith wo huh matp haschukaj wo heb hu hihi g t-wepnag mat am t-oithch hab wo e junihith.
46009001	Pi ani em-ahgith mams am hab wo junihith hegai mani ahni haschu pi am hu hab wua. Ahni ani hab wa'ap pi hekaj g ha'ichu ni-ap'ethag, chum anis d uhgchu ch ge'e ap'ethag nat pi am i ni-kei g Jiosh mant wo ahgachugath g Christ. Ni heg am neith am i thahm mat e chegito k i wuhsh. Kum ahpim d e tho'ibiakam heg hekaj ha'ichu ni-ahga mani am ahgachug wehhejed g Jesus Christ.
46009002	Chum as ha'i pi wohochuth mani d Jesus Christ kehsha, m wabshaba ahpim s-wohochuth nat pi em-tho'ibia k hekaj am wohokamch mani d kehshaj.
46009003	Ith ani am ha ahgith hegam mo pi wohochuth mani d Christ kehsha.
46009004	Ahchim mach d Christ chuhchai ach edgith g ap'ethag matt ab wo bei g t-gegosig heg hekaj t-chikpan.
46009005	Christ wepnag ch Peter ch ha'i ehp g Christ chuhchai ash an uh'uthch g e-wehm kihkam mo eda hasko hihhim ch am ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kumsh am ha thagio'ith.
46009006	Bani wa masma ap'ethag. Kuch eda ahchim g Barnabas wehm pi hekaj g t-ap'ethag ch wabsh hejel t-thagio'ith.
46009007	K eda wehs nahnko mahs chikpantham ab u'u g e-gehgewi ab e-chikpan amjed. Shonthal am ha thagio'ith ch g oithag chikpantham ab ha namkith heg hekaj mo haschu i bahijith ch g ha'ichu thoakam ha nuhkuththam ha gegosith heg hekaj mo haschu ab i wuhshani.
46009008	Pi o d wabsh hemajkam hab ha-elitha ihtha. An o hab chu'ig heg eda Jiosh chehanig
46009009	mat g Mosesbad an o'oha: Pi amt an hu wo wulsh g woiwis chini mat wo kehiwia g ha'ichu bahijitha. Neh, pi o hegam hab wa'i ha ahg woiwis.
46009010	Ahchim o hab ep t-ahg. Hegai mo hedai i moihun ch hegai mo hihk g e'es at hemho wa ab wo ha'ichu i nei ith ab e-chikpan.
46009011	Heg o wa wepo matt am ei g ha'ichu kai em-shahgith, am em-ahgithch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. K hab chum mahs matt ab ha'ichu wo i nei em-amjed.
46009012	Am amsh ha'i i ha wehmaj. Kuch eda ba'ich i ap'ethag matt ab wo chum i nei ha'ichu em-amjed ch wabshaba pi hekith ab hu em-tahni ch am wabsh wehs ha'ichu nakog matt pi an hu wo shohbi g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g Christ.
46009013	Mt wo chum s-mahchk mo hegam mo am chikpan ge'e cheopi ch ed ab i neith g e-gegosig heg amjed mo g hemajkam ab mahkch g Jiosh.
46009014	Pegih, k hab wa'ap masma am t-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus hemu. Ahchim mach am ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh attsh ab amjed wo i nei g t-thagio'ithadag.
46009015	Ni eda pi hekith sha'i hekaj ihtha ni-ap'ethag ch pi heg hekaj em-ahgith ihtha manis em-chehani mamt wo i ni-thagio'i hemu. Ba'ich i mant wo bihugim k wo muh kih hegai manis wo em-kowlant ith hekaj s-kehg ha'ichu ahga.
46009016	Ab o ni-chehani g Jiosh mant wo ahgachugath g ha'ichu ahgaj. Kunt wo si pi ap ni-tahtkk mantp pi am hu hab wo junihith. Jiosh ash ab ep em-chehani mamt wo t-namkith ahchim mam ab t-amjed kah g ha'ichu ahgaj. Ni wabshaba pi ab hu em-tahni heg hekaj mant ba'ich wo i s-ap ni-tahtkk ab wabsh em-mahkch.
46009017	Mantp ahni hab i n-ah mant am hab wo junihith ihtha chikpan ch hekaj ab wo bei g ni-gehgewi. K wabshaba g Jiosh ab ni-chehani ch ab ni-hiwig.
46009018	Pegih, k ith d ni-gehgewi mani si s-ap ni-tahtk heg hekaj mani ab wabsh em-mahkch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Heg ani hekaj pi hekaj g ni-ap'ethag manis wo em-kowlant.
46009019	Pi ani hedai ha hiwig ch wabshaba wehs ha wehhejed ni-pionchuth mantp hems hab masma mu'i ab wo i ha nohnogi Christ wui.
46009020	Ni am ha oithch hab ni-junihim hegam mo am oith g heki hu t-himthag ahchim Tutuligo mani hekith i ha wehmaj
46009021	ch am ha oithch hab ni-junihim hegam mo pi am hu oith mani hekith i ha wehmaj mant hekaj ab wo i ha nohnogi Christ wui. K eda pi hab mahs manis pi ab hu wecho g Jiosh chehanig nani pi am hab junihim mo haschu ab i ni-chehani g Christ.
46009022	Pi ant am hab wo junihith mat haschu wo ha kudutath, chum anis s-mahch mo s-ap'e am ni-wehhejed. Tp hems heg hekaj wo ni-hiwigi mant am wo i ha wehmt. Wehs ani ha wepo masma hab ni-wua mantp hems hab masma ab wo i ha nohnogi Christ wui wabsh chum has masma.
46009023	Ith ani wehs hab wua mant hekaj am wo ahgachugath g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh matt t-wehm wo bei g s-ap tahhathkam.
46009024	S-mahch am mat g e melchuththam hab wa'i masma wo bei gehgewi mat wo si e nakogath. Tt hab wa masma am wo t-nakogath matt wehs am hab wo juh g Jiosh tatchui.
46009025	Hegai mo hedai i tatchua mat wo bei g gehgewi at hemho wa wo e momoisha k wo e nuhkuth wehs ha'ichu k ed. Neh, ith o wehs hab e wua heg wa'i wehhejed mamt ab wo wahki g gihko. T eda wabsh wo huhug. Ch wabshaba ahchim am hab t-junihim heg wehhejed m at pi hekith wo huhug.
46009026	Ni hekaj hab hi heg wa wepo mani shel med heg wui mant am wo nahto g ni-mel k ab wo bei g ni-mahkigdag. S-mahch am mo g shonikkashtham pi tatchua mas wo heki wua g e-shonihina. Ni ahni hab wa'ap pi tatchua manis wo heki wua g ni-ap'ethag wehhejed g ni-chikpan.
46009027	Shonikkashtham o ab si e nakog ch e momoisha. Ni ahni hab wa masma ni-nakog Jiosh chikpan ed mat pi wo ni-ohhoth heg amjed am i thahm mant ab i em-wai mamt am hab wa'ap wo junihith.
46010001	Am am wa chum s-mahch matsh wa haschu has e juh am ha tahgio g t-shohshon matsh wa g Mosesbad am i ha wanim. Jiosh ash hab masma ha nuhkuth ch ha wanimed mash wa g chewagi am ha ba'ich him. Kutsh am gahi i huhud g ge'e shuhthagi.
46010002	Ith atsh hab ha juni mat hekaj ab wo s-wohog elithath g Mosesbad.
46010003	Wehsijj ash am ko'a hegai ha'ichu hugi mash g Jiosh ab ha mahk
46010004	ch wehsijj ab ih'e hegai shuhthagi mash ab ge'e waw t amjed tha'iwuni ch s-wawinig. Ihtha waw o wepogithas g Christ mo g thoakgaj chum hebai ha wehmaj ch ab ha mahkch g ho'ige'ithalig.
46010005	Tsh wa eda mu'ijj pi ab hu wohog el g Jiosh. Tsh hekaj si pi ha hohho'i ihtham k ab ha hugio tohono jewed ch ed mash an oiopohim. Sh g ha-hohon am wabsh e thagitohim.
46010006	Pegih, wehs ihtha o d wabsh chehgitha mat wo t-shohbi matt pi ab hu wo i tatchua g pi ap'ekam mash wa hab e wua ihtham
46010007	ch pi ab hu wui wo t-ho'ige'ithahu mo haschu pi d Jiosh mash wa hab e wua ha'ijj ihtham. Bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed matsh wa am thadhaiwua k huh mat haschu am to'i hegai mo chum jioshchuth k am i wuwhag k e waila.
46010008	Am hu hebai ehp, sh ha'ijj wabsh chum hedai ha wehm wo'iwup. Tsh g Jiosh am ha'i ha cheha matsh wo ha koktha. Tsh gokko gamai waik mihl (23, 000) e ko'ij hemako tash ed.
46010009	Am hu hebai ehp, tsh ha'ijj bagach g Jiosh. Tsh heg hekaj am ap'ech matsh wo ha ki'ikka g kohk'oi k wo ha hugio.
46010010	Am hu hebai ehp, sh ha'ijj pi ap has ahg g Jiosh hab kaijch mash pi ap ha thagio'ith. Tsh heg hekaj am ap'ech matsh g anghil wo ha hugio. Mt heg hekaj pi am hu ha oithch hab wo e junihith.
46010011	Ith ash wehs an o'ohanas mat wo t-shohbithath matt pi hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ahchim mach hemu in d thothakam am wehs ha oithch.
46010012	Ha'ijj amsh hab e elith mam s-gewpkthag am e-wohochuthadag ed. Mt wabshaba wo si s-e nen'oithk mamt pi wo i e jushathkath k pi wo i gei am pi ap'ekam ch ed no pi wehsijj t-a'appem g Jiawul.
46010013	Wehs hegai a'appema mo ab t-aihim o chum hedai ab a'ahe. K wabshaba g Jiosh hab kaij matsh wo t-nuhkuthath ch heg hekaj pi hiwgith mas wo t-a'appe am thahm matt he'es wo i t-nako ch ab t-mahkch g gewkthag matt wo nakog k wo t-tho'ibia heg amjed.
46010014	Pegih, ni-wepnag mani si em-tatchua, pi g ab hu wui wo sha'i e ho'ige'ithahunath hegai mo haschu pi d Jiosh.
46010015	Am g wo i a'amichuth ihtha nam pi ha'ichu s-a'amichuth.
46010016	Ab ach ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ch ab si ihm g alithaj mach eda hab wua g mihshmetha chemait hugi no pi hab d ahga mat am i thagito g e-hon kots t ab k am iawua g e-eh'ed mat am t-wehhejed muh.
46010017	Tho wa'i hemako hegai mat am t-wehhejed muh. Ch ahchim am t-chehgithch mach am wehmaj d hemako am t-wehm hab wuathch g t-mihshmetha chemait hugi.
46010018	Jiosh atsh am ha cheha g t-shohshon mat wo ha koktha g ha'ichu thoakam k hekaj wo iagchul g e-chu'ichig wehhejed k haha wo huh hegai chuhkug. K hegam mo ko'a ab ihm g Jiosh.
46010019	Pegih, k hegam mo ab ha wui iagchulith g e-jijoshta ab ha ihm ko'athch g e-iagchulitha. K eda pi d ha'ichu g ha-jijoshta.
46010020	Ab o wabsh ha ihm g jijawul pi e mahchch mas has e wua. Kuni pi em-tatchuith mams wo ha wehm ab ha ihm g jijawul ko'athch hegai mo ab ha to'ith.
46010021	T-kownalig Jesus Christ o ab t-mahkch ihtha t-mihshmetha chemait hugi. K pi sha'i hiwgithas mams wo ha wehmajk amai mo ab ha ihm g e-jijoshga ko'athch hegai mo ab ha tho'ith.
46010022	Shahag wepo mam tatchua mamt wo hehgamch g Jiosh ab ha ihmathch g jijawul mamtp hedai ha wehm ko'a mo haschu ab wui e to'aw g ha-jijoshga. S-e g wo nen'oithk no pi ba'ich i s-gewkthag g Jiosh mam ahpim ch wo s-ko'okam em-namkith.
46010023	Msh ha'i hab chech'e mo wehs ha'ichu hiwgithas matp haschu wehhejed pi an hu ha'ichug g chehanig. Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mo pi wehs ha'ichu s-ap'e am t-wehhejed. Wehs ha'ichu o hiwgithas ch wabshaba pi wehs d wo i t-wehmtadagk.
46010024	Am g wo s-chegitok g chum hedai ha-ap'ethag ch pi wabsh hejel e-tatchui.
46010025	Oi g am wabsh wo huhgi matp haschu am e gagda nolawtakud ch ed k pi wo e kudu mas hebai e bei. Pi o ab hu em-ab mams ab wo ha kakke mas d hegai mo ab e to'ith g ha-jijoshga.
46010026	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mo wehs ha'ichu d enigaj.
46010027	Mamtp wo tatchuath ch am wo e gegositho ha-kih am hegam mo pi d e tho'ibiakam ch ab em-waith. Kumt wabsh wo huh matp haschu ab wo i em-to'i k pi ab hu wo ha kakke mas ab e to'ith g ha-jijoshga, wabsh pi wo e kudu mas hebai be k ab em-mah.
46010028	T wabshaba hema ab wo sha si em-ahgi mat ab e to'i g ha-jijoshga, mt pi wo huh mat heg hekaj pi wo e kudu hegai mo em-ahgith. Pegih, mtp hems ha'i hab wo chei, “Ms haschu ahgk hig wo ge has ni-ahgath heg hekaj mani haschu i ko'a mani eda heg hekaj ab ho'ige'ith g Jiosh?
46010030	Kunis haschu ahgk wo ni-shohbi heg wabsh hekaj mam e kudut?”
46010031	Pegih, woho o wa mach ap'ethag matt wabsh chum haschu wo ko'ath. K wabshaba ab t-ab matt ab wo si ha'ichuch g Jiosh wabsh chum haschu k ed, chum hems heg hekaj mach haschu i ko'ath ch haschu i ih'e.
46010032	Am g wabsh s-ap wo kihkath ch pi ha'ichu am hu hab wo junihith mas heg hekaj hedai am hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam, chum hems hegam mo pi d e tho'ibiakam.
46010033	Bamt wo masmak mani ahni. Pi ani am hu wa'i hejel ni-chegito ch wabshaba wehs s-ha chegito g hemajkam. Bani wa ni-wua matp hems heg hekaj wo s-hohho'i mani has ni-wua k ab wo s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga k wo e tho'ibia.
46011001	Am g wo ni-oithk hab e wuath hab masma mani ahni Christ oithch hab ni-junihim.
46011002	Ab ani si has em-elith mamsh chum hekith s-ni-chegito ch am oithch hab e junihim ihtha himthag mant am em-wui u'apa.
46011003	Mt wabshaba wo chum s-mahchk mo g cheoj am thahm g uwi. K g Christ am thahm g cheoj. K g Jiosh am wehs ha'ichu thahm.
46011004	Ith amt wo chehgithch mam eda e mihshmath. Mt heg hekaj ahpim chechoj pi ab hu wo ha ma'ishchith g e-mohmi mam hekith i e ho'ige'ithahun ch am ep ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. That wo s-ta edam ha'ichuk mamtp ab wo ha ma'ishchith.
46011005	Kumt ahpim u'uwi hi ab wo ha ma'ishchith g e-mohmi mam hekith i ha kaichuthch e ho'ige'ithahun ch am ep ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Bat wa masma wo s-ta edamak mamt wo s-wohlim hih g e-mo'o mamtp pi ab hu wo ha ma'ishchith.
46011006	Pegih, mt ab wo e ma'ishchith ch wo e mihshmath k heg hekaj pi wo si e el.
46011007	Kumt ahpim chechoj pi ab hu wo ha ma'ishchith g e-mohmi e mihshmathch no pi g Jiosh am t-eda chehgithch g e-gewkthag. Mt wabshaba ahpim u'uwi ab wo e ma'ishchith nam pi ab wecho g chechoj ch ab chehgithch g ha-gewkthag.
46011008	Jiosh at wehpeg nahto g cheoj k heg amjed ab i wuhshath g uwi k nahto am wehhejed g cheoj.
46011010	Ab o em-neith g anghil. Kumt ahpim u'uwi am wo ha chehgi ab ha ma'ishch g e-mohmi mam ab ha wecho g chechoj.
46011011	K eda hab d elithaj g Jiosh mat g cheoj ch uwi ab a'ai wo e hiwgath ch ab a'ai wo i e wehmajk.
46011012	Woho o wa mat g Jiosh ab i wuhshath g uwi ab amjed g cheoj. K wabshaba g chechoj ab hahawa uwi t amjed i wuwhag. K wehs ha'ichu ab d Jiosh amjedkam.
46011013	Am g wo oithahith ihtha mo pi hab chum chu'ig mas g uwi ab wo e ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui pi ab hu ma'ishch g e-mo'o.
46011014	S-mahch ach mo g che'echew mo'o s-ta edama am wehhejed g cheoj
46011015	ch wabshaba am wa s-ap'e g uwi wehhejed no pi ab mahkch g Jiosh mat hekaj ab wo e ma'ishchith g mo'oj.
46011016	Pi ani ahpim wa'i em-mashcham ihtha. Wehsko ani am ha mashcham mo hebai g t-wehm wohochuththam e hehemapath. Kush wehsijj g Christ chuhchai hab masma ha mashcham. T hab pi hedai ab hu wo chum t-ne'owi heg hekaj.
46011017	Msh am ha'ichu ep pi ap hab wua mam am e hehemapath.
46011018	Wehpeg ant ith hab wo ah mani kah mamsh ha'i ab e wui gegok am e nanmekch. Ni am wa he'es s-wohochuth ihtha.
46011019	Hemho wa at am wo i wuhsh g hab mahs kudutadag em-shahgith mat am wo i e tashogi mo hedai pi ap'e.
46011020	Na'ams hab elith mam s-ap hab wua g chemait hugi hekith i e nanmekch ch amsh eda pi ap am hab junihim.
46011021	Wehpeg amsh e wehm e gegosith ch eda pi a'ai e ho'ith ch ha'i wabsh s-kokwog ch ha'i nawko'o ch ha'i bihugko'o.
46011022	Bo wa masma tasho mam pi ab hu has ha elith g e-wehm wohochuththam ch wabsh si ha edawua hegam mo am d wa sho'igkam. Mt hemho wa ab wo e chu'ichigch ith hekaj. Ba'ich o i s-ap'e mamt wo e gegos hehe'ejel e-kihki am k am hab wo juh g chemait hugi mam am e nanmek.
46011023	Am ani wa em-mashcham hegai mo wa g t-kownalig Jesus am ni-tashogith ab amjed ihtha chemait hugi himthag. Am atsh i shonwua heg i hudunk ab mamtki wa wo gagda matki wo e muhkith. Hegam mash wa ab wui e thagitokch atsh am i e hemapai. Kutsh g Jesus am i bei g chemait
46011024	k am i hahai ab ho'ige'ithk g Jiosh k hab kaij, “Tho ni-honshpadag ihtha mamt am i em-hahaini. Ith ani hab ahgch hab kaij mant wo ni-muhkith am em-wehhejed. Ab g wo huhgi ihtha hahainig k ith chum hekith am hab wo junihith mamt hekaj wo s-ni-chegitok.”
46011025	Tsh wa woho hab e juh. Kutsh am hahawa bei g tahsa k hab kaij, “Tho ni-eh'ed ihtha nawait. Ith ani hab ahgch hab kaij mat g ni-eh'ed wo e iawua. T g Jiosh heg hekaj am hab wo juh hegai mo wa hab kaij matsh hab wo em-juni. Ab g wo ih'i ihtha k ith chum hekith am hab wo junihith mamt wo s-ni-chegitok.” Neh, bo kaij g t-kownalig Jesus.
46011026	Kuch hekith am hab i wua ihtha chemait hugi ch am tasho wohokamchuth mat t-wehhejed muh ch ab aihim mat ep wo jiwia.
46011027	Pegih, tt am wo si hejel i t-mamche machs wa woho ab ha'ichuchuth g t-kownalig Jesus k am hab haha wo juh g chemait hugi. Tsh ab wo moht g chu'ichig matp hedai pi ap hab wo wuath ihtha chemait hugi no pi pi ha'ichuchuth mat am thagito g e-hon kots wui k am iawua g e-eh'ed mat t-wehhejed muh.
46011029	Tt am wo ai g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mattp hab wo juh g chemait hugi pi amichuthch mat am t-wehhejed muh g t-kownalig Jesus.
46011030	Heg am hekaj mu'ijj kok'o ch pi ab hu gewpk ch ha'ijj heki hu koi.
46011031	Bat wa masma hab wo t-juh g Jiosh hab ahgk matt wo thagito g pi ap t-chu'ichig k pi gm hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed g Jiosh hab masma mat hegam mat pi ab hu wui wo i e nohnogi. Pi at hab masma s-ko'okam ab wo t-namkith g Jiosh mattp hems wehpeg am wo si hehe'ejel i t-mamche mach has masma.
46011033	Pegih, ni-wepnag, am amt wo a'ai e nenida k wehs e wehm hab wo juh g chemait hugi.
46011034	Matp hema d wo bihugimkamk ch wo e gegos ab e-kih ab mat koi wo e ai g em-namki. Mt am hahawa pi heg hekaj ab hu wo e chu'ichigch. Am ant haha wo i ap'ech mam haschu ab ep i ni-kakke hekith i em-neithk.
46012001	Ab am wa ep ni-kakke ab amjed hegai gewkthag mo g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab t-mahkch matt ab a'ai wo i t-wehmajk. Tatchua ani mamt wo s-mahchk g wohokam ab amjed ihtha.
46012002	Ithani am hahawa s-mahch mam wa ha'ichukaj am i e wanimed mam eda ab has ha elith mam haschu i chum jijoshchuth.
46012003	K wabshaba pi d Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch am i em-wanimed namt wa ge e nako mams wo wohokamch mo g Jesus d Jiosh. Hegam mo pi edgith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o hab elith mo g Jesus am gawulkthas ab Jiosh t amjed. Kuch wabshaba ahchim mach edgith s-mahch mo g Jesus d Jiosh.
46012004	Ab o t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag g gewkthag matt hab wo junihith g nahnko mahs ha'ichu am wehhejed g Jiosh.
46012005	K g t-kownalig Jesus am ap'echuthch matt has masma am hab wo junihith.
46012006	K d nahnko mahs chikpan mach am hab junihim ch wabshaba wehs ab d amjedkamaj g Jiosh.
46012007	Heg o ab t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K ith am t-gewpkathch ch ab hehe'ejel t-mahkch matt has wo t-junihith ch am a'ai wo i t-wehmajk. Kuch s-mahch mo am t-e'eda g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag no pi ab t-mahkch g gewkthag.
46012008	Ab o ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wo s-chu a'amichuth k am wo tashogi g s-hasig ha'ichu ch ab ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wo si s-mahchk ch ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
46012009	Ab o ha'ijj t-mahkch g ge'e wohochuthadag ch ab ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wo ha thoaj
46012010	o g s-hasig ha'ichu hab ep wo junihith. Ab o ha'ijj hehe'ejel t-mahkch g ha'ichu e-ahga matt wo ahgath ch ab ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wo neneokath g pi t-machiga ne'okikaj ch ab ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wabsh wo s-amich hegam ne'oki k am wo i tashogi k ch ab ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wo s-mahchk mo haschu ahga ab amjed g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch haschu pi ab hu amjed.
46012011	Neh, wehs ihtha o ab d amjedkamaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg ab hehe'ejel t-mahkch mo has i mahs chikpan am hab s-junimk ab gai t-wuhshanim.
46012012	S-mahch ach mo g t-honshpadag mu'i nahnko chuhchu'ithag ch wabshaba d wa'i hemako. Kuch hab wa masma wehsijj d hemako ahchim matt ab i t-wehnath g Christ.
46012013	Mu'ijj am hi wa pi d Tutuligo. Tt wabshaba pi wo t-nako machs hab wo chei mam pi d t-wehm wohochuththam. Ha'ijj am hi wa d nenehol. K wabshaba pi has d ahga mam has i mahs ch ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh. Heg at wehsijj ab i t-hemakoch. K hahawa heg wa wepo mach d Jesus honshpadag. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wehsijj an t-u'ukch.
46012014	Kuch eda nahnko mahs ha'ichu chikpan hab masma mo g nahnko chuhchu'ithaj g t-honshpadag.
46012015	T-tahtad o pi wepo ha'ichu hab wua mo g t-nohnhoi. Kuch wabshaba wehs ha tatchua.
46012016	K g t-nahnk gawul ha'ichu hab wua mo g t-wuhpui.
46012017	Kuch wabshaba wehs ha tatchua natt ge has masma ha'ichu wo kah mattp pi wo sha ha nahnkk ch pi has masma wo hewagi mattp pi wo sha ha thahkk.
46012018	Jiosh at am nahto g o'othham k hab masma hab juh g nahnko chuhchu'ithag ab t-honshpadag ab.
46012019	K wehs ab i e wehnathch g hab t-chuhchu'ithag no pi d hemako g t-honshpadag.
46012021	Pi ach hegam wa'i tatchua t-wuhpui ch wabshaba g t-nohnhoi ehp k ch pi heg wa'i tatchua t-mo'o ch wabshaba g t-tahtad ehp.
46012022	Ha'i o pi gewpkthag g hab t-chuhchu'ithag ch wabshaba hab wa masma d si t-tatchui.
46012023	Kuch s-ap ha nuhkuth ch ha ma'ishch mat pi wo mahsk hegam hab chuhchu'ithag mo pi ta neithagma.
46012024	Pi ach hab masma s-ha nen'oith hegam hab chuhchu'ithag mo pi has d ahga mat wo e neithath.
46012025	Wehs ach ha tatchua g hab t-chuhchu'ithag mat wehs e wehm s-ap wo chikpanath.
46012026	Pegih, bach wa masma chum t-wehm s-ap chikpan ch wehs t-wehm wo t-sho'igch mattp hema ha'ichukaj wo t-sho'igch. Kutt wehs t-wehm wo s-hehgigk mamtp hema ab wo si s-ap has t-ah.
46012027	Pegih, wehsijj ach d hemako g Jesus Christ wehm ch heg wa wepo mach d honshpadaj ch hehe'ejel d nahnko chuhchu'ithaj.
46012028	Jiosh at wehs ab i t-mahkhi matt haschu hab wo junithahith. K ith d si wehs ha thahm t-chikpan mach ha'i d Jesus Christ chuhchai ch am ahgachugch g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed. K ith ab oithch d t-chikpan mach ha'i d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga i tashogiththam. K ith ab oithch d ep t-chikpan mach ha'i d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ha mashchamtham. Ha'ijj ach s-hasig ha'ichu hab wua ch ha'ijj u'ukch g gewkthag matt wo ha thoaj ch ha'ijj am i ha wehmaj ha'i ehp ch ha'ijj am ha'ichu a'ap'echuth ha shahgith g t-wehm wohochuththam ch ha'ijj g pi t-machiga ne'okikaj neneok.
46012029	Pi att wehsijj gm hu mehk wo ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch pi wehsijj d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga i tashogiththam ch pi wehsijj d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ha mashchamtham ch pi wehsijj u'ukch g gewkthag matt hab wo junihith g s-hasig ha'ichu
46012030	o wo ha thoaj ch pi wehsijj neneok g pi t-machiga ne'okikaj ch pi wehsijj ab mahks g amichuthadag matt wo tashogi ihtham ne'oki.
46012031	K wabshaba ha'i ihtham mahkigdag ba'ich d i ha wehmtadag g t-wehm wohochuththam. Kutt heg hekaj ba'ich wo i tatchua matt wo hekaj hegam. K eda g pihk elithadag wehs ba'ich d i si ha'ichu.
46013001	Neh, ttp hems wo t-nako matt wo neneokath g nahnko mahs o'othham ha-ne'okikaj o chum hems g anghil ha-ne'oki. T wabshaba hegai t-ne'oki heg wo wa wepok mo g s-nakosig ha'ichu am e gew mattp pi wo edgithath g pihk elithadag.
46013002	Thach wabsh pi ha'ichu mattp pi wo edgithath g pihk elithadag, chum achs ab wo mahksk matt wo si s-ap i tashogi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o wo s-mahchk g ge'e ha'ichu ch g s-juhk ha'ichu ahga wo s-amichuthath o wo edgithath g wohochuthadag matt wo i himch g tho'ag.
46013003	Pi o ha'ichu t-wehhejed s-kehgaj mattp pi wo edgithath g pihk elithadag, chum achs hems wo s-chechojimak matt wehs gm hu wo ha mah g ha'ichu t-eniga, chum hems ab wo i t-thagito mamt wo t-mehith k wo t-koktha ha wehhejed.
46013004	Mattp wo edgithath g pihk elithadag ch wo s-hemajimak ch ab wo s-ha bahbgith ch pi wo chu hehgamk ch pi wo woikimak
46013005	ch pi am hu wo ha edawua ch pi wo chu tha'ath ch wo s-bamuistk. Pi att wo kuint mat hema pi ap has wo e juh
46013006	k pi wo hohho'i g pi ap'ekam k wabshaba si s-ap wo t-tahtkk ab kahkch g s-ap'ekam
46013007	ch s-ap hab wo ha elithath g hemajkam. Chum as pi ap hab wo e junihith, tt hab wo ha elithath matp hems wo wa a'ap'et ch hekaj wabsh s-ap wo nakogath matp has wo e juh.
46013008	Ab o hehe'ejel t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag g ha'ichu ahga ch pi t-machiga ne'oki ch ha'ichu mahchig mat d wabsh wo i t-wehmtadagk hemuch. Kut wabsh wo huhug ihtham mahkigdaj matt hekith am wo i ai hegai mo haschu g Jiosh wehs s-ap am ap'echuthch t-wehhejed. T wabshaba g pihk elithadag pi hekith wo huhug.
46013011	Neh, no hig pi g ali alikaj neok ch alikaj ha'ichu tahtk ch ha'ichu chegito? T wabshaba ab wo i e ai g ge'eligaj. T wo ge'ehogat.
46013012	Pegih, tt hab wa masma am gawul wo t-juh matt hekith am wo nei g t-tho'ibiakam am i ko'ok. Hemuch ach wabsh al he'es ha'ichu i s-mahch ab amjed g Jiosh. K ith heg wa wepo mach wabsh s-kohmagim neith ha'ichu. Tt wabshaba heg i tash haha wo si s-ap s-mai ha'ichu ab amjed g Jiosh ab i neithok g t-tho'ibiakam. T g t-mahchig hahawa d wo wehsk hab masma mo hab masma s-t-mahch g Jiosh.
46013013	Pegih, chum att hekith ab wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh ch ab s-ap wo nenidath mat am hab wo i junihith g e-ne'oki am t-wehhejed. Chum att hekith wo si pihk t-elithath ha hekaj. K g pihk elithadag wehs ha ba'ich d i si s-has ha'ichu.
46014001	Pegih, mt am wo e nakogath mamt ab wo si pikh e elithath wehs ha hekaj ch wo i ha wehmtath heg hekaj mo haschu ab t-makiog g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag matt hab wo junihith. T ith d wo si i ha-wehmtadagk matt am wo ha ahgithath mo haschu g Jiosh am i t-tashogith.
46014002	Pi at hedai hejel wo s-em-amichuth k ab wo bei g i wehmtadag mamtp wabsh g pi e-machiga ne'okikaj wo neneokath. Heg o wa wepo mach heg hekaj ab wa'i Jiosh wui neneok.
46014003	K wabshaba hegai mo am ha ahgith mo haschu g Jiosh am i ha tashogith am i ha wehmaj ch am i ha gewkemhun ch ab ha mahk g s-ap tahhathkam.
46014004	Hejel o wa'i e wehhejed hab kaij hegai mo gawul kaitham nenneok. K wabshaba hegai mo am ha ahgith mo haschu g Jiosh am i ha tashogith am i ha wehmaj g e-wehm wohochuththam.
46014005	Mamt hu'i wehsijj wo neneokath g pi e-machiga ne'okikaj. Ni wabshaba ba'ich i tatchua mamt wo bei hegai mahkigdag mamt si s-ta amichutham wo ahgath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Pi at am hu hugkam d wo i ha-wehmtadagk mamtp wo neo heg hekaj pi e-machiga ne'oki, heg hi wa matp am hema wo gagda g em-ne'oki am wehs ha wehhejed.
46014006	Pi ant ha'ichukaj wo sha'i i em-wehmt mantp hems am wo jiwia em-wui k heg wa'i hekaj wo neokath pi ni-machiga ne'oki. Bant wa'i masma wo i em-wehmt mant am wo tasho em-ahgi mo haschu am ni-maskogith g Jiosh o g ha'ichu mahchig ab amjed o g ha'ichu mashchamigaj.
46014007	Ith ant wo ha'ichu wepogi mamt wo s-amich. S-mahch am mat pi hedai wo s-mahchk mo haschu ne'i am chum a'aga matp g uhs kuikud ch ahlpa pi kehg wo kaitha.
46014008	T pi hedai wo s-mahchk g shonthal mat has wo e juh matp g kuhutham pi ap am hu wo kuhu g kuikud.
46014009	Pegih, t hab wa masma pi hedai wo em-amich mam haschu am chum a'aga mamtp wabsh gawul kaitham wo neokath. Heg o wa wepo mat an wabsh wo i huhug g em-ne'oki.
46014010	Mu'ij o g nahnko mahs ne'oki ith thahm jewed.
46014011	Mantp pi wo mahchk g ne'okij g gawul neoktham, kutt d wabsh wo ge o'othhamk ab a'ai t-wui nach ge s-t-amichuth.
46014012	S-ap'e o mam si tatchua g mahkigdaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kumt ba'ich am hab wo i junihith mat haschu ba'ich d wo i ha-wehmtadagk g em-wehm wohochuththam.
46014013	Hegai mat hedai wo gawul kaitham nenneokath at hemho wa wo chum e ho'ige'ithahun k ab wo tai g Jiosh g amichuthadag mat s-ap wo i tashogi g gawul kaitham e-ne'oki.
46014014	Pi att hedai am hu wo i ha wehmtath heg hekaj ha'ichu t-amichuthadag mattp wabsh g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj wo t-ho'ige'ithahunath, chum achs si s-ap t-tahtk am hehe'ejel t-i'ibthag ed.
46014015	Kutt heg hekaj pi wabsh wo t-ho'ige'ithahunath g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj ch pi wabsh wo ne'eth g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj ch wabshaba s-ta amichutham hab ep wo t-juh.
46014016	Pi at wo e nako hegam mo pi mahch mach has t-wua mat t-wehm ab wo ho'ige'el g Jiosh mattp wabsh g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj wo t-ho'ige'ithahunath nat ge wo amich mach has kaij.
46014017	Ttp hems hi wa si s-ap wo t-ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui. T wabshaba ihtham pi ab hu wo bei g i wehmtadag.
46014018	Ab o ep ni-mahks ihtha mahkigdag. Kuni ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh mani em-ba'ich i mu'ikko nenneok g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj.
