46014019	Nt wo ni-nako mant heg hekaj mu'i mihl ne'oki hab wo chei. K wabshaba ba'ich i s-ap'e mach eda t-mihshmath mant al hetasp ne'oki hab wo chei mat wo s-e amich mani haschu chum ha mashcham.
46014020	A'alkaj am hab e junihim, ni-wepnag, ab si ha'ichuchuthch ihtha al mahkigdag ch heg hekaj ab si e haschuth. Am g wabsh wo thagito ihtha pi ap'ekam. Neh, a'al o pi mahch g pi ap'ekam. Kumt hab wa'i masma hab wo masmak mo g a'al mamt pi wo mahchk g pi ap'ekam.
46014021	An o o'ohadag mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Bant wo ha juh g Tutuligo mat wo e gehg k hemho wa ab wo kaihamath g ha-ne'oki g gawul hemajkam. T eda wabsh kia pi ab hu wo ni-kaihamath.
46014022	Neh, ihtham gawul kaitham ne'oki mam ab si ha'ichuchuth o wa d chum chehgitha am ha wehhejed hegam mo pi ab hu kaimk g Jiosh ch pi t-wehhejed d chehgitha ahchim wohochuththam. Hegai mo g Jiosh am t-tashogith matt wo ha ahgi g t-wehm wohochuththam o am ha chehgith mo am t-wehmaj g Jiosh, chum as pi am hu wo ha chehgi hegam mo pi kaimk g Jiosh.
46014023	T hegam mo s-kaimk ch am wo i wahp t-namki ed hab wo chei matt t-loligoch mattp wabsh gawul kaitham wo nenneokath.
46014024	Hemho wa att am wo tasho ahgath mat has chu g Jiosh am wo t-tashogi matt wo ah. Kut wo s-t-amich g pi e tho'ibiakam k wo s-mai moki d pi ap chu'ijkam ch atki wo e lothai.
46014025	Wehs g ha'ichu t-ahga at ab ha wui wo tashogi g s-a'agi ha'ichu ha-chegitoi. Kut ab wo i shul Jiosh wui k ab wo ihm k wo wohokamch moki woho am t-wehmaj g Jiosh.
46014026	Ith ani hab ahg, ni-wepnag, mamt wehs ha'ichu s-ap am hab wo junihith e-namki ed. Mtp hems hema am wo ah g ne'i k hema g mashchama hab wo juh k hema wo ah mat haschu g Jiosh am wo i em-maskogi k hema hems g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj wo neo k hema am wo i tashogi mo has d ahga ihtha ne'oki. Wehs ha'ichu at d wo i chum em-wehmta.
46014027	Mamtp wo neneo g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj, mt am wa'i waik o gohkajj hab wo juh shakal e oitham. Mt hema am wo i tashogi ihtha mo am hab e kaij.
46014028	Kumt pi am hu hab wo chum chei g gawul kaitham ne'oki matp pi am hu hedai wo ha'ichugk mat am wo i tashogi k wabsh hejel e wehhejed ch ab Jiosh wui hab wo chei.
46014029	Kumt waik o gohkajj am wo ah mat haschu g Jiosh ab wo em-mah. Kumt ha'ijj am wo a'amich mo haschu am hab e kaij.
46014030	Kumt wabshaba wo ha'asa neo matp g Jiosh am hema ep wui wo ha'ichu i tashogi mat am hab wo chei.
46014031	Wehsijj am hiwgithas mamt am wo ah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga hehemakoj. T hab wehsijj wo ha'ichu mahch k ab hekaj wo bei g i gewkemhunadag.
46014032	Mt wo nenida g e-ap'ethag mat hekith g Jiosh ab wo em-mah g ha'ichu e-ahga am ha wehhejed.
46014033	Pi o tatchua g Jiosh matt wabsh wo has hu t-wuath ch wabshaba matt wo s-thotholimak. Bamt masma hab wo e wuath e-namki ed mo wehsko hab e wua g Jiosh hemajkamga.
46014034	Ahpim u'uwi amt ab wabsh wo ha wechok. Bo masma hab chu'ig g heki hu t-himthag chehanig. Pi amt has wo chei ab amjed mo has i kaij g chechoj
46014035	k wabshaba ab wo ha kakke g e-wehm kihkam am e-kihki am mamtp wo ha'ichu s-mahchim. That wo si edathagk mamtp ab wo ha kakke mam am e mihshmath.
46014036	Pi g hab wo elithath mas ahpim em-gahi wuhshanim ab i wuhsh g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o mams ahpim ab wa'i bei.
46014037	Mt wo chum s-mahchk mo ith d Jiosh chehanig mamtp hedai hab e elith mam d Jiosh ha'ichu ahgtham ch edgith g gewkthaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
46014038	Kumt pi ab hu wo ha kaiha matp hedai pi ab hu wo kaiha ihtha.
46014039	Pegih neh, ni-wepnag, am g wo si i e gewpkath mamt wo ah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wabshaba pi wo ha tha'i hegam mat g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj wo nenneokath.
46014040	Wehs amt ha'ichu si s-ap am hab wo junihith e-namki ed ch pi wabsh wo has hu e wuath.
46015001	Am ant ep wo em-ahgi ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh, ni-wepnag. Ab amt i s-wohoch mant eda am em-ahgi heki hu k s-wihnam gegok am e-wohochuthadag ed.
46015002	Tho ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mamt heg hekaj wo e tho'ibia mamtp woho an u'ukch.
46015003	Am ant em-ahgi mant haschu bei. K ith d si s-has ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ch hab chu'ig mat g alithaj muh heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig
46015004	k uhpam ep e chegito mo am d i waik tash mamt am woi cheo ch ed hab masma mo an o'ohadag Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed mat am hab wo e juh.
46015005	Am at i e chehgi Peter wui k ab hahawa wehs ha wui g am e-chuhchai
46015006	k am ep i e chehgi ha wui g hetasp siant i ba'iwichkim mo ab d wohochuththam. Mu'ijj ihtham o an d wabsh kia thothakam. T ha'ijj hi wa koi.
46015007	Am at hahawa ep i e chehgi e-wehnag James wui k ab ep ha wui wehs g am e-chuhchai
46015008	k am si ha oithch hab wa'ap i e chehgi ab ni-wui. Ni eda s-ko'okam ha sho'igchuth hegam mo ab s-wohochuth. K pi ab hu d chum ni-wuikam manis d wo kehshajk. T wabshaba wa am ni-wui i e chehgith k ab i ni-waith k am i ni-kei.
46015010	Bat wa masma si s-ni-ho'ige'el g Jiosh. Kuni heg hekaj d kehshaj ch chum hems wehs ha ba'ich i si chikpan hegam mo am d chuhchaij. K eda d Jiosh mo hab junihim ihtha. Pi ani hejel hab junihim.
46015011	K g Jiosh hab wa'ap i ha wehmt hegam mo ni-wehm d piongaj g Jiosh. Wehsijj ach heg am wa ahgachug. K d ihtha ha'ichu t-ahga mam ab s-wohochuth.
46015012	Ith o d ha'ichu t-mashchama mat uhpam ep e chegito g Christ. Msh eda ha'i hab chech'e mat pi hedai uhpam ep wo e chegito.
46015013	Pegih, t g Christ hab wa'ap pi ep e chegito matp wo wohok mat pi hedai ep wo e chegito.
46015014	Kut pi d wo ha'ichuk machs hekaj wo em-mihshmath o mams ab wo s-wohoch.
46015015	T d wabsh wo iattogik mattp wo em-ahgi mat g Jiosh ab i wuhshath g e-alithag.
46015017	Kumt pi wo sha'i e tho'ibia. T pi ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk g em-wohochuthadag.
46015018	T hab wa'ap pi wo e tho'ibia hegam mat heki hu koi ab i s-wohochuthk g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed g Christ.
46015019	Sha'att wa'i si sho'ig hab wo mahsk wehs ha ba'iwichkim ahchim wohochuththam mattp pi uhpam ep wo t-chegito.
46015020	T wabshaba woho ab i wuhsh g Christ muhkig amjed k am i shonwuich mat wo i wuwha g ko'i.
46015021	Muhkig at ab i shonwua hema amjed g o'othham. T g i wuhshanig ab muhkig amjed hab wa masma ab i shonwua hema amjed g o'othham.
46015022	Hegai mat g muhkig ab amjed i shonwua o d Adambad. Kuch wehsijj mukiog nach pi heg ab d amjedkam ch heg wehm d Hemako. K hegai mat g i wuhshanig ab amjed i shonwua d Christ. Kutt heg wehm ab i t-hemakoj ab i s-wohochuthk k hekaj ab wo i wuwha muhkig amjed.
46015023	Tho Jiosh hab elitha mat wehpeg ab i wuhsh g Christ ab muhkig amjed. Tt ahchim ab hahawa hab wa'ap wo i wuwha mach ab s-wohochuth. Ith at hab wo e juh mat hekith ep wo jiwia g Christ.
46015024	T am haha wo huhug g jewed. Kut ab wo thagito g Christ g e-kownaltalig e-ohg Jiosh wui. T Wabshaba g Jiosh wehpeg ab wecho wo i ul wehs ha'ichu. Hemuch at ab wo gegokkath g kokownal ch nahnko mahs gewpkthag Christ wui.
46015025	T wabshaba g Christ hemho wa wo himchuthath g e-kownaltalig ch ab wo ai mat wehs wo ha gewito g e-obga.
46015026	K g muhkig d si oithchkam ha'ichu mamt wo gewito.
46015027	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mat wehs ha'ichu ab wecho wo i ul g am si e-Kehsha. K oi wa pi hejel hab e ahg g Jiosh mas ab wecho wo i e ul.
46015028	T wabsh chum haschu ab wecho wo i ul g Christ. T heg ab hahawa wehs ha'ichu wo thagito e-ohg Jiosh wui. T g Jiosh d wo ge'e kownalk wehs ha'ichu thahm chum hekith.
46015029	Neh, ha'ijj at g em-tatchui ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh k hahawa koi. Kumt ha'i hab wa'ap ab i s-wohochuth k e pahl wapko mamt wo ha wehmajk am i ko'ok. Pegih, pi g hab wo cheh'i mas pi ep wo e chegito.
46015030	Wehs tashkaj ach pi sha'i huwith g t-thoakag ahchim mach am ahgachug g tho'ibiathag. Kutt pi am hab wo t-junihith matp pi ab hu wo i wuwha g ko'i.
46015031	Neh, ni-wepnag, wehs tashkaj o am hab chu'ig g s-ni-mukimkam. Ith ani hab kaij nani pi ab si has em-elith mam d ni-wehm wohochuththam.
46015032	Ia at ha'i hab masma ni-cheggia mo g s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu thothakam Ephesus t am. Kunt pi ab hu ha wui wo sha'i kekiwua am ahgachugch matt ep wo t-chegito am i ko'ok matp pi d wo wohokamk. Matp hab chu'ig, nt wabsh oithk hab wo ni-junihith g hab ha-che'i mo hab chu'ig, “Tt hig wabsh wo si t-gegosithath ch wo s-hehgigk natt pi hemuch im hu hab wo i t-juh.”
46015033	Mt wo e iattogith k hab wa'ap wo masmak mo hegam mamtp ab wo ha kaihamath.
46015034	Ha'ijj amki pi mahch g Jiosh. K ith d si em-edathag. Am g wabsh wo thagito g pi ap e-chegitoi k s-ap ha'ichu wo chegito.
46015035	Neh, ha'ijj amsh hab chech'e, “Shaht masma ep wo i wuwha g ko'i. Kut has wo mahskath g hohon matp woho hab wo e juh?”
46015036	Pegih, nt wo em-tashogi. T-hohon o wepogithas mo g ha'ichu kai. Heg at am wo e ei jewed ch ed. T g elithaj wo padt. T g kai am haha wo i wuhsh.
46015037	Hegai mam am e'esha o d wabsh si s-wohom ha'ichu kai ch pi d wehs hegai mat ab wo i wuhsh.
46015038	Jiosh at hab masma am wo wuhshath mo has i masma tatchua k ab mahkch mat hab wo mahskath mo g je'ej. Wehs o gawul mahs g ha'ichu wuhshanig.
46015039	K g ha'ichu thoakam hab wa'ap gawul mahs. O'othham o am wa has mahs chuhkug. K g ha'ichu thoakam ch u'uwhig ch waptopi am wa hehe'ejelko gawul mahs chuhkug.
46015040	Tash ch mashath ch huhu'u o gawul masma mo g jewed ch gawul masma s-kehgaj.
46015041	K ihtham mo an t-thahm hab chu'ig pi e wepo masma s-kehgaj. Mashath o gawul masma s-kehgaj mo g tash. K g huhu'u hab wa'ap gawul masma s-kehgaj mo ihtham ch pi e wepo masma s-kehgaj.
46015042	Ihtha t-honshpadag o d wabsh jewed t ab ha'ichu ch wo hekit k pi wo kehgajk ch pi wo ha gewkthagk ch wo muh k gd hu wo e hiash. T g Jiosh ab wo i t-wuwhas. T g t-honshpadag d haha wo thahm kahchim ch ed ha'ichuk ch wo s-kehgajk ch wo gewkthagk ch pi hekith wo hekit k pi hekith wo muh. Jiosh at ab t-mah ihtha t-honshpadag matt ith thahm jewed wo hekaj. K hab mahs mat hemho wa am wo nahto g thahm kahchim honshpadag matt an wo hekajith thahm kahchim ch ed.
46015045	Neh, bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana mash g wehpeg o'othham d Adambad. Tsh ith g Jiosh am nahto k ab mah g thoakag k Hekaj am i shonwuich g o'othham thoakag. K wabshaba g Christ ab hahawa t-mahkch g wechij thoakag.
46015046	Pi o an hu wehpeg d thahm kahchim thoakag g o'othham ch wabshaba hemho wa in jewed thahm wehpeg mahsi.
46015047	Jiosh atsh wabsh g jewedkaj am nahto hegai si wehpegkam. T heg i thahm ia hahawa jiwia g Christ ab thahm kahchim t amjed.
46015048	Wehsijj ach ab d amjedkamaj hegai mat g jewedkaj e nahto ch hab wa masma. Ch ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth hegai mat ia jiwia thahm kahchim t amjed hab wa masma mo hegai.
46015049	Matt wo i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed k haha wo wepo masmak.
46015050	Pi at an hu wo sha'i i wah thahm kahchim ch ed ihtha jewed thahm t-hon mo aihim g muhkig.
46015051	Neh, nt am haha wo em-ahgi g s-a'agi ha'ichu. Pi att wehsijj wo ko'o k wabshaba wehsijj wo gawul t-juh ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
46015052	Kut ith si s-hohtam hab wo e juh hab masma mam si s-hohtam e wuhigith. Wehpeg at ab wo kaitha g kukuikud k g si ha oithchkam ab wo kaitha. T ab ha hekaj wo i wuwha hegam mat heki hu koi ab i s-wohochuthk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Tt ahchim mattp in d wabsh wo kia thothakamk hab wa'ap wo gawul t-juh.
46015053	Ihtha t-hon at am gawul wo e juh mat pi hekith wo muh.
46015054	T hab masma wo e wohokamch ihtha mo an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Muhkig at im hu hab wo i e juh. Jiosh at am s-ap wo gewito.
46015055	Bo wa masma g muhkig mo g si ge'e ko'oi. K g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig heg wa wepo mo g ke'ij. T wabshaba g t-kownalig Jesus Christ gm hu hab i juh g ke'ij ab nakogk g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag. Jiosh at am i ap'ech mat hab masma wo t-gewitojel g muhkig. Kuch heg hekaj si s-hehgigam ab ho'ige'ith.
46015058	Pegih neh, ni-wepnag, pi at wo sha'i heki e wua matt haschu am hab wo junihith g t-kownalig Jesus wehhejed. Kumt heg hekaj s-wihnam wo gegokkath e-wohochuthadag ed ch chum hekith wo si chikpanath wehhejed.
46016001	Ith ant hab wo ah heg amjed lial mamt am wo to'awath ha wehhejed hegam e-wehm wohochuththam mo am kih Judea jewed ch ed. Bani ha ahg hegam wohochuththam mo am mu'ikpa kih Galasia jewed ch ed mat am wo to'awath g e-lialiga.
46016002	Kumt ahpim hab wa masma hab wa'ap am wo ha'i to'awath wehs thomig ed mamtp he'ekia wo i e nako am a'amichuthk mam he'ekia i ha gew.
46016003	Kumt am wo ha'i i ha chuhcha mat am wo i ui g em-mahkigdag Jerusalem wui. Nt am wo ha o'ohani g ge'egedchu Jerusalem t am am jiwiak em-wui. T ith am wo i bei g em-chuhchai k am wo hihi.
46016004	Kunt ahni am epai wo ha oi matp d wo Jiosh tatchuik mant am wo hih.
46016005	Wehpeg ant am wo i ha neithahi g t-wehm wohochuththam ha-kihhim oithk am Macedonia ch ed k am haha wo i em-chehgimed
46016006	k antp hems wehs s-hehpch'ed oitham am wo em-wehmajkahim. Mt am haha wo i ni-wehmt mantp hebai ba'ich wo i hih.
46016007	Pi ant wo em-nei am himathch Macedonia wui nani pi tatchua mant am wo wa tash em-wehmajkahim matp d wo Jiosh tatchuik.
46016008	Bani ni-elith mant ia wo ha'ichugk Ephesus kihhim t am ch ab wo ai g bahijitha gegosig.
46016009	Ge'ej o g ni-ap'ethag mant am hab wo junihith g Jiosh chikpan iia, chum as hi wa mu'ijj ab ni-wui gegok.
46016010	Tp hems am wo jiwia g Timothy em-shahgith. Kumt si s-ap ab wo neithath no pi am hab wa'ap junihim g Jiosh chikpan hab masma mani ahni.
46016011	Pi amt wo pi ap hab elithath mo d wabsh wechij o'othham ch wabshaba am wo i wehmt. T hab s-ap e taht k ab uhpam wo i hih. Si ani nenida mat ia ep wo jiwia hegam ha wehm mat am wehmaj wo hihi em-wui.
46016012	Am amsh s-neithamk g Apollos. Kuni ab chum si i gewkemhun mat am wo i em-chehgim. K wabshaba pi hab elith mo d Jiosh tatchui mat am wo hih hemu ch heg hekaj pi wo ha oi ihtham mat am wo i em-chehgio k wabshaba am wo wa em-nei mat hekith am wo s-ap'ekath wehhejed.
46016013	Am g wo s-e nen'oithath ch s-wihnam wo gegokkath am e-wohochuthadag ed ch s-ge'ehogam am wo chikpanath
46016014	ch ab wo e chehgithch wehs ha'ichu k ed mam ab si pihk e elith wehs ha hekaj.
46016015	S-mahch am mo hegam Stephanas d si wehpegkam am em-jewedga ed mat wehs e wehm ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Ihtham at am i e thagito mat ha'ichu am hab wo junihith ha wehhejed g wohochuththam. Kuni ab em-gewkemhun, ni-wepnag,
46016016	mamt ab wo ha kaihamath hegam mo hab masma em-wanimed mo ihtham ch hegam mo hedai ha wehm chikpan.
46016017	Hemu at wabsh ia thatha g Stephanas ha wehm g Fortunatus ch Acaicus. Kuni si s-ap ni-tahtk ch ha neith nani pi si s-em-neithamk.
46016018	Ab at si i ni-hehgchul hab masma mat hab em-juh. S-ap amt ab wo ha neithath g hab mahs o'othham.
46016019	Hegam mo ab ihm g Christ iia Asia jewed ch ed o am i em-ahgith mamt ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el. Aquila ch Priscilla ch hegam mo am e nanmek ha-kih am o hab wa'ap am i em-ahgith mamt ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el.
46016020	Wehsijj g wohochuththam iia Ephesus t am o hab wa'ap am i em-ahgith mamt ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el. Ab g a'ai wo s-e ho'ige'ithath nam pi d e wehm wohochuththam.
46016021	Ia ant hejel wo o'oha g ni-ho'ige'ithadag am em-wui.
46016022	Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i ha juh matp hedai pi ab hu wo tatchuath g t-kownalig Jesus. Ia at ep wo jiwia g Jesus s-hohtam.
46016023	Si o s-hemajima g t-kownalig Jesus Christ ab em-wui ch ba'ich ab wo i em-mah g i wehmtadag.
46016024	Ab ani si pihk ni-elith wehs em-hekaj ahpim ni-wehm wohochuththam. Neh, ith ant hab wo wa'i chei am em-wui.
47001001	Ni-wepnag mam am kih Corinth t am ch am wehsko Greece jewed ch ed: Am ant ep wo ha'ichu i em-o'ohani ahni Paul g t-wehnag Timothy wehm. S-mahch am mani d kehshaj g Jesus Christ. Tho Jiosh tatchui mani heg an ahgachug.
47001002	Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
47001003	T-kownalig Jesus Christ ohg o hab wa'ap d t-ohg Jiosh ch si s-hemajima ab t-wui. Wehs g i gewkemhunadag o ab amjed him. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo si i ho'ige'ithath.
47001004	Heg o am i t-gewkemhun wehs t-kudutadag ed. Kuch heg hekaj t-nakog matt am epai wo i ha gewkemhunath hegam mo nahnko mahs ha'ichukaj e kudut heg wa hekaj mat haschu g Jiosh hekaj i t-gewkemhu.
47001005	M o wa woho mach hebai t-sho'igchuth mach d Jesus Christ wohochuththam. K wabshaba g Jiosh ba'ich i t-gewkemhun heg hekaj mat haschu g Jesus Christ am hab t-juni.
47001006	Ahchim ach wa t-sho'igchuth am i em-wehmajch mamt wo e tho'ibia. K g Jiosh am i t-gewkemhun matt hab wa'ap am wo i em-gewkemhu. Mt hab ab wo bei g gewkthag mamt s-ap wo nako hegai hab mahs sho'igthag mach ahchim nakog.
47001007	Pegih, s-mahch ach mamt hemho wa hab wa'ap wo bei g i gewkemhunadag nam pi hab wa'ap nakog g sho'igchuthadag.
47001008	Tatchua ach matt am wo i em-chegitoich ahpim t-wepnag matt he'ekia i t-sho'igch am Asia jewed ch ed. Sha'at wa'i si s-wechima ab t-ma'ish hegai cheggiadag. Kunt wa sha'i si s-mukima ni-taht.
47001009	Bo wa sha tahhathag mant ni-lothaitachuth k hemho wa wo ni-mu'ij. Ith atki hab ahgk hab e juh matt pi ab hu hejel wo t-hiwgath ch wabshaba heg wa'i Jiosh ab wo si hiwgath. Heg o ab i ha wuwhasith g ko'i muhkig amjed
47001010	ch t-tho'ibia ab amjed hegai si s-ta ehbithamakam ha'ichu matt am chum t-ko'ij. Kuch ab si hiwig mat ep wo t-tho'ibia matt pi wo t-ko'ij.
47001011	Kum ahpim am i t-wehmaj am e ho'ige'ithahunch t-wehhejed. T g Jiosh am hab wo juh mam haschu ab tahni k ab wo s-t-ho'ige'el. T mu'i ab wo ho'ige'el g Jiosh t-hekaj.
47001012	Jiosh o si s-hemajim ab t-mahkch g gewkthag. Kuch heg hekaj si s-ap himchuth g t-thoakag ith thahm jewed ch pi ha'ichu sha'i em-iattogith ch hab pi t-kudut. Ith o ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam.
47001013	Heg ach am wa'i em-o'ohanith mamt haschu s-ap wo ne'okchulith k wo s-amich. Am ani hab hi wa chum em-elith mamt am hu wa hebai wehs s-ap wo s-amich
47001014	mam haschu wabsh he'es i s-amichuth hemu. Kumt hekaj ba'ich ab wo si has i t-el hab masma matt ahchim ab wo si has em-el mat hekith wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus.
47001015	D ant hu'i heki hu hab masma i chum ap'ech mant am wo i em-nei am himathch Macedonia wui k am ep wo i em-nei ab uhpam himathch. Mt hab gokko ab wo bei g ho'ige'ithadag k wo i ni-wehmt mant am wo hih Judea wui.
47001017	Nt eda pi koi am hu i em-chehgim. Kumki ha'i hab ni-elith mani wabsh pehegi neok ch pi woho am hu hab wo ni-juh mani wa has i kaij.
47001018	K eda pi woho ihtha. Jiosh o s-mahch mani hab chum s-junimk mani haschu hab i ahg mant hab wo juh.
47001019	Neh, am ach ahgachug g Silas ch Timothy wehm ab amjed g Jesus Christ. K heg d Jiosh alithag ch chum hekith hab wua mo haschu hab i ahg.
47001020	Wehs at am hab t-juni g Jiosh g hab e-elitha am gahi wuhshanim g Jesus Christ. Kutt heg gahi wuhshanim ab wo si hehgchulithath g Jiosh.
47001021	Tho Jiosh mat am i t-gewpkathch Christ himthag ed ab t-mahk g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg am wohokamchuth mach d hemajkamgaj ch wehs wo bei hegai mo ab t-makiog.
47001023	S-mahch o g Jiosh mani pi em-kudutamk ch heg hekaj pi koi am hu ep em-wui hih. Ba'ich o i s-ap'e mamt wehpeg am wo i ap'ech hegai mo pi ap'e am em-shahgith.
47001024	Pi o hab chum chu'ig machs ahchim am wo em-nu'ichkwuhith em-wohochuthadag ed. Ba'ich o i s-ap'e matt am wo i em-gewkemhu em-wohochuthadag ed. Kumt hab wo s-gegokkath heg eda.
47002001	Am ant si i ni-oithahim k hab i ni-ah mantki pi am hu wo i em-chehgim hemu manis wo ge s-em-keh'el.
47002002	Mt pi wo ap e taht mantp hab wo ni-juh. Nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo ap ni-taht.
47002003	Heg ant hekaj am wabsh em-o'ohani. Ab amt wo chum ni-mah g s-ap tahhathkam. Kuni pi tatchua manis am wo chum jiwia em-wui k wabsh pi wo ap ni-taht em-wehhejed. S-mahch ani mamt wo s-hehgigk mant hekith ahni wo s-hehgigk.
47002004	Si ani pi ap ni-tahtk ch mu'i ni-oh'og iawua am em-o'ohanithk nani pi si pihk ni-elith em-hekaj. Ni eda pi tatchua manis ab wo em-mah g pi ap tahhathkam.
47002005	Ab at i em-mah g pi ap tahhathkam hegai mat am si pi ap has chu'i em-shahgith. Kuni pi tatchua manis ab wabsh wo si em-chehmo.
47002006	Am at wa ge'e ab nako g e-namkithadag ab em-amjed mamt has i masma am ap'ech.
47002007	Mt hahawa ab wo i s-ho'ige'ith k ab wo i gewkemhu nat pi has e juh k am hu wo si pi ap e tahtam k wabsh si s-wohom gm hu hab wo i e juh.
47002008	Am g thahm ep wo ahgith mam ab si pihk e elith wui.
47002009	S-mahchimk ani am i em-o'ohanithk mams ab wo s-ni-wohog el. Kumt wa woho am hab e juh.
47002010	Kunt hab wa'ap ab wo i s-ho'ige'el hegai mat pi ap has chu'i mamtp ahpim ab wo i s-ho'ige'el.
47002011	T hab pi wo e nako g Jiawul mas wo t-wohppo'i ihtha t-wehnag. S-mahch ach mo hab wa s-e junimk.
47002012	Pegih, nt wa pi am hu em-wui hih am himathch Macedonia wui k wabshaba am hih Troas wui. Tki g Jiosh am ap'ech mant am i ahgachug g ha'ichu ahgaj amai.
47002013	Nt am hu hebai ni-kudu nat pi pi oi jiwia g Titus am i em-chehgimedk. Kunt am i ha ho'ige'el g t-wehm wohochuththam amai k gm hu hih Macedonia wui. T am ni-nam g Titus k am ni-ahgith mamt s-ap am hab juh g ni-ne'oki.
47002014	Kuni heg amjed ab si ihm g Jiosh mat am i ap'ech hegai mo pi ap'e am em-shahgith. Jiosh o chum hekith ab t-mahkch g gewitoithag hekaj hegai mat g Christ am t-wehhejed hab juh. Ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed g Christ o an wehsko e gantan hab sha masma mat g s-ap uhwchu wehsko wo e hewagi mat hebai wo e mehi.
47002015	Hegam mat wo e tho'ibia o ab si s-hohho'ith ch kah mo g Jiosh ab ha makiog g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. K hegam mat pi wo e tho'ibia pi hohho'ith ch kah mo am hihim pi ha huhugetham muhkig wui. Pegih, tho si s-has ha'ichu chikpan ihtha.
47002017	Kut pi wo e nako mat am hab wo juh hegam mo wabsh pehegichuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch wabsh s-u'imk g lial. Ahchim Christ pionag ach hi pi hab sha'i masma ch pi em-iattogith ch wabshaba s-ap am ahgachug ihtha wohokam mo g Jiosh ab t-mahkch.
47003001	Pi ani wabsh hejel ni-wohokamchuth mani d kehshaj g Christ ch pi tatchua mams ab wo ni-wohokamch g o'ohanakaj.
47003002	Ahpim mamt ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga am heg wa wepo mam d o'ohanaj g Christ ch am wohokamchuth mani d kehshaj. K ith pi an hu o'ohanas hohothai t ab hab masma mash wa hegai heki hu wehst-mahm chehanig ch wabshaba an o'ohanas em-thothakag ed nat pi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag gawul em-juh k am i em-ap'ech heg hekaj ha'ichu ni-ahga. Kut wehs wo nei mat has em-juni g Jiosh k wo s-mahchk mani d Christ kehsha.
47003004	Ith ani hab kaij nani pi ab hiwig g Jiosh heg hekaj mat g Christ hab t-juni.
47003005	Pi o d hejel t-gewpkthag ch wabshaba d Jiosh gewkthag mach hekaj am hab junihim g Jiosh chikpan.
47003006	K ihtha mach ahgachug d wechij ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. K ab ha'i kaiham. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab ha mahk g wechij thoakag. Pi o hab masma hegai hekiukam ha'ichu ahgaj ch wabshaba d chehanig. K g pi ap chu'ijkam heg hekaj s-mahch mo ab ha wui him g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag.
47003007	Hegai hekiukam chehanig ash an o'ohanas hohothai t ab. Tsh g Jiosh am ha chehgi g e-gewkthag ch e-tonlig matsh wa ab ha mah ihtha g Tutuligo. Mosesbad wuhiosha ash wa si tonod heg hekaj Jiosh gewkthag mash wa an wehmajkahim tho'ag t ab ch ab bei hegai chehanig. Tsh pi sha'i e nako g wehmaj o'othham mas ab wo i nei g Mosesbad. Kush eda am wa chum chukhim hegai tonlig. Neh, Jiosh atsh hab wa masma am ha chehgi g e-gewkthag mat wa ab ha mah hegai hekiukam chehanig mo ab t-namkith g muhkigkaj
47003008	k wabshaba ba'ich am t-chehgithch g e-gewkthag mo ab t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg am t-eda chikpan.
47003009	Tho si s-has ha'ichu hegai hekiukam chehanig mach hekaj s-mahch mo ab t-aihim g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig. Pegih, k ba'ich d i si ha'ichu hegai ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mach hekaj s-mahch mo gm hu hab i junihog g pi ap t-chu'ichig matt d haha wo s-ap'ekamk am tahgio.
47003010	T wabsh pi e ha'ichuch g gewkthaj g hekiukam chehanig am t-wehhejed no pi ba'ich i s-gewkthag g Christ ha'ichu ahga.
47003011	Hekiukam chehanig at am i huhug. T wabshaba g Christ ha'ichu ahga pi hekith wo ha huhug.
47003012	Ith ach ab ab t-gewpkathch ch hekaj am si s-t-mahch ch ahgachug.
47003013	Mosesbad atsh wa ab ma'ish g e-wuhiosha matsh g wehmaj o'othham pi ab hu wo nei hegai tonlig mo ab ab tonod ab amjed g Jiosh gewkthag. Sh hegam pi neith mo huhughim hegai tonlig. Ch ahchim hi pi ab hu ma'ishch hegai Jiosh gewkthag mo ab t-ab e chehgithch.
47003014	K eda wabsh kia e ehstokch mu'i ha wehhejed g ni-wehm o'othham. K heg hekaj pi mahch mo huhughim g gewkthaj hegai hekiukam chehanig. Im at hu hab wo i e juh hegai pi ha-amichuthadag mat hekith ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Christ.
47003015	Chum wa hems ith i tashkaj o heg wa wepo mo ab ma'ishpi g ha-amichuthadag mo hekith am i ne'okchulith hegai ha'ichu ahga mat g Mosesbad an o'oha.
47003016	Neh, ab atsh i e ma'ishpi'o g Mosesbad matsh hekith ab ep i miabi g Jiosh. T ihtham ha-amichuthadag hab wa'ap wo i e ma'ishpi'o mat hekith ab wo i miabi g Jiosh.
47003017	Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o d Jiosh ch am ha'ichug t-thoakag ed am i t-ap'echuthk g Jiosh wehhejed. Kuch hab t-wul'okch mach pi chum t-ap'echuth g chehanigkaj.
47003018	Pi o ab hu ma'ishpi g t-amichuthadag ahchim mach ab ihm g Christ. Kuch ab wui nea ch ab chehgithch g gewkthaj ch tonligaj hab sha masma mo g neithakud. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am si gawul t-junihim. Tt hekaj ba'ich wo i wepo masmak g Christ.
47004001	Ab o s-t-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ch ab t-chehani matt am wo ahgachugath g ha'ichu ahgaj. Heg ach hekaj pi ha'ichukaj t-shohbithch ch heg am hab wua.
47004002	Pi ach hab wua g s-a'agi ha'ichu ch pi ha iattogith ch pi am hu gawul wua g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Jiosh o s-mahch mach am ahg g wohokam ch am i t-nakog matt wo s-ap'ek am hemajkam ha-nena ed.
47004003	Ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mach ahgachug o hegam wa'i ha wehhejed pi tasho mo pi d e tho'ibiakam.
47004004	Jiawul o ge'e gewkthag ith thahm jewed ch thaishch g ha-amichuthadag. K hekaj pi amichuth mo s-ha tho'ibiamk g Christ ch d si hekia s-ap'ekam ch wepo d thoakam g e-ohg Jiosh. Heg o wa wepo mo g Jiosh gewkthag d si s-mahs tonlig ch ab ab tonod g alithaj. K eda ihtham pi neith.
47004005	Pi ach hejel t-amjed ha'ichu ahgachug. Jesus Christ o d t-kownalig. Kuch heg amjed an ahgachug ch d wabsh em-pionag wehhejed.
47004006	Jiosh atsh am wa i tonlith g s-chuhugam gd hu'i si wehpeg. K heg ha wepo mat am epai i tonlith g t-thoakag nat pi t-mahtchul g Christ. K heg am t-chehgithch g Jiosh.
47004007	Thach wabsh chum hemajkam. K eda g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g e-gewkthag. T hab wo s-e mahchk mo d wa Jiosh gewkthag ch am t-eda. Kuch heg hekaj hab sha masma mo g bith haha'a mat hema g lai am ha eda wo to'akchith g s-e-kaisthag.
47004008	Mu'ikko ach ha'ichukaj t-kudut. K wabshaba pi ha'ichu t-shohbithch. Hebai ach ha'ichu pi a'amichuth ch wabshaba am wabsh ba'ich i t-gewpkath.
47004009	Mu'ikko am t-sho'igchuth. K wabshaba g Jiosh chum hekith t-wehmaj. Hebai am hi wa chum si s-ko'okam has t-wua. Ch wabshaba pi t-ko'ijith.
47004010	Chum o hekith am hab chu'ig g muhkig t-wehhejed mamt wa hab masma hab juh g Jesus. K hab masma am tasho e neith g Jesus thoakag am t-thoakag ed.
47004011	T-thoakag oithch o am hab chu'ig mattp hems wo t-muhkith am wehhejed g Jesus. K hab wa masma ab e chehgithch g Jesus thoakag id amjed t-chuhkug mo am him muhkig wui.
47004012	S-ni-mukimakam o chum hekith am hab chu'ig nani pi am hab junihim ihtha chikpan. K am wa s-ap'e namt pi ith hekaj ab bei g wechij thoakag.
47004013	Bo chu'ig an Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed mash hema hab kaij: Am ant neo nani pi ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Pegih, bach wa masma ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch hekaj am ahgachug.
47004014	Jiosh at wa ab i wuhshath g t-kownalig Jesus muhkig amjed. Kuch s-mahch mat hab wa'ap ab wo i t-wuwhas ahchim wohochuththam k ab wo i t-wahpki matt am wo wehmajk kihthaj ed.
47004015	Pegih, ni ab nakog g sho'igthag am em-wehhejed ch am ha wehhejed hegam mat hab wa'ap wo e tho'ibia am kahk g ha'ichu ni-ahga. K heg hekaj mu'ithahim hegam mo ab ho'ige'ith ch ab si has elith g Jiosh.
47004016	Heg att hekaj pi hekith ha'ichukaj an hu wo t-shohbi matt am hab wo junihith ihtha chikpan. Ab o hi wa chum aihim g muhkig g t-chuhkug nach pi hekitahim. K wabshaba g t-thoakag wehs tashkaj ab i e wechijith.
47004017	Hebaichujj ach hab hi wa elith mo sha'i si ge'ej g t-kudutadag iia. K wabshaba heg ab wui t-u'a g woho si ge'e ap'echuthaj g Jiosh. Heg eda at g Jiosh chum hekith ab wo si has t-elithath. T pi an hu wo ha'ichugk g jewed t ab t-kudutadag.
47004018	Ab ach wui t-gewpkathch hegai ap'ethag, chum achs hi wa chum pi neith g t-wuhpuikaj. Hegai mach haschu i neith hemu at wabsh wo huhug. T wabshaba pi hekith wo huhug hegai mach am wui t-gewpkathch.
47005001	Ihtha t-chuhkug o heg wa wepo mo d wabsh uhksha nat pi wabsh wo e padch. Kutt wabshaba wo edgithath g ba'ich i s-kehg honshpadag an thahm kahchim ch ed. T ith g Jiosh hab wo t-juni. Kut hab wo masmak mo g si s-kehg kih ch pi hekith wo e padch.
47005002	Hebaichujj ach si i shahshani nach pi am chum s-hihimimk thahm kahchim wui ch s-behimk hegai s-kehg honshpadag mat g Jiosh ab wo t-mah.
47005004	Pi ach hab ahgch shahshani machs im hu hab i s-junimk ihtha t-honshpadag ch wabshaba hab ahgch matt oi ab wo bei hegai wechij t-honshpadag an thahm kahchim ch ed k pi d haha wo mukimkamk.
47005005	Jiosh at am i t-ap'ech ith wehhejed k ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wo t-wehmajk ch am wo i wohokamch mo haschu ab t-makiog.
47005006	Pegih, si ach s-ap t-tahtk ch ia chewed,
47005007	chum achs pi neith g t-kownalig Jesus, nach pi ab s-wohochuth ch hab s-ap himchuth g t-thoakag.
47005008	Kuch wabshaba ba'ich i chum tatchua matt an wo i t-chihwiapath wehmaj, chum achs wo thagito ihtha t-chuhkug.
47005009	K wabshaba pi has d sha'i ahga machs hebai hab chu'ig. Ith o ba'ich d i si ha'ichu matt am hab wo juh g tatchuij, chum achs ia wo ha'ichugk ith thahm jewed o an wo wehmajk anai.
47005010	Wehsijj att hemho wa am wo i t-chehgi Christ wui mat am wo t-a'appem k ab wo i t-mahkhi g t-namkithadag mattp has i masma s-ap hab junihim o pi ap hab junihim hegai chikpan mo ab t-mahkch iia.
47005011	S-to'o ehbitham hab mahs g Jiosh lothaita. Kuni heg hekaj ab si i ha chehani g hemajkam mat wo hiwigi mat g Jiosh am wo i ha ap'ech e tahgio. S-mahch o g Jiosh mo ith d wohokam mani em-ahgith. Kuni hab chum em-elith mam ahpim hab wa'ap s-mahch.
47005012	Pi ani hejel chum ni-ha'ichuchuth. K wabshaba mu'ijj ab si has ha elith hegam mo si s-kehg hab mahs pi sha'i mahchk g ha-i'ibthag. Kuni am ha'ichu em-ahgith mamt hekaj wo e nakog k ab wo uhpam i nodagi g ha-ne'oki.
47005013	Ha'i ash hab ni-elith mani ge pi ni-mahch ch hab ni-junihim. Ni eda wabsh s-gewkam am hab junihim g Jiosh tatchui. Kum ahpim s-mahch mani s-ni-tahtk ch am hab ni-junihim em-wehhejed.
47005014	E at muhkith g Christ wehs t-wehhejed no pi ab si t-tatchua. Kuch hekaj ab aigo si tatchua ch hemho wa am hab s-junimk g tatchuij. Ith o heg wa wepo matt ahchim wehmaj koi
47005015	nach pi hahawa pi am hu hab junimk g hejel t-tatchui ch wabshaba heg tatchui am hab s-junimk mat e muhkith k ep e chegito k i wuhsh t-wehhejed.
47005016	Heki ani hu wa hab ni-elith mani s-mahch mo has chu'ig g hemajkam ch s-mahch mat has wo chum chu'igkath hegai mat d wo Jiosh si Kehshak. Ni wabshaba hemuch ith s-mahchimk ab amjed g Jiosh.
47005017	Tho si wechij thoakam matp hedai ab i e hemakoj g Christ wehm. Im at hu hab i e juh g hekiukam ha'ichu. T g wechij ha'ichu ab i wuhsh.
47005018	Jiosh at wehs ith hab juh. Heki ach hu wa d obgaj. T wabshaba g Christ am gawul t-juh mach d hahawa naipijjuj g Jiosh k ab t-chehani matt am wo i ahgahi g ha'ichu ahgaj mat ha'ijj hab wa'ap ab wo i nawojt g Jiosh.
47005019	Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga mat g Jiosh ab chum i ha nawojt g hemajkam k gm hu hab i juh g ha-chu'ichig heg hekaj mat g Christ haschu hab juh ha wehhejed.
47005020	Neh, kuch si s-hemajim ab em-waith am wehhejed g Christ mamt ab wo i hiwigi g Jiosh mat am gawul wo i em-juh mamt hahawa pi d wo obgajk.
47005021	Wehs at ab abch g e-alithag g pi ap t-chu'ichig mat heg hekaj ab wo t-abch g Christ s-ap'ekam ahchim matt ab wo i s-wohoch.
47006001	Bo chu'ig an Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Ab ant wo em-kaiham k wo em-tho'ibia mat hekith wo i e ai g tho'ibiathag tash. Pegih neh, e at ai hegai tash mamt wo e tho'ibia. Kuch si s-hemajim am em-ahgith am wehhejed g Jiosh mamt pi wo heki wua g hemajimataligaj.
47006003	Ch wabsh chum s-ap hab junihim g t-chikpan am wehhejed g Jiosh. Mt hab pi ab hu ha'ichu wo t-abchuth k pi ha'ichukaj an wo e kuh.
47006004	Kut wo tashok mach d piongaj g Jiosh nach pi ab s-bahbagi nakog g nahnko mahs kudutadag.
47006005	Mu'ikko am wa t-gewittan ch hebai gd hu si t-kukpa k ch hebai ep t-bibhiad chum s-t-kokthaimkch. Mu'ikko at wabsh i t-ba'iwich g chikpan. Kuch pi sha'i ha kohsh ch pi sha'i t-gegosith.
47006006	Si ach t-nuhkuth ch si t-mashcham ch ab si s-ha bahbgi g hemajkam ch ab ha wui si s-hemajima ch ab si ha tatchua. Chum ach hekith ahg g wohokam ch chum hekith hab wua g s-ap'ekam ch hekaj cheggia g pi ap'ekam. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am t-wehmaj ch am chehgithch g Jiosh gewkthag am t-chikpan ed.
47006008	Ha'ijj o ab si has t-elith ch ha'ijj si t-edawua. Ha'ijj o ab si s-ap has t-ahg ch ha'ijj s-ko'okam has t-ahg. Ha'ijj o hab t-ahg mach s-chu i'attomk. Kuch eda g wohokam ahg.
47006009	Ha'ijj o pi ab hu t-mahchimk ch eda mu'ijj s-t-mahch. Ha'ijj o hab elith mach ko'ihim. Kum eda s-mahch mach wabsh kia thotha. Chum am hi wa s ko'okam t-sho'igchuth ch wabshaba pi sha'i t-koktha.
47006010	Ha'ichu o pi ap t-tahhathchuth. Kuch eda chum hekith s-hehgig. Chum achs hi wa pi ha'ichu edgith ch eda s-mahch ch ahgachug mo g Jiosh wehs ha'ichu edgith ch ab t-makiog mach haschu i tatchua.
47006011	Neh, ith ani wehs ahg si ni-ihbthag amjed nani pi ab si em-tatchua.
47006012	Pi ani d ahni manis pi ab hu em-tatchua. Tham ahpim ha'i mam pi ab hu ni-tatchua.
47006013	Bani masma chum em-wehm neok mam d ni-a'aliga. Am g hig wo i ni-chehgith mam ab ni-tatchua hab masma mani ahni hab masma ab em-tatchua.
47006014	Pi g ab hu wabsh wo si e beh'i ha ab hegam mo pi ab hu ihm g Jesus Christ. Shaht hig masma g s-ap'ekam ab wo e wehnathk g pi ap'ekam? Shaht masma g tonlig ab wo e wehnathk g s-chuhugam.
47006015	Jiawul o ab wui kehk g Christ. Kumt heg hekaj pi ab hu wo i e hemakoj g pi wohochuththam ha wehm.
47006016	Ab ach ihm g Jiosh. K pi hab chum chu'ig machs ha'ichu ab ep wo ihmath. Jiosh o am t-eda. K ith heg wa wepo mach d cheopigaj. Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh: Thant wo em-Jioshgak ch am wo em-shahgithk. Kumt d wo ni-hemajkamgak.
47006017	K hab ep kaij: Am amt wo i e gawulkai ab ha amjed hegam mo pi ni-mahch k pi am hu wo hudawogath hegai mo haschu d pi ap'ekam.
47006018	Nt ab wo i em-bei mamt d wo ni-a'aligak.
47007001	Neh, ith ash hab kaij g Jiosh, ni-wepnag, mat am hab wo t-juni. Kutt hekaj ab hig wo si i t-ap'ech heg amjed mo haschu uamhun g t-chuhkug ch t-thoakag k am wo si i t-thagito Jiosh wui ab si has elithch.
47007002	Ab g wo si i s-ni-ho'ige'elith. Pi ant hedai sha'i s-ko'okam has juh manis has i masma ha iattogith o manis haschukaj i ha padch o manis haschu i ha ehs.
47007003	Pi ani heg hekaj hab kaij ihtha manis ab ha'ichu em-abchuth. Am am wa s-mahch mani ab si em-tatchua. Kut pi ha'ichu wo sha'i i t-gawulkai, chum hems g muhkig.
47007004	Ab ani si has em-elith ch ab si em-hiwig ch si s-hehgig ch am si i ni-gewkaj, chum as mu'i ha'ichu t-kudut.
47007005	Wehsko o wa an hab chu'ig g kudutadag mant eda am jiwia Macedonia jewed ch ed. Mu'ijj o wa ni-kawhain. Kuni wa am ni-kudut nani ge s-mahch mam has masma hab e junihim.
47007006	K wabshaba g Jiosh chum hekith ab t-mahk g gewkemhuna mach eda t-kudut. Kunt wa ab i ni-gewkemhu mat am ni-nam g Titus.
47007007	Heg o si s-ap e tahtk ch am ni-ahgith mamsh chum si s-ni-neithamk ch si pi ap e tahtk heg hekaj mat haschu has e juh am em-shahgith. K hab kaij mamsh ab ha wui gegok hegam mo has ni-ahg. Kuni hekaj ba'ich i si s-hehgig hemuch.
47007008	Si amsh pi ap e tahtk am ne'okchulithk g ni-o'ohana. Kuni wa chum pi hohho'ith mant heg am em-o'ohani. Kumsh wabshaba pi tash pi ap e tahtk ch am wabsh i ap'ech hegai mash pi ap'e am em-shahgith. Jiosh at hekaj hegai em-sho'igchuthadag. Kuni hahawa si s-ap ni-tahtk.
47007010	Bo wa masma hekaj g Jiosh g pi ap tahhathkam am t-thoakag ed matt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap t-chegitoi k wo bei g s-ap tahhathkam. T wabshaba hegam mo pi ab hu e thagitokch Jiosh wui ba'ich im hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed mat ab wo ha ai g pi ap tahhathkam.
47007011	S-mahch am mat has em-juh g Jiosh mamt pi ap e taht. Am amt i e oithahim k si tatchua mat pi hedai ab hu wo em-abch mams pi ap chu'i. Si amt pi hohho'i hegai mo am pi ap chu'ig em-shahgith k ab si i e shohbi hegaj k si s-gewkam i tatchua mamt am wo i ap'ech hegai mo wa am pi ap'e. Am amt e chehgi moki pi d em-chu'ichig hegai matp am hab chu'ig em-shahgith.
47007012	Pi ant heg wa'i hekaj am wa em-o'ohani mamt am wo i ap'ech hegai mo wa am pi ap'e. Jiosh o s-mahch mant wa am em-o'ohani mat hekaj am wo e chehgi em-shahgith mam ab si ni-tatchua.
47007013	Kuch ab i t-gewkemhun mamtsh ab bei g i wehmta. Titus o si s-ap e tahtk mamsh wabsh si s-ap'e. Kuni heg hekaj si s-hehgig
47007014	nant pi si s-ap has em-ah ab wui. Kumt pi si ni-edawua. Chum ach hekith g wohokam ahg ab em-wui. Kut hab wa'ap am e wohokamch hegai mant am ahgi g Titus ab em-amjed.
47007015	Ba'ich o ab i si em-tatchua am i chechegitodch mamt si s-ap ab i neith k am si i e nako mamt ab wo s-wohog el.
47007016	Si am s-ap hab junihim hegai mani has i kaij. Kuni heg hekaj ab si em-hiwig ch si s-hehgig.
47008001	Neh, t-wepnag, am ach s-em-ahgithamk mat haschu wa hab juh g Jiosh am ha shahgith g wohochuththam amai Macedonia jewed t am.
47008002	Mu'i sho'igthag at nakog k wabshaba wabsh si s-hehgig ch si s-ap e tahtk ch am hab wua g mahkig mo eda d wa chum si sho'igkam.
47008003	Bat juh ihtha mahkig mat he'es i e nako, pej ba'ich i mo he'es i chum e nakog, wabsh hejel hab e elithk.
47008004	Ab at si t-tai matt wo ha hiwigi mat hab wo juh ihtha k hab masma am wo i ha wehmt hegam mo d Jiosh hemajkamga ch si e sho'igchuth amai Judea t am.
47008005	Kut ba'ich am hab i juh mach he'es hab i chum ha elith nat pi wehs am i e thagito chikpanaj ed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ mach has masma am ha tashogith.
47008006	Am at wa heki hu i chikp ihtha g Titus. Kuni am si i chehani mat am wo i em-wehmt k wo nahto ihtha s-kehg chikpan.
47008007	Si am ge'e ha'ichu ab ap'ethag ch ab si s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ha'ichu s-mahch ab amjed g Jiosh ch s-kehg neneok ch s-wapagima ch ab si t-tatchua. Kuch heg hekaj hab em-elith mamt wo i ha wehmt hegam mo e sho'igchuth am Judea ch ed.
47008008	Pi ani ab hu s-gewkam em-chehani mamt hab wo juh ihtha. Ni wabsh chum s-mahchimk mas he'es i ge'ej g em-pihk elithadag. Heg ani hekaj am em-ahgith mat has masma hab juh g i wehmta ihtham ha'i.
47008009	Am am wa s-mahch mat has masma am chehgi g e-hemajimatalig g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Thach wabsh sho'igkam. T heg an thagito g e-kihthag ch e-ap'ethag k sho'ig ia ha'ichugkahim matt ahchim ab wo si i bei g ap'ethag.
47008010	Bani masma hab elith ihtha mamt am wo i nahto hegai mamt wa am hab i chum juh ha'akith. Ahpim amt wa wehpeg si s-hohho'ith k am hab i junihi ihtha i wehmta.
47008011	Pegih, am g wo i e gewpkath k wo nahto. Bamt wa masma s-wapagimam am wo i nahto mamt wa gd hu i wehpeg hab e juh.
47008012	Mt wo s-ap e taht k am hab wo juh mamt he'es wo i e nako. T g Jiosh wo wa s-hohho'i.
47008013	Pi ani hab ahg mams ahpim wo e sho'igch am i ha wehmajch hegam wohochuththam mo e sho'igchuth. Ithani am ha'ichu s-edgith ch hekaj wo i ha wehmt. T hegam am epai wo i em-wehmt mamtp hekith wo i tatchua g i wehmta. Bamt masma am a'ai wo i e wehmt mamt hekith wo i tatchua g i wehmta.
47008015	Bat masma hab wo e juh hegai mo an hab chu'ig Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed ch hab chu'ig: Matp hedai he'es wo i edagi ha'ichu, t am wo wa ahijsk mo he'es i tatchua.
47008016	Titus o si pihk e elith em-hekaj hab masma mani ahni. Kuni heg hekaj ab si i ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.
47008017	S-ap o e tahtk mani ab ahgith mat am wo i em-wehmt ch am hejel si e nako mat am wo i em-chehgim.
47008018	Am ani hema ep ahgith mat wo oi g Titus. Ith o s-ap ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. K heg hekaj wehsko ab si has elith g t-wepnag.
47008019	K ith d ha-kehsha mat wo t-oi matt am wo i ui g em-mahkig ha wui hegam mach am i s-ha wehmtamk. Si ach s-t-nen'oith matt s-ap hab wo juh ihtha em-wehhejed. T hab pi hedai has wo t-ahg k wabshaba ab wo has elithath g Jiosh.
47008022	Pegih, t am wo oi g Titus ihtha t-wehnag. Mu'ikko att am a'appe ab tahnich mat am wo i t-wehmt. Kuki chum hekith s-t-wehmtamk, wahm hemuch no pi ab si has em-elith.
47008023	Kum s-mahch mo g Titus d ni-wehm chikpantham ch am wo i em-wehmt. K ihtham ha'i mat am wehmaj wo hihi am d ha-chuhchai g t-wepnag ch ab si ha'ichuchuth g Christ.
47008024	Ab ani si s-ap has em-ahg am ha tahgio. Kumt am wo ha chehgi mam ab si ha tatchua. T hegam mat am i ha chuhcha wo s-mahchk mani g wohokam am ha ahgith.
47009001	S-mahch ani mam tatchua mamt wo i ha wehmt g sho'igkam e-wepnag, chum anis hems pi am hu wo em-o'ohani heg amjed. Ia ani wa heki hu si s-ap has em-ahg ha wui ihtham t-wepnag am ha ahgithch mamt heki hu hab i e ah ha'akith mamt am wo i ha wehmt hegam sho'igkam. Ith at mu'ijj am si i ha gewpkai.
47009003	Kuni ithani am ha ahgith ihtham t-wepnag mat am wo hihi em-wui. Mt wo si e nahtokch heg hekaj e-mahkig. Kut pi wabsh wo heki e wua g s-kehg ni-ne'oki ab em-amjed.
47009004	Tp hems wo ha'i t-wehmajk g Macedonia t am hemajkam. Kunt wo si ni-el mamtp pi wo e nahtokch mani eda si s-ap em-ahg am ha wui. Mt ahpim hab wa'ap wo si e el.
47009005	Heg ani hekaj hab elith mo s-ap'e mant am wo si i ha cheha ihtham t-wepnag mat am wehpeg wo hihim k am wo i em-wehm ap'ech g em-mahkig. Bat masma heki hu wo nahtoisk mant am haha wo jiwia. Mt am wo e chehgi mam woho i s-ha wehmtamk g sho'igkam ch pi hab wabsh wua manis ab si em-chehani mamt am hab wo juh.
47009006	S-mahch am mat mu'i wo nei g ha'ichu bahithag hegai mat mu'i wo ei g ha'ichu kai. T pi ab hu mu'i wo nei hegai mat pi mu'i wo ei. Pegih, mt hab wa'ap mu'i ab wo nei g ap'ethag mamtp s-ba'ama ab wo ha'ichu ha mah am Jiosh wehhejed.
47009007	Mt wabshaba hejel hab wo e ah mamt he'ekia ab wo i ha mah. Pi o ab hu t-chehani g Jiosh machs ab ha'ichu wo ha mah no pi s-hohho'ith matt si s-ap t-taht k am hab wo juh g t-mahkig k pi wo ge s-tha'ath.
47009008	Jiosh at wo e nako mat ab wo em-mah hegai mam haschu i tatchua. Kumt chum hekith wo edgithath mam haschu i tatchua hejel e wehhejed ch am thahm ep wo edgithath mamt am hab wo juh g i wehmta.
47009009	Neh, bo chu'ig an Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed: Hegai mat si s-ba'ama ab ha'ichu wo ha mahkath g sho'igkam at chum hekith wo e nakogath mat am hab wo e junihith.
47009010	Jiosh at ab wo mahkath g ha'ichu kai hegai mat wo e'eshath. T heg amjed ab wo neithath g ha'ichu hugi. Pegih, k hab wa'ap tasho mo s-ba'ama ab t mahkch g i wehmtadag matt am epai ha'i wo i ha wehmt.
47009011	Chum at hekith s-ba'ama am wo i em-wehmajk mamt wo s-chechojimak. Kut mu'ijj ab wo si i ho'ige'el g Jiosh heg hekaj em-mahkig.
47009012	Ihtha mamt am hab wo juh at am wo i ha wehmt g Jiosh hemajkamga. T mu'i ho'ige'elig am hab wo juh Jiosh wui.
47009013	Em-mahkig at am wo wohokamch mam woho ab s-wohochuth g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jesus Christ. Kut mu'ijj ab wo si i ha'ichuch g Jiosh
47009014	k wo e ho'ige'ithahu am em-wehhejed ab si em-tatchuathch no pi g Jiosh ab si em-mahkch g hemajimatalig.
47009015	Ab att wehsijj wo si i ho'ige'el g Jiosh mat ab i t-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag.
47010001	Ha'ijj amsh hab kaij manish s-em-keh'ith wabsh em-o'ohanithch ch antsh ep wo s-hemajimak am ep jiwiak. Pegih, bani wa masma chum si s-hemajima mo g Christ.
47010002	Am g wabsh wo s-thotholimak. Nt hab pi wo em-keh'el am jiwiak. Ha'ijj amsh hab kaij manish wabsh hejel ni-wehhejed am hab junihim ha'ichu. Ni eda g Jiosh wehhejed hab wua. Nt wo ni-nako mant wo si s-gewkam neo ab em-wui.
47010003	In ach d thothakam jewed thahm ch wabshaba pi hab masma hab t-junihim mo hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh.
47010004	Hegam o ab wui gegok g Jiosh ch ha iattogith ch ab si ha'ichuchuth g hejel ha'ichu e-mahchig. K wabshaba ahchim ab t-mahkch g Jiosh g gewkthag. Kuch heg gewkthagkaj wehs gewito ihtha pi ap'ekam ch pi g hejel t-gewkthagkaj.
47010006	Pegih, am amt wo i e chehgi mam am wehs e thagitokch ith eda Christ himthag. Nt haha wo s-ko'okam ha namkith hegam mo am wa ha'ichukaj pi am hu wehs i e thagitokch.
47010007	Ha'i amki ab wabsh thahmjed ha'ichu neith ch hab chum si e elith mam d si Christ pionag. Am g wo si i e oithahim. Ahchim ach hab wa masma d Christ pionag mamtp has i masma hab e elith.
47010008	Pi ani sha'i si ni-elith am he'es i em-ahgithch ab amjed ihtha gewkthag mat g t-kownalig Jesus ab ni-mah. Ab o ni-mahkch mant hekaj am wo i em-gewkemhun k pi gm hu hab wo i em-juh ab amjed.
47010009	Pi ani hab ahgch am em-o'ohanith manis wo em-toths.
47010010	Tp hems hema hab wo chei, “Paul o si s-ta ke'itham kaij ab t-o'ohanithch ch wabshaba ia t-wui jijiwhia ch pi gewkthag. K g ne'okij d wabsh pi ha'ichu.”
47010011	T eda hegai mat hab wo wa chei wo chum s-mahchk mant hab wa masma hab wo chei hekith am em-wehmajkch mani has i kaij am ni-o'ohana ed.
47010012	Bamt wo s-mahchk mach pi ab hu sha'i i t-wepnath o t-wepogith hegam mo am si uhgk has e ahg. Wo o wabsh hejel e iattogith no pi hejel am e a'appem ch am hejel e ahg mo has masma.
47010013	Ahni ani hi am wa'i hugkam ni-a'aga mat he'es ab i ni-mah g Jiosh g chikpan. Kum ahpim d ni-nuhkutha.
47010014	Pi ant sha'i ba'iwich hegai mo g Jiosh ni-nuhkuthachuth mant am jiwia em-wui k am u'apa g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Christ.
47010015	Ni hekaj pi sha'i ni-haschuth heg hekaj mo d ha'i ha-chikpan mani am a'aga hegai chikpan mat g Jiosh ab i ni-mah ch wabshaba heg wui am ni-gewkathch mat am wo i ge'etha g em-wohochuthadag. Mt hekaj am epai wo i ni-wehmajk
47010016	mamt gm hu ba'ich ep wo i ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mo hebai pi koi hedai am hu ahgachug. Kunt pi hekith hab wo chum chei manis heg hab juh mat wabsh hema hab juh.
47010017	Bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed: Pi at hedai ab hu wabsh wo chum si has elithath g hejel ha'ichu hab e-juni. Heg at ab wo wa'i has elithath Jiosh ha'ichu hab juni.
47010018	Pi o has d sha'i ahga mas has i elith g o'othham g hejel e-chikpan. Heg o wa'i Jiosh s-mahch machs has i masma hab t-junihim.
47011001	Pi o hab chum chu'ig manis hab masma hejel ni-wehhejed wo neokath. Kuni eda ab si em-tatchua am wehhejed g Christ. Kumt hekaj ab wo ni-kaiha. Bam sha masma mam d hohntaj. Kuni si s-em-tha'a hab masma mo g Jiosh mamt wo si e nuhkuth g Christ wehhejed.
47011003	Am g wo s-chegitok matsh wa pi wohoch g Jiosh hegai wehpeg uwi mash hab chehgig Eve. Jiawul atsh wa s-a'agi iattogi am gahi wuhshanim g wamad. Kuni s-gihug mat hab wa'ap wo em-juh am gahi ha wuhshanim hegam mash chum em-iattogith. Kumtp hems wo s-ohhoth g Christ
47011004	namsh pi ha hiwgith ch ab ha kaiham. Ab ani em-ahgith hegai mo haschu am i ni-tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab amjed g Christ. Kumsh eda ha'i ab ha kaiham hegam mash gawul ha'ichu am em-ahgith ab amjed.
47011005	Ihtham amsh ha'i ab si has ha elith hab masma mo d Christ chuhchai. Ni eda ahni hig woho d kehshaj.
47011006	M o hi wa woho mani pi am hu i si s-mahch g amogitha. Kuni wabshaba s-mahch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch am em-wui i tashogith.
47011007	Ha'i amsh hab ni-elith mani pi ab hu ni-ha'ichuchuth pi sha'i em-hiwgithch mams ab wo ni-namkith. Ni eda am hab ni-junihim mant g s-ap'ekam am hab wo em-juni.
47011008	Tatchua ani g lial ch wabshaba pi tatchua manis wo em-wechhu. T hegam wohochuththam mo am a'ai kihhim Macedonia jewed ch ed ab ni-mamka mani haschu i tatchua.
47011010	Am ani em-ahgith wehsko Greece jewed ch ed mant pi wo em-hiwigi mams ab wo ni-namkith mani eda am ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga em-shahgith.
47011011	Pi ani heg hekaj hab kaij ihtha manis pi ab hu em-tatchua. Jiosh o s-mahch mani ab si em-tatchua.
47011012	K wabshaba ha'i hab chum kaij mash hab masma chikpan mani ahni. Ni eda ahni pi ha'ichu em-kowlant. K ihtham hi em-kowlant ch hab em-iattogith. Am ash chum ni-wepo e wua ahni mani d Christ kehsha. Pegih, t hemho wa wo chum ahgath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga pi ab hu ha'ichu em-kowlantch.
47011013	K wabshaba pi d wohokam Christ chuhchai ch ha'ichu ha iattogith ch chum t-wepo e wua ahchim mach d si s-wohom Christ chuhchai.
47011014	Am o wa tasho mat hab masma hab wo e wuath no pi d Jiawul pionag. Jiawul o chum e wepogith g s-ap'ekam anghil. T g piongaj hab wa'ap wo e wepogithath ahchim mach am ahgachug g s-ap'ekam. T wabshaba g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo ha namkith heg hekaj.
47011016	Ha'i amsh hab ni-elith mani wabsh pehegi neok. Nt eda am wo em-ahgi g wohokam ab amjed g ni-chikpan. Ab g wo kaiham mant has wo chei.
47011017	Pi o ab hu ni-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus mant hab kaitham wo neokath.
47011018	Nt wabshaba am hab wo ni-juh no pi mu'ijj wabsh hejel si e haschuth.
47011019	Kum ahpim hab e elith mam s-chu a'amichuth ch eda wabsh ha hiwgith hegam mo pi ha'ichu a'amichuth
47011020	mat am hab wo em-juh mo haschu d i ha-tatchui. Tp hems am ha'ichu wo em-wohppo'i o atp s-wihnam an wo em-ui o atp pi ab hu has wo em-elithath o atp s-ko'okam has wo em-ah.
47011021	Ha'i ash hab ni-elith mani pi hab masma ab em-wui mo hegam nani pi si ni-elith. Pegih, woho o wa mant wo si ni-el mantp hab wo masmak. Hegam o si e haschuth ch e wehhejed neneok. Pegih, nt ahni hab wa'ap ni-wehhejed wo neo.
47011022	Neh, bash e a'aga mash d Tutuligo ch d Jiosh hemajkamga ch d Abrahambad amjedkam. Pegih, ahni ehp.
47011023	Bo kaij mo d Christ pionag. Nt ahni hab wo chei mani ba'ich d i si piongaj mo hegam, chum ams hab wo ni-elithath mani wabsh pehegi neok. Ba'ich ani i si s-gewkam chikpan ch ba'ich i mu'ikko ni-kuhpach g Christ wehhejed. Ba'ich amt i mu'ikko ni-gewitta. Mu'ikko ant chum alo muh.
47011024	Hetaspo at am hugkam ab ni-chu'ichigch g ni-wehm Tutuligo mat waikko gamai humukto ni-gewitta.
47011025	Waikko at ni-gewitta g Rome t am haha'ichu. Hemho amt ni-ma'ichkwua. Waikko at wachum g wahlko mani an eda. Kuni hemako tash ch hemako chuhug chehmo'im am wi'inoghim shuhthagi ch ed.
47011026	S-to o ehbithama am ni-wehhejed mani hebai i oimmed. An o hab chu'ig g wi'inthag ch mu'ij g s-chu e'eskam. Ha'ijj o s-ta ehbitham s-ni-keh'ith g ni-wehm o'othham ch gawul mahs o'othham. Am o ha'ichug g s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu kihhim ch ed ch gm hu jegko ch an ge'e shuhthagi thahm. K hegam mo d chum t-naipijju chum s-ko'okam ni-jujju.
47011027	Mu'ikko ant si gewko k pi ha kohsig ch hebai d bihugimkam ch tonomkam. Mu'ikko ani pi ha ha'ichu hugi ch pi ha kih ch s-wihonagi eniga.
47011028	Am ba'ich ehp mani wehs tashkaj si ha chegitok hegam mo ab ihm g Christ ch an a'ai hab chu'ig.
47011029	Ab ani ha wehm nakog ha'ichu hegam mo pi gewpkthag. Tp hema am wo gei pi ap'ekam ch ed, ni ha wehm si ni-kudut.
47011030	Pi ani hejel si ni-ha'ichuchuth. Tho Jiosh mo am chehgithch g e-gewkthag am ni-eda mani eda d wabsh si sho'ig pi gewkam hemajkam. Ni heg ab wa'i ha'ichuchuth.
47011031	Jiosh alithag o d ni-kownalig. K g Jiosh s-mahch mo wehs woho ihtha mani em-ahgith. Kunt chum hekith ab wo si hehgchulithath.
47011032	Neh, hegai kownal mo ab wecho g ge'e kownal Aretas at wa am i ha chuhcha g shonthal ab Damascus kihhim kihjeg t ab mat an wo ni-be k wo ni-kuh.
47011033	Mt wabshaba an ni-thai washomi ch ed k ab i ni-huduni hothai kolhai amjed. Nt hab hi wa al masma ni-tho'ibia.
47012001	Pi at ha'ichu wo ni-ap'et manis wo em-ahgi hegai mani haschu am hab junihim. Heg ant wo wa'i em-ahgi mat haschu g Jiosh am ni-chehgi.
47012002	Heg at am uhgk i ni-bei e-kihthag wui an thahm kahchim ch ed. Ith at hab e juh gamai gi'ik a'ahithag wehgaj. Pi ani hi wa mahch manis s-wohom an jiwia, aha nat hegai ni-thoakag an jiwia. Heg o wa'i Jiosh s-mahch ihtha. Heg ani hi wa s-mahch mant an i ni-nei Jiosh kihthag ed.
47012004	An ant s-ta kakaim ha'ichu kah. K g Jiosh pi ni-hiwgith manis am wo ah.
47012005	Ith ant ab wo si has ah mat g Jiosh am ni-chehgi k pi ahni ab hu hejel has wo ni-ah. Jiosh o ab ni-chehgithch g e-gewkthag nani pi d wabsh sho'ig pi gewkam hemajkam.
47012006	Kuni mu'i ha'ichu hab wua heg hekaj gewkthaj ch wabshaba pi em-ahgith nani pi pi tatchua mas hedai ab hu wo si has ni-elithath heg hekaj. Heg amt wa'i hekaj ab wo si has ni-elithath mam haschu i neith mani hab wua ch haschu i kah mani hab kaij.
47012007	Pi o hab mahs manis wo si ni-ha'ichuchuthath heg hekaj mo haschu am ni-chehgith g Jiosh. K g t-kownalig Jesus hiwgith g Jiawul mat wo i ni-mumkichuth k wo ni-kudutath mant pi ab hu wo si ni-ha'ichuchuthath.
47012008	Waikko ant ab chum si ni-ho'ige'ithahu Jesus wui ab tahnich mat gm hu hab wo i juh ihtha ni-mumkithag.
47012009	Kut hab masma i nodagi g e-ne'oki, “Ba'ich at i s-ap wo e chehgi g ni-gewkthag ab m-ab mapt wabsh s-ap wo nakogath g e-sho'igthag napt pi pi wo e nako maps hejel wo nako. Heg wa'i ni-gewkthagkaj apt wo e nako.” Neh, kuni heg hekaj si s-hehgig ch wabsh s-ap ni-tahtk mani d wabsh si sho'ig pi gewkam hemajkam nant pi hab masma wo taht g Christ gewkthag.
47012010	Heg o am chehgithch g e-gewkthag am ni-wehhejed mani hekith i mukialig. Kuni heg hekaj wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk mani mukialig ch ab nakog g s-ko'ok has ahgadag ch s-wehch ha'ichu ch sho'igchuthadag ch kudutadag wehhejed g Christ.
47012011	Ab o em-ab mamt ni-wehhejed wo neneokath ab ha wui hegam mash has ni-ahg am em-shahgith. Msh wabshaba pi hab e wua. Kunt hemho wa am ni-wehhejed has wo chei, chum anis pi hohho'ith manis hab wo ni-juh nani pi d wabsh pi ha'ichu. K wabshaba g t-kownalig Jesus ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag am ni-kehshch. Pegih, m haschu ahgch ba'ich ab has i ha elith hegam mash wabsh em-iattogith.
47012012	Bani wa junihim g s-hasig ha'ichu ch mu'i ha'ichu ab nakog mani wa eda am ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga em-wui. K ith am chehgithch mani d Christ kehsha.
47012013	S-ap ani hab ni-junihim ab em-wui hab wa masma mani ab wehs ha wui hegam mo an a'ai d Christ ihmtham, heg hi wa mani pi em-hiwgith mams ab wo ha'ichu ni-namkith. Ab g wabsh wo s-ni-ho'ige'ith mani pi em-hiwgith.
47012014	Ith o d i waikkokam mant am wo i em-chehgim. Kunt pi ha'ichu ab hu wo em-tai nani pi ahpim ab em-tatchua ch pi g em-lialiga. Bam sha masma mam d chu'uchum ni-a'aliga namt pi hemu ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga ab amjed g Christ k hekaj bei g wechij thoakag. K hab chum mahs mat g jehj wo ha thagio'ithath g chu'uchum e-a'aliga ch pi hab mahs mas g chu'uchum a'ai wo ha thagio'ithath g e-jehj.
47012015	Am o wa s-ap'e mant am wo hugio g ha'ichu ni-eniga ch ni-thoakag em-wehhejed. Ab ani ba'ich i si pihk ni-elith em-wui mo g jehj ab e-a'aliga ha wui. Kumt heg hekaj ab wo chum si ni-tatchuath.
47012016	S-mahch am mani pi ha'ichukaj sha'i em-wechun. Kumsh eda ha'i hab kaij manish wabsh em-iattogith
47012017	ch ui g em-lialiga hejel ni-wehhejed. Pi o woho ihtha. Am ant ha cheha hegam Titus mat am wo hihim k wo i hemapai g lial g sho'igkam ha wehhejed.
47012018	K hegam wabsh s-ap ha'ichu hab elith ch am hab e junihim mani ahni has i masma.
47012019	Na'ams ha'i hab ni-elith mani gm hu wabsh chum ni-oan ith hekaj mani wa hab kaij. K eda pi hab chu'ig. Am ani Jiosh tahgio hab kaij hegai mo d Christ tatchui. K wehs hegai mach haschu hab i junihim d i em-wehmtadag.
47012020	S-gihug ani mant wo cheh am jiwiak mamt gawul wo masmak mani hab masma chum em-tatchuith. Mt ahpim hab wa'ap wo cheh mant ahni gawul wo masmak mam has i chum ni-tatchuith. Ntp hems wo cheh mam ha'i wabsh kia e kawani ch ha'i s-e hehgamk ch ha'i pi babmuistk ch s-chu tha'a ch s-ko'okam has e ahg ch chum si e haschuth ch a'ai e cheggia.
47012021	T heg wo ni-mah g si edathag am Jiosh tahgio. Kunt wo shoakath mamtki koi gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k pi ap e nuhkuth ch ha ehsith g ha-wehm kihkam ch s-tohntom has e wua ch g pi ap'ekam tatchua.
47013001	Neh, s-ko'okam ant ab wo ha namkith g pi ap chu'ijkam am i ep em-chehgimedk. K wabshaba an o'ohadag: Bat wa'i masma wo e wohokamch g ha-chu'ichig mamt gohk o waikajj am wo ah mam neith mat pi ap chu'i.
47013002	Pi at hedai wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag matp pi wo thagito g pi ap e-chu'ichig. Ith ani heki hu em-ahgith mant wa am ep jiwia.
47013003	Mt haha wo s-ap s-mai mo neok g Christ gahi ni-wuhshanim. Heg at s-gewkam am wo i em-chikpan k am wo chehgi g e-gewkthag em-shahgith.
47013004	Woho o wa mat e wepogi g sho'ig pi gewpkam o'othham k ab e muhkith kots t ab. T wabshaba g Jiosh am chehgi g e-gewkthag. K g Christ hahawa ep thoakam heg gewkthagkaj. Kunt ahni am i s-mai mani pi ha gewkthag ab i gehshk Christ wui. K wabshaba g Jiosh ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag gahi wuhshanim g Christ mant hekaj s-ap am wo i em-chikp.
47013005	Am g wo si e mamche k am hejel wo i e a'amich mams am hi wa s-ap hab chu'ig e-wohochuthadag oithch. Mt wo wa chum s-ap s-mahchk mam ab u'ukch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mamtp woho d wohochuththam
47013006	k hab wa masma wo s-mahchk mani ahni hab wa'ap woho d wohochuththam.
47013007	Ab ani si ni-ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui mamt pi am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ch wabshaba g s-ap'ekam am hab wo junihith, chum as wo pi ap ni-ahgath hegam mo s-ni-keh'ith.
47013008	Pi att wo t-nako matt wo shohbi g wohokam. Hemho wa att am wo wohokamch.
47013009	Tt wo s-ap t-taht k ab wabsh wo i t-sho'igch mamtp ahpim wo i gewpka am e-wohochuthadag ed. Ab ach si t-ho'ige'ithahun mamt wehs ab wo i e thagito k am s-ap wo i e nahto.
47013010	T-kownalig Jesus o ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag mant wo shohbi g pi em-ap'ekam. Kunt am i em-o'ohani mamt hekaj am wo i ap'ech mant eda koi jiwia. Nt hab pi wo em-keh'el am jiwiak. Tho Jiosh hab elitha mant am wo i em-gewkemhu. Kuni hab pi em keh'ithamk.
47013011	Pegih, ni-wepnag, ha'as ant hab wo chei. Am g wo i e nakogi mamt wehs ab wo i e thagito Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui. T heg wehs wo i em-ap'ech. Ab g wo i s-wohog elithath g t-mashchamadag ch ab wo i hemakoch g e-wohochuthadag k wo s-ap e tahtk ch e wehm kihkath. T g Jiosh wo em-wehmajk ch wo em-mah g pihk elithadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
47013012	Ab g a'ai wo si e tatchuath. Ihtham t-wepnag mo ia kih ash s-em-ho'ige'ith.
47013013	Ab o si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. K g Jiosh ab si em-tatchua. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab em-makiog g gewkthag mamt ab a'ai e wui wo si s-ap e tahtkkath. Neh, ith ant hab wo wa'i chei.
48001001	Ni-wepnag mam am kih Galasia jewed ch ed: Am ant wo i em-o'ohani ahni Paul mat g Jesus Christ am i ni-kei g e-ohg Jiosh wehm.
48001002	K ia ha'i i ni-wehmt g t-wepnag ch ab s-em-ho'ige'ith.
48001003	Ab o wa s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
48001004	Jesus Christ at ab s-wohog el g e-ohg k e sho'igchuth k ab muh kots t ab mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichigk ab wo i t-wuwhas ab amjed g pi t-ap'ethag. T g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig amjed.
48001005	Pegih, tt heg hekaj ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh.
48001006	Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g e-ho'ige'ithadag am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag. Kunt si ni-toths mamtsh s-hohtam thagito g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj k ab s-wohoch g gawul ha'ichu ahga.
48001007	K heg pi d sha'i tho'ibiathag ahga. Hegai wa'i Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o d tho'ibiathag ahga. K eda ha'i hemajkam gawul ha'ichu am chum em-ahgith ch heg hekaj ab i chum em-ga'agwulkath ab amjed g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
48001008	T wabshaba g Jiosh am wo ha lothait k s-ko'okam wo ha namkith. Neh, mantp hems ahni o chum hems g anghil gawul ha'ichu wo em-ahgi, t g Jiosh hab wa masma wo t-lothait k s-ko'okam wo t-namkith. Heki am hu ab kaiham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch am wa chum s-mahch mo has chu'ig.
48001010	Tp hems pi wo hohho'i g hemajkam mani has kaij. Ni eda pi hab ahgch hab kaij mas g hemajkam wo s-hohho'i. Jiosh o s-hohho'ith mani ahgachug g ha'ichu ahgaj. Thani Jiosh alithag pionag. K hab chum chu'ig mant heg ab wo s-wohog elithath, chum as has wo ni-el g hemajkam.
48001011	Mt wo chum s-mahchk mo pi ab hu d hemajkam ha amjedkam ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mani am em-ahgith.
48001012	Pi at hedai o'othham ni-ahgi o ab ni-mashcha. Tho Jiosh alithag mat ab mahsko wua ni-wui.
48001013	Thani Tuhligo. Kumki heki hu kah mani wa hab masma ab ihm g Jiosh mo g ni-wehm o'othham ch si ha sho'igchuth hegam mo ab ihm g Jesus ch am chum s-keshwuimk g ha-hehemaptha.
48001014	Thani wa si s-has ha'ichu am t-himthag ed mu'i ha ba'iwechkim g ni-wepo ge'edam nanid pi ba'ich i s-gewkam oith g t-himthag.
48001015	T wabshaba g Jiosh s-ni-ho'ige'ith k am heki hu i ap'ech mant eda koi mahsi mant d wo piongajk.
48001016	T am hebai i cheka. T am hahawa mahsko wua g e-alithag ab ni-wui mant wo ahgachugath g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab em-wui ahpim go'ol hemajkam. Kunt pi hedai i wui hih mas wo ni-tashogi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
48001017	Ab o thadha g Jesus Christ chuhchai Jerusalem kihhim t ab am Judea jewed ch ed ch am ahgachug g ha'ichu ahgaj. Nt wabshaba pi am hu sha'i hih manis hekaj wo ha neith k wo ha wehm neo. Im ant hu hab wabsh hih Arabia jewed wui k am hahawa ep uhpam hih Damascus kihhim wui.
48001018	Am o d i waik a'ahithag thahm, nt am hih Jerusalem wui k ab ha'ichu wo kakke g Peter k am wehmaj thakahim gohk thomig ab.
48001019	M ant wa'i hemako ep nei g Jesus kehsha. K heg d James ch d wehngaj g Jesus.
48001020	Jiosh o s-mahch mo d wohokam ihtha mani em-ahgith.
48001021	Am i thahm, mant am hahawa ep hih Syria jewed wui ch Cilicia jewed wui.
48001022	K eda pi ni-mahch hegam mo ab ihm g Jesus ch am kih Judea jewed ch ed.
48001023	Ihtham wabsh kah mo ha'i hab kaij, “Hegai mo wa t-sho'igchuth o am hahawa ahgachug ihtha Jesus ha'ichu ahga mo wa heki hu chum s-keshwuimk.”
48001024	Neh, bash kaij ch ab si ihm g Jiosh am i kaiok mat am gawul i ni-juh.
48002001	Am him k am d i wehst-mahm a'ahithag, nt am hih Jerusalem wui wehmaj g Barnabas. Tt am hema i bei g gawul mahs o'othham. K ith hab chehgig Titus.
48002002	Jiosh o wa ab ni-chehgith mant am wo him k wo ha nei hegam mo am d ha wanimedtham g Jesus ihmtham. Kutt am ha wehm t-nam. Ni am ha ahgith mani haschu i ahgachug am ha-shahgith g gawul mahs hemajkam nani pi s-gihug matp hems ha'i wo padch g ni-chikpan.
48002003	K am ha'i ha'ichug hegam mo chum s-em-wupulshpamk ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam hab em-elithch mant hemho wa am hab wo junihith g heki hu t-himthag ahchim Tutuligo. Ihtham o pi woho wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus ch wabsh am thadhak ch chum mamche machs haschukaj pi am hu oithch hab junihim hegai heki hu t-himthag. Am o t-wehmaj g Titus. K ihtham ab si t-ahgith matt hemho wo wa pahl hikuch. Kuch wabshaba ab ha wui gegok. K hegam mo am d ha wanimedtham t-wepo hab elith. Neh, bach wa masma s-ap nuhkuth ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mach am em-wui ahgachug.
48002006	Tho wabsh ni-wehm wohochuththam hegam mo am d ha wanimedtham ch pi ha'ichu wechij ab hu ni-ahgith. Pi ani si has ha elith. Wehsijj ach t-wepo d haha'ichu am Jiosh tahgio.
48002007	K hegam hab kaij matki g Jiosh am hab wa'ap i ni-kei hab masma mat am i kei g Peter. Heg o d kehshaj ch am ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ha wui g Tutuligo. Ni ahni hab wa'ap d kehshaj ch am ahgachug ha wui g gawul mahs hemajkam. K g Jiosh wepo ab t-mahkch g gewkthag.
48002009	Bamki ha elith hegam James ch Peter ch John mo d ha wanimedtham. T ihtham am wohokamch mat g Jiosh ab ni-mah ihtha chikpan k t-nowi-bebhe. Kutt am i t-ap'ech ab t-wui mat hegam am wo ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga Tutuligo hemajkam ha wui. Nt ahni hi g Barnabas wehm gawul mahs hemajkam ha wui wo ahgachugath.
48002010	K hegam hab t-ahg matt wo i ha wehmajk hegam mo d sho'igkam am ha shahgith. Am ani wa heki hu hab junihim ch hekaj si chikpan.
48002011	Am ani wa kih Antiok kihhim t am ch am ha ahgith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. T am jiwia g Peter k am ha wehm oimmed hegam go'ol hemajkam mat ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. T am hahawa ha'i t-wui thatha g Tutuligo ab amjed g James. K heg i thahm g Peter pi an hu ha wehm oimmed g go'ol hemajkam ch pi ha wehm e gegosith no pi s-ehbith mat has wo chei hegam Tutuligo.
48002013	K hegam ehp mo hab wa'ap d Tutuligo hab wa'ap e wua mo g Peter, chum wa hems g Barnabas.
48002014	Ni am ha neith mo pi am hu sha'i ap hab junihim g e-wohochuthadag ch hab kaij ab wui g Peter am ha kaichuthch, “Neh, Peter, thap Tuhligo ch wabshaba hahawa pi am hu hab junihim hegai t-himthag mo wa g Jiosh ab t-chehani. Pegih, p haschu ahgch hab e elith mapt pi wo ha hajunimak g go'ol hemajkam, t ho'ip am hab i junihi g t-chehanig?”
48002015	Ahchim Tutuligo ach wa hab chum t-elith mach pi hab masma pi ap'e mo g go'ol hemajkam.
48002016	T wabshaba am i t-chehgi g Jiosh mat pi hedai wo e nako mas am tahgio hejel wo i e ap'ech am hab junihithch g chehanig. Bo d elithaj matt ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k ab wo i hiwigi g Jesus Christ. T heg am tahgio wo i t-ap'ech. Pegih, tt heg am hab wa'i juh k am i t-ap'ech.
48002017	Am att i s-mai mach d pi ap chu'ijkam am i s-mahchk ab amjed g Christ. Pi at heg hab t-juh machs d pi ap chu'ijkam
48002018	k wabshaba am i t-ap'ech Jiosh tahgio. Kutt d wo pi ap chu'ijkamk mattp wo chum s-t-apchutham g chehanigkaj.
48002019	Chehanig o s-hasig. Kutt pi wo t-nako machs am oithk hab wo t-junihith ch am wo i t-ap'ech. Nt heg hekaj am i ni-thagito Jiosh wui mat am wo i ni-ap'ech k am hahawa d wo thoakamk wehhejed.
48002020	Jiosh alithag o ab si pihk e elith t-hekaj ch ab nako g s-ko'ok muhkig ab kots t ab am t-wehhejed mat heg hekaj ab wo i t-mah g wechij thoakag. Kuch heg hekaj ab hiwig ch d thothakam am nenaj ed ch am wehhejed.
48002021	T wabsh wo e nahnkogi g Christ muhkig matp g o'othham wo e nako mas wo s-ap'ek am Jiosh nena ed heg wabsh hekaj mo hab junihim g chehanigaj. K wabshaba pi hab chu'ig. Ab o t-wui him g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag heg hekaj Christ muhkig. Kutt pi wo thagito g ho'ige'ithadaj ab hiwigch g Christ.
48003001	Heki am hu kah mat ab muh g Jesus Christ kots t ab am em-wehhejed. Kum d pi ha'ichu a'amichuththam mamt ab wo ha kaihamath hegam mo em-iattogith ch hab kaij mamt hab wo junihith g t-chehanig ahchim Tutuligo.
48003002	Ab amt i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. T g Jiosh ab em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
48003003	Kut heg s-ap i shonwuich g em-wechij thoakag. Pegih, m haschu ahgch hahawa pi hiwig mat ba'ich wo i himath g em-thoakag. Pi amt wo e nako mamt s-ap wo nahto g e-thoakag g hejel e-gewkthagkaj.
48003004	Mu'i am ha'ichukaj e sho'igchuth am wehhejed g Jiosh alithag. T g em-sho'igthag wo e nahnkogi mamt wo sha thagito g Jiosh alithag.
48003005	Ab amt si i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. T heg hekaj ab em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wo em-wehmajk k hab ep wua g s-hasig ha'ichu am em-shahgith. Pi at hab ahgk hab e juh ihtha mams am hab si junihim g Tutuligo ha-chehanig.
48003006	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Abrahambad at ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh. K g Jiosh heg hekaj hab masma ab neith mo s-ap'e.
48003007	Kum ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam mam ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ba'ich i wepo masma mo g Abrahambad ki hegam mo d si amjedkamaj ch pi ab hu wohochuth. Heg o wa wepo mam ahpim d Abrahambad amjedkam.
48003008	Kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam o heki hu s-mahch ch an o'oha mat g Jiosh am hab wo ha juh g go'ol hemajkam mat ab wo i s-wohochuth k wo i e ap'ech am tahgio. Kush hab kaij g Jiosh am wui g Abrahambad: Nt wo s-ha ho'ige'el wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam matp hedam ab wo i s-ni-wohoch hab masma mant ahpi hab m-juh.
48003009	Pegih, t wa woho ab wo bei g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag hegam matp hedai ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh hab masma mat g Abrahambad hab e juh.
48003010	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Matp hedai pi am hu wehs oithch hab wo e junihith g Jiosh chehanig ch heg amjed wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. K hab mahs mat pi hedai wo sha'i e nako mas wehs oithch hab wo e junihith. T heg hekaj wehsijj wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.
48003011	K wabshaba an o'ohanas: Jiosh at am wehs wo i ha ap'ech hegam mat ab wo i s-wohochuth k ab wo i hiw. T ihtham wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. K heg hekaj tasho mat pi hedai wo i e ap'ech am chehanig oithch hab e junihithch.
48003012	Pi am ab hu hiwig g Jiosh mamtp wabsh hejel wo s-e apchutham. An o o'ohanas matt hemho wa wehs oithch hab wo t-junihith g Jiosh chehanig ch hab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
48003013	Kuch wabshaba wehsijj d pi ap chu'ijkam. K ab t-wui him g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag. T g Christ ab bei t-wehhejed gm hu i e gawulkathk ab amjed g Jiosh no pi an o'ohanas: Gm at hu i e gawulkai ab amjed g Jiosh matp hedai ab e naggia uhs t ab.
48003014	Ith at hab t-juni g Christ. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab wo t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mattp hedai ab wo i s-wohochuth k ab wo i hiw. Ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam amt hab wa'ap masma wo bei hegai mash wa g Jiosh am ahgith g Abrahambad mat ab wo t-mah.
48003015	Tho t-himthag matp ha'i ha'ichu ab a'ai wo e ah'ath, t pi hedai wo e nako mas am hejel gawul wo juh.
48003016	Pegih, k ab si ah'ath g Jiosh g Abrahambad mat wo ha tho'ibia g nahnko mahs hemajkam am hema gahi wuhshanim g Abrahambad amjedkam. Kuki heg hab ahg Christ.
48003017	Kut pi sha'i gawul juh g ha'ichu e-ahga g Jiosh mat hekith ab i t-mah ahchim Tutuligo g t-chehanig mo ithani d wa'i gi'ik siant waikko wehst-mahm (430) ahithag amjed.
48003018	Jiosh at wo ha tho'ibia g hemajkam hab masma mat tho'ibia g Abrahambad mat wa hab masma ab ha ah'ath ha'ichu. Ith at wo em-tho'ibia mamtp ab wo i s-wohoch, k pi hegai chehanig.
48003019	K wabshaba am wa ha'ichu wehhejed s-ap'e hegai chehanig. Heg o hekaj tasho mo haschu d pi ap'ekam. K hab d elithaj g Jiosh matt an wo u'ukchith ihtha chehanig am hugkam mat in wo i wuhsh g alithaj. Am ash ha ahgith g Jiosh g chehanig am gahi wuhshanim g anghil.
48003020	Kush hema g o'othham am ha wehhejed neok g Jiosh ch hemajkam matsh eda am i ap'ech hegai chehanig. Sh wa eda g Jiosh si hejel am ahgith g Abrahambad g ha'ichu e-ah'atha.
48003021	Pi o ab hu wui kehk g Jiosh ha'ichu ah'atha g chehanigaj. Mattp wo sha t-nako machs wehs oithch am hab wo t-junihith g Jiosh chehanig, t wabsh wo t-hiwigi g Jiosh matt heg hekaj wo t-tho'ibia. K wabshaba pi hab sha'i mahs. Heg at hekaj wo t-tho'ibia g Jiosh mo has i masma ab ha'ichu t-ah'ath.
48003022	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mo wehs hemajkam d pi ap chu'ijkam ch pi wo sha'i e nako mas hejel wo e tho'ibia. T heg hekaj wo ha tho'ibia g Jiosh k ab wo i ha mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hegam mat ab wo hiwgath g alithaj.
48003023	An o wabsh t-shohbithch g Jiosh g e-chehanigkaj am hugkam mat ab i t-chehgi matt ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k wo t-tho'ibia.
48003024	T-mashchamahim o g e-chehanigkaj matt has wo chum masmak ch ab wo ai matt ab wo i hiw g alithaj. Kut heg am wo i t-ap'ech Jiosh tahgio mattp ab hiwig.
48003025	K hahawa pi d ihtha chehanig ch wabshaba d Jiosh alithag mo ab i t-chehgithch matt has wo chum masmak.
48003026	E amt pahl wapko mamt am wo e chehgi mamt ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k ab bei g alithaj. Kum d hahawa a'aligaj g Jiosh ch hab wo masmak mo g si alithaj.
48003028	K g Jiosh wehs t-wepo masma t-neith ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth. Ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam am t-wepo d ha'ichu ahchim Tutuligo am Jiosh tahgio. K g nenehol t-wepo d ha'ichu ahchim mach pi d nenehol. K g u'uwi t-wepo d ha'ichu ahchim chechoj. Wehsijj ach ab i t-hemakochuth ahchim mach an u'ukch g Jesus Christ.
48003029	Kuch d hemajkamgaj ch heg hekaj hab wa'i masma mach d amjedkamaj g Abrahambad ch wo bei hegai mat haschu g Jiosh am i ap'ech wehhejed.
48004001	Chum as wehs d wo enigajk g ali g ohgaj ha'ichu eniga, t eda pi wo bei t ho'ip am i ge'etha.
48004002	Mt wo nuhkuthath g ali ch ep wo nuhkuthath hegai mat haschu d wo enigajk am hugkam mat wo ai g e-ge'elig.
48004003	Kuch wa ahchim hab wa masma mo g a'al nat pi g Jiosh kei g e-chehanig mat hekaj wo t-nuhkuth am hugkam matt ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj.
48004004	T am i s-ap e ai, t g Jiosh ab i ah'ath g e-alithag. Kut ab mahsi k wepo e juh g hemajkam k am i ge'elhim k am hab junihim hegai chehanig mo g Jiosh ab ha mahkch g Tutuligo.
48004005	Ab ach wa t-abchuth g t-chu'ichig ab chehanig wecho. Kut ia jiwia g Jiosh alithag jewed thahm mat wo t-tho'ibia am t-wehhejed nakogk g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag matt d haha wo a'aligajk g Jiosh.
48004006	T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wo t-wehmajk. Kuch hab d a'aligaj ch ab ihm ch hab kaij, “Jiosh t-ohg” .
48004007	nach pi hahawa pi d wabsh piongaj. T ab wo i t-mah g Jiosh mat haschu i ap'ech am t-wehhejed mach d a'aligaj.
48004008	Heki am hu pi mahch g Jiosh ahpim go'ol hemajkam ch ab ha'ichu e jijoshchuth ch ab ha ihm mo eda pi d sha'i hegai thoakam Jiosh.
48004009	Pegih, m haschu ahgch am uhpam ha wui ep s-hihimimk mamt d ep wo ha-neneholigak hemu mam eda am wa chum s-mahch g Jiosh. Pi at wo e nako hegam mas am wo i em-wehmajk.
48004010	Kum haschu ahgch si has elith g ha'ichu tash mo hekith i e a'ahe ch am hab wua g piast. Pi amt heg hekaj wo i e ap'ech am Jiosh nena ed.
48004011	Si ani s-em-gihug ch am em-chegito mamt hu wo i s-chegitok hegai s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mani wa am em-ahgith.
48004012	Am g hab wo masmak mani ahni nani pi hahawa pi ab hu wecho g heki hu t-chehanig.
48004013	S-mahch am mo wa ha'ichu pi ni-ap'e mant wa am jiwia k am em-ahgith ab amjed g Jiosh alithag.
48004014	M wa eda pi sha'i s-ni-tamhog ch ab i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k i ni-wahkith k am ni-nuhkuth heg wa wepo mantp d hema anghil o d Jiosh alithag.
48004015	Ab o wa si ge'ej g pihk em-elithadag mamtsh chum hems g e-wuhpui wo ni-mah heg hekaj pi ni-ap'ethag.
48004016	Kut haschu has e juh mam heg amjed hab ni-elith manis s-em-keh'ith ahni mani am chum em-ahgith g wohokam?
48004017	Hegam mo hab chum em-elith mamt am oithk hab wo e junihith g chehanig ch hekaj am wo i e ap'ech Jiosh tahgio o hab wabsh e wua mo ab em-tatchua ch wabshaba em-iattogith no pi gm hu hab i s-em-junimk ab ni-amjed mamt ab wo si ha ha'ichuchuthath.
48004018	M o wa s-ap'e mat ab hema wo em-tatchuath ha'ichu s-ap'ekam wehhejed. Bani wa ni-tahtk chum anis pi am hu em-wehmaj. K wabshaba ihtham em-tatchua g ha'ichu pi ap'ekam wehhejed.
48004019	Am am wa s-mahch mo g je'e mu'i ha'ichu nakog g e-a'aliga ha wehhejed ch ab a'ahe mat wo ha ge'ege'el. Pegih, ni ahni hab wa masma mu'i ha'ichu nakog am em-wehhejed mant ab wo em-ahijithaj mamt hab wo masmak mo g Jiosh alithag.
48004020	Mant hu am wo i em-wehmajk hemu ch wo em-wehm a'aga ihtha ha'ichu nani pi s-em-gihug.
48004021	M haschu ahgch hab chum e elith mamt am wo i e ap'ech Jiosh tahgio am oithch hab e junihithch g chehanig? Pi amt wo sha'i e nako mamt am hejel wo i e ap'ech.
48004022	Ith ant am wo em-tashogi ab amjed g Jiosh heki hu o'ohana. An o hab chu'ig mash gohk a'alithag g Abrahambad. Hema ash d madaj g Hagarbad ch hema d Sarabad mad ch hab chehgig Isaac. Sarabad ash d Abrahambad hohnig. Kush g Hagarbad d ha-neholiga.
48004023	Pi atsh koi bei g e-mad d Sarabad k eda heki hu okst. Sh wabshaba g Jiosh am ha ahgith mat wo ge madt. Kush ihtha madaj d ha-aliga. Sh wabshaba g Hagarbad mad d ha-neholiga hab masma mo g je'ej.
48004024	Sarabad ani wepogith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Ch ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth wepogithas g Sarabad mad nach pi woho d a'aligaj g Jiosh. Hagarbad ani wepogith hegai chehanig mat ab e mah Sinai tho'ag t ab am Arabia jewed ch ed. Wehs hegam mo chum s-e apchuthamk am oithch hab e wuathch g chehanig o wepogithas hegai mo d nehol mad no pi pi woho d Jiosh a'aliga. Mu'ijj o hab wa chum e wua g ni-wehm Tutuligo ch hab an e u'ukch hab masma mo g nehol. Ab Jerusalem t ab am ab si hiwig g chehanig. K wabshaba an t-thahm hab chu'ig g wechij Jerusalem. Kuch heg wui t-gewpkathch wehsijj ahchim matt ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh k am tahgio i t-ap'ech.
48004027	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mash hab kaij g Jiosh: Si g s-hehgigk ahpi uwi mapt pi hekith sha'i madt napt pi ba'ich i mu'i wo a'aligak mo hi hegai mat heki hu madt.
48004028	Pegih neh, Isaacbad ash d si ha-aliga hab masma mash am ha ahgith g Jiosh. Ch ahchim hab wa masma d a'aligaj g Jiosh.
48004029	Heg ash wa sho'igchuth g Isaacbad mash pi d si ha-aliga. K hemuch hab wa'ap t-sho'igchuth hegam mo pi d a'aligaj g Jiosh.
48004030	An o o'ohadag mash hab kaij g Jiosh ab Abrahambad wui: Gam g hu i ha wuwhasith ihtham e-neneholiga. Pi at wo enigak g m-eniga am wehmaj hegai mo d madaj g m-hohnig.
48004031	Pegih neh, ni-wepnag, pi ach hab masma mo g ha-neholiga mad ch wabshaba hab masma mo g si ha-aliga
48005001	T-tho'ibia at g Christ. S-wihnam g an wo u'ukchith g e tho'ibiathag ch pi ab hu ep wo chum i hiw g chehanig mams hekaj wo e tho'ibia.
48005002	Mamt wo sha e pahl hikuch hab elithch mamt hekaj wo e tho'ibia am oithch hab e junihithch g chehanig, k d si shel mamtki wabsh thagito g e-wohochuthadag k pi wo e tho'ibia.
48005003	Nam woho hab e elith mamt am wo i e ap'ech Jiosh tahgio g pahl hikuchkakaj? Nt wo em-ahgi mamt hemho wa am wehs oithk hab wo e juh g chehanig mamtp heg hekaj am wo i chum e ap'ech.
48005004	Am o s-em-apchuthamk g Christ. Mt wabshaba gm hu hab wo i juh mamtp hejel chum s-e apchuthamk am oithch hab e wuathch g chehanig.
48005005	Ab o t-mahkch g gewkthag g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kuch hekaj ab wui t-gewpkathch mat g Jiosh s-ap am wo i t-ap'ech e tahgio.
48005006	Pi o hi wa has chu'ig matp hema heki hu wo e pahl hikuch o pi wo e pahl hikuch. Tho wa'i ihtha mamt ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wo chehgithch g si pihk e-elithadag am i ha wehmajch.
48005007	S-ap am wa chum s-wohochuth g wohokam. Tsh wabshaba am ha'i thatha em-wui k im hu hab i chum em-wanchshulig.
48005008	Pi o d Jiosh mo im hu hab i em-wanchshulig ab amjed g wohokam.
48005009	Bamtp elith mo d wabsh al chum ha'ichu ihtha. T eda wehs wo padch g em-wohochuthadag ch em-thoakag hab masma mat g jewajithakud wehs wo jewaj g wahga.
48005010	Bani em-elith mam d wabsh kia ni-wehm wohochuththam ch pi gm hu wo i e nohnogi ab amjed g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag. T g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mo hedai im hu hab i chum em-wanchshulig.
48005011	Ha'i o hab kaij mani ahni ahgachug mamt am hab wo junihith g t-chehanig ch hekaj wo s-ap'ek am Jiosh nena ed. T wabshaba pi wo chum ni-mu'am g ni-wehm o'othham mantp heg wo ahgachugath. Heg o hekaj s-ni-mu'amk mani ahgachug mat g Jiosh alithag ab muh kots t ab mat hekaj am wo i t-ap'ech Jiosh nena ed.
48005012	Mat hu wo i em-thagito hegam mo hab em-elith mamt wo e-pahl hikuchk k hekaj wo s-ap'ek am Jiosh nena ed.
48005013	Pi at hab ahgk ab i em-wai g Jiosh mat gd hu wabsh wo i si em-thagsh heg hekaj e-chehanig k wabshaba hab ahgk mamt d wo a'aligajk. Pegih, mt heg hekaj ab wo si pihk e elithath ab a'ai e wui ch pi wabsh g hejel e-tatchui hab wo junihith.
48005014	Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana: Si g wo pihk e elith wehs ha hekaj hab masma mam hejel si pihk e elith. Kumtp hab wo wuath ihtha ch heg wo wa wepok mam wehs oithk hab e wua g chehanig.
48005015	S-e g wo nen'oithk mamt pi a'ai wo s-e keh'ithath namt pi hab wa masma wo padch g e-nawojthag k a'ai wo e padch.
48005016	Pi o wepo chu'ig g o'othham tatchui ch Jiosh tatchui. Kumt ab wo e thagitokchith Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui. T heg ab wo em-shohbithath ch wo i em-wanimedath. Mt hab pi hab wo junihith g hejel pi ap e-tatchui.
48005018	Pi at ab hu ha'ichu wo em-chu'ichigch g chehanig mamtp woho am wo i e thagitokchith Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui.
48005019	M o tasho g wabsh o'othham tatchui. Hegam mo hab wua g hejel e-tatchui atp hems wo'iwup hema i wehm mo pi d ha-wehm kihkam o hab wua g nahnko mahs s-uam ha'ichu.
48005020	Hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh o gawul ha'ichu chum jioshchuth o ha'i atp hems ha hihoin o atp hems a'ai e cheggia o a'ai s-e hehgamk o babgat o nahnko ha ahg o s-chu tha'athag o a'ai e ga'agwulkath.
48005021	o s-behimk g ha'ichu ha-eniga o nawkko'o o s-tohntom has e wua. Hegam mo hab masma ha'ichu hab wua at pi am hu wo i wahp Jiosh kihthag ed.
48005022	Kuch wabshaba pi hab mahs ahchim mo am t-eda ulinig g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Heg o am chikpan g t-thoakag. Kuch hab si pihk t-elith ha hekaj ch si s-ap t-tahtk ch ab wabsh i s-thotholima ch s-t-tahtk ch nenida mo haschu g Jiosh ap'echuthch t-wehhejed ch s-ha ho'ige'ith g hemajkam ch s-ap'e ch s-hemajima ch wabsh si t-shohbithch ch am hab wo juh mach has i kaij. Pi o an hu sha'i shohbithch g chehanig hegai hab mahs ha'ichu.
