48005024	Ahchim mach d Christ hemajkamga att hab i t-ah matt pi am hu hab wo junihith g hejel t-tatchui.
48005025	Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at ab i t-mah g wechij thoakag. Tt heg hekaj ab wui wo t-thagitokchith mat s-ap wo t-wanimedath.
48005026	Pi att wo ge t-haschuthath ch pi a'ai wo t-kudutath ch pi wo chu hehgamk.
48006001	Matp hema pi ap ha'ichu hab wo juh g em-wehm wohochuththam, mt am wo i gewkemhu mat am wo i e ap'ech ahpim mam am e thagitokch Jiosh wui. Kumt wabshaba wo e sho'igchuth k si s-hemajim am hab wo juh ihtha heg hekaj mamtp hems hema ahpim haha wabsh pi ap ha'ichu hab wo juh.
48006002	Nam hig woho am oithch hab s-e junimk g chehanig? Pegih, k ab t-chehani g Jiosh alithag matt am a'ai wo i t-wehmajk.
48006003	Pi g am wo chum si e ha'ichuchuth. Thach wabsh sho'igkam ch wabsh hejel wo t-iattogi mattp ab wo chum si t-ha'ichuch.
48006004	Pi att hab wo chei machs ba'ich i s-ap hab wua g t-chikpan mo hema ehp. Tho wabsh hehe'ejel t-chikpan hegai mach hab wua. Kutt heg wo wa'i a'appe hejel t-chikpan k wo si s-ap t-taht mattp s-ap hab wo wuath.
48006006	K ab em-ab mamt ab ha'ichu wo ha mah hegam mo am em-mashcham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mamt hekaj am epai wo i ha wehmt.
48006007	Pi amt wo e nako mamt wo iattogi g Jiosh. Hejel am e iattogith mamtp hab elith mat pi wo em-namkith g Jiosh heg hekaj mam haschu hab i junihim. Nat hig pi wo ui g eshtham hegai hab mahs kai mat haschu wo ei? Pegih, k hab wa masma am t-thoakag wehhejed.
48006008	Mt wo s-ko'okam e namkith am i muhk mamtp hab wo sha juh g hejel e-tatchui k wabshaba chum hekith an wehmaj wo kihkath g Jiosh mamtp wo e thagito Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui k hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui.
48006009	Pi g sha'i ha'asa hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. Jiosh o am wa ap'echuthch g tash mat ab wo i em-mah g em-gehgewadag.
48006010	Ab g wehs wo i s-ha ho'ige'ithath ch am wo i ha wehmajk mamt he'es wo i e nako, wahm hegam mo d em-wehm wohochuththam.
48006011	Hemu ant hejel ha'ichu am wo i em-o'ohani. Mt wo s-mai mani d ahni an neithk mani ha'as an i o'ohan.
48006012	Hegam mo ahgahim mamt wo e pahl hikuch k hab wo s-ap'ekam am Jiosh tahgio o ab chum si e ha'ichuchuth mam am oithch hab e junihim g ha-chehanig. K eda hejel pi am hu ap hab junihim. Ab at muh g Christ kots t ab am t-wehhejed. K eda hegam pi ahgachug ihtha no pi s-gihug mat g ha wehm Tutuligo wo ha sho'igch.
48006014	Kuni eda heg wa'i ahgachug matt ab wo i s-wohoch mat g Jesus ab muh kots t ab am t-wehhejed. Tho wa'i ihtha mant hekaj ni-tho'ibia. Kut g jewed t ab ha'ichu wabsh pi e ha'ichuch am ni-wehhejed.
48006015	Pi o d sha'i ha'ichu g pahl hikuchka. Ith o d si ha'ichu mamt ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k hab wo bei g wechij thoakag.
48006016	Ith o d hahawa t-himthag. T g Jiosh ab wo s-em-ho'ige'ithath ch ab wo em-mahkath g s-ap tahhathkam ahpim mamt am oithk hab wo e junihith hab masma mo wehs hab ha wua g e-hemajkamga.
48006017	Pi ant hahawa ha'ichukaj wo sha'i ni-kudu nani pi ab s-babaliwuani heg amjed mat g Jiosh alithag obga mu'ikko ni-gewittan k ni-ma'ikka. Heg o wa wepo mant ni-nakpi mani d piongaj g t-kownalig Jesus.
48006018	Neh, ab at wo wa ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'ithath g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
49001001	Ni-wepnag mam am kih Ephesus t am: Am ant wo i em-o'ohani g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ahni Paul. Jiosh at am i ni-kei mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alithaj Jesus Christ. Kuni kah mamsh ab s-wohochuth g Jesus ch s-ap himchuth g e-thoakag heg wehhejed.
49001002	Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh t-ohg g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
49001003	Jiosh o ab wehs t-makiog g e-ho'ige'ithadag nach pi ab s-wohochuth g alithaj. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo si ho'ige'ithath.
49001004	Pi at wa koi ha'ichu sha'i nahto g Jiosh k hab i e ah mat ab wo i t-gawulkai matt d wo hekia s-ap'ekamk am tahgio ch pi wo ha chu'ichigk. Si o pihk e elith t-hekaj
49001005	ch am i ap'ech mat g alithaj am hab wo t-juh matt hab wa'ap d wo a'aligajk.
49001006	Heg att hekaj ab wo si hehgchulithath g Jiosh. Si o s-ap ab t-neith nach pi d hemako g si tatchuithch alithaj wehm.
49001007	Heg eh'ed at am e iawua kots t ab. Kut ab nako g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig k wo t-tho'ibia. Si o ge'ej g Jiosh hemajimatalig ab t-wui.
49001008	Ab o t-mahkch g ha'ichu mahchig ch ha'ichu amichuthadag.
49001009	Pi o ta machima g Jiosh hab elitha. T wabshaba heki hu am i ap'ech mat ia'i ithani haha wo t-mahtchul.
49001010	K ith hab d elithaj matsh g Christ d wo kownalk wehs ha'ichu thahm. Am at i ap'ech g tash matsh wehs ha'ichu ab wo i hemakoj Christ wecho. Wehs hegai mo an thahm kahchim ch ed ch hegai mo in jewed thahm at ab wo wechokath.
49001011	Wehs at hab wo e juh g Jiosh hab elitha. K hab d elithaj gd hu i shohshon k amjed mat wehpeg ab wo i t-gawulkai ahchim Tutuligo.
49001012	K ab t-ab matt ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh ahchim matt wehpeg ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g alithaj.
49001013	Kumt ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam hab wa'ap kah k ab i s-wohoch ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj. Kut heg hekaj hab wa'ap em-tho'ibia g Jiosh k hab wa'ap ab em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mash hab masma heki hu hab kaij matsh hab wo em-juni. Ihtha Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am em-chehgithch mam hab wa'ap d Jiosh hemajkamga hab sha masma mo g em-cheposig am chehgithch g em-eniga.
49001014	Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ahchim mach d hemajkamgaj. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch matt wehs ab wo bei hegai mo haschu ab i t-makiog. S-ap at wo t-tho'ibia ab wehs amjed g pi t-ap'ethag. Kuch heg hekaj ab si has elith.
49001015	Ab amtsh i s-wohoch mo g Jesus d em-kownalig k si pihk e elith wehs ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuththam.
49001016	Kuni heg hekaj chum hekith ab ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.
49001017	Jiosh o d si ge'e s-ap'ekam ch d ohgaj g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Kuni ab tahni mat ab wo em-mahkchith g amichuthadag ch am ba'ich wo i e tashogithath em-wui. Mt hab ba'ich wo i s-ap s-mahchk g Jiosh.
49001018	Ab ani tahni mat wo em-tashogi mamt has wo masmak am ep i e chechegitok ch haschu wo edgithath mam d ab waithaj ch ab gawulkthas wehhejed.
49001019	Mt ep wo s-mahchk mat wehs wo hekaj g e-gewkthag am t-wehhejed ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth. K g gewkthaj si ge'ej.
49001020	Am at wa chehgi g e-gewkthag ith hekaj matki ab i wuhshath g e-alithag muhkig amjed k ab thai s-apkojed e-hugith ab an thahm kahchim ch ed
49001021	mat d wo kownalk wehs ha'ichu thahm. Thahm kahchim ch ed kokownal ch jewed thahm kokownal o wehsijj ab wecho g Jiosh alithag. K d ihtha ge'e kownal mo g Jiosh ab t-mahkch mat d wo t-mo'o am himthamk ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth.
49001023	Ch ahchim d hemajkamgaj ch wehmaj d hemako hab sha masma mach d honshpadaj. K heg d t-mo'o. Kuch am t-wehm d hekiakam. K eda heg an wehsko ha'ichug ch wehs ha'ichu an u'ukch ch wehs ha'ichu himchuth am t-wehhejed.
49002001	Heki am hu pi edgith ihtha wechij thoakag nam pi d pi ap chu'ijkam ch pi ab hu kaiham g Jiosh.
49002002	Jijawul ha-ge'ejig o an em-u'ukch hab masma mo an wehs ha u'ukch hegam mo pi ab hu kaiham g Jiosh. Kum hegam ha oithch am hab e junihim ch ab s-wohog elith g ge Jiawul.
49002003	Wehsijj ach hab wa masmakahim ch am hab junihim g hejel pi ap hab t-elitha. K wa ab t-wui him g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag.
49002004	Pi ach wa ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh ch gm hu gawulkthas ab amjed heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig. K wabshaba g Jiosh t-hekaj si pihk e elith ch si s-hemajim t-tho'ibia ab amjed g t-chu'ichig k ab t-mah g wechij thoakag. Ith o heg wa wepo mat heki hu ab i t-wuwhas muhkig t amjed
49002006	k am uhgk i t-u'u k an e-hugith an t-toa hab masma matsh hab juh g si e-alithag. Kuch hemu in melchuth g Jesus kownaltalig jewed thahm hab masma mattsh an hahawa hab wo junihith thahm kahchim ch ed.
49002007	Ith at wehs am hab t-juni g Jiosh gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag. K hab d elithaj mat hab masma wehs am wo ha chehgi imhab i amjed mo has masma si s-hemajima ch ab si t-tatchua.
49002008	Ab at i s-t-ho'ige'el g Jiosh k tho'ibia natt pi ab i s-wohoch. Pi att wo sha'i t-nako machs hejel wo t-tho'ibia. Chum hems g t-wohochuthadag o d mahkigdaj.
49002009	Pi o am hu ha'ichug machs haschukaj wo chum si t-gimaihunath no pi pi hejel hab d t-juni machs hekaj t-tho'ibia.
49002010	Ab at i t-mah g Jiosh ihtha wechij thoakag. Kuki hab d elithaj matt hekaj am hab wo junihith hegai s-ap chikpan mat heki hu am i ap'ech am t-wehhejed.
49002011	Am g wo s-chegitok ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam mam has i masma mamt eda koi ab hu i s-wohoch g Christ. Pi am wa pahl hikuchkas hab masma mach ahchim Tutuligo.
49002012	K g Jiosh pi ab hu em-mahkch hegai mo haschu ab t-mahkch ch pi ab hu em-mahtchulith mat ia wo i wuhshath g e-alithag mat d wo si Kehshajk. Kum wa pi ab hu wui i e gewpkath g Jiosh
49002013	ch pi mahch ch pi edgith g chehanigaj. Kuch wa heg hekaj s-em-keh'ith. M ahpim ab aigo hab wa'ap s-t-keh'ith. K hegai t-keh'ithadag hab sha masma mo g kolhai ch gm hu a'ai t-ga'agwulkathch. T wabshaba g Christ s-ap am oithk hab e juh ihtha chehanig k ab e muhkith kots t ab t-wehhejed k hab masma hugio g gewkthaj g chehanig. K heg pi ab hu hahawa t-chu'ichigchuth ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh. Jesus Christ at ab i t-hemakoj e wehm. Kuch pi hahawa a'ai s-t-keh'ith nach pi d hahawa hemako.
49002017	Pegih, ia at wa jiwia g Jiosh alithag jewed thahm k am ahgachug t-shahgith ihtha tho'ibiathag ahga matt am hahawa em-wui u'apa ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam mam wa pi sha'i mahch g Jiosh.
49002018	K g Jiosh hab wa'ap ab em-mahkch g ap'ethag ahpim mamt hab wa'ap ab i s-wohochuth k ab wui i e thagito. K hab wa'ap an em-u'ukch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
49002019	Pi am d haha wabsh mehkjed o'othham ch wabshaba d a'aligaj g Jiosh. K g Jiosh ab em-mahkch g ap'ethag am e-kihthag ed hab masma mo ahchim ab t-mahkch.
49002020	Ith o heg wa wepo mam d Jiosh kihta. Kuch heg wa wepo mach d kih shon ahchim mach ha'i d Jesus si chuhchai ch ha'i d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. K g Jesus an wehsijj t-u'ukch hab masma mach an ab kihtas.
49002021	Am o wabsh kia ge'ethahim ihtha kih no pi g Jiosh i ha ba'ihamahim hegam mo ab hahawa s-wohochuth.
49002022	Kuch wehsijj t-wehm si s-ap hab chu'ig ch d s-ap'ekam cheopi no pi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am t-eda.
49003001	Ia am ni-kuhpch nani pi ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga am ha shahgith g nahnko mahs hemajkam. Kuni am ni-ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui em-wehhejed nam pi d ni-wehm wohochuththam.
49003002	Am amtp hu wa'i kah mo ab ni-wui si s-hemajima g Jiosh ch ab ni-mah ihtha chikpan mant hekaj wo i em-wehmajk.
49003003	Am at i ni-chehgi g s-a'agi e-apchutha mant ia he'es hekaj em-o'ohani.
49003004	Kumt wo s-mai am ne'okchulithch ihtha mant am em-o'ohani mani has masma s-amichuth ihtha s-a'agi ha'ichu ab amjed g Christ.
49003005	Ith o heki hu pi mahch g hemajkam. T wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hemuch am hahawa i t-tashogi ahchim Jesus Christ chuhchai ch Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.
49003006	Ihtha s-a'agi ha'ichu ahga o hab chu'ig mam ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ab hahawa t-wehm ap'ethag ahchim Tutuligo ith eda Jiosh ho'ige'ithalig. Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g e-ap'ethag nach pi ab s-wohochuth g ha'ichu ahgaj ch ab hiwig g Jesus Christ.
49003007	Kuni ahni d em-pionag ch am em-ahgith ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Heg at si s-ni-ho'ige'ith k am i ni-kehsh k ab ni-mah g gewkthag mant wo em-ahgi.
49003008	Shahag wepo mani ahni wehs ha ba'ich d wabsh pi ha'ichu am ha shahgith g Jiosh hemajkamga. T eda g Jiosh ab ni-mah ihtha ap'ethag mant am wo em-ahgi ahpim nahnko mahs hemajkam g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Christ ho'ige'ithalig. Heg o ba'ich i si s-kehg s-ap hab chu'ig mo hig chumpk g si ge'e kaisthag. Kutt pi wo t-nako matt wehs wo s-amich.
49003009	Ith o d ni-chikpan mant am wo i ha tashogi g hemajkam mo has masma hab chu'ig ihtha s-a'agi ha'ichu apchuthaj g Jiosh. Jiosh at wehs ha'ichu nahto k wabshaba pi mahsko wua ihtha s-kehg hab e-elitha mu'i a'ahithag oitham
49003010	nat pi ia'i ithani wo ha chehgi g anghil kokownal g mu'i nahnko mahs ha'ichu e-amichuthadag am gai t-wuhshanim ahchim mat t-tho'ibia.
49003011	Jiosh at am hab juh ihtha gahi wuhshanim g t-kownalig Jesus Christ mat has i masma ap'ech ga hu i wehpeg.
49003012	Kuch ap'ethag matt si s-gegokim ab wo i miabi g Jiosh ab s-wohochuthch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g alithaj.
49003013	Ab ani shoak em-wui mamt am wabsh wo si i e gewpkath k pi has wo e tahtkkath mani ni-sho'igchuth em-wehhejed. Wehs o d wabsh em-ap'ethag ihtha ni-sho'igthag.
49003014	Ith ani wehs am i chechegitod ch hekaj ab i gegshshe heg wui mat wehs ha'ichu nahto.
49003015	Wehs nahnko thakam hemajkam ch anghil o d nahtoij. T heg ab ha mah g ha-chechgig.
49003016	Wehs o edgith g gewkthag g Jiosh ch ge'e ab t-makiog. Kuni ab tahni mat ba'ich ab wo i em-mah. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am t-eda ha'ichug ch ab t-makiog g Jiosh gewkthag.
49003017	Ith o heg wa wepo mo g Christ am t-eda kih. Ab ani tahni g Jiosh mamt chum hekith hab wo masmak mo g Christ ch wo si pihk e elithath ab wehs ha wui.
49003018	Sho'o wa'i si ge'ej g Christ tatchuithag ab t-wui. Pi at hedai wo e nako mat wabsh hejel wo s-mai mo he'es i ge'ej. Kuni ab tahni g Jiosh mat am wo tashogithath em-wui mamt wo s-ap s-mahchk. T hab wo i em-shuhthath g Jiosh gewkthag.
49003020	Jiosh at wo e nako mat ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu hab wo t-juni mach hems he'es ab i chum tahni o hems he'es i chegitod. Heg o hekaj hab t-junith e-gewkthag mo am chikpan t-eda.
49003021	Kutt chum hekith ab wo hehgchulithath ahchim mach d hemako g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm.
49004001	Thani lihso heg hekaj mani ahgachug g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus. Kuni ab si s-em-ho'ige'itham am em-ahgith mamt hab wo masmak mo has masma g Jiosh em-tatchuith ch ab i em-gawulkai.
49004002	Pi g am wo chum si e ha'ichuchuthath ch wabshaba wo s-hehemajimak ch chum hekith ab wo s-e bahbgik ch ab a'ai wo e tatchuath. Am g wo e chehgithath mam ab a'ai e tatchua.
49004003	Ab at i t-hemakoch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Pegih, mt wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui mamt pi gm hu a'ai wo i e ga'agwulkai.
49004004	Heg o wa wepo mach d honshpadaj g Christ nach pi d hemako ab wecho. Thach hemako no pi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag d wa'i hemako ch am wehsijj t-eda. Kuch d hemako nach pi am t-wepo t-gewpkathch heg wui mo g Jiosh am t-wehhejed ap'echuthch thahm kahchim ch ed.
49004005	Wehsijj ach d hemako nach pi ab wecho g hemako kownal ch t-wepo ha'ichu ab s-wohochuth ch t-wepo t-pahl wapko.
49004006	Thach hemako no pi g Jiosh d wa'i hemako ch wehsijj d t-ohg ch wehs t-thahm d kownal ch an wehsko hab chu'ig ch am ep wehsijj t-eda ha'ichug.
49004007	Christ at wehsijj ab i t-mahkhi hegai matt hekaj ab a'ai wo i t-wehmajk.
49004008	Bo chu'ig g Jiosh heki hu o'ohana: T wo ha gewito g e-obga k am wo hih thahm kahchim wui k ab amjed wo i ha mahkhi g e-hemajkamga g nahnko mahs mahchig ch gewkthag.
49004009	Pegih, bo chu'ig mat g si Kehshaj gn hu uhpam ep wo hih thahm kahchim wui. K heg hekaj tasho mat ia wo jiwia jewed thahm.
49004010	Hegai mat ia jiwia jewed thahm o d hegai mat am uhpam hih e-kihthag wui an thahm kahchim ch ed k ab uhpam bei g e-gewkthag k am hahawa wehsko ha'ichug e-nahtoi ed.
49004011	Ab at t-mah ahchim e-hemajkamga g nahnko ha'ichu mahchig ch gewkthag. Kuch heg hekaj hab wua g nahnko mahs chikpan wehhejed. Am at ha'i i t-chuhcha matt an wo i oiopo k wo ah g ha'ichu ahgaj k am ha'i i t-chuhcha matt d wo Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththamk ch ha'i matt ab wo i ha wanim Jiosh wui ch ha'i matt wo ha nuhkuthath g t-wehm wohochuththam ch wo ha mashchamath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
49004012	Ab o t-mahkch g Jiosh ihtha nahnko mahs chikpan matt hekaj am wo i ha ap'ech g Jiosh hemajkamga matt wehsijj wo t-nahtokchith matt am hab wo junihith g Christ chikpan ch ab a'ai wo i t-gewkemhunath.
49004013	Kutt heg hekaj ab wo i t-hemakoj k ab wo i ge'ege'ehogat t-wohochuthadag ed k wehs wo s-mahchk g wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh alithag ch wehs wo wepo masmak.
49004014	Pi att hab haha wo masmak mo g a'al machs in has a'ai gawul wo junihith g t-wohochuthadag. T hab pi wo e nako hegam mo am nahnko masma e nakog mat wo t-iattogi.
49004015	Am att wo ahgath g wohokam ab pihk t-elithch ha wui ch am wo i ge'ege'ehogat matt hab wo masmak mo g Christ. Heg o wa wepo mo g Christ d t-mo'o.
49004016	Ch ahchim d honshpadaj mach ab wui t-thagitokch ch s-ap t-wehm chikpan hab masma mach nahnko mahs d chuhchu'ithaj. Batt wa'i masma am wo i ge'ege'ehogat t-wohochuthadag ed matt ab a'ai wo si t-tatchuath ch am wo i t-wehmajk.
49004017	Pi g am hu ha oithk hab wo masmak hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh. Ith o d t-kownalig Jesus chehanig. Hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh o wabsh pehegi ha'ichu chegito
49004018	ch pi ha'ichu a'amichuth ch ep pi chechkaithag. Ith o heg wa wepo mo am s-chuhugam k ed hihim. K g Jiosh heg hekaj pi ab hu ha mahkch g wechij thoakag.
49004019	Pi o edgith g si edathag no pi am wabsh e thagitokch pi ap'ekam wui ch hab junihim g nahnko mahs si s-uam ha'ichu.
49004020	Mtsh wabshaba ahpim ab kah g tho'ibiathag ahga k am i s-mai g Christ. Am amsh em-mashcham g wohokam ab amjed. Mt amjed pi hab wo chum masmak mo hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh.
49004022	Im g hu hab wo i juhni g pi ap e-tatchui. Heg o wa em-iattogith ch em-padchuth.
49004023	T wabshaba g Jiosh am hab wo em-juh mat g em-tatchui ch em-thoakag d wo hekia s-ap'ekamk.
49004024	Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g wechij thoakag. K ihtha thoakag wepo masma mo g Jiosh thoakag ch am e chehgithch mo heg wa'i tatchua s-ap'ekam. Am g wo himath g e-wechij thoakag ch am wabsh wo thagito g pi ap'ekam.
49004025	Thach t-wehm wohochuththam ch heg wa wepo mach d Christ honshpadag. K pi hab chum mahs machs a'ai wo t-iattogithath o hedai i ehp. Am g hab wo kaijjith g wohokam.
49004026	Hemho wa amt wo babgat ab pi ap'ekam wui k wabshaba pi heg hekaj hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam. S-hohtam g wo thagito g e-bagatalig.
49004027	T hab pi wo e nako g Jiawul mas am hab wo em-juh mamt hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam.
49004028	T wo ha'asa ha'ichu ha ehs hegam matp hedai ha'ichu ha ehsith. Ab o hab wa'ap ha ab mat wo chikpanath ch heg amjed ab wo edgithath mat haschukaj am wo i ha wehmt g sho'igkam.
49004029	Pi g am wo pi kehg neneokath ch wabshaba wo s-ap neneokath ch ab a'ai wo i e gewkemhunath. T g em-ne'oki hab masma d wo i ha wehmtadagk hegam mat hedai wo i em-kahkath.
49004030	Pi g am wo pi ap tahtchuth g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Tho hegai mo am t-eda ulinig. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mat g Jiosh s-ap am wo i t-wahpki e-kihthag ed.
49004031	Im g hu hab wo i juhni g keh'ithadag ch pi amkadag ch bagatalig ch kawhaina ch has ahgadag.
49004032	Jiosh at im hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig matt ab i s-wohoch g Christ. Kumt ahpim hab wa masma ab a'ai wo s-e ho'ige'ithath ch im hu hab wabsh wo i juh matp hema i chum s-ko'okam has wo em-juh.
49005001	Ab o si t-tatchua g Jiosh. Kutt am oithch hab wo t-junihith nach pi d a'aligaj.
49005002	Christ o am hab junihim g e-ohg Jiosh tatchui ch ab si t-tatchua ch am t-wehhejed e muhkith. Kutt ahchim hab wa'ap ab aigo wo si tatchuath ch ab a'ai wo si t-tatchuath.
49005003	Thach Jiosh hemajkamga. K pi hab chum mahs machs wo ha wehm wo'iwua matp hedai pi d t-wehm kihkam o achs wo chegito g s-uam ha'ichu o achs wo s-behim matp haschu pi ab hu d t-wuikam.
49005004	S-mahch am mat pi am hu wo i ha wahpki g Jiosh hegam mo hab wa masma. Hegai mat wo s-behim mo haschu pi ab hu d wuikamaj o heg jioshchuth. (4) K pi hab chum mahs machs s-bihtagim wo neneokath o achs pehegi wo neneokath. Ab g wo ho'ige'ithath g Jiosh.
49005006	Ha'i oki hab kaij mo am wa s-ap'e hegam mo hab masma hab e junihim. Kumt wabshaba pi ab hu wo kaiha g pehegi ha-ne'oki. Jiosh at hemho wa s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mat pi ab hu wo s-wohog el.
49005007	An g hu wabsh wo ha neithath hegam hab mahs hemajkam ch pi am hu ha oithch hab wo e junihith.
49005008	Ahpim amsh hab wa'ap masma heki hu. Heg o wa wepo mam wa am s-chuhugam k ed hihimath ch am hahawa i wuwha tonlig ch ed namt pi hahawa s-mai g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Pegih, mt am wo hihimath g e-thoakag ith eda s-ap'ekam tonlig
49005009	ch hab masma hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch wo ahgath g wohokam.
49005010	T g t-kownalig Jesus wo s-hohho'ithath hegai mam haschu hab wua.
49005011	Pi amt am hu wo ha wehmajk hegam mo hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. That wo s-ta edam ha'ichuk mamt chum hems heg ab wo neneokath mo haschu s-a'agi hab wua ihtham. Kumt wabshaba wo ha ahgi mo pi ap hab e junihim.
49005013	T haha wo s-e mahchk mo has chu'ig. Bo d ahga ihtha che'ithag mo hab chu'ig: Bam wa'i masma mo g kohkshtham o g ko'i ahpim mam hedai pi mahch g Jiosh. Ab g wo i wuwhaki no pi g Christ ab em-makiog g tonlig ch wechij thoakag.
49005015	Am g wo si s-e nen'oithk mamt has masma wo himchuthath g e-thoakthag ch pi hab wo masmak mam d wabsh pi ha'ichu a'amichuththam.
49005016	Ge'ej o g pi ap'ekam hemu. K wabshaba g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g ap'ethag matt hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. Am g s-ap wo hekaj g e-ap'ethag.
49005017	Jiosh o am em-wui tashogith g e-tatchui. Am g wo si i a'amichuth k wo s-mai mo haschu wud.
49005018	Pi g wo nawkkath namt pi heg hekaj wo padch g e-thoakag mamt pi wo e tho'ibia. Am g wehs wo i e thagitokchith Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui. T heg an wo em-u'ukchith ch ab wo em-mahkchith g si ge'e s-ap tahhathkam.
49005019	Kumt hab ab a'ai wo i e gewkemhunath ch ab wo ihmath g Jiosh g heki hu mihshmetha nen'eikaj ch wechij mihshmetha nen'ei
49005020	ch chum hekith ab wo ho'ige'ithath g Jiosh t-ohg wehs ha'ichukaj am chehchegch g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
49005021	Ab g a'ai wo i e thagito e wui mamtp woho ab si has elith g Christ.
49005022	Ahpim u'uwi amt ab wo i e thagito e-kuhkun ha wui. Ith o ab d em-wuikam nam pi d Christ wohochuththam.
49005023	Kun o gewkthag am thahm g e-hohnig hab masma mo g Christ gewkthag am t-thahm ahchim mach ab ihm ch ab si hiwig. Ahchim ach heg wa wepo mach d honshpadaj. K heg d t-tho'ibiakam.
49005024	Ab att wehs wo i chum t-thagitokch wui. Kumt ahpim u'uwi hab wa masma wehs ab wo i chum e thagitokch e-kuhkun ha wui.
49005025	Ahpim chechoj amt hab masma ab wo si ha tatchuath g e-hohonig mo g Christ ab si t-tatchua. Heg o ha'as ge'e ab si t-tatchua mat am t-wehhejed e thagito mamt wo mua.
49005026	Bat wa e juh mat hekaj wo t-wapkon k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth ch ab hiwig. Kut hab wa masma ab i t-gawulkai
49005027	e wehhejed matt d wo hekia s-ap'ekam enigajk.
49005028	Kumt ahpim chechoj ab wo si ha tatchuath g e-hohonig hab masma mam ab si hejel e tatchua no pi heg wa wepo mam d hemako e wehm. Hejel e hekaj o si pihk e elith matp hedai g e-hohnigkaj si pihk e elith no pi d wa'i hemako.
49005029	Pi o hekith hedai hejel s-e keh'ith ch wabshaba am i e nakog mat wo e gegosithath ch wo e nuhkuthath. Kuch ahchim wohochuththam heg wa wepo mach d honshpadaj g Christ nach pi wehmaj d hemako. K heg s-ap t-nuhkuth.
49005031	Kumt ahpim chechoj hab wa masma hab wo ha juhkchith g e-hohonig no pi hab chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana: Cheoj at am wo thagito g e-ohg ch e-je'e k wo ha hohnt k d haha wo hemakok g e-hohnig wehm.
49005032	Neh, bo chu'ig ihtha si s-has ha'ichu wohokam ab amjed g hohnta. Kuni ith amjed am i chum em-tashogith mach d hemako g Christ wehm.
49005033	K wabshaba hab wa'ap tasho mat g cheoj hemho wa ab wo si tatchuath g e-wehm kihkam hab masma mo ab si hejel e tatchua. T g uwi ab wo si has elithath g e-kun.
49006001	Ab o em-ab ahpim a'al mamt ab wo s-ha wohog elithath g e-jehj no pi ith d Christ tatchui ch d s-ap'ekam em-wehhejed.
49006002	Bo chu'ig g Jiosh heki hu o'ohana: Ab g wo si has ha elithath g e-ohg ch e-je'e. T wehs wo s-ap'ek em-wehhejed. Kumt ge'eho d wo thothakamk am jewed thahm.
49006003	Ith o d wehpeg chehanigaj g Jiosh mo ab wehnags g ha'ichu ahgaj mat ha'ichu hab wo juni hegai mat ab wo s-wohog elithath.
49006004	Ahpim jehj amt pi wabsh wo si s-gewkam ha shohbithath g e-a'aliga mamt wabsh wo ha babgach. Tho Jiosh tatchui mamt am wo i ha mashcha ab amjed g Christ hab masma mam ha gegosith k ab wo i ha shohbi pi ap'ekam amjed.
49006005	Ahpim nenehol amt ab wo s-wohog ha elithath g e-a'amo ch ab wo si has ha elithath ch ab si e-tatchui amjed hab wo junihith g e-chikpan hab masma mamtp hems g Christ hab masma wo chikpanthath
49006006	ch d wo piongajk. Pi amt hab wabsh wo junihith mas heg hekaj wo em-neithath g em-ahmo ch wo s-em-hohho'ithath ch wabshaba hab wo junihith wehs g e-ihbthagkaj, chum as hems pi am hu wo em-neithath. Ith o em-tatchuithch g Jiosh.
49006007	Kumt s-ap e tahtk k am hab wo junihith g e-chikpan nam pi g Jiosh ep chikpanith ch pi heg wa'i o'othham.
49006008	Mt wo s-chegitok mat g Jiosh ab uhpam wo i nodagi g em-namkithadag mamt haschu i s-kehg chikpan hab wo juh, chum ams hems d wo neholk o pi d wo neholk.
49006009	Ahpim mam d a'amo amt wo s-ap i ha nuhkuthath g e-pionag ch pi wo ha ebkiothath. Am g wo s-chegitok mam e wehm ahmo an thahm kahchim ch ed. Kut ihtha ahmo wehs t-wepo masma wo t-lothai.
49006010	Hemako ha'ichu ant hab ep wo chei. Ab g wo i e gewpkathch Jesus t ab no pi heg ab em-mahkch g ge'e gewkthag.
49006011	Ab g wo i hekaj hegai mo haschu g Jiosh ab em-mahkch k hab wo e nako mamt ab wui wo gegokiwua g ge Jiawul s-a'agi cheggiadag.
49006012	Pi ach g hemajkam ha cheggia ch wabshaba hegam ha cheggia mo d si pi ap'ekam gewpkthag in t-thahm ch ha-kokownalig ch ha-haha'ichuga ch g jijawul.
49006013	Mt heg hekaj ab wo si i hekaj g Jiosh gewkthag mamt wo e nahtokch hemu ch wo e nako mamt ab wui wo gegokiwua g pi ap'ekam mat hekith ab wo i em-cheggia. Kut pi wo sha'i i em-shul.
49006014	Neh, mt wo si e nahtokchith wehhejed ihtha cheggiadag. An g wo u'ukchith g wohokam. T ith heg wo wa wepok mo g cheggiakud giwud. Am g hab wo wa'i junihith g s-ap'ekam. T ith heg wo wa wepok mamt ab hab juh g wainomi lihwa.
49006015	Mt wo e nahtokchith mamt wo i ahgahi ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mo g Jiosh s-ha tho'ibiamk. T ith heg wo wa wepok mamt ab cheka g e-shuhshk.
49006016	Jiawul o chum s-em-padchuthamk hab sha masma mat wo ha mehi g hahpod k hekaj wo em-mummu. Mt wabshaba s-wihnam wo u'ukchith g e-wohochuthadag hab wa masma mamt g kawad am e tahgio wo ulinichith. T hab pi has wo em-juh.
49006017	Ab g wo s-wohochuth mat em-tho'ibia g Jiosh k pi hekith wo em-thagito. T ihtha em-tho'ibiathag hab wo wa masmak mo g wainomi wonami. An g wo u'ukchith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga hab sha masma mamtp hems g is-pahyo. Ith o ab em-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mamt hekaj wo gewito g Jiawul.
49006018	Kumt chum hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ch ab wo tahnith g Jiosh g i wehmtadag. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i t-wehmaj t-ho'ige'ithahuna ed. Kumt wo s-nenenashank ch wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ha wehhejed g Jiosh hemajkamga.
49006019	Ahni amt am hab wa'ap wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ni-wehhejed mat g Jiosh ab wo ni-mah g ne'oki mat hekith wo i e ai mant am wo ha jehnigi. Nt hekaj s-ni-mamachim ch s-gewkam am wo ah ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mat ia'i ithani hahawa t-tashogi.
49006020	Ith ani hekaj d lihso mani ith ahgachug. Kumt am wo si e ho'ige'ithahunath mant s-gewkam wo ahgath mant has wo i chum masmak.
49006021	Ab ani chehani g t-wehnag Tychicus mat am wo i em-chehgimed k am wo em-ahgi mani has wa'i masma ch has ni-wua. Tho si s-ap piongaj g Christ ch si s-ap am wo i em-gewkemhu em-ahigthch mach has t-wua.
49006023	Am ani ni-ho'ige'ithahun mat g Jiosh t-ohg ch g t-kownalig Jesus Christ ab ba'ich wo i em-mah g s-ap tahhathkam ch pihk elithadag nam pi d wohochuththam.
49006024	Jiosh at ba'ich ep wo i s-em-ho'ige'el wehs ahpim mam woho ab si tatchua g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
50001001	T-wepnag mam am kih Philippi t am: Am ant wo ha'ichu i em-o'ohani ahni Paul g Timothy wehm. S-mahch am mach d piongaj g Jesus Christ namt pi ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed k d Jiosh hemajkamga. Am ach s-ha ahgithamk g em-wanimedtham ch hegam mo am i ha wehmt mat ab wo i s-t-ho'ige'el.
50001002	Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
50001003	Ab ani ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ch si s-ap ni-tattam ch ni-ho'ige'ithahun mani hekith i em-chechegitod.
50001005	Am am chikpanith g Jiosh ch ha'ichukaj am i ni-wehmaj gd hu i amjed mani wa am em-ahgith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh.
50001006	Kuni heg hekaj s-mahch mat am wo himchuthahith g Jiosh ihtha tho'ibiathag em-wehhejed. Am at i shonwuich em-thoakag ed k wo nahto mat hekith ia ep wo jiwia g Jesus Christ jewed thahm.
50001007	Bani wa masma hab em-elith nani pi chum hekith am i em-chegitod. Kum ahpim hab wa'ap chum hekith s-ni-chegito ch ha'ichukaj i ni-wehmt, chum hems hemu mani ia hu d lihso.
50001008	Ab o ni-mahkch g Jesus Christ g si ge'e pihk elithadag em-hekaj. K g Jiosh s-mahch mo ith d wohokam mani em-ahgith.
50001009	Kuni ab tahni mat hab wo em-juh mat ba'ich wo i ge'etha g pihk em-elithadag ch ha'ichu em-mahchig ch ha'ichu em-amichuthadag.
50001010	Mt heg amjed wo s-mahchk hegai mo s-ap'e mamt hab wo junihith ch pi am hu wo edak g pi ap'ekam ch pi wo ha chu'ichigk mat hekith ep wo jiwia g Jesus Christ.
50001011	Heg o hab em-wua mamt am wo e chehgithch mam am hab wua g s-ap'ekam ha'ichu ch heg hekaj ab ha'ichuchuth g Jiosh ch ab hehgchulith.
50001012	S-em-ahgithamk ani mo ba'ich i e gantan ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh heg hekaj mani ia kuhpi.
50001013	Wehsijj o s-mahch ia ge'e kownal kih am ch an wehgaj mani d lihso heg wa'i hekaj mani d piongaj g Jesus Christ.
50001014	K g t-wehm wohochuththam pi ha'ichu sha'i ehbith ch ba'ich i s-gewkam ia ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga neithch mani wabsh s-ap ab nakog g ni-sho'igthag.
50001015	Ha'i o am hi chikpan ab si hejel e-tatchui amjed mat ba'ich wo i chum wahmuth g ha'ichu pi ni-ap'ethag hemuch mani wa hu d lihso no pi s-ni-hehgamk ch wabsh ni-pip'ichuth. K wabshaba ha'i ni-hekaj si pihk e elith ch ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga no pi s-mahch mat g Jiosh am i ni-kei mant wo wohokamch g ha'ichu ahgaj.
50001018	K pi has chu'ig. Ni wabsh s-ap ni-tahtk mo e ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga, chum as ha'i pi ap ha'ichu e-tatchui ab am wo ahgahi.
50001019	E am ho'ige'ithahun am ni-wehhejed. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag i ni-wehmaj. Ni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk ch s-mahch mamt wo i ni-wuhshath.
50001020	Tatchua ani mant chum hekith wehs hab wo juh mo haschu i ni-tatchuith g Christ pi ha'ichu ehbithch, wahm hemuch. Bant masma ab wo si has elithath wehs ni-ihbthagkaj, chum anis hems wo ni-muhkith heg hekaj.
50001021	Neh, pi o has d ahga g ni-thoakag ni-wehhejed. Chum ani hi wa s-wehmjimk g Christ. K heg hekaj chum s-ap'e mant hu wo i muh.
50001022	Ntp wabshaba d wo thoakamk ch ba'ich wo i chikpanthath g Christ. Ni-wehhejed o hi wa ba'ich i s-ap'e mant wo muhk k wo wehmajk g Christ.
50001024	K wabshaba em-wehhejed hi ba'ich i s-ap'e mant d wo thoakamk.
50001025	Ni heg hekaj s-mahch mant d wo thoakamk ch hab am wo i em-wehmajk. Mt wo i ge'ehogat am e-wohochuthadag ed ch hab wo si s-ap e tahtkkath.
50001026	Am ant wo em-wehmajk. Kumt ba'ich ab wo i si has elithath g Christ ni-hekaj.
50001027	Bamt masma wo himath g e-thoakag mamt wo ha'ichuch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Christ. Nt haha wo kah mam am e hemakochuthch ch s-ap ahgachug mat g hemajkam ab wo s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh, chum anis hems pi am hu ep wo em-nei.
50001028	Pi g wo sha'i ha ehbithath hegam mo ab em-wui gegok. T heg amjed wo s-mahchk mat ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. Mt ahpim ab wo bei g e-tho'ibiathag ab amjed g Jiosh.
50001029	Tho Jiosh hab elitha mamt pi ab wabsh wo s-wohochuthath g Christ ch wabshaba am wehhejed ep wo e sho'igchuthath.
50001030	Ab amt wui wo gegokkath g pi ap'ekam hab masma mam am wa neith mani hab ni-wua ch hemu kah mani hab wabsh kia ni-wua.
50002001	Bani em-elith mam s-ap ab e thagitokch Jesus Christ wui. K heg ab si i em-gewkemhun. Kum si s-ap e tahtk no pi si em-tatchua. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am em-wehmaj. Kum a'ai e hekaj si pihk e elith.
50002002	Nt heg hekaj ab wo si i em-gewkemhu mamt wo i hemakoj g e-chegitoithag k ab ba'ich wo i e tatchuath ch ba'ich wo i s-ap e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui. Nt heg amjed wo si s-ap ni-taht.
50002003	Pi amt wo s-chu tha'ath ch pi wo chum ge e ha'ichuchuthath. Ab amt wabsh wo i e sho'igchuthch ab a'ai e wui ch pi wa'i si hejel am wo e chegitoth.
50002004	Am g wo wa'i chegitoth g ha-ap'ethag ha'i ehp, pi heg wa'i hejel e-ap'ethag.
50002005	Bamt masma ha'ichu wo chum chegitok mash wa g Jesus Christ ch pi hejel wo chum si e ha'ichuch.
50002006	Jesus Christ o d Jiosh ch wabshaba pi hab e elith mat hejel wo e wepogi g e-ohg Jiosh.
50002007	Ga at hu hab wabsh sha'i juh g e-ap'ethag k wabsh e pionchuth k ia mahsi k wepo mahs mo g o'othham.
50002008	Ab o s-wohog elith g e-ohg Jiosh ch ia e sho'igchuthahim ch ab muh kots t ab heg wa wepo masma mo d wabsh pi ap hemajkam.
50002009	T g Jiosh ab i wamgith k am ba'ich i si uhgkaj thahm kahchim ch ed k ab mah g gewkthag wehs ha'ichu thahm.
50002010	T heg hekaj wehsijj ab wo si has i elith k ab wui wo i shul hegam mo an thahm kahchim ch ed ch hegam mo an jewed thahm ch hegam mo am jewed wecho
50002011	k am wo ah mo ihtha Jesus Christ wehs d ha-kownalig. Neh, batt masma ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh.
50002012	Ni-naipijju, chum am hekith s-wohog elith hegai Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mani wa am em-ahgith mani eda em-wehmaj. K ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mamt ab wo s-wohog elithath hemu mani wa chum pi am hu em-wehmaj. Am g wabsh wo chikpanath ch wo ge'ege'elhith am e-tho'ibiathag ed ch ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh.
50002013	Chum o hekith em-makiog g Jiosh g tatchuithag ch gewkthag mamt am hab wo junihith g hab elithaj.
50002014	Kumt heg am hab wo junihith pi has ahgch mamt hekith heg hekaj wo e sho'igch.
50002015	T hab pi wo em-chu'ichigch g Jiosh. Tham Jiosh a'aliga ch d wo chum si hekia s-ap'ekamk am ha shahgith hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh. Ihtham o s-chu i'attomk ch totontodag. Kumt hab wo sha masmak am ha wehhejed mo g huhu'u am ha wehhejed g s-chuhugam k ed oiopotham
50002016	am ha ahgithch mo g Jiosh ab ha makiog g wechij thoakag. T g Jesus Christ ab wo si em-ha'ichuch mat hekith ia ep wo jiwia jewed thahm. Nt heg hekaj wo si s-hehgigk mat g ni-chikpan pi wabsh wo e nahnkogi.
50002017	Ab amt i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga k am i e thagito Jiosh wui hab sha masma mo wa ab wui ha'ichu e iagchulith. Kunt hemho wa wo si s-ap ni-taht mamt am wui i e thagito, chum anis hems wo ni-muhkith nani pi ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mat g ni-eh'ed wo e iawua em-wehhejed hab sha masma mo wa g nawait e iawua ab ab g iagchulitha.
50002018	Pegih, ahpim g ep wo si s-ap e tahtk ni-wehm matp g Jiosh hab wa masma wo ha'ichuch g ni-chikpan.
50002019	Hemu ant wo cheha g Timothy mat am wo i em-chehgim matp d wo t-kownalig Jesus tatchuik. T heg ia wo u'apa g ha'ichu ahga ab em-amjed mat am wo i ni-gewkemhu.
50002020	Timothy o d wa'i hegai mo hab wa masma hab e tahtk ab em-amjed mani ahni ch si s-ap wo em-nuhkuth.
50002021	Ha'i o hi g hejel e-tatchui am hab elith ch wabsh pi ab hu ha'ichuchuth g hab elithaj g Jesus Christ.
50002022	Kum eda am wa s-mahch mo hab masma ni-wehm chikpan g Timothy mo g ha-alithag.
50002023	Hemu ant wo s-mai matp haschu has wo i mahsk am ni-wehhejed. T am haha wo hih g Timothy em-wui.
50002024	Bani elith mo d tatchuij g t-kownalig Jesus mant ahni am hab wa'ap wo i him k wo em-nei.
50002025	Ia ant wo cheha g em-kehsha Epaphroditus mat am uhpam ep wo hih em-wui. Ia o i ni-wehmaj hab masma mamsh am ahgith ch mu'i ha'ichu ni-wehm nakog.
50002026	Msh wabshaba kah mat wa mumku. K si s-em-neithamk ch e kudut mamsh ith kah.
50002027	Woho o wa mat si mumku k chum alo muh. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab si i s-ho'ige'ith k thoaj. K hab wa'ap d ni-ho'ige'ithadag mat pi muh nant pi wo si pi ap ni-taht mat hems wo sha muh.
50002028	Ni heg hekaj chehani mat am uhpam wo hih. Mt hab wo si s-hehgigk am neithok. Nt ahni hab wa'ap wo si s-hehgigk ch pi wo ni-kudu em-hekaj.
50002029	Kumt ab wo si has el nat pi pi huwi g e-thoakag mat hab wo juh g Christ tatchui k wo i ni-wehmt em-wehhejed.
50003001	Mt wabsh wo si s-hehgigk mo d em-kownalig g Jesus Christ. Pi ani has sha'i ni-tahtk mant am ep em-o'ohani hegai mant wa heki hu em-o'ohani. Kut ith d wo i em-wehmtadagk.
50003002	Ha'i o hab junihim g pi ap'ekam ch eda chum ahgahim mamt hab wo junihith g chehanig ch hab wo i e ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio. Mt wo si s-e nen'oithk ab ha amjed. Bo masma pi ha'ichu amichuth mo g gogogs.
50003003	Pi am tatchua mamt wo e pahl hikuch hab masma mo heki hu chehanis matt ahchim Tutuligo hab wo t-juh. Jiosh at heki hu i em-ap'ech e wehhejed namt pi ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k ab i hiw g Jesus Christ. K ith heg wa wepo mam pahl hikuchkas. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o ab t-mahkch g gewkthag ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kuch hekaj ab si ihm g Jiosh ch ab si has elith g Jesus Christ ch pi ab hu sha'i hejel t-hiwig machs am oithk hab wo t-juh g chehanig k hekaj wo t-tho'ibia.
50003004	Ahni ant ba'ich wo i ni-nako mo hegam mant ab wo hiwgath g chehanig
50003005	nani pi d Tuhligo ch ni-pahl hikuch mani eda d gigi'ik tash hab masma mo an o'ohanas chehanig ch ed. Benjaminbad o d ni-shohshon ch d hema hegam gamai gohk t-shohshon ahchim Tutuligo. Thani wa Palasi mo hegam hab e elith mo pi ha chu'ichig ab amjed g t-chehanig.
50003006	Ha anid sho'igchuth hegam mo ab ihm g Jesus Christ nani pi hab ha elith mo ab wui gegok g t-chehanig. Neh, banid wa masma hab ni-wua ch hekaj hab ni-elith mani pi ha chu'ichig.
50003007	T wabshaba am hahawa i e tashogi g Jesus Christ ni-wui. Kuni hemuch hahawa pi ab hu ha'ichuchuth wehs ihtha nani pi g Jesus Christ ab si ha'ichuchuth.
50003008	Wehs ha'ichu o d wabsh pi ha'ichu hahawa no pi ba'ich i s-ap'e mant wo s-mahchk g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Wehs ant ha'ichu s-ohhoth mant wo s-mai g Jesus Christ
50003009	k am wo i ni-hemakoj heg wehm. Heki anid hu g chehanig oithch hab ni-elith mani s-ap'e am Jiosh tahgio. T wabshaba am hahawa i ni-tashogi g wohokam g Jesus Christ. Kunt ab i s-wohoch. T hekaj am i ni-ap'ech g Jiosh e tahgio.
50003010	Ni hahawa tatchua mant wo si s-mahchk g Jesus Christ ch ab wo taht hegai gewkthaj mat hekaj i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed, chum anis hems hab wa'ap wo ni-sho'igch.
50003011	Neh, bant wa masma hab wa'ap wo i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed mat d wo si oithchkam tashk.
50003012	Pi ani hab kaij manis heki hu wehs ab i neith ihtha ch wehs ap'echuthas ch wabshaba am ni-nakog mant heg ab wo bei mo haschu ab ni-makiog g Jesus Christ ch hekaj an ni-bei.
50003013	Heg ant hekaj pi wo chegito mat haschu heki hu has i e juh am ni-tahgio k am wui wo ni-gewkai hegai mo haschu am ni-ba'ich.
50003014	Neh, mo g s-melithkam am e gewkathch mat wo ha gehg k wo bei g s-ap e-namkithadag. Kuni ahni am hab wa'ap ni-gewkathch mant wo bei g s-ap ni-namkithadag. K d ihtha mant an haha wo wehmajk g Christ an Jiosh kihthag ed.
50003015	Wehsijj att hab wo wa chum t-junihith ahchim mach s-gegokim hihim g t-wohochuthadag. Ha'ijj amtp hems pi hab masma hab e junihim. T wabshaba g Jiosh wo mahsko em-wuij mam haschu i pi ap hab wua.
50003016	Am amt wo oithath g wohokam mam ab he'es i heki hu s-mahch ch am hab junihim.
50003017	Am ani si s-gewkam oith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch am em-chehgith mamt has wo masmak. Mt wo si ha nenashanath hegam mo am hab e wua mani has i masma em-chehgith ch am ha oithk hab wo e junihith.
50003018	Ab at e muhkith g Jesus Christ kots t ab mat wo t-tho'ibia. K eda mu'ijj ab wui gegok ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga. Ith o si pi ap ni-tahtchuth. Kuni wa mu'ikko am em-ahgith ihtha heki hu ch hemu am ep em-ahgith.
50003019	Ihtham o heg wa'i ab si has elith hejel e-tatchui ch heg wa'i s-hohho'ith jewed t ab ha'ichu. T g Jiosh gm hu wo i ha shul Jiawul kih ed no pi e hahaschuth heg hekaj mat hekaj wo chum si e eh'elithath.
50003020	Kuch wabshaba ahchim am chegito g thahm kahchim ch ed t-kihthag. Ab at amjed wo jiwia g t-tho'ibiakam Jesus Christ. Kuch ab nenida.
50003021	Heg at gawul wo juh g mukialig t-hon heg hekaj si ge'e e-gewkthag mat hekaj wehs ha'ichu wo thahmkath. T g t-hon si s-kehg hab wo masmak hab masma mo g honaj si s-kehg hab mahs ab i wuhshanik muhkig amjed.
50004001	Pegih, ab amt i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus. M d hahawa si ni-tatchuithch ni-wepnag. Ni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk ch chum si s-em-neithamk. S-gegokim g wo gegokkath am eda g e-wohochuthadag.
50004002	Ab ani s-em-ahgithamk ahpim Euodia ch Syntyche mamt pi wo e ne'owinath ch am wabsh wo i e wehmajk nam pi d e wehm wohochuththam.
50004003	Ihtham u'uwi o am si i ni-wehmajkahim mach wa am ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Ni heg hekaj am ep s-m-ahgithamk ahpi map hab e chechcheg I-ha-Wehmttham mapt woho am wo i ha wehmajk map hab masma i ni-wehmajkahim. Clement ch ha'i ehp o hab wa'ap i ni-wehmajkahim. Pi o wehs s-e mahch g ha-chechgig ch wabshaba an o'ohadag heg eda mo an e o'ohan g e tho'ibiakam ha-chechgig ch an kahch Jiosh kihthag ed.
50004004	Si g wo s-hehgig ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ mani hab masma chum hekith hab chech'e.
50004005	E o aihim mat ep wo jiwia. Kumt heg hekaj wabsh wo i s-hehemajimak ab wehs ha wui g hemajkam.
50004006	Pi g wo sha'i e kudut heg hekaj mam haschu i chum tatchua k ab wabsh wo i tai g Jiosh k ab wo i ho'ige'el matp haschu hab wo i t-juni.
50004007	T g Jiosh ab wo em-mahkath g s-ap tahhathkam. K ihtha s-ap tahhathkam pi ta amichuthama ch wabshaba wo chehmo g t-thothakag. Kutt hab pi ha'ichukaj wo t-kudutath ahchim matt ab i t-hemakoch g Jesus Christ wehm.
50004008	Am g wo chegitok wehs ihtha mo haschu d s-ap'ekam k ab wo hehgchulithath g Jiosh heg amjed mo haschu d wohokam ch haschu d si o'othhamthag ch haschu d s-ap'ekam ch haschu s-kehgaj.
50004009	Am g wo i e mashcham k hab wo junihith hegai mam haschu i kahk ch ab bei ni-amjed. Kut wo e chehgi mo am em-wehmaj hegai mat t-tho'ibia k ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam.
50004010	Si ge'e s-hehgig ant bei ab amjed g Jiosh mamt ab ep i e chehgi mam ab si pihk e elith ni-wui. Tash o pi am hu em-ap'e mams ab ha'ichu wo ni-mah k wo i ni-wehmt. Ni wabshaba s-mahch mam si pihk e elith ni-hekaj.
50004011	Ni pi hab ahgch hab kaij manis ha'ichu si tatchua nant pi s-mai mant ab wabsh wo si s-ap ni-tahtkk mani haschu i edgith,
50004012	chum anis hebaichujj wo bihugim k pi ha'ichu wo edgithath o hebaichujj ge'e ha'ichu wo edgithath.
50004013	Jesus Christ o ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag. Nt heg hekaj wo ni-nako mant s-ap am hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui.
50004014	K wabshaba si s-ap'e mamt am i ni-wehmt pi ni-ap'ethag ed.
50004015	S-mahch am ahpim Philippi t am wohochuththam mam d wa'i ahpim ch am i ni-wehmaj am i thahm mant am em-thagito am u'apak g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh amai Macedonia jewed ch ed.
50004016	Ni hebaichujj ha'ichu tatchua ab Thessalonica kihhim t ab. Kum ab ni-mamka.
50004017	Pi o hab mahs manis heg ab wa'i tatchua em-mahkig. Ba'ich ani i tatchua mamt ab wo bei g ho'ige'ithalig ab amjed g Jiosh.
50004018	Ia at u'apa g em-mahkig g Epaphroditus. Kuni hahawa pi ha'ichu sha'i tatchua. Em-mahkig o hab sha masma mo hegai s-ap uhw ha'ichu mo wa ab e iagchulith Jiosh wui. K g Jiosh ab si s-hohho'ith
50004019	ch hab wa'ap wo em-mahkath mam haschu i tatchua. Ab o e chehgithch ab amjed g Jesus Christ mo g Jiosh ge'e ha'ichu an to'akch am t-wehhejed.
50004020	Chum att hekith wo hehgchulithath g Jiosh t-ohg! Chum hekith!
50004021	Ab amt wo ha ahgi g t-wehm wohochuththam mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el. Ni-wehm chikpantham iia o hab wa'ap kaij mamt ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el.
50004022	K wehsijj g t-wehm wohochuththam hab wa'ap kaij, wahm hegam mo ia ha'ichug ge'e kownal kih ed.
50004023	Neh, ab at wo wa ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'ithath g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
51001001	T-wepnag mam am kih Colossai t am: Am ant wo i em-o'ohani g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ahni Paul mat g Jiosh am i ni-kei mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alithaj Jesus Christ. K ia i ni-wehmt g t-wehnag Timothy. Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh t-ohg ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
51001003	Chum ach hekith ab i ho'ige'ith g Jiosh em-wehhejed t-ho'ige'ithahunch.
51001004	Ab amtsh i s-wohoch g wohokam ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ k ab hahawa si ha tatchua g e-wehm wohochuththam. Ith ach hekaj ab i ho'ige'ith g ohgaj Jiosh.
51001005	Bam masma nam pi ab wui i e gewpkathch hegai s-kehg kihthag mo g Jiosh am nahtokch t-wehhejed an thahm kahchim ch ed.
51001006	Am at em-wui jiwia ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga no pi an wehsko chehmohim g jewed ch am ha ap'echuthahim hegam mo ab kaiham hab masma mo hab em-wua. Woho amsh s-mahch g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag
51001007	nash pi am em-ahgith ihtha t-wehm chikpantham Epaphras. Ith ach ab si tatchua ch hab elith mo si s-ap hab wua g e-chikpan am em-shahgith.
51001008	Ia at hahawa jiwia k am t-ahgith mamsh ab a'ai si e tatchua g gewkthajkaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
51001009	Kuch heg hekaj chum hekith t-ho'ige'ithahun em-wehhejed. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o ab em-mahkch g amichuthadag. Kuch ab tahni g Jiosh mat hab wo em-juh mamt s-ap wo hekaj hegai amichuthadag k wo s-mahchk g tatchuij.
51001010	Bamt masma ab wo si ha'ichuchuthath g t-kownalig Jesus ch ab wo hehgchulithath am hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam namt pi ba'ich i s-ap wo s-mahchk g Jiosh.
51001011	Jiosh o wehs edgith g gewkthag. Kuch ab tahni mat ba'ich ab wo i em-mahkath g gewkthag. Mt hekaj wehs ha'ichu s-e tahtk ch wo nakogath ch wo si s-hehgigk.
51001012	Jiosh kownaltalig o d hekia tonlig. K g Jiosh s-kehg ha'ichu an nahtokch t-wehhejed ahchim mach d hemajkamgaj. Kumt ab wo si i ho'ige'el mat am i em-ap'ech mam d hahawa hemajkamgaj ch ab wo bei hegai mo an nahtokch.
51001013	Jiawul o an wehs ha u'ukch hegam mo hedai pi mahch g Jiosh. K g kownaltaligaj d hekia s-chuhugam. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i t-wuwhas ab gewkthaj amjed k am i t-wahpki si e-tatchuithch e-alithag kownaltalig ed.
51001014	T heg t-tho'ibia k gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
51001015	Jiosh o pi ta neithagma ch wabshaba hemu e chehgithch gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag. Kutt hab wa'i masma ab wo nei g Jiosh matt wo nei g alithaj. Heki o hu an wehmaj g e-ohg mat eda koi an hu ha'ichu e nahto ch wehs ha'ichu ba'ich d i si s-has ha'ichu.
51001016	Jiosh at am i kei g e-alithag mat wehs ha'ichu wo nahto. T heg wehs nahto hegai mo haschu an hab i chu'ig thahm kahchim ch ed ch in jewed thahm, hegai mach haschu i neith ch hegai mach pi neith. K wehs d chuhchaij g nahnko mahs kokownal in jewed thahm ch an thahm kahchim ch ed. K d Jiosh tatchui mat wehs ha'ichu d wo enigajk g alithaj.
51001017	K wehs ha'ichu in hab chu'ig g alithaj gewkthagkaj.
51001018	K heg d t-mo'o am himtham ahchim mach ab ihm. Kuch ab amjed bekch g t-thoakag hab masma mo g honshpadag ab mo'o t amjed bekch g e-thoakag. Jiosh alithag o wehs d t-si'ihegi ch ab i wuhsh muhkig amjed mat d wo si s-has ha'ichuk am wehs ha'ichu thahm.
51001019	Chum as hab masma ia jiwia g Jesus mo g o'othham k eda d Jiosh wehmaj g e-ohg ch heg hekaj wepo chu'ig.
51001020	Ab amt naggai kots t ab k mua. Kut eda ha hiwigi g Jiosh no pi hab d elithaj mat g alithaj wo hejel e iagchul. T heg hekaj wehs ha'ichu wo e nako mat wo chum i e ap'ech am Jiosh wui.
51001021	Mehk am wa ab amjed g Jiosh ch d obgaj nam pi pi ap ha'ichu chegito ch pi ap ha'ichu hab junihim.
51001022	T wabshaba g Jiosh gm hu hab i juh g e-obgatalig k ab wabsh i chum em-hemakoj e wehm heg hekaj e-alithag muhkig. Kumt heg hekaj d wo hekia s-ap'ekamk ch pi ab hu wo ha chu'ichigk
51001023	mamtp am wabsh i s-gewkam wo wohochuthath g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g alithaj ch pi gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed. Ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga o wehsijj ab d ha wuikam g hemajkam ch heg hekaj an wehsko chehmohim g jewed.
51001024	Bo sha mahs mach d honshpadaj g Christ ahchim mach ab ihm. Heg atsh si e sho'igch t-wehhejed. Kuni wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk ch am oithch ni-sho'igchuth mat s-ap wo e nahto g honshpadaj hegam ha hekaj mat hab wa'ap ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga.
51001025	Am at i ni-kei g Jiosh mant wo em-ahgithahi ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj. Ni heg hekaj d em-pionag ch am em-ahgith.
51001026	E o ehstokch gd hu i shohshon k amjed mat woho has wo t-juni g Christ. T wabshaba hemuch am si tashogi g Jiosh t-wui.
51001027	K d ihtha mat g Christ ab wo t-mah g Hekai S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kut heg am wo t-edak, chum hems ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam, ch hab wo t-juh matt d wo Jiosh hemajkamgak ch wehmaj ab wo si has t-elithath am kihthaj ed.
51001028	Kuch am chum t-nakog matt wehs wo ha ahgi g hemajkam ab amjed g Jesus Christ k wo ha shohbith k ep wo ha mashcha mat has wo masmak ha'as mach he'es i s-amichuth. T hab s-ge'ema wo hihimath e-wohochuthadag ed. Kutt am wo ha chehgi Jiosh wui mo hab masma.
51001029	Ab o si ge'e ni-mahkch g Christ g gewkthag. Ni heg hekaj am si ni-gewkathch mant wo nahto ihtha chikpan.
51002001	Mamt hu wo i s-mahchk mani has i masma s-gewkam ni-ho'ige'ithahun am em-wehhejed ch am ep ha wehhejed hegam mo am kih Laodicea t am, pej wehs ha wehhejed hegam mo pi ni-mahch no ge ni-neith.
51002002	Jiosh o am chum wehs t-tashogith g e-amichuthadag ch e-mahchig gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag. Kuni ab tahni mat am wo si i em-gewkemhunath mamt wo s-ap s-mai hegai mo wa g Jiosh am t-tashogith k ab a'ai wo i e tatchuath hab masma mam d e-hajunim.
51002004	Ha'i o chum ha iattogith ch gm hu ha wanchshulig ab amjed g Christ. Kumt wabshaba pi ab hu wo ha kaiha, chum as hems hab wo e wuath mo s-ap'e.
51002005	Pi ani am hu ha'ichug em-wehm ch wabshaba chum hekith am em-chegito. Am amsh a'ai i e wehmt ch s-gewkam ab s-wohochuth g Jesus Christ. Kuni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk.
51002006	Ab amt i e thagito Jesus Christ wui mat d wo em-kownaligk. K d hahawa em-wuikam mamt ab wo wechok ch am wo himath g e-thoakag ch wehmaj d wo hemakok.
51002007	An g beh'i g e-gewkthag ab amjed mamt heg amjed ba'ich i s-gewkam ab wo wohochuthath mam has i masma mashchamas ch chum hekith ab wo i mahkchith g e-ho'ige'ithadag.
51002008	S-e g wo nen'oithk mat pi hedai wo em-iattogi. Ha'i ash chum s-em-mashchamamk hegai mo haschu d wabsh o'othham ha-mahchig ch em-ahgith mamt heg ab s-ap wo himath g e-thoakag. Tt wabshaba ab wo beihith g t-mashchamadag ab amjed g Christ
51002009	no pi heg d Jiosh am wehmaj g e-ohg, chum as hi wa hab masma ia jiwia mo g hemajkam.
51002010	Kumt am i e hemakoj g Christ wehm k wehmaj d hekiakam. K heg ab em-mahkch g wechij thoakag ch d kownal am wehs ha thahm g kokownal am jewed thahm ch an thahm kahchim ch ed.
51002011	Heki ach hu wa t-pahl hikuchk ahchim Tutuligo am t-chehanig oithch. K wabshaba d t-himthag ahchim matt ab ihm g Christ matt wo t-pahl wakon k hab wo t-chehgi matt ab i t-hemakoj heg wehm k ab i t-wul'o pi ap t-tatchui amjed. Gd att hu t-wachumch shuhthagi wecho t-pahl wakonch k am ep i wuhsh shuhthagi t amjed. K ith heg wa wepo matt gd hu t-hiash muhk k amjed ab uhpam i wuhsh muhkig amjed hab masma mat g Christ hab e juh.
51002013	Neh, ahpim mam d gawul mahs hemajkam ch pi edgith g t-chehanig am wa si gawulkthas ab Jiosh t amjed heg hekaj pi ap e-chu'ichig. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab em-wui mahtchul g e-alithag. Kumt ab i s-wohochuth k hab bei g wechij thoakag. Jiosh alithag at ab nako g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag kots t ab k gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
51002015	Jiawul o chum s-wulshpamk g Jiosh alithag. T wabshaba ab i e wul'o gewkthaj amjed k gewito t-wehhejed k hab masma wehs ha gewito g jijawul.
51002016	Jiosh ash wa hab masma ha chehani g Tutuligo mat am wa has mahs ha'ichu hugi wo ko'ath ch am hab wo junihith g mihshmetha piast. Ihtham chehanig o am chum t-tashogithahim mat has wo masmak g Jiosh si Kehsha mat hekith wo jiwia. T wabshaba ia hahawa jiwia g Jiosh si Kehsha k am hejel i e tashogi t-wui. K hahawa pi hab mahs machs am hab wo junihith hegai hab mahs ha'ichu k ch hekaj wo chum s-mahchk g Jiosh si Kehsha.
51002018	Ha'i o hab e elith mo em-ba'ich i s-ap'e natsh pi ha'ichu nei am e-nena ed ch hab chum kaij mamt pi wo e tho'ibia k ho'ip ab i e sho'igchuth k ab wo i has ha elithath g anghil. Pi g wo sha'i ha wohochuth. Ho o wabsh chum si e hahaschuth g hejel e-chegitoithagkaj
51002019	ch pi ab hu hiwig g Jiosh si Kehsha. K eda heg d t-mo'o ch s-ap ab i t-thagio'ith ch t-ge'elith. Kuch ahchim ab ab gi'i k ch ab ep a'ai t-ab gi'i hab masma mo g hon ch hab wa'ap masma i ge'elhim.
51002020	Ith o heg wa wepo matt heki hu koi nach pi d hemako heg wehm mat t-wehhejed muh. Heg at ab i t-wul'o heg amjed mo d wabsh hemajkam ha-mashchama. Pi g heg hekaj am haha wo i chum e ap'echuth Jiosh tahgio.
51002021	Hegam mo em-kudut o ab chum em-chehani mamt pi an hu wo hudawgath ch jejkath ch tattamath ha'ichu i.
51002022	K wabshaba am wa s-ap'e mamt wabsh wo hekaj mo haschu i s-ap'e. T wabsh wo huhug e hekajk. Hegai mo d wabsh hemajkam ha-chehanig ch ha-mashchama
51002023	o pi woho d ha'ichu amichuthadag. Bo em-ahgith mamt heg oithk wo e mihshmethath ch wo e sho'igchuthath ch hab ab wo e sho'igchuthath Jiosh wui. T wabshaba ith pi wo sha'i thotholimagi g pi ap em-tatchui.
51003001	Jiosh at ab t-mah g wechij thoakag ahchim matt ab ihm g alithaj mo d t-tho'ibiakam. K ith heg wa wepo mat ab i t-wuwhas muhkig t amjed hab masma mat ab i wuhshath g e-alithag. Hemuch o an thaha g alithaj s-apkojed hugithaj an ch am t-wehhejed ap'echuth matt wo wehmajk. Kutt heg wui am wo i t-gewpkai.
51003002	Pi g am hu wo chegitokath g jewed thahm ha'ichu ch wabshaba g thahm kahchim ha'ichu wo tatchuath.
51003003	Jiosh at am i t-wehnathk g e-alithag. T heg heki hu muh k an hab chu'ig thahm kahchim ch ed. K ith heg wa wepo matt heki hu ko'o k an wehmaj.
51003004	Ia at ep wo i wuhsh g Christ jewed thahm. Kutt am wehmaj wo i wuwhag k wepo masma wo si s-kehgajk.
51003005	Mt gm hu hab wo i juh g pi kehg e-tatchui ch pi kehg e-chegitoi k pi wo wehmaj wo'iwua matp hedai pi d em-wehm kihkam k pi wo pihk e elithath mamt ge'e ha'ichu wo bei. Hegai mat wo s-behim mo haschu pi ab hu d wuikamaj o heg jioshchuth.
51003006	S-ko'ok namkithadag at ab ha ab wo gei hegam mo hab masma ha'ichu hab junihim.
51003007	Ahpim o wa an em-u'ukch g pi kehg tatchui. Kum wa g pi ap'ekam hab junihim.
51003008	An o wa em-u'ukch g bagatalig ch hehgamthadag ch keh'ithadag. Mt wabshaba hemuch im hu wehs hab wo i juh ihtha pi ap'ekam ab e amjed k pi hekith pad wo neokath
51003009	ch pi ha'ichu wo ha iattogithath. Wehs at mukito ihtha hab mahs ha'ichu ab em-ab.
51003010	Ab amt i e thagito Jiosh wui. T heg ab em-mah g wechij thoakag k em-tatchuith mamt wo wepo masmak ch ab wo s-ap s-mahchk.
51003011	Christ o d si s-has ha'ichu am t-wehhejed ahchim mach ab ihm. Heg thoakag o am ha'ichug t-thothakag ed. Kuch heg hekaj ab i t-hemakochuthch. Pi ach hahawa t-gawulkathch ab em-amjed ahchim mach d Tutuligo. Pi o has d ahga g pahl hikuchka. Pi o t-gawulkathch g ha'ichu t-amichuthadag. Nenehol o d hemako ahchim t-wehm mach pi d nenehol. Wehsijj ach d hemako ab ihmch g Christ.
51003012	Jiosh o si pihk e elith t-hekaj ch ab i t-gawulkai. Kutt heg hekaj wo si pihk t-elithath ha hekaj g hemajkam ch wo s-hemajimak ch s-t-tahtk ch wo nakogath ha'ichu ch pi hab wo chum t-wuath machs d s-has haha'ichu am ha-nena ed.
51003013	Jiosh at ab s-t-ho'ige'ith k gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Kutt hab wa'ap wo s-ha bahbgi hegam mat hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam ab t-wui k hab wa'ap ab wo s-ha ho'ige'el.
51003014	Ab o t-ab matt a'ai t-hekaj wo si pihk t-elithath ch hab s-ap d wo hemakok.
51003015	Christ o ab em-makiog g s-ap tahhathkam. Ab g wo i ho'ige'ithath heg hekaj ch wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui nam pi d hemako heg wehm hab sha masma mam d honshpadaj.
51003016	Mt am wo s-chegitok g Christ ha'ichu ahga. Jiosh o ab em-makiog g amichuthadag. Kumt ab a'ai wo i e mashchamath ch wo ahgath g Jiosh o'ohana ed nen'ei ch mihshmetha nen'ei ch wo ne'ichuthath g Jiosh ch ab wo i mahkchith g ge'e ho'ige'ithadag.
51003017	Wehs amt hab wo junthath g t-kownalig Jesus hegai mamt haschu hab wo junihith. Kumt ab wo ho'ige'ithath g t-ohg Jiosh am gahi wuhshanim g Jesus.
51003018	Ahpim u'uwi mam ab ihm g Christ amt ab wo s-wohog ha elithath g e-wehm kihkam. Bo masma em-tatchuith g Jiosh.
51003019	Kumt ahpim chechoj wo si pihk e elithath ha hekaj g e-wehm kihkam ch ab wabsh wo i s-ha bahbgi.
51003020	Ahpim a'al amt ab wo s-wohog ha elithath g e-jehj chum hekith. Ith o d tatchuij g Jiosh.
51003021	Kumt ahpim ha-jehj pi am wo si ha babgachuthath g e-a'aliga mat pi wo heb hu wua g e-chegitoithag.
51003022	Ahpim mam d ha-pionag amt ab wo s-wohog ha elithath g e-a'amo woho'i e-tatchui ab heg wabsh hekaj mam ab si has elith g Jiosh ch pi heg hekaj mas am wo em-nei g em-a'amo k wo s-hohho'i g em-chikpan.
51003023	Pi o d wa'i o'othham mo em-chikpnachuth ch wabshaba d t-kownalig Jesus. Ab o him g tash mamt an wo wehmajk. T heg ab wo em-namkith heg hekaj em-chikpan. Kumt heg hekaj woho'i e-tatchui ab am hab wo junihith g e-chikpan.
51003025	T-kownalig Jesus at ep wo namkith hegai matp hedai hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam. Heg at wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithag. Jiosh at wehs wo ha lothai g hemajkam k hab masma wo ha namkith matp has i masma hab e junihim.
51004001	Ahpim a'amo amt s-ap ab wo ha neithath g e-pionag ch ep wo s-chegitok mam hab wa'ap ge ahmo. K heg an thaha thahm kahchim ch ed ch d Jiosh.
51004002	Ahpim wehs g chum hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ch ab ep wo i ho'ige'ithath g Jiosh.
51004003	Chum ach s-ahgamk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g alithaj. Kumt ab wo tai mat ab wo t-mah g ap'ethag matt hab wo t-juh. Thani lihso nani pi heg ahgachug.
51004004	Kumt ab wo tai g Jiosh mat hab wo ni-juh mant am si tasho wo ahgath.
51004005	Am g si s-e mamachim hab wo e junihith am ha-nena ed hegam mo pi ab hu ihm g Jiosh. Ab o em-mahkch g Jiosh g ap'ethag mamt hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. Am g s-ap wo hekaj g e-ap'ethag.
51004006	Kumt chum hekith s-hemajim wo neneokath ch wo s-ta kakaim ha'ichu ahgath. Tho em-wuikam mamt wo s-mahchk mamt has masma s-ap ab uhpam wo i nodagi g ne'oki ab wui g hemajkam ha'ichu kakkei.
51004007	Ia o t-wehmaj hegai mo hab chehgig Tychicus ch s-ap hab junihim g Jiosh chikpan.
51004008	Kuni chehani mat am wo i em-chehgimed k am wo i em-gewkemhu am em-ahgithk mach has wa'i masma.
51004009	T heg wo oi em-wehm kihkam Onesimus k d hahawa t-wehm wohochuththam. Ihtham at am wo i em-ahgi wehs ha'ichu mo hab e junihim iia.
51004010	Aristarcas o ni-wehm d ep lihso k ch am ep i em-ho'ige'elith. K hegai Mark mo d Barnabas ma'i am ep i em-ho'ige'elith. Heki ani hu em-ahgith mamt ith am wo i wahkith k wo kaiha matp am wo hih em-wui.
51004011	Joshua Justus o am hab wa'ap i em-ho'ige'elith. Tho wa'i ihtham waik mo d Tutuligo hemajkam ch ni-wehm chikpan am wehhejed g Jiosh. Kuni ha hekaj am si i ni-gewkemhun.
51004012	K ia ep thak ch am i em-ho'ige'elith hegai em-wehm kihkam mo hab chehgig Epaphras. Nt wo em-ahgi mo ith chum hekith si e ho'ige'ithahun am em-wehhejed ch am ha wehhejed hegam mo am kih Laodicea t am ch hegam mo am kih Hieropolis t am. Ab o tahni g mat Jiosh ab wo i gewkai g em-wohochuthadag. Mt hab s-ap wo s-wohog elithath g Jiosh.
51004014	Ihtha si t-tatchuithch t-nawoj Luke mo d mahkai o am ep i em-ho'ige'elith. K g Demas am ep i em-ho'ige'elith.
51004015	Am g wo ha ahgith g t-wehm wohochuththam am Laodicea t am ch hegam mo am e-mihshmath kihj am g Nymphas mat ab wo s-t-ho'ige'el.
51004016	Ihtha o'ohana amt am wo ne'okchulith k gm hu haha wo ha mah hegam mo am kih Laodicea t am. T am epai wo ne'okchul. T hegam ab epai wo em-mah hegai mant ha o'ohani. Kumt am epai wo ne'okchul.
51004017	Mt wo ahgi g Archipus mat am wo i nahto hegai Jiosh chikpan mani wa hab ahgith.
51004018	Hejel ant an wo o'oha ihtha wawnim ahni Paul mant am wo si em-ho'ige'el. Pi g wo sha'i pi chegito mani ia hu kuhpi. Neh, ab at wo wa ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'el g Jiosh.
52001001	T-wepnag mam am kih Thessalonica t am: Am ant ha'ichu wo i em-o'ohani ahni Paul. K ia ni-wehmaj g Silas ch Timothy k ch am i ni-wehmaj. Tham woho hemajkamgaj g t-ohg Jiosh ab i e thagitok t-kownalig Jesus Christ wui. Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
52001002	Chum ach hekith ab ho'ige'ith g Jiosh em-hekaj ch em-wehhejed t-ho'ige'ithahun.
52001003	Ab am si s-wohochuth g t-kownalig Jesus Christ ch hekaj chum hekith hab s-junimk g s-ap'ekam. Pihk em-elithadag o hab em-wua mam si chikpanith g Jiosh. Kum si s-gewkam him g e-thoakag nam pi si nenida hegai matsh hab wo wa t-juni g Jesus. Ith ach am wa wehs s-chegito ch hekaj chum hekith ab ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.
52001004	Jiosh o ab si em-tatchua ch ab i em-ui mamt d wo a'aligajk.
52001005	Am att u'apa g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj em-wui. Kumt ab i s-wohoch. Pi ach wabsh neneok. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at ab t-mah g gewkthag k am em-chehgi mo d wohokam g ha'ichu t-ahga. Am am wa s-mahch mach s-ap himchuth g t-thoakag am em-shahgith. Bach wa masma am em-chehgith mamt has wo i chum masmak.
52001006	Kum am t-oithch s-ap hab e junihim ch hab s-ap hab junihim g t-kownalig Jesus tatchui. Chum ams em-sho'igchuth, mt ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab em-mah g si ge'e s-hehgig.
52001007	An amsh e wehgaj ha chehgithch g e-wehm wohochuththam mat has wo chum masmak. Mu'ijj ash ab em-amjed ha'ichu mahchim hegam mo am kih Macedonia ch Greece jejewed ch ed.
52001008	T g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga gm hu a'ai ep jejewed thahm i hih ab em-amjed. Wehsko o an e a'aga mam ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh. K ab hahawa d em-wuikam mamt wo ha ahgi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kuch ab wabsh em-wui thagitokch.
52001009	Si amt s-ap ab i t-neith k ab i s-wohoch g s-wohokam Jiosh k gm hu ha thagito hegam mo d wabsh hemajkam ha-nahtoi. Ith o wehsko an a'aga g hemajkam.
52001010	Ab o wa t-aihim g s-ko'ok namkitha ab amjed g Jiosh. T wabshaba g Jiosh alithag am t-wehhejed e muhkith mat wo t-tho'ibia. T g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig amjed k ab uhpam ep bei. Hemuch amsh s-ap nenida mat ia ep wo jiwia g Jiosh. Alithag ab thahm kahchim t amjed.
52002001	Am am wa s-mahch ahpim t-wehm wohochuththam mat s-ap ha'ichu am hab e juh heg hekaj matt am thatha am ahgachugch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
52002002	Am ach wa em-ahgith mat ha'i t-sho'igch amai Philippi kihhim t am matt eda koi am hu thatha em-wui. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i t-mah g gewkthag. Kutt am wabsh s-chechojim ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj em-wui, chum as mu'i ab t-wui gegok.
52002003	Ha'ichu t-chegitoithag o am wabsh si s-ap'e. Pi ach em-iattogith ch wabshaba wabsh s-chechojim ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mamt ab wui wo i e thagito.
52002004	Jiosh at t-a'appem k am i t-chuhcha matt wo i ahgahi g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj. Kuch heg hab wa'i junihim mo haschu d tatchuij ch pi wabsh g hemajkam ha-tatchui hab junimk. Jiosh o am t-mamche mach haschu ahgch hab ha'ichu junihim.
52002005	Am am wa s-mahch mach pi wabsh em-hehosimhun ch pi em-iattogith machs wo ha'ichu em-wohppo'i. Jiosh o s-mahch mo d wohokam ihtha.
52002006	Pi ach hekith am hu t-gahgith mas g o'othham ab wo ge has t-elithath ch ab wo t-hehgchulithath.
52002007	Bo hi wa chum mahs mamt ab wo si has t-elithath ch ha'ichukaj wo i t-wehmtath ahchim mach d Jesus chuhchai. Kuch wabshaba pi am hu t-gahgith ihtha nach pi si s-hemajim ab em-neith hab masma mat g ha-je'e ab wo ha neithath g e-a'aliga.
52002008	Si ach pihk t-elith ab em-wui ch hekaj am wabsh i t-thagitokch em-wehhejed mach em-ahgithahim g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh, chum achs hems heg hekaj wo t-ko'ij.
52002009	Am amtp hu wa'i s-chegito mach si chikpan wabsh i si'alim amjed ch mehk s-chuhugam k ed matt pi ha'ichukaj wo em-kudu.
52002010	Si ach wa s-ap ab em-neith ch pi hekith hab wua g pi ap'ekam ab hema i em-wui. Jiosh o s-mahch ihtha. Kum ahpim hab wa'ap s-mahch.
52002011	Jiosh o ab i em-waith mamt am wo ap'ethagk kihthaj ed ch ab wehmaj wo u'ukchith g ab has elithadag. Kum s-mahch mach am i em-gewkemhun wepo masma mo g ha-ohg ch ab s-ap i em-neneokith ch i em-chehani mamt am hab wo masmak mam d Jiosh a'aliga.
52002013	Heg ach wa'i ahgachug Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch pi g hemajkam ha'ichu ha-ahga. Kumt hab wa'i masma hab elith k hekaj ab i s-wohoch. Jiosh o am i chikpan em-shahgith ch am wohokamchuth mo d ha'ichu ahgaj. Kuch hekaj chum hekith ab si ho'ige'elith.
52002014	Am am ha oithch hab e wua hegam e-wehm wohochuththam mo am a'ai kih Judea ch ed. Ha-wehm o'othham o ha sho'igchuth. K hegam wabsh s-ap ab nakog. Kum ahpim hab wa'ap wabsh s-ap ab nakog mo g em-wehm o'othham em-sho'igchuth.
52002015	Tho hegam ni-wehm o'othham mat wa mua g t-kownalig Jesus. Kush d t-shohshon mat wa ha koktha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. K hegam ni-wehm o'othham t-sho'igchuth ch gm hu i t-wuwhas ahchim mach am ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. K g Jiosh pi hohho'ith mo has e wua. Chum o hems ab wehs ha wui gegok g hemajkam
52002016	chum t-shohbithch ahchim mach ha ahgith g go'ol hemajkam hegai mat hekaj wo e tho'ibia. T ith ab wabsh ba'ich i ge'ethaj g pi ap ha-chu'ichig. Kut heg gm hu ai mat ab ha wui wo jiwia g wehs s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag.
52002017	Pi att sha'i pi em-chegito matt hekith am i t-gawulkai ab em-amjed. Chum ach s-em neithamk
52002018	ch am ha hekaj chum si i t-nako matt am uhpam wo hihi em-wui. Ahni Paul ant mu'ikko am chum uhpam s-himim. T am ni-kuh g jijawul ha-ge'ejig Satan.
52002019	M eda d ahpim mach am si em-hiwig ch em-hekaj wo si s-hehgigk ch ab wo si ho'ige'el g t-kownalig Jesus mat hekith ep wo jiwia.
52003001	Am att i pi t-nako am em-chegitokch. Kum s-mahch matt am i kei g t-wehnag Timothy mat am wo him k am wo em-nei. Tt ahchim am hejel wih Athens kihhim t am. Timothy o si s-ap ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g Christ. Kutt hab i t-ah mat am wo him k am wo i em-gewkemhun k am wo i gewkai g em-wohochuthadag.
52003003	Kumt hab pi hedai wo sha'i thagito g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga heg hekaj e-sho'igchuthadag. Am am wa s-mahch matt wo t-sho'igch ith hekaj t-wohochuthadag.
52003004	Ith ach wa heki hu am em-ahgith mach eda am em-wehmajkahim. Kum s-mahch mat wa woho hab e juh.
52003005	Kunid s-gihug mat am hu wo i em-bijim g ge Jiawul. Kut wo heki e wua g t-chikpan am em-shahgith. Nt pi ni-nako manis am ba'ich ep wo i neahi k hekaj am i kei g Timothy mat wo s-mai mams am wabsh kia ab s-wohochuth.
52003006	T hemuch ia ep jiwia ab em-amjed k ia u'apa g s-ta hohho'itham ahga ab amjed g em-wohochuthadag ch pihk em-elithadag. Am o t-ahgith mam chum hekith si s-ap am t-chegito ch hab wa masma chum s-t-neithamk mach ahchim has i masma chum s-em-neithamk.
52003007	Mu'i ach ha'ichu nakog ch mu'i t-sho'igchuth. K wabshaba g em-wohochuthadag ab t-gewkemhun.
52003008	S-gegokim amki ab s-wohochuth g t-kownalig Jesus. Kuch ab si t-nenenashanichuth
52003009	ch ab si i ho'ige'elith g Jiosh mam hab wa masma ab t-mahkch g s-hehgig.
52003010	Chum ach hekith ab tahni g Jiosh wehs t-ihbthagkaj matt wo wa ep em-neith k ab wo i em-wehmt mamt s-ap ab wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
52003011	Mat hems wo wa'i t-hiwigi g t-ohg Jiosh ch t-kownalig Jesus matt am wo wa ep em-nei.
52003012	Ab ach tahni g Jiosh mat ba'ich ab wo i em-mah g gewkthag mamt hekaj wo si pihk e elithath ab a'ai e wui ch ab ha wui g wehs hemajkam.
52003013	Kumt s-gegokim ab wo wohochuthath g Jiosh ch ab wui wo gawulkthask ab amjed g pi ap'ekam mamt pi wo ha chu'ichigk mat hekith ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus wehs ha wehm hegam mo d hemajkamgaj ch heki hu koi.
52004001	Pegih, t-wepnag, am ach wa em-ahgith mamt has masma wo himath g e-thoakag ch hab wo hohho'ithach g Jiosh. Ab amt bei g ha'ichu t-ahga. Kuch hemuch ab si em-tahni ch ab em-chehani am wehhejed g t-kownalig Jesus mamt ba'ich am hab wo i junihith.
52004002	S-mahch am mach wa has masma am em-shelinith g gewkthajkaj.
52004003	Jiosh o em-tatchuith mamt ab wo si i e gawulkai pi ap'ekam amjed k wo si e nuhkuth g hejel e-wehm kihkam wehhejed.
52004004	Ahpim chechoj amt wo s-mahchk mamt wo si s-ap ha hohnt am tahgio g Jiosh ch am hemajkam ha tahgio.
52004005	Hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh o wabsh hejel e-tatchui wehhejed bebhe g uwi. Mt wabshaba ahpim pi hab masma wo be
52004006	k hab pi ab hu hedai wui pi ap has wo chu'i. Heki ach hu am em-ahgith mat g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo ha namkith matp hedai am hab wo juh ihtha pi ap'ekam.
52004007	Jiosh at pi hab ahgk ab i t-gawulkai machs am hab wo junihith g s-uam ha'ichu. Tho tatchuij matt d wo hekia s-ap'ekamk.
52004008	K heg hekaj ab t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Hegai matp hedai wo s-ohhoth ihtha mashchama at wo s-ohhoth g Jiosh.
52004009	Heki atsh hu i em-tashogi g Jiosh mamt wo si pihk e elithath wehs ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuththam. K pi hab chum mahs machs am hu ep wo ge em-o'ohani ab amjed.
52004010	Si amsh pihk e elith wehs ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuththam am wehs Macedonia jewed ch ed. Kuch wabshaba ab si em-tahni mamt ba'ich am hab wo i e junihith.
52004011	Am g wo i e nakog mamt wo s-thotholimak ch am hab wo junihith g hejel e-chikpan ch wo ha'ichu e gahgithath. Ith ach wa heki hu hab em-ahgith.
52004012	Bamt masma pi hedai ab hu wo hiwgath mas ab wabsh wo em-mah hegai mam haschu i tatchua. T hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh wo em-nei mam s-chikpnadag k ab wo si has em-elithath.
52004013	Si ach em-tatchuith mamt wo s-mahchk g wohokam ab ha amjed hegam mat heki hu koi. T hahawa pi wo i em-bijim g pi ap tahhathkam hab masma mat hab wo ha juh g pi wohochuththam.
52004014	Neh, ab at i wuhsh g Jesus muhkig amjed. Kuch s-wohochuth ihtha ch hekaj ab wui nenea mat g Jiosh ab ep wo i ha wuwhas hegam mat koi ab s-wohochuthch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus.
52004015	Hegam atsh wo i wuwha ab amjed g muhkig matt koi an hu wo nam g t-kownalig Jesus.
52004016	Wehpeg at ab wo si s-kaitham t-wai g anghil ha-ge'ejig. T g Jiosh kuikud ab haha wo kaitha. T ab haha wo i hud g t-kownalig Jesus ab thahm kahchim t amjed. T hegam mat heki hu koi ab s-wohochuthch g Jesus ab wo i wuwha.
52004017	T hegam mat hedai in d wo kia thothakamk heg i tash ed ab haha wo i e hemapai ha wehm chewagi ch ed k an wo nam g t-kownalig. Kutt am i amjed chum hekith wo wehmajk g t-kownalig.
52004018	Ab g wo si e gewkemhunath ith hekaj ha'ichu ahga.
52005001	Pi o hab mahs manis am hu wo em-o'ohani ab amjed mas hekith hab wo i e juh ihtha ha'ichu mani am ahg.
52005002	Am am wa s-ap s-mahch mat chum s-a'agi wo e ai mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus. Neh, pi o ta machima mas hekith wo i jiwia g s-chu ehskam chuhug ch ed, o mas hekith wo i e ai mat g uwi ab wo taht g s-ko'ok k wo bei g ali. K hab wa'ap pi ta machima am ha wehhejed g pi e tho'ibiakam mas hekith ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig.
52005003	Ihtham at hab wo kaijjith mo wehs ha'ichu am wabsh i si s-ap'e ch s-thotholima. T am wabsh wo si e ai mat wo e ko'ijith k pi wo e tho'ibia.
52005004	Kum eda ahpim e tho'ibiakam s-mahch ihtha. K pi hab chum mahs mat s-a'agi wo jiwia hegai tash em-wui hab sha masma mo g s-chu ehskam.
52005005	Jiosh o ha'ichu t-tashogith. Kuch an u'ukch g tonlig hab masma mo hegam mo am tash ed hihim.
52005006	Pegih, tt wo chum s-nenenashanik ch pi hab wo masmak mo g nawkkoi.
52005007	Hegam mo pi nenenashanik ch nawkko'o o am eda g s-chuhugam.
52005008	Kutt wabshaba ahchim s-ap wo t-nahtokchith hab masma mo g shonthal. T-wohochuthadag ch pihk t-elithadag o d wainomi lihwa t-wehhejed. Kuch ab wui t-gewpkathch mat g t-tho'ibiathag s-ap wo e nahto. K ith hab sha masma mo g wainomi wonami t-wehhejed.
52005009	Pi at hab ahgk ab i t-gawulkai g Jiosh mas wo t-namkith heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig k wabshaba hab ahgk mat g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wo t-tho'ibia.
52005010	Heg at muh t-wehhejed k i wuhsh matt d wo thothakamk wehmaj. K wabsh chum has masma s-ap'e chum achs wo heki hu koi o in d wabsh wo kia thothakamk mat wo jiwia.
52005011	Mt heg hekaj ab wabsh wo si a'ai e gewkemhunath ch ab a'ai ha'ichukaj wo i e wehmajk mam am hab wa e junihim.
52005012	Ab ach si em-tahni mamt s-ap ab wo ha neithath g e-wanimedtham ch hegam mo am em-mashcham ch ab shohbithch g pi ap'ekam em-shahgith. Tho Jiosh hab elitha mo hab wua.
52005013	Ab g wo si has ha elithath ch s-ha ho'ige'ithath no pi hab wua a Jiosh chikpan. Am g wabsh wo s-thotholim kihk e wehm.
52005014	Ab ach si em-tahni mamt wo ha ahgithath hegam mo s-papadma mat wo chikpanath. Ab g wo i ha gewkemhunath hegam mo pi wihnam gegok am e-wohochuthadag ed. I g wo ha wehmtath hegam mo pi ha gewpthag ch ab wehsijj wo si ha bahbgi.
52005015	Pi g am uhpam wo agwua mat hema s-ko'okam wo em-juh k wabshaba chum hekith am wo i e nakogath mamt s-ap ha'ichu hab wo wuath ab a'ai e wui ch ab wehs ha wui g hemajkam.
52005016	Chum g hekith wo s-ap e tahtkkath.
52005017	Chum g hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahunath.
52005018	Ab g wo s-ho'ige'ithath g Jiosh, chum atp haschu has wo i chu'igk. Ith o d Jiosh tatchui em-wehhejed ahpim mamt ab i e hemakoj g Jesus Christ wehm.
52005019	Pi g am hu wo shohbith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
52005020	Pi g am wo s-kaihogi hegam mo g Jiosh ab ha mahkch g ha'ichu ahga
52005021	k wabshaba wehs ha'ichu wo i a'appemath ch g s-ap'ekam ab wo u'ukchith.
52005022	Im g hu wehs hab wo i juhni g pi ap'ekam.
52005023	Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam. Kuni ab tahni mat wehs gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap'ekam ab em-amjed k wo si nuhkuthath g em-thoakag ch em-ihbthag ch em-hon mat d wo hekia s-ap'ekamk. Mt am hahawa pi wo ha chu'ichigk mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
52005024	Jiosh at ab i em-wai e wui k chum hekith hab junihim mo has i kaij.
52005025	Am g wo t-wehhejed e ho'ige'ithahunath.
52005026	Am g wo ha ahgith g t-wehm wohochuththam mat ab wo i s-t-ho'ige'el.
52005027	Ni ab si em-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus gewkthagkaj mamt am wo ne'okchul ihtha o'ohana am wehs ha wui g t-wehm wohochuththam amai.
52005028	Neh, ab at wo wa ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'el g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
53001001	T-wepnag mam am kih Thessalonica t am: Am ant ep wo i em-o'ohani ahni Paul. K ia ni-wehmaj g Silas ch Timothy k ch am i ni-wehmaj. Tham woho hemajkamgaj g t-ohg Jiosh ab i e thagitok t-kownalig Jesus Christ wui.
53001002	Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
53001003	Chum ach hekith ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh em-hekaj, t-wepnag. Am amsh si i gewkahim e-wohochuthadag ed ch ba'ich i si pihk e elith ab a'ai e wui.
53001004	Kuch heg hekaj si s-ap t-tahtk ch wehsko ha ahgithahim g t-wehm wohochuththam ab em-amjed. Msh am em-sho'igchuth nam pi ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh. Kumsh eda s-ap ab nakog g e-sho'igthag am wehhejed g Jiosh.
53001005	Ith o am wohokamchuth mat am i em-ap'ech g Jiosh e wehhejed k pi ab hu ha'ichu wo em-abch am lothaita ch ed. Am am e sho'igchuth wehhejed g Jiosh kownaltalig. K g Jiosh hab em-elith mam d s-ap'ekam ch am wo i em-wahpki e-kihthag ed.
53001006	Jiosh at s-ap hab wo juh g lothaita. Hegam mo em-sho'igchuth at wo e sho'igch heg hekaj.
53001007	Kumt ahpim wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g e-sho'igchuthadag. Jiosh at hab wo juh ihtha mat hekith ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus ab thahm kahchim t amjed. T ia wehmaj wo thatha g anghiligaj k wo si s-gewkthagk.
53001008	T ia wehmaj ep wo e chehgi g si ge'e mei. T wo s-ko'okam ha namkith g Jesus hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh ch pi ab hu wohog elith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus.
53001009	Hegam at gm hu wo si i e gawulkai ab amjed g Jiosh k pi hekith wo bei g ge'e gewkthaj k chum hekith ab wo beihith g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.
53001010	Ith at hab wo e juh mat hekith ia ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus. Kut g gewkthaj am haha wo i chehgi mat t-tho'ibia k ab i t-gawulkai e wehhejed.
53001011	Pegih, heg ach hekaj chum hekith ab t-ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui am em-wehhejed. Ab at i em-wai mamt wo e tho'ibia k d wo a'aligajk. M hab hahawa s-junimk g s-ap'ekam ab s-wohochuthch. Kuch ab tahni g Jiosh mat am e-tatchui oithk hab wo em-juh k hab s-ap hab wo em-elithath. Jiosh o gewkthag mat hab wo juh ihtha mach ab tahni.
53001012	Kumt ab wo si ha'ichuchuthath g t-kownalig Jesus. T heg hab wa'ap ab wo si em-ha'ichuchuthath. Jiosh at si s-hemajim am i ap'ech g e-alithag wehm mat ith hab wo em-juni.
53002001	Bach wa em-ahgith mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus Christ k ab e wui wo i t-ui.
53002002	Kush am hema em-ahgith mat heki hu hab e juh. Pi g am wo sha'i e kudut k pi sha'i ha wohochuth, chum as hems hab wabsh e wua mo heg am ha tashogith g Jiosh o atp hems em-ahgith matt ahchim hab masma ha'ichu o'oha.
53002003	Koi at e ai. Hemho wa at wehpeg am hab wo e juh mat mu'i ab wui wo gegokiwua g Jiosh hegam mo hab chum kaij mo ab s-wohochuth. T am hahawa hema wo i wuhsh g o'othham k wehs ha ba'iwechkim d wo pi ap'ekamk ch d wo si obgajk g Jiosh ch am wo i wah ge'e cheopi ch ed am Jerusalem t am k am wo thahiwua mat g hemajkam ab wo jiosht. Kut pi wo ha hiwigi mas ha'ichu ep wo jioshgak. T g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo namkithath chum hekith.
53002005	Am am wa s-chegito mani wa am wa heki hu em-ahgith ihtha mani eda am em-wehmaj.
53002006	S-mahch am mo g pi ap'ekam an e shohbithch hemu. T wabshaba has tash in hu hab wo i e juh hegai mo an shohbithch.
53002008	T am haha wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus k si s-masma ab wo e chehgith k ab ab wo ihbhe hegai si pi ap o'othham k hekaj wo mu'a k gm hu wo si i tha'ich mamt hebai wo ha nehnich g jijawul.
53002009	T g jijawul ha-ge'ejig Satan ab wo mah g gewkthag. Kut hab wo juh g nahnko mahs s-hasig ha'ichu ch s-ta neithamam ha'ichu mat wo ha iattogi g hemajkam.
53002010	Kut hegam ab wo i s-wohoch mo hedai d pi e tho'ibiakam.
53002011	Jiosh at hab wo ha juh mat wabsh g ha'ichu iattogi ab wo s-wohoch no pi ihtham s-hohho'ith g pi ap'ekam ch pi ab hu wo bei g wohokam mat hekaj wo chum e tho'ibia.
53002012	T hegam mo e iattogith ch ab s-wohochuth hab wa'ap ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.
53002013	Mt wabshaba ahpim wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. Si o pihk e elith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ em-hekaj. Kumt am wehmaj ab wo e ha'ichuchuthath. Gd hu i si wehpeg at am i ap'ech g Jiosh mat g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wo i em-gawulkai wehhejed. Kumt ab i s-wohoch ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj mach wa am em-ahgith. Ith ach hekaj ab i ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.
53002015	Pegih, am ach wa em-mashcham ihtha wohokam ch am ep em-o'ohanith ab amjed. Kumt s-wihnam wo gegokkath ch an wo u'ukchith.
53002016	Ab o t-wui si pihk e elith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ g Jiosh t-ohg wehm ch ab si s-t-ho'ige'el. Kuch heg hekaj ab wui t-gewpkathch.
53002017	Ahchim ach ab tahni mat ab wo i em-gewpkathch mamt g s-ap'ekam am hab wo junihith ch hab wo kaijjith.
53003001	Ab g wo e ho'ige'ithahun, t-wepnag, k ab wo tai g Jiosh mat pi ab hu wo e shohbi g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed t-kownalig Jesus. T mu'ijj ab wo si has i elith k ab wo s-wohog el hab masma mo am hab e wua em-shahgith.
53003002	Pi ap hehemajkam o pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ab t-wui gegok. Kumt am wo si e ho'ige'ithahunath mat wo t-tho'ibia g Jiosh ab ha amjed.
53003003	Jiosh at hemho wa am hab wo juh mo haschu i t-ahgith. S-mahch ach mat ab wo i em-mah g gewkthag k wo em-nuhkuth mat pi wo em-gehg g Jiawul.
53003004	Tham t-wehm wohochuththam. Kuch heg hekaj hab em-elith mam am hab junihim hegai mach ab i em-mashcham ch am hab wabsh wo i junihith.
53003005	Ch ab i tahni g t-kownalig Jesus mat hab wo em-juh mamt ba'ich wo i mai g Jiosh pihk elithadag k wo s-chu nakogath hab masma mo hab masma g Jesus Christ.
53003006	Heki ach hu em-mashcham mamt wo s-wapagimak. K eda ha'i hegam mo d wohochuththam s-papadma ch pi am hu oithch hab e junihim g t-mashchama. Ch ab em-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus Christ gewkthagkaj mamt pi am hu wo ha wehmajk.
53003007	Am am wa t-neith mach wa pi sha'i papadma mach wa am em-wehmajkahim. Kum am wa s-mahch mamt am chum t-oithk hab wo wa masmak.
53003008	Si ach wa chikpan chum hems s-chuhugam k ed matt am wo wa ha'ichu ha namkithath hegam mach hedai i kih am thadha mamt pi ha'ichu wo heki gei t-wehhejed.
53003009	Bo hi wa chum mahs mach ap'ethag mamt ab ha'ichu wo i t-namkith nach pi d Jiosh pionag em-wehhejed. Ch wa wabshaba hejel t-thagio'ith matt am wo em-chehgi mamt has wo chum masmak.
53003010	Bach wa em-ahgith mach eda am em-wehmaj mamt pi wo ha gegos hegam mo pi tatchua mat wo chikpanath.
53003011	Kah ach mo am em-shahgith ha'i s-papadma ch pi chikpan ch wabsh himchuth g has ahgadag.
53003012	Ch ab si ha chehani g t-kownalig Jesus Christ gewkthagkaj ch ab ha gewkemhun mat am wabsh wo i e bahbgi k wo chikpanath ch hekaj wo e thagio'ithath.
53003013	Kumt ahpim mam wabsh s-ap am hab e junihim am hab wabsh wo i junihith g s-ap'ekam ch pi wo thagito
