53003014	ch wabshaba wabsh wo thagito hegai matp hedai pi ab hu wo wohog elithath ihtha mani ia em-chehani. Tp hems ab wo wa bei g si edathag k am wo i e ap'ech.
53003015	Am g wo s-chegitok mo pi d em-obga ch wabshaba d em-wepnag mamt ab wo shohbithath ha'ichukaj.
53003016	Chum at hekith am wo em-wehmajk g t-kownalig Jesus. Kuch ab tahni mat chum hekith ba'ich ab wo i em-mahkath g s-ap tahhathkam.
53003017	Ahni Paul ant ia hahawa si hejel ha'ichu wo o'oha hab masma mani hab wa wua an wehs ni-o'ohana ed. Mt hab masma wo s-mahchk mani d ahni.
53003018	Neh, ab at wo ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'el g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
54001001	Ni-wehnag Timothy: Ia ant ha'ichu wo i m-o'ohani ahni Paul mani d kehshaj g Jesus Christ. Jiosh at ni-cheha mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alithaj Jesus Christ. T hab ab wo hiwgath g hemajkam mat heg am wo ha u'apa Jiosh kihthag wui.
54001002	Ab g ni-kaiham ahpi Timothy map d ni-alithag ab i s-wohochuthk g ha'ichu ni-ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ. Ab o wa si s-m-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i m-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
54001003	Ab ani wa si s-ap m-ahgith mapt am wo wih Ephesus t am mani wa am him gm hu wo himk Macedonia wui. Am g wabsh i thakath ch am wo si ha keshwua hegam mo g iattogi chum ha mashcham.
54001004	Ihtham o chum ha mashcham mo g hoho'oki a'agitha ab wehnags g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ep chum ha mashcham mat hemho wa wo s-chegitok g e-shohshonbad ha-chechgig. T wabshaba ihtha ha-mashchama hab wo ha juh mat wo thagito g Jiosh hab elitha k ab wabsh a'ai wo e ne'owinath. Bat wa'i masma wo s-mahchk g Jiosh hab elitha mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj.
54001005	Pt wo ha ahgi mat woho ab wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch heg hab wo wa'i junihith mo haschu s-mahch mo d s-ap'ekam ch hab pi wo e kudutath. Ith at hab wo ha juh mat wo i ge'etha g ha-tatchuithag.
54001006	Ha'i at thagito g e-wohochuthadag k hekaj wabsh ha wehm e ne'owin.
54001007	Ihtham o hab chum e elith mo d chehanig ha mashchamtham ch wabshaba pi amichuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga chum as hab e elith mo s-e mahchk ch neneok.
54001008	S-ap'e o g chehanig. K wabshaba ihtham pi ap hekaj am chum ha shohbithch hegam mo hab wua g s-ap'ekam. K eda g chehanig chum e hekaj mat wo ha shohbi hegam mo g pi ap'ekam hab wua. Ihtham o pi ab hu has elith g Jiosh ch pi ab hu wohog elith. Ha'ijj o s-ha mu'amk chum hems g e-ohg o g e-je'e.
54001010	Ha'ijj o g s-totontom ha'ichu chegitok ch chum hems chum e u'uwichuth o e chechojchuth ch e wehm hab junihim g s-uam ha'ichu. Ha'ijj o ha lilsochuth wabsh hejel e wehhejed ch ha iattogith ch ab ha'ichu ha abchuth g s-ap'ekam o'othham. Nahnko masma o ab wui gegok g mashchamaj g Jiosh hegam mo chum ha mashcham g iattogi.
54001011	Jiosh o ni-nuhkuthachuth ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu e-ahga. K heg am t-tashogith ihtha mant em-ahgi.
54001012	T-kownalig Jesus oki hab ni-elith mant s-ap am hab wo junihith ihtha chickpan nat pi am i ni-kehsh k ab ni-mahkch g gewthag wehhejed. Kuni heg hekaj ab si ho'ige'ith.
54001013	Heki anid hu wa ha sho'igchuth hegam mo ab s-wohochuth g Jesus ch ab ha wui pi ap has ahg g Jesus. Kut eda heg ab si i s-ni-ho'ige'el nani pi pi ni-mahch ch hab junihim pi ab hu wohochuthch.
54001014	Si at s-hemajim ab ni-wui i e tashogi. Nt hab ab i s-wohochuth k ab i ni-hemakoj wehmaj k ab wui a pihk ni-elith.
54001015	Neh, hema hab che'ithag o hab chu'ig. “Ia at jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus jewed thahm mat wo ha tho'ibia g pi ap chu'ijkam.” K ith d si wohokam nat pi ab si s-ni-ho'ige'el. Ni eda shahag wepo mani wa wehs ha ba'iwechkim d si pi ap chu'ijkam mani wa cheggia g t-tho'ibiakam Jesus ha sho'igchuthch hegam mo ab s-wohochuth. T heg ab wabsh ni-bahbgi mat wehs am wo ha chehgi g hemajkam mat ab wabsh wo ha bahbgi. Tp hems hab wa'ap ab wo i s-wohochuth k ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
54001017	Neh, wehs ha'ichu thahm o d kownal g Jiosh ch pi ta neithagma ch pi hekith im hu hab wo i e juh. Kutt ab wo si uhgk i ulin k ab wo hehgchulithath chum hekith. Neh, woho o wa ihtha.
54001018	Pegih, ni wehnag, Timothy, heki o hu am i t-tashogith g Jiosh maptki am hab wo junihith ihtha chikpan. Kuni ab ep i m-gewkemhun mapt hab wo wa junihith. Hegai Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab m-wui at hab wo masmak mo g s-kehg cheggiakud. Pt hekaj ab wui kehkkath g ge Jiawul.
54001019	An g si u'ukchith g e-wohochuthadag ch heg hab wo wa'i junihith map haschu s-mahch mo d s-ap'ekam. Ha'ijj oki pi hab masma ch hekaj padch g e-wohochuthadag.
54001020	Hymanaeus ch Alexander oki ha'i hegam ch pi ap has ahg g Jiosh. Nt gm hu i ha thagito ge Jiawul wui mat wo e sho'igchuth k atp hems wo thagito g pi ap e-chu'ichig.
54002001	Si ani s-m-ahgithamk mapt wo ha'ichu ha ahgi g t-wehm wohochuththam. Tho si ha'ichu mat ab wo e ho'ige'ithahunath Jiosh wui. Pt wo ha ahgi mat ab wo tahnith g i wehmtadag ch wo e ho'ige'ithahunath am ha wehhejed g wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam.
54002002	K hab ep mahs mat wo e ho'ige'ithahunath am ha wehhejed g kokownal ch u'usagakam mat ihtham s-ap hab wo junihith g e-chikpan. Kutt hab s-thotholim wo kihthagk ch wo s-ap t-tahtkkath.
54002003	Neh, ith at wo hohho'ithach g Jiosh no pi d t-tho'ibiakam
54002004	ch tatchua mat wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam wo e tho'ibia k wo s-mai g wohokam ab amjed.
54002005	Tho wa'i hemako g t-ohg Jiosh. K hab wa'ap d wa'i hemako g si Kehshaj ch d Jesus Christ ch d wa'i hegai mat i t-hemakoch g Jiosh wehm. Jesus Christ at t-wepo e juh mat d wo o'othhamk
54002006	ch ab wo bei g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag k hab wo t-tho'ibia. Ith o am t-chehgithch mo wehs hemajkam s-ha tho'ibiamk g Jiosh.
54002007	Kut heg hekaj am i ni-kei mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alithaj k wo ha mashcha g gawul mahs hemajkam g wohokam. S-mahch ap wehs ihtha.
54002008	Bant wo chei mat wahm g chechoj ab wo e ho'ige'ithahunath Jiosh wui ch atp hems am wo uhgk uh'ul e-nohnhoi. S-ap at ha'ichu hab wo elithath ch pi wo sha'i s-bagak ab hedai i wui.
54002009	Kunt hab ep wo chei mat g u'uwi wabsh s-ap ab wo e enigadathch ch ep s-ap hab wo juhkchith g e-mo'o mat pi heg hekaj wo chum si e hahaschuthath.
54002010	Ab o ha ab mat chum hekith am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch heg amjed wo e chehgithch mo d wohochuththam.
54002011	Ab o d ep ha-wuikam mat wabsh s-bahbagi ch s-thotholim ab wo kaiham k wo mahchith g Jiosh himthag.
54002012	Ahni ani pi sha'i ha hiwgith g u'uwi mas wo ha mashcha g chechoj o am ha thahm wo e uh'ulinchith.
54002013	Ab o ha ab g chechoj mat am wo i ha wanim g hemajkam ith eda himthag. Jiosh at wehpeg nahto g cheoj k am haha wabsh oithk nahto g uwi. Ihtham ash wa hab chechgig Adam ch Eve.
54002014	Kush pi d Adambad mat e iattogi. Hegai uwi atsh e iattogith k melchkwua g Jiosh chehanig.
54002015	T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab ha mah g u'uwi mat wo e sho'igch hekith am i ha mamsijith g a'al. T wabshaba ab ha amjed wo mahsi g t-tho'ibiakam. Kut wo e tho'ibia matp ab wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh ch wo si pihk e elithath wehs ha hekaj ch wo s-ap'ek ch wo s-e neimakath.
54003001	Tatchua o g si s-kehg chickpan hegam matp hedai s-ha wanimelimk g wohochuththam. Neh, ith o d hab ha che'ithag ch d wohokam.
54003002	Kunt am wo i em-chegitoch mat has wo chum masmak hegam mo hab s-e junimk. S-ap at d wo o'othhamk. T hab pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo ha'ichu ha abch. Hemako at wo wa'i hohnigk ch wo si s-e tahtkk wehs ha'ichu k ed ch wo si s-ap hejel e nuhkuthath ch s-ap ha'ichu am hab wo junihith ch wo s-chechojimak hegam ha wui matp hedai am wo ha chehgio ha-kihki am. Ab o ha ab mat wo s-mahchk mat has masma wo ha mashcha.
54003003	Pi o hab chu'ig mas wo nawkko'oth o s-hohtam wo babgatath o wo ha kawnith o heg wa'i lial ab wo si tatchuath.
54003004	S-hemajim at am wo ha thahmk g e-wehm kihkam. T g a'aligaj ab wo wechok ch ab wo si has elithath.
54003005	Pi at has masma wo s-ap i ha wanim g e-wehm wohochuththam matp pi ap wo ha wanim g e-wehm kihkam.
54003006	Pi at d wo hema hegamk mat hemuch ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga nat pi am hu wo chum si e haschuthath ch wo i gei hab masma matsh wa g ge Jiawul hab e juh.
54003007	Heg amt am wo i kei mo chum hems g pi wohochuththam ab si has elith. T hab pi hedai ab hu ha'ichu wo chu'ichigch mas heg hekaj wo i wua g ge Jiawul.
54003008	T hab wa'ap s-ap d wo o'Othhamk hegam mo am i ha wehmaj g ha wanimedtham. Pt wo ha ahgi mat pi wo chu iattomk ch pi wo nawkko'oth ch pi heg wa'i lial ab wo tatchuath.
54003009	Tho si ha'ichu mat am wo si wehs s-ap oithath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch heg hab wo wa'i junihith mo haschu s-mahch mo d s-ap'ekam.
54003010	Wehpeg amt am wo i ha mamche k am haha wo i ha chuhcha matp s-ap am hab wo masmak.
54003011	U'uwi chikpantham at hab wa'ap s-ap d wo u'uwik ch pi wo chu ahgamk ch pi wo nawkko'oth ch pi wo chu iattomk.
54003012	Ihtham i ha-wehmttham at hehemako wo wehm kihkamk ch hab wa'ap s-ap wo ha thahmk g e-a'aliga ch s-ap wo himath g e-kihthag.
54003013	Hegam mat s-ap hab wo juh g e-chikpan at pi wo has e elith k si s-gewkam am hab wo junihith. Kumt ab wo si has ha elithath.
54003014	Bani chum ni-tahtk mant s-hohtam am wo i m-chehgim. Tp wabshaba hems pi wo ni-ap'et. Kunt heg hekaj am wo ha'ichu i m-o'ohani. Kumt ith ab wo s-mahchk mamt has masma hab wo e junihith mamt s-ap wo himchuthath g Jiosh himthag. Tham Jiosh hemajkamga ch d nuhkuththam g wohokam.
54003016	Pi o wa ta machima matt has masma wo s-ap'ekamk am Jiosh tahgio. T wabshaba ith am i t-tashogi g Jiosh. K d wohokam ihtha mo an hab chu'ig ne'i ed: T-wepo at hab e juh g Jiosh alithag k an e mahsith. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am wohokamch mo d s-ap'ekam. S-ta neithamam at hab e juh, chum hems g anghil ha wehhejed. S-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed o an e ahgahim nahnko mahs hemajkam ha wui. T mu'i hemajkam ab s-wohoch. Kut am uhpam ep i bei g Jiosh thahm kahchim wui. Neh, pi at hedai wo sha'i e nako mas wo pi wohokamch ihtha wohokam.
54004001	Si o tasho am i ni-tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat ab wo i e ai g tash mat mu'i wo thagito g e-wohochuthadag. Ha'i at wo ha mashcha g iattogi nat pi g jijawul wo i ha wahmuth. T mu'i hemajkam ab wo ha wohog el.
54004002	Hegam mat chum hekith wo ha iattogithath at pi wo sha'i e kudutath heg hekaj nat pi gd hu wabsh wo i ha ap'et.
54004003	Ihtham o ha mashcham mo d pi ap'ekam mat wo e hohont ch ep pi ha hiwgith mas wo ko'ath g has mahs ha'ichu hugi. K eda wehs ihtha d Jiosh nahtoi ch am wa s-ap'e am t-wehhejed. Ahchim mach s-mahch g wohokam att hekaj ab wo ho'ige'el g Jiosh k ab wo ui g nahtoij.
54004004	Jiosh at wehs ha'ichu nahto. K wehs s-kehgaj. Tt hekaj ab wo i ho'ige'ith k ab wo ui.
54004005	Bo kaij g Jiosh mat g ho'ige'ithahuna am wo i ap'ech nenaj ed.
54004006	Thapt wo s-ap'ekam piongajk g Jesus Christ maptp am wo i ha ahgi g t-wehm wohochuththam ihtha ha'ichu mashchama. Kupt an wabsh s-ap wo u'ukchith g e-wohochuthadag ch wehs ha'ichu mashchama ab amjed map hab hi wa masma hab e wua.
54004007	Pi g am hab masma hekaj g hoho'oki a'agitha mas d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Pi at hab wo em-juh mamt wo s-a'ap'ek am Jiosh nena ed. Am apt wo si e mashchamath mapt am hab wo junihith s-ap'ekam himthag.
54004008	S-ap'e mapt wo e momoisha k wo s-gewkk. K wabshaba ab him g tash mat wo huhug ihtha. K heg hekai ba'ich i s-ap'e mapt wo i e gewkai am e-wohochuthadag ed. Ith o ab m-mahkch g s-ap'ekam thoakag ithani ch imhab i ba'ich.
54004009	Tho si wohokam ihtha ha'ichu ahga. K hab chu'ig mat wehs ab wo i chum s-e wohoch.
54004010	Jiosh at wehs wo ha tho'ibia hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k am wo i e gewpkai wui. Kuch ab s-wohochuth ch heg hekaj am si t-nakog ch mu'i ha'ichu ab nakog matt wo ha ahgi hemajkam ab amjed ihtha.
54004011	Am g i ha mashcham ihtha mani m-ahgith k ab i ha chehani mat am hab wo junihith.
54004012	Bapt masma s-ap hab wo e junihith ch s-ap wo neokath. T pi hedai pad has wo m-elithath map d wabsh wechij hemajkam. Ab g si pihk e elithath wehs ha wui ch wo si e nuhkuthath ch pi hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam. T hab wo e chehgithahith g em-wohochuthadag.
54004013	Am g i e nakog mapt am wo wa ne'okchulithath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga am ha-namki ed ch wo ha mashchamath ch am wo i ha gewkemhunath.
54004014	Neh, ha wanimedtham at was e ho'ige'ithahu m-wehhejed k ab m-taht. T wa hegam mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam am ah mat has mahs chikpan ab m-mah g Jiosh. Pegih, am g i e nakogath ch heg am hab wo junihith.
54004015	T hab ab wo i e gewkemhunath g wohochuththam an m-neithch.
54004016	Si g s-e nen'oith map has e junihim ch haschu ha mashcham k hekaj pi wabsh wo heki wua g e-thoakag. T hegam mat ab wo m-kaiha hab wa'ap pi wo heki wua g e-thothakag.
54005001	Pi g ab wabsh si chehmoth g keli o'othham k wabshaba ab wabsh wo s-ap ha'ichu kakke hab masma mapt g hejel e-ohg hab chum masma hab wo juhkchith. Wechij o'othham apt hab masma ab wo ha neithath mo d m-wepnag.
54005002	ch g o'oki hab masma map g e-je'e ch g wechij u'uwi hab masma mo d m-u'uwiga. Pt wabsh si s-ap wo ha chegitokath.
54005003	Am g ha ahgith hegam mo am hemiap e mihshmath mat wo ha nuhkuth hegam mo d si hehe'ejel wi'ikam u'uwi.
54005004	K wabshaba pi ab hu ha ab mas wo ha nuhkuth hegam mo ge a'aliga. Ihtham ha-a'aliga at wo chum ha nuhkuth nat pi ha ge'egel. K d Jiosh tatchui mat aigo epai wo i ha wehmtath,
54005005	Hegam mo woho d si hehe'ejel wihpkam o heg ab wa'i hiwig Jiosh ch chum hekith ab tahni g i wehmtadag. Ihtham amt wo ha nuhkuthath
54005006	ch wabshaba wabsh wo ha thagito hegam mo wabsh e gahgith g s-tahhathkam.
54005007	Neh, pt wo ha ahgi hegam mo e wehm mihshmath mat hab wo juh ihtha mani m-ahgith. T hab pi hedai has wo ha ahgath.
54005008	Hegam mat pi wo ha nuhkuth g e-hajuni o ba'ich d i pi ap'ekam mo g mischini.
54005009	Pi at an hu wo ha ui g wechij u'uwi mat wo ha nuhkuth. Hegam mat wo i ha wehmtath at wo aisk g chuhthpo wehst-mahm a'ahithag ch d wo hegamk mo s-ap e nuhkuthahim g e-kunbad wehhejed
54005010	ch s-ap ha ge'egel g a'al ch s-ap ha nuhkuth g Jiosh wohochuththam ch wehsko s-e mahch mo ha'ichukaj i ha wehmt hegam mo tatchua g i wehmtadag, chum as hems pi d wo ha-machigak.
54005011	Wechij u'uwi atp hems ep wo s-kuhkuntam mo eda hab chum kaij mat pi hab wo e juh k wabsh wo chikpani g Jiosh, neh, k hab masma wo e chu'ichigchuth k gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed g Christ.
54005013	Ha'i atp hems wabsh wo s-e papadmakamch an oiopothch ha-kihki oithch, wahm ba'ich i pi ap'e mat wo mai g has ahgadag k an wo gantanath g pi kehg ha'ichu ahga.
54005014	Ha'i at heki hu hab masma hab e juh k am i oi g Jiawul. Ith o hekaj ba'ich i a-ap'e mat g wechij u'uwi ep wo kuhkunt k wo mahmadt k wo s-ap thagio'i g e-kihthag. T heg hekaj g t-obga pi wo e nako mas wo pi ap has t-ahgath.
54005016	Am g ha ahgith g u'uwi mat wo i ha thagio'i g hehe'ejel wihpkam e-hajuni k pi ab hu hedai wo mohto'i. Hegam mo am hemiap e mihshmath at hegam wo wa'i ha thagio'i mo d si hehe'ejel wihpkam
54005017	Am g wehs ha ahgith mat ab wo si has i ha elithath hegam mo d kekel em-wanimedtham ch s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan, wahm hegam mo si chikpan ch hab junihim g mashchama ch mihshmetha.
54005018	An o o'ohanas Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed: Pi g an hu wo bishdath g woiwis chini mat wo kehimunath g ha'ichu em-bahithag. T am wo wa ha kamshshapath g ha'ichu em-bahithag. K hab d ahga ihtha mamt hab wa'ap wo ha namkithath hegam mo hab junihim g chickpan, chum hems g Jiosh pionag.
54005019	Pi g ab hu kaiham g ha'ichu abchutha ab hema i ha ab ihtham kekel, heg hi wa mat gohk o waik hab wo chei mo si s-ap s-mahch ha'ichu ab ha amjed, mt am haha wo i mamche.
54005020	Am apt hemajkam ha kailith k wo si s-ha keh'el hegam mat hedam pi gm hu wo thagito g pi ap'ekam. T hab masma wo s-e gihugath ha'i ehp.
54005021	Am g wehs wepo masma hab ha juhni ihtham mani m-shelinith k pi hedai sha'i gm hu wo i gawulkai. Ith ani si s-bahbagi ab m-chehani am ha tahgio g Jiosh ch Jesus ch am ha tahgio g hekia s-ap'ekam anghil.
54005022	Pi g am wabsh si s-e hohtkith mapt am wo hema i kei mat wo chikpani g Jiosh. Tp hems d pi ap chu'ijkam. Kut d wo m-chu'ichig mapt s-hohtam am i kei.
54005023	Ha'i o g pi ap ha-chu'ichig am tasho e neith. Kum s-ap s-mahch ch pi woho am hu wo i ha chuhcha ihtham. K wabshaba ha'ijj pi am hu tasho e neith g ha-chu'ichig. Mt heg hekaj am wo si i ha mamche mamt hedai am wo i ha chuhcha. (25) K hab wa masma g s-kehg ha-chikpan am tasho e neith. Chum as hi wa pi am hu i si tasho ch wabshaba pi wo ehsto g s-kehg ha-chikpan imhab i ba'ich. (23) Neh, s-e g nen'oithk, Timothy. Pi o kehgaj g shuhthagi amai. Kupt am wo sha'al wehnath g nawait. T hab pi wo m-mumkichuthath hegai shuhthagi.
54006001	Hegam wohochuththam mo d nenehol at ab wo si has ha elithath g e-a'amo. T heg hekaj pi hedai wo has ahgath g Jiosh ch pi wo has ahgath g t-mashchama.
54006002	Hegam mo g ha-a'amo hab wa'ap d wohochuththam at ba'ich ab wo i si has ha elithath ch ba'ich i s-ap wo ha chikpani nat pi g ha-chikpan d wo ha-ap'ethagk g ha-wehm wohochuththam. Ith apt hemho wa wo i ha mashcham k hekaj wo ha mihshmath mani wa m-ahgith.
54006003	Ho o wabsh chum si e hahaschuth ch d wabsh pi ha'ichu mahchim hegam mat hedai i pi heg hekaj wo ha mashcha t-kownalig Jesus Christ mashchama. Heg o d wohokam t-mashchama ch am t-tashogith g s-ap'ekam himthag. K ihtham wabsh tatchua mat wo ha ne'owinath ch wo ha kawnith. Ith o wabsh i wahmuth g hehgamthag ch bagatalig ch pi ap has ahgadag.
54006005	Kut hegam wo ha kawhainath matp hedam pi ap ha'ichu chegito ch pi mahch g wohokam ch hab chum elith mat g o'othham wo s-e kaisch ith hekaj t-himthag.
54006006	K wabshaba ith d s-wohokam s-t-kaisthag matt wo himath g s-ap'ekam ch wo si s-ap t-tahtkkath, chum achs pi ha'ichu wo edgithath.
54006007	Pi ach ha'ichu sha'i u'ath ch in mahsi ith thahm jewed ch pi ha'ichu sha'i be k wo hih.
54006008	Heg o am wa chum s-ap'e am t-wehhejed matt ab wo wa al he'es ha'ichu ko'ath ch ab s-ap wo t-enigadathch.
54006009	Hegam mo s-e kaischuthamk at heg hekaj hab wo s-junim g pi ap'ekam. T g ha-tatchui gm hu hab wo i ha juh ab amjed g Jiosh. Kut ha'i ep wo ha padch.
54006010	Nahnko mahs pi ap'ekam o ab shohshon heg amjed mat hema heg wa'i lialkaj wo si pihk e elithath. Ha'i at heg hekaj im hu hab i e juh ab amjed g e-wohochuthadag k oi wa mu'i ha'ichu pi ap tahhathkam ab nako.
54006011	Pi g hab masma hab e juhni mo hegam mani am ha ahg nap pi d Jiosh chikpanthamga. Ith apt eda am wo i e nako s-ap'ekam ch e-wohochuthadag ch pihk elithadag ch ha'ichu nakogadag ch hemajimatalig mapt wo wepo chu'igk mo g Jiosh.
54006012	Am g si e gewkath wehhejed g Jiosh k wo s-wihnam u'ukchith g e-wohochuthadag mapt hekaj am wo i wah Jiosh kihthag ed hab masma mat g s-melithkam hab wo e juh mat wo ha gehg. Ith at hekaj ab i m-bei g Jiosh mapt wa am si s-kehg ah g e-wohochuthadag am mu'i hemajkam ha kaichuthk.
54006013	Bapt wabsh masma hab wo e juh matsh wa g t-kownalig Jesus natsh pi heg s-ap ah g wohokam am tahgio hegai ge'e kownal mo hab chehgig Pontius Pilate. Kupt wehs am hab wo juh ihtha mani m-ahgith k ab wo ai mat ab ep wo i hih g Jesus. T hab pi hedai ab hu ha'ichu wo m-chu'ichigch. Ith ani ab si m-chehani am tahgio g Jesus ch am tahgio g Jiosh. Jiosh o ab ha mahkch g thoakag wehs ha'ichu thothakam ch ab ep wo i m-wehmt mapt hab wo juh g ni-chehanig.
54006015	Jesus at ia ep wo i e chehgi heg i tash ed mo kehshch g Jiosh. Jiosh o si s-hemajima ch wehs ha'ichu nuhkuth ch d kownal wehs ha thahm g kokownal.
54006016	ch pi hekith ha mumkku. Pi o hedai neith ch pi hedai wo e nako mas wo nei. An o ha'ichug hab mahs tonlig ch ed mat pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo miabi. Pi at hekith wo huhug g gewkthaj. Kutt ab wo si has elithath chum hekith. Neh, bo masma.
54006017	Ab g i ha chehani hegam mo d s-kakais mat pi wo si e hahaschuthath heg hekaj ha'ichu e-eniga ch pi ab hu wo hiwgath ch wabshaba ab wo hiwgath g Jiosh. Heg o wud mo s-ba'ama ab t-mahk wehs ha'ichu mach haschu i hekaj s-ap t-tahtk.
54006018	Ab g i ha chehani mat am hab wo i junihi g s-kehg chikpan ha wehhejed hegam mo tatchua g i wehmta k pi wo chu tha'ath ch wo ha'ichu ha ho'ithath g sho'igkam. Ith o d woho s-kaisthag.
54006019	Bo masma heg wa wepo mo e to'ithahim g s-namkig ha'ichu an thahm kahchim ch ed hekaj wo si s-ap tahtkkath chum hekith.
54006020	Si g s-ap nuhkuth hegai mamt ab m-nuhkuthach. Pi g am hu ha wehmajk hegam mo wabsh pehegi e ne'owin heg hekaj mo hab chum elith mo d ha'ichu mahchig. Ith at pi wo sha'i i t-wehmajk matt ba'ich i s-ap wo s-mai g Jiosh.
54006021	Ha'i o hab chum e ahg mo edgith ihtha mahchig ch oi wa wabsh heb hu wua g e-wohochuthadag. Neh, Jiosh at wo wa s-m-ho'ige'el.
55001001	Ni-wehnag Timothy: Ia ant ep wo ha'ichu i m-o'ohani ahni Paul mani d kehshaj g Jesus Christ. Tho Jiosh tatchui mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alithaj. T hab wo bei g wechij thoakag hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch ab amjed g alithaj hab masma mash wa heki hu hab kaij matsh hab wo e juh.
55001002	Ab g ni-kaiham ahpi map d ni-alithag t-wohochuthadag ed. Ab o wa si s-m-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i m-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
55001003	Chum ani hekith ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh mani hekith i ni-ho'ige'ithahun m-wehhejed. Jiosh ash wa am ha tashogith g t-shohshon matt has masma wo himath g t-thoakag ch ab wo si has elithath. Kuni hab masma hab ni-wua ch hab pi sha'i ni-kudut.
55001004	P ahpi hab wa'ap ab s-wohochuth g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Kuni s-chegito mapt si pi ap e taht mant hekith am i m-thagito. Kuni s-m-neithamk mapt ep wo si s-hehgigk.
55001005	Am apt ha oithk hab e juh g e-hu'ul Lois ch e-je'e Eunice mapt ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
55001006	Pt wo s-chegito matt ab toa g t-nohnhoi m-ab k am m-wehhejed t-ho'ige'ithahu. T g Jiosh ab m-mah g gewkthag k am m-chehgi mapt has i mahs chikpan hab wo junihith wehhejed. Pegih, pt wo i e gewkath k am hab wo junihith.
55001007	Jiosh at ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat an wo t-u'ukchith ch ab wo t-mahkchith g gewkthag ch pihk elithadag ch thotholimadag ahchim mach d hemajkamgaj. Kutt heg hekaj pi ha'ichu wo sha'i ehbithath.
55001008	Pegih, pt pi has wo e elithath am wehhejed neokch g t-kownalig Jesus ch hab wa masma pi has wo e elithath ab ni-amjed mani wehhejed d lihso. Ab o t-mahkch g Jiosh g gewkthag matt am wehhejed wo t-sho'igch. Kupt wo si nako g e-sho'igthag am ahgachugch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj.
55001009	Tho Jiosh mat t-tho'ibia ab pi ap'ekam t amjed. Pi att has masma has wo t-juh k wo t-tho'ibia. Gd hu i si wehpeg at am i ap'ech mat wo s-t-ho'ige'el am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag Jesus Christ matt d wo Jiosh hemajkamgak.
55001010	Ia at jiwia g t-tho'ibiakam Jesus Christ k am i t-tashogi g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag. Kah att g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj k s-mai matt has masma s-ap am wo gahi wuwha g muhkig edgithch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
55001011	Jiosh at am i ni-kei mant wo ahgachugath g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ch wo ha mashchamath.
55001012	Kuni heg hekaj hab mu'i ni-sho'igchuth ch pi sha'i has ni-elith ith amjed nani pi s-mahch hegai mani ab s-wohochuth. T heg wo e nako mat s-ap wo ni-nuhkuthath mant wehs am hab wo juh mat haschu wehhejed ab i ni-gawulkai k ab wo ai mat ep wo jiwia.
55001013	Ab ani m-mashcham mo has chu'ig g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kupt heg wo wa'i ahgahith nap pi heg s-wohochuth ch ab si tatchua g Christ ch d hemako heg wehm.
55001014	Am o t-eda g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch ab t-mahkch g gewkthag. Kutt hekaj am wo si s-ap nuhkuth g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh.
55001015	Am ap wa s-mahch mat ia wabsh i ni-thagito hegam mo ab Asia t amjed ia ni-wehmajkahim, chum wa g Phygelus ch Hermogenes.
55001016	K wabshaba g Onesiphorus pi has e elith mani d lihso ch an i ni-gahghi ia jiwiak Rome kihhim t am am hugkam mat ni-cheh k mu'ikko ia i ni-chehgimed k ab ni-mamka g s-ap tahhathkam. Kuni ab tahni g Jiosh mat ba'ich ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el hegam Onesiphorus.
55001018	Jiosh at wo wa s-ho'ige'el g Onesiphorus heg i tash ed matt ab wo nam g Jiosh. S-mahch ap mat he'es ha'ichu s-ap am hab ni-juni g Onesiphorus amai Ephesus kihhim t am.
55002001	Jiosh o si s-hemajim ab t-mahkch g gewkthag ahchim matt ab i t-hemakoch g Jesus Christ wehm. Kuni heg hekaj m-ahgith mapt s-gegokim wo himath g e-chikpan wehhejed.
55002002	Mu'i hemajkam ani ha mihshmath m-kaichuthch. Kupt ahpi epai wo ha mashcha hegam mat am wo i e nakog k ha'ijj epai wo ha mashcha ihtha.
55002003	Neh, bapt masma wo e sho'igch mat g shonthal am hab junihithch g e-chikpan am wehhejed g Jesus Christ.
55002004	S-mahch ap mat g shonthal wehs hab wo junihith hegai mat g uhgchugaj ab wo cheha ch pi ha'ichu wo hiwigi mas wo shohbi. Kupt ahpi hab wa'ap wo masmak am wehhejed g Jiosh.
55002005	S-mahch ap mat g s-melithkam pi ab hu wo bei g e-gehgewi heg hi wa mat am hab wo junihith g ha-chehanig. Kupt ahpi hab wa'i masma wo bei g e-gehgewi mapt am Jiosh tatchui oithk hab wo e junihith.
55002006	Hegai mo si chikpan g e-esha at wehpeg ab wo ui g e-oda mat wo bai. Kupt ahpi hab wa'ap ab ha'ichu wo i nei am chikpank g Jiosh wehhejed.
55002007	Am g i oithahim ihtha mani m-ahgith. T g Jiosh am wo i m-wehmt mapt wo s-amich.
55002008	Jesus Christ o hab wa'ap d o'othham ch ab s-ap nakog g sho'igthag. T g Jiosh ab uhpam i wuhshath heg i thahm mat muh. Tho ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mani am ahgachug. Kupt am wo oithahith mat haschu ab nako g Christ ch s-ap ab wo nako g e-sho'igthag.
55002009	Ni ahni hab wa'ap ni-sho'igchuth am ahgachugch ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga hask mam ep ge ni-wulshch g e hukshchim wapainomikaj hab masma mantp d si pi ap hemajkam. K wabshaba g Jiosh ne'oki pi e wulshch.
55002010	Am ani wabsh i ni-thagitokch mantp haschu ab wo i nako ha wehhejed hegam mat g Jiosh am i ap'ech mat wo e tho'ibia. Ihtham at ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ. T g Jiosh chum hekith ab wo si has ha elithath.
55002011	Tho si wohokam ihtha hab ha-che'i: Chum att hekith d wo thothakamk g Christ wehm mach hedai ab i t-thagitokch wui nat pi t-wehhejed muh.
55002012	T heg ab wo t-hiwigi matt wo i wehmt am eda g kownaltaligaj ahchim matt an wo u'ukchith g t-wohochuthadag am t-sho'igthag ed. T wabshaba im hu hab wo i e juh ab ha amjed hegam mat wo thagito g e-wohochuthadag.
55002013	Hemho wa at am hab wo juh mo has i kaij. Kut pi gm hu hab wo i e juh ab t-amjed, heg hi wa mattp wo thagito g t-wohochuthadag.
55002014	Am g i ha chegitochuth ihtha mani wa m-ahgith k ab ha shohbith g Jiosh gewkthagkaj mat pi wabsh pehegi wo neneokath ch pi wo e cheggiath. Ith at wo ha padch hegam mat wo kaiha.
55002015	Am g si i e nakog mapt d wo si s-ap piongajk g Jiosh ch si s-ap am wo ha mashchamath g Jiosh wohokam mapt pi wo sha'i si e elithath.
55002016	Ha'i at thagito g wohokam k ha mashcham mat heki hu ab i wuwha g ko'i muhkig amjed. Gohkajj ihtham mo ith hekaj ha iattogith o d Hymanaeus ch Phyletus. K g ha-mashchama padchuth g ha-wohochuthadag hab masma mat g pi kehg hihwthag wo em-cheawuagi. Pi g ha wehm a'agath g ha-mashchama. Gm at hu hab wo i m-juh ab amjed g Jiosh.
55002019	T wabshaba g Jiosh s-wihnam shondath g e-ne'oki mat pi hedai wo sha'i gawul juh. K an o'ohanas: Jiosh o s-ha mahch mo hedai woho ab s-wohochuth. K an ep o'ohanas: Matp hedai hab wo chei mo d Jiosh hemajkamga k hemho wa gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed g pi ap'ekam.
55002020	Neh, matp hems am wo ha'ichugk g nahnko mahs hohashaha'a am s-kais kih ed. Tp hems ha'i d wo ohlak ch ha'i d wo plahtak ch ha'i d wo uhsk ch ha'i d wo bithk. Kut wo e hekaj hegam mo s-namkig ha wehhejed g s-has haha'ichu. T g pi namkigchu wabsh chum has masma wo e hekaj.
55002021	Pegih, t g Jiosh hab wa masma si s-has ha'ichukaj wo t-hekaj mattp hedai wo t-kegchuthch ab amjed g pi ap'ekam natt pi wo t-nahtokch ch wo i t-gawulkathch wehhejed.
55002022	Pegih, pi g am i e thagito pi ap'ekam ch ed k am s-ap wo i e gewkathch s-ap'ekam k ed ch am hab wo junihith mapt haschu wo ha ahgi ch wo si pihk e elithath wehs ha hekaj ch wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ab ha wui g e-wehm wohochuththam. T hegam mo ab ihm g Jiosh ch s-ap ha'ichu chegito m-wehm hab wo masmak.
55002023	Bant ep wo chei mapt pi wo ha ne'owi hegam mat wabsh wo has hu kaijjith ch pi e mahch ch e ne'owin. S-mahch ap mat ith am wabsh wo ha u'apa kawhaina ch ed.
55002024	Jiosh pionag at pi wo chum ha kawhainath ch wabsh wo si s-hemajimak ab wehs ha wui ch wo si s-ap ha mashchamath
55002025	ch si s-hemajim wo ha shohbithath hegam mat ab wui wo gegokiwua ch wo ha mashchamath. Tp hems ab wo ha mah g Jiosh g ap'ethag mat wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo s-mai g wohokam.
55002026	T hab masma uhpam wo bei g s-ap e-chegitoithag k wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g Jiawul.
55003001	Si g s-chegitok mat wehs ha'ichu wo s-hasigk mat d wo i ha oithch tatshk.
55003002	Hemajkam at wo s-chu tha'ath ch wo si pihk e elithath g lialkaj ch wo chum si e hahaschuthath. Mu'i hemajkam at wo a'ai s-ko'okam has e ahgath ch pi ab hu uhpam wo i nodgithath g s-ap'ekam. Mu'i at wo has ahgath g Jiosh. T g a'al pi ab hu wo wohog ha elithath g e-ge'egedga.
55003003	Mu'i hemajkam at wo pi a'amdagk ch pi hedai ha hekaj wo pihk e elithath ch ha'ichu wo e iattogithath ab a'ai e amjed ch wo s-ta ehbithamak ch wo s-ta keke'ithamak. Mu'i at wo s-ohhothath g s-ap'ekam.
55003004	Mu'i at pi ab hu wo ha tatchuath hegam mo d chum ha-naipijju ch has am wabsh wo si e wuath ch pi ab hu wo tatchuath g Jiosh ch wabshaba g pi kehg s-tahhathkam ab wo tatchuath.
55003005	Hemajkam at hi wo wa e mihshmethath ch wabsh pi wo wohochuthath hegai mo haschu ab chum kah ch im hu hab wabsh wo i juh g Jiosh gewkthag. Pi g am hu ha wehmajk ihtham hab mahs hemajkam.
55003006	Ha'i at am wabsh ep wo si i wahpkath ha-kihki ed ch wo s-ap ha iattogi g u'uwi. T hegam mo pi gewkpthag am e-wohochuthadag ed ab wo ha kaihamath no pi tatchua g pi ap'ekam ch e kudut g e-chu'ichigkaj
55003007	ch pi mahch g wohokam, chum as hems hi wa chum s-mahchimk.
55003008	Hegam mo ha iattogith o ab wui gegok g wohokam hab masma mo wa Jannesbad ch Jambresbad ab wui gegok g Mosesbad. Ho o wabsh pi ap ha'ichu chegito ch d ep hegam mat pi e nako am Jesus wohochuthadag ed.
55003009	T wabshaba wehsijj wo s-mai mo pi ha'ichu a'amichuth hab masma mat wa am hab e juh ha tahgio g Jannesbad ch Jambresbad. Kut heg hekaj pi wo e nako mat ge'e ha'ichu wo padch.
55003010	P wabshaba ahpi hig am oith g ha'ichu ni-mashchama ch ha'ichu hab ni-juni ch ha'ichu hab ni-elitha. S-mahch ap mani haschu ab s-wohochuth ch has masma ab i s-ha bahbgi g hemajkam ch pihk ni-elith ha hekaj ch nakog ha'ichu.
55003011	S-mahch ap mam ni-sho'igchuth. Kuni mu'i ha'ichu s-ko'ok nakog. S-mahch ap mant mu'i ha'ichu nako am Antiok t am ch Iconium t am ch Lystra t am. T wabshaba g Jiosh ni-tho'ibia wehs amjed ihtha.
55003012	Kupt ahpi hab wa'ap wo e sho'igch natt pi wehs wo t-sho'igch ahchim mach tatchua matt am wo oithath g s-ap'ekam thoakag ab si i t-thagitok Jesus wui.
55003013	T wo i e gewpkai g pi ap'ekam ch s-chu i'attomkam k ba'ich wo i ha iattogithath g hemajkam ch hejel wo e iattogithath.
55003014	Tt wabshaba ab i m-mashcha g wohokam. Kupt ab si s-gewkam i s-wohochuth k wo s-wihnam u'ukchith s-mahchch matt hedai m-mashcha.
55003015	S-mahch ap map ga hu i e-alijk amjed ab kaiham g Jiosh o'ohana. K ith d hegai map amjed ab bekch g e-amichuthadag. Kupt hekaj ab i s-wohoch g Jesus Christ k e tho'ibia.
55003016	Ab o tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hegai mo g Jiosh tatchua mat an wo e o'ohan k d wo t-mashchamak. K heg wehs d i t-wehmtadag matt hekaj a'ai wo t-mashcham k wo s-mahchk g wohokam ch wo shohbithath g pi t-ap'ekam ch am wo i t-shelinith matt has masma s-ap wo himchuthath g t-thoakag.
55003017	Kutt heg hekaj wo s-ap t-nahtokch ahchim mach ab ihm g Jiosh matt am hab wo juh wabsh chum has mahs s-kehg chikpan wehhejed.
55004001	Jesus at am s-ap wo i nahto g e-kownaltalig ia ep jiwiak k wo ha lothai wehs hemajkam, chum hems hegam mat eda d wabsh wo kia thothakamk. Heg ani hekaj si m-chehani am tahgio g Jiosh
55004002	mapt am wo si ahgahi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k am wo si e gewkathch mapt am wo ahgath wabsh chum hekith ch pi am hu wo chum ge nenidath mat hekith am wo s-apkot mapt am wo ahgath. Ab g i ha shohbith pi ap'ekam amjed k am i ha gewkemhun mat hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam wabsh s-bahbgim ha mashchamch.
55004003	Ab o him g tash mat wo i mu'itha hegam mat gawul ha'ichu wo ha mashcha. Kut mu'i hemajkam ab wo s-ha kaim
55004004	k g wohokam mashchama wo thagito k ab wo hiwgath g hoho'oki a'agitha.
55004005	Pt wabshaba ahpi wo si s-e nen'oithk ch wo s-e chegitok wehs ha'ichu k ed ch ab wo nako g sho'igthag. Am g wehs hab juhni g e-chikpan am ahgachugch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga nap pi d piongaj g Jiosh.
55004006	Ahni at hi e ai g ni-tashga mant wo ni-muhkith.
55004007	S-ap ant nahto g ni-chikpan am s-gewkam i oithk hab masma mo g s-melithkam am si i e nakog mat wo bei g s-ap'ekam e-gehgewi.
55004008	K heg am wa'i wi'is mant wo bei g s-ap'ekam ni-gehgewi nani pi g s-ap'ekam am hab junihim. Jiosh alithag o d s-ap'ekam usagakam ch ab wo i ni-mah ihtha mat hekith ep wo jiwia k ab wo i t-gawulkai ge'e lothaita ch ed. Kut wehsijj hab wa'ap ab wo bei g e-gehgewi hegam mo hedai ab si pihk e elith hekaj g Jiosh alithag ch nenida mat ep wo jiwia.
55004009	Am g i e nakog k s-hohtam ab i ni-chehgimed
55004010	nant pi hejel ia wih. Crescens at gm hu hih Galasia jewed wui. T g Titus gm hu hih Dalmasia jewed wui. Demas at ab si tatchua g jewed t ab ha'ichu k ia wabsh i ni-thagito k gm hu hih Thessalonica wui.
55004011	Heg o wa'i Luke ia ni-chechga. Ab apt wo i bek g Mark. T am wo i ni-wehmt ith eda chikpan.
55004012	Ab ant cheha g Tychicus mat am wo hih Ephesus kihhim wui.
55004013	Ab g i ni-behith g ni-lihwa ch ni-o'ohana, wahm hegam mant hejel o'oha. Ab ant nuhkuthach g Carpus amai Troas kihhim t am.
55004014	S-ko'okam at wa has ni-thohththa hegai Alexander mo d hihliyo. T g Jiosh wo wa mah g s-ko'ok namkithadag.
55004015	Neh, pt wo si s-e nen'oithath ab amjed no pi sha'i si wui kehk g ha'ichu t-ahga.
55004016	Hegam mat wo chum i ni-wehmt at ia wabsh i ni-thagito mamt wa wehpeg ni-lothai. Ab ani tahni g Jiosh mat pi ab hu wo ha abch ihtha.
55004017	Jiosh at wa i ni-wehmt k ab i ni-mah g gewkthag. Nt hekaj hab ni-nako mant am s-ap ah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga am ha wui hegam mo am ha'ichug nahnko mahs hemajkam. T ab i ni-tho'ibia mamt pi am hu ni-wua maipith ha wui
55004018	k hab wa'ap wo ni-tho'ibia ab wehs amjed g pi ap'ekam ha'ichu k an wo ni-u'apa thahm kahchim ch ed. Ab att wo si has elithath g Jiosh chum hekith. Neh, ith o wa'i si.
55004019	Am apt wo ha ahgi g Priscilla ch Aquila ch hegam Onesiphorus wehm kihkam mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el.
55004020	Ga at hu wih g Erastus Corinth kihhim t am. Nt g Trophimus ga hu wuiok Miletus kihhim t am nat pi mumku.
55004021	Am g i e nakog k ab wo i hih mat koi wo e ai g s-hehpich'edkam. Ihtham wehsijj o ab s-em-ho'ige'ith Eubulus ch Pudens ch Linus ch Claudia ch wehsijj g t-wehm wohochuththam iia.
55004022	Neh, am at wo wa em-wehmajk g t-kownalig Jesus. T g Jiosh wo wa s-em-ho'ige'el.
56001001	Ni-wehnag Titus: Am ant wo ha'ichu i m-o'ohani ahni Paul mani d Jiosh pionag ch m-ahgi g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj. S-mahch ap mat g Jesus Christ am i ni-kei mant ith wo ahgachugath. K hab d elithaj mant am wo i ha gewkemhunath hegam mat g Jiosh ab i ha gawulkai mat d wo hemajkamgajk. T hab wo i gewka g ha-wohochuthadag. T ba'ich wo i mai ihtha wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh.
56001002	Bo kaij g Jiosh mat eda pi koi ha'ichu sha'i nahto matsh ab wo ha mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch.
56001003	T hemu am i e ai mat s-ap maskogi g ha'ichu e-ahga.
56001004	Kupt ab i s-wohoch ab ni-ab k hahawa wepogithas map d ni-alithag. Ab o wa si s-m-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-tho'ibiakam Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i m-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
56001005	Am ant i m-thagito Crete jewed t am mapt am wo i ap'ech mo haschu koi ap'echuthas am ha sha'ashagith hegam mo hemiap e mihshmath. Am apt wo i ha chuhcha wehs kihhim ed hegam mat wo ha wanimedath mani wa ith heki hu m-chehani. Kunt am wo i m-chegitoch mat has wo chum masmak.
56001006	That wo si s-ap o'othhamk ch hemako wo hohnigk ch pi wo ha chu'ichigk. T g ha-a'aliga hemho wa d wo wohochuththamk ch ab wo ha kaihamath g e-ge'egedga. T hab pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo ha'ichu ha abch.
56001007	Pi o hab chu'ig mas g ha wanimedtham wo ge e haschuthath o s-hohtam wo babgatath o wo nawkko'oth o wo ha cheggiath o mu'i ha'ichu wo si s-behimkkath.
56001008	K wabshaba hab chu'ig mat wo s-thotholimak ch hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch chum hekith wo i ha wehmajk hegam mo tatchua g i wehmtadag.
56001009	Am ap ha mashcham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kut ith an wo si u'ukchith mat heg hekaj wo i ha gewkemhunath g hemajkam ch wo i ha shohbithath hegam mo ab wui gegok g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
56001010	Heki at hu mu'i i wuwha hegam mo chum s-keshwuimk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ha iattogith g hemajkam ch heg hekaj ab ha wanchkwup mat wo ui g lial, wahm hegam mo d ni-wepo Tutuligo o'othham. Kumt heg hekaj wehs e wehm am wo i ha shohbi.
56001012	Hema ash hab kaij g s-chu amichuththam am Crete t am, “Ahchim Crete t am o'othham ach s-chu i'attomk ch s-ta keke'ithama ch s-papadma ch wehs ha'ichu si s-behimk.”
56001013	Woho o wa mo has i kaij. Kupt heg hekaj si s-gewkam wo i ha shohbi. T hab ab wo m-kaiham k ab wo s-wohochuthath g wohokam.
56001014	Pt wo ha ahgi mat pi wo wohochuthath g Tutuligo ha-hoho'oki a'agitha ch hegai mo d wabsh ha-chehanig hegam mo pi tatchua g wohokam.
56001015	Wehs o s-kehgaj g Jiosh ha'ichu nahtoi am ha wehhejed hegam mo s-kehg ha'ichu chegitoithag. K wabshaba pi ha'ichu s-kehgaj am ha wehhejed hegam mo pi kehg ha'ichu chegitoithag ch pi wohochuth g wohokam no pi g pi kehg ha'ichu ha-chegitoithag wehs ha'ichu padchuth ha wehhejed. K pi has ab hu sha'i tahhathag g ha-i'ibthag mo am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam.
56001016	Ihtham o hab kaij mo s-mahch g Jiosh ch wabshaba hab e wua mo pi mahch no pi s-ta keke'ithama ch pi chechkaithag. K g ha-thoakag pi kehg hab mahs. K pi ab hu sha'i ha ab ulini mas hab wo juh g s-ap'ekam.
56002001	Kupt wabshaba ahpi am wo ha mashcha g wohochuththam mat has wo e junihith ch hekaj wo e chehgithath mo s-kehgaj g Jiosh mashchamadag.
56002002	Pt wo ha ahgi g kekel o'othham mat d wo si o'othhamk ch pi wabsh wo i e wahmuth k wabshaba wabsh wo i e bahbgi wehs ha'ichu k ed. T wabsh shelinim wo oithath g e-wohochuthadag ch wo pihk e elithath ab wehs ha wui ch s-e tahtk ch ab wo nakogath ha'ichu.
56002003	Kupt hab wa'ap wo ha ahgi g o'oki mat wo s-thotholimak ch wo e chehgithch mo am oithch hab e junihim g s-ap'ekam ch pi wo nawkko'oth ch pi wo pi kehg neneokath ab hedai k amjed.
56002004	T g wechij u'uwi ab ha amjed wo mai mat has wo chum masmak ch ab wo i ha tatchuath g e-wehm kihkam ch e-a'aliga
56002005	ch wo e nuhkuthath mat pi hab wo wuath g pi ap'ekam ch wo si s-wapagimak am e-kihthag ed ch ab wo ha wohog elithath g e-wehm kihkam. T hab pi hedai has wo ahgath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
56002006	Kupt hab wa'ap wo ha ahgi g wihpiop mat d wo si o'othhamk.
56002007	Chum apt hekith hab wo wuath g s-ap'ekam ch hab masma wo ha chehgi mat has wo chum e junihith.
56002008	Kupt ab wo si has elithath g wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh ch heg wo wa'i ha mashchamath. T hab wo si e elithath hegam mo ab wui gegok g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch pi wo e nako mas has wo m-ahgath.
56002009	Ab g ha ahgith wabsh chum hedai ha-pionag mat ab wo kaihamath g e-ahmo ch pi ab hu wo ne'owinath
56002010	ch pi ha'ichu wo ehsithath ch wabshaba wo e chehgithahith mo s-ap d pion. Kut heg amjed am wo i e tashogi mo s-ap'e g ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh matt heg hekaj t-tho'ibia.
56002011	Jiosh o wehs s-ha ho'ige'ith g hemajkam ch hab juh g tho'ibiathag chum wehs ha wehhejed. T ith am wabsh s-ap i e chehgi.
56002012	Kutt heg hekaj wo s-ohhoth g pi ap'ekam k wo t-nuhkuth matt hab wo wuath g s-ap'ekam ch ab wo si ha'ichuch g Jiosh ith eda jewed.
56002013	Batt wo masmak nach pi nenida mach haschu s-wohochuth mat ia ep wo jiwia k si s-tondam wo e chehgi hegai mo d t-Jioshga ch d t-tho'ibiakam Jesus Christ.
56002014	Heg at am i e thagito mat s-ko'okam e muhkith k hekaj t-tho'ibia ab amjed g pi ap'ekam k i t-kegch mach d hahawa si hemajkamgaj k si tatchua matt hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.
56002015	Pegih, am g si ha ahgith wehs ihtha k i ha gewkemhun mat hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam k ep i ha shohbith mat hedai hab wo i wuath g pi ap'ekam. Pi at hedai wo chum pi m-ha'ichuchuthath nap pi gewkthag mapt ith am hab wo junihith.
56003001	Pt am wo ha ahgithath g wohochuththam mat has wo chum masmak. T wo s-ha wohog elithath g e-kokownalig ch am oithk hab wo e junihith g chehanig ch chum hekith wo e nahtokchith mat wo s-ap chikpanath ch hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.
56003002	Am g ha ahgith mat pi wo pi kehg neneokath ab hedai i amjed ch wabshaba wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ch wo si s-hemajimak ab wehs ha wui.
56003003	Neh, heki ach hu wa hab masmakahim mo hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh. Pi ach wa ab hu kaiham g Jiosh ch pi ha'ichu amichuth ch hab s-junimk g pi ap'ekam ch pi a'amdag ch s-chu hehgamk. Ha'i o s-t-keh'ith. Kuch ab epai s-ha keh'ith.
56003004	K wabshaba g t-tho'ibiakam Jiosh si pihk e elith t-hekaj ch ia i e chehgi jewed thahm
56003005	mat wo t-tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag. Pi at hedai wo e nako mas wo e tho'ibia g hejel ha'ichu hab e-junikaj. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i s-t-ho'ige'ith k gm hu wako g pi ap t-chu'ichig matt wo edagi g wechij thoakag. Heg at hekaj ia jiwia g t-tho'ibiakam Jesus Christ jewed thahm k heg hekaj ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Heg o am t-eda ch ab t-mahkch hegai wechij thoakag.
56003007	Jesus Christ o ab s-t-ho'ige'ith ch am i t-ap'ech matt wo s-ap'ek am Jiosh tahgio. Kuch heg hekaj edgith ihtha wechij thoakag ch hab am wehmaj wo kihkath chum hekith am i thahm matt wo koi.
56003008	Tho wohokam ihtha mani haschu m-ahgith. Kupt chum hekith am wo ha ahgithath g wohochuththam. T hekaj wo e nuhkuth mat wo s-wapagimak ch hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. Ith at d wo i ha-wehmtadagk g hemajkam.
56003009	Kupt pi wo ha ne'owinath hegam mo wabsh pehegi ha'ichu m-kaiam ch am chum m-pip'ichuth ab amjed g Tutuligo ha-chehanig ch chum ge e haschuth ch hab kaij mo ab d ha amjedkam g si s-has haha'ichu.
56003010	Gokko apt wo s-ha tha'i hegam mat hedai wo chum a'ai ha ga'agwulkai g wohochuththam. Hegam mat pi ab hu wo m-kaiha o pi ap'e. T g pi ap ha-chu'ichig am wo ha chehgi. Kumt wabsh wo ha thagito.
56003012	Ia o ni-wehm thadha g Artemas ch Tychicus. Kunt ihtham am hema wo i kei mat am m-wui wo jiwia. Kupt am haha wo hih Nicopolis kihhim wui mapt am wo ni-wehmajk nant pi am wo thakath s-hehpich'ed.
56003013	Kah ani mash am m-wehm tha hegai Zenas mo d chehanig hudawogtham ch atsh am hebai wo ha mihshmetham g Apollos wehm. Kupt he'es wo i e nakog k am wo i ha wehmt mat pi ha'ichu wo pi edagi.
56003014	Bat wo wa chum masmak g wohochuththam mat hab wa'ap wo i ha wehmajk hegam mo hab masma tatchua g i wehmtadag.
56003015	Wehsijj o am i m-ho'ige'ith ihtham t-wehm wohochuththam mo ia kih. Am g wehsijj i ha ho'ige'ith g t-wehm wohochuththam amai. Jiosh at wo wa s-em-ho'ige'el.
57001001	Ni-wehnag, Philemon: Ia ani kuhpi ahni Paul nani pi ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ. K ia ni-wehmaj g Timothy ch ab s-em-ho'ige'ith. Am ant ha'ichu wo m-o'ohani, Philemon, s-chegitokch map wa s-ap i t-wehmaj ith eda chikpan.
57001002	Kupt ith am wo ne'okchul Aphia wui ch heg wui Archipus mo wa t-wehm ahgahim g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga, pej wehs ha wui hegam mo am em-wehm e mihshmath em-kih am.
57001003	Ab o si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh ch t-kownalig Jesus Christ ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch g s-ap tahhathkam.
57001004	Ab apsh wabsh kia si hiwig g t-kownalig Jesus ch si pihk e elith ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuththam. (7) Sh hegam ab si i e gewkemhun ab neithch map s-ap ha'ichu hab ha junith. Ni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk (4) ch ab ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ch ab tahni mat ba'ich wo i m-wehmt hemu. (6) Pt hab ba'ich ab wo i chehgi map ge'e edgith g s-ap'ekam ab ihmch g Jesus Christ.
57001008	Ab o ni-mahkch g Christ g gewkthag mant ab wo ha'ichu em-cheha ahpim mam ab ihm.
57001009	Nt wabshaba ab wabsh wo i m-gewkemhu mapt ha'ichu hab wo ni-juni heg wabsh hekaj map si pihk e elith t-hekaj. Thani keli hemu ch ia kuhpi Jesus Christ wehhejed. Kupt ab wo si pihk e el ni-wui k hekaj hab wo juh g ni-tatchui.
57001010	Ia o ni-wehmaj ihtha m-neholiga mo hab chehgig Onesimus. Ni am ahgith ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus. T ab i s-wohoch. K heg wa wepo mo d ni-alithag am t-wohochuthadag ed.
57001011	Heki ash hu s-padmam chikpan m-wehhejed ch wabshaba hemu s-wagimam chikpan mo hab masma hab d ahga g chehgigaj ch hab ha'ichu ni-junith am m-wehhejed.
57001012	Ab ani chehani mat am uhpam ep wo hih m-wui. Kupt hab masma ab wo neithath mo d ni-alithag.
57001013	Chum ani hi wa tatchua mat ia wo i ni-wehmt m-wehhejed mani ia kuhpi ch ahg g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. K wabshaba pi hab chum chu'ig manis wo m-wohppo'i g m-pionag. Ba'ich o i s-ap'e mat hejel hab wo i e ah mapt has masma wo i ni-wehmt.
57001015	Tho heb hu himkam ihtha m-pionag al he'es i tash. Kuki wabshaba hab d elithaj g Jiosh mat hab masma wo e chehg k d haha wo m-wehm wohochuththamk chum hekith.
57001016	Tho si t-wehnag, wahm ahpi, no pi d m-pionag ch am i thahm d hahawa m-wehm wohochuththam.
57001017	Bap masma hab ni-elith mani d si m-wehnag, pegih, k ch hab wa masma hab wo elithath g Onesimus mat d wo si m-wehnagk.
57001018	Ab atsh m-wui pi ap chu'i. Kupt wabshaba ahni ab wo ni-mohto'i.
57001019	Ahni ant wo m-namkith heg hekaj, chum aps ahpi ab ni-ab e wulshch nant pi am m-wui u'apa g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mapt hekaj e tho'ibia.
57001020	Pegih, pt hab masma hab wo elithath g Onesimus mat d wo m-wehnagk. Ith at ab wo si i ni-gewkemhu am wehhejed g Jiosh alithag.
57001021	Ith ant am i m-o'ohani s-mahchch mapt ba'ich i thahm ha'ichu hab wo ni-juni mani m-tahni.
57001022	Jiosh at ab wo kaiha g em-ho'ige'ithahuna k ab wo i ni-wuhshath ab amjed g kukpaikud. Nt am ep wo i em-chehgim. Kumt heg hekaj am wo i ap'ech g kih ni-wehhejed.
57001023	Ia o ep ni-wehm kuhpi g Epaphras ch s-m-ho'ige'ith.
57001024	K ia ep thadha g Mark ch Aristarcas ch Demas ch Luke ch hab wa'ap s-m-ho'ige'ith.
57001025	T-kownalig Jesus Christ at wo wa s-em-ho'ige'el.
58001001	Heki atsh hu am ha'i i ha chuhcha g Jiosh g t-shohshonbad matsh am wo amogath g ha'ichu ahgaj. Kush ihtham Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam he'es am al i ha tashogith g Jiosh a'ahithag oitham.
58001002	Kutsh g Jiosh am hahawa i kei g e-alithag. Tsh ith ia i wuhsh jewed thahm k si s-ap t-tashogith g Jiosh. Ith o wud matsh g Jiosh gd hu i si wehpeg am i kei matsh wehs ha'ichu wo nahto. K heg hekaj wehs ha'ichu d enigaj.
58001003	Kutsh eda ia jiwia k e sho'igchuth k e muhkith matsh gm hu hab wo i juh g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mach d pi ap chu'ijkam. Tsh g Jiosh ab hahawa uhpam ep i be k an thai si e-hugith an. Kush si s-kehg s-masma am e chehgithch g s-has ha'ichuthaj mash woho si wepo chu'ig g e-ohg ch wehs an u'ukch g e-nahtoi matsh an s-ap hab wo chu'igk.
58001004	Neh, bo wa masma am e chehgithch mo ith d alithaj g Jiosh. K heg hekaj tasho mo ba'ich d i si s-has ha'ichu mo hi g anghil.
58001005	Jiosh ash pi hekith hema g anghil hab ahg mo d alithaj ch wabshaba hab kaij ith wui: Ni-alithag, hemu ant am wo ha chehgi g hemajkam map ahpi d wa'i ni-alithag. Kush hab ep kaij: That wo ni-alithagk ch am wo i wuhsh jewed thahm.
58001006	K an ep o'ohanas mash hab kaij: Wehs g anghil at hemho wa ab wo hehgchulithath.
58001007	K an ep o'ohanas: Anghil o ha'ichu wehhejed s-kehgaj hab sha masma mo g hewel ch mei.
58001008	Kush wabshaba g Jiosh alithag am wehmaj wehs ha'ichu thahm. Kush g Jiosh ab wui hab kaij: Thap Jiosh. Kut pi hebai wo ha hugk g m-kownaltalig mani ab m-hiwgith. K g m-chehanig chum hekith s-ap'e.
58001009	S-hohho'ith ap g s-ap'ekam ch g pi ap'ekam pi hohho'ith Nt heg hekaj am i m-kehsh k ab m-mah g si ge'e s-hehgig wehs ha ba'iwechkim.
58001010	Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh ch hab ep kaij ab wui: Ni-Kehsha, am apt nahto g jewed kahchim ch thahm kahchim.
58001011	T heg wehs wo hekit k gm hu hab wo i e juh hab masma mat g i'ikus. Kupt eda ahpi hi wabsh chum hekith d wo thoakamk ch pi hekith am gawul wo e juh.
58001013	Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh ab e-alithag wui ch hab ep kaij: In g hu thahiwua si ni-hugith an k ab wo ai mant wo ha gewito g m-obga. Neh, ith ash wehs hab kaij g Jiosh ab e-alithag wui ch pi hekith ab hu anghil ha wui hab sha'i kaij.
58001014	Anghil ash pi wepo masma g Jiosh alithag ch d wabsh gewpkthag mash am chikpan Jiosh wehhejed. Kuch ahchim d hahawa Jiosh a'aliga t-tho'ibiak ch am wo i wahp kihthaj ed. Kush g anghil d Jiosh pionag ch atsh am wo i t-wehmajk.
58002001	Neh, wehs ihtha o ab t-chehgithch mo g Jiosh alithag wehs thahm g e-nahtoi. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo si t-u'ukchith ith ab s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj matt kah ch pi gm hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed.
58002002	Pi ash d Jiosh alithag ch d wabsh anghil matsh wa ia u'apa g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga heki hu. Tsh wabshaba s-ko'okam bei g e-namkithadag hegam mash pi ab hu ha kaiham.
58002003	Sh eda d si alithaj g Jiosh hegai matsh hemu ia u'apa g ha'ichu ahgaj. Kutt hemho wa ab wo kaihamath. Am o t-tashogith g tho'ibiathag. Kutt pi has masma wo t-tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag matt pi ab hu wo kaihamath. Hegam matsh ab kah g Jiosh alithag o s-ap am t-ahgith ihtha ha'ichu ahgaj matsh ia u'apa.
58002004	K g Jiosh hab ha junithahim g s-hasig ha'ichu ch hekaj am wohokamchuth g ha'ichu ha ahga. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab t-mahkch g gewkthag mach hekaj hab wua g nahnko mahs i wehmtadag ch i gewkemhunadag ab a'ai t-wui.
58002005	Pi ash d anghil mas g Jiosh am i ha chuhcha mat am wo himchuthath g kownaltaligaj. Thach ahchim hemajkam.
58002006	Neh, an o hebai hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mash hema hab kaij ab Jiosh wui: Ni-Jioshga, thach wabsh al hemajkam maptsh ia wabsh t-shul mattsh am wo ha wechokath g anghil he'es i tash. Pi oki hab chum chu'ig maps ab wo has t-elithath ch wo t-thagio'ithath. Ptsh eda ab wo si t-haha'ichuchuth k ab wo t-mah g si s-kehg s-has ha'ichuthag
58002008	k am wo i t-chuhcha wehs ha'ichu thahm. Neh, bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana ch hab d ahga mat wehs g Jiosh nahtoi am wo ha wechokath g hemajkam. Pi o hab chu'ig ithani.
58002009	Kuch wabshaba s-mahch matsh heki hu i shonwua ab Jesus amjed matsh hab wo e juh. Heg atsh wa i e jumalkath k t-wepo e juh k he'es i tash ha wecho g anghil ch chum hems e thagito muhkig wui am wehs t-wehhejed. Ith o d Jiosh hab elitha no pi si s-t-ho'ige'ith. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab si ha'ichuchuth k an thai mat d wo t-kownaligk.
58002010	Wehs ha'ichu o d Jiosh nahtoi ch wehhejed an hab chu'ig. T heg si s-hemajim am i ap'ech mat g Jesus wo e sho'igchuth k hekaj wo t-tho'ibia matt d wo a'aligajk ch am hahawa chum hekith wo wehmajk si s-kehg kihthaj ed. Jiosh hab elitha o wehs s-ap'e.
58002011	Pegih, tsh hab wa masma ab i t-gawulkai g Jiosh alithag matt hab wa'ap d wo Jiosh a'aligak ch pi wo ha chu'ichigk. Kush heg hekaj pi sha'i e elith mat hab wo t-a'agath ‘ni-wepnag.’
58002012	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mash g alithaj s-t-nawojimk ch hab ahg g Jiosh: Bant wo ha a'agath mo d ni-wepnag hegam mat ab wo s-m-wohoch am i kahk g ha'ichu ni-ahga. Amt ant ha shahgith ab wo m-hehgchulithath.
58002013	Kush hab ep kaij: Ab ant hab wabsh masma wo s-m-wohochuthath mo g m-hemajkamga. K an ep o'ohadag matsh ia wo jiwia k wo ha wehmajk ch hab wo ah: Ihtham o d Jiosh a'aliga. Kut am ni-nuhkuthach. Neh, bash kaij ch hab t-a'aga ‘Jiosh a'aliga.’
58002014	Kush eda g Jiawul edgith g gewkthag mat ab wo t-abch g t-chu'ichig matt hekaj gm hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed g Jiosh. Tsh wabshaba g Jiosh alithag t-wepo e juh mat hekaj s-ap ab wo bei g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag k wo hugio g Jiawul gewkthag mat hahawa pi wo e nako mas gm hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed g Jiosh.
58002015	Jiosh alithag atsh gewito g Jiawul am t-wehhejed. Kutt heg hekaj pi wo ehbithath g muhkig.
58002016	Pi ash d anghil mas g Jiosh wo ha tho'ibia. Thach ahchim hemajkam mach ab s-wohochuth.
58002017	Tsh heg wa hekaj am t-wepo e juh k t-wepo masma ia oimmelhim ch ha'ichu nakog. Bat wa'i masma s-ap d wo t-uhgchu pahligk ch ab wo s-t-ho'ige'ithath ch gm hu hab wo i juh g t-chu'ichig am wehhejed g Jiosh.
58002018	Jiawul o chum t-chehani matt hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam. K wabshaba g Jesus s-ap e nakog mat am wo i t-gewkemhunath nash pi hab wa'ap nakog mash wa g Jiawul chum chehani g pi ap'ekam.
58003001	Pegih, ni-wehm wohochuththam, ab at i em-gawulkai g Jiosh gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag Jesus. Heg o d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d uhgchu t-pahlig. Kumt wo oithahith mo has chu'ig.
58003002	Jiosh atsh heki hu am i kei g Mosesbad ha thahm g e-hemajkamga. Kush heg s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan. Pegih, sh g Jesus hab wa'ap s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan am Jiosh wehhejed.
58003003	Kutt wabshaba ba'ich ab wo i si has elithath g Jesus mach g Mosesbad no pi d Jiosh ch wehs ha'ichu nahto.
58003005	Mosesbad ash s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan am ha shahgith g Jiosh hemajkamga ch wabshaba d wabsh Jiosh pionag. Tsh g Jiosh am i kei matsh wo ha'ichu a'aga wehhejed matsh gm hu ba'ich hahawa s-ap wo i e tashogit.
58003006	Kush eda g Jesus d Jiosh alithag ch d si kehshaj matsh wehs am wo ha thahmkath g hemajkamgaj. Kuch ahchim d hemajkamgaj mattp pi wo thagito g t-wohochuthadag k wabsh s-ap t-tahtkk ch wo nenida mat hab wo t-juni mo has i kaij.
58003007	Neh, bash masma hab chu'ig am t-wehhejed mash wa hab chu'ig am ha wehhejed g t-shohshonbad ahchim Tutuligo. Hegam ha wui ash hab kaij g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag: Ab o em-waith g Jiosh hab masma mo wa ab ha waith g em-ge'egedga.
58003008	Hegam o pi chechkaithag Kumt pi hab wo chum masmak. Jiosh o wa am ha wehhejed ap'echuthch g jewed ch ab ha waith mat s-ap am wo thadhaiwua heg eda. T wabshaba wa pi am hu i wahp
58003009	k wabsh pip'ichuth ch am thadha gm hu jegko am wa chum neithch mo haschu am hab ha junith gi'ikko wehst-mahm (40) a'ahith ab.
58003010	T g Jiosh pi am hu i ha wahpki heg oitham k s-ha keh'ith k hab kaij: Chum o hekith pi ap chegito ihtham hemajkam ch pi mai g ni-himthag.
58003011	Kunt hab si i ni-ah mat pi hekith am hu wo i wahp k pi hekith wo s-ap thadhaiwua ihtham ge'eged mo hab masma k wabshaba ab wo bei g s-ko'ok namkithadag.
58003012	Neh, tsh wa woho hab e juh g Jiosh ne'oki am ha wehhejed. Kumt heg hekaj wo s-e nen'eithath mamt pi hab masma wo pi chechkaithagk. Jiosh o d thoakam ch woho gm hu hab wo i em-juh mamtp pi ab hu wo kaihamath.
58003013	Ab o t-waith g Jiosh hemu ch wabshaba pi chum hekith ab wo t-waithath. Mt wo e iattogi g pi ap'ekamkaj mamtp pi ab hu wo kaihamath g Jiosh. Ab g a'ai wo i e gewkemhunath mamt ab wo kaihamath.
58003014	Thach s-wohom Christ hemajkamga mattp an wo si u'ukchith g t-wohochuthadag wehs t-thoakag oitham.
58003015	Mt heg hekaj wo s-chegitok ihtha mani am em-ahgith ch pi wo pi chechkaithagk hab masma mash wa hegam mash pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh.
58003016	Jiosh atsh wa am ha tho'ibia ab ha amjed g Egypt t am hemajkam am gahi wuhshanim g Mosesbad. Kush eda hahawa pi chechkaithag.
58003017	Sh g Jiosh s-ha keh'ith ch hab kaij matsh pi wo ha hiwigi mas am wo i wahp amai mash hebai am chum ap'echuthch ha wehhejed k ho'ip wehs koi hegam ge'eged mash pi ab hu wohog elith. Kush heg hekaj am oiopo tohono jewed ch ed gi'ikko wehst-mahm (40) a'ahith ab.
58003019	Neh, ith o am t-chehgithch matki heg hekaj pi am hu ha wahpki g Jiosh heg eda jewed mash pi ab hu wohochuth.
58004001	Kutki heg hekaj pi am hu ha ap'et g Jiosh waitha. Kutt ahchim wo s-t-gihugath matt pi hab wo masmak mash wa hegam. Jiosh ash am t-wehhejed ap'echuthch e-kihthag ed hab sha masma mash wa am ha wehhejed chum ap'echuthch hegai jewed.
58004003	Ith ash am ap'echuthas gd hu i amjed matsh am e nahto g jewed. Sh wabshaba hab masma hab chu'ig am t-wehhejed mash wa hab chu'ig am ha wehhejed. Jiosh ash hab kaij matsh pi hedai am hu wo i wah pi ab hu wohochuthch k wabshaba ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo s-wohochuthath ch hab s-ap am wo i wahp kihthaj ed am i t-pihhunk ia jewed thahm.
58004004	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed matsh nahto g jewed ch thahm kahchim chuhthp tashkaj k am hahawa i e pihhu heg eda wewa'ak tash.
58004005	Pegih, sh am t-wehhejed an hab chu'ig g s-ap heubagitha wehmaj g Jiosh. Sh wabshaba mu'ijj pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh. Kush hab kaij matsh pi hekith am hu wo i wahp.
58004006	Hegam mat ab wo s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh atsh am wo i wahp Jiosh kihthag ed. Neh, pi atsh am hu i wahp heg eda jewed mash g Jiosh am wui ha waith hegam matsh wehpeg kah g waithaj natsh pi pi ab hu wohoch.
58004007	Tsh wabshaba g ha-a'aliga am i wahp. Tsh g Joshuabad am i ha wanim. Kush ab ha wui hab hahawa kaij g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ihtha mani wa am em-ahgith: Ab o em-waith g Jiosh hab masma mo wa ab ha waith g em-ge'egedga. Kumt pi wo pi chechkaithagk hab masma mo wa hegam. Heki atsh hu am i wahp heg eda jewed. K heg hekaj tasho mo pi ab hu heg wui ha waith g Jiosh
58004009	ch wabshaba ha waith matsh d wo hemajkamgajk. Kut hab wo e nahtokch mat am wo i wahp heg eda si s-kehg s-hehgig mash ha wehhejed ap'echuthch. Jiosh atsh am i nahto g e-chikpan k hahawa si s-hehgig. Kutt ahchim hab wa'ap wo nahto g t-chikpan k wo si s-hehgigk mattp wo t-nahtokch.
58004011	Pegih, oi g am wo e nakog mamt am wo i wahp k wo si s-hehgigk am wehmaj g Jiosh. Pi atsh am hu i wahp hegam matsh pi ab hu wohog el g Jiosh. Kutt wo s-t-nen'oith k pi hab wo masmak.
58004012	Sho'o wa'i si s-gewkthag g Jiosh ne'oki. K g Jiosh heg hekaj am chehgithch mo has chu'ig g t-thoakag ch t-chegitoithag. Bo masma g ne'okij mo g s-mu'uk wainomi mamtp hems heg hekaj gd hu wo si hikuch g chuhkug ch oh'o k wo cheh mo haschu gd hu si eda.
58004013	Pi att wo sha'i t-nako machs haschu gm hu wo ehsto ab amjed g Jiosh. Wehs o ha'ichu s-mahch. Kutt hemho wa hema tash am wo gegokiwua ba'ich k wehs wo ah g t-chu'ichig.
58004014	Tho si uhgchu t-pahlig ch d Jiosh alithag g Jesus ch an i wah Jiosh kihthag ed am t-wehhejed. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo s-wohochuthath chum hekith.
58004015	Ihtha uhgchu t-pahlig o si pihk e elith t-hekaj natsh pi ab nakog k s-mahch hegai mach ahchim ab nakog. Jiawul ash hab wa'ap chum chehani mat hab wo juh hegai mo haschu pi d Jiosh tatchui hab masma mo hemu ab t-chehani. Kush wabshaba s-ap ab wui kehk ch pi hekith hab juh g pi ap'ekam.
58004016	Pegih, ab o t-kaiham g Jiosh no pi g alithaj d uhgchu t-pahlig ch si pihk e elith t-hekaj. Kutt heg hekaj s-ap wo t-nako matt ab wo tahnith g i wehmtadag ch pi wo ehbithath. T heg ab wo i s-t-ho'ige'ith k ab wo i t-wehmt.
58005001	Jiosh atsh am i ap'ech matsh hema g t-wehm o'othham d wo uhgchu t-pahligk ch ab wui hab wo junihith g iagchulitha ch ho'ige'ithahuna am t-wehhejed ch hejel e wehhejed. Kut ith hemho wo wa chum s-hemajimak ab t-wui no pi hab wa'ap d o'othham ch hebai hab wua g pi ap'ekam.
58005004	Pi atsh hedai am wabsh wo hejel i e kei mat d wo uhgchu pahlk. Jiosh atsh am wo i kei hab masma matsh wa hab juh g Aaronbad gd hu i heki hu matsh g amjedkamaj d wo papalk.
58005005	Tsh hab wa masma pi am hu wabsh hejel i e kei g Christ. Jiosh atsh wa am i kehsh k ab wui hab kaij: Ni-alithag, hemu ant am wo ha chehgi g hemajkam map ahpi d wa'i ni-alithag.
58005006	An o hebai hab ep chu'ig mash hab ep kaij ab wui: Thapt wo pahlk heg hekaj mant am i m-kei hab masma mant g Melkisedekbad ch pi heg hekaj maps d Aaronbad amjedkam. Kupt chum hekith d wo pahlk. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh ab wui.
58005007	Kush g Jesus ab wui e ho'ige'ithahun ch shoak ch iawua g e-oh'og mash eda ia oimmed ch ab aihim g muhkig. Kush g Jiosh ab kaiham nash pi heg si s-hemajima ch ab si has elith.
58005008	Thash Jiosh hab elitha matsh wo e sho'igchuth k wo e muhkith am t-wehhejed. Kutsh wa woho hab e juh k hab masma s-mai g wohog elithadag, chum as d Jiosh alithag.
58005009	Bat wa masma am i ap'ech g Jiosh mat hab wo juh g pi ha huhugetham tho'ibiathag wehsijj t-wehhejed mattp hedai ab wo s-wohog el.
58005010	Kush hab kaij g Jiosh mat am i kei mat d wo uhgchu pahlk hab masma mat am i kei g Melkisedek.
58005011	Mu'i ani ha'ichu chum s-em-mashchamimk ab amjed g Christ ith hekaj Melkisedek. Mt wabshaba pi wo amich.
58005012	Ithani amki tash d Jiosh wohochuththam ch hab wo chum chu'igk mamt ha'i ep wo ha mashcha. Kumtki eda koi si s-ap s-mai g wehpeg mashchama. Bam sha masma mam d wabsh kia al haha'as a'al ch hegai wa'i wihbi ih'e
58005013	nam pi pi amichuth g Jiosh ne'oki ab amjed g s-ap'ekam.
58005014	Hegam mat wo ge'ege'ehogat e-wohochuthadag ed at wo s-amich g Jiosh ne'oki k wo s-mahchk mo haschu d s-ap'ekam ch haschu d pi ap'ekam.
58006001	Gd hu i si wehpeg att am em-mashcha mamt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh
58006002	k wo e pahl wapko. T g Jiosh ab wo i em-wuwhas muhkig t amjed k pi wo em-lothai. Kutt heki hu em-mashcha mamt ab wo ha taht hegam mat hab wa'ap ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh k wo e ho'ige'ithahu am ha wehhejed. Kut ab wo bei g gewkthaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab masma mamt ahpim.
58006003	Ith o d hema hegam wehpeg mashchama am t-wohochuthadag ed. K wabshaba ha'ichu d ep hegai mamt ep wo s-mai. Mt heg hekaj pi heg wo wa'i a'agath mo d si shondaj g t-wohochuthadag.
58006004	Pi at wo e nako hegam mat wo s-mahchk g Jiosh ch wo thagito mas gm hu ep wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegito k ep wo bei g wechij thoakag. Heki o hu ha tonlith g Jiosh g ha-amichuthadag. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am ha eda chikpan. Kut chum bei ihtha wechij thoakag
58006005	k chum s-mahch mo g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga s-ap'e ch neith g Jiosh gewkthag
58006006	ch wabshaba wehs thagito ihtha heg hekaj pi ap'ekam. Heg o wa wepo mat ab ep sisish g Jiosh alithag kots t ab k si edawua am ep i e nohnogithk pi ap'ekam wui. Kut pi wo sha'i e nako mas gm hu ep wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.
58006007	Neh, no hig pi woho mam hab elith g e-e'es mat chum s-kehg wo bahithagt mat hekith wo juh. Kumt wo thagito hegai oithag mat wabsh g ho'i wo i wuhshath. Pegih, t hab wa masma wo em-thagito g Jiosh mamtp pi ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk.
58006009	Ni wabshaba hab em-elith mamt woho e tho'ibia k hab masma ab ba'ich wo i bei g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag.
58006010	S-ap am ha'ichu hab junihim ha wehhejed g e-wehm wohochuththam ch hab wabsh kia junihim nam pi si pihk e elith ha hekaj. T g Jiosh wo s-chegito hegai mam haschu hab junihim.
58006011	Tatchua ani mamt hab wa masma am hab wo junihith wehs e-thoakag oitham ch ab wo ai hegai mo g Jiosh ab t-makiog hahawa.
58006012	Hegam mash wa heki hu ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ash s-bahbagi ab nenida mat hab wo ha juni mash haschu hab kaij mat hab wo juh. Kumt ahpim hab wo wa masmak.
58006013	Jiosh ash wa am si ahg g t-shohshonbad Abraham mash haschu ab t-makiog
58006014	ab wui hab kaijch: Hejel ni-wehhejed ani si m-ahgith mant ab wo si s-m-ho'ige'ith k ab mu'i wo i ha wuwhas g m-amjedkam.
58006015	Kutsh heg am wabsh s-bahbagi nenida k am nei matsh wa g Jiosh am i shonwuich mat haschu am ahgi mat hab wo juni.
58006016	Neh, s-mahch ach mat am Jiosh tahgio a'ai wo i ap'ech g hemajkam mat woho hab wo juh g ha'ichu e-ahga.
58006017	Pegih, t g Jiosh am hejel e tahgio i ap'ech g ha'ichu e-ahga Abrahambad wui no pi pi hedai ba'ich i ge'ej mas am tahgio wo i ap'ech. Bo masma am t-chehgithch ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth mat pi hekith am gawul wo juh g hab e-elitha.
58006018	Kutt heg hekaj ab wo t-gewkemhunath mat s-ap wo nahto g t-tho'ibiathag.
58006019	Jesus atsh am heki hu i wah thahm kahchim ch ed. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mat am wo i t-wahpki ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth. Jiosh atsh am i kei matsh d wo uhgchu t-pahligk chum hekith. Pi ash heg hekaj d pahl mas d papal ha amjedkam. Jiosh atsh am i kei hab masma matsh wa heki hu am i kei hegai mash hab chehgig Melkisedek.
58007001	Nt wo ha'ichu em-ahgi ab amjed hegai Melkisedekbad mant wo em-tashogi g Jesus chikpan. Jiosh atsh am i kei g Melkisedekbad. Kush d kownal am Salem kihhim ch ed ch d ep pahl. Kutsh ihtham Abrahambad gm hu hebai githahiop k am ha'i ha koktha g pi ap'ekam kokownal k ab uhpam hihim. Kutsh g Melkisedekbad ab ha nam k ab i s-ho'ige'el g Abrahambad am wehhejed g Jiosh.
58007002	Tsh g Abrahambad ab mah mo haschu ab d wuikamaj g Jiosh mash d hemako tahpna mo wehst-mahm e tahpanch g gehgewathaj. Melkisedekbad chehgig o hab d ahga ‘S-ap'ekam Kownal.’ K g Salem hab d ahga ‘Thotholimathag.’ K heg hekaj d ep thotholimkam kownal.
58007003	Pi o an hu hebai o'ohanas mas hedai d ha-amjedkam g Melkisedekbad ch has masma mahsi k has masma heb hu hih. K ith am t-chehgithch mat has masma in wo i wuhsh g Jiosh alithag ab thahm kahchim t amjed k am uhpam ep wo him k d wo uhgchu pahlk chum hekith.
58007004	Melkisedekbad oki ba'ich d i si s-has ha'ichu mo g Abrahambad. Tsh heg ab mah g hemako tahpna mo wehst-mahm e tahpanch g gehgewathaj matsh am ui cheggiadag ed
58007005	K hab chu'ig g t-chehanig matsh hegam t-wehm o'othham mo d Levibad amjedkam ch d papal ab t-amjed wo ui hegai hemako tahpna matsh wehst-mahm wo e tahpanch g t-gehgewathag.
58007006	Kush ihtha Melkisedekbad pi d Levibad amjedkam. Tsh eda g Abrahambad ab namkith hegai mo d Jiosh wuikam. Tsh g Melkisedekbad ab i s-ho'ige'el.
58007007	Kuch s-mahch mat g ge'echu ab wo s-ho'ige'el g chumchu. K heg hekaj ba'ich i ge'ej g Melkisedekbad mo g Abrahambad.
58007008	Melkisedekbad o ba'ich d i si s-has ha'ichu mo g t-papalig. Hegam o wabsh ko'ihim. K wabshaba pi an hu hebai o'ohanas mat muh g Melkisedekbad.
58007009	K heg wa wepo mat g t-papalig ha-shohshonbad Levi am namkith g Melkisedekbad
58007010	nash pi ab d Abrahambad amjedkam mash heg am namkith.
58007011	Jiosh atsh am i ha chuhcha g Levibad amjedkam matsh d wo t-papaligk ch ab wo t-mah g chehanigaj. T wabshaba pi wo sha'i e nako g t-papalig mas am wo i t-ap'ech g Jiosh wehhejed. Tsh heg hekaj ab hema ep i wuhsh mash gawul masma mo hegam ch wepo masma g Melkisedekbad.
58007012	Kut hemho wa am gawul juh g Jiosh g e-chehanig mat am wo i kei g Jesus mat d wo t-pahligk.
58007013	Heg ash pi ab hu d Levibad amjedkam ch wabshaba ab d Judabad amjedkam matsh ihtham pi d wo chum papalk am t-chehanig ed. K heg hekaj tasho mat g Jiosh am gawul juh g e-chehanig am t-wehhejed.
58007015	Neh, ba'ich ant am wo i em-tashogi mo g Jesus pi ha wepo masma g t-papalig ch wabshaba wepo masma g Melkisedekbad.
58007016	Pi atsh e pahlch g t-chehanigkaj k wabshaba e pahlch g gewkthajkaj g e-thoakag. K g thoakaj d pi ha huhugetham.
58007017	Heg o hekaj ab amjed o'ohanas mash ab wui hab kaij g Jiosh: Am ant i m-kei hab masma mant wa am i kei g Melkisedekbad. Kupt chum hekith d wo uhgchu pahlk. Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh am e-alithag wui.
58007018	Kut heg am i t-ap'ech Jiosh tahgio mach ab hahawa s-ap miabith. Heki hu t-chehanig o pi ab hu sha'i t-mahkch g gewkthag machs hekaj am wo i t-ap'ech Jiosh wehhejed. Kut hekaj g Jiosh gm hu hab i juh.
58007020	Jiosh ash hab wabsh kaij matsh g Levibad amjedkam d wo papalk
58007021	ch wabshaba g e-gewkthagkaj hab kaij ab wui g Jesus: Ahni ani g ni-gewkthagkaj hab si kaij mapt d wo uhgchu pahlk chum hekith. Kunt pi hekith am gawul wo juh g hab ni-elitha. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.
58007022	K ith am t-chehgithch mat g Jiosh am i ap'ech g ba'ich i s-kehg ap'echutha mat hi heki hu nat pi am i kei g hejel e-alithag mat d wo uhgchu pahlk chum hekith.
58007023	Hegam Levibad amjedkam at pi wo e nako mas d wo papalk chum hekith no pi ko'ihim.
58007024	T wabshaba g Jesus chum hekith d wo thoakamk. T hab pi hedai ep am kehkud ed wo i kekiwua.
58007025	Kut wo e nako mat wehs wo ha tho'ibia hegam mat am gahi wuhshanim ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui nat pi chum hekith d wo thoakamk ch am ha wehhejed ab wo tahnith g Jiosh mat am wo i ha wehmt.
58007026	Tatchua ach g si s-ap uhgchu pahl. K g Jesus woho hab masma ch d hekia s-ap'ekam ch i e gawulkathch ab ha amjed g pi ap'ekam. Ithani o an thaha Jiosh wehm an thahm kahchim ch ed.
58007027	Pi o wepo masma hegam mo d u'ugchu papal am heki hu t-chehanig ed. (a) Hegam o d pi ap chu'ijkam ch wehpeg ab wo ha'ichu iagchul hejel e-chu'ichig wehhejed k ab haha wo iagchul g hemajkam ha-chu'ichig wehhejed. K wabshaba g Jesus pi ha chu'ichig. (b) Hegam o chum hekith ab ha'ichu iagchulith Jiosh wui. T wabshaba g Jesus hemho hab juh. T heg wehs am i ap'ech g pi ap ha-chu'ichig. (c) Hegam o ab ha'ichu chum namkith g Jiosh. T wabshaba g Jesus hejel am i e thagito mat hekaj ab wo iagchul.
58007028	Hegam mo d papal ab heki hu t-chehanig wecho o pi d sha'i hekiakam ch pi ap wo nahto g e-chikpan. T wabshaba g Jiosh am hahawa i kei g e-alithag g hejel e-gewkthagkaj. K heg d uhgchu t-pahlig ch d si hekiakam. Pi at hekith wo huhug g gewkthaj. T hab s-ap wo nahto g e-chikpan.
58008001	Neh, bo wa masma d uhgchu pahl g Jesus mant am i em-tashogi. Kush g Jiosh ab si has elith ch am e wehm thahshch e-kownal thaikud ed.
58008002	Jiosh kihthag o si s-wohom d ge'e cheopi ch pi d wabsh hemajkam ha-nahtoi. K heg eda am chikpan ihtha si s-wohom uhgchu t-pahlig.
58008003	U'ugchu papal at ab ha'ichu wo chum iagchul Jiosh wui am wehhejed g pi ap ha-chu'ichig g hemajkam. T ith hab wa'ap wo wa juh g Jesus.
58008004	K eda pi hiwgithas mas hab wo juh ia jewed thahm no ge d Levibad amjedkam. Tho wa'i ihtham mo am t-himthag chehanig ed hab wua g chu'ichig iagchulitha.
58008005	K eda g ha-chikpan wabsh t-chehgithch g Jiosh kihthag ch hegai si s-wohom chu'ichig iagchulitha. Jiosh atsh wa am chehgi g Mosesbad mo has masma g kihthaj an thahm kahchim ch ed. Kush wa neith g Mosesbad an kehkch tho'ag thahm. Kush wa hab kaij g Jiosh ab wui: Am ani m-chehgith mo has masma g ni-kihthag. Kupt am wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat hab masma am hema hab wo juh g ikus kih mat d wo ni-cheopigak.
58008006	Neh, hegam u'ugchu papal o am i chum ha wehmt g hemajkam heg hekaj heki hu hab elithaj g Jiosh. K wabshaba ihtha wechij ha'ichu hab elithaj ba'ich i s-kehgaj no pi g Jiosh ba'ich i s-kehg ha'ichu ab t-makiog. K g Jesus ba'ich i s-ap i t-wehmt heg hekaj.
58008007	Pi at am hu hab wo juh g wechij apchutha g Jiosh matp g hekiukam s-ap am wo i t-ap'ech wehhejed.
58008008	Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh: Ab o him g tash mant am wo nahto g wechij hab ni-elitha am ha wehhejed g ni-hemajkamga.
58008009	Kut pi hab wo masmak mo hegai mant am chum nahto am ha wehhejed g ha-ge'egedga mant eda ab i ha wuwhas Egypt jewed t amjed. Hegam o pi ap am hu hab junihim g ha'ichu ni-apchutha. Kuni heg hekaj pi ha chegima.
58008010	Nt wabshaba am hab wo juh g wechij ha'ichu hab ni-elitha am ha wehhejed. K d ihtha mant am wo o'oha g ni-chehanig ha-chegitoi ed ch am ha-i'ibthag ed. Kut woho d wo ni-hemajkamgak. Nt ahni d wo ha-Jioshgak.
58008011	Kut pi hedai wo sha'i ha mashcha g e-wehm o'othham mat wo s-ni-mahchk. Wehs at wo s-ni-mahchk, chum as hedai wud wo k.
58008012	Gm ant hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig k pi hekith ep wo chegitok.
58008013	Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh. K heg hekaj tasho mat hekit hegai heki hu t-himthag chehanig k oi gm hu hab wo i e juh.
58009001	Am o apchuthas heg eda heki hu chehanig mat has masma g hemajkam ab has wo elithath g Jiosh ch am ep apchuthas mat g hemajkam am wo i kei g ikus kih mat hab d wo ahgak.
58009002	Ith ash wa an e eda kuhpi. K hegai wehpeg kih hab e a'aga ‘Hekia S-ap'ekam Kih.’ Sh ith eda am ha'ichug g lalampa chuhchakud ch mihsa. Sh heg ab mihsa g papal am tho'aw g pahn ch hekaj ab si has elith g Jiosh.
58009003	Kush hegai hema ep kih hab e a'aga ‘Si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kih.’
58009004	Ith ash eda am ha'ichug g ohla iagchulithakud. Kush ith ab g papal an memheith g s-ap uhw ha'ichu. Kush am ep ha'ichug hegai uhs washa mash d chehgitha mach d chum Jiosh hemajkamga ahchim Tutuligo. Ith ash wehsko e ma'ishch g ohlakaj. Am ash ith eda e thahshch g ohla ha'a. Sh ith eda ha'i nuhkuth hegai ha'ichu hugi mash hab e a'aga ‘manna.’ Kush am e chekch hegai Aaronbad usaga mash wa ab i i'iwgi. Kush wa am ep e to'akch hegai gohk ko'okmalk hohothai mo an ab o'ohanas g Jiosh chehanig.
58009005	An thahm ihtha uhs washa ash an nahtois g gohk anghil ch ab e wui gegok ch g e-a'ankaj am ehkchulithch matsh hebai wo e iawua g eh'edaj g ha-iagchulitha. Ith ash am e iawua matsh hekaj g Jiosh wo s-ha ho'ige'ith k gm hu hab wo i juh g ha-chu'ichig. Pi ant am hu wo kia wehs ha'ichu t tashogi ab amjed ihtha.
58009006	Neh, bash wa masma wehs apchuthas ihtham ha'ichu. Sh g papal am i wahpk wehpeg kih ch ed wehs tashkaj ch am hab wua g e-chikpan.
58009007	Kush wabshaba heg wa'i si uhgchu pahl gd hu i wapke heg eda ba'ich kih hemho ahith ab. Kush g ha'ichu thoakam eh'ed am iagchulith Jiosh wui am wehhejed g e-chu'ichig ch ha-chu'ichig g hemajkam matp hems am hab juh pi mahchch mo d pi ap chu'ichig.
58009008	Hegai Si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kih o wepogithas g Jiosh kihthag. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am t-chehgithch mo pi koi ab hu kuhpi'oks g Jiosh kihthag am t-wehhejed mo eda wabsh kia an kuhpi hegai kih.
58009009	K d wabsh chehgitha mo g ha'ichu thoakam ab iagchulith Jiosh wui. Pi at woho am wo i ha ap'ech Jiosh tahgio. K heg hekaj am wabsh kia e kudut heg hekaj pi ap e-chu'ichig.
58009010	Ihtha heki hu chehanig o wa am ha chehgithch mat haschu wo ko'ath ch has masma wo i e ap'echuthath e lihmhunch am Jiosh wehhejed am hugkam mat hekith g Jiosh am wo i wechijith wehs ha'ichu am t-wehhejed.
58009011	Tsh wa ith am woho hab e juh g Christ k d si uhgchu pahl am thahm hegai s-kehg ha'ichu mash g Jiosh hab kaij matsh hab wo t-juni. Hegai apchutha mo am eda chikpan g Christ o ba'ich i ge'ej ch ba'ich i s-ap'e mo hegai ge'e cheopi mani am heki hu ahg. Pi at g o'othham am nahto. K pi d ihtha jewed thahm ha'ichu.
58009012	Hemho at am i wah g Christ heg eda apchutha s-ap nahtok g t-tho'ibiathag. Hegam mo d jewed thahm papal o wabsh g ha'ichu thoakam ha-eh'ed am iagchulith. T wabshaba g Jiosh alithag g hejel e-eh'edkaj ab t-behi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
58009013	Neh, mash wa g ha-eh'ed g siswat ch totolo ab e sihbanith ch g matai ab amjed g wisilo mehithag ab e nehnichuth ha thahm g hemajkam mat wo ha chehgi mat wo i ha kegch g Jiosh heg amjed matp hems pi ap am hu hab junihim g e-himthag chehanig.
58009014	Pegih, t ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu hab t-juni g Christ mat am i e thagito Jiosh wui k am t-wehhejed e muhkith. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o wa ab mahkch g gewkthag mat hab juh. K d hekia s-ap'ekam iagchulitha. Heki achd hu t-kudut heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig. T wabshaba g Christ am iagchul g e-eh'ed Jiosh wui mat am wo i t-ap'ech. Kuch am hahawa g Jiosh wehhejed chikpan.
58009015	Bash kaij g Jiosh matsh ab wo t-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag k ab wo i t-wahpki e-kihthag ed. T g alithaj am i ap'ech ihtha wechij ha'ichu ahgaj t-wehhejed ahchim mo g Jiosh ab t-waith. Muhkigaj at am i t-wuwhas matt pi wo ai g t-namkithadag heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig ab wecho hegai heki hu apchutha.
58009016	Neh, mat hema wo muh k am wo thagito g e-ahga mat hedai wo i ui g ha'ichu enigaj. T hemho wa am wo e wohokamch mat muh ihtha o'othham. Kut am hahawa hab wo e juh g ahgaj.
58009017	Pi at hab wo sha'i e juh g ahgaj mat wo kia thoakath. T hekith wo i muh, t hab haha wo e juh.
58009018	Chum hems hegai heki hu apchutha am ha shahgith g Jiosh ch hemajkam at i e ap'ech g eh'edkaj.
58009019	Mosesbad atsh wehpeg am wehs ha ahgi g chehanig mo has i masma an o'ohanas k am hahawa wasib g wisilo ch siswat ha-eh'ed k g shuhthagi am i wehnath k ith o'os heg ab o'ohana mo an hab chu'ig g chehanig ch ab ha thahm g hemajkam. Batsh juh ihtha am wa has mahs sha'ikaj mo hab e a'aga ‘hyssop’ ch kahwal wopo mo i wegiumthas.
58009020	Kush wa hab kaij g Mosesbad: Ith o d eh'ed mat hekaj i e shonwuich g apchuthaj g Jiosh mamt ab wo s-wohog elithath.
58009021	Bash wa kaij ch hab wa'ap masma ab o'os g eh'ed heg ab ikus kih ch wehs ha'ichu thahm mash hekaj am ihm g Jiosh.
58009022	Tho Jiosh chehanig am t-wehhejed ahchim Tutuligo mo wehs ha'ichu e kegchuth heg hekaj eh'ed. T g pi ap chu'ichig gm hu hab wo i e juh hab wa'i masma mat g eh'ed wo e iawua.
58009023	Neh, bo masma i e kegchuth ihtham mo am wabsh oithch hab chu'ig hegai mash am Jiosh kihthag ed. T wabshaba g thahm kahchim apchutha hemho wa ba'ich i s-ap'ekam iagchulithakaj wo i e kegch.
58009024	Hegai Si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kih ash am oithch hab junis g Jiosh kihthag. Tsh g Jiosh alithag pi am wabsh i wah heg eda k wabshaba am i wah Jiosh kihthag ed k ithani am t-wehhejed neok am tahgio g Jiosh.
58009025	Uhgchu t-pahlig ahchim Tutuligo o wabsh g ha'ichu thoakam t-mum'ajith ch ab Jiosh wui iagchulith. Tsh wabshaba g Jiosh alithag ba'ich i s-ap iagchulitha hab juh nat pi hejel e muhkith am t-wehhejed. Pi o hekith nahtois g ha-chikpan g u'ukchu t-papalig. K heg hekaj mu'ikko hab junihim.
58009026	Tsh wabshaba g Jiosh alithag wabsh hemho hab juh k pi mu'ikko e muhkith am t-wehhejed. Neh, k hab masma tasho mat s-ap nahto g e-chikpan mat gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Kush hemu hahawa e aihim mat g jewed wo huhug.
58009027	Am o apchuthas mat hemho wa wo muh g o'othham hemho k heg i thahm ab wo ai g ge'e lothaita tash.
58009028	Bat wa masma g Christ hab wa'ap hemho am i e thagito t-wehhejed k gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. T ith pi am hahawa ep d wo chikpanajk. Tsh wabshaba ia ep wo i e maskogi mat wo t-tho'ibia ahchim mach ab si hiwig ch ab nenida mat ab ep wo jiwia.
58010001	Ab ash wa t-chehani g Jiosh matt ab wui wo ha iagchulithath g ha'ichu thoakam wehs a'ahith ab. Ith atki pi gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig k wabshaba wabsh s-kohmagim t-chehgithch mat has masma g Jiosh gm hu hab haha wo i juh.
58010002	Pi at ep wo t-kudutath g pi ap t-chu'ichig matp gm hu s-ap hab wo i e juh heg hekaj iagchulitha. Kutt heki hu wa'i ha'asa hab wo juh.
58010003	Ihtha t-iagchulitha o am wabsh i t-chechegitolith g t-chu'ichig wehs ahith ab.
58010004	Pi at hekith wo sha'i e nako g totolo ch siswat ha-eh'ed mas gm hu hab wo i juh g t-chu'ichig.
58010005	Sh heg hekaj ab wui hab kaij g Jiosh g alithaj am wo jiwiak jewed thahm: Pi ap wa chum hohho'ith mat g hemajkam ab m-wui wo iagchul g ha'ichu thoakam. Ith o wabsh ha chehgith mant has masma gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig. Heg apt hekaj hab wo ni-juh mant d wo jewed thahm o'othhamk ch ab m-wui wo ni-iagchul.
58010007	Ni heg hekaj hab kaij mani ab m-wui ni-thagitokch ch am hab wo juh hegai mo an o'ohanas m-o'ohana ed map ni-tatchuith.
58010008	Neh, Jiosh o ab ha chehani g hemajkam mat ab wui wo ha iagchul g ha'ichu thoakam. Kumtp hems pi amichuth mas haschu ahgch hab e kaij mo chum pi hohho'ith hegai iagchulitha.
58010009	Pegih, bo e kaij no pi d wabsh chehgitha am hugkam mat hekith g alithaj hab wo juh g s-wohom iagchulitha am hejel e thagitok Jiosh wui. Heg ash hekaj ab wui hab kaij: Ab ani m-wui ni-thagitokch mant hab wo juh g m-tatchui.
58010010	Tho Jiosh hab elitha mat g alithaj wo e muhkith am t-wehhejed. Kut wa woho hab e juh k hab masma wehs gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
58010011	Wehs tashkaj o am hab wua g e-chikpan g t-papalig ch mu'ikko hab wua g iagchulitha. T wabshaba ihtha iagchulitha pi hekith gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
58010012	Jiosh alithag at hi hemako iagchulitha hab juh mat gm hu hab wo i juh. K ith chum hekith s-kehgaj heg wehhejed. T g Jiosh ab hahawa si has elith k an e wehm thahshch e-kownal thaikud ed.
58010013	K ithani ab thak ch ab wo ai mat g Jiosh wo ha gewitojel hegam mo ab wui gegok.
58010014	Pegih, t hemho am e iagchul t-wehhejed k hekaj i ha ap'ech ia'i amjed wehs hegam mat gm hu oa g pi ap'ekam ha-ihbthag ed.
58010015	Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am hab wa'ap wohokamchuth ihtha hab masma:
58010016	Bo kaij g Jiosh: Ith o d wechij apchutha mant am hab wo juh ha wehhejed. Bant wo juh g ni-tatchuithag am ha-i'ibthag ed ch ha-chegitoi ed.
58010017	K hab ep kaij: Am ant hu wo pi chegito g pi ap ha-chu'ichig k pi thahm am hu ep wo sha'i i chegito.
58010018	Pegih, t gm hu hab i e juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Kutt hekaj hahawa pi heg hekaj hab wo sha'i juh g iagchulitha.
58010019	Ab ach hahawa si ap'ethag matt ab wo i miabi g Jiosh nat pi muh g Jesus am t-wehhejed. Ith o heg wa wepo mach ap'ethag matt am wo i wahp heg eda Si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kih.
58010020	E at muhkith g Christ am t-wehhejed k hab masma ab i kuhpi'o ihtha wechij himthag am t-wehhejed
58010021	no pi s-wohom d si uhgchu t-pahlig ahchim Jiosh hemajkamga.
58010022	Hekai ach hu t-kudut g pi ap t-chu'ichigkaj. T wabshaba ab i t-kegchuth k gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Kuch heg hekai ab si hiwig ch d hekiakam ch ab wo i miabi g Jiosh.
58010023	Jiosh at woho ab wo t-juni mash has i kaij. Kutt heg hekaj si s-wihnam wo t-u'ukch heg ab.
