58010024	Ab att hig a'ai wo si pihk t-elithath ch ab a'ai wo i t-wehmtath matt am wo chehgithath mach ab ha tatchua g hemajkam ch am wo i ha wehmajk.
58010025	Ha'i at ha'asa ha wehm e nam g e-wehm wohochuththam. Kumt wabshaba ahpim pi hab wo chum e juh k ab wo si a'ai i e gewkemhunath. E o aihim mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus. Kutt hekaj wahm ba'ich ab wo i t-gewkemhunath.
58010026	Pi at gm hu hab wo sha'i e juh g chu'ichigaj hegai mat am hab wo kia junihith g pi ap'ekam ha chum s-mahchch g wohokam. Pi o am hu hahawa ha'ichug mas haschu am wo e iagchul heg wehhejed.
58010027	Jiosh atsh wo ha lothait k gm hu wo ha shul s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag ed. K ith hab masma mo g pi ha huhugetham mei. Heg o am wa'i wi'is mat wo chum si s-ehbithath matsh has wo ha juh.
58010028	Mosesbad atki an o'ohana Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed matsh gohk o waik wo wohokamch g chu'ichigaj hegai mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g Jiosh chehanig. Kutsh wo e muhkith.
58010029	Kumt ba'ich i s-ko'ok namkithadag ab wo bei mamtp pi ab hu wo ha'ichuch g Jiosh alithag. Heg at iawua g e-eh'ed k e muhkith mat gm hu hab wo i chum juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o chum si s-hemajima ab em-wui. Kumt wabshaba wo si s-nen'oithk
58010030	nash pi hab kaij g Jiosh: Ani ant ab wo ha mah g ha-namkithadag. K an ep o'ohanas: Jiosh at wo ha lothai g e-hemajkamga.
58010031	Tho si s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu mamt wo muh pi am hu e ap'echuthch Jiosh wui. Hemho wa at gm hu wo em-shul s-ko'ok em-namkithadag ed.
58010032	Am g wo s-chegito mo wa has chu'ig ha'ichu am em-wehhejed. Mu'i ha'ichu amt nako amjed mamt ab s-mai g wohokam k eda pi sha'i e gehgch heg hekaj.
58010033	Mu'ikko am s-ko'okam has em-ahg ch em-sho'igchuth am hemajkam ha tahgio. Hebai am wa si pi ap e tahtk ha wehhejed hegam mo hab wa'ap hab masma e sho'igchuth.
58010034	Ab am ha wehm nakog g sho'igthag hegam mat e kuhpach. Ab am wa wabsh s-ap e tahtk mat wa chum wehs em-wohppo'i g ha'ichu em-eniga heg hekaj mam s-mahch mo ba'ich d i si ha'ichu hegai mamt ab bei mat ith pi hekith wo ha huhug.
58010035	Pi g am wo heb hu wua g e-wohochuthadag. Ith at wo em-u'apajel g ge'e em-mahkigdag.
58010036	Bamt wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui ch wo s-chu nakogath. T g Jiosh am hab wo em-juni mash haschu hab s-em-junimk.
58010037	Neh, bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Pi o ge'e tash am wi'is mat am wo jiwia g si ni-Kehsha.
58010038	Ni-hemajkamga at ab wo s-wohoch ihtha k wo e tho'ibia. Tp wabshaba hema wabsh wo sha kuhkam kekiwua, nt pi wo hohho'i ihtha. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.
58010039	Tt ahchim hi pi wo sha'i kuhkam gegokiwua machs im hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed g Jiosh k wabshaba ab wo i s-wohochuth k wo t-tho'ibia.
58011001	T-wohochuthadag o hab d ahga mach s-mahch mo woho hegai mach am wui t-gewpkathch, chum achs hems pi t-wuhpuikaj neith.
58011002	Mu'ijj g t-shohshonbad ash ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Sh hekaj ab s-ha hohho'ith g Jiosh.
58011003	Ab ach s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch hekaj s-amichuth mat wehs ha'ichu nahto pi ha'ichu amjed am wabsh neokk.
58011004	Hema ash wa hab chehgig Abel ch ash ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ch hekaj ab s-wohog elith k ab wui iagchul g ha'ichu thoakam e-mu'a. Tsh wabshaba g wehngajbad Cain pi hab masma hab e juh. Tsh g Jiosh ab si s-hohho'i g Abelbad natsh pi hab juh g tatchuij. Ith ach an ne'okchulith Jiosh o'ohana ed. K ith heg wa wepo mo g Abelbad am wabsh kia neok ch am ha'ichu t-ahgith.
58011005	Hema ash wa hab chehgig Enoc ch ash ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh. Sh g Jiosh s-hohho'ith ch gm hu i bei mash wabsh kia thoa. Kutsh pi hedai edagi.
58011006	Hegam at wo wa'i s-ha hohho'ithath g Jiosh mat hedai ab wo s-wohochuthath. Hegai mat ab wo i miabi g Jiosh at hemho wa wo s-wohoch mo an hema d Jiosh ch am i e tashogith ha wui hegam mo ab s-mahchimk.
58011007	Noahbad atsh ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh k ab si has elith. Jiosh ash wa am ahgith mat hema hab wo juh g si ge'e wahlko natsh pi wo ha wi'in. Tsh ihtham Noahbad woho hab e juh k heg eda e tho'ibia g e-wehm kihkam wehm ch e-a'aliga ha wehm. Bat masma am mahsko wua g Jiosh g hemajkam ha-chu'ichig natsh pi hegam pi ab hu wohoch. Kush hab kaij g Jiosh mash ihtham Noahbad d s-ap'ekam nash pi ab s-wohochuth.
58011008	Abrahambad ash ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ch ab s-wohog el. Jiosh ash hab ahg matsh am hu hebai wo mah g mehk jewed. Kutsh ab wui wo hih. Tsh g Abrahambad woho thagito g e-kihthag k gm hu hih wa chum pi mahchch mas hebai wo hih.
58011009	Jiosh atsh pi oi ha mah hegai jewed. Kush am wabsh i e chiwiapadath ch am kihkahim ikus kih ch ed am ha wehm g e-amjedkam. Kush g Jiosh am hab wa'ap ha ahgith ihtham Abrahambad amjedkam matsh am hu hebai wo ha mah hegai jewed.
58011010	Abrahambad ash ab wui e gewkath hegai kihhim mo d Jiosh nahtoi ch pi hekith wo i gei.
58011011	Abrahambad ch Sarabad ash wa ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh mash wa hab ha ahgith matsh wo hema mahsith g ali matsh eda heki hu kekelit. Sh g Sarabad pi ha mamdat.
58011012	Neh, sh wa g Abrahambad d si keli mat pi ep wo chum e nako mas wo alitht. T eda ab amjed i hih mu'i hemajkam mo pi ta kuintama hab masma mo g huhu'u ch hab masma mo g o'od an ge kahchki babsho.
58011013	Wehsijj ihtham mach am ha chehcheg at ko'o k huhug koi wehs u'uk hegai mash haschu g Jiosh ab ha makiog. Heg o wa wepo wo mehkjed neith ch ab si tatchua hegai ha'ichu no pi s-mahch mo d wabsh chihpiatham ith thahm jewed.
58011014	Hegam mo hedai s-mahch ihtha o am tasho e gahgith g jewed mat d wo si ha-enigak.
58011015	Pi o am hu uhpam e chegito heg wui jewed mat am thagito. Jiosh at wo ha hiwigi mat wo uhpam hihi matp hab wo e el.
58011016	K wabshaba am e gewpkathch heg wui jewed mo ba'ich i s-ap'e, pej hegai thahm kahchim kihthag. Jiosh o s-hohho'ith mo hab a'aga mo d ha-Jioshga nat pi am heki hu nahto g kihhim ha wehhejed.
58011017	Abrahambad alithag ash hab chehgig Isaac. Tsh wa g Jiosh am wabsh a'appe g Abrahambad mash eda d thoakam mat wo mua g e-alithag k hekaj ab wui wo iagchul. Tsh g Abrahambad ab i s-wohochuth k hab chum juh, chum as g Isaacbad d si hejel alithag ch d Jiosh mahkigdag.
58011018	Jiosh ash wa hab ahgith mat ab Isaacbad amjed wo i hihi g amjedkamaj.
58011019	Abrahambad o ab s-wohochuth mat g Jiosh wo e nako mat ab uhpam wo i wuhshath g Isaacbad muhkig amjed. K heg wa wepo mat hab e juh nat pi oi wa tho'ibia.
58011020	Isaacbad ash wa ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ch hekaj am ha ahgith g e-a'alithag Jacob ch Esau matsh has masma ab wo s-ha ho'ige'el g Jiosh.
58011021	Jacobbad ash wa ab s-wohochuth ch ab ihm g Jiosh ch am ha ahgith hegam e-wopsmad mash d Joseph a'alithag matsh has masma ab wo s-ha ho'ige'el g Jiosh. Ith at hab juh mo eda muhkhim an wabsh e-cheowikud an e gewishch.
58011022	Josephbad ash wa ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ch hekaj hab kaij am i muhkhimk mat wo uhpam hihi g Tutuligo ab amjed g Egypt jewed ch am ep si shel ha ahgith mat has wo juh g oh'oj.
58011023	Mosesbad jehj ash wa ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh. Kownal ash chum ha chehani g Tutuligo mat wo ha koktha g chechoj e-a'aliga. Tsh eda g Mosesbad jehj pi sha'i ehbeni g kownal chehanig k e'esto g Mosesbad waik mashath amjed mat mahsi neithch mo s-ap ulini d ali.
58011024	Kownal alithag atsh an hahawa bei g Mosesbad k hab a'aga mo d madaj. K wabshaba g Mosesbad ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ch pi hohho'ith am i ge'ehogatk mat hab wo e a'agath mo d madaj hegai mo pi d Jiosh hemajkamga.
58011025	Ba'ich i mat ab wo nako g sho'igthag ha wehm g Jiosh hemajkamga ki hegai mat am he'es wo si s-hehgigk ha wehm hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh.
58011026	Am ash a'amichuth mat wo e sho'igch wehhejed g Jiosh si Kehsha. K wabshaba ith ba'ich d i si ha'ichu am wehhejed ki g Egypt jewed s-kaisthag no pi am wa s-chegitog mash haschu si s-kehg ha'ichu ab ha makiog g Jiosh g e-hemajkamga.
58011027	Kutsh heg hekaj pi sha'i ehbeni g kownal k am thagito g Egypt jewed. Heg o wa wepo mo ab neith g pi ta neithagam Jiosh nash pi ab nakog g sho'igthag am wehhejed.
58011028	Jiosh ash am ahgith g Mosesbad mat wo ha cheha g hemajkam mat wo ha koktha g kahwal mahmad k ab wui wo iagchul g ha-eh'ed ab e-pupualit ab. Tsh hab pi wo ha koktha g anghil g wehpeg cheoj ha-a'aliga. Tsh g Mosesbad ab i s-wohochuth k hab masma ha cheha g hemajkam.
58011029	Kush g Jiosh hab ha ahg g Tutuligo mat am gahi wo i huhud S-wegi Kahchki oithch. Kutsh ab i s-wohochuth k hab e juh. Kutsh am i tahp g shuhthagi. Tsh am wabsh s-gaki jewed oithk hihi. Tsh g Egypt t am shonthal am chum ha oithk heb e juh. Tsh ha ma'ish g shuhthagi k wehs ha koktha.
58011030	Neh, an ash wa uhgk hohothai kolhaidag g Jerico kihhim. Kutsh wa g Jiosh hab ha ah g t-shohshon matsh an wo e himtchul. Tsh ab i s-wohochuth k hab e juh. Tsh hekaj i shul g Jiosh hegai kolhai.
58011031	Tsh am i wahp k wehs ha koktha hegam mo pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh. Tsh wabshaba hema ab s-wohoch g Jiosh, chum as d chehpa'awi, k wa ha tho'ibia hegam Tutuligo mash wa am s-a'agi chechga g jewed. Kumtsh heg hekaj pi mua mamt hekith ha gewito.
58011032	Pi ant wo ni-nako manis wehs in wo o'oha ab ha amjed hegam kekelibad mash hab chechgig Gideon ch Barak ch Samson ch Jephtha ch David ch Samuel ch mu'i ehp g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.
58011033	Jiosh ash wa hab ha ahg matsh haschu hab wo juh. Kutsh ab i s-wohochuth k hab e juh. Ha'ijj atsh g nahnko mahs jejewed ha gewito k hab wua g s-ap'ekam. Tsh g Jiosh ab ha mah mash haschu ha ahgith mat ab wo ha mah. Ha'i atsh wa e tho'ibia ab ha amjed g maipith
58011034	ch ab amjed mam chum s-ha kokthaimk g meikaj ch is-pahyokaj. Tho wabsh o'othham ch eda ab bei g ge'e gewkthag k am s-chechojim ha gewito g e-obga ab a'ai jejewed amjed.
58011035	Jiosh atsh wa ab uhpam i ha chegitoich g ha-ko'ithag ha'i u'uwi mo ab s-wohochuth. Ha'i atsh wa wabsh s-ap e taht k e ko'ij pi thagitoimk g e-wohochuthadag no pi s-mahch mat g Jiosh ba'ich i s-kehg thoakag ab wo ha mah.
58011036	Ha'ijj amsh wa s-ko'okam has ha ahg ch ha gewittan k ha'i ha wupulsh k gd hu si ha kuh.
58011037	Ha'ijj amtsh wa ha ma'ichshulig k ha'ijj an ha eda si ha hikuch k ha'ijj g is-pahyokaj am ha koktha. Mu'ijj ash sha'i si sho'ig ch wabsh g ha'ichu thoakam e'elithagkaj e e'enigadathch. Msh wa mu'i ha sho'igchuth ch pi ab hu ap ha neith.
58011038	Kumsh wa ha sho'igchuth no pi d si s-ap hemajkam. An o wabsh oiopo tohono jewed oithk ch ka'akwulk oithk ch am wabsh kih wahpag ch ed ch chehcho ch ed.
58011039	Ith o wehs d ha-ap'ethag am Jiosh wehhejed no pi ab s-wohochuth. T eda chum koi ab hu nei mo wa haschu ha ahgith g Jiosh mat hab wo ha juni.
58011040	Jiosh at hab masma ap'ech mat ab t-wehm wo bei g ba'ich i s-kehg ap'ethag.
58012001	Neh, ihtham mu'i hemajkam at e nako no pi ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh. K ith am t-chehgithch matt ahchim hab wa'ap masma wo t-nako. Mu'i o ha'ichu gd hu wabsh i chum t-wulshshap. Kutt hemho wa ab wo si i t-hawpkaj hab masma mat g e wopoichuththam. Hegam mo d e wopoichuththam at am s-gewkam wo wohp heg oithk mamt hebai wo i ha cheki. Kutt ahchim hab wa masma am s-gewkam wo i t-nako t-wohochuthadag ed.
58012002	Pegih, tt hig am wo i t-gewpkai Jesus wui. Heg at ab i t-mah g t-wohochuthadag k wo wa s-ap t-nahto heg eda. Pi at sha'i thagito g e-chikpan, chum as e muhkith ab kots t ab k ab nako g si edathag no pi ab behiog g s-ap tahhathkam. Tsh g Jiosh ab si has elith k an e wehm thahshch e-kownal thaikud ed.
58012003	Mu'i ha'ichu at ab nako g Jesus k ab ep nako g keh'ithadag ab ah amjed g pi ap hemajkam. Pegih, mt ahpim am hab wa'ap wo si e nakog k pi wo sha'i ha'asa.
58012004	Koi amt ha'ichu sha'i nako ab wui gegokch g pi ap'ekam.
58012005	Pi g am wo pi chegito mo ab si i em-gewkemhun g Jiosh ch hab masma ab em-wehm neok mam d a'aligaj mash wa hab kaij: Ni-a'aliga, s-gewkam ani em-shohbith heg hekaj pi ap em-chu'ichig nani pi si em-tatchua. Mt heg hekaj am wo si i oithahim k s-gewkam wo e nakogath.
58012007	Pegih, ab g wo nakogi g e-sho'igthag hab masma matp hems g em-ohg s-gewkam ha'ichukaj wo em-shohbi. Em-sho'igthag o am chehgithch mo g Jiosh hab masma hab em-juhkch mam d a'aligaj. Pi o woho d ha-alithag hegai mam pi ha'ichu i shohbith.
58012008	Jiosh at si s-ko'okam wo em-shohbithath. Kumt hekaj wo s-mahchk mam d a'aligaj.
58012009	Neh, em-jehj atp hems ab s-gewkam ha'ichu em-shohbi. Kum ab si has ha elith. Pegih, ba'ich o i matt ab wo i t-thagito t-ohg Jiosh wui k ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
58012010	T-jehj ith thahm jewed o he'es ab ha'ichukaj s-gewkam t-shohbithahim hab elithch mo s-ap'e. K wabshaba g Jiosh ab ha'ichukaj i t-shohbith mat hab wo t-juh matt d wo hekia s-ap'ekamk mo heg hab masma.
58012011	Pi o ta hohho'ithama mo hekith i s-gewkam t-shohbith g Jiosh. Ch wabshaba heg amjed bebhe g si s-ap'ekam thoakag ch hahawa si s-ap t-tahtk.
58012012	Mt hekaj ab wo si e gewpkai Jiosh wui k wo s-gegokim gegokiwua.
58012013	Am g hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam mamt am wo i gewpka e-himthag oithk. Kut am wo em-nei hegam mo pi gewpkthag k atp hems ab wo i gewpka.
58012014	Am g wo i e nakog k wehs s-ap ab wo ha neithath g hemajkam ch am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ha'ichu namt pi hab wa'i masma am wo i wahp Jiosh kihthag ed.
58012015	Am at wo i wah g bagatalig em-shahgith mamtp wo thagito g Jiosh hemajimatalig. Am g a'ai wo si e nuhkuthath mat pi hab wo e juh.
58012016	Am g wo s-e nen'oithath mamt pi wo e uamhu g pi ap'ekamkaj wabsh pehegchuthch g Jiosh ha'ichu hab masma matsh wa hab e juh hegai mash hab chehgig Esau. Ith ash d ge'echu ha-alithag. K heg hekaj ha'ichu d chum ap'ethaj. Kush wabshaba pi ab hu has sha'i elith ch gagda mat si hemho gegosig ab i nei heg amjed.
58012017	S-mahch am matsh am hahawa chum gawul juh g pi ap e-chegitoi k chum shoak. Tsh wabshaba g ohgaj am hahawa pi e nako mas ab wo mah g Jiosh ho'ige'ithalig.
58012018	S-e g wo nen'oithk no pi d si s-has ha'ichu ihtha Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mamt ab i kaiha. Neh, t-shohshonbad atsh ab wui hihi g Sinai Tho'ag matsh ab wo kaiha g Jiosh chehanig. Kush g mehi an thahm wuhshani hegai tho'ag. K an ha wehgaj g s-chuhugam an kahch ch g s-gewk hewel an med
58012019	ch g kuikud ab kaitha. K ab hema g neok. Tsh am i kah g hemajkam ihtha mash ab neok k ab si shoani ch ab ahgith g Mosesbad mo pi kaimk hegai ne'oki.
58012020	Jiosh ash ab ha chehani ch hab kaij: Pi amt ab hu wo i chehchsh ith ab tho'ag. Kumt hemho wa wo mua matp hedai am hab wo e juh, chum as d wabsh wo ha'ichu thoakamk. Kush ith s-ehbith g hemajkam.
58012021	Kush sha'i si s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu hab mahs. Sh g Mosesbad hab kaij: Ih, sha'ani wa'i si s-ehbith ch si gigiwuk.
58012022	Pegih, ch ahchim hemuch hab wa'ap kaiham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. K g Jiosh kihthag d si s-wohom t-kihthag ch d thahm kahchim ch ed Jerusalem kihhim. Bach a'aga amai mo am ha'ichug Sion Tho'ag. K ith heg wa wepo mach ahchim hab wa'ap ab wui t-gewpkathch g tho'ag hab masma mash wa g t-shohshon. Mu'i mihl anghil o an ha'ichug anai Jiosh kihthag ed.
58012023	Kutt ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga an wo i t-hemapath k an wo ha'ichugk ch wo si s-hehgigk. Heki o hu an o'ohadag g t-chechgig mach d a'aligaj g Jiosh. Kutt g si hemako alithaj wehm wo edgithath wehs ha'ichu. Jiosh o d si usagakam wehs hemajkam ha thahm. Kuch ab s-wohochuth. K heg wa wepo matt heki hu ab wui hihi. An o ha'ichug hegam mat heki hu koi am i e ap'echuthk Jiosh wui. Kutt am wo ha wehmajk.
58012024	Ab att i s-wohoch g Jesus nat pi heg am i ap'ech g wechij ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh t-wehhejed. E at iawua g Jesus eh'ed mat e muhkith k hab gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Ith o ba'ich i s-kehg d ha'ichu mo hegai matsh wa g Abelbad hab e juh.
58012025	Neh, nahnko masma o ab t-wui neok g Jiosh ithani. Kumt pi gm hu wabsh wo s-ohhoth g ne'okij. Hegam mash wa pi ab hu kaiham hegai mash am ha ahgith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ash wa pi e tho'ibia. Kutt ba'ich wo i bei g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mattp pi ab hu wo kaiha hegai mo ab neok thahm kahchim t amjed.
58012026	Ne'okij ash wa u'ugij g jewed ab Sinai Tho'ag amjed. K wabshaba ia'i ithani hab kaij: Am ant ep wo u'ugij pi heg wa'i jewed ch wabshaba g thahm kahchim ehp.
58012027	Neh, ith o hab d ahga mat g ha'ichu nahtoij wo e u'ugijith k im hu hab wo i e juh. Tsh heg an wo wa'i wih mat haschu pi ap wo e u'ugij.
58012028	Pegih, tt ab wo si i ho'ige'el g Jiosh mat ab i t-ui ith eda kownaltalig mat pi ha'ichu wo e nako mat wo u'ugij. Ab att hig wo si ihm g Jiosh am hohho'ithaj oithch ab has elithch ch ab ep s-wohog elith.
58012029	Jiosh atsh wehs wo hugio g pi ap'ekam hab masma mat g mehi wo hugio g s-mehithkam.
58013001	Neh, ab am a'ai e wui si pihk e elith hab masma mam d e-hajunim ab ihmch g Jesus Christ. Pegih, pi g wo sha'i thagito ihtha.
58013002	Nt ep wo em-ahgi mamt am wo i ha wahpki g sho'igkam e-kihki ed, chum ams pi ha mahch. Batsh wa e juh ha'i k hahawa chum nei moki d anghil.
58013003	Am g wo wa s-ha chegitok hegam mam gd hu si ha kuhpch hab sha masma mamtp hems ahpim am ha wehm kuhpi. Am g wo s-ha chegitok hegam mo e sho'igchuth hab sha masma mamtp hems ha wehm e sho'igchuth.
58013004	Ab amt wo si has elithath g hohnta ch wo si e nuhkuth a'ai e wehhejed. Jiosh at ab wo ha mah g s-ko'ok namkithadag hegam mat pi wo e nuhkuth ch hegam mat wo ha ehs g ha-wehm kihkam.
58013005	Pi g heg wa'i s-kaisthag ab wo tatchuath ch wabshaba wabsh wo s-ap e tahtkkath heg hekaj mam haschu i edgith. Jiosh ash hab kaij: Pi ant hekith wo sha'i em-thagito. Chum ant hekith wo em-wehmajk.
58013006	Pegih, tt ab hig wo si i t-gewpkath k hab wo chei: Jiosh o i ni-wehmaj. Kunt pi hekith ha'ichu wo sha'i ehbithath. Pi at hedai has wo ni-juh, heg hi wa mat g Jiosh wo hiwigi.
58013007	Am g wo s-chegitok g ha'ichu ha-ahga hegam mo wehpeg am ahgahim g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Am g wo i chegito mo has masma in d thothakamkahim ch has masma e ko'ij k am oithk hab wo i juh g ha-wohochuthadag.
58013008	Jesus Christ o am hab wabsh i masma ith i tashkaj mo wa gd hu i heki hu ch am hab wabsh wo i masmak chum hekith.
58013009	Kumt pi wo sha'i hiwigi mas g gawul mahs mashchama im hu hab wo i em-juh ab amjed g s-ap'ekam himthag. Ha'i o an u'ukch g heki hu t-himthag chehanig hab e elithch mat hab masma wo i gewkai g e-wohochuthadag. T wabshaba ith pi wo sha'i i ha wehmt. An att wo u'ukchith g Jiosh hemajimatalig. Bat wa masma wo i gewka g t-wohochuthadag.
58013010	Hegam mo an u'ukch g heki hu e-himthag chehanig o ge iagchulithakud. Pegih, ch ahchim hab wa'ap ge iagchulithakud. K d hegai kots mat g Jiosh si Kehsha ab ab e muhkith. T hegam mat hedai wabsh g chehanigkaj wo chum i e gahgithahi g e-tho'ibiathag pi wo sha'i bei ab amjed ihtha t-iagchulithakud.
58013011	Uhgchu pahl o am iagchulith g ha'ichu thoakam eh'ed am heg eda Si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kih mat heg hekaj im hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig g hemajkam. Kush g ha-chuhkug g ha'ichu thoakam gm hu jeg ed e memheith.
58013012	Pegih, t g Jesus heg hekaj gm hu jeg ed e muhkith k g e-eh'ed iawua mat im hu hab wo i juh g hemajkam pi ap ha-chu'ichig.
58013013	Ahchim o d t-edathag g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Kut eda heg ab moht am t-wehhejed. Pegih, tt wo si s-hehgigam a'agath mo d t-tho'ibiakam am i thagitok g heki hu t-himthag.
58013014	Pi ach ia hu d si kihkam ith thahm jewed. An ash hab chu'ig g s-kehg kihhim am t-wehhejed. Kuch heg wui am nenea.
58013015	Ab o t-ab matt chum hekith ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh. Ith o heg wa wepo mo d t-iagchulitha Jiosh wui. K g Jesus i t-wehmt mach hab wua. Chum att hekith ab wo ho'ige'ithath g Jiosh am chehchegch.
58013016	Pi g am ha'asa hab wo juhni g s-ap'ekam k ab wabsh a'ai wo i e wehmajk. K ith hab wa'ap heg wa wepo mo d t-iagchulitha. K g Jiosh s-hohho'ith.
58013017	Ab g wo s-ha wohog elithath g e-wanimedtham. Ihtham o chum hekith am nuhkuth g s-ap'ekam em-thothakag nat pi hemho wa am wo i ahgahi g e-chikpan am Jiosh wui. Kumt ab wo ha mah g s-ap tahhathkam ha-chikpan ed mamt ab wo ha wohog elithath. Pi at ha'ichu em-wehhejed wo s-kehgajk mamt ab wo ha mah g pi ap tahhathkam.
58013018	Am g wo wa tahnith g Jiosh mat wo i ni-wehmajkath. Bani wabsh s-junimk g s-ap'ekam ch pi sha'i ha'ichu hab wua manis hekaj ni-kudut.
58013019	Kumt heg hekaj ab wo i tai g Jiosh mant s-hohtam am wo i ni-thagito. Nt hab s-hohtam am uhpam wo i em-chehgim.
58013020	Ahni ani hab wa'ap ab ha'ichu tahni g Jiosh mat hab wo em-juni. S-mahch am mat g t-kownalig Jesus e muhkith mat wo i t-ap'ech Jiosh wehhejed. T g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig t amjed s-hohho'ithch mat has e juh. Kut g hab elithaj hahawa pi hekith gawul wo e juh. Jesus at chum hekith wo t-nuhkuthath.
58013021	Pegih, ni ab tahni g Jiosh mat ab wo em-mahkath mam haschu i tatchua mamt hekaj am hab wo junihith g tatchuij. Jesus o ab t-makiog g gewkthag. Kutt ab wo si has elithath chum hekith.
58013022	Neh, pi o sha'i chewaj ihtha ni-o'ohana. Kuni ab si em-ahgith ahpim ni-wehm wohochuththam mamt wabsh si s-ap e taht k wo kaiham k ab wo bei g i wehmtadag.
58013023	Am ant wo em-ahgi mamt i wuhshath g Timothy mamt wa gd hu si kuh. Kunt wo bek am i em-chehgimedk matp wo sha s-hohtam jiwia.
58013024	Am g wo ha ahgith g e-wanimedtham ch wehs g t-wehm wohochuththam mat ab wo i s-t-ho'ige'el. T-wepnag iia Italy t am o am hab wa'ap s-em-ho'ige'ith.
58013025	Jiosh at wo wa s-em-ho'ige'el.
59001001	Am ant wo i em-o'ohani ahni James mani d piongaj g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
59001002	Am g wabsh wo si s-ap e tahtkkath mat hekith ab wo em-a'ahe g sho'igthag.
59001003	Ith o a'appem g em-wohochuthadag ch wo i gewkai. Kumt hab s-ap wo nahtoisk ch s-ap wo nakogath g e-sho'igthag.
59001005	Ha'ijj amtp hems ha'ichu pi amichuth. Kuni am em-ahgith mamt ab wo tai g Jiosh g amichuthadag. T ab wo i em-mah. Jiosh o si s-ba'ama ab ha mamka g hemajkam mo haschu i tatchua ch pi ha keh'ith.
59001006	Mt wabshaba hemho wa wo s-wohochuthath mat hab wo em-juni g Jiosh mam haschu ab i tahni. Hegam mo pi wohochuth at wabsh ha'ichukaj wo e kudu hab sha masma mat g shuhthagi g hewelkaj wo e kudut k an a'ai has wo e wuath.
59001007	Ihtham at g Jiosh pi am hu hab wo ha juni mat haschu ab wo i tai
59001008	no pi pi am hu shelinim wawani g ha-wohochuthadag.
59001009	Chum achs hems ha'ijj d sho'igkam ch eda wo chum si s-ap t-tahtkkath nat pi t-tho'ibia g Jiosh.
59001010	Kut g s-kakais hab wa'ap wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath e tho'ibiak. Jiosh o am wehs t-wepo t-ha'ichuchuth. S-kakais at ha'as s-hohtam gm hu hab wo i e juh mat g sho'igkam.
59001011	T g si s-has ha'ichu hab ha-juni wo huhug hab sha masma mat g ha'ichu wuhshanig wo huhug mat hekith wo gaksh g jewed am s-toni k ed.
59001012	Tt wo si s-ap t-tahtkk matt hekith s-ap ab wo nako g t-sho'igthag. Ab o t-mahkch g Jiosh g wechij thoakag ahchim mach ab si tatchua ch am wo i t-wahpki e-kihthag ed matt hekith wehs wo gahi wuwha g t-a'appemadag.
59001013	Pi g hab wo sha'i cheh'i mas g Jiosh hab chum em-wua mamtp wo sha pi ap nako g e-a'appemadag k hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam. Jiosh o pi hekith hab wua g pi ap'ekam ch pi hedai hab chum ha wua mas hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam.
59001014	O'othham o wabsh hejel e-tatchuikaj hab wua g pi ap'ekam. T g Jiosh ab wo i ha mah g s-ko'ok namkithadag heg wehhejed.
59001016	Ha'i o chum ha iattogith ch hab chech'e mo g pi ap'ekam ab d Jiosh amjedkam. Pi g ab hu wo sha'i ha wohochuth, ahpim ni-wehm wohochuththam.
59001017	Jiosh at s-kehg nahto wehs ha'ichu. K wehs s-kehgaj hegai mo ab t-mahkch. Tash ch mashath ch huhu'u hebaichuj pi ab hu t-mahkch g tonlig no pi g jewed e nodgith. K wabshaba g Jiosh pi hekith gawul e wua ch chum hekith tonlithch g t-chegitoithag g wohokamkaj.
59001018	Jiosh at am i t-tashogi g wohokam. Kutt ab i s-wohoch. T hekaj ab i t-gawulkath k ab i t-mah g wechij thoakag matt d wo a'aligajk.
59001019	Pi g wo s-e hohtkith mamt ha'ichu hab wo chei. Ba'ich o i s-ap'e mamt wo ha'ichu kaihamath. Pi g am wabsh pehegi ha'ichukaj wo babgat.
59001020	Pi at hab masma wo i e ap'ech g pi em-ap'ethag. Jiosh at am wo wa'i ap'ech g pi t-ap'ethag.
59001021	Gam g hu hab wo i juhni wehs ha'ichu mo s-bihtagi am em-chegitoi ed ch am em-thoakag ed. Ab g wabsh wo i e sho'igchuth Jiosh wui k ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj. Kut heg hekaj wo em-tho'ibia.
59001022	Pi g am wo hejel e iattogithath mamt wabsh wo kaihamath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch eda pi am hu hab wo junihith.
59001023	Jiosh o'ohana o hab sha masma mo g neithakud matt heg eda ab wo i t-neith k wo cheh mo haschu pi kehg hab mahs am t-thoakag ed.
59001024	Pi g gm hu wabsh wo hihim pi am hu i chegitok mo has mahs g em-thoakag
59001025	k wabshaba am wo si oithahith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch am hab wo junihith. T g Jiosh ab wo si i s-em-ho'ige'ith k ab wo i em-wehmt wehs ha'ichu hab em-juni ed. Kut g ha'ichu ahgaj ab wo i em-wuwhas pi ap'ekam t amjed.
59001026	Hegam mo hedai hab kaij mo d Jiosh wohochuththam ch eda wo pi ap neneokath o wabsh hejel e iattogith. K g ha-himthag pi ha'ichu wehhejed s-kehgajk.
59001027	Bo d elithag g Jiosh mat g t-wohochuthadag ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk. Hemho wa att wo si t-nuhkuthath mat pi wo t-padch g jewed t ab ha'ichu. Kut hab ep wo t-juh g t-wohochuthadag matt ha'ichukaj wo i ha wehmajk hegam mo d hehe'ejel wihpkam u'uwi ch a'al. T hab pi wo e sho'igchuthath.
59002001	Ab am s-wohochuth g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Pegih, k pi hab chum chu'ig mams pi ab hu wo ha ha'ichuch g sho'igkam.
59002002	Pi o ap'e mamtp hema wo si s-ap thai g s-kais o'othham k eda hab wo ah g sho'igkam mat gm hu wabsh wo kehkkath o wo thahiwua jewedo.
59002004	Pi o ap'e g em-tatchui mamtp ha ba'ich ab wo i ha'ichuch g s-kais o'othham.
59002005	Jiosh ash ab ha makiog g sho'ig hemajkam g ge'e wohochuthadag mat am wo ap'ethagk kihthaj ed. Kutsh wehsijj ab wo i ha wahpki hegam mo ab tatchua.
59002006	M eda ha'i pi ab hu has ha elith g sho'igkam ch hegam wa'i s-kakais ab si has ha elith. Am g wo i oithahim mo ha'i g s-kakais em-sho'igchuth ch am i em-wahpkith chehanig ch ed
59002007	ch s-ko'okam has ahg hegai mach ab ihm mo d t-tho'ibiakam.
59002008	Am g hab wo junihith g Jiosh chehanig mo hab masma an o'ohanas: Ab amt wo si pihk e elithath wehs ha wui g hemajkam hab masma mam has i masma hejel e wehhejed si pihk e elith.
59002009	Mt wo melchkwuhith g Jiosh chehanig mamtp ab a'ai wo i ha ga'agwulkathath g hemajkam ab ha neithch mo has i mahs.
59002010	Kumt d wo pi ap chu'ijkamk am Jiosh chehanig ed mamtp chum hems al hemako chehanig wo melchkwua.
59002011	An o hab chu'ig mamt wo si e nuhkuth heg wa'i wehhejed hejel e-wehm kihkam ch an hab ep chu'ig mamt pi wo mua g hemajkam. Kumtp hems s-ap wo e nuhkuth g e-wehm kihkam wehhejed k wabshaba d wo pi ap chu'ijkamk mamtp wo hema mua.
59002012	T wabshaba g Jiosh gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig mat wo t-tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mat hekith wo t-lothai. Pegih, tt hemho wa hab masma hab wo t-junihith ch hab wo kaijjith mach d t-tho'ibiakam ch ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'ithath g hemajkam. Pi at ab hu wo i ha ho'ige'el g Jiosh hegam mat pi ab hu wo ha ho'ige'ithath g hemajkam.
59002014	Pi o woho d Jiosh wohochuththam hegam mat pi hab wo junihith g tatchuij. Kut pi wo ha tho'ibia. Ha'ichu hab t-juni at wo t-wohokamch machs d wohochuththam.
59002015	Neh, matp hems ha'i g t-wehm wohochuththam d wo sho'igkamk ch wo ha'ichu si tatchua.
59002016	Pi o ap'e machs pi am hu wo i ha wehmt k hab wabsh wo chei, “Jiosh at wo wa'i i em-wehmt.”
59002017	Pi ach woho wohochuth g Jiosh mattp pi am hu hab wo junihith g tatchuij.
59002018	Ha'ijj amki hab e elith mamt ab wabsh wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh ch eda pi am hu hab wo junihith g tatchuij. K eda hab chu'ig mat g ha'ichu hab t-juni wo tashogi g t-wohochuthadag.
59002019	Jijawul o hab wa'ap chum s-wohochuth mo an hema d Jiosh ch sha'i si s-ehbith ch eda pi am hu hab junihim g tatchuij ch hab masma e chehgithch mo pi d sha'i e tho'ibiakam.
59002020	K heg hekaj tasho mo pi woho wohochuth g Jiosh hegam matp hedai pi hab wo junihith g e-wohochuthadag. Am ant ha'ichu ep wo em-ahgi mant hekaj wo si tasho em-chehgi ihtha.
59002021	Ab ach d amjedkam hegai mash hab chehgig Abraham. Kush heg ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh. Tsh g Jiosh am cheha matsh ab wui wo iagchul g e-alithag mu'ak. Tsh g Abrahambad am woho hab chum juh k hekaj e chehgith mo ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ch d e tho'ibiakam. Tsh g Jiosh am hahawa pi hiwigi mas wo mua g e-alithag no pi wabsh a'appem g wohochuthadgaj.
59002022	Abrahambad at ab wehnath g ha'ichu hab e-juni g e-wohochuthadag. Wohochuthadgaj at s-ap i e nahto heg hekaj ha'ichu hab junij.
59002023	T hekaj am e wohokamch hegai mo an o'ohanas: Abraham at ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh. K heg hekaj hab kaij g Jiosh mo d e tho'ibiakam ch pi ha chu'ichig. Neh sh g Jiosh am hahawa hab masma ihm mo d nawojij.
59002024	Pegih, ith o am t-chehgithch mo pi d e tho'ibiakam hegam mat hab wabsh wo kaijjith mo d wohochuththam. Hemho wa att am hab wo junihith g t-wohochuthadag ch hab wa masma am wo t-chehgi mach d t-tho'ibiakam.
59002025	Am g wo s-chegitok mo haschu an o'ohanas ab amjed g Rahabbad. Heg atsh wa ha'i ha tho'ibia g t-shohshonbad mash eda g wehmaj o'othham s-ha kokthaimk. Ith at am wohokamch mo ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh. Kutsh g Jiosh tho'ibia.
59002026	Pegih, am ach t-chehgithch g ha'ichu hab t-junikaj mach haschu ab i s-wohochuth. K hegam mat pi am hu hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh.
59003001	Pi g am wabsh wo s-e hohtkithath mamt d wo ha mashchamthamk ch wo ha ahgithath g ha-chu'ichig. Jiosh at ba'ich i s-gewkam wo hudaw mach haschu has i junihim ahchim mach d ha mashchamtham natt pi chum ba'ich wo i s-mahchk mo haschu d s-ap'ekam.
59003002	S-ap at d wo o'othhamk ch s-ap wo nuhkuthath g e-thoakag hegam matp hedai s-ap wo nuhkuth g e-nehni mat pi wo pi ap neo.
59003003	Chum as si chumaj g t-nehni ch eda d si s-has ha'ichu hab masma mo g pilin. Pilin o d al chum ha'ichu. Kutt eda wo pilindath g kawyu k hekaj wo t-nako matt wo i nodagi mattp hebai wo i s-nodgitham.
59003004	Nt ep wo wepogi g wahlko nodgithakud matt hekaj wo i nodagi g ge'e wahlko, chum as has masma s-gewkam wo medath g hewel.
59003005	Nt ep wo wepogi g al chum chuhthagi mat mu'i wo mehi g u'us. Pegih, k am wa tasho matt hab wa'ap wo t-nako matt ge'e ha'ichu wo padch g t-ne'okikaj.
59003006	Pi kehg ne'oki o ab d Jiawul amjedkam. Kutt hekaj wo padch g t-chegitoi ch t-thoakag hab masma neneokch.
59003007	T wo e nako g hemajkam mat wabsh chum has mahs ha'ichu thoakam wo mahshoch nat pi ha mahshoch g jewed t ab ha'ichu oiopotham ch ha'ichu tha'atham ch wahammad ch waptopi.
59003008	T wabshaba pi hedai wo e nako mas wo hejel thotholimagi g e-nehni. Chum o hekith e nahtokch mat hab wo juh g pi ap ne'oki k hekaj wo padch g t-chegitoi.
59003009	Hebaichujj ach i thagitokch g t-nehni am Jiosh wui ch hekaj hehgchulith ch eda hebaichujj has ha ahg g hemajkam. K eda g hemajkam d Jiosh nahtoi. T e wepo masma chum ha nahto.
59003010	Ith o heg wa wepo mach has ahg g Jiosh mach eda chum hehgchulith.
59003011	Neh, no hig ab e wehm i tha'iwuni g s-kehg shuhthagi ch s-onk shuhthagi shon k amjed?
59003012	No ab i wushke g suhna uhdwis wa'ug ab? Pegih, k haschu ahgch ab em-amjed e wehm i wushke g hehgchulitha ab Jiosh wui ch has ahga ab hemajkam ha wui mo eda ihtham d Jiosh nahtoi?
59003013	Pi g hab wabsh wo cheh'i mam s-chu amichuth. Bag wo juhnith g s-ap'ekam ch hab masma wo e chehgi mam s-chu amichuth.
59003014	Pi g am wo ha iattogithath ch pi wo chum ge e haschuthath mo ab em-mahkch g Jiosh g amichuthadag mamtp wo s-ta ke'ithamak ch wo s-chu hehgamkk ch ep wo s-chu tha'ath.
59003015	Pi o ab hu d Jiosh amjedkam hegai s-ta ke'ithamadag ch s-chu hehgamthadag ch s-chu tha'amkam. T pi hab wo chum chu'igk hegam mo e tho'ibiakch. Tho wabsh jewed thahm ha'ichu ch ab d amjedkamaj g Jiawul hegai hab mahs ha'ichu.
59003016	Mu'i o ha'ichu pi ap'e mo hebai hab chu'ig g s-chu hehgamthadag ch s-chu tha'amkam. Wehs nahnko mahs pi ap'ekam o am hab chu'ig.
59003017	Kuch wabshaba ahchim mach u'ukch g amichuthadag ab Jiosh t amjed d hekia s-ap'ekam ch s-thotholima ch ab ha o'othhamchuth g hemajkam ch s-ha ho'ige'ith ch ha wehm s-hemajim neneok ch pi ha iattogith.
59003018	Am g wo ha thotholimachuth g hemajkam. Kut g Jiosh am wo i ha ap'ech mat am hahawa hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.
59004001	Ha'ijj amsh am a'ai e kam'on ch e cheggia mam eda d chum e tho'ibiakam. Nt wo em-ahgi mam hab masma hab e wua nam pi ha'ichu s-behimk mo pi ab hu d em-wuikam
59004002	ch wo ha cheggia k wo ha mua mamt wo bei. K eda g Jiosh ab chum em-makiog mam haschu i tatchua. Ab g wabsh wo tahni. T wo em-mah. Pi am edgith nam pi pi ab hu tahni.
59004003	T wabshaba g Jiosh pi ab hu wo em-mah mam haschu i tahni matp g em-tatchui pi wo ap'ek.
59004004	Ha'ijj am tatchua g pi ap'ekam ch hekaj d obgaj g Jiosh.
59004005	K wabshaba an hab chu'ig Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed mash g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wui kehk g pi ap t-tatchui.
59004006	Bo wa masma ab t-makiog g Jiosh g gewkthag matt pi hab wo junihith g hejel t-tatchui. Bo chu'ig g o'ohanaj: Jiosh o si s-ha ho'ige'ith hegam mo e sho'igchuth ch wabshaba ab ha wui kehk hegam mo si e hahaschuth.
59004007	Mt heg hekaj ab wo i e thagito Jiosh wui k ab wui wo gegokkath g ge Jiawul mamt pi hab wo junihith g tatchuij. T g Jiawul s-hohtam wo i e mehkoth ab em-amjed.
59004008	Ab g wo i miabith g Jiosh. Kut ab aigo epai wo i em-miabi. Am g wabsh wo thagito g pi ap ha'ichu hab e-juni ahpim mam ge gohkpa chegito mamtp woho wo s-kaim g Jiosh. T g Jiosh wo i ap'ech g em-thoakag.
59004009	Am g wabsh wo si pi ap e tahtk k wo iawua g e-oh'og heg hekaj pi ap ha'ichu hab e-juni ch pi wabsh wo hehemath ch pi wo s-e tahhathchuthath heg hekaj.
59004010	Ab g wo i e sho'igchuth wui g Jiosh. T heg ab wo si em-ha'ichuch.
59004011	Pi g am wo a'ai has e ahgath, ahpim ni-wehm wohochuththam. Hegam mat hab wo e junihith o ab wui gegok hegai chehanig mo hab chu'ig matt ab a'ai wo si pihk t-elithath. Heg o wa wepo mo hudawk mas s-ap'e g Jiosh chehanig. K eda hab chum mahs matt hab wabsh wo junihith.
59004012	Heg at wo wa'i t-lothai mo hedai t-mahkch g chehanig. Ab o hejel ab g Jiosh mas wo t-tho'ibia o im hu hab wo i t-juh ab e amjed. K heg hekaj pi ab hu em-ab mams am wo has ha ahgath. Ab g wabsh wo thagito g lothaita Jiosh wui.
59004013	Ab g wo i ni-kaiham ahpim mam ab si e hiwig ha'ichu k ab. Tp hems hema hab wo chei mat hemu s-hohtam wo chihpia am hema kihhim wui k am wo kihkath ahith ab mat wo ha'ichu chikpan k mu'i wo nahto g lial.
59004014	Kum eda pi mahch mas haschu has wo e juh ba'ich tash. An amt al he'es wo i e neith k an wabsh wo i huhug hab sha masma mo g kuhbs.
59004015	Bamt wo chum chei, “Matp d wo Jiosh tatchuik, kutt hab wo juh ha'ichu.”
59004016	M eda am ge e hahaschuth mamt haschu hab wo juh. Pi o ap'e mams hab masma wo ge hahaschuthath.
59004017	Kut d wo pi ap chu'ijkamk matp hedai pi am hu hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam mo eda s-mahch mat has wo chum e juh.
59005001	Ab g wo kaiham mant haschu wo o'oha mamtp hedai s-e kakaischuth hab wuathch g pi ap'ekam. Bamki chum e elith mamt ge'e ha'ichu wo edgithath kekeltk. T wabshaba g em-kaisthag wabsh wo huhug. Kumt wo shoanith ch ab wo ai g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.
59005004	Em-kaisthag o si ge'ej ch wohokamchuth mam pi ap ha namkith g e-pionag. Hegam o d wabsh sho'igkam ch am em-ahgith g pi e-ap'ethag ch shoani. M wabshaba pi ab hu ha kaiham ch chum hems ab ha'ichu ha abchuth ch ha koktha. K ihtham pi e nakog mas wo e tho'ibia. K wabshaba g Jiosh ab ha kaiham ch wo ha tho'ibia. Ahpim mam e kakaischuth ha sho'igchuthch am ab aihim g lothaita hab masma mat g wipsilo wo e gi'ichuth k ab wo ai mamt wo ha koktha.
59005007	Pegih neh, ahpim ni-wehm wohochuththam, am g wabsh wo s-e tahtk ch nenida mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Am g wo neith mo has masma nenida g eshtham g juhki mat wo i wuhsh g eshaj.
59005008	Mt hab wa'ap s-e tahtkk ch wo nenidath ch am wo si e gewkemhu no pi e aihim mat ep wo jiwia g ge'echu t-kownalig.
59005009	E o nahtokch mat hab wo juh g lothaita. Pi g hedai has wo ahgath. Kut hab wa masma pi hedai has wo em-ahgath.
59005010	Am g wo i ha chegito g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Hegam ash wa s-e tahtk ch nakog g e-sho'igthag. Kumt am ha oithk hab wo chum masmak
59005011	nam pi s-mahch mo g Jiosh ab ha mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam. Hegai kelibad mash hab chehgig Job ash hab wa'ap s-e tahtk ch nakog g e-sho'igthag. Tsh g Jiosh am hahawa wehhejed ge'e ha'ichu i ap'ech. Ith o am t-chehgithch mo si s-t-ho'ige'ith ch si pihk e elith t-hekaj.
59005012	Am g hab wabsh wo juhni mamt haschu hedai wo i ha ahgi mamt hab wo juh. Pi o ap'e mams wabsh chum hekith wo i gewkathch g e-ne'oki am chehchegch g Jiosh. Jiosh at wo em-lothai mamtp hab wo e juh.
59005013	Nam am hu ha'i ha'ichukaj i e kudut? Pegih, e g wo ho'ige'ithahun. Nam ha'i s-hehgig? Pegih, ab g wo si hehgchulith g Jiosh g nen'eikaj.
59005014	Nam am hu ha'i kok'o? Bo chum mahs mamt ab wo i ha wai hegam mo am d ge'eged em-shahgith. T hegam ab wo em-huhu g e ko'atham a-saithihkaj k wo e ho'ige'ithahu em-wehhejed
59005015	s-wohochuthch mat g Jiosh wo em-thoaj. Kut woho hab wo e juh. Mamtp g pi ap e-chu'ichigkaj kok'o, t g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g em-chu'ichig.
59005016	Kumt heg hekaj ab a'ai wo e ahgi g pi ap e-chu'ichig k wo e ho'ige'ithahu a'ai e wehhejed. T wo em-thoaj g Jiosh. Mu'i at ha'ichu hab wo ha juni g Jiosh hegam mat ab wo tahnith ch d wo s-ap'ekam o'othhamk.
59005017	Heg at hekaj hab e juh mash haschu g Elijabad ab tahni g Jiosh. Heg ash d wabsh o'othham ch ab si tai g Jiosh mat hab wo juh mat pi wo ha juhkath. Kush wa woho pi ha juhk gi'ik a'ahith ab.
59005018	Kutsh ab hahawa tai g Jiosh mat wo juh. Kutsh hahawa juh. Tsh ab i wuhsh g ha'ichu bahithag ab amjed g jewed kahchim.
59005019	Neh, tp hems hema wo heb hu hih g em-wehm wohochuththam ab amjed g wohokam. Kumt am uhpam wo i nodagi ab amjed g pi ap'ekam. T g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap chu'ichigaj k wo tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok namkithadgaj.
60001001	Ni-wepnag: Am ant ha'ichu wo i em-o'ohani ahni Peter mani d kehshaj g Jesus Christ. Heg at am i ni-kei mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed. Kuni ha'ichu s-em-ahgithamk ahpim mam am a'ai kih Pontus ch Galasia ch Cappadocia ch Asia ch Bithynia jejewed ch ed hab masma mo g ni-wehm Tutuligo.
60001002	Jiosh at ab i em-gawulkai mamt d wo hemajkamgajk k ab em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wo em-wehmajk ch am wo i kegch g em-thothakag. Mt hekaj ab wo s-wohog elithath g Jesus Christ ab i s-wohochuthk mat iawua g e-eh'ed k e muhkith em-wehhejed. Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
60001003	Ab att hig wo si i ho'ige'el g Jiosh heg hekaj t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Heg ohg Jiosh at ab i wuhshath muhkig t amjed. K ith am t-chehgithch mat hab wa'ap ab wo i t-wuwhas muhkig t amjed. Tt heg hekaj ab i s-wohochuth k ab bei g wechij thoakag.
60001004	Jiosh o an nahtokch g si s-kehg kihthag am t-wehhejed an thahm kahchim ch ed. T ihtha ap'echuthaj chum hekith d wo hekiakamk ch pi hekith wo e padch.
60001005	Ab ach s-wohochuth g Jesus Christ. K heg hekaj t-nuhkuth g Jiosh g si ge'e e-gewkthagkaj. Kuch ab nenida mat s-ap wo maskogi g t-tho'ibiathag mat hekith wo huhug ihtha jewed.
60001006	Si g wo s-hehgigk mamt wo e tho'ibia, chum ams hems ab wo nakogath g nahnko mahs sho'igchuthadag ch pi ap tahhathkam hemu.
60001007	Ihtha em-sho'igchuthadag at wo a'appe g em-wohochuthadag k wo chehgi mo d wohokam hab masma mat g ohla g meikaj wo e a'appe mas d wohokam. Ia atsh ep wo i e chehgi Jesus Christ. T g Jiosh am haha wo chehgi mo ab si has em-elith.
60001008	Pi am hi wa chum neith ch wabshaba ab si tatchua ch ab ep si s-wohochuth. K ith hekaj si ge'ej g s-em-hehgig. Kumt pi wo sha'i e nako mams wehs s-ap wo ah.
60001009	Jiosh at em-tho'ibia namt pi ab i s-wohoch g Jesus Christ.
60001010	Hegam mash d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam oki wa an o'ohan matsh an wo em-ai ihtha tho'ibiathag ha'ichu ahga ch eda an ep chum hoanahim g e-o'ohana ch an chum mamche
60001011	mas hekith wo i k ch has masma hab wo e juh. Christ atsh ab ha mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Sh heg am ha tashogith matsh gm hu si ha ba'ich hab wo e juh matsh wo e sho'igch g Christ k haha wo bei g ab si has elithadag.
60001012	S-mahch ash mat pi wabsh hejel e wehhejed o'oha hegai mash am ha wui i e tashogith. Hemu at hab e juh hegai matsh wa an o'oha. K ahpim d em-wehhejedkam mamt wo kah. Jiosh chuhchai ash am em-ahgith ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab ha mahkch g gewkthag mat an wo ahgahith. Ihtha wohokam o sha'i si s-ta kakaima chum hems g anghil ha wehhejed.
60001013	Am g wo i e nakog k ab wo si i e nenenashanichuth k ab wo si i e gewpkai heg ab ho'ige'ithadag mat g Jiosh wo em-mah mat hekith ep wo jiwia g Jesus Christ.
60001014	Ab g wo s-wohog elithath g Jiosh ch pi wo sha'i e hiwigi mams gd hu uhpam wo shul heg eda pi ap'ekam mam wa ab tatchua mam eda pi mahch g Jiosh.
60001015	Jiosh at ab i t-wai matt d wo hemajkamgajk. Kutt heg hekaj d wo chum si hekia s-ap'ekamk hab masma mo g Jiosh.
60001016	An o o'ohanas Jiosh o'ohana ed mo hab kaij: Hemho wa amt d wo hekia s-ap'ekamk nani pi ahni d hekia s-ap'ekam.
60001017	Bam masma ihm g Jiosh ab e ho'ige'ithahunch wui mo d em-ohg. Kut heg wehs wo ha a'appe. Pegih, mt ab wo si has elithath chum hekith mamt he'es i tash ia d wo thothakamk.
60001018	Heki o hu hab elithas mat wo em-tho'ibia g heki hu em-himthag. Em-shohshonbad ash wa chum em-mashcham mamtsh ha'ichu ab wo namkith g Jiosh k hekaj am wo i e ap'ech nenaj ed. Kumtp hems chum namkith g plahtha o g ohla o wabsh chum haschu. K wabshaba ihtha hab mahs ha'ichu d wabsh pi ha'ichu am Jiosh tahgio. Kum am hahawa s-mahch mat g Jiosh ba'ich i s-namkig ha'ichukaj em-tho'ibia.
60001019	Am o t-tashogith g Jiosh mat has masma wo t-tho'ibia am t-chehanich mattsh wo mua g si s-kehg kahwal k ab wui wo iagchul. Pegih, k g Jesus Christ d si hekia s-ap'ekam ch hab sha masma e muhkith am t-wehhejed mat wo t-tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mach d pi ap chu'ijkam.
60001020	Jiosh at am i kei mat eda koi in hu nahto g jewed k hemuch hahawa in i maskogi jewed thahm mat wo t-tho'ibia
60001021	k ab i wuhshath am i thahm mat e muhkith k ab uhgk i be k ab thai e-hugith an k ab si has elith. Kumt heg hekaj ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh k ab si hiwig.
60001022	Jiosh at ab i hekiagi g em-thoakag namt pi ab s-wohog el g wohokam ab amjed. Pegih, ab g a'ai wo e tatchuath wehs e-ihbthagkaj.
60001023	Pi at hekith wo huhug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kutt ab i s-wohochuth k hekaj ab bei g wechij thoakag. T ith hab wa'ap pi hekith wo huhug, chum as g t-chuhkug wo huhug.
60001024	Neh, an o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Hemho wa at wehsijj wo koi g o'othham hab masma mat g washai wo gaksh. T g ha-gewkthag wehs wo huhug hab masma mat g ha'ichu heosig.
60001025	T wabshaba g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga pi hekith wo ha huhug. Neh, bo chu'ig. K d hegai ha'ichu ahgaj mat am em-wui e u'apa.
60002001	Gam g hu hab wo i juhni g s-padhog elithadag ch iattogitha ch hehgamthadag ch has ahgadag.
60002002	Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o d s-kehg gegosig g em-thoakag wehhejed. Ab at em-wui chehgi g e-ho'ige'ithadag. Kumt ab wo si tatchuath hab masma mo g s-moik ali tatchua g wihbi ch hekaj wo i ge'elhith am e-tho'ibiathag ed.
60002004	Ab g wehs wo i e thagito t-kownalig Jesus wui. Ha'i o chum s-ohhothamk g hemajkam. T wabshaba g Jiosh am i kei mat d wo t-shonk am t-wohochuthadag ed.
60002005	Kumt ab wo abkath hab sha masma mat g hohothai ab wo abkath g e-shon am ha-kihta ed. Heg o wa wepo mach ab ab kihtas g Jesus ch d ge'e cheopi no pi am hahawa t-eda g Jiosh. Jiosh at wehs am i t-chuhcha ahchim Jesus wohochuththam matt d wo hekiakam papalk ch ab wui wo t-ho'ige'ithahunath ch am hab wo junihith g tatchuij. T ith heg wo wa wepok mo g s-ap iagchulitha no pi g Jiosh s-hohho'ith.
60002006	Ith ani hab kaij no pi an o'ohanas mo g Jiosh hab kaij: Am ant wo hema i kei mat d wo ha-shondagk g ni-hemajkamga. T hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch pi hekith heg hekaj wo si e elithath.
60002007	Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh. K ihtha kehshaj woho d si t-tatchui ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth. T wabshaba hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth wabsh s-ohhoth. Ith o hab ahgch an o'ohanas mo g Jiosh hab kaij: Ni-kehsha at d wo ha-shondagk g ni-hemajkamga, chum as g ha-wanimedtham wo chum s-ohhoth.
60002008	K an ep o'ohanas: Hemajkam at ab ab wo keiko hegai mat d wo chum ha-shondagk. Ith o hab d ahga mat mu'ijj pi ab hu wo wohoch g Jiosh ne'oki k pi wo mahchk g kehshaj. K d Jiosh tatchui mat ihtham pi wo e tho'ibia.
60002009	Kum eda ahpim ab s-wohochuth ch d Jiosh hemajkamga ch wehs d papal am wehhejed g t-kownalig Jesus. Jiosh at am i em-chuhcha mamt wo i ahgahi g s-kehg ha'ichu tatchuij. Ab at i em-wuwhas s-chuhugam k amjed k ab i em-wahpki si s-kehg tonlig ch ed no p i ab em-mahkch g amichuthadag.
60002010	Heki am hu pi d ha'ichu ch wabshaba hemuch d hahawa Jiosh hemajkamga ch ab hahawa u'ukch g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag.
60002011	Pegih, ni-wepnag, pi am ia hu d si kihkam jewed thahm. Chum o hems g hejel em-tatchui cheggia g em-tho'ibiathag. Kunt wo si em-ahgi mamt pi ab hu wui wo i e thagito
60002012	k wabshaba hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. T hab wo nei g s-ap ha'ichu hab em-juni hegam matp hedai ab ha'ichu em-abchuth. T ab wo i e ai g ge'e lothaita tash. T ihtham hemho wa wo wohokamch mat g Jiosh si s-kehg ha'ichu hab juh am em-thoakag ed.
60002013	Ab g wo s-wohog elithath g kownal ch wehs hegam mo d kownal chuhchai. Ihtham o chum s-ko'okam ha namkith g pi ap chu'ijkam ch ab i ha gewkemhun g s-ap chu'ijkam.
60002015	K d Jiosh tatchui mamt ab wo s-ha wohog elithath ch hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. T hab pi wo e nako mas has wo em-ah hegam matp hems nahnko em-ahg.
60002016	Ab at i em-wuwhas g Jiosh heki hu em-himthag amjed. Mt hab masma am hab wo e junihith mam d e tho'ibiakam ch d si piongaj g Jiosh ch wabshaba pi wo hekaj g e-ap'ethag mams am hu hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam.
60002017	Ab g wo ihmath g Jiosh ch ab wo si has ha elithath g kokownal ch s-ap ab wo ha neithath g hemajkam ch ab wo si pihk e elithath ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuththam.
60002018	Ahpim pion, ab g wabsh wo i e thagitokchith e-a'amo ha wui ch ab wo has ha elithath, chum as ha'ijj wo s-ta kek'eithamak.
60002019	Kut g Jiosh ab wo s-em-ho'ige'ithath. S-ap'e o mamt s-ap wo nako g sho'igchuthadag s-chegitokch g Jiosh.
60002020	Ab o d t-wuikam g s-ko'ok namkithadag mattp hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam. Ttp wabshaba s-ap wo nako g sho'igthag am hab chum junihithch g s-ap'ekam, t g Jiosh ab wo wa s-t-ho'ige'el ith hekaj
60002021	no pi hab d elithaj matt s-ap ab wo nako. Ith o wa am t-chehgithch g Christ mo wa eda s-ap ab nakog g sho'igthag am t-wehhejed.
60002022	Neh, pi at hekith hab juh g pi ap'ekam k pi hekith sha'i ha'ichu ha iattogith.
60002023	Ab amt wa si s-ko'okam has ah. T wabshaba pi ab hu aigo has ha ah. Si amt sho'igch. T wabshaba pi ha ebkioth k ab wabsh i e thagitokch Jiosh wui s-mahchch mo heg d si s-ap'ekam usagakam.
60002024	Christ at wehs moht g t-chu'ichig k heg hekaj ab e muhkith kots t ab mat wo t-tho'ibia. Kutt hab wo thagito g pi ap'ekam k am wo i hihi s-ap'ekam oithk. Sho'igchuthadaj at thoaj g t-thoakag.
60002025	Thach wa heb hu hihimkam hab sha masma mat g kahwal wo heb hu hih. T g Christ ab uhpam i t-ui e wui k s-ap nuhkuth g t-thoakag hab sha masma mat g kahwal ha nuhkuththam hab wo juh g heb hu himkam kahwal.
60003001	Ahpim u'uwi amt ab wo e thagitokch hehe'ejel e-kuhkun ha wui k ch s-ap wo ha nuhkuthath chum hems hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh. Tp hems ab wo i s-wohoch
60003002	am neithch g s-ap ha'ichu hab em-juni, chum ams hems pi has wo kaijjith ab amjed g e-wohochuthadag.
60003003	S-ap amt ulinim d wo u'uwik ch wabshaba heg pi ab hu wo hiwgath mams ab wo si has masma e ap'ech. Pi at wo em-ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio mamt has masma wo ap'ech g e-mo'o o an hab wo juh g si s-namkig a'anilo ch sisishpakud ch eniga.
60003004	Ba'ich i mamt wo s-hemajimak ch wo s-thotholimak. T hab wo s-ap'ek g em-thoakag am Jiosh tahgio.
60003005	Bo wa masma hab chu'ig g Jiosh wohochuththam u'uwi ga hu i wehpeg ch ab i e thagitokch hehe'ejel e-kuhkun ha wui.
60003006	Sarabad o wa hab chu'ig ch ab s-wohog elith g Abrahambad mo heg d ha-wanimedtham am ha-kihthag ed. Kumt ahpim Jiosh wohochuththam u'uwi am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch pi ha'ichukaj wo e kudutath. T heg wo wa wepok mam d Sarabad amjedkam.
60003007	Ahpim chechoj amt ab wo has ha elithath g e-hohonig nam pi s-mahch mo pi am hu hugkam s-gewkthag mam ahpim. Bamt masma s-ap wo e ho'ige'ithahunath g e-hohonig ha wehm. T g Jiosh ab wo em-kaihamath. Am g wo s-chegitok mam e wehm u'ukch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag no pi g Jiosh ab em-mahkch.
60003008	Wehsijj amt ab wo i e hemakochuth k ab a'ai wo si i e tatchuath ch wo s-e ho'ige'ithath ch ab wo i e sho'igch a'ai e wui.
60003009	Pi g am wo e agwua g pi ap'ekamkaj k pi ab hu wo i nodagi g pi kehg ne'oki. Ab o t-ab matt ab wabsh wo i s-ha ho'ige'el. T g Jiosh ab epai wo i s-t-ho'ige'el nat pi heg hekaj ab i t-wai.
60003010	An o hab chu'ig Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed: Pi g am wo pad neneokath ch pi ha'ichu wo ha iattogithath mamtp wo tatchuath mamt s-ap e tahtk ch in d wo thothakamk ch wo s-hehgigk.
60003011	Hemho wa amt wo s-ohhoth g pi ap'ekam k am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch am wo i e nako mamt wo s-ap e tahtkkath ab wehs ha wui.
60003012	T g Jiosh wo em-nuhkuthath ch ab wo kaihamath g em-ho'ige'ithahuna. Mtp wabshaba hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam, t g Jiosh ab em-wui wo kehkkath. Neh, bo wa masma an o'ohadag.
60003013	K pi hab chum mahs mas hedai wo s-ko'okam em-juh mamt am wo si e nakogath mamt am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.
60003014	Tp hab wo mahsk mamt wo e sho'igch am hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam, mt wabsh wo s-ap e tahtkkath nat pi g Jiosh ab wo wa s-em-ho'ige'el heg hekaj. Pi g wo sha'i ha ehbithath hegam mat wo em-sho'igchuthath.
60003015	Ab g wo has elithath g t-kownalig Jesus Christ ch chum hekith wo e nahtokchith mamt s-ap wo ahgi mat hedai ab wo i em-kakke mam haschu wui ab e gewpkathch.
60003016	Kumt wabsh si s-ap e taht k wabsh s-hemajim ab wo ha ahgi. Ha'i atp hems pi ap has wo em-ahg k ab wo chum em-abch g pi ap'ekam k wabshaba wo si e el mamtp chum hekith am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.
60003017	S-ap'e o matt wo t-sho'igch am hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam matp d wo Jiosh tatchuik. K wabshaba d si edathag mattp am hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ch hekaj wo t-sho'igch.
60003018	Jesus Christ o d hekia s-ap'ekam ch wa eda e sho'igch. Pegih, tt ahchim hab wa'ap wo t-sho'igch. E at muhkith g Jesus Christ am t-wehhejed ahchim mach d pi ap chu'ijkam mat am wo i t-ui Jiosh wui. Chuhkugaj amt hi wa chum mua. T wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ba'ich i mah g gewkthag.
60003019	Ith gahi wuhshanim Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o wa g Jesus Christ am ha mihshmath hegam mo hemu d ko'i ch gm hu si kuhpi.
60003020	Jiosh ash wa si s-hemajim ab ha nenida g hemajkam mash eda g Noahbad ab s-wohog elith ch nahtohim g ge'e wahlko. Tsh wabshaba g hemajkam pi ab hu wohog el. Tsh hab ha wi'in. Tsh hegam wa'i Noahbad e tho'ibia am i wahpk wahlko ch ed matsh am i ha wi'in. Sh d gigi'ik hemajkam matsh e tho'ibia.
60003021	Ith ani wepogith g t-pahl wakonadag. Heg att hekaj am t-chehgi mach s-wohochuth mat g Jesus Christ s-ap gahi wuhsh g muhkig am t-wehhejed. Tt ahchim hab wa'ap s-ap wo gahi wuwha. Pi o hab d ahga g pahl wakonadag machs wabsh wako g t-chuhkug. Bo d ahga matt ab i t-thagito Jiosh wui nat pi gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Ch hahawa pi heg hekaj t-kudut.
60003022	Christ at gm hu hih thahm kahchim wui. Kush g Jiosh ab si has elith an e-hugith an thahshch e-kownal thaikud an. Kush g anghil ch nahnko mahs gewpkthag an thahm kahchim ch ed ab wecho.
60004001	E at sho'igch g Christ k hekaj am gewito g pi ap'ekam t-wehhejed. Kumt ith wo s-chegitok namt pi hab wa'ap wo e sho'igch mamt wo gewito g pi ap'ekam.
60004002	Hemho wa amt am wo e-thagitokchith Jiosh wui wehs e-thoakthag oitham ch pi g hejel e-tatchui hab wo junihith.
60004003	Tash amt am hihi pi ap'ekam ch ed mam ab jioshga ihtha jewed t ab ha'ichu ch nawkko'o ch wabsh e totontochuth ch ha wehm wo'iwup hegam mo pi d em-wehm kihkam.
60004004	Hemu at e ai mamt ha'asa hab juh hegai hab mahs pi ap'ekam. K g em-wehm o'othham hahawa pi em-amichuth ch ab si has em-ahg.
60004005	E o nahtokch g Jiosh mat wehs wo ha lothai g hemajkam, chum hems hegam mat heki hu koi. Kut wehs wo ah g pi ap e-chu'ichig hegam mat pi thagito.
60004006	E ash wa ahgahim g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga chum hems wa hegam ha wui mat ithani heki hu koi matp hems ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag k an haha wo wehmajk g Jiosh.
60004007	E o aihim mat wo huhug g jewed. Kumt wo si e nuhkuth ch wo si s-e tahtkkath ch hab s-ap wo e ho'ige'ithahunath.
60004008	Ith o d i si ha'ichu mamt ab wo si ha tatchua g e-wehm wohochuththam k hekaj wabsh wo pi chegito g pi ap ha-chu'ichig.
60004009	S-hohho'itham amt ab a'ai wo i e hiwgithath e-kihki ed.
60004010	Ab o t-mahkch g Jiosh g nahnko mahs mahchig ch ap'ethag. K hab d elithaj matt am a'ai wo i t-wehmtath ith hekaj t-ap'ethag.
60004011	Mamtp hedai wo ha mihshmath k heg wa'i Jiosh ha'ichu ahga wo ahgath. Mtp hedai ab wo mahksk mamt wo i ha wehmtath g hemajkam, mt am hab wo juh heg hekaj gewkthag mo g Jiosh ab em-mahkch. Bamt masma ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh am gahi wuhshanim g Jesus Christ. Neh, wehs o ab d t-wuikam matt ab wo wechokath ch ab wo hehgchulithath chum hekith.
60004012	Ni-tatchuithch ni-wepnag, pi g am wo has elithath mam ab nakog g sho'igthag.
60004013	Jesus Christ o wa heg ab nakog. Kumt wo si s-hehgigk mam hab wa'ap nakog am hab junihithch g chikpanaj. Ab o him g tash mat g gewkthaj wo i e maskogi. Kumt hahawa ba'ich wo i s-hehgigk.
60004014	Mtp hems s-ko'okam has wo em-ahgath nam pi ab si ihm g Christ. Kumt wabshaba wo si s-ap e tahtkkath no pi am em-wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
60004015	Pi g am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam. T wo em-ai g s-ko'ok em-namkithadag. Pi g wo ha mua'i. Pi g wo s-chu e'eskath. Pi g wo hudawogath hegai mo haschu pi ab hu em-him.
60004016	Mt ab wo si i ho'ige'el g Jiosh k pi has wo e el mamtp wo sha e sho'igch heg hekaj mam ab si ihm g Christ.
60004017	E at ai mat g Jiosh wo t-a'appe. Kutt chum hems ahchim Jiosh hemajkamga wo t-a'appe g sho'igchuthakaj. Pegih, t hemho wa ba'ich ab wo i nei g sho'igthag hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
60004018	Neh, bo chu'ig g heki hu o'ohanaj g Jiosh: S-hasigam at wo e tho'ibia hegam mo hab elithas mo d s-ap'ekam. T eda g Jiosh ba'ich i s-gewkam wo ha a'appe hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth.
60004019	Neh, Jiosh o d t-nahtokam ch woho hab wo juh hegai mo hab kaij mat hab wo juh. Kumt heg hekaj ab wui wo i e thagito, chum as hems wo hiwigi mamt wo e sho'igch am hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam.
60005001	Ahni ani wa g ni-wuhpuikaj neith mad wa mu'i e sho'igch g Jesus Christ. Jiosh o ab si has elith ch wehmaj ab si has t-elith ch ith am wo maskogi mat hekith ia ep wo jiwia g Christ jewed thahm. K ab ni-ab mant wo ahgahith ab amjed. Thani hema ha wanimedtham g Jiosh hemajkamga ch heg hekaj am i em-gewkemhun ahpim mam hab wa'ap d ha wanimedtham.
60005002	Am o ha'i em-nuhkuthachuth g Jiosh g hemajkam. Kumt wo si s-ap ha nuhkuthath hab masma mat g kahwal ha nuhkuththam hab wo ha juh g e-kahwaliga. S-mahch am mo pi ha shahthahim ch wabshaba s-ap ha wanimed. Kumt ahpim hab wa'ap wo ha wanimedath g hemajkam ch am wo ha chehgi g e-thoakagkaj mat has wo chum masmak. Pi o hab chum chu'ig mams ab wo ha'ichu si i ha chehanith. K pi hab chum chu'ig mams wo si tatchuath g e-namkithadag heg hekaj chikpan. Mt wo chum si tatchuath mamt si s-ap wo ha nuhkuthath.
60005004	T g Jesus Christ ab wo em-mah g pi ha huhugetham si has elithadag mat hekith ia ep wo jiwia jewed thahm no pi heg wehsijj d t-nuhkuththam.
60005005	Ab amt wo ha kaihamath g e-wanimedtham. Wehsijj amt wabsh wo i e sho'igchuthath. Neh, bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana: Jiosh at ab ha wui wo kekiwua hegam mo chum si e haschuth k wabshaba wo ha mah g ho'ige'ithalig hegam mat ab wo i e sho'igch.
60005006	Pegih, mt ab wabsh wo i e sho'igch Jiosh wui. Kut heg ab haha wo si em-ha'ichuch mat hekith am wo s-ap'et.
60005007	Ab g wehs wo i thagito g e-kudutadag Jiosh wui no pi ab si em-tatchua.
60005008	Si g wo s-e tahtkkath ch wehs ha'ichu wo si nenashanath. Jiawul o chum s-t-u'imk ch s-ko'okam s-t-junimk hab masma matp g mawith wo sha t-be k hab wa'ap wo s-ko'okam t-juh.
60005009	Wehsijj g em-wehm wohochuththam o ab nakog ihtha hab mahs sho'igthag. Kumt heg hekaj s-wihnam wo gegokkath e-wohochuthadag ed ch ab wui wo gegokkath g Jiawul.
60005010	Jiosh at ab i em-gawulkai mamt ab wo i s-wohoch g Jesus Christ k chum hekith wehmaj wo edgithath g si s-kehg ap'ethag. Kumt al ha'as wo i taht g sho'igthag. T g Jiosh ab wo em-mah g gewkthag k hab wo em-juh mamt wo ge'ege'ehogat k s-wihnam wo gegokkath.
60005011	Jiosh o d gewkthag chum hekith. Kutt chum hekith ab wo hehgchulithath.
60005012	Ia o ni-wehmaj g Silas ch am o'oha ihtha al ha'ichu ni-ahga k am wo i bei em-wui. Ab ani si hiwig g Silas am eda ihtha chikpan. Jiosh o si s-hemajim ab i em-wehmt. Kuni am i em-gewkemhun mamt pi hekith wo pi chegito g i wehmtadaj.
60005013	Ihtham t-wehm wohochuththam mo ia d kihkam Rome t am o s-em-ahgithamk mamt ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el. Ia o ep ni-wehmaj g t-wehnag Mark ch hab wa'ap s-em-ahgithamk mamt ab wo s-ho'ige'el.
60005014	Ab g wo a'ai si e ihmath, ahpim e wehm wohochuththam. Ab at wo wa ba'ich i em-mah g Jiosh g s-ap tahhathkam.
61001001	Ni-wepnag: Ia ant ep wo i em-o'ohani g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ahni Simon Peter. S-mahch am mani d hema piongaj ch kehshaj g Jesus Christ. Heg o d t-tho'ibiakam Jiosh ch gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Mt ab i s-wohoch. K g em-wohochuthadag wepo masma mo g t-wohochuthadag ahchim Tutuligo matt wa ab i s-wohoch.
61001002	S-mahch am g Jiosh ch ep s-mahch g t-kownalig Jesus. K heg hekaj ab si s-em-ho'ige'ith ch ab ba'ich wo i em-mahkath g s-ap tahhathkam.
61001003	Pegih, s-mahch ach g Jiosh. K heg hekaj ab t-mahkch wehs hegai mach tatchua matt hekaj s-ap wo himchuthath g t-thoakag ch d wo s-ap'ekamk. Ab at i t-gawulkai ab t-chehgithch g si s-tondam e-gewkthag ch s-e-ap'ekam.
61001004	Si ge'e ha'ichu atsh hab wo t-juni g Jiosh. Kumt ab i s-wohochuth k hab wo edgithath g Jiosh thoakag ch wo e tho'ibia ab amjed hegai pi ap'ekam mo in ha'ichug heg hekaj pi ap ha-tatchui g hemajkam.
61001005	Pegih, ab o em-mahks g wohochuthadag. Kumt wo si e nakogath mamt wo s-ap'ek ch am wo si i mamche g s-ap'ekam
61001006	ch wo s-thotholimak ch s-chechojim ab wo nakogath ha'ichu ch ab wo ihmath g Jiosh.
61001007	Ab o em-ab mamt ab ep wo si ha tatchuath g e-wehm wohochuththam ch ab wo si pihk e elithath chum hems ha hekaj g hemajkam.
61001008	Neh, ith amt wehs eda am wo e nakogath ch hekaj s-wapagim am hab wo junihith g tatchuij g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
61001009	Kutp hedai pi hab wo junihith ihtha ch hab wo masmak mo g pi neatham no pi pi ap neith mat gm hu hab i juh g Jiosh g pi ap chu'ichigaj.
61001010	Neh, mt hekaj am ba'ich wo i si e nako mamt si s-wihnam wo bei hegai mat haschu wehhejed ab i em-waith k ab i em-gawulkai g Jiosh. T hab pi hekith hab wo e juh mams wo i shul ab amjed g Jiosh.
61001011	Jiosh at s-ap ab wo em-mah g ap'ethag mamt am wo i wahp t-tho'ibiakam Jesus Christ kownaltalig ed.
61001012	Heki amki hu s-mahch ihtha mani ia em-ahgith ch s-wihnam gegok heg eda wohokam mamt ab bei. Nt wabshaba am wo i em-chechegitolithath mamt wo s-chegitok ch ab s-ap wo bei g e-ap'ethag.
61001013	E o aihim mant im hu hab wo i ni-juh mad hab ni-ahgith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Ni hekaj hab ni-ahg mant am wo si em-chechegitolithath wehs ihtha am hugkam mant hebai hugkam d wo thoakamk.
61001015	Am ant wo i ni-nako mant am wo o'oha wehs ihtha. Mt hab masma chum hekith wo s-chegitokath am i thahm mant hekith im hu hab wo i ni-juh.
61001016	Ia atsh ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus Christ jewed thahm. T g gewkthaj am ep wo e chehgi. Wohokam ach am em-ahgith ith amjed ch pi g hoho'oki a'agitha ahchim machd heki hu am neith g si s-tondam gewkthaj g si t-wuhpuikaj.
61001017	An achd wehmaj g Jesus. Kud g ohgaj Jiosh ab mah g si has elithadag k ab neok ch hab kaij, “Ith o d si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag.”
61001018	Ith achd kah mo ab neok thahm kahchim t amjed anai machd an wehmaj tho'ag thahm.
61001019	Ith o am si wohokamchuth mo haschu heki hu am ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Ha'ichu ha-ahga o wabsh he'es ab i t-mahkch g amichuthadag hab sha masma matp hems g kanjel t-tonlithch am s-chuhugam k ed. K wabshaba g Jesus am t-mahtchulith ch ba'ich i ge'e ab t-mahkch g amichuthadag hab sha masma mo g s-mahs hu'u ba'ich i t-tonlithch mat hekith ab wo i chesh mo e aihim g mahsithag. Mt heg hekaj wo s-chegitok g ha'ichu ha-ahga g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam k ab wo e thagitokch Jesus wui.
61001020	Ha'ichu ha-ahga o pi d wabsh hemajkam ha'ichu ha-ahga. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am ha tashogith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. T heg hekaj pi hedai wo e nako mas wabsh g hejel e-mahchigkaj wo i tashogi g ha'ichu ha-ahga.
61002001	An atsh wa ha'i i wuwha mash wa e wepogith g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch wabshaba wabsh ha iattogith g hemajkam. Kut hab wa'ap in wo i wuwha em-shahgith hegam mat wo chum em-mashcha g pi wohokam k wo padch g em-wohochuthadag. Jesus Christ o d t-tho'ibiakam. K wabshaba ihtham pi wohokamchuth. S-hohtam at im hu hab wo i ha juh g Jiosh mat hekith wo e ai g ha-tashga.
61002002	Mu'ijj at am ha oithch hab wo junihith g s-bihtagi ha'ichu hab ha-juni. T heg hekaj mu'i hemajkam wo pad has ahgath g Jesus himthag.
61002003	Hegam mo em-iattogith ab amjed g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o wabsh s-u'imkch g em-lialiga. K wabshaba am e nahtokch g Jiosh mat wo ha lothait k im hu hab wo i ha juh.
61002004	Si o tasho mo e aihim g lothaita tash. Ha'i atsh am shul g anghil pi ap'ekam ch ed. Tsh g Jiosh am ha shul s-chuhugam k ed k am ha u'ukch mat haha wo ha lothai ge'e lothaita tash ed.
61002005	Mu'ijj g heki hu hemajkam ash wa pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh. Kutsh hab juh g ge'e wi'inthag matsh ha wi'in. Sh eda am wa chum ahgahim g s-ap'ekam ihtha mash hab chehgig Noah. Tsh ith tho'ibia g Jiosh ch wewa'ak ehp g wehmaj kihkam.
61002006	Sh gm hu ba'ich, kush sha'i si pi ap'e hegam mash am d kihkam Sodom ch Gomorra t am. Tsh g Jiosh am wabsh i ha hugio ihtham kihhim g meikaj mat wo ha chehgi g pi ap hemajkam mat has wo ha juh.
61002007	Kush am hema kih g s-ap'ekam o'othham ch hab chehgig Lot ch si s-wohom pi hohho'ith g pi ap ha'ichu hab ha-juni. Tsh ith g Jiosh tho'ibia matsh hekith i ha hugio hegam kihhim.
61002009	Wehs ihtha o am t-tashogith mo g Jiosh e nahtokch mat wo ha tho'ibia g s-ap'ekam o'othham ab amjed g ha-kudutadag k s-ko'okam ab wo ha namkith g pi ap'ekam mat wo e ai g ge'e lothaita tash.
61002010	Jiosh at ba'ich i si s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mo d wabsh totonto ch pi ap hekaj g e-chuhkug ch pi ab hu wohog elith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Hegam mo ahgachug g pi wohokam o e sheshmachuth ch si e hahaschuth ch s-ta kek'eitham neneok ch s-ko'okam has ha ahg hegam mo d haha'ichu an thahm kahchim ch ed.
61002011	Anghil o ha ba'ich i s-gewpkthag ch eda pi sha'i ko'okam ab ha abchuth hegam haha'ichu am tahgio g Jiosh.
61002012	K eda hegam s-chu i'attomkam pi ha'ichu am hu chegito hab masma mo g mischini ha'ichu thoakam ch s-ko'okam has ahg hegai mo haschu pi amichuth. T g Jiosh wo ha hugio hab masma mamtp hems wo mua g ha'ichu thoakam.
61002013	S-ko'okam at ab wo bei g e-namkithadag heg hekaj mo am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. Thash ha-hohho'itha mat chum hems tash ed hab wo junihith g si s-uam ha'ichu. Am ash em-wehm e gegosith. K d si edathag mo hab s-junimk g iattogitha.
61002014	Heg o wa'i tatchua mat g u'uwi an wo ha neithath ch pi ap ha'ichu am wo chegitoth. Shahag wepo mo pi ha huhuge g pi ap ha-tatchui. S-u'imk o hegai mo pi ab hu d ha-wuikam ch im hu hab pi apko i ha wanimed hegam mo pi gewpkthag. Jiosh o heki hu ab ha mohto'ithch g s-ko'ok namkithadag.
61002015	Heki at hu i e mehkoth ab amjed g s-ap'ekam hab masma matsh wa hema hab e juh mash hab chehgig Balaam. Ihtha Balaambad ash d chum Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch wabshaba s-u'imk g lial am hab junihithch g pi ap'ekam.
61002016	Tsh g Jiosh shohbi g pi ap ha'ichu hab elithaj am hab juhk g wuhlu shoigaj mat haha wabsh neo.
61002017	No hig pi woho mo pi ha'ichu wehhejed s-kehgaj g shongam matp wo gaksh o g s-chuchk chewagi matp gm hu wabsh wo wi'ichkwua? Pegih, k hab wa'ap pi ha'ichu wehhejed s-kehgaj ihtham mo pi ahg g wohokam. Jiosh at am wo ha shul si s-chuhugam k ed.
61002018	Chum o si s-gimaim ch pehegi neneok ch s-uam ha'ichukaj i ha wanchshulig hegam mo chum e nakog mat wo e tho'ibia
61002019	no pi am ha ahgith mo wabsh chum haschu s-ap'e ch eda hejel e wupulshch g pi ap'ekamkaj. Matp haschukaj wo e gewito g o'othham k heg hekaj wo e wulshchith.
61002020	Hegam s-chu i'attomkam at s-mai g wohokam ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ k hekaj wo chum e tho'ibia. Kut heg hekaj ba'ich wo i pi ap'ek mat am ep wo e wupulsh g pi ap'ekamkaj.
61002021	Ab o ha mahkch g Jiosh g ha'ichu e-ahga. K wabshaba ba'ich i s-ap'e mat hems pi wo kah matp wabsh gm hu wo s-ohhoth.
61002022	T am wo e wohokamch ihtha hab ha-che'ithag: Gogs at am uhpam wo bah g e-wihos, ch ith ehp, Kohji o tatchua mat am uhpam wo gei bith ch ed, chum as wo si e kegch.
61003001	Pegih neh, ni-wepnag, ith o d wa'i gokkokam mant am i em-o'ohanith k am i em-chegitol ihtham ha'ichu.
61003002	Chum ani si em-tatchuith mamt wo s-chegitok g ha'ichu ha-ahga g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch ep wo s-chegitok hegai chehanigaj g t-tho'ibiakam kownal Jesus mo g am chuhchaij am wa em-ahgith.
61003003	Mt wo s-mahchkath mat am wo i e aihi mat ep wo jiwia g Jesus, t an ha'i wo i wuwha mo heg wa'i hejel e-tatchui am hab s-junimk. Ihtham at wo has em-ahgath
61003004	ch pi ab hu has wo elithath g wohokam ch hab wo kaijjith, “Mki wabsh hejel e iattogith mam hab chech'e matsh ep wo uhpam jiwia g Jesus. T eda pi jiwia. T mu'ijj heki hu wa'i koi g t-shohshon. Wehs ha'ichu o am hab wabsh i e junihim mo has i e junihim ga hu hebai i amjed mashp hekith in i e nahto g jewed.”
61003005	Ihtham o hab s-e junimk mo pi mahch mo ith d wohokam matsh wa g Jiosh am neok k am nahto g thahm kahchim ch jewed. Ihtha jewed atsh ab i wuhsh shuhthagi t amjed k g shuhthagikaj e nahto.
61003006	K am i himtham, sh d wa ep shuhthagi mat ha wi'in k ha hugio g hemajkam.
61003007	K hab wa masma wabsh g e-ne'okikaj an u'ukch g Jiosh g thahm kahchim ch jewed ch ab wo ai mat wo ha lothai g pi ap hemajkam k im hu hab wo i ha juh mei ch ed.
61003008	Ith amt ep wo s-chegitok mo g mihl a'ahithag hab wa'i masma mo g hemako tash am wehhejed g Jiosh.
61003009	K wabshaba am hemajkam t-wehhejed shahag wepo mo si chewaj g tash mat g Jiosh am hab wo juh hegai mash hab s-t-junithamk. K eda g Jiosh si s-ha bahbgi g hemajkam ch ab chum ha nenida no pi pi hab chum sha'i elith mas hedai wo huhug am pi ap'ekam ch e d pi gm hu s-ohhothk g pi ap e-chegitoi.
61003010	Neh, no hig pi woho mo pi ta machima mas hekith g s-chu ehskam am wo wah em-kih ed? Pegih, k hab wa'ap pi ta machima mas hekith ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus. S-hohtam atsh wo jiwia. Kutsh wo si s-kaitham huhug g thahm kahchim k wo meitto g tash ch huhu'u ch jewed.
61003011	Wehs ha'ichu atsh wo huhug. Mt heg hekaj ab wo chum si i e thagitokch Jiosh wui
61003012	ch ab wo nenidath hegai tash ch am wo e nakogath mat hems s-hohtam wo e ai. Tsh hi wo wa chum meitto g thahm kahchim ch jewed.
61003013	Sh wabshaba g Jiosh hab kaij mat heg i thahm am haha wo nahto g wechij thahm kahchim ch wechij jewed. Tsh g s-ap'ekam an hab wo wa'i e junihith anai. Neh, ith ach ab si nenida.
61003014	Pegih oi g wo, tt hig am wo si i t-nako matt wo si s-ap'ek am Jiosh tahgio k wo si s-ap t-tahtkkath ab a'ai t-wui. T g Jiosh s-ap ab wo t-neithath.
61003015	Am g wo s-amichuthath mo g Jiosh am wabsh s-t-bahbgi mattp hems wehsijj wo t-tho'ibia. Paul at wa am hab wa'ap em-o'ohani ihtha heg hekaj amichuthadag mo g Jiosh ab mahkch.
61003016	Bo wa masma hab chu'ig wehs o'ohanaj ed mo am ha o'ohanith g a'ai hemajkam ith amjed. Hahasko o s-hasigam hab kaithag g o'ohanaj. K pi ap am hu i tashogith hegam mo pi amichuth g e-wohochuthadag ch pi wihnam gegok heg eda mo hab wa masma hab ep wua g heki hu o'ohanaj g Jiosh. Ho o wabsh hejel ab e mohto'ith g pi ap chu'ichig. T im hu hab wo i ha juh g Jiosh.
61003017	Am am wa heki hu s-mahch wehs ihtha, ni-wepnag. Hegam mat pi ab hu wo wohog elithath g Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed. Kumt wo s-e nen'oithath mamt pi am hu ha oithk hab wo e junihith.
61003018	Am att hig wo i t-nako matt ab ba'ich wo i mahchith g t-tho'ibiakam kownal Jesus Christ ch ba'ich wo i bei g i wehmtadag ab amjed. Heg ach ab si hehgchulith ch chum hekith ab wo si ihmath.
62001001	Ni-wepnag: Am ant wo i em-o'ohani ab amjed hegai mat ia u'apa g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga jewed thahm k ab t-mahkch g wechij thoakag. Chum ash hekith wehmaj g e-ohg Jiosh an thahm kahchim ch ed ch wabshaba ia i wuhsh jewed thahm. Kuni si neith g hejel ni-wuhpuikaj ch kahk ch ab tahtk g ni-nohnhoikaj.
62001003	Ahchim mach wa neith g Jiosh alithag ach am em-ahgith ab amjed mamt hekaj t-wehm ab wo ihmath g Jiosh. Jesus Christ o d Jiosh alithag.
62001004	Kuni am em-o'ohanith ahpim mam ab s-wohochuth mamt hekaj wo si s-ap e tahtkkath. Nt ahni hab wa'ap wo si s-ap ni-tahtkkath em-wehm.
62001005	Jesus o am t-ahgith mash g Jiosh d hekia tonlig.
62001006	T wo ha iattogi matp hedai hab wo chei mo s-mahch g Jiosh k eda hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam. Ith o am s-chuhugam k ed him.
62001007	Jiosh o d wohokam. Kutt wo si s-ap t-tahtkkath ab a'ai t-wui am oithch hihimathch g wohokam. Kut heg gm hu hab wo i junihith g pi ap t-chu'ichig nat pi heg hekaj t-wehhejed muh g alithaj. Heg o wa wepo mo g alithaj eh'ed gm hu wakon g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
62001008	Pi g hab wo sha'i cheh'i mams pi ha chu'ichig. Heg o d iattogi.
62001009	Tt wo mahsko wua g t-chu'ichig. T g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh k wo i t-kegch. Heg at hekaj ab nako g Jiosh alithag g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag ab e sho'igchuthk kots t ab.
62001010	Jiosh o am t-tashogith matt wehsijj hab juh g pi ap'ekam. Kut hedai hab wo chei mo pi ha chu'ichig k am wo e chehgi mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh.
62002001	Tham ni-a'aliga ab i s-wohochuthk g ha'ichu ni-ahga. Kuni ab i em-gewkemhun mamt pi am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam. Jesus Christ o d hekia s-ap'ekam ch ab e ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui am t-wehhejed. Kutt am wo ahgi g Jiosh g t-chu'ichig matt hekith am hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam.
62002002	T heg gm hu hab wo i juh g t-chu'ichig nat pi g alithaj heg hekaj nako g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag. Kut wabsh chum hedai wo chum e nako mat ab wo i e nodagi wui.
62002003	Tt wo s-mahchk mach woho'i s-mahch g Jiosh matt am hab wo junihith mo haschu ab i t-chehani.
62002004	Hegai mat pi am hu oithk hab wo e junihith g Jiosh chehanig o pi mahch g Jiosh, chum as hems hab wo chum chei mo s-mahch.
62002005	Ahchim mach hab wua g Jiosh tatchui ach woho'i ab si tatchua. Ith at am wo t-chehgi mach woho d a'aligaj.
62002006	Jiosh alithag o chum hekith am hab junihim g e-ohg tatchui. Kutt ahchim hab wo chum masmak mattp woho d a'aligaj g Jiosh.
62002007	Pegih, ni-tatchui, pi ani em-ahgith g wechij chehanig am em-ahgithch mamt ab a'ai wo si e tatchuath. Jiosh o wa heki hu hab masma t-chehani. Kum ith ab kaichug heki hu wa'i amjed.
62002008	T eda g Jiosh alithag am i wechijith t-wehhejed mat ab i t-mah g wechij thoakag. Tonlig o gm hu hab i wua g s-chuhugam am t-wehhejed.
62002009	Am o wabsh kia him s-chuhugam k ed matp hedai s-keh'ith g e-wehnag, chum as hab wo kaijjith mo hab wua g s-ap'ekam.
62002010	Tt am tonlig ch ed wo hihimath mattp woho ab wo si ha tatchuath g t-wepnag. T pi hedai wo pihk chu'i heg hekaj mach has masma.
62002011	K wabshaba am s-chuhugam k ed him hegai matp hedai wo s-ha keh'ithath.
62002012	Pi ant hab ahgk am wo em-o'ohani mams pi mahch g Jiosh. Gm at hu hab i juh g em-chu'ichig. Kum s-mahch.
62002013	Ahpim mam d si ge'eged am s-mahch mo g Jesus chum hekith d thoakam. Kum ahpim wechij hemajkam s-gewkthag ch am gewito g Jiawul nam pi s-gegokim ab e u'ukch Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab. Heg ant hekaj am wo i em-o'ohanith k ab wo i em-gewkemhu.
62002015	Pi g wo sha'i si pihk e elithath heg ab mo d wabsh jewed t ab ha'ichu. Hegam matp hedai wo si pihk e elithath ith ab ha'ichu at pi wo sha'i pihk e elithath ab Jiosh wui.
62002016	Pi o d sha'i Jiosh hab elitha matt hab wo s-junim g pi ap'ekam o si s-wohom wo s-behim mach haschu i neith o machs haschukaj wo si t-haschuthath. Wehs ihtha o d wabsh jewed t ab ha'ichu
62002017	ch hab wa masma d wabsh huhugetham ha'ichu. T wabshaba pi hekith wo huhug hegai wechij thoakag mo g Jiosh ab t-mahkch ahchim mach am hab junihim g tatchuij.
62002018	Am am wa kah matsh an wo i e maskogi hegai mash d si obgaj g Jiosh alithag. Heki at hu mu'i an i wuwha t-shahgith mo d obgaj. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mo e aihim mat wo huhug g jewed.
62002019	T wo chum t-wehm wih matp d t-wehm wohochuththam k wabshaba am i t-thagito. K heg hekaj tasho mo pi woho d t-wehm wohochuththam.
62002020	Jiosh alithag at ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg am t-wehmaj ch i t-wehmt. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch g wohokam.
62002021	Pi o hekith g iattogi d wohokam. Kum s-mahch ihtha nam pi s-mahch g wohokam. Nt heg hekaj am em-o'ohani ihtha.
62002022	Hegam mo hab kaij mo g Jesus pi d Jiosh alithag o wehs ha ba'ich d i s-chu i'attomkam ch d obgaj. Heg o hekaj e chehgith mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh.
62002023	Hegam mo pi ab hu ihm g Jiosh alithag o hab wa'ap pi ab hu ihm g Jiosh. Hegam o ab wa'i ihm g Jiosh mo hedai ab ihm g alithaj.
62002024	Mt am wabsh wo i wohochuthath ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mam ga hu i wehpeg amjed kaichug. Kut heg hekaj chum hekith am wo em-wehmajk g Jiosh g e-alithag wehm.
62002025	Heki o hu hab kaij g Jiosh matsh ab wo t-mah ihtha wechij thoakag matsh pi hekith wo huhug.
62002026	Am ant em-o'ohani ab ha amjed hegam mo em-iattogith ch im hu hab i s-em-junimk ab amjed g Jesus. Kumt pi ab hu ha'ichu wo mahchim ha ab.
62002027	Pi o hab chum mahs mams wabsh chum hasko amjed wo i e gahgithahi mam haschu i pi amichuth. Jiosh alithag at ab em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kut heg chum hekith am wo em-wehmajk ch wehs wo em-mashchamath g wohokam. Kumt ab wo kaihamath g mashchamaj ch ab wo s-wohog elithath g Jiosh alithag
62002028	ch hab masma pi wo si e el mat hekith ep wo jiwia.
62002029	Tho hekia s-ap'ekam g Jiosh. Kumt heg hekaj wo s-mahchk mamtp hedai hab junihim g s-ap'ekam ch d a'aligaj.
62003001	Jiosh at hab t-juh mach d hahawa a'aligaj no pi si pihk e elith ab t-wui. Hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh alithag o pi mahch mach ahchim hab wa'ap d Jiosh a'aliga.
62003002	Batt wo chum masmak mo g Jiosh alithag nach pi hab wa'ap d a'aligaj. K pi koi am hu i si tasho matt has wo masmak nach pi wabsh s-kohmagim neith mo has i masma g Jiosh alithag. T hekith ep wo jiwia k ab wo i e chehgi t-wui. Kutt haha wo wepo masmak natt pi wo s-mai mo has masma.
62003003	K eda hemu tasho mo d si hekia s-ap'ekam g Jiosh alithag. Kutt ahchim wo si t-nuhkuthath matt d wo s-ap'ekamk nach pi s-mahch mat ep wo jiwia. Kutt wo neith k wo wepo masmak.
62003004	That wo pi ap chu'ijkamk am Jiosh chehanig ed hegai mat hedai hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam.
62003005	Pi o ha chu'ichig g Jiosh alithag ch in i wuhsh jewed thahm wepo masma g o'othham mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
62003006	Pi att am hu hab wo chum junihith g pi ap'ekam mattp ab wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh alithag. Hegai mat hedai hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam oki pi mahch g Jiosh alithag.
62003007	Ha'i o hab kaij mamt d wo s-ap'ekamk, chum hems pi am hu hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam. S-e g wo nen'oithk mat pi wo em-iattogi. Jesus o am t-chehgithch g hejel e-thoakagkaj matp hedai d wo s-ap'ekamk ch am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.
62003008	Matp hedai hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ch d wo Jiawul pionagk nat pi hab wo junihith g tatchuij g Jiawul. Jiawul o hab junihim g pi ap'ekam gd hu i si wehpeg amjed. T ia jiwia g Jiosh alithag jewed thahm mat wo hugio g Jiawul chikpan.
62003009	Pi att am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ahchim mach d a'aligaj g Jiosh nach pi edgith g wechij thoakag.
62003010	K ith hekaj tasho mo hedai d a'aligaj g Jiosh ch hedai am oith g Jiawul. Pi o d sha'i a'aligaj g Jiosh hegam mat hedai pi hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch pi ab hu wo pihk e elithath ab ha wui hegam mo d chum ha-wepnag.
62003011	Ihtha mani em-ahgith o d hegai mam kaichug gd hu i amjed mamt wehpeg kah. Ab g wo si pihk e elithath a'ai e wui.
62003012	Neh, hema ash wa d Cain ch hab junihim g Jiawul tatchui. Kumt pi oithk am hab wo e junihith. Cain cheoj wehnag ash wa hab junihim g s-ap'ekam. Sh g Jiosh si tatchua. Tsh g Cain heg hekaj s-hehgam k mua.
62003013	Pi g wo sha'i e totothsith mat hems g hemajkam hab wa masma wo s-em-keh'ithath.
62003014	S-mahch ach mo ab t-mahkch g Jiosh g wechij thoakag nach pi si pihk t-elith ha hekaj g t-wehm wohochuththam ch hab masma ab ha neith mo d t-wepnag. Hegam mo pi pihk e elith ha hekaj g e-wepnag o hab sha masma mo g ko'i.
62003015	Heg o wa wepo mo d ha mu'akam matp hedai s-ha keh'ith. Kuch s-mahch mo pi edgith g wechij thoakag hegam mat hedai d wo ha mu'akamk.
62003016	Jiosh alithag at ab muh kots t ab t-wehhejed no pi t-hekaj si pihk e elith. Ith o hekaj tasho mo haschu d pihk elithadag. Kutt wo si pihk t-elithath ha hekaj g t-wepnag am hugkam matt chum hems wo t-muhkith am ha wehhejed.
62003017	Pi o sha'i pihk e elith ab Jiosh wui hegai mat hedai ha'ichu wo s-edgithath ch pi heg hekaj ab hu wo i wehmt g e-wehnag.
62003018	Ab att wo ha mah g t-wepnag g i wehmtadag matp wo tatchua k pi hab wabsh wo kaijjith mach si pihk t-elith ha hekaj. Pegih, si ach pihk t-elith ha hekaj g t-wepnag.
62003019	K heg hekaj tasho mach edgith g wohokam. Ith att hekaj ab wo i t-gewkemhu matt ab wo i miabi g Jiosh.
62003020	Hebaichujj ach ab ha'ichu t-chu'ichigchuth. K wabshaba g Jiosh ba'ich i s-gewkthag mach ahchim ch wehs ha'ichu s-mahch
62003021	ch gm hu hab i juh hegai t-chu'ichig. Tt hab pi ha'ichu ab hu wo t-chu'ichigchuth k ab wabsh wo i miabi g Jiosh pi sha'i has t-elithch.
62003022	Bach junihim g Jiosh tatchui ch hegai mo haschu ab t-chehani. K g Jiosh heg hekaj am hab t-junith mach haschu ab i tahni.
62003023	K ith d chehanigaj g Jiosh matt ab wo s-wohochuthath g alithaj ch ab a'ai t-wui wo si pihk t-elithath mo hab masma t-chehani g alithaj.
62003024	Mach hedai ab s-wohog elith g Jiosh att ab si t-hemakoj heg wehm. Jiosh at ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K ith d Jiosh ch t-wehmaj. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mach d a'aligaj.
62004001	Mu'i at an i wuwhag k hab chum e wua mo d ha mihshmaththam. K eda pi ha wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kumt heg hekaj pi wabsh chum hedai ab wo s-ha wohochuth k ho'ip ha a'appe mas woho ha wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
62004002	Ahchim o wa'i t-wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mach hedai wohokamchuth mo g Jesus d Jiosh alithag ch ia mahsi k d o'othham hab masma mach ahchim.
62004003	Pi o am hu ha wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hegam mo hedai pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh alithag. Am o hema ha wehmaj ch d Jesus obga. Heki am hu kah mat an wo i wuhsh g obgaj. K hemuch in ha'ichug no pi an ha wehmaj hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh alithag.
62004004	Jiosh alithag obga o am ha wehmaj hegam mo g iattogi chum ha mihshmethahim. K wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag in t-wehmaj. Kutt heg hekaj ha gewito no pi heg ba'ich i s-gewkthag mo hi g Jiosh alithag obga.
62004005	Hegam o ab wabsh jewed t ab ha'ichu k amjed neneok. K hegam ab ha kaiham mo hab wa'ap pi mahch g Jiosh.
62004006	Pi o ab hu t-kaiham mach chum neneok ab amjed g Jiosh no pi pi mahch g Jiosh. Hegam o ab wa'i t-kaiham mo hedai s-mahch g Jiosh. Bach masma s-mahch mo hedai edgith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Heg o am ha tashogith g wohokam.
62004007	Ab att wo chum si pihk t-elithath a'ai t-wui no pi g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g pihk elithadag. Mamtp woho wo s-mahchk g Jiosh ch d a'aligaj ch wo si pihk e elithath.
62004008	Jiosh o si t-tatchua ch heg hekaj si pihk e elith ab t-wui. K hegam mo pi edgith g pihk elithadag pi d sha'i a'aligaj.
62004009	Jiosh at ab i wuhshath g si hemako e alithag ith thahm jewed. T heg ab nako g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mach heg ab beihog. Kut hab masma ab t-mah g wechij thoakag. Bat wa masma am t-tashogi g Jiosh mo si pihk e elith ab t-wui. Kutt heg amjed i s-mai g pihk elithadag k hahawa si pihk t-elith ab Jiosh wui.
62004011	Am o wa tasho mo ab t-wui si pihk e elith g Jiosh. Pegih, ni-wepnag, ahchim att hab wa'ap wo chum si pihk t-elithath ab a'ai t-wui.
