62004012	Pi ach hedai hekith sha'i neith g Jiosh g t-wuhpuikaj. K wabshaba heg ab t-mahkch g si ge'e pihk elithadag. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mo t-wehmaj.
62004013	Jiosh at ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg d Jiosh ch ab t-wehm kihthag. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mach d a'aligaj.
62004014	Heki at hu am i kei g Jiosh g e-alithag mat ab wo i hih jewed wui k wo ha tho'ibia g hemajkam. Kuni si neith ihtha ch heg amjed am em-ahgith.
62004015	Wehsijj ach d a'aligaj g Jiosh matt hedai ab s-wohochuth k ah mo g Jesus d si alithaj.
62004016	Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mo si pihk e elith g Jiosh ab t-wui ch ab si t-hemakojithch e wehm. Jiosh o ab si t-tatchua. Kuch s-mahch mach d a'aligaj nach pi ab a'ai si t-tatchua.
62004017	Ab o t-mahkch g si ge'e pihk elithadag. Kuch wepo masma ab si tatchua mo g alithaj ch hab s-ap t-taht k wo ai g lothaita
62004018	k pi wo ehbithath. Gm at hu hab i juh g pi ap t-namkithadag g Jiosh no pi si pihk e elith ab t-wui. Kutt heg hekaj pi wo ehbithath ch wabsh aigo wo si pihk t-elithath ab wui. Pi o pihk e elith ab Jiosh wui hegai mat hedai wo s-ehbithath.
62004019	Wehpeg o si pihk e elith g Jiosh ab t-wui. Kuch heg hekaj edgith g pihk elithadag.
62004020	Pi o woho d Jiosh wohochuththam mo hedai pi ab hu pihk e elith t-wui ahchim mach d wohochuththam. Ba'ich o i s-hasig matt ab wo si tatchua hegai mach pi neith. Pi at wo e nako mat ab wo si tatchua g Jiosh matp hedai pi ab hu wo si ha tatchua g e-wepnag.
62004021	Ab o t-chehani g Jiosh ahchim mach ab si tatchua matt ab epai wo si ha tatchuath g t-wepnag.
62005001	Thach Jiosh a'aliga wehsijj ahchim mach s-wohochuth mo g Jesus d alithaj g Jiosh ch d si Kehshaj. Kutt ab a'ai wo si t-tatchuath nach pi d t-wepngam. K g Jiosh d t-ohg.
62005002	S-mahch ach mo d wohokam g t-tatchuithag ab a'ai t-wui nach pi ab si tatchua g Jiosh.
62005003	K am wa tasho mach ab si tatchua g Jiosh nach pi ab s-wohog elith. K g chehanigaj pi sha'i wehch am t-wehhejed.
62005004	Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g gewkthag matt wo gewito g pi ap'ekam. Ab ach s-wohochuth g alithaj. K heg hekaj ab t-mahkch hegai gewkthag matt heg hekaj gewito g pi ap'ekam. Pi at wo e nako g pi wohochuththam mas wo gewito g pi ap'ekam.
62005006	Jesus Christ at ia jiwia jewed thahm k e pahl wakon k am hab juh g e-chikpan k am hahawa e muhkith am t-wehhejed.
62005007	T g pahl wakonaj ch muhkigaj am wohokamch mo d Jiosh alithag ch d thoakam ith thahm jewed. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab wa'ap wohokamchuth. Ihtham waik o am wohokamchuth mo g Jesus d Jiosh alithag.
62005009	Neh, ab ach s-wohochuth g o'othham mat ab ha'ijj wo t-ahgi mo si s-ap s-mahch. K g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ba'ich i s-gewkthag mat heg am wohokamch g e-alithag.
62005010	Kutt hedai ab wo s-wohoch g Jiosh alithag k wo si s-ap s-mahchk mo d wohokam. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at t-wehhejed wo wohokamch. Hegam mo pi wohochuth g Jiosh oki hab elith mo t-iattogith.
62005011	Ab o i t-tashogith g Jiosh mo ab t-makiog g pi ha huhugetham thoakag am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag.
62005012	Ahchim mach ab ihm g alithaj ach edgith hegai thoakag. K hegam mo pi ab hu ihm pi edgith.
62005013	Ith ant am em-o'ohani ahpim mam ab ihm g Jiosh alithag mamt hekaj wo s-mahchk mam edgith ihtha wechij thoakag.
62005014	Si ach s-mahch mat ab wo t-kaiha g Jiosh matt ab ha'ichu wo tai matp ith am tatchuij oithch d wo ha'ichuk. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo i t-gewkemhunath ch ab wo ha'ichu tahnith nat pi woho am hab wo t-junithahith.
62005016	Ab att wo tahnith g Jiosh mat gm hu hab wo i juh g ha-chu'ichig g t-wehm wohochuththam matp ab wo e shohbi. Kut hab wo juh mach haschu ab tahni. Pi ani em-ahgith mams wo e ho'ige'ithahu ha wehhejed hegam mat pi ab hu wo sha'i e shohbi.
62005017	Wehs o ha'ichu d pi ap'ekam mo haschu i pi d Jiosh tatchui. T wabshaba g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g ha-chu'ichig hegam mat ab wo e shohbi.
62005018	S-mahch ach mo g Jiawul edgith g gewkthag am wehs ha thahm hegam mo pi d Jiosh a'aliga. Kuch eda ahchim d Jiosh a'aliga. Jiosh alithag o t-nuhkuth. Kut pi wo sha'i e nako g Jiawul mas gm hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed. Pi att am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ahchim mach d Jiosh a'aliga.
62005020	K g Jiosh alithag ab t-mahkch g amichuthadag matt wo s-mahchk g wohokam Jiosh ch wo edgithath g wechij thoakag. Heg at hekaj ia jiwia g Jiosh alithag jewed thahm. Heg o d wa'i t-Jioshga mo d si wohokam Jiosh.
62005021	Kumt pi ha'ichu ep wo jioshchuth k pi hedai ep ab hu wui wo e ho'ige'ithahunath.
63001001	Ni-tatchui ni-wepnag: Am ant wo ha'ichu i em-o'ohani ahni mani d hema ha wanimedtham wehsijj hegam mo ab si ihm g Jesus Christ. Si ani pihk ni-elith em-hekaj nach pi d t-wehm wohochuththam. Wehs g t-wehm wohochuththam o hab wa'ap si pihk e elith em-hekaj. Pi at hekith gm hu hab wo i e juh g wohokam ab t-amjed.
63001003	Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g e-alithag Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mah g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam. Kumt ab wo u'ukchith g wohokam ch wo si pihk e elithath wehs ha hekaj.
63001004	Si ani s-ap ni-tahtk ch ia ha'i ha neith g em-wehm kihkam. K ihtham an u'ukch g wohokam hab masma mo ab t-chehani g Jiosh.
63001005	Kuni ab wehs i em-gewkemhun mamt ab a'ai e wui wo si pihk e elithath. Pi o d wechij chehanig ihtha mani am em-ahgith. Edgith ach ihtha gd hu i shohshon k amjed.
63001006	Kutt ab a'ai t-wui wo si pihk t-elithath ch hekaj am wo t-chehgithath mach ab s-wohog elith ihtha chehanigaj g Jiosh.
63001007	Mu'i at an i wuwha mo chum s-ha mashchamamk g hemajkam ch eda d wabsh s-chu i'attomkam ch d obgaj g Jiosh alithag no pi pi ha mashcham mat ia mahsi k d o'othham hab masma mach ahchim.
63001008	Kumt heg hekaj wo s-e nen'oithk mamt pi gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wabshaba wehs wo bei mo haschu ab em-makiog g Jiosh.
63001009	Hegam matp hedai am gawul wo juh g Jiosh alithag mashchama o pi sha'i mahch g Jiosh. S-mahch ach g Jiosh ch ep s-mahch g alithaj ahchim mach am oithch hab masma g alithaj mashchama.
63001010	Kumt heg hekaj pi ab hu wo ha kaihamath hegai mat hedai wo chum s-em-mashchamam k eda pi wo ahgachugath g Jiosh alithag mashchama. Pi g am hu wo i ha wahpkith e-kihki ed k chum hems pi hab wo chei ab ha wui. “Jiosh at wo wa em-wehmajk,”
63001011	mamt pi ab hu wo i ha wehmt hegam mat am wo ahgachugath g pi wohokam.
63001012	Mu'i ani ha'ichu s-em-ahgithamk ch wabshaba pi ith hekaj am i em-o'ohani nani pi am s-himimk mant wo em-neith k wo em-wehm neo. Kutt am t-wehm si s-ap wo t-tahtkk.
63001013	Ia o ha'i kih g t-wepnag ch ash si pihk e elith em-hekaj.
64001001	Ni-tatchui ni-wehnag, Gaius: Am ant wo ha'ichu i m-o'ohanith k d hema ha wanimedtham wehsijj hegam mo ab si ihm g Jesus Christ.
64001002	Ia at ha'i thatha hegam mash am em-wui ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k ia t-ahgith mapsh si s-ap himchuth g e-thoakag am oithch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga map has i masma chum hekith hab e junihim. Si ani s-hohho'ith ch kah mapsh am wabsh kia si s-ap e tahtk am Jiosh wui. Kuni ab tahni g Jiosh mat wehs ha'ichu wo s-ap'ek am m-wehhejed. Kupt wabsh wo si s-thoak.
64001004	Tho si s-ap tahhathkam am ni-wehhejed mat hegam mani ha ahgith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga wo si s-ap u'ukchith.
64001005	Kupsh am s-ap ha thagio'ith hegam mash am thaiw am ahgachugch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga, chum as pi d m-machiga.
64001006	Ihtham mat ia thatha o t-ahgith mapsh si pihk e elith ha hekaj. Kuni ab si i m-gewkemhun mapt ba'ich wo i ha wehmajk mat gm hu hasko ep wo i ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
64001007	Ihtham o t-ahgith mash pi ha hiwgith hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jesus mas ha'ichu ab wo i ha mah.
64001008	Ahchim o ab d t-wuikam mach ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh alithag matt wo i ha wehmtath hegam mo ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
64001009	Ith ani chum em-tashogith heki hu ni-o'ohana ed ahpim mam am e wehm e mihshmath. Kush wabshaba g Diotrephes pi chegima g ni-o'ohana ch am em-iattogith ch pad neok ab t-amjed ahchim mach ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Tatchua ash g Diotrephes mat d wo em-wanimedthamk. Am ant wo em-tashogi am jiwiak mo pi ap'e hegai mo haschu am hab junihim. Pi ash ab hu i ha wahpkith ch pi ha thagio'ith hegam mo am thaiw am ahgachugch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ash pi em-hiwgith mams ahpim hab wo chum juh ch wo chum em-wuwhas ab em-namki amjed.
64001011	Matp hedai hab masma hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ch pi mahch g Jiosh. Pi g am hu s-ha wepom k wabshaba hegam s-ha wepom mat hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. Ihtham o d Jiosh a'aliga.
64001012	Hema hegam mo hab junihim g s-ap'ekam o d Demetrius. Wehsijj am hab wa kaij. Kuni s-mahch mo d wohokam. Kum ahpim s-mahch mani chum hekith g wohokam ahg.
64001013	Mu'i ani ha'ichu s-m-ahgithamk ch wabshaba pi ith hekaj am i m-o'ohani
64001014	nani pi am s-himimk mant wo m-neith k wo m-wehm neo ab amjed.
64001015	Si g s-ap e tahtk am Jiosh wui mat m-tho'ibia. Ia o ha'i kih g t-wepnag ch ash si pihk e elith m-hekaj. Am g wehs ha ahgith g t-wepnag mach si pihk t-elith ha hekaj.
65001001	Ni-wepnag: Am ant wo i em-o'ohani ahni mani d Jude ch d piongaj g Jesus Christ ch d James wehnag. Jiosh o si pihk e elith em-hekaj ch ab i em-gawulkath k em-nuhkuth am wehhejed g e-alithag Jesus Christ.
65001002	Ab ani tahni g Jiosh mat ab ba'ich wo i s-em-ho'ige'ithath ch ab ba'ich wo i em-mahkath g s-ap thahhathkam ch pihk elithadag.
65001003	Ab ant ha'ichu wo i chum em-o'ohani ab amjed g t-tho'ibiathag. T wabshaba ha'i i wuwha mo d s-chu i'attomkam ch am chum gawul s-junimk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g tho'ibiathag ch ab wui gegok g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Ihtham o hab s-junimk g pi ap'ekam ch heg hekaj hab kaij mat g o'othham wabsh chum haschu has wo junihith ab i s-wohochuthk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. K wabshaba heki hu an o'ohanas mat s-ko'okam wo ha namkith g Jiosh hegam mat ab wui wo gegokiwua. Heki o hu t-ahgith g Jiosh matt haschu ab wo chum s-wohochuthath. Kum ahpim ab s-wohochuth g ha'ichu ahgaj. Nt heg hekaj am wo i em-o'ohanith k ab wo i em-gewkemhu mamt si s-gewkam wo u'ukchith.
65001005	Am g wo s-chegitok mat has ha juh g Jiosh hegam mo pi ab hu wohog elith. Chum as wehs e tho'ibia g Tutuligo ab Egypt jewed t amjed, k eda mu'ijj pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh ch hekaj s-ko'okam e ko'ij.
65001006	Am g wo s-chegitok mat has e juh g anghil. Ab o chum s-wohog elith g Jiosh ch wabshaba ha'i gm hu hab i e juh ab amjed. T hegam am i ha kuh g Jiosh k am s-wihnam ha kuhpch s-chuhugam k ed mat wo ha lothai ge'e lothaita tash ch ed.
65001007	Am g wo s-chegitok mat has i ha juh hegam mo am kih Sodom kihhim t am ch Gomorra kihhim t am ch gn hu ha wehgaj. Bo wa ep pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh ch hab junihim g pi ap'ekam am ha wehm wohpiwup hegam mo pi d ha-wehm kihkam. Chechoj o am e wehm wohpiwup ch hab wua g pi ap'ekam. T g Jiosh ab i huduni g mehi am ha thahm ihtham kihhim k am wehs ha koktha g hemajkam. Bo wa masma i t-tashogith g Jiosh mat s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mat pi wo thagito g pi ap'ekam. T g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag pi hekith wo huhug.
65001008	Ihtham s-chu i'attomkam mo am ha'ichu chum em-mashcham ash ha'ichu chehchk ch heg oithch am hab e junihim ch hekaj e uamhun ch pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh ch nahnko ha ahg g anghil.
65001009	Chum ash wa hems hegai anghil ha-ge'ejig mash hab chehgig Michael pi s-ko'okam ab abchuth g ge Jiawul no pi heg hab wa'ap d chum anghilkahim. Jiawul ash wa pi ap hab e wua am chum s-behimkch g Mosesbad mat am i muh. Kush ihtha Michael am s-tha'ith ch wabshaba pi s-ko'okam has ahg ch hab hi wabsh kaij, “Jiosh at wo wa'i s-m-keh'el heg hekaj.”
65001010	Sh wabshaba hegam s-chu i'attomkam nahnko ahg mo haschu i pi amichuth ch hab wua mo haschu i tatchua hab masma mo g mischini ha'ichu thoakam ch hab masma e uamhun.
65001011	Jiosh at s-ko'okam wo ha namkith no pi pi ab hu wohog elith. Heki o hu mash wa hema d Cain ch mua g e-wehnag. Kush eda g wehngaj d s-ap'ekam. K ihtham s-chu i'attomkam am hab wa'ap e wua. Hema ash wa d Balaam ch am ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga heg wabsh hekaj mat wo ui g lial. K ihtham s-chu i'attomkam hab wa'ap e wua. Hema ash wa d Kora ch ab wui kehk g Jiosh. K ihtham s-chu i'attomkam hab wa'ap e wua. T heg hekaj g Jiosh im hu hab wo i ha juh ab e amjed.
65001012	Kah ani mash ihtham s-chu i'attomkam am em-wehm e gegosith ch am chum em-uamhun. Neh, pi at am hu wo i em-wehmajk g chewagi matp gm hu wabsh wo wi'ichkwua k pi wo ha juh. T hab wa masma pi am hu wo i em-wehmajk ihtham mo wabsh hejel i e chegito. Neh, t wabsh wo e huhp g ha'ichu babhetham uhs matp pi ab hu wo ha babheth mat eda wo chum e ai mat ab wo bai. Kut ihtham s-chu i'attomkam hab wa masma wabsh wo huhug no pi pi sha'i e chehgith g ha'ichu s-ap'ekam ab ha amjed.
65001013	S-ta edam ha'ichu ash am wabsh e chehgith ab ha amjed hab masma mo g totshagi am e chehgith an shuhthagi hugith an. Ihtham o wabsh pi thotholima ch ab aihim mat g Jiosh gm hu wo ha shul ge'e s-chuhugam k ed.
65001014	Tsh wabshaba g Jiosh heki hu hema tashogi mat has wo ha juh. Sh ith hab chehgig Enoc ch d wosmdaj hegai mash g woskaj wosk d si wehpeg o'othham. Sh g Jiosh hab ahg mat wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat ab wo i hih g Jiosh mat wehs wo ha lothait k s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mo pi tatchua ch has ahg ch hab wua g pi ap'ekam. T wehst-mahm mihl anghil ab wo i oi.
65001016	Ihtham s-chu i'attomkam o chum hekith a'aga g pi e-ap'ethag ch hab wua g pi ap e-tatchui. Ge o e hahaschuth ch hab wabsh e wua mo ab ha'i si ha haha'ichuchuth mat hekaj ab aigo wo si ha haha'ichuch.
65001017	Am g wo s-chegitok mo haschu i em-ahgith hegam mo d chuhchaij g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
65001018	Bo wa kaij ab em-wui, “Am at ha'i wo i wuwha em-shahgith mo eda e aihim g si ha oithch tash k hab wabsh wo junihith g hejel e-tatchui ch wo nahnko em-ahgath.”
65001019	T am wo tashok mo ihtham pi sha'i e thagitokch am wui g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag no pi am hab junihim g hejel e-tatchui ch hab chum em-wua mamt ab a'ai e wui wo gegokiwua.
65001020	Tho si hekia s-ap'ekam g t-wohochuthadag. Kumt heg ab ba'ich i s-wihnam wo e u'ukchith. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wo em-mahkchith g gewkthag mamt hekaj am wo neneokath Jiosh wui.
65001021	Mt wabsh chum hekith am wo edak g Jiosh pihk elithadag ch s-e tahtk ch wo nenidath mat g t-kownalig Jesus ab wo i em-wahpki Jiosh kihthag ed mamt hahawa chum hekith an wo ha'ichugk.
65001022	Ab g wo i s-ha ho'ige'ith hegam mo pi mahch mas haschu wo s-wohoch
65001023	k am wo i ha ahgi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. T hab wo e tho'ibia ab i s-wohochuthk. Kumt wabshaba wo s-e nen'oithk mo haschu pi ap hab wua mamt ahpim hab wa'ap pi heg hekaj wo e uamhu.
65001024	Ab att wo si has elithath g Jiosh nat pi g alithaj Jesus Christ t-tho'ibia k d t-kownalig. Jiosh o si s-gewkthag ch wehs ha'ichu thahm chum hekith. Ab att wo i t-thagito wui. T wo e nako mat wo t-nuhkuth. Kutt pi gm hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed. T am wo i t-wahpki e-kihthag ed. Kutt wo si s-hehgigk ch ab wo si has elithath chum hekith.
66001001	Hemu at am i tashogi g Jesus Christ hegai matsh haschu am hab wo e juh pi sha'i mehk i'ajed. Jiosh ash am ahgith matsh am wo t-chehgi ahchim mach d piongaj. Tki heg am hema i kei g anghil. T ith am ni-chehgi ahni John mani d piongaj g Jesus Christ.
66001002	Kuni ia o'ohan hegai mani haschu i neith. Ihtha ni-o'ohana o d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch d hegai wohokam mat am i maskogi g Jesus.
66001003	Jiosh at wo wa s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mat am wo i ne'okchul ch hegam mat ab wo kaihamath. E ash aihim mat am hab wo e juh wehs ihtha gm hu ba'ich ha'ichu ahga mant in wo o'oha.
66001004	Am ant wo i em-o'ohani ahpim wewa'ak thakam Jesus Christ ihmtham am Asia chekshani ch ed. Ab at wo wa ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'ithath ch ab ba'ich wo i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam g t-ohg Jiosh ch Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch Jesus Christ. T-ohg Jiosh o chum hekith an ha'ichug. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am wehmaj ch wewa'ak masma e chehgithch am t-wehhejed. K g Jesus Christ si s-ap am i t-tashogith g wohokam ch d hegai mat si wehpeg ab uhpam s-ap i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed k am hahawa ha thahm g wehs kokownal ith thahm jewed. Ab o si t-tatchua ch heg hekaj e muhkith t-wehhejed k t-tho'ibia ab pi ap t-chu'ichig amjed
66001006	k hab t-juh mach d hahawa piongaj g t-ohg Jiosh ch am wo i ahgahith g ha'ichu ahgaj. Jesus Christ o wehs u'ukch g gewkthag. Kutt ab wo ihmath chum hekith.
66001007	Neh, e o aihim mat ep wo jiwia ab thahm kahchim amjed. Wehs hemajkam at wo neithath, chum wa hegam mat ab sisish kots t ab. Wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam at wo shoshani heg hekaj.
66001008	T-kownalig Jiosh o wehs u'ukch g gewkthag ch hab kaij, “Ahni ani d alpha ch d omega.” Ihtham o d si wehpeg ch si oithchkam o'ohana. K hab ahg g Jiosh mo si wehpeg an ha'ichug ch si ha oithch an wabsh wo kia ha'ichugk.
66001009	Thani em-wehm wohochuththam ahni John nach pi ab t-hemakochuthch g Jesus Christ wehm. Ni am em-wehm ap'ethag Jiosh kownaltalig ed ch hekaj em-wehm ni-sho'igchuth. An amt ni-wua heg ab al sikod jewed mo hab chehgig Patmos ch am ha'ichug shuhthagi ch ed nani wa pi si s-gewkam ahgahim g Jiosh ne'oki ch hegai wohokam mat g Jesus am i tashogi.
66001010	K am hu hebai d thomig tash. Ni ab ihm g Jiosh. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am si i ni-wehmaj. Kuni kah mat ab hema si s-kaitham neo ab ni-wehgaj k hab sha kaithag mat g kuikud ab ku
66001011	k hab kaij, “An g o'ohan mapt haschu wo i nei k am haha wo ha cheha mat am wo i bei ihtha o'ohana hegam ha wui wewa'ak thakam Jesus ihmtham amai Ephesus t am ch Smyrna t am ch Pergamum t am ch Thyatira t am ch Sardis t am ch Philadelphia t am ch amai Laodicea t am.”
66001012	Neh, nt ab si sikol i kekiwua mant wo nei mas hedai ab ni-wui neok k haha wabsh nei mo g wewa'ak ohla lalampa an thadha chuhchakud t an.
66001013	K am ha shahgith hema kehk ch hab mahs mo g Jiosh si Kehsha. K g lihwaj gd hu si ais g tahtdaj. K g ohla giwud an hab juhkch e bahsho.
66001014	K g mo'oj si s-tohta hab masma mo g s-wihs gew. K g wuhpuij si s-masma tonod hab masma mo g s-toni nahtha.
66001015	K g tahtdaj si s-wegima tonod hab masma mo g kohwli hahgig. K g ne'okij hab masma hab kaithag mo g si ge'e shuhthagi an med.
66001016	Ith o an u'ukch g wewa'ak huhu'u s-apko e-nowi ed ch an kamshch g is-pahyo. K ith ab i wuhshanis chinij ab. K g wuhioshaj sha'i si tonod hab masma mo g tash tonlig thahm juhk.
66001017	Kunt am i neithok ab i gei wecho hab sha masma mo g muhki. Kut an ni-tahtam k hab kaij, “Pi g am sha'i ni-ehbenith. Thani ahni mani si wehpeg ia ha'ichug ch chum hekith ia wo ha'ichugk.
66001018	Am ant wa chum ni-muhkith k uhpam ep ni-chegito k chum hekith d haha wo thoakamk. Am ani thahm gewkthag g muhkig ch am thahm gewkthag amai mo am ha'ichug g ko'i.
66001019	“Pegih, am g o'ohan map haschu i neith mat hab wo e juh hemu ch haschu hab wo e juh imhab i thahm.
66001020	Am ant wo m-ahgi g s-a'agi ha'ichu ab amjed ihtham wewa'ak huhu'u mani in u'ukch ch ihtham wewa'ak lalampa. Ihtham wewa'ak lalampa o d hegam ni-ihmtham mo am kihthag hegam ha eda wewa'ak kihhim. K ihtham wewa'ak huhu'u o d ha-wanimedtham.”
66002001	K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab ni-ihm ch am kihthag Ephesus t am. Ihtha ha wanimedtham at am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga ahni mani an ha u'ukch g s-apkojed ni-nowikaj g wewa'ak huhu'u ch an oimmed ha shahgith g wewa'ak lalampa.
66002002	S-mahch ani mam haschu hab junihim. S-ap am chikpan ch am wabsh s-e bahbgi ch pi ab hu sha'i ha bahbgi hegam mo ab ni-wui gegok. Ha'i o hab chum kaij mo d ni-chuhchai. Kumt eda ha a'appem k s-mai mo d wabsh s-chu i'attomkam.
66002003	Ab amt s-bahbagi nako g sho'igthag ni-wehhejed k pi sha'i ha'asa.
66002004	“Neh, ith o s-ta hohho'ithama. K wabshaba ha'ichu pi ta hohho'ithama ab em-ab. Pi am ab hu ni-tatchua hemuch hab masma mam wa gd hu i heki hu.
66002005	Am g wo i oithahim mamt he'esko i e mehkoth ab ni-amjed k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi mamt hab ep wo masmak mam wa heki hu. Mtp sha pi gawul wo i e juh, nt gm hu wo i bei g em-tonligga.
66002006	Ith am hi wa s-ap am hab junihim mam si pi hohho'ith mo haschu s-ta edam hab junihim hegam mo am oith g Nicolas. Ith o wa chum pi apko ha wanimed g Jiosh hemajkamga. Ahni ani hab wa'ap si pi hohho'ith ihtha.
66002007	“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath. “Ab ant wo ha mah hegam mat gewito g pi ap'ekam g ap'ethag mat ab wo huh g bahidaj hegai uhs mo ab ha mahk g thoakag ch am kehk Jiosh oithag ed.”
66002008	K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag Smyrna t am. Ith at am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga ahni mani si wehpeg ia ha'ichug ch si ha oithch ia wabsh wo kia ha'ichugk, ahni mant muh k ep i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed.
66002009	S-mahch ani mam e kudut. Tham hi wa chum sho'igkam iia ch wabshaba d s-kakais am Jiosh tahgio. S-mahch ani mo ha'i si pi ap has em-ahg g Tutuligo. Ihtham o hab e elith mo d Jiosh hemajkamga ch eda wa chum pi woho no pi d wabsh Jiawul hemajkamga.
66002010	“Pi g am wo sha'i ehbithath mamtp haschu i s-ko'ok ab wo nako. Neh, mt wo em-kuh. K wabshaba d wabsh Jiawul chi'oitha ihtha. Kut am wa'i wehst-mahm tash hab wo mahsk ihtha em-kudutadag. Am amt wo hihimath e-wohochuthadag oithch am hugkam mamt hekith wo i koi. Kunt ab wo em-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hab masma mamt g gihko wo mah hegai mat wo ha gewito.
66002011	“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath. “Hegam mat wo gewito g pi ap'ekam at pi wo ai g gokkokam muhkig.”
66002012	K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag Pergamum t am. T ith am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga ahni mo g ni-is-pahyo ge a'aijed mu'ukasig.
66002013	S-mahch ani mo g Jiawul himthag si s-gewkthag amai. M eda ab wabsh kia s-ni-mahch ch e ahg. Hegai mo d Antipas ch ab si s-ni-wohokamchuth at wa e muhkith amai. Kumt eda wa pi sha'i ni-thagito.
66002014	“K wabshaba am ha'ichu d hegai mani pi hoho'ith am em-shahgith. Am o ha'i em-wehmaj ch am hab wua hegai mat wa haschu ha mashcha g Tutuligo ihtham Balaambad ch Balakbad. Ihtham at wa ha mashcha mat wo huh hegai ha'ichu hugi mo wa ab e to'ith g ha-jijoshchutha ch ehp mat hab wo wuath g s-tohntom ha'ichu. Ith o wehs d pi ap'ekam am ni-tahgio.
66002015	Am o ha'i ep em-wehmaj mo g Nicolas mashchama ab s-wohochuth.
66002016	Gam g hu wo s-ohhoth ihtha pi ap'ekam. Nt wo em-cheggia heg hekaj is-pahyo mo ab i wuhshanis ni-chini amjed mamtp pi am hu wo i e ap'ech.
66002017	“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath. “Ab ant wo ha mah hegam mat wo gewito g pi ap'ekam hegai pi ta behima ha'ichu hugi mo hab e a'aga ‘manna.’ Ab ant ep wo i ha mahkhi ihtham g s-toa Hothai. T hegam ha ab an wo o'ohanask g wechij chehgig. T hegam wo wa'i hehe'ejel s-mahchk g chehgig mat hedai i bei.”
66002018	K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag Thyatira t am. T ith am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ni-ahga ahni Jiosh alithag mo g ni-wuhpui hab masma tonod mo g nahtha. K g ni-tahtad hab masma tohonnod mo g thahpiunas kohwli.
66002019	S-mahch ani g s-ap'ekam em-chikpan, pihk em-elithadag, em-wohochuthadag ch em-hemajimathadag ch em-bahbgithadag. Ba'ich am hab i e junihim ia'i ithani.
66002020	“K wabshaba am ha'ichu d hegai mani pi hohho'ith am em-shahgith. Am am wabsh hiwgith hegai uwi mo e wepogith g Jezebelbad ch hab e a'aga mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Ith o ha mashcham g ni-ihmtham mat am hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ha'ichu ab a'ai e wehm ch ep wo ko'ath hegai ha'ichu hugi mo ab e to'ith g ha-jijoshchutha.
66002021	Ab ant wa he'es i mah g tash mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. K wabshaba pi hohho'ith mat wo thagito g pi ap'ekam.
66002022	Kunt heg hekaj hab wo juh mat wo mumku k wo wo'iwua. T hegam chechoj mo am wehmaj wohppo am wehmaj ep wo e sho'igch. S-hohtam ant hab wo juh ihtha heg hi wa matp gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.
66002023	Nt wo ha koktha g mahmdaj mat wehs g ni-ihmtham wo s-mai mani s-mahch g hemajkam ha-chegitoithag ch ha-tatchuithag. Ab ant wo em-namkith heg hekaj mam haschu has i junihim.
66002024	“Ha'ijj ahpim Thyatira t am hemajkam amt pi am hu i oi ihtha pi ap'ekam mashchamadag k pi mai hegai mo ha'ijj hab a'aga ‘Jiawul si s-juhk s-a'agi ha'ichu.’ Pi ant ab hu ba'ich ha'ichu s-wehch wo em-mohto'i.
66002025	Mt wabshaba hemho wa wo s-wihnam u'ukchith hegai mam haschu i edgith ch ab wo ai mant wo uhpam jiwia.
66002026	“Ni-ohg Jiosh at ab ni-mah g gewkthag mant wehs s-gewkam wo ha thahmkath g jejewed ch wo ha padch g pi ap'ekam kokownaltalig. Kunt ab wo ha mah ihtha gewkthag hegam mat wo gewito g pi ap'ekam k am hab wo junihith g ni-tatchui ch ab wo ai mant ep wo jiwia. T am ni-wehm wo ha thahmkath g jejewed. Kut am ha wehhejed wo mahsi g ho'ige'ithadag hab masma mat g s-mahs hu'u.
66002029	“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath.”
66003001	K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag Sardis t am. T heg am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga ahni mani an u'ukch g wewa'ak huhu'u ch am kehshch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wewa'ak masma wo e chehgithath em-wehhejed. S-mahch ani mam has chu'ig. Bam em-elith mam d s-ap'ekam. Mt eda e mehkoth ab ni-amjed.
66003002	Neh, mt ab wo i nehnen k ab wo i gewkai hegai mam haschu wabsh kia edgith mat koi wo s-ap muh. Pi o hohho'ith g Jiosh hegai mam haschu am hab junihim.
66003003	Am g wo s-chegitok mam wa haschu ab em-mashcham k ab wo i s-wohog elith k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. Kumtp pi wo sha nehnen, nt s-a'agi ia wo jiwia hab sha masma mo g s-chu ehskam. Kumt pi wo sha'i mahchk g ohla mant hekith wo i jiwia.
66003004	“Ha'ijj ahpim amai Sardis t am am hi wa si e nuhkuth mat pi ha'ichu wo em-uamhu. Ahpim mam s-ap am hab e junihim amt ni-wehm wo himath s-tohtam e enithadathch.
66003005	Hegam mat hedai wo gewito g pi ap'ekam at s-tohtam wo e enigadath. An o o'ohadag g ha-chechgig an thahm kahchim ch ed mo d e tho'ibiakam. Kunt pi wo sha'i oa g ha chechgig k wabshaba hab wo chei am tahgio g ni-ohg Jiosh ch am ha tahgio g anghiligaj mo d ni-hemajkamga.
66003006	“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath.”
66003007	K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag Philadelphia t am. T heg am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga ahni mani d hekia s-ap'ekam ch d wohokam ch an u'ukch g Davidbad yahwi. Ith ani hekaj ha'ichu kukpi'ok. T pi hedai wo e nako mas ab ep wo kuh. Kuni ha'ichu kukpa. T pi hedai wo e nako mas ab ep wo kuhpi'o.
66003008	S-mahch ani mam pi am hu i si s-gewpkthag ch wabshaba am oithch hab e junihim g ni-mashchama ch ab si ni-hiwig. Ab ant i hema kuhpi'o g kihjeg em-wehhejed. T pi hedai wo e nako mas ab ep wo kuh.
66003009	“Ha'i o hab e a'aga mo d Tutuligo ch d Jiosh hemajkamga. K eda hab chu'ig mo d wabsh Jiawul hemajkamga. Bant wo ha juh mat ab wo i hihi em-wui k ab wo i shulig k ab wo si has i em-el. T wo wehsijj s-mai mani ahpim ab si em-tatchua.
66003010	“Am am hab junihim g ni-chehanig ch s-bahbgim ab nakog ha'ichu. Nt heg hekaj wo em-nuhkuth heg amjed kudutadag mo ab him ha wui g wehs hemajkam mat am wo ha a'appe wehs jewed shuhthgim.
66003011	S-hohtam ant wo jiwia. Am g wo si nuhkuth hegai mani ab em-mahkch. T hab pi hedai wo sha'i em-wohppo'i hegai mani ab em-makiog hahawa.
66003012	“Bant wo ha juh hegam mat wo gewito g pi ap'ekam mat d wo u'ugchuk am Jiosh kihthag ed hab sha masma mo g che-tondag am ge'e cheopi ed. Kut ihtham pi hekith wo sha'i thagito g Jiosh kihthag. An ant ha ab wo o'oha g ni-Jioshga chehgig ch g Jiosh kihhim chehgig. Jiosh kihhim o d Wechij Jerusalem ch ab wo i hud Jiosh amjed an thahm kahchim ch ed. Ab ant ha ab ep wo o'oha g ni-wechij chehgig.
66003013	“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath.”
66003014	K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag Laodicea t am. T heg am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga ahni mani s-ap wohokamchuth g wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh ch am wehs thahm g Jiosh nahtoi.
66003015	S-mahch ani mam has chu'ig. Bam chum e elith mam s-ap ab ihm g Jiosh. Kum eda pi am hu woho i e thagitokch wui.
66003016	Nt heg hekaj gm hu hab wo i em-juh ab ni-amjed hab sha masma mamt gm hu wo wiho g wabsh s-huhk wasib.
66003017	Bam chech'e mo am wabsh i s-em-ap'e ha'ichu nam pi d s-kakais ch hab ep chech'e mam pi ha'ichu ep sha'i tatchua. Ni wabshaba em-ahgith mam si sho'ig ch s-ta ho'ige'ithama ch gm wabsh i s-thathpk ch pi nenea.
66003018	Ab g wo i e thagito ni-wui k hab masma wo edagi g s-wohom kaisthag ch s-kehg wehschuga ch kulani am wehhejed g em-wuhpui. Kumt hahawa pi wo sho'igk ch pi wo s-thathpk ch wo s-neneak.
66003019	Ha'ichu ani shohbith ch ha gewittan hegam mani ab si ha tatchua mat hekaj gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.
66003020	“Neh, ab ani em-waith ni-wui. K heg wa wepo mani ab kehk em-kihjeg ab ch ab shontpag ch ab em-chehcheg. Kumt wo kah mani ab neok k wo i kuhpi'o g kihjeg. Nt ab wo i wah. Kutt ab a'ai wo t-ihmath ch t-wehm wo si s-hehgigk hab masma matt hems wo t-wehm t-gegosithath.
66003021	Ni-ohg Jiosh at an ni-thai e-hugith an kownal ni-thaikud an nant pi gewito g pi ap'ekam. Kunt ahni am hab wa'ap wo em-thai ni-hugith an kownal thaikud t ab mamtp hedai wo gewito g pi ap'ekam.
66003022	“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath.”
66004001	Ab ant hahawa i nen k ha'ichu ep neith. Am ni-tahgio o hab sha mahs mo ab kuhpi'okas g thahm kahchim hab sha masma mo ab ge kihjeg. Kuni ep kah g ne'okij g Jesus. K hab sha kaithag mo g kuikud ch hab kaij ab ni-wui, “Ab g i hihm. Nt am wo m-chehgi mat haschu hemho wa am hab wo e juh i'ajed imhab.”
66004002	T ha hekaj ab si i ni-wehmt g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K shahag wepo mat g thahm kahchim am e chehgi ni-wui. Kuki g ge'e kownal thaikud ab kehk. K an hema thaha ith ab.
66004003	K g wuhioshaj wabsh tonod hab masma mo hegam si s-kehg hohothai mo hab e a'aga ‘jasper’ ch ‘carnelian.’ K an kownal thaikud wehgaj hab chu'ig g kiohod. K ith s-chehthagi hab masma mo hegai s-kehg hothai mo hab e a'aga ‘emerald.’
66004004	Kuki an wehgaj hab ep chu'ig g gokko gamai gi'ik kownal thathaikud. Kuki an ha ab thadha g gokko gamai gi'ik ge'eged ch s-tohtakaj e enigadathch ch g ohla gigiko ab wahpkch.
66004005	Kuki ab ge'e kownal thaikud amjed ab si memhe g wepgi. Kuki ab toahim g tataniki. Kuki g wewa'ak kuhchki am memeihim ba'ich g ge'e kownal thaikud no pi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wewa'ak masma e chehgithch am t-wehhejed.
66004006	Am ba'ich g ge'e kownal thaikud oki sha'i si s-thahpk ch hab masma mo g mi-lihtha am tadani ch am wabsh gai tonod. An wehgaj g kownal thaikud oki an a'ai gegok g gi'ik ha'ichu thothakam ch wehsko wuhpui.
66004007	K hema hab sha mahs mo g mawith. K hema hab ep mahs mo g wisilo. K hema g wuhioshaj hab mahs mo g o'othham wuhiosha. K hema hab mahs mo g ba'ag ch an tha'a.
66004008	K wehsijj ihtham chuhthp a'an. K g ha-a'an wehsko wuhpui. K chum hekith ne'e hab masma: “Ab ach si has elith g t-kownalig Jiosh. Tho si hekia s-ap'ekam ch si s-gewkthag ch chum hekith an ha'ichug.”
66004009	Kuki am ne'e ihtham gi'ik ha'ichu thothakam ch ab mahk g has elitha ch ho'ige'elig hegai mo chum hekith an ha'ichug ch an tha kownal thaikud t an.
66004010	K heg wui ab hab wa'ap i shuhullig hegam ge'eged ch am wuashulig g e-gigiko ch am wecho shuhullig ch ab ihm ch hab chech'e:
66004011	“T-kownalig Jiosh, ab ap ap'ethag matt ab wo si m-hehgchulithath ch ab wo si has m-elithath nap pi wehs s-gewkthag ch wehs ha'ichu nahto. K hab d m-elitha mo in hab chu'ig.”
66005001	Ni haha wabsh neith. Kuki an u'ukch g holiwek o'ohana s-apkojed e-nowi ed hegai mo an tha kownal thaikud t an. K wehsko o'ohanas ab ab ihtha ch wewa'akpa ab si bithshpi ch cheposithas.
66005002	Neith ani ehp g si s-gewk anghil. K heg si s-kaitham amog ch hab kaij, “Thoh'o am hugkam ap'ethag mat wo e nako mat wo wantsh g chechposig k ab wo i kuhpi'o ihtha o'ohana?”
66005003	T wabshaba pi hedai e cheh an thahm kahchim ch ed ch in jewed thahm ch am jewed wecho mat wo e nakog k wo kuhpi'o k an wo i nei eda g o'ohana.
66005004	Ni heg hekaj si pi ap ni-tahtk ch shoak.
66005005	K hab hahawa kaij hema hegam ge'eged ab ni-wui, “Pi g am shoakath. Neh, Mawith Namkam at gewito g pi ap'ekam k hab wo e nako mat wo wantsh g wewa'ak chechposig k ab wo i kuhpi'o g holiwek o'ohana. Bo masma hab chu'ig mo hab masma o'ohadag mo ith ab d Judabad amjedkam ch d ep Davidbad amjedkam.”
66005006	Kuni hahawa neith hegai moki hab ahg. K eda ihtha Mawith Namkam hab masma ab i e chehgithch mo g kahwal mad ch atki heki hu e muhkith k ithani am kehk si eda g kownal thaikud. K an wehgaj gegok hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thothakam ch hegam ge'eged. K hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch wewa'ak a'ag ch wewa'ak wuhpui. Ihtham wewa'ak wuhpui o hab d ahga mat ab amjed i hih g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag k an wehsko neith ch nuhkuth g Jiosh nahtoi.
66005007	T am hih hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch k am bei g holiwek o'ohana ab s-apko nowij ab hegai mo ab tha kownal thaikud t ab.
66005008	T ha hekaj ab wui i shul hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ch hegam gokko gamai gi'ik ge'eged. K ihtham wehsijj ge ahlipa ch ohla hohas-haha'a. K hegam ha eda hohas-haha'a s-ap uhw shuhthagi ch ith d ha-ho'ige'ithahuna g Jiosh hemajkamga.
66005009	K am hema a'aga g wechij ne'i. K g ha-ne'i hab chu'ig: “Ahpi ap ge'e ap'ethag mapt wo e nakog k am wo bei g holiwek o'ohana k wo wantsh g chechposigaj napt pi e muhkith k hekaj ab uhpam i ha ui g hemajkam am wehhejed g Jiosh. K g m-u'i d wehsko thakam hemajkam ch d nahnko kaitham neneoktham ab wehs jejewed ha amjed.
66005010	Bapt ha juh mat wehs d wo papalk ch ab wo ihmath g Jiosh ch d wo kokownalk wehsko jewed thahm.”
66005011	Nt am hahawa nea k ha kah mu'i mihl anghil. Ihtham o an wehgaj gegok g ge'e kownal thaikud am ha wehm hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ch hegam ge'eged
66005012	ch si s-kaitham ne'e hab masma: “Hegai mat kahwalkaj e muhkith o ab ab ulini mamt am wo i kei wehs ha'ichu thahm k ab wehs wo mah g s-kaisthag ch ha'ichu amichuthadag ch gewkthag ch ab has elithadag ch hehgchulithadag ch ho'ige'ithadag.”
66005013	Kuni ha kah g wehs ha'ichu thoakam an thahm kahchim ch ed ch an jewed thahm ch am jewed wecho ch am ge'e kahchki ch ed. Wehs ihtham o am ne'e hab masma: “Tho ha wuikam g Jiosh heg wehm mat kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch mamb ab wo si pihk e elithath ha wui ch ab wo si has ha elithath ch ab wo ha hehgchulithath ch ab ha wui wo thagitokchith g e-gewkthag chum hekith.”
66005014	Tki hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ab wohokamchuth k hab kaij, “Am o wa woho ihtha.” T g ge'eged ab i shul wecho k ab si ihm.
66006001	Ni ab neith hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kutki hema gam wantsh hegam wewa'ak chechposig. K hema hab kaij hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam, “Ab g i hihm.”
66006002	K g ne'okij hab sha kaithag mo g tataniki. Nt hahawa ep chum nei. Tki g s-toa kawyu am hema i wuhsh. Kuki ab hema cheshaj ch g gaht u'a. Mt g gihko an hab juh mo'oj an. Ge oki gewkthag ch am i wuhsh mat wo ha gewito g hemajkam.
66006003	Kutki am hahawa ab kuhpi'o g gokkokam cheposig hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kuni kah g gokkokam ha'ichu thoakam. K hab kaij, “Ab g i hihm.”
66006004	Tki ab hema ep i wuhsh g kawyu k ge s-wegi. K ab hema cheshaj. Kumt ab mah g gewkthag mat hab wo juh g cheggiadag an jewed thahm mat g hemajkam wo a'ai e koktha. Kumt g ge'e is-pahyo ab mah.
66006005	Tki ab hahawa i kuhpi'o g waikkokam cheposig hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kuni kah g waikkokam ha'ichu thoakam. K hab kaij, “Ab g i hihm.” Nt chum nei. T g s-chuk kawyu ab i wuhsh. K hema cheshaj ch g pisaltakud u'a.
66006006	K am hema neok ab ha shahgith hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ch hab kaij, “T wo si s-namkigk g ha'ichu hugi. Mt chum hems wo ha namkith g e-nahtoi am chikpank hemako tashkaj mamt wo ha nolawt g al hemako s-wehch pilkani o g waik s-wehch si-wahyo. Mt wabshaba pi wo shohbi g manjeki ch nawait.”
66006007	Tki gam hahawa wantsh k kuhpi'o g gi'ikkokam cheposig hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Ni kah g gi'ikkokam ha'ichu thoakam. K hab kaij, “I hihm.”
66006008	Nt ab i chum nei. Tki g s-kohmagi kawyu ab i wuhsh. Kuki hema cheshaj ch hab chehgig Muhki. Kuki ab si mia oithch him hegai mash hab e a'aga Jiawul Kih. Mtki ihtham ab ha mah g gewkthag am thahm g hemako tahpani mo gi'ikko e tahpanch (¼) ihtha jewed. Kutki ha koktha cheggiadag ch ed ch g bihugigkaj ch mumkithagkaj. Tki g mischini ha'ichu thoakam hab wa'ap ha'i wo ha koktha.
66006009	Tki gam hahawa ep wantsh k kuhpi'o g hetaspokam cheposig hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kuni neith ab wecho g iagchulithakud g ha-thothakag hegam matki e ko'ij heg hekaj mo am ahgahim g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch pi sha'i thagito g ha'ichu e ahga.
66006010	Ihtham o si s-kaitham hihnk ch hab kaij, “Si s-gewkam kownal ch si s-ap'ekam ch si s-wohokam, he'es at wo i tashk mapt haha wo ha lothai g hemajkam an jewed thahm k ab wo ha mah g s-ko'ok namkithadag heg hekaj mat t-koktha?”
66006011	Mt ab hahawa wehsijj i ha mahkhi g s-tohta liliwa k hab ha ahg mat wo sha'al ba'ich i e uh'ulinihogith k ab wo ai mat wehs wo e ko'ij hegam ha wehm pion ch ha-wepnag mat ha wepo masma wo e ko'ij.
66006012	Tki gam hahawa ep wantsh k kuhpi'o g chuhthpokam cheposig hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Tki am sha'i si u'ugij g jewed. Kutki g tash ge chuku hab masma mo g s-kowk s-chuk ikus. Kutki g mashath wehsko ge wegih hab masma mo g eh'ed.
66006013	Tki g huhu'u i shul ab thahm kahchim amjed an jewed thahm hab sha masma mat g pi bakam suhna wo i shul ab e-jehj amjed mat g s-gewk hewel wo si u'ugij.
66006014	Tki g thahm kahchim ab wabsh i huhug hab sha masma mat g tapial wo i e holiwkath k gd hu wo e cheh. Tki wehs g thohtha'ag ch g al si'iskod jejewed am shuhthagi ch ed gm hu gawulko i e uh'ul.
66006015	Ni ha neith matki wehs chum e e'esto g hemajkam, chum hems g kokownal ch si s-has haha'ichu ch shonthal ha-ge'ege'ejig ch s-gewpkkam ch hegam ehp mo d sho'igkam ch hegam mo d nenehol. Am atki chum e e'esto chehcho ch ed ch am hohothai wepcho
66006016	ch ab si hihnk thohtha'ag ch hohothai wui hab kaijch, “Ab g wo i shulig t-thahm mat pi wo t-neithath g Jiosh. Oi g wo t-e'esto ab amjed hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch mat pi wo s-ko'okam t-namkith.
66006017	E o aihim g lothaita tash. Kutt pi wo sha'i t-nako matt ab wui wo gegokiwua.”
66007001	Ntki haha wabsh ha nei g gi'ik anghil. K hema ab kehk si'alig tahgio ch hema ab huduni tahgio ch hema ab wakolim tahgio k ch hema ab juhpin tahgio. Kuki ihtham an u'ukch g gi'ik hewel mat pi an hu wo hewedath jewed thahm o an kahchki thahm. Kuki gm hu wabsh i pi hoini wehs ha'ichu.
66007002	Kuni hahawa hema ep neith g anghil. Kuki ith ab him si'al wecho amjed ch g Jiosh cheposithakud u'a. Kuki eda ab mahks hegam gi'ik mat wo padch g jewed ch kahchki. K wabshaba ihtha hema ab ha wui hab kaij.
66007003	“Pi g am s-ko'okam has wo juhni g jewed ch kahchki ch kukui. Kutt ab ho'ip kia ha chepos g Jiosh pionag ab ha-koka ab.”
66007004	Kuni kah mash d siant gi'ikko wehst-mahm gamai gi'ik mihl (144,000) hegam mamt ha chepos heg hekaj Jiosh cheposithakud.
66007005	Am o ha'ichug g gamai gohk mihl (12,000) ab wehsijj i ha amjed g t-shohshonbad. Ihtham o wa d gamai gohk ch wa hab chechgig Judah, Reuben, Gad,
66007006	Asher, Naphtali, Manasseh,
66007007	Simeon, Levi, Issachar,
66007008	Zebulun, Joseph, Benjamin.
66007009	Ntki hahawa ep ha nei moki am sha'i si ge'e hemapig hab chu'ig. Kuki pi ta kuintama ihtham hemajkam ch ab amjed g wehsko jejewed ch d nahnko mahs o'othham ch nahnko kaitham neneoktham. Kuki am thaha e-kownal thaikud ab hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kuki hegam mu'i hemajkam am ba'ich gegok ch s-tohtakaj e enigadathch ch g ha'ichu i'ibhonig an uh'ukch
66007010	ch si s-kaitham neneok ch hab kaij: “T-tho'ibiathag o ab amjed g Jiosh ch ab amjed hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.”
66007011	Kuki wehsijj g anghil an ha wehgaj gegok ch am i shulig ch ab ihm g Jiosh ch hab ep kaij:
66007012	“Ab ach si ho'ige'ith ch si hehgchulith g Jiosh no pi wehs edgith g amichuthadag ch gewkthag chum hekith. Amen.”
66007013	Tki hema hegam ge'eged ab ni-kakke k hab kaij, “Thoh'o wud ihtham hemajkam mo s-tohtam e enigadathch ch hebai amjed hihim?”
66007014	Ni hab kaij ab wui, “Pi ani sha'i mahch. Ahpi ap wa s-mahch.” K hab kaij ab ni-wui, “Ihtham o d hegam mat ab s-ap gahi wuwha g si ge'e sho'igchuthadag. Heg o wa wepo mat am i wapko g e-wepschuga heg hekaj eh'edaj hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.
66007015	Heg o hekaj ia gegok Jiosh ba'ich ch ab ihm wehs tashkaj ch s-chuhugam oithk. Kut g Jiosh wo ha nuhkuthath chum hekith.
66007016	Pi at thahm d ep wo bihugkoik o d wo tonkkoik. Pi at hekith ep wo s-tonik ha wehhejed.
66007017	Hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch at wo ha nuhkuthath hab masma mo g kahwal nuhkuththam ch am wo i ha wanim heg wui s-kehg thoakag mo heg wepogithas shonkam shuhthagi. Kut g Jiosh ab wehs wo i oa g ha-oh'og.”
66008001	Tki am hahawa wantsh k kuhpi'o g wewa'akkokam cheposig hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kuki gm hu wabsh i pi shahmuni an thahm kahchim ch ed am hu'i eda hugkam ohla.
66008002	Kuni haha wabsh ha neith hegam wewa'ak anghil moki am gegok Jiosh tahgio. Mtki ihtham ab i ha mahkhi g wewa'ak kukuikud.
66008003	Kuki am kehk g iagchulithakud kownal thaikud ba'ich. Tki heg wui am hema ep jiwia g anghil k g ohla ha'a u'a. Kumtki am eda ge'e to'i g s-ap uhwchu mat ab wo i wehnath g ha-ho'ige'ithalig g Jiosh hemajkamga k am wo iagchul Jiosh wui.
66008004	Kutki g anghil mehi g s-ap uhwchu. Tki g kuhbs ab amjed am uhgk i chesh wehnathk g ha-ho'ige'ithalig g hemajkam.
66008005	Tki am hahawa bei g mehi ab amjed g iagchulithakud heg hekaj ohla ha'a k am iawua jewed thahm. Kutki am sha'i si kop g tataniki k si s-kaithag. Kuki g wepgi an tohonnod ch g jewed si u'ugij.
66008006	Tki hegam wewa'ak anghil mo u'a g wewa'ak kukuikud am i e nako mat wo ku.
66008007	Tki g wehpeg anghil am si kuhu g e-kuikudkaj. Tki g chea ch mehi wehnathch g eh'ed ab i e iawua an thahm g jewed. Kutki hemako tahpani mei g jewed mo waik e tahpanch (⅓). Kutki g kukui hab wa'ap masma ha'as meitto. Tki g washai wehs meitto.
66008008	Tki g gokkokam anghil am hahawa epai kuhu g e-kuikudkaj. Tki am ha'ichu e tha'ich ge shuhthagi ch ed ch hab sha mahs mo g ge ge'e tho'ag ch meihim. Tki hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g ge shuhthagi wabsh e eh'edch.
66008009	Tki ha'akia ep koi g ha'ichu thoakam am ge shuhthagi ch ed ch ha'akia ep wachkk g wapalko am shuhthagi ch ed.
66008010	Tki g waikkokam anghil am hahawa ep ku. Tki g ge'e hu'u ab i gei thahm kahchim t amjed k hab masma meihim mo g kuhchki ch ma'ish g hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g a'akimel ch shohshonkam shuhthagi.
66008011	K hab chehgig ihtha hu'u S-siwkam. Kutki g hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g shuhthagi wabsh ge siwa. Tki mu'i hemajkam koi chum i'ik ihtha shuhthagi no pi si s-siw.
66008012	Tki g gi'ikkokam anghil am hahawa epai kuhu g e-kuikudkaj. Kutki g hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g tash ch mashath ch huhu'u ge chuku. Kutki heg hekaj ha'as huhug g ha-tonlig ch ha'as tash pi tonod tash oitham ch chuhug oitham.
66008013	Nt am hahawa ep i nen k kah. Kuki si s-kaitham hab kaij g ba'ag an uhgk tha'athch, “Eh, si s-ta ehbithama! That wo si s-ta ehbithamak am ha wehhejed hegam mo an kih jewed thahm mat ab wo kaitha g kuikud ab ha amjed hegam waik anghil mat am ep wo kuhk.”
66009001	Tki am hahawa ep kuhu g hetaspokam anghil g e-kuikudkaj. Kuni neith g hu'u. Tki ith am gei jewed thahm ab thahm kahchim t amjed. Kumtki ab mah hegai yahwi mo heg d wuikam wag mo pi hebai hug.
66009002	Kutki ihtha hu'u am kuhpi'o hegai wag. Tki g kuhbs hab masma ab i wuhsh mo ab amjed g si ge'e nahthakud. Kutki g tash tonlig wabsh wehsko chuku heg hekaj kuhbs ab amjed g wag.
66009003	Tki g ge'eged shosh'o ab i huhud amjed g kuhbs an thahm g jewed. Kumtki ab ha mah g gewkthag mat s-ko'okam wo ha juh hab masma mo g nanakshel.
66009004	Kum hab ha ahg mat pi wo ko'okam has juh g washai ch kukui ch wehs ha'ichu wuhshanig. Hegam atsh wo wa'i s-ko'okam has ha juh hemajkam mo pi ab hu cheposithas e-koka ab heg hekaj Jiosh cheposithakud.
66009005	Kumtki pi ha hiwigi ihtham shosh'o mat wo ha koktha ihtham hemajkam k wabshaba wabsh wo s-ko'okam ha sho'igch hetasp mashath ab. Kuki g s-ko'ok ab amjed g ha-sho'igchutha hab masma s-ko'ok mo g nakshel ke'i.
66009006	Kutki heg oitham hetasp mashath ihtham hemajkam wo chum si s-ko'im k wabshaba pi wo koi.
66009007	Kuki ihtham shosh'o hab mams mo hegam kakawyu mo e hekaj am cheggiadag ch ed. Kuki g ha-mohmi hab mams mo g u'uwi ha-mohmi. K an ha-mohmi an wahpkch g ohla gigiko.
66009008	Kuki g ha-wuhpiosha sha o'othham ha-wuhpiosha mams. Kuki g ha-tahtami hab mams mo g mawith tahtami.
66009009	Kuki g ha-babsho ab ha'ichukaj mam'aishch mo hab sha mams mo g wainomi koktoni. K g ha-a'an hab sha kaithag mo g mu'i cheggiakud kakalit an wohpo mat wo ha cheggia.
66009010	Kuki g ha-bahbhai ch ha-u'ush hab mams mo g nanakshel ha-u'ush. K g e-bahbhaikaj e nakog mat wo s-ko'okam has ha juh g hemajkam hetasp mashath ab.
66009011	Kuki ep ge kownalig. K ith am ha wanimed ch d hegai anghil mo nuhkuth g s-juhk wag ch hab chehgig am t-ne'oki ed Abbadon k ch am Greek ha-ne'oki ed hab chehgig Apollyon. K ith hab d ahga Ha'ichu Padchuththam.
66009012	Tki am i huhug ihtha wehpeg si s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu. K ith i thahm matki am hab ep wo e juh g gohk si s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu.
66009013	Tki g chuhthpokam anghil am hahawa epai kuhu g e-kuikudkaj. Kuni kah mo ab hema neok ab chuhchpulij amjed hegai ohla iagchulithakud mo am kehk ba'ich g Jiosh.
66009014	K hegai mo ab neok hab kaij heg wui anghil mo d chuhthpokam ch an u'ukch g kuikud, “Ha g thagito hegam gi'ik anghil mo am e wupulshch heg bahsho akimel mo hab chehgig Euphrates.”
66009015	Mtki am i ha thagito ihtham gi'ik anghil. Ihtham oki wa e nahtokch ith si wehhejed ohla ith si tash ed ith si mashath ab ch ith si ahithag ed mat wo ha koktha g hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch wehs hemajkam.
66009016	Kum am ni-ahgith mash d gohk siant mi-yohn (200,000,000) ihtham mo g kakawyu ha chehchejch.
66009017	Kuni am ni-tahgio neith g kakawyu ch hegam mo ha chehchejch. Kuki g ha-wainomi koktoni si s-wepegi ch ep s-o'am ch hab masma s-chehethagi mo g thahm kahchim. K g kakawyu ha-mohmi hab mams mo g maipith ha-mohmi. K ab ha-chihchini amjed ab i wuhshani g mei ch kuhbs ch s-uam uhw.
66009018	Tki g hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g hemajkam e ko'ij ith hekaj waik ha'ichu mo ab wuhshani ha-chihchini amjed.
66009019	Kuki ihtham kakawyu hab wa'ap s-gewpkthag am ha bahbhai am. Ha-bahbhai oki hab mams mo g kohk'oi ch ab ge mohmi. K ith hekaj s-ko'okam has ha wua.
66009020	Kutki wabshaba hegam hemajkam mat an wih pi gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chu'ichig k ab wabsh kia ha ihm g jijawul ch ab ep ha ihm g e-jijoshchutha. Kuki eda ihtha pi am hu ha'ichu d i ha-wehmtadag. Ha-jijoshchutha o d wabsh ha'ichu ha-nahtoi ch pi ha'ichu neith ch pi ha'ichu kah ch pi sha'i oiopo no pi d wabsh ohla ch plahtha ch kohwli ch hothai ch uhs.
66009021	Ihtham hemajkam atki pi sha'i thagito g e-mu'adag ch e-hihoina ch ha'ichu ehsig ch hegai mo s-tohntom ha'ichu wua a'ai e wehm.
66010001	Ntki hahawa ab nei matki ab hema i hud g s-gewk anghil ab thahm kahchim amjed. Ith oki g chewagikaj e enigadathch ch g kiohod an hab juhkch e-mo'o an. Kuki g wuhioshaj hab mahs mo g tash. K g kakhioj hab mahs mo g mehi am wuhshanim.
66010002	Ith oki g s-apko e-tadkaj am keishch g ge shuhthagi ch g s-ohgig e-tadkaj am keishch g jewed. Kuki an hab chu'ig g o'ohana nowij ed ch pi holiwkas.
66010003	Kuki am si s-kaitham neok ch hab sha kaithag mo g mawith ab todk. Kutki g wewa'ak tataniki ab hahawa uhpam neneo todkch.
66010004	Nt am haha wabsh wo i chum o'oha. Tki wabshaba ab hema neo thahm kahchim t amjed k hab kaij, “Pi g am hedai sha'i ahgith mo has kaij ihtham wewa'ak tataniki. Pi g an hu sha'i o'ohan.”
66010005	Kutki ihtha anghil mo an thahm kehk g ge kahchki ch jewed ab si uhgk i bei g s-apkojed e-nowi ab thahm kahchim wui
66010006	k hab kaij, “Jiosh o chum hekith an ha'ichug ch nahto g thahm kahchim ch jewed kahchim ch ge kahchki ch wehs ha'ichu mo am ha eda ihtham k hab kaij mat am wa e ai mat ge'e ha'ichu hab wo e juh.
66010007	Wewa'akkokam anghil at am wo kuhu g e-kuikudkaj. T am hab haha wo juh g Jiosh g s-a'agi e-apchutha mo wa am ha ahgith hegam e-pionagbad mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
66010008	Kutki hegai mo wa ab neok ni-wui ab thahm kahchim t amjed ab ep neok k hab kaij, “Neh, an o u'ukch g o'ohana hegai anghil mo an thahm kehk g kahchki ch jewed. Am g hihm k ab beh'i.”
66010009	Nt am hih wui hegai anghil k ab tahni mat wo ni-mah. K hab kaij ab ni-wui, “Ab g be k huhgi. T wo si s-i'owik mapt wo huh ch wabshaba wo siwa am m-wohk ed.”
66010010	Nt ab bei g al o'ohana nowij ab k huh. K s-wohom si s-i'owi mant huh. Nt wabshaba am i bah. T hahawa si siwa am ni-wohk ed.
66010011	Kum ab hahawa ep ni-ahgith ihtha, “Am apt ep wo o'oha g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab ha amjed mu'i nahnko mahs mehk jewed thakam hemajkam ch kokownal ch nahnko kaitham neneoktham.”
66011001	Kumtki ab hahawa hema ni-mah g kuintakud uhs k hab ni-ahg, “I g wuhshani k an kuint g Jiosh cheopiga ch g iagchulithakud k wo ha kuint hegam mo am e ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui amai.
66011002	T wabshaba hegai mo an wehgaj kolhaitas am i e thagito ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam. Pt pi an hu has wo i juh. Ihtham nahnko mahs hemajkam at wo kehiwia hegai mo d chum si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kihhim am oitham g gi'ikko wehst-mahm gamai gohk (42) mashath.
66011003	Jiosh o hab kaij, “Gohk ant wo ha mah g ni-pionag g gewkthag. T ihtham am wo ahgahi g ha'ichu ni-ahga ab wabsh sho'ig e enigadath g thahumkaj heg oitham hemako mihl gohk siant chuhthpo wehst-mahm (1260) tash.”
66011004	Neh, t am hahawa ni-chehgi matki has wo masmak ihtham gohk. Kutki hab wo masmak mo hegam gohk olive u'us wuhshanig mo wa heki hu o'ohanas ab ha amjed ch hab ep wo masmak mo hegam gohk lalampa mo am chuhch ge'e cheopi ch ed.
66011005	Kuki g mehi ab i wushke ha-chihchini amjed ch ha koktha g ha-obga. Kut hedai wo i chum s-ko'okam has ha juh k wo e koktha.
66011006	Ab oki mahks g ap'ethag mat wo kuh g thahm kahchim. T pi wo ha juhkath heg oitham mat am wo ahgath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Ab oki ep mahks g ap'ethag mat wo eh'edch g shohshonkam shuhthagi k an wo i wuhshath g nahnko mahs si sho'igthag ch mumkithag ia jewed thahm.
66011007	Tki am wo i nahto g e-chikpan. Tki ab hema wo i wuhsh g s-ta ehbithamakam o'othham ge shuhthagi t amjed k e wepogithch g mischini ha'ichu thoakam ch wo ha cheggia k wo ha gewito k wo ha koktha ihtham gohk.
66011008	Tki g ha-ko'ithag am wo wehchkath wohg ch ed heg eda ge'e kihhim mat wa amai g s-ap'ekam t-kownalig ab e naggia kots t ab. Ihtha kihhim at e wepodath g si pi ap'ekam k hab e a'aga Sodom ch hab ep e a'aga Egypt.
66011009	Wehs nahnko kaitham neneoktham an wehs jewed thahm atki wo ha neithath mat ihtham gohk am wo wehchk waik eda hugkam tash. Kumtki pi wo ha hiwigi mamt gd hu wo ha hihash.
66011010	Tki g hemajkam wo si s-hehgigk mat koi ch wo pipiast k ab a'ai wo e mah g ha'ichu mahkigdag noki pi ha sho'igchuth ihtham gohk.
66011011	Am i thahm g waik eda hugkam tash, ni am neith matki g Jiosh ab haha wo i ha mah g thoakag. Tki wo gegokiwua. Kutki wehsijj hegam mat wo nei ihtha wo si s-ehbeni.
66011012	Kutki ihtham gohk wo kah mo ab hema si neok ab thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij, “Ab g wo i hihim.” Kutki am wo i chehchsh thahm kahchim wui am chewagi ch ed am ha-neithag ed g e-obga.
66011013	Tki am wa'i hekaj am si s-gewkam wo u'ugij g jewed. Kutki g hemako tahpani mo wehst-mahm e tahpanch (1/10) g kihhim wo i gei. Kutki wewa'ak mihl (7000) hemajkam wo e ko'ij heg eda jewed u'ugij. Kutki hegam ha'i matki am wo wih wo sha'i si s-ehbeni k ab wo si has el g gewkthaj g Jiosh.
66011014	Ith o d i gokkokam ha'ichu s-ta ehbithamakam mat ia'i kuhgi. T wabshaba g waikkokam hahawa s-hohtam hab wo e juh.
66011015	Kut g wewa'akkokam anghil am hahawa kuhu g e-kuikudkaj. K am ha'i si s-kaitham neneok ab thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij, “Wehs g kokownaltalig ia jewed thahm at d haha wo Jiosh kownaltaligk. Kut am wo ha thahmkath g si e-kehsha wehm i'ajed ch chum hekith.”
66011016	Kutki hegam gokko gamai gi'ik ge'eged ab i shulig k gd hu si kokawua k ab ihm g Jiosh
66011017	ch hab kaij: “T-kownalig Jiosh, chum ap hekith an ha'ichug ch am hahawa wehs i chehgi g e-gewkthag k am i himch g e-kownaltalig. Kuch heg hekaj ab si m-ho'ige'elith.
66011018	Hegam mo pi m-mahch o si s-babga. Kut e ai mapt wo ha lothai. Wehsijj g ko'i at wo i wuwhag k wo e lothaitach. Kupt wo ha mah g ha-mahkigdag g ha'ichu i m-tashogiththam ch wehs hegam mo d m-hemajkamga ch ab s-m-wohog elith, chum as hedai d wo k. E at ai mapt gm hu hab wo i ha juh hegam mo padchuth g jewed” Neh, bo kaij hegam ge'eged.
66011019	Kutki g Jiosh cheopi an thahm kahchim ch ed ab i e kuhpi'o. T am e chehgi hegai uhs washa mo am eda wehch g Jiosh ha'ichu ah'athadag. Kut am si tohonno g wepgi. K an kaithag g tataniki. T g jewed u'ugij. T g chea s-gewkam gei.
66012001	Am atki hahawa ha'ichu si ge'e e chehgi an thahm kahchim ch ed. Am aniki neith mat g uwi am hema i wuhsh. Kuki g ipudaj hab mahs mo g tash. Ihtha uwi oki an keishch g mashath ch g gihko ab wahkch e-mo'o ab. K ith ab gamai gohk huhu'u an thadha.
66012002	Kutki wo ge madt. Tki ab i hihhi g s-ko'ok matki wo mahmadho. K hekaj am si shoshshak.
66012003	Am atki hahawa ha'ichu ep i e chehgi thahm kahchim ch ed. Niki am neith matki am hema i wuhshani k e wepogith g ge'e nehbig hujud ch ge s-wegi ch ge wewa'ak mohmi ch wehst-mahm a'ag. K g gigiko an hab chuhchu'ig wehs ha ab g mohmij.
66012004	Kutki g e-baikaj i ha chewaim g hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g huhu'u k im hu hab i ha juh ab thahm kahchim amjed ch am ha nehnich jewed thahm. Kutki wo mahmadho hegai uwi. T ihtha Nehbig Hujud e wepogiththam am wui i kekiwua mat wo huh g madaj mat wabsh wo chum mahsi.
66012005	Kutki am i mahmadho g uwi. Tsh g madaj am d wo kownalk wehs ha thahm g jejewed. Mtki am ha hekaj bei g ali k gm hu i bei Jiosh wui. K heg an tha kownal thaikud ed.
66012006	Tki hegai uwi gm hu heb hu meh am tohono jewed ch ed. Am atki i apch g Jiosh wehhejed mat am wo e nuhkuth hemako mihl gohk siant chuhthpo wehst-mahm (1260) tash.
66012007	Tki an haha wabsh g cheggiadag hab e juh Jiosh kihthag ed. Hegai anghil mo hab chehgig Michael g e-anghiliga ha wehm oki cheggia g Nehbig Hujud. K wehs g jijawul am i wehmt g Nehbig Hujud. Tki wabshaba hegam Michael ha gehg. Kumtki hahawa pi ha hiwigi mas an ep wo ha'ichugk Jiosh kihthag ed.
66012009	Ihtha Nehbig Hujud atki gm hu si e wua ab amjed g thahm kahchim. Heg oki wud mash wa ko'oi masma ch hab chehgig ge Jiawul ch hab ep chehgig Satan. Ith o ha iattogith g wehs hemajkam an jewed thahm. Ab amt i ha nehnich g piongaj wehmaj.
66012010	Ntki hahawa hema ep kah an thahm kahchim ch ed. Kuki ith si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Neh, chum o hekith ab kehk g ge Jiawul Jiosh ba'ich ch ab chum ha'ichu ha abchuth g Jiosh hemajkamga. T wabshaba g Jiosh gm hu i wuhshath k am i maskogi g si e-Kehsha gewkthag. Kut hab wa masma i e maskogi g ha-tho'ibiathag g Jiosh hemajkamga.
66012011	“Jiosh si Kehsha at am i e thagito mat g eh'edaj e iagchul ab Jiosh wui. K g hemajkamgaj heg hekaj ab si hiwig ch s-ap ahgachug g wohokam ab amjed ch hab gehg g Jiawul, chum as hems wo e muhkith.
66012012	T wo si s-hehgigk wehsijj hegam mo am ha'ichug Jiosh kihthag ed. T wabshaba wo si e sho'igch hegam mo am ha'ichug jewed thahm. Jiawul at si s-bagam ab wo i hud jewed thahm s-mahchch mo pi sha'i tash hiwgithas.”
66012013	Pegih, am amtki wa tha'ich jewed thahm ihtha Nehbig Hujud mo d Jiawul. Tki wa eda heki hu madt hegai uwi. T g Nehbig Hujud an ha hekaj i hu'ui.
66012014	Kumtki ab a'anch g uwi g ba'ag a'ankaj mat gm hu wo tha'a k gn hu wo e ehstokch tohono jewed ch ed. Kumtki am wo nuhkuthath waik eda hugkam a'ahithag mat g Nehbig Hujud pi wo mua.
66012015	Tki g Nehbig Hujud ab haha wabsh i iawua g shuhthagi e-chini amjed am oithk hegai uwi mat gm hu wo i chum moht.
66012016	Tki wabshaba g jewed ab i wehmt g uwi, heg wa wepo mat ab i kuhpi'o g e-chini k im hu bah hegai shuhthagi mo ab tha'iwuni Nehbig Hujud chini amjed.
66012017	Tki haha wabsh woho'i bagat g Nehbig Hujud ab wui g uwi k amjed am i ha cheggia hegam mo ab d amjedkamaj. Uwi amjedkam oki d hegam mo ab s-wohog elith g Jiosh chehanig ch ab s-wohochuth hegai wohokam mat am i ha tashogi g Jesus.
66012018	Kuki am hahawa kehk g Nehbig Hujud ge shuhthagi koa an.
66013001	Ntki haha wabsh nei hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam o'othham mo e wepogithch g mischini ha'ichu thoakam. Ith at ab i wuhsh ge shuhthagi t amjed k ge wehst-mahm a'ag ch wewa'ak mohmi. K an a'agaj an gigiko an shahsh'ai. K an mohmij an o'ohadag g si pi ap'ekam chechgig.
66013002	Ihtha s-ta Ehbithamakam oki hab sha mahs mo g ohshod. K g tahtdaj hab sha mams mo g judumi tahtad. K g chinij hab mahs mo g mawith chini. T g Nehbig Hujud ab mah g gewkthag ch e-kownaltalig wehs jewed thahm.
66013003	Hema g mo'oj o hab sha mahs matki wa e muhkith k wabshaba ep thoa k e chegito. Kut ab si has i el g hemajkam wehsko k am i oi ihtha s-ta Ehbithamakam. T wehs hemajkam ab i ihm g Nehbig Hujud nat pi ab mah g e-gewkthag hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam
66013004	k ab ep ihm g s-ta Ehbithamakam ch hab kaij, “Pi oki hedai hab sha'i masma mo ihtha. Pi atki hedai wo sha'i e nako mat wo cheggia.”
66013005	Kum wabsh hiwgith ihtha mat wo si pi kehg neokath. Kumtki ab ep mah g gewkthag am oitham g gi'ikko wehst-mahm gamai gohk (42) mashath.
66013006	Kut ihtha am ha hekaj pad neo ab wui g Jiosh k pi ap hekaj g chehgigaj ch nahnko ahg g Jiosh kihthag ch hegam mo an kih kihthaj ed.
66013007	Ab amtki hiwigi mat wo ha cheggia g Jiosh hemajkamga k wo ha gewito. Kumt ab ep mah g gewkthag am ha thahm g wehsko thakam hemajkam mo has i kaitham d neneoktham.
66013008	K wabshaba g Jiosh hemajkamga ha chechgig o an o'ohadag e tho'ibiakam ha-o'ohana ed. Ihtha o'ohana o d enigaj hegai mat kahwalkaj e muhkith am ha wehhejed. Ihtham e tho'ibiakam at pi ab hu wo ihm hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam. Hegam wa'i mo pi an hu o'ohadag heg eda o'ohana at ab wo ihmath hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam.
66013009	Am g wo s-ap i a'amichuth ihtha.
66013010	Hegam mo hedai d ha wuikam mat wo e kuhpach at hemho wa wo e kuhpach. Hegam mo d ha wuikam mat wo e ko'ij at hemho wa wo e ko'ij. K eda d ha-wuikam g Jiosh hemajkamga mat wo s-chu nakogath ch wo s-gewkk am e-wohochuthadag ed.
66013011	Ni hahawa ep neith matki ab hema ep i wuhsh gd hu jewed wecho amjed. Ith o hab wa'ap mahs mo g s-ta ehbithamakam ha'ichu thoakam ch ge gohk a'ag hab sha masma mo g kahwal a'ag ch hab masma neok mo g nehbig hujud.
66013012	Hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam mat wehpeg i wuhsh oki ab mahkch g gewkthag hegai mat am hahawa i wuhsh. K heg ab wehs ha chehani g hemajkam jewed thahm mat ab wo si has elithath hegai wehpeg s-ta Ehbithamakam matki uhpam e chegito.
66013013	K ith hiwgith mat am hab juh g si ge'e s-hasig ha'ichu. K wehs hemajkam neith mat ab i huduni g mehi thahm kahchim t amjed in jewed thahm. Bo wa masma wehs ha iattogith g hemajkam ith thahm jewed ch d s-chu Iattomakam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam ch ab ha chehani mat am ha'ichu wo nahto mat heg wo wepogithask s-ta Ehbithamakam mat wehpeg i wuhshani k atki e muhkith g is-pahyokaj k uhpam e chegito.
66013015	Hegai s-chu Iattomakam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam atki am ihbheiwua ith eda mat am e nahto. Tki heg hekaj e nako ihtha ha'ichu ha-nahtoi mat wo neok k ep wo ha koktha wehs hegam mat pi ab hu wo i shul wui.
66013016	Tki ihtha s-chu Iattomakam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam i ha huilisamath wehs hemajkam matp hedai d wo i k mat an wo e chepos heg hekaj wehpeg s-ta Ehbithamakam cheposig. Kumtki wa woho an ge ha chechpos an s-apkojed ha-nohnhoi an ch ab ha-koka ab.
66013017	Pi atki hedai wo e nako mas ha'ichu wo ha nolawt o ha'ichu wo gagda, heg hi wa mat ab wo cheposigk g s-ta Ehbithamakam chehgigkaj o heg hekaj nuhmilo mo d chehgigaj nuhmilo.
66013018	Ith oki d si s-juhk ha'ichu. Kut am wo i mamche matp hedai wo s-chu amichuthath mo has d ahga hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam nuhmilo no pi hegai nuhmilo d chehgigaj hema o'othham. K ihtha nuhmilo d chuhthp siant chuhthpo gamai chuhthp (666).
66014001	Ntki ab ep nei Kuki hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch an kehk Sion tho'ag t ab. K ith wehm g siant gi'ikko gamai gi'ik mihl (144,000) hemajkam am gegok. K an ha-koka an o'ohadag g chehgigaj hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch ch heg ohg chehgig.
66014002	Kuni kah mo ab hema neok thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaithag mo g ge'e shuhthagi s-kaitham med ch hab kaithag mo g tataniki an thoahim. Hegai mani kah o hab kaithag mo mu'i a'alpa am e gew.
66014003	Hegam hemajkam mani wa ha neith oki am ahg g wechij ne'i ch am gegok wui hegai kownal thaikud ch hegam ha wui gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ch hegam ge'eged. Kutki pi hedai ep wo e nako mas wo mai g ha-nei.
66014004	Ihtham oki d hegam mat pi sha'i ha hohont k si e nuhkuth mo pi ha wehm wohppo. Kut am ha wehhejed e muhkith hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch k ha tho'ibia. Kuki ihtham an oithahim mo hebai i oimmed ch d wehpegkam e tho'ibiakam.
66014005	Pi oki hekith ha'ichu ha iattogith ch pi ha chu'ichig.
66014006	Ntki hahawa hema ep nei g anghil. K ith an tha'a uhgk ch ahgahim g pi ha huhugetham s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab ha wui g nahnko kaitham neneoktham an wehsko jewed thahm.
66014007	Si o s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ab g wo si has elith g Jiosh ch ab ihm. E at ai mat wo ha lothai g hemajkam. Ab g wo i tohtonwua k ab wo i ihm g Jiosh. Heg at nahto g thahm kahchim ch jewed ch ge shuhthagi ch g shohshonkam shuhthagi.”
66014008	Tki am hahawa hema ep i oi hegai wehpeg anghil k hab kaij, “I at gei ihtha ge'e kihhim. Wehs hemajkam o am hab wua g pi ap'ekam a'ai e wehm ith hekaj kihhim. K heg hekaj hab e a'aga Babylon. Shahag wepo mo ha nawkkoichuth.” Neh, bo kaij hegai gokkokam anghil.
66014009	Tki g waikkokam anghil am i ha oi hegam gohk k si s-kaitham hab kaij, “T wo ha mah g Jiosh g s-ko'ok namkithadag wehs hegam mo hedai ab si has elith hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam ch ab chechposithas heg hekaj cheposigaj e-koka ab o an e-nohnhoi an. Ith o heg wa wepogithas mat g Jiosh ab wo ha mah g s-ko'ok nawait nat pi am wo s-ko'okam ha mehi g ha'ichu s-mehithagkaj am ha tahgio g s-ap'ekam anghil ch hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.
66014011	T g kuhbthaj hegai mehi mat s-ko'okam wo ha mehi am wo wuhshanith uhgk ia'i amjed ch chum hekith. Pi o am hu ha'ichug g ulinihogig ha wehhejed hegam mat ab i shul wui g s-ta Ehbithamakam ch ab wui g wepogithaj k ab e chepos heg hekaj chehgigaj.” Neh, bo kaij ihtha anghil.
66014012	Ith att hekaj hemho wo wa si s-chu nakogath ahchim mach d Jiosh hemajkamga ch ab s-wohog elith g Jiosh chehanig ch am s-gewkam oith g Jesus.
66014013	Ni hahawa hema ep kah. Kuki ith ab neok thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij mantsh an wo o'oha ihtha, “T wo si s-ap e taht hegam mat wo koi, ab s-wohochuthch mo g Jesus d ha-kownalig.” K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab kaij, “Tho si wohokam ihtha. T wo si s-ap e ulinihogi ihtham heg amjed s-wehch e-chikpan k ab wo bei g e-mahkigdag heg wehhejed.”
66014014	Ntki hahawa nei g s-toa chewagi. Kuki an ith thahm hema thak ch hab mahs mo g Jiosh si Kehsha. K g ohla gihko ab e wahkch mo'oj ab. K an u'ukch g s-mu'uk ohso.
66014015	T ab hema i wuhsh g anghil ab amjed g ge'e cheopi k ab si s-kaitham neok ch hab kaij heg wui mo an tha chewagi ch ed, “Heg o wa wepogithas mapt an wo hikkumia g uhdwis bahithag g e-ohsokaj am wehsko jewed thahm. E at ai g ge'e lothaita tash. Kupt am wo i ha hemapai g hemajkam heg wehhejed.”
66014016	Kut hegai mo an tha chewagi thahm ab si i widu g e-ohso an jewed thahm heg wa wepo mat am hab wo juh g oda.
66014017	Niki hahawa hema ep neith g anghil. T heg ab i wuhsh cheopi t amjed an thahm kahchim ch ed k an hab wa'ap hema u'ukch g s-mu'uk ohso.
66014018	K am hema ep kehk g anghil ch am nuhkuth g nahtha ab ab g iagchulithakud. Ith at am hih heg wui mo g s-mu'uk ohso an u'ukch k si s-kaitham hab kaij, “E at ai g ge'e lothaita tash. K heg wepogithas mapt an wo hikkumia g uhdwis g e-ohsokaj.”
66014019	Kut wa woho ab i widu g anghil g e-ohso an jewed thahm k am hikkumia g uhdwis k am ha shul kehiwinakud ch ed. Ith o am chehgithch mat g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo ha namkith.
66014020	Kum ha kehiwia g uhdwis gm hu jeg ed ab amjed g kihhim. T g ha-eh'ed ab i meh ab amjed g kehiwinakud hab masma mo g wi'inthag mo gohk siant mihya chewaj ch hetasp tad s-juhk.
66015001	Ntki hahawa ep nei g si ge'e chehgitha an thahm kahchim ch ed. Wewa'ak anghil oki u'a g wewa'ak sho'igthag. Ihtham oki d si ha oithchkam sho'igthag. Jiosh atki ith hekaj am wo i kuhgi g s-gewk e-a'appemadag.
66015002	Neith ani mo am ha'ichu tadani ch hab sha mahs mo g mi-lihtha ch g mehi wehnags. Ha ani ep neith hegam mat gewito hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam pi ab hu has elithch g wepogithaj ch ab hu cheposig heg hekaj chehgigaj ch nuhmilo. Am oki gegok hugithaj an ihtha mo sha mi-lihtha mahs ch g a'alpa an u'ukch mat g Jiosh ab ha mah.
66015003	Mosesbad ch hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch oki ab ha mahkch g ne'i. K ith am a'aga: “T-kownalig Jiosh, thap si s-gewkthagkam. K g ha'ichu hab m-juni d si ge'e ha'ichu ch sha'i si s-kehgaj. T-kownalig an wehsko jewed thahm, tho si s-ap'ekam ch wohokam g m-himthag.
66015004	Wehsijj att ab wo si has i m-el. Pi at hedai wo sha'i pi am hu ah map d si ha'ichu nap pi ahpi d si hekia s-ap'ekam. Wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam at ab wo i hihim k ab wo i shul m-wui no pi wehsijj neith g si s-ap'ekam ha'ichu hab m-juni.”
66015005	Am i thahm ani hahawa ep neith moki ab kuhpi'okas g Jiosh cheopiga an thahm kahchim ch ed. Kuki heg eda am ha'ichug hegai ikus kih mo hab d ahga mo g Jiosh am ha wehmaj g e-hemajkamga.
66015006	Tki ab i wuwha g wewa'ak anghil k u'a g wewa'ak si oithchkam sho'igthag ab amjed g cheopi. Ihtham anghil oki si s-kehg s-tohtam e enigadathch ch g ohla babshodag an hab juhkch e-babsho an.
66015007	Tki hema hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ab ha mah ihtham wewa'ak anghil g wewa'ak ohla hohas-haha'a. Kuki ihtham shuhshuthch g s-ko'ok namkithadag.
66015008	Hegai cheopi o ab wabsh i shuhthags g kuhbskaj no pi am ha'ichug g s-tondam gewkthaj g Jiosh. Kut pi hedai wo e nako mas an hu wo i wah cheopi ch ed am hugkam mat wo kuhgi ihtham wewa'ak sho'igthag mat u'apa hegam wewa'ak anghil.
66016001	Kuni wa hema ep kah. K ith am s-kaitham neok ab amjed g cheopi ab ha wui ihtham wewa'ak anghil ch hab kaij, “Am g wo hihim k wo iawua g s-ko'ok namkithadag an jewed thahm ab ha amjed hegam hohas-haha'a.”
66016002	Tki g wehpegkam anghil am him k am iawua an thahm g jewed hegai mo wasibch e-hoas-ha'a ch ed. Kutki g si s-ko'ok ch s-ta ehbithama hihiwthag ha ai hegam mo ab ha ab hab chu'ig g s-ta Ehbithamakam cheposig ch ihtham mat i shul ab wui g wepogithaj.
66016003	Tki amjed g gokkokam anghil am hahawa epai iawua hegai mo wasibch an ge shuhthagi thahm. Tki g shuhthagi hab masma e eh'edch mo g muhki eh'ed. Tki wehs ha'ichu koi am ge shuhthagi ch ed.
66016004	Tki amjed g waikkokam anghil am epai iawua hegai mo wasibch an a'akimel ch ed ch shohshonkam shuhthagi ch ed. Kutki e eh'edch g shuhthagi.
66016005	Kuni kah mo hab kaij ab Jiosh wui hegai anghil mo nuhkuth g shuhthagi: “Thap si hekia s-ap'ekam Jiosh ch chum hekith an ha'ichug. K ab d ha-wuikam ihtham g s-ko'ok namkithadag.
66016006	Iawua at g ha-eh'ed g m-hemajkamga ch hegam ha'ichu i m-tashogiththam. Kupt heg hekaj g eh'ed ab ha mah mat wo ih. Ith o wa si e gahgith ihtham.”
66016007	Niki amjed hahawa hema ep kah. K ith ab neok iagchulithakud amjed ch hab kaij, “T-kownalig Jiosh, thap si s-gewkthagkam. K g m-lothaita si woho ch si s-ap'e.”
66016008	Tki amjed g gi'ikkokam anghil am iawua hegai mo wasibch an tash t an. Kut ha mehi g hemajkam g e-s-tonikaj.
66016009	T eda ihtham pi gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. Jiosh o ha hiwgith mat wo e sho'igch. K heg hekaj ab si s-ko'okam has ahg ch pi ab hu has elith g gewkthaj.
66016010	Tki amjed g hetaspokam anghil am iawua hegai mo wasibch an thahm g s-ta Ehbithamakam kownal thaikud. Kutki g s-chuhugam an gei wehsko s-ta Ehbithamakam kownalitalig ed. Kuki g hemajkam si e kihk'ishch pi nakogch g s-ko'ok
66016011	ch si pi kehg neneok ab Jiosh wui heg hekaj e-hihiwthag ch ha'ichu s-ko'ok ch wabshaba pi gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.
66016012	Tki amjed g chuhthpokam anghil am iawua hegai mo wasibch heg eda ge akimel mo hab chehgig Euphrates. Tki gaksh ihtha mat ab gahi wo i huhud g kokownal ab si'al wecho amjed.
66016013	Niki hahawa ep neith g waik pi kehg gewpkthag. K ihtham hab mahs mo g babath ch d jijawul ch ab i wuwha ha-chihchini amjed g Nehbig Hujud ch g s-ta Ehbithamakam ch g s-chu Iattomkam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam ch hab wua g s-hasig ha'ichu.
66016014	Ihtham waik gewpkthag atki am hihi ha wui g kokownal an wehsko jewed thahm mat ab wo i ha hemapai. Kutki ihtham kokownal wo ha cheggia g Jiosh hemajkamga.
66016015	(Bo kaij g Jiosh alithag, “Ab g wo ni-kaiham. Bant masma s-a'agi wo jiwia mo g s-chu ehskam. T wo s-ap e tahtkkath hegam mat wo s-nenenashanik. T wabshaba hegam mat pi hab wo masmak wo si e elithath hab sha masma mo an wabsh s-thahpkam oiopo.”)
66016016	Tki amjed hegam waik gewpkthag am ha u'apa g kokownal amai mo g Tutuligo hab a'aga Armageddon.
66016017	Tki amjed g wewa'akkokam anghil am iawua hegai mo wasibch an hewel ch ed. K ab hema si s-kaitham neok ab amjed hegai kownal thaikud mo am tha cheopi ch ed hab kaij, “Am at hab e juh.”
66016018	Tki am si tohonno g wepgi k am si kokp g tataniki. Tki g jewed si s-gewkam u'ugij. Pi oki hekith hab sha'i masma u'ugij g jewed am i amjed mat an e nahto g o'othham. Ith oki d si ge'e jewed u'ugij mo pi hebai hab sha'i masma.
66016019	Tki hegai ge'e kihhim waikpa e tahp. Kutki wehsko g kihhim gn hu a'ai jewed thahm i shul. Jiosh o am wa s-chegitok hegai ge'e kihhim mo hab e a'aga Babylon ch ab mah g s-ko'ok namkithadag. Ith at heg wo wepogithask mat ab wo ih g si s-nawmthag nawait nat pi heg hekaj si s-ko'okam wo e juh.
66016020	Kutki wehs g si'iskod jejewed ch thohtha'ag wo heb hu hihi.
66016021	Tki g sha'i si ge'eged chea an wo i shul. Ihtham oki hehemako am hu i siant s-wehch ch atki ab wo i shul thahm kahchim amjed am ha thahm hegam pi ap'ekam hemajkam. Kutki ihtham ab wo si pad neneo Jiosh wui.
66017001	T amjed hegam hema wewa'ak anghil mo an uh'ukch g wewa'ak hohas-haha'a am jiwia ni-wui k hab kaij, “Ab g i hihm k neith ihtha ge'e kihhim mo am miabithch kehk g mu'i a'akimel ch heg wepogithas mo g si pi ap'ekam chehpa'awi. Ith at wehsko wo ma'ish g jewed g pi ap'ekamkaj.
66017002	Kokownal wehsko jewed thahm at heg hekaj hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam. T g hemajkam wehsko jewed thahm wo noda hab juhkch g s-tohntom ha'ichu hab masma mamt wo nawkk i'ok g nawait. Neh, nt am wo m-chehgi mat has masma ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag ihtha pi ap'ekam kihhim.”
66017003	T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab si i ni-wehmt. Tki g anghil am i ni-bei tohono jewed wui. Ni am g uwi neith. Kuki ith an thaichug s-wegi s-ta ehbithamakam ha'ichu thoakam ab. K ith wewa'ak mohmi ch wehst-mahm a'ag. K g pi ap'ekam chechgig an o'ohadag wehsko ab.
66017004	Ihtha uwi o si s-ihbhaimagim ch s-wegima e enigadathch ch g ohlakaj ch s-kehg hohothaikaj e hehosithch. K an nowij ed hab chu'ig g ohla tahsa ch shuhthags g si s-uam ha'ichu. Ith o hab d ahga mo d wabsh tohnto ihtha kihhim.
66017005	Ab koaj ab o o'ohadag g chehgig. K ith s-a'agi has d ahga ch hab chu'ig, “Si Ge'e Babylon kihhim o hab sha masma mo d ha-je'e g wehs chechpa'awi ch totonto ith thahm jewed.”
66017006	Neith ani mat sha'i si s-ap e taht ihtha uwi mat e ko'ij hegam mat pi thagito g Jesus. Heg o wa wepo mat nawm i'ok g ha-eh'ed. Kunt am i neithok wabsh woho'i si has ni-taht.
66017007	K ab ni-kakke g anghil ch hab kaij, “Shahchu apt ahgk si has e taht. Am ant wo m-ahgi mo has d ahga ihtha map s-neithma.
66017008	Ihtha s-ta Ehbithamakam mo wewa'ak mohmi ch wehst-mahm a'ag o d chum thoakamkahim ch hahawa e muhkith k wabshaba ep wo e chegito k ab wo i wuhsh s-juhk wag t amjed k hahawa ep wo e muhkith. T heg hekaj wo si has i e taht g pi e tho'ibiakam. Ihtham o g ha-chechgig pi an hu o'ohadag heg eda o'ohana mo an g ha-chechgig o'ohadag g e tho'ibiakam.
66017009	“K d ha-wuikam g Jiosh hemajkamga mat wo s-amich ihtha. Hegam wewa'ak mohmi o d wewa'ak ka'akwulk. K ihtham ha thahm thaha ihtha uwi. Ihtham mohmi o d ep wewa'ak kokownal.
66017010	Hetasp ihtham at im hu hab i e juh. K hemako d wabsh kia kownal. Kut hemako koi am hu i thahiwua k hekith am wo i thahiwua k pi sha'i tash am hu wo thakath.
66017011	Hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam mat e muhkith at d wo gigi'ikkokam kownalk. Ith o ha wehm chikpan hegam wehpeg wewa'ak kokownal ch gm hu wo him k wo e muhkith.
66017012	“Hegam wehst-mahm a'ag map neith o hab d ahga mat wehst-mahm kokownal ab ep wo i wuwha. Ihtham at he'es ab wo i wehmt hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam
66017013	k ab wo mah g e-gewkthag no pi wehsijj e wepo masma ha'ichu hab elith.
66017014	Ihtham at wo cheggia hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. T oi wa heg wo ha gewito no pi d ge'e kownal am ha thahm g kokownal. T hegam mo si s-gewkam am oith ihtha mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch am wehmaj wo ha gewito nat pi ab i ha waith k am i ha chuhcha.”
66017015	K hab ep kaij g anghil ab ni-wui, “Am ap neith mo ihtha uwi am mu'i ha thahm thaha g ge shuhshugi. K ith hab d ahga mat g ge'e pi ap'ekam kihhim am wo thahmkath mu'i jejewed ch mu'i nahnko mahs hemajkam.
66017016	Kut g Jiosh hab wo ha juh hegam wehst-mahm kokownal mat ab wo wechokath g s-ta Ehbithamakam. Kut e wehm wo si s-keh'ithath hegai ge'e kihhim mo wepogithas g pi ap'ekam uwi ch wehs ha'ichu wo wohppo'i. T heg gm wabsh wo i thahpkath. T ihtham wo huh g chuhkugaj k wo hugio g meikaj. Neh, bat wa masma am oithk hab wo e juh mo has i kaij g Jiosh.
66017018	Ihtha uwi map neith o d hegai ge'e kihhim mat s-gewkam an wo ha u'ukch g kokownal a'ai jewed thahm”
66018001	Am i thahm, ni hahawa ep neith g anghil. Tki ith ab i hud thahm kahchim t amjed k ge'e u'ukch g gewkthag. K ab amjed g tonlig wabsh wehsko tonod an jewed thahm.
66018002	K am si s-kaitham neok ch hab kaij: “I at gei ihtha ge'e kihhim mo hab masma mo g chehpa'awi. Jijawul o ebkioth. Nahnko mahs s-u'amakam ch pi a'amkam u'uwhig o am kih eda.
66018003	Bat wa masma e padch g kihhim nat pi mu'i ha padch g hemajkam g pi ap'ekamkaj. Heg o wa wepo mat ha nawkkoich. T am wehmaj ab wo bei g s-ko'ok namkithadag. T g kokownal wehsko hab juh g pi ap'ekam ith hekaj kihhim mo g chehpa'awi wepogithas. T g s-kakais wehsko jewed thahm ba'ich i s-e kakaisch heg hekaj pi ap'ekam mo am hab e wua.” Neh, bo kaij g anghil.
66018004	Ni hahawa ep kah mo ab neok g Jiosh thahm kahchim amjed ch hab kaij: “Ab g wo i wuwhaki, ni-hemajkamga. Ab g wo i wuwhaki ab amjed ihtha kihhim mo hab sha masma mo g chehpa'awi. Pi g am hu wo wehmajk heg eda pi ap'ekam. Pi g ab hu wo wehmaj beh'i g s-ko'ok namkithadaj.
66018005	Pi ap chu'ichigaj o sha'i si uhgk sipulkas. Kuni s-chegito g pi ap chu'ichigaj.
66018006	S-ko'okam at hab em-juh. Kumt uhpam s-ko'okam hab wo juh. Ab g ba'ich wo i nodgith g chu'ichigaj wui. Heg at wo wa wepothagk mamt am wo i shuhthath g kohbaj heg hekaj i'ithag mo e thahm ba'ich i s-gewk mat wa has i masma am hab em-juh.
66018007	Ab g wo mahki g ha'as sho'igthag ch pi ap tahhathkam mo wa he'es hejel ab e mahkch g ab si has e-elithadag ch kaisthag. T wo si e sho'igch hab masma mo g hejel wi'ikam uwi k eda hab e elith mo d kownal ch pi hekith wo e sho'igch.
66018008	Kut ith hekaj g sho'igthaj wehs ab wo i shul thahm wabsh shel i e oitham. K g sho'igthaj d s-ko'ok mumkithag ch pi ap tahhathkam ch bihugig Am at wo meitto ihtha kihhim. S-gewkthag ani ch wo lothait k s-ko'okam wo namkith.” Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh.
66018009	Hegam kokownal mo wehmaj hab junihim g pi ap'ekam at wo si shoanith wehhejed am i neithok mamt mei.
66018010	Ihtham o ga hu wabsh mehk gegok no pi s-ehbith mat wo nei g sho'igthaj ch hab kaij: “Ih, sho'ig! Ihtha si ge'e s-gewk kihhim mo e wepogith g Babylon at sha'i si s-hohtam ab bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.”
66018011	K g s-kakais ith thahm jewed hab wa'ap si shoani ch pi ap e tahtk wehhejed no pi hahawa pi hedai ha nolawt g ha-gagli.
66018012	Pi oki hedai ha nolawt g ha-ohlaga ch ha-plahthaga ch s-namkig hohothai ch g s-namkig ha-lohbaga ch g mamskal ch g s-namkig uhs. Nahnko ha'ichu oki hab wua g al-huanthi a'agkaj ch s-namkig uhs ch kohwli ch wainomi k ch s-namkig hothaikaj. K oi wa pi hedai ha nolawt.
66018013	Am o chum gagda hegai mo haschu am wehnaths g ha'ichu hugi ch nahnko mahs s-ap uhwchu ch nawait ch e ko'atham a-saithi ch chu'i ch pilkani ch haiwani ch kahwal ch kakawyu ch kakalit ch nenehol ch chum hems g o'othham thothakag. K pi hedai ha nolawt.
66018014	K hab kaij ihtham s-kakais ab wui hegai kihhim: “Wehs hegai map ab si tatchua at huhug. M-kaisthag ch s-m-kehgthag at im hu hab i e juh. Kupt pi thahm ep wo ha edagi.”
66018015	Hegam mat s-e kakaisch am ha'ichu gagdak atki ga hu wabsh mehk wo gegokk no pi s-ehbith g sho'igthaj. Ihtham at wo si shoanith ch wo pi ap e tahtkkath
66018016	ch hab wo kaijchith: “Ih, sha'i si sho'ig ihtha si ge'e kihhim mat wa eda ab wo si s-kehg e enigadathch g s-ihbhaimagi ch s-wegi lohbakaj k ab hab wo juhkchith g ohla hehosimhuna ch s-kehg hohothai.
66018017	T eda sha'i si s-hohtam wehs heb hu shul g e-kaisthag.” Wehsijj oki ga hu wabsh mehk gegok hegam mo d ha-ge'ege'ejig an wapalko ch ed ch hegam mo an thadhaichug ch hegam mo d pion an wapalko ch ed ch wehs hegam mo ab behe g e-kihthag ab ge shuhthagi t amjed.
66018018	Am o meihim g kihhim ch g kuhbs am wuhshani. K wehs ihtham am neith ch si hihnk ch hab kaij, “Pi o hekith hema kihhim hab sha'i masma d ge'e kihhim.”
66018019	T ihtham ab hahawa iawua g jewed e-mo'o ab k si s-kaitham hihnk ch si shoani ch hab kaij: “Sho'ig, sho'ig, ihtha si ge'e kihhim. Ihtha kihhim o wud mat ia s-e kakaisch hegam mo e'edgith g wapalko. Sha'i si s-hohtam at wehs ha'ichu heb hu shul ihtha kihhim.” Neh, bo kaij ihtham pi ap'ekam hemajkam.
66018020	Kut oi wa d wo si ge'e s-hehgigk an thahm kahchim ch ed mat i gei ihtha pi ap'ekam kihhim. Jesus chuhchai ch Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch wehs g Jiosh hemajkamga at wo si s-hehgigk. Jiosh at ab wo abch ihtha kihhim g chu'ichig mo has ha juhkchkahim.
66018021	Kut am hahawa hema i e chehgi g si s-gewk anghil k am hema bei g hothai. Ihtha hothai oki ha'as ge'ej mo g si ge'e chu'ikud. T g anghil am tha'ich ge shuhthagi ch ed k hab kaij: “Bat masma am wo si e tha'ich ihtha ge'e kihhim mat pi hekith hedai ep wo neithath.
66018022	Hegam mumsigo mo ha gew g a'alpa ch uhs kukuikud ch kohwli kukuikud at pi hekith am hu ep wo piast amai. Pi at hekith am hu ep wo e chikp g nahnko mahs chikpan amai. Pi amt hekith am hu wo chu'ath.
66018023	Pi at hekith am hu ep wo e mehmheith g lalampa. Pi at hekith hedai am hu ep wo e hohont. Hegam mo d s-kakais iia o wa u'ukch g gewkthag wehsko jewed thahm. K wa ia ge has e wuihim g mamakai ch hekaj ha iattogith g hemajkam an wehs jewed thahm. T eda wehs huhug ihtha.” Neh, bo kaij hegai anghil.
66018024	Kumtki s-ko'okam wo namkith g kihhim nat pi ia e ko'ij g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch Jiosh hemajkamga. Chum o hems d chu'ichigaj hegam mat gn hu a'ai jewed thahm e ko'ij.
66019001	Nt amjed hahawa ha'ichu kah. K ith hab kaithag mo sha'i mu'i hemajkam am neneok an thahm kahchim ch ed ch hab kaij: “Ab ach si has elith g Jiosh. Tho'ibiathag ch ab has elithadag ch gewkthag o ab d amjedkamaj g Jiosh.
