66019002	Tho wohokam ch s-ap'ekam g Jiosh lothaita nat pi s-ko'okam ab namkith ihtha si pi ap'ekam chehpa'awi mo padchuth g jewed heg hekaj e-tohntomthadag. Jiosh at s-ko'okam ab namkith nat pi ha koktha g piongaj.”
66019003	K am ep Hihnk ch hab kaij: “Ab ach si has elith g Jiosh. Mei at ihtha ge'e pi ap'ekam kihhim. T g kuhbs ab amjed chum hekith am wo wuhshanith.”
66019004	K eda an thahm kahchim ch ed thaha g Jiosh e-kownal thaikud an. T ab wui i tohtonwua hegam gokko gamai gi'ik ge'eged k ab si has elith ch hab kaij, “Pegih neh, ab ach si has elith g Jiosh.”
66019005	K ab hahawa hema neok miajed g Jiosh kownal thaikud ch hab kaij: “Ab g wo si has i elith g Jiosh ch ab s-wohog elith ahpim piongaj ch ahpim wehs hemajkam mam ha'i d s-has haha'ichu ch ha'i pi d has haha'ichu.”
66019006	Ni hahawa ep kah mu'i hemajkam. K g ha-ne'oki hab kaithag mo g s-gewk shuhthagi an med ch hab kaithag mat g tataniki ab si s-kaitham kop. Ha ani kah mo hab kaij: “Ab ach ihm g Jiosh no pi d si uhgk t-kownalig ch u'ukch g gewkthag am wehs hemajkam ha thahm.
66019007	Ab att wo si i s-hehgigk ch wo s-ap t-tahtkkath ch ab wo si has i el g gewkthaj. E at ai mat ab wo i ha hemapai g e-hemajkamga hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. T heg wo wa wepothagk mo g si ge'e hohnta. T g hemajkamgaj ab si e nahto wehhejed
66019008	hab sha masma mat g wo kuntam ab si s-tohama wo e enigadath. Ihtha lohba o wepogithas g s-ap'ekam ha'ichu hab ha-juni.”
66019009	K hab kaij g anghil ab ni-wui, “An g o'ohan ihtha: Ab at wo i ha hemapai g e-hemajkamga hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kut wo si s-hehgigk hab masma mamt wo si s-hehgigk am ha-gegosig ed g wo ha hohntam.” K hab ep kaij g anghil, “Ith o d si s-wohokam Jiosh ne'oki.”
66019010	Kunt am hahawa si i gei wecho k ab si has i el. K wabshaba hab kaij ab ni-wui, “Pi g hab masma ab si has ni-elith mani d Jiosh. Ab g si ihm g Jiosh. Thani wabsh piongaj hab masma mam ahpim mam ab s-wohochuth hegai wohokam mat g Jesus am i em-tashogi.” Neh, bo kaij g anghil. K ihtha wohokam d hegai mo ab amjed an u'ukch g e-amichuthadag g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.
66019011	Nt hahawa ep nei g thahm kahchim. T i e kuhpi'o. K am hab chu'ig g s-toa kawyu. K an ab tha hegai mam hab a'aga Wohokam. Heg o d hegai mo am s-ap ha lothait ch s-ap hab wua g cheggiadag.
66019012	Wuhpuij o hab masma s-mahs mo ab mehmheihim. K mu'i gigiko an hab chuhchu'ig mo'oj an. An o hema o'ohadag g chehgig ab ab. K heg wa'i hejel s-mahch mo haschu wud.
66019013	K g lihwaj d wabsh i eh'ed. Kum hab a'aga Jiosh Ne'oki no pi g Jiosh am gahi wuhshanim neok ab t-wui.
66019014	T g mu'i anghil am i oi hab masma mo g shonthal k g s-tohta kakawyu ha chehchejch ch s-tohtam e e'enigadathch.
66019015	Is-pahyo o ab i wuhshanis chinij amjed hegai Jiosh Ne'oki. T ith heg hekaj wo ha gewito g jejewed k am hahawa s-gewkam wo i ha wanim g wainomi usagakaj k s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mo bagachuth g Jiosh. Ith at heg wo wa wepothagk mamt g uhdwis wo kehiwia.
66019016	Ab lihwaj ab ch an kahioj an o ith chehgig an o'ohadag ‘Si Ge'e Kownal am Wehs ha Thahm g Kokownal.’
66019017	Ni hahawa hema ep neith g anghil. Ith o am kehk tash ch ed. K eda g u'uwhig an nen'e hewel ch ed. K ith ab ha wui si s-kaitham neok ch hab kaij, “Am g wo hihim k am wo i e hemapai mat g Jiosh am hab wo em-juni g si ge'e gegosig.
66019018	T wo em-gegos g pi ap hemajkam ha-chuhkugkaj. Kumt chum hems wo huh g ha-chuhkug g kokownal ch shonthal ha-ge'ege'ejig ch s-has haha'ichu ch ep wo huh g ha-chuhkug g kakawyu ch hegam mo ha chehchejch ch hegam mo d nenehol.”
66019019	Ni hahawa ep neith hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam mat wa heki hu in i wuhsh. Wehs g kokownal an jewed thahm at am i ha hemapai g e-shonthalig k am i wehmt g s-ta Ehbithamakam mat wo cheggia hegai mo g s-toa kawyu cheshaj. Kut ith g shonthaligaj i wehmt.
66019020	Kumt bei hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam ch heg ehp s-chu Iattomkam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam. Tho ihtha mo wa ha iattogith g s-hasig ha'ichukaj hegam mo ab hab juhkch g s-ta Ehbithamakam cheposig ch hegam mat ab i shul wui g wepogithaj. Kumt ha ui hegam gohk k wabsh thoakk am ha nehnich heg eda kahchki mo chum hekith meihim.
66019021	Hegai mo wa g s-toa kawyu cheshaj at ha koktha g ha-shonthalig heg hekaj is-pahyo mo wa kamshch ab e-chini ed. Kut g u'uwhig am huh g ha-chuhkug k si s-kokwoth.
66020001	Ni amjed hahawa hema ep neith g anghil. T ith ab i hud thahm kahchim amjed k an u'ukch g yahwi ith wehhejed s-juhk wag ch an u'ukch g chew e hukshchim wainomi.
66020002	K am thaha g Nehbig Hujud ch d ge Jiawul ch hab chehgig Satan. Tki g anghil an si wulshp
66020003	k am tha'ich heg eda s-juhk wag k ab si yahwidath k ab ep si bithsh. T hab pi ab hu ep wo i wuhshani k pi ep wo ha iattogi g hemajkam am hugkam mat wo e ai g hemako mihl a'ahithag. Ith at i thahm am hi wa ep wo sha'i e thagito pi sha'i tash.
66020004	Kuni hahawa ep neith g kokownal thathaikud ch hegam mo an thadha. Ihtham amtki ab ha mah g gewkthag mat d wo u'usagakamk. Am ani ep ha neith hegam mat e ko'ij no pi am ahgachug hegai Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mo g Jesus am ha tashogith. Ihtham at pi ab hu sha'i has i el g s-ta Ehbithamakam ni'is g cheposigajkaj ab hu e chechpos e-koka an o e-nohnhoi an. Jiosh at ab ha mah g ap'ethag mat ab wo i wuwha muhkig amjed k am wo i ha wanimedath g hemajkam wehmaj g Christ hemako mihl a'ahith ab.
66020005	Hegam mat wehpeg ab wo i wuwha muhkig amjed at wo si s-hehgigk ch wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ch pi am hu gahi ep wo wuwha g muhkig. Jiosh at hab wo ha juh mat d wo papalk ch d wo piongajk g alithag. Kut heg wehm am wo i ha wanim g hemajkam hemako mihl a'ahith ab. (5) T wabshaba pi koi ab hu uhpam wo i e chechegito hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh am hugkam mat wo huhug g hemako mihl a'ahithag.
66020007	Am i thahm g hemako mihl a'ahithag, mtki ab wo i wuhshath g ge Jiawul amjed mam am kuhpch.
66020008	Kutki am wo him k am ep wo ha iattogi g hemajkam an wehsko jewed thahm. Ihtham hemajkam at ha'i hab wo e a'agath Gog O'othham ch ha'i hab wo e a'agath Magog O'othham. Kut g Jiawul am wo i ha hemapai mat hab wo juh g cheggiadag. Kutki hab sha masma wo mu'ijk mo g o'od an shuhthagi bahsho
66020009	ch am wehskojed wo i e hemapath k an wo e keshwua ha wehgaj hegam mo d Jiosh hemajkamga ch am kih Jerusalem ch ed. T oi wa g mehi ab wo i hud thahm kahchim t amjed k wo ha hugio.
66020010	Mt amjed g ge Jiawul am tha'ich heg eda kahchki mo chum hekith meihim. Tho ihtha mei kahchki mamt am eda heki hu ha nehnich g s-ta Ehbithamakam ch s-chu Iattomkam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam. Ihtham atki ab wo nako g s-ko'ok tash oitham ch chuhug oitham am i amjed ch chum hekith.
66020011	Ni hahawa ep neith mo g si ge'e s-toa kownal thaikud am kehk. K ab thaha g Jiosh. T g jewed ch thahm kahchim heb hu wohp ab amjed k pi hekith ep sha'i e neith.
66020012	Kuni ha neith hegam mo d ko'i ch d nahnko i mahs hemajkam. Ihtham o am gegok wui g kownal thaikud. Kut i e kuhkpi'o hegam o'ohana mo an o'ohadag g pi ap ha-chu'ichig. T am ep i e kuhpi'o hegai o'ohana mo am eda o'ohadag g e tho'ibiakam ha-chechgig. T g Jiosh ha lothai g ko'i.
66020013	Wehsijj at i wuwha ab ge shuhthagi t amjed ch ab hiha'ini t amjed an wehsko jewed thahm. T g Jiosh ha lothai heg hekaj mo haschu i pi ap has junihim.
66020014	Pi o an hu o'ohanas g ha-chechgig heg eda o'ohana mo an o'ohanas g e tho'ibiakam ha-chechgig. Kumt hekaj am ha shul heg eda kahchki mo meihim. Ith at hab wo masmak mo g gokkokam muhkig. T g Jiosh am wo hugio g muhkig k am ep wo hugio amai mo am ha'ichug g ko'i.
66021001	Ni hahawa ep neith g si wechij thahm kahchim ch si wechij jewed. Hegai wehpeg thahm kahchim ch wehpeg jewed at wa heb hu hihi. T g ge shuhthagi am wabsh i huhug.
66021002	K ab i hudunihim g si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kihhim thahm kahchim t amjed. Ith atki g Jiosh nahto. K hab e a'aga Wechij Jerusalem ch si e nahtokch am wehhejed g Jiosh alithag hab sha masma mat g wo kuntam wo si e nahtokch mat wo nam g wo e-kunta.
66021003	Ab o thaha g Jiosh e-kownal thaikud ab. Kuni kah mo hab kaij, “Ithani at g ni-kihthag ia i hud ha wui g hemajkam. Am ant ha wehm wo kihkath. Kut d wo ni-hemajkamgak. Am ant wo ha wehmajk ch d wo ha-Jioshgak
66021004	ch ab wo i thagi'o g ha-oh'og ab ha-wuhpui ab. Pi at hedai haha wo muh o pi ap wo e tahtkkath o wo shoakath o wo tahtkkath g s-ko'ok. Im at hu hab i e juh g hekiukam.”
66021005	Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh ch amjed hab ep kaij, “Ithani ant am hahawa si wechij nahto wehs ha'ichu,” ch hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “An g o'ohan ihtha wohokam mani m-ahgith. Wehs hemajkam at ab wo chum s-wohoch,”
66021006	K hab ep kaij, “E at nahto wehs ha'ichu. Ahni ani d alpha ch d omega. Ith o hab d ahga mani si wehpeg ia ha'ichug ch si ha oithch ia wabsh wo kia ha'ichugk. Nt wo ha mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hegam matp hedai wo tatchua hab masma mamt wo ha wasibi g tonkkoi g shuhthagi.
66021007	Ab ant ni-wui wo i ha gawulkai mat d wo ni-a'aligak hegam mat hedai i gewito g pi ap'ekam.
66021008	T wabshaba wo e nehnich mei kahchki ch ed g s-chu ehbithkam ch pi wohochuththam ch hegam mo loligog ch chum e u'uwichuth o chum e chechojchuth ch ha mu'adkam ch totonto ch s-chu hihoinkam ch s-chu i'attomkam ch hegam mo wabsh g o'othham nahtoi ha jijoshchuth. Hegai mei kahchki o d gokkokam muhkig.”
66021009	Hema hegam wewa'ak anghil mat am u'apa g si oithchkam sho'igthag at am jiwia ni-wui k hab kaij. “Ab g i hihm. Nt am wo m-chehgi hegam mo d hohnigaj hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.”
66021010	T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab si i ni-wehmt. T g anghil am i ni-be k am ni-u'apa si uhgk tho'ag thahm k ab i ni-chehgi hegai hekia s-ap'ekam kihhim mo d Wechij Jerusalem. Ith o ab hudunihim thahm kahchim t amjed ch d Jiosh nahtoi
66021011	ch si tonod g Jiosh tonligkaj hab masma mo hegai si s-kehg gai tondam hothai mo hab e a'aga jasper.
66021012	An kihhim wehgaj o hab chu'ig g uhgk kolhai. K ith eda hab chu'ig g gamai gohk kihkijeg. K g gamai gohk anghil ab ha nuhkuth g kihkijeg. An o kihkijeg t an hab chu'ig g ha-chechgig hegam gamai gohk thakam Tutuligo hemajkam.
66021013	Waik kihkijeg o hab chu'ig an si'alig tahgio ch waik an juhpin tahgio ch waik an wakolim tahgio ch waik an hudunig tahgio.
66021014	K ihtha kihhim kolhaidag o an hab junis gamai gohk hohothai thahm. K ihtham ha ab an o'ohadag g ha-chechgig hegam gamai gohk chuhchaij hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.
66021015	Hegai anghil mo ab ni-wui neok o g ohla kuintakud uhs an u'ukch mat hekaj wo kuint g kihhim ch g kolhaidaj ch g kihkijeg.
66021016	K ihtha kihhim si s-ap s-chuhchpul ch ha'as uhgk ch ha'as chewaj mo he'es i s-tadani. T g anghil am kuint. K d mihl hetasp siant (1500) mihya.
66021017	T g anghil am ep kuint g kolhaidag. K d gohk siant gamai chuhthp (216) tad uhgk.
66021018	K hegai kolhai heg hekaj hab junis hothai mo hab e a'aga jasper. K g kihhim d wabsh gai tondam ohla.
66021019	K g shondaj ith hekaj hab junis nahnko mahs si s-kehg hohothai. Wehpeg shondaj o d hegai hothai mo hab e a'aga jasper. K g gokkokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga sapphire. K g waikkokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga agate. K g gi'ikkokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga emerald.
66021020	K g hetaspokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga onyx. K g chuhthpokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga carnelian. K g wewa'akkokam s-oam ch d hegai mo hab e a'aga quartz. K g gigi'ikkokam d hegai mo ab e a'aga beryl. K g humuktokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga topaz. K g wehst-mahmhokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga chalcedony. K g gamai hemako d hegai mo hab e a'aga turquoise. K g gamai gokkokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga amethyst.
66021021	K g gamai gohk kihkijeg d hegai hothai mo hab e a'aga pearl. Wehsijj hegam kihkijeg o hab junis ab hehemako pearl amjed. K g kahya am kihhim ch ed d wabsh ohla ch am wabsh gai tonod hab masma mo g mi-lihtha.
66021022	Pi ani sha'i hema neith g cheopi. Wehs g kihhim o d wabsh ge cheopi no pi an eda kihthag g Jiosh ch hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.
66021023	Pi o an hu ha'ichug g tash ch mashath. Jiosh o an wehsko tonlithch g kihhim heg wehm mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch g si ge'e e-gewkthagkaj.
66021024	Hemajkam am jewed thahm at s-ap am wo hihimath ith hekaj tonlig. T g kokownal am wo u'apa g e-kakaisthag.
66021025	T g kihkijeg chum hekith ab wabsh wo kuhkpi'okask. Pi at hekith wo s-chuchkagath. T heg hekaj pi ab hu wo i e kuhkp g kihkijeg.
66021026	Si s-has haha'ichu am wehs jejewed ch ed at am wo u'apa g e-kakaisthag.
66021027	T wabshaba pi am hu wo hiwgithask g s-uam ha'ichu. T pi ab hu wo i wahp g s-chu i'attomkam ch hegam mo hab junihim g s-ta edam ha'ichu. Hegam at am wo wa'i wahpkath heg eda kihhim mo g ha-chechgig an o'ohadag heg eda mo g e tho'ibiakam ha-chechgig an o'ohadag. Ith o d o'ohanaj hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.
66022001	T am hahawa ni-chehgi g akimel hegai anghil. K ith ab tha'iwuni heg amjed kownal thaikud mo g Jiosh an thaha heg wehm mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. K hab d ahga ihtha mo g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Shuhthagi o si tohonnod hab masma mo g tondam hothai
66022002	ch an si eda med g kahya. K g thoakag uhs ge a'aijed shohshon ch an a'ai kehk ihtha akimel ch an babhe hemho wehs mashath ab. K g hahhagaj d ha-kulaniga g nahnko mahs hemajkam wehsko jewed thahm.
66022003	K pi an hu ha'ichug hegai mo pi hohho'ithachuth g Jiosh. Am at wo ha'ichugk g Jiosh kownal thaikud. Kut an wo thakath hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. T g piongaj ab wo si has elithath
66022004	ch wo neithath g wuhioshaj. T g chehgigaj an wo o'ohadagk ha-koka ab.
66022005	Pi at thahm ep wo s-chuhugamk nat pi g tonlig a'ai wo wuhshanith ab amjed g Jiosh. Kut pi an hu wo ha'ichugk g tash. T pi wo e tatchuath g lalampa. T g Jiosh hemajkamga am d wo kokownalk chum hekith.
66022006	K hab hahawa ep kaij g anghil ab ni-wui, “Ihtham ha'ichu ahga o woho. Kut wehsijj ab wo chum s-wohoch. Jiosh o wa ab ha mahkch g ha'ichu i e-tashogiththam g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat am wo ha'ichu ha chehgi ch am ep ni-chehani mant am wo em-chehgi hegai mat haschu has wo e juh s-hohtam.” Neh, bo kaij g anghil.
66022007	K g Jesus hab kaij, “Ab g wo i ni-kaiham. S-hohtam ant wo jiwia. Jiosh at wo wa s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mat ab wo s-wohog el wehs ihtha gm hu ba'ich ha'ichu ahga mo in o'ohanas.” Neh, bo kaij.
66022008	Kuni ahni John wehs kah ch wehs neith ihtha mani in o'ohan ith eda o'ohana. Am o wa kehk hegai anghil mo ab ni-wui neok. Nt ab i gei wecho k ab chum si has elith am i neithok k kaiok ihtha wehs.
66022009	K wabshaba hab kaij ab ni-wui, “Pi g am hab e juhni. Thani wabsh em-wehm pion ahpim Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch wehs hegam mo ab s-wohog elith mo haschu an o'ohadag ith eda o'ohana. Ab g has i elith g Jiosh.”
66022010	K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “E o aihim mat wehs am hab wo e juh ihtha map neith ch kah ch an o'ohan. Pi g am ehsto.
66022011	“Pi at hedai wo sha'i e nako mas am gawul wo e juh mat hekith wo e ai ihtha. Hegam mo d p ap'ekam at d wabsh wo pi ap'ekamk. T hegam mo d s-ap'ekam am hab wabsh wo i chu'igkath ch am hab wo wa junihith g s-ap'ekam.”
66022012	K g Jesus hab kaij, “Ab g wo ni-kaiham. S-hohtam ant wo jiwia k wo u'ath g ni-mahkigdag mant ab wo i ha mahkhi ha'as mat hedai he'es ha'ichu hab i juh.
66022013	Ahni ani d alpha ch d omega. Ith o hab d ahga ‘si wehpegkam ch si oithchkam’ ch hab d ep ahga ‘i shonkam ch i kuhgkam.’ ”
66022014	Neh, no hig pi woho mat wo si s-ap e tahtkk ch pi wo si e el hegai mat g wehschugaj s-kehg wo wakonask, Pegih, mt hab wa masma wo si s-ap e tahtkk matp gm hu hab wo i e juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig. Jiosh at ab wo em-mah g ap'ethag mamt ab wo ko'ath g bahithaj hegai thoakag uhs ch ab wo i wahp kolhai kihjeg t ab heg eda Wechij Jerusalem. Kumt wo si s-hehgigk.
66022015	K wabshaba am jeg ed hab chu'ig hegam mo s-uam ha'ichu hab wua ch hegam mo hab wua g hihoina ch s-totontomkam ch ha mu'akam ch hegam mo jijoshchuth g hemajkam ha'ichu ha-nahtoi ch hegam mo s-hohho'ith g ha'ichu iattogi ch ha'ichu ha iattogith.
66022016	K hab kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ant am cheha g ni-anghiliga mat am wo em-ahgi ihtha wehs ahpim mam am kawod e nanmek ch ab has ni-elith. Ahni ani d Davidbad amjedkam ch wepo masma mo g si s-mahs si'alig hu'u.”
66022017	Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o ab i ha waith g hemajkam am gai ha wuhshanim hegam mo ab si has elith g Jesus Christ, Ihtham o hab kaij, “Ab g wo beh'i g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.” Kut wehsijj hegam mat ab wo kah ihtha at hab wa'ap wo chei, “Ab g wo beh'i g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.” Pegih, ab g wo beh'i wehsijj ahpim mam hedai i tatchua. Bo wa masma am em-wehhejed mo g shonkam shuhthagi am ha wehhejed g tonkkoi.
66022018	S-e g wo nen'oithk ahpim mamt ab wo i kah mamt pi am hu gawul wo juh ihtha gm hu ba'ich ha'ichu ahga mo in hab chu'ig ith eda o'ohana. Mu'i o ha'ichu in o'ohadag g sho'igthag. Kut ith ab wo i wehnath g Jiosh g s-ko'ok em-namkithadag mamtp ab ha'ichu wo i wehnath hegai mo in o'ohadag.
66022019	K in o'ohadag mach ap'ethag matt am wo i wahp Si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kihhim ed k wo huh g bahithag hegai uhs mo ab t-chehgithch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. T wabshaba g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g em-ap'ethag mamtp ahpim ha'ichu gm hu hab wo i juh ith amjed o'ohana.
66022020	Hegai mo am s-mahch ch ahg wehs ihtha o hab kaij, “Woho o wa. S-hohtam ant ab wo i hih.” Pegih oi g. Ab g i hihm, t-kownalig Jesus.
66022021	T wo wa s-em-ho'ige'el g t-kownalig Jesus k am wo em-wehmajk.
